1b1(sha): k+Shu
1b2(sha): d+h+r-i/
1b3(sha): Sh+mid+d+ha//
1b4(sha): dzi R+Ya//
2a1(sha): @#/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i ye
2a2(sha): shes/ 'jam dpal gshin rje nag po gsang ba de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'khrul
2a3(sha): 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug sbyong ba zhes bya ba rgyud
2a4(sha): rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo 'jigs btson la
2b1(sha): phyag 'tshal lo// 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal dang / steng gi de
2b2(sha): bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i seng ge dang / gzhan yang sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
2b3(sha): dpa' chen po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub pa rnams dang / gzhan
2b4(sha): yang 'jam dpal nag po'i tshogs la/ gshin rje gshed dang / thugs mchog 'bar ba dang / ya ma
2b5(sha): rA dza dang / myos byed 'bar ba dang / ar+ya dmar po dang / ral pa char dgu dang / rdo rje bdud 'joms
3a1(sha): @##dang dmar po dang / dmigs pa dang / mig dmar dang / a ba glang mgo dang / lcogs pa mgo
3a2(sha): dgu dang / ya ba ti dang / rtol pa dang / phya sangs dang / stag mgo nag po dang / ro langs ma dang / e ka dza ti dang / lha
3a3(sha): mo nag mo dang / bdud mo nag mo dang / sbal mgo khrag mig ma dang / srin mo mgo 'phyangs dang / yag sha nag mo dang / rdo rje
3a4(sha): ral gcig dang / drang srong dkar skya dang / rak+ta dri snoms dang / spyang mo mgo dgu dang / khrag gi ral pa can dang / nag mo
3a5(sha): spus 'gro dang / sngo skye mche ba dang / rlung lnga spyan gsum ma dang / rak+kha kha rag ma dang / gnod sbyin ral pa can la sogs te
3a6(sha): yum gyi tshogs dang / de dag rang rang gi 'khor no zhe sdang gi rgyal po dang / nga rgyal gyi rgyal po dang / 'dod chags kyi rgyal po
3b1(sha): dang phrag dog gi rgyal po dang / gti mug gi rgyal po dang / bdud kyi tshogs dang / dri za'i tshogs dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / gshin rje'i tshogs
3b2(sha): dang srin po'i tshogs dang / klu dbang gi tshogs dang / ya bdud kyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang 'byung po'i
3b3(sha): tshogs dang / sa bdag gi tshogs dang / gzhan yang las kyi gshin rje'i tshogs la/ tshe bo dag nag po dang / stag mda' dmar po dang / gab pa thun
3b4(sha): 'bebs dang / chos kyi rgyal po dang / bye bas ta dang / bye ba gung rings dang / nag po lto 'phyangs dang / 'chi bdag nag po dang / bdud 'bebs
3b5(sha): rten can dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / kha g.yal mche gtsigs dang / me dpal srog gcod dang / de dag la sogs te re re'i 'khor na las kyi gshin rje khri
3b6(sha): khri gnas pa'i tshogs rnams dang / gzhan yang 'chi bdag bdud kyi tshogs la/ bdud kyi rgyal po rinag spungs pa dang / bdud po mi zan bcu dang / bdud kyi
3b7(sha): blon po bdun dang / bdun gyi khyad pa sde bzhi dang / bdud kyi bskos pa sde bzhi dang / bdud kyi skya dmag sde bcu gsum dang / bdud kyi zungs pa bzhi dang / bdud
4a1(sha): kyi pho nya bzhi dang / bdud kyi bla rkun bzhi dang / bdud kyi shan pa sde bzhi dang / de la sogs te bdud rigs stong phrag brgyad cu dang / gzhan yang mon
4a2(sha): pa bdun la sogs te mon gyi tshogs rnams dang / gzhan yang thig le chos kyi sku las mngon par shar ba/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo la sogs dbyings kyi yum lnga dang / chos kyi
4a3(sha): dbyings kyi ngang la sa shar ba/ srid pa bde 'gro la sogs te ye shes kyi ma mo bcu bzhi dang / ye shes rol pa la sogs pa las sprul pa e ka drA ti la sogs pa srid pa'i sman mo//
4a4(sha): rnams dang / 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa ma mo nag mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / rdo rje mkha' 'a gro la sogs mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsam gyis
4a5(sha): mi khyab pa dang / bdud mo brgya byin kun dga' mo la sogs pa bdud mo'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin 'phrog ma la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /
4a6(sha): mon mo kha g.yal la sogs te mon mo'i tshogs dang / srin mo khrag 'thung la sogs te srin mo'i tshogs dang / lha mo dga' byed la sogs te lha mo'i tshogs dang / klu mo yak+ka la
4a7(sha): sogs te klu mo'i tshogs dang / de dag la sogs te dregs shing rngam pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas
4b1(sha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po/ btsun mo gsang ba'i yum chen mo dang gnyis su med par gyur te/ g.yo ba
4b2(sha): med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i ngang las sangs rgyas dang sems can thams cad kyang bde ba chen po'i ro myong ba la ma g.yos pa kho nar gnas so// de ltar de'i ngang las
4b3(sha): 'di skad ces bya ba'i sgra rang byung bar gyur to// gnas dang ston pa 'khor bstan dus// 'di zhes mtshon pa rnam bzhi'i dbyibs// skad ces gsal byed ston pa'i gtso//
4b4(sha): bshad ni las can 'khor sdud yid// pa sgra don dam rgyud mchog nges// dus bzhi mnyam nyid 'dir rdzogs pa'o// zhes grags par gyur to// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor
4b5(sha): rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'khrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de'i tshe de'i dus na nyid las ma
4b6(sha): g.yos pa'i 'khor sprul pa'i sku yi rang byung gi ye shes rol pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas/ thal mo sbyar te mi g.yo ba las bslang ba'i phyir gsol pa/ e ma ho//
4b7(sha): ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa la/ kun gzhi rnam dag dang yas ma g.yos kyang // rdzogs pa'i tshul du longs spyod skur bzhengs pas// mnyam nyid dang pas 'gro ba'i
5a1(sha): don mdzod cig/ ces bskul bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzhi byang chub sems kyi ngang las khro chen 'bar ba'i skur bzhengs te gsad
5a2(sha): ba'i rtsa rnams g.yos te/ drag po gtu ma rnga ma seng ge zil gnon zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas/ sku phyag rgya chen po'i gar bsgyur te/ gsung rnga ma
5a3(sha): pa'i nga ro 'di bsgrags so// hUM hUM hUM dzA na dz+wa la/ e ha la ha ya/ a kro te ka phaT phaT/ dza hUM baM ho hring hring / zhes 'brug gi sgra dus gcig ldir ba bsgrags pa sa/ 'og min
5a4(sha): gyi gnas dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bskyod la khad/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos par gyur te/ khur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem
5a5(sha): che ma/ rab tu che ma che ma/ shig shig/ rab tu shig shog/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma' bar gyur/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur te/ ldeg cing 'jigs la khang
5a6(sha): par gyur to// 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad kyang brgyal te lus la rdebs par gyur to// de nas yang ga shin rje'i rgyal po sprul pa'i sku yis/ 'khor rnams brgya la
5a7(sha): ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das lhun grub rdo rje la gsol ba btab bo// kye ho lnga nyid lhun grub rdo rje 'chang // bde chen thig le spros bral dag pa las//
5b1(sha): ye shes rol pa'i rdzogs skur ba zhengs nas kyang // cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam 'das dpag tu med// 'jig rten
5b2(sha): khams rnams 'ur 'ur che ma che ma g.yos// 'khor rnams khams nas lus kyang sa la rdebs// dbugs dang ma bral dran pa'i dbang po nyams// de phyir 'khor rnams
5b3(sha): srog dang ldan par mdzod// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs lhan gyis rdzogs pa'i rdo rje des/ 'khor rnams brgya la ba las
5b4(sha): bslang ba'i phyir/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// skad cig ma de nyid las 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs so// de nyid du rang gi
5b5(sha): de kho na nyid mthong ste/ ye shes rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i sku phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs te/ 'khor 'dus pa'i tshogs
5b6(sha): phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i dregs pa can de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la mgrin gcig tu gsol pa/ kye ho rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin
5b7(sha): ga shekas// thig le ye shes rol pa las// khro bo'i rgyal po 'jigs shi rnga ma// khros pas 'khor rnams dran pa nyam pa// rdzu 'phrul rmad byung ngo sa tshar che//
6a1(sha): bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa yis// rang dam srog gi snying po rnams// bstan pa srung phyir las dang bcas// rdo rje khros pa'i spyan sngar 'bul// dpa'
6a2(sha): po chen khros nyid kyis// rnam shes srog snying 'di bzhes la// dbang bskur byin rlabs stobs ldan mdzod// bdag cag dregs pa'i 'khor rnams kun// snang srid 'jig
6a3(sha): rten khams 'di ru// mun par 'thibs dang bsregs pa dang // lo thog 'joms dang gnam lcags 'bebs// smyo 'bog yams nad srog gcod dang // mdze shu sna tshogs
6a4(sha): 'dus pa'i nad// bdag cag rnams kyi rang las lags// dpa' bo chen po ci la skyon// cho 'phrul chen po ci la ston// bdag cag gdug byed dregs pa rnams//
6a5(sha): dkyil 'khor chen po'i sprul pa bgyid// ces gsol pas// bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs mi bzad pa'i rdo rje de dges pa chen por gyur te/ zhi ba dang / khro bo dang /
6a6(sha): gshin rje dang / ma mo dang / bdud pho mo dang / rgyal po dang / gza' rgod dang / srin po pho mo dang / mon pho mo dang / ging pho mo dang / dmu dang / btsan dang / srog bdag
6a7(sha): dang / lha gdon dang / sa bdag pho mo dang / klu dang / gnyan dang / mkha' 'gro dang / de dag la sogs te lha ma srin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i srog gi snying po rang dam gcig/
6b1(sha): tu dril nas bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ ya las ni bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa bzhi ru phye ste phul lo// ya las ni yan lag rnam pa gsum du phye nas phul lo//
6b2(sha): la la zhi rgyun gyi drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni bsgrub pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni dmod pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// la las ni tshig chod kyi drag sngags
6b3(sha): su phul lo// ya las ni tshad can gyi ngan sngags su phul lo// la las ni tshad med kyi ngan sngags su phul lo// ya las ni gdab pa'i ngan sngags su phul lo//
6b4(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dang las thams cad gcig tu dri ya te/ dbang du bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang dam
6b5(sha): bca' ba 'di gsungs so// he he/ 'khor tshogs zhi khror sprul pa kun// nga nyid rdo rje kun bzang ni// chos sku skye 'gag med pa las// longs spyod chen po'i skur bstan
6b6(sha): te ta sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ nga nyid ldan rdzogs khro bdag che// sku lnga yang dag rdzogs pa yang // lnga ny-id lhun l+ye shes ni// brtan g.yo kun la brdal cing khyab//
6b7(sha): thams cad nyid pa 'bal chos sku'o// sems nyid ye shes rang gsal ba// ma sangs za ba med bsod nams kyang // rang snang longs spyod chen po'i ste// thams cad
7a1(sha): nyid la lhun grub ste// ma btsal nyid la nyid rdzogs pa// mngon par byang chub sku ru bshad// snang stong gnyis su mi phyed phyir// gdul bya 'joms
7a2(sha): pas rdo rje'i sku// gdul bya rnams kyi ngo bo la// zhing khams bsam yas thams cad du// cir yang snang phyir sprul sku'o// de dag nga nyid rdo rje 'chang // gsung lnga
7a3(sha): lhun gyis grub pa yang // spros pa thams cad brjod med phyir// brjod bya'i ngo bo gzhan na med// sgra tshig thams cad las 'das te// brjod bral bsam brjod kun
7a4(sha): gyi gzhi// sgra rnams ma spang rang snang phyir// don nyid brjod bya kun snang bas// de mtshon byed pa'i yan lag ni// snang la sogs pa'i don ston pa'o// dngos nyid sgra
7a5(sha): rnams sems nyid phyir// 'dzin med snang brjod mi gos yangs// sgra kun sems nyid bdag gsung gsal// grags stong gnyis med mi phyed pa'o// sgra gcig la na
7a6(sha): cig spros phyir// ston pas de bzhin nyid du gsungs// sgra yi bye brag kun rdzogs pas// gdul bya'i ngo la so sor thos// ma brjod ye shes rig pa yis// thams
7a7(sha): cad gsal bar brda sprod phyir// rig pa spros med brjod bral de// thams cad khyab pas dgra rnams kun// bdag tu lhun grub cir yang rol// gdul bya'i yid
7b1(sha): bzhin dus gcig gsal// de dag rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// ye shes lhun grub thugs nyid kyang // mtshan ma kun bral ngang gi stong // sgrib med nyid du lhun rdzogs
7b2(sha): gas la// dbyings nyid brda khyab gnyis dang bral// chos rnams ma 'dres kun tu ston// yon tan lhun rdzogs rol bsam yas// de nyid rdo rje nga yi thugs// 'khor
7b3(sha): 'das dregs pa rnga ma chen kun// srog dang nus pa dbang bsdus te// dregs pa'i tshul du las ngo long // dbang po bkrag mdangs nga dbang sbyar// zhes gsungs
7b4(sha): pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang srog gi snying po thams cad nus pa dpag tu med pa'i mthur byin gyis brlabs te bsdus so// las thams cad sbyor ba sna tshogs
7b5(sha): kyi mthu dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs te bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus shes na/ yi ge gsum gyi brda ru dril nas srid pa'i khyabs khang du dbang du bsdus so//
7b6(sha): de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis ngag 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho rdo rje 'chang chen dpal// bdag cag 'khor du 'dus pa rnams//
7b7(sha): dpa' bo chen po'i spyan snga ru// rang dam srog gi snying po phul// bdag cag rang las bsgrub par bgyid// bstan pa srung zhing chos 'khor bskyang // log par lta
8a1(sha): pa'i dgra dang bgegs// skad cig yud la bsgral bar bgyi// gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga ru// dam bcas bzhin du ma bgyis na// bdag cag
8a2(sha): rnams kyi mgo lus snying // tshal pa brgyar gas sreg par shog/ ces bro bor na sa dam bcas so// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri
8a3(sha): drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi nang nas gshin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de
8a4(sha): bzhin gshegs pa rngam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang // las las grub pa'i genas mchog
8a5(sha): dang / tagasang ba drod kyi 'khor lo gsum// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba gsum gyi don
8a6(sha): rgyas par bshad do// 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams nyon// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ phyi nang snod bcud
8a7(sha): dag pa ru// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ de yi yon tan bsam mo khyab// dur khrod chen po gtum pa yi// gdug pa can dang ldan pa ru// las
8b1(sha): las grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // yum gyi b+ha ga yangs pa ru// gsang ba drod kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa yi// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa/
8b2(sha): 'di lta ste// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan// thod pa keng rus bcag par bcas// sgo bzhi gru chad par khyams 'gram// rta babs bzhi dang tA ra Na// lhun po bzhi
8b3(sha): dang ldan pa'i gnas// nor bu rin chen keng rus kyis// ka ba brgyad dang de bzhin gdung // tshangs pa'i dral phyam zhing rus bcas// thod pa rgyu ma zhing chung gis//
8b4(sha): bla 'og thams cad smras pa'o// stag gzig seng ge ma he glang // chu srin gnam lcags sgo la mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo dur khrod brgyan// yid 'ong mchod pas
8b5(sha): gang bar spras// rin chen pha gu thod pa zhing // dra ba dra phyed dri ya bu dang // zhing chung rgyan gyis mdzes pa'o// rdo rje me 'od shin tu 'bar// dbus ni gru gsum mthing
8b6(sha): nag la/ rtagasang mdzad rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang lcags// rdo rje ra ba le tse dgu// thod rlon 'phreng ba rtsizas bcu lcags// gos ras khrag mtsho thod skam bskor//
8b7(sha): phyi rim 'khor lo dgu gnyis gsu// gos ras gser bcas rdo rjes gsor// gru chad khrag mtsho dmar nag bzhi// bar khyams bzhi dang sgo bzhi phyogs//
9a1(sha): byi yi bar khyams sgo bzhir ldan// dbus su gshin rje bdud mo bsnol// ma he nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// gshed bdag gtso bo me klong dbus//
9a2(sha): g.yas g.yon sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i dbus// gru gsum gdan la dregs pa'i tshul// mdun na srin po'i gdan stengs su// thugs mchog yab yum rngam
9a3(sha): zhing bzhad// rtsibs bzhi rung rang gdan stengs su// gshed po bzhi rnams yum dang bcas// rtsibs bcur phyogs skyong yab yum la// rtsibs mtshan bdud
9a4(sha): po yab yum gnas// phyi rim sgrol ging bco brgyad la// rtsibs mtshan ging mo de bzhin te// gru chad ro langs lce spyang gnas// nang gi bar khyams thar
9a5(sha): byed brgyad// yu ma dang bcas te gnas pa'o// sgo bzhir sgo ma sgrol byed bzhi// phyi yi bar khyams mon pho mo// las kyi ga shi ni rje bdun gnyis gnas//
9a6(sha): sgo bzhir ba se yi lha mo bzhi// rang rang ga dan la rdzogs par ga nas// phyi khyams khor yug sde brgyad gnas// 'bum phrag g.yog dang yang g.yog bcas
9a7(sha): drug khri drug stong 'khod pa'o// rang sngags srog gis 'brel pa yis// dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa ni// 'khor du sngags pa kun 'dus pa'o//
9b1(sha): lhun gyi grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// dur khrod las grub dkyil 'khor ni// lho yi phyogs na gshin rje'i gnas// dur khrod chen po'i gtum drag tshal// zhes
9b2(sha): byibya rgya khyon dpag tu med// rmang logs gser dang g.yu ru snang // rtse mo gnam lcags u ra mo la// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i bad gtams pa// 'khor lo gnam
9b3(sha): lcags mtshon cha yis// 'od zer bzhir 'phro rab tu 'khrug/ mchog chen mchog phran dra ba sa gtams// ba ma chen chu srin 'khor lo yi// ka ba ka zhu ka gdan bcas/
9b4(sha): ga nam lcags thog gi tsha tsha 'phro// thod pa brtsegs pa'i 'bur chung zhing // zhing che na bla ra 'phan dang gdugs// chu srin rgyal mtshan dpa' ngar bkram// tsit+ta
9b5(sha): mang po sprin ltar btibs// rtse nas rtsa bar zhag 'dzag kho la// bskal pa'i ma ri sna tshogs 'bar// keng rus sha khrag dur khrod 'dam// gnam lcags khang
9b6(sha): bzangs me ru 'bar// 'khor lo'i gzhal yas ro myags 'dam// dur khrod gnas chen khri stong yod// nyi zla 'phra men mthongs yod pa// gza' dang skar mas
9b7(sha): yongs su brgyan/ mtshon gyi brlabs dang rlung nag dri ba so dang // ker rus ri rab mtha' ma lcags ris bskor// da lta bu yi gnas da na// ro ya tshogs rnams
10a1(sha): gnas pa ni// rlon dang skams dang rul ba dang // gsar dang rnying dang phyed dal dang // bam dang dpungs dang mnam pa dang // rangs pa dang ni stod
10a2(sha): smad dang // rengs dang rnam par rengs pa dang // 'khums dang bus dang 'gyel pa dang // langs pa dang ni 'greng ba dang // lU rdu ma mgo dang phyed ma dang // keng rus
10a3(sha): brul dang tshal bu dang // khrag dang rnag dang chu ser dang // zhag dang lha rkang nang rol dang // rgyu ma dri zhen pags pa la// ro la 'brad dang gshog pa dang // 'thung
10a4(sha): shing 'tshong dang longs spyod byed// de lta bu yi dur khrod na// 'jig rten yi dwags srog la za ba dang // stag gzig dom dred bya rog kang ka dang // byan lag spyang ki kha
10a5(sha): 'ug yin du kha// srin 'bu la sogs de dag thams cad kyang // sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'cha' ba dang // ldag nyog byed dang lha dang rgod pa dang // ngu dang cho nges
10a6(sha): 'debs dang khu cos 'don// 'phyong dang rgol dang srog la 'jab pa dang // mig bsgrims lag rjes rgyug pa dang // rnga ma dang srog len bla rku bdud kyang bcod//
10a7(sha): mo la sems 'byor 'jug cing mngal kyang skems// drag po'i rkan rde bas ltas ngan sgra sgrogs dang // gzugs mi sdug dang 'dzum pa'i mdangs ston dang // 'kho
10b1(sha): lo'i bro brdung lcags kyi mda' 'phen dang // spyugs pa'i glu le na mgo yi dung 'bud dang // dar gyi g.yab 'dor rang la rang 'khro dang // sha za khrag 'thung rnying 'byin
10b2(sha): srog gcod dang // lag pa gar bsgyur rdo rje'i thog 'phen dang // gti mug ma sa'i dur khrod ri ltar spungs pa dang // 'dod chags rak+ta'i dur khrod rba glo 'khyil ba dang /
10b3(sha): zhe sdang keng rus dur khrod brag ltar gtam pa dang // rab tu 'jigs shing shin tu skyi g.ya' ba// las las grub pa'i dur khrod chen por bshad//
10b4(sha): gsang ba'i dur khrod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste/ rang rgyud dkyil 'khor drug dang srog shing gsum// thig lo bcud ldan yi ge'i rnam par ldan// rang rang rtsa
10b5(sha): dang kha dog ye shes gsal// yum gyi b+ha ga mkha' dbyings dag pu ru// rnam pa zhi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor nyi zla'i gdan// thig le'i ye shes rol pa'i
10b6(sha): bde chen sku// snang srid ka dag lhun gyis grub par bzhugs// de nyid gsang ba bde chen dkyil 'khor bshad// ces gsungs so// nges 'khor gyi tshogs
10b7(sha): thams cad mgu bar gyurabacom ldan 'das la ngag 'thun par 'di skad ces bstod do// e ma ho/ mnyam nyid dang las dreg pa'i skur sprul nas/
11a1(sha): gdug pa can rnams ma lus dbang du bsdus// bstan pa gnas phyir 'khor du sprul nas 'gyed// don gyi dkyil 'khor chen po ngo mtshar che//
11a2(sha): rdo rje 'chang chen khro bo'i rgyal// rnam dag chos sku gnyis med mkha'// ye shes rol pas 'jigs pa'i sku// cho 'phrul thugs rjes 'gro don mdzad// ces pastod
11a3(sha): do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di bstan to// skye 'gro ma lus chos sku ba de ba'i ngang // ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs//
11a4(sha): 'khor ba'i skyon bral bas ma yas dpag med sku// 'dul ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs sprul pa bstan// zhes gsungs pas/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar gyur te/
11a5(sha): bcom ldan 'das la ngo mtshar brjod de/ 'gro ba las kyis rmongs pa la// 'dul ba'i sku yis las rim bstan// bstan pa gnyis med mnyam sbyar bas// gdug pa
11a6(sha): thabs bsgral ngo mtshar che// zhes brjod do// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me yong khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// dkyil 'khor don gyi le'u ste/
11a7(sha): gsum pa'o// // de nas nyid kyi thugs las sprul pa'i sku ga shin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma he/
11b1(sha): chos sku byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'gro ba'i don du khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las
11b2(sha): mchog bsdus pas// mi dge mtshams med dman pa kun bsgrol ba'i// las kyi rgyal po sbyor ba smin pa'i mchog/ mchong chen gdug pa gnad tshul dregs pa yis//
11b3(sha): yan lag brgya gnyis bzhi dang yang bzhi dang // gzer thun nag po'i dmod pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas bka' bstsal pa//
11b4(sha): snying po byang chub sems bsdus nas// byin rlabs ldan pas gsang bcud bstan// 'jig rten khams na 'dul ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus dregs pas myos// bstan
11b5(sha): pa rin chen rgya lam cig/ snying po 'phrul gyi sbyor ba gcig/ lus kyi las sbyor brgya phrag brgya// yan lag nyis brgya stong bcu drug/ 'phra bsgyur bye bas khri phrag gcig/
11b6(sha): bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi lnga dang gcig/ bgrod pa'i rim pa drug phyed ldan// yan lag sngon dang bcas pa bzhi// rten gyi sbyor ba las bcu gnyis// 'dren pa'i gas
11b7(sha): lam bcu gnyis ldan// sgo dgug yang bcud e ka'i thog/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzhi dang stong // dbang gi rim pa lnga dang bcas// phyi nang gsang ba gsang chen dril//
12a1(sha): rang bzhin sbrul dang sgrub byed las// ye shes ya ma bany+tsa ti// las mchog thabs mchog gnyis dang rtsa// dkar nag las gsang brgya dang bcu/
12a2(sha): ga shin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro ging // bdud dang srin po sha za klu// smyo byed rgyal po dkar srungs gza'// sa bdag sde brgyad srog gcod ga nya na// rlag byed chu srin mu stegs
12a3(sha): sri// log 'dren 'byung po dur khrod bdag/ dri za lha gdon drang srong 'byung // gnod sbyin gnon po grib gnon sha na// smyo byed rkem byed brjed byed gshed// mdangs
12a4(sha): 'phrog khrag 'thung gtum po rgod// dbugs len drod nyul sha za rngam// khyung khra dur bya dur bya 'ug/ kha rgod skye spyang stag dom wa// khyi sbrul bud ba sdig sdom
12a5(sha): 'bru// 'jig rten dregs pa srog dbang 'phrog/ thams cad sregs shing las la myos// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas pa yis// gshin rje gshed kyi dge 'dun
12a6(sha): ku na// rgyud 'dir bstan pa kun 'byung ba// sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhir ba shad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug
12a7(sha): stong pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba
12b1(sha): yongs su rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'brel ba'i don 'di bshad do// bde dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yis// snod dang ngang tshul yul du
12b2(sha): brtag/ bde lam gsang sgo dregs pa yis// gter sgo yang thog sha za'i srog/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// rten dang grol ba sems dpag med//
12b3(sha): dri med sems kyi rgyan ldan mchog/ 'joms byed ya ma za yi lus// myos par dug gi spu dri can// dbang po brtan dang rdo rje me// ya ma brtan ma lus srin mo//
12b4(sha): rdo rje snying po stobs dpag med// me chu 'byung bzhi brtan dang 'pho// las kyi 'dren pa'i sgrog lus brgyan// dregs pa dbang phyug bde ba'i gnas// 'pho ba
12b5(sha): gsum gyi bdag nyid can// gsang lam yang thog mi 'gyur 'phel// bde byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'joms byed yA ma ka li'i srog/ 'dren pa stobs
12b6(sha): kyi lam las gzung // rkyen gsum lus gcig brda yis sbyar// shes pa gsum bsdus gcig la rten// dbye ba'i las ni bcu gnyis brgyad// rgyal mtshan
12b7(sha): rgyud kyi 'phrul dbang bcal// rig pa stobs kyi lam dang ldan// 'phen pa'i sbyor ba stobs dang sdud// rdo rje srin po sbyor ba gcig/ 'khor lo rin cha ni sgyu ma'i
13a1(sha): gter// dbang can bran dang las dbang g.yog/ mun khang mtsho gling ya ma'i gnas// nam mkha'i rgyal po khams dang chu// lo yi dgra dang
13a2(sha): rang dbang 'joms// gsang mchog rlung khams yan lag lus// gcod pas mtshon chagashed dbang sgyur// me yis 'jigs pa yang dag skyed// las kyis
13a3(sha): spyod pa'i snying po sa// don dang ldan pa'i las sbyangs la// las chen thig le nam mkha'i khongs// rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i stobs// snying po gsum la ya
13a4(sha): dag sdud// khams lnga'i dbyibs su bde ba bcud// sangs rgyas kun bdag lnga yi ngang // lnga nyid stobs bdag rang gnas mchog/ gsang ba'i rig can rin chen
13a5(sha): mdzod// mchog gi las dang sbyor ba'i las// 'khor lo rgyal po bde ba'i gnas// 'phrul gyi snying po gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba dbang gi rang rgyas btab/
13a6(sha): mi mthun lus la gnod byed gdon// dus dang len pa'i khams su sbyar// yul dang dbang po skye mched lnga// dbab pa'i sbyor ba gcig dang bcas// gshin rje nag
13a7(sha): po bdud dang gshed// rang lus phyag rgya'i stobs dang ldan// che ba'i thig les dregs pa 'khol// zil gnon phyag rgyas kun dbang sdud// las kyi phyag rgya dbang
13b1(sha): rim brtsegs// khams gsum 'khor ba'i sems can ni// dug lnga'i nad kyis gdungs shing 'khyams// de la sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// lus la gnag pa'i
13b2(sha): sdig pa gzhug/ gsum bsdus dril la yul dbang dbrog/ las kyi 'khol ba las la mngag/ lam sbyangs yul ba grod gnas dang sprad// phyag rgya'i lus la gsum
13b3(sha): gyis brlab// sku gsung thugs kyi bde gnas su// chos sku 'od zer 'bar bcas 'khyil// 'phro 'du dang bcas rang dbang sgyur// dri ma gsum dang drug la smin//
13b4(sha): nus pa'i stobs kyis dbang po sdud// gcig gi khams dang thams cad sbyar// 'du ba nad kyis lus la smin// b+ha ga bde ba'i pho brang du// byang chub 'khor ba'i
13b5(sha): lam sbyangs nas// bde ba chen po'i gnas phab la// sems dang dri ma gnyis brdzus la// sa bon dag pa'i dbyings su 'phangs// bde ba dang bcas gnas su
13b6(sha): 'khyi'o// sngags dang mchog las gzi brjid 'bar// zhing khams kun spros sbyang bgrod bsdu// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bde gnas ldan// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'o/
13b7(sha): 'bar gang // ye shes 'khor lo thig ler 'khyil// 'khor lho chung stong dpag cad// dkrugs pas phyag rgya gzhan dbang sgyur// lus bcud dang sa ma sems dang brag/
14a1(sha): pho brang sgo ru rten bzhi dpral// dbus kyi pho brang e la bsdu// rdo rje snying po brda yis dkru// bde lam bde gnas dgu thog dang // gsang las
14a2(sha): rdo rje bgrod lam 'phang // tshul gsum sbyor ba bzhi drung ldan// stobs bzhi yan lag bzhi dang bcas// be bag ta yi khu ba dang // rdo yis mtsho gling ka 'phangs dang //
14a3(sha): bde ba gsang mchog rgyal lam bskyed// ya ma ka li'i zhing khams nas// ya ma rakra 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang po snyings ma yul la rol// dngas ma'i srog mdang
14a4(sha): bde gnas gsal// rlig pa thod pa'i snying por bsdu// gsang gsum bde ba'i yul dang sprad// don gsum thabs kyis bgrod par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul
14a5(sha): 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ brda gsum thabs kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas ya ma rA dzA sa
14a6(sha): gsol pa/ bde chen gsang ba'i 'khor lo mchog/ bgrod cing lta ba ji ltar lags// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal pos/ gsang ba'i
14a7(sha): 'khor lo bgrod pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// rig pa sems kyi lta ba ni// bde ba'i 'khor lo ye shes can// 'khrug byed tsit+ta'i 'khor lor bcas// myos pa
14b1(sha): rten dang dpral ba nyid// srog gi dbang po kun bsdus la// tshe ga nas rdo rje'i lam du sbyang // dbang po rdo rje yul la bstim// srog gi rdo rje dbang bsdus la// rdo rje srin
14b2(sha): po'i stobs la bstim// rdo rje thig le stobs ldan la// 'phra man rdo rje'i sprul pa 'gyed// nyi ma'i rdo rje las dbang dkrug/ brtan pa'i rdo rjes gzir byas nas//
14b3(sha): tshe 'das srog rten rdo rjes 'joms// gnyis ldan rdo rje'i brda yis dbye// don gyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i sku// dbang po mchog gi rdo rjer 'gyur// don ldan rig pa chos
14b4(sha): sku'i klong // rdo rje'i rgyal po'i bcud sdud dbab// rang gnas tshe yi lam du gzud// 'jog po bde lam gyen bzlog 'phang // yul gyi dmigs pa rang la gzud//
14b5(sha): phyi nang snod bcud 'od du 'bar// ye shes 'phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyis// rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang chen 'gyur// gsang rgyal 'phrin las dngos grub 'di// b+hu g+ha raM g+ha ka tra//
14b6(sha): b+ha ga sha dz+nyA na b+ha lat+t+ra/ b+h+ye d+hA yA mA ra ka sha'i 'bru/ b+h+yo g+h+rA s+thi rA b+h+yAM D+haM tri/ pUng g+haM na na'usti ru tA/ stAM k+ShI b+hUb+h+yA d+h+yA b+hil+lA/ s+t+rIk+thaSh+Ti lha b+ha ska ya d+he d+ha la d+h+yaM s+yA yAM/ sa
14b7(sha): ga'i sbyor ba tshul gsum sbyar/ 'phrul gyi 'khru la mig skabs kyis sgyu// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gnyis da ye shes 'a m+bu la 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ rnal
15a1(sha): 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// 'khrul mig drag po 'khrul 'khor gyi// rgyu dang tshad dang gzer dang gnad// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang las dang gzer/
15a2(sha): dus dang gnas dang rdzas dang thabs// phyogs dang blang dang rgod dang 'pho// ldog dang 'khyams 'bral gcod dang 'bigs// rdzas dang gnas dang rgyu dang thun// rnal bzlog
15a3(sha): gzir gnan blang // las dang dngos grub thun mong mchog/ lus dang yan lag thabs gnad dang // bde ba smin byed dbang bsdu 'phang // sangs rgyas kun mnyam mthu
15a4(sha): stobs bdag/ rin chen rdo rjes ma ta/ ut+pal ljon shing myu gu'i 'bru// me tog mdog ldan bcud phyung ba// rtsi thog ma sbyar len dang 'khyams// rtsa ba dbang gi bkra
15a5(sha): ba'i mchog/ mdangs bcas bsgrol ba thabs ldan blang // bcu drug rkyang ba bzhi ldan gcig/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bde dbang sgyur// 'bigs dang gcod la
15a6(sha): sogs pa'i las// bsrungs dang skyob pa kun byed pa'o// 'khrul mig drag po gnyis dbang gcig/ 'khor lo mi 'gyur brtan po yi// phyag rgyu rdo rje sngags kyi
15a7(sha): gzer/ mtshon cha'i lo ma spu gri'i gnas// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang chen thabs// gnyis med mthun pa'i las nyid las// 'khor lo chos sku phyag rgyar
15b1(sha): gsal// zla ba shar ltar brtan brjid la// nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i 'od stong 'bar// sbyor ba'i 'khor lo du ma 'phro// mtshon cha'i 'khor los rtsa lam gcod//
15b2(sha): sngags kyi 'khor los sreg cing sdud// ting 'dzin 'khor los bskul zhing 'byed// rdo rje 'khor lo bde mchog gsal// gsang ba'i 'khor lo gsang bcud len//
15b3(sha): sems pa'i 'khor los rang dbang 'bebs// shugs kyi 'khor los rang dang ldan// bag chags 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po 'khor lo rten la sdud// nag po
15b4(sha): 'khor lo'i lto bar gzhug/ 'byung ba'i 'khor lo skyobs kyis gnan// gnyis ldan 'khor lo gcig gi ngang // bskul ba'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo gcig zhing 'bar//
15b5(sha): dmigs pa'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // bcud kyi 'khor lo sdud cing 'phel// bde ba'i 'khor lo rtsa lam brgyud// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // sa bon
15b6(sha): 'khor lo las kyi dbab// 'khor lo sgra dang bcas nas 'khyil// 'od zer 'khor lo phyag rgyar dbab// thugs kyi sbyor ba bsam yas mchog/ chos sku phyag rgya'i
15b7(sha): bod ldan gsal// 'khor lo'i gnas su 'khor lo bca'// gsang ba tshe yi 'khor lor 'bar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan la// yas kyo 'khor lo
16a1(sha): sa ra pa/ gshin rje nag po 'joms pa yi// bde ldan 'khor lo brtsegs pa yi// pho brang gnas dang sbyar ba'i lus// zhi ba'i gnas su
16a2(sha): las dang sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ gsang
16a3(sha): ba'i 'khor lo lta ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khros pas rang rgyud kyi thig le 'dri bshad do// bde ba'i
16a4(sha): sbyor ba bgrod pa'i mchog/ rang rgyud thig le mchod pa'i phul// ye shes rol pa mnyes pa'i rgyan// bde brgyan gyi mchod pa dang // yid 'ong glu yi dbang phyug rtsal//
16a5(sha): thobs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// las chen sbyor ba'i yul dbang sgrol// ting 'dzin shugs 'gro rgyun dbang sgyur// 'phrin las sna tshogs 'gag pa med//
16a6(sha): byin rlabs mchog ldan mchod pa'i mchog/ rig pa rang dbang rgyun mi 'chad// g.yas nas bde lam bskul lam dbab// tshangs pa'i gnas su mchod rgyun 'khril//
16a7(sha): bde chen mchod rgyun lhun mnyam gsal// sngags kyi stobs kyi rlung bskul la// drod kyi dbang po rtsa lam bzhu// rkyen dang ldan pas mchod rgyun 'bebs// g.yas/
16b1(sha): nas bskul nas g.yon nas 'bebs// rak+ta chags pa'i mchod pa yin// g.yon nas bskul nas g.yas nas 'bebs// g+hu b+hin dri yi mchod pa yin// g.yas
16b2(sha): g.yon gnyis nas bskul nas su// dbu ma'i thig le rgyun shar ba// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yin// rtsa gsum bskul nas gang zhing 'bar// sna tshogs b+ha ling
16b3(sha): mchod pa yin// rtsa rnams bde bas mdzes gang ba// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa yin// ye shes rang gnas 'od gsal ba// snang gsal 'od 'bar mchod pa yin//
16b4(sha): bskyed pa ha si cir yang g.yo// bde ldan sgra yi mchod pa yin// thams cad gnyis med ro mnyam gcig/ kun tu bzang po'i mchod pa yin// ye shes thig le
16b5(sha): gcig tu 'khyil// sbyor ba dbang gi mchod pa yin// shes pa gnyis 'dzin rtog bral ba// stobs chen shugs bsgrol mchod pa yin// rdo rje 'od ldan phyag rgya
16b6(sha): yis// ye shes chen po rang nyams gsal// rang gnas thig le'i mchod pa yin// lnga rdzogs bde ba gcig tu 'khyil// lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa
16b7(sha): yin// bdag dbang rdo rje brtan pa'i sku// rang byung lnga dang mdzes pa'i ro// 'chi med bdud rtsi mchod pa yin// mtshan mar mi gnas dbyings su thim// gnyis
17a1(sha): su med pa'i mchod pa yin// mchod rgyun don ldan grod pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid bdag la rol zhing mchod// tshangs pa gser gyi sgo
17a2(sha): gnyis nas// ye shes nyi zla thig le dgug/ phyag rgya'i lus la bstam zhing gnas// gang yin dbang po legs bskor gzhug/ sgo gnyis rtsalnga sbyangs
17a3(sha): thig ler bstim// yang dang ma la dngas ma bsdu// ya tshogs brgyad dang lnga drug gnyis// stobs gsum rdo rje'i lam bskyod nas// yang dag bde ba'i gnas
17a4(sha): su b+h+yo/ bde bas gang nas shes rab bskyod// gnyis med phyag rgyas rang gang gsal// rgyun dang bde ba'i mchod par rol// rdo rje rgyal po bskyod pa yis/
17a5(sha): shrI bany+dzar bde ba'i// de bku h+ya rU dz+wA la// brtan pa'i thig le bzlas pa bya// bde ba chen po'i sku la gsal// nyon mongs bde ba rang gnas 'bar/ ma
17a6(sha): ba'i ye shes rang 'bar rtsal// sbyor ba sgra yi thig le dpag/ gshin rje sku mi dbyings su thim// ngas gling dgu 'dus rdo rje'i rtse// b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i ngo rma
17a7(sha): du// 'bru yi dngas ma dril bsdus la// phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pas bzung // byin dbang rdo rje ngang gi rdzogs// sbyor ba du ma'i skabs kyi brtsam// gang 'do//
17b1(sha): las la thog med 'jug/ thun mong mchog gi dgongs par ldan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bgrod par bshad// tra tan garba tsakra ma Ni rat+na ke du a ta ra she u tra tan
17b2(sha): tAgasang ba'i thig le lta ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // gsang ba'i don gyi skabs so// // de nas yang 'khon
17b3(sha): gyi nang nas sprul pa'i sku gshin rje'i rgyal po rang gi stan langs te/ bskor ba lan brgya phrag stong du byas te/ thal mo sbyar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ rdo rje 'am
17b4(sha): chen po la gsol ba/ kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang // sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod rdzogs// 'jam dpal nog po khro chen gyi// bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi sngon
17b5(sha): 'gro gang // dngos nyid las rims bya thabs tshul// 'khor la rgyas par mdzad du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje snying pos
17b6(sha): bka' bstsal pa/ ye shes bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi ni// bgrod pa'i rim pas sngon 'gro brtsams// zhi ba'i ting sbyor ba las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed//
17b7(sha): byos par bya ba'i lus la gdon// 'khor lo brgya phrag sbyor ba gcig/ rim pa du ma lal gyi gnad// yan lag rgyan gyi 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje srin po las mon gshad
18a1(sha): khro ba'i rgyal po yang dag gzud// dbang gi gnas su phyag rgyar 'bar// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// sku gsung thugs khro mi bzad pa//
18a2(sha): dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi yab// zhi khro rab 'byams rang bzhin dpal// gdul bya drag phyir shin tu khros// che btsan dregs pa bran du 'khol// tshe yi dngos grub thob
18a3(sha): 'dod pas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bgrod pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// sems nyid ye shes 'od gsal zhing // rang bzhin lhun grub bde ba che// chos sku chen
18a4(sha): po'i rol bsam yas// nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la// gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pas// 'jam dpal gshed kyi gnas mchog ni// ngam ri brag nag gnam lcags bdag/
18a5(sha): sog po khros 'dra srin mdung rtse// ngam grog g.yang sa skyi g.ya' 'jigs// gu 'dus mi rogasar rnying yod// sha za na sog gcod 'dab chags ling // gcan gzan gdug
18a6(sha): pa 'drim zhing gnas// 'jig rten lha 'dre'i gnas bcas sa// mkha' 'gro ma lus 'dun sa rgyu// lho ru kha ltas gnag la gzir// gnas der gshin rje gshed po gnyen// /
18a7(sha): sems kyi chos nyid ma bcos la// de bzhin nyid kyi blo bzhag ste// gnyis med rtsol bral ngang nyid dang // dpa' bos yun ni ring du gnas// de ma yin pa'i gang zag gis// /
18b1(sha): dus gsum phyogs bcu'i bdag nyid can// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yis// thun mong ma yin mtshan dper ldan// nyi zla'i tshul sgom thig le grang //
18b2(sha): shes rab pha rol phyin ma yis// gsung gi thig le yang dag bsgrags// 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi// glu yi mtshan rnams yang dag brjod// de sogs mdo
18b3(sha): sde ci nus bgrangs// sku yi phyag rgya sna tshogs pa zhengs// srog gdon skyabs dang sbyin pa bskye// sbyin gtor phyi mched dag par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi las rdzogs
18b4(sha): nas// sa blang sbyang brtsig dngos la 'jug/ 'don yon mchod pa lnga dang gau tor ma gsum// chang phud rin chen sman dang 'bru sna tshogs// bshams la dkon mchog
18b5(sha): gsum po dang // rgyal po bzhi dang gtsang rigs sde brgyud 'khor// sa bdag sa srin yi dgas dang // lha mo bstan ma bgegs kyi rigs// 'gro ba rigs drug
18b6(sha): spyan drang 'bod// mnyes shing mgu bar bya ba'i phyir// 'dod yon gtor ma mchod par 'bul// byin gyis brlabs te tshim gyur na// gnas mchog chen
18b7(sha): po'i sa phyogs 'dir// rnal 'byor dam ldan dpa' bo bdag/ gshin rje gshang chen khro rgyab gyi// gsang ba'i dngos grub len byed pa// lha klu bgegs chen
19a1(sha): khyed rnams la// sa slong las kyi grogs 'chol gyis// 'dod yon mchod sbyin 'di long la// bar chad ma byed grogs stong gyis// sangs rgyas
19a2(sha): bstan pa yun du srung // dam las ma 'da' zhes brjod do// bdag nyid khro chen thugs kha nas// thig le ye shes rol pa las// 'byung ba'i snying po rnam gsum gyis//
19a3(sha): 'phros pas sa gzhi bsregs stor dkrug/ don dam stong nyid ngang du gnas// de nas rgyud la maN+Dal rtsig/ khro bo'i nga rgyal phyag rgya che// rdo rje 'gros dang gar gyi bskor//
19a4(sha): de nas mtshams gsum dang po gcod// rgyang grags phyogs mtshams bzhi gnyis su// mtho brgyad rang rang gtsang rigs mgo na// de nang phyogs bzhir tho chen bzhi//
19a5(sha): rgyal chen sde bzhir mnga' yang gsol// mchod yon gtor ma byin nas kyang // bar chod byed pa'i dam sri kun// mtshams kyi nang du shor ra re// phyogs mtshams srung
19a6(sha): ba'i las mdzod cig/ nang nas dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod las kyi gnyer gtad bya// de nas nang du ra sogs sam// khyi sogs sa 'dzul sogs pa la//
19a7(sha): bar chod dam sri logs 'dren gyis// ming gzugs snying po stobs bcus bri// phag thod dang bcas the ma 'og dang // lam chen rgya gram srang du mnan// khro rgyal ga she
19b1(sha): kyi stobs kyis gzir// sngon du 'gro ba'i rim par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i snying po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste
19b2(sha): brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang bdag ga nad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas// ched du
19b3(sha): brjod pa 'di brjod do// ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i nyams ldan pa// rang rig sems kyi sgron ma 'bar// phyi rol yul la rten mi gzung // dbang phyug khro bdag
19b4(sha): gshed kyi gtso// dbyings phyug ro langs gsang ba'i yul// thugs khar thugs mchog yab yum gnas// yan lag gshed po yum dang bcas// de bzhin
19b5(sha): gnas su phyogs skyong 'bar// bu ga thar byed yab dang yum// stod smad tshogs la sgrol ba'i ging // ba spu bu ga las grub mon// sprul pa yang sprul dpag tu
19b6(sha): med// mdun rgya ba lta zur sgo srungs ma// ye shes stobs ldan rol pa 'phro// gsang ga nas khyams dang sbu gu dang // za ma tog dang ge sar la// phyag rgya rdzogs
19b7(sha): pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal// ha si bde sgra sngags kyi tshig/ thig le 'phro 'du byin dbang sdud// bde ba'i ye shes mchod pa'i phul// sman pa rang gi dbang po la//
20a1(sha): rim pa las kyi gan chen bskor// bdud sgor rten zhal 'chi bdag gshed// tshangs pa'i gnas su chos rgyal rnga ma// dran po'i dbang po
20a2(sha): 'chi bdag rgyul// dregs pa'i ngag lam lto ba nag/ srid pa'i rten tsa ra ma dpal gcod// gsang ba dgu khri sa ta las// de bzhin gnas su sha za bdud// ba spu
20a3(sha): bu ga me mtshon 'bar// bdag nyid chen po'i dkyil 'khor la// ye shes 'khor lo de nyid dbab// thabs dang shes rab sprul pa 'gyed// rol pa rjes 'thun cho gar
20a4(sha): ldan// rang 'byung ye shes lha bsnyen mchog/ thig le rol pa me mtshon thogs// sreg gcod sgrol ba'i ngar dang ldan// dbugs kyi rta zhon yul la bskyod//
20a5(sha): bskyod bskul las kyi bsnyen pa mchog/ dman pa dngos nyid ling ga la// dregs pa gtum chen mtshon dpal ngar// shing srid bzhin du bsad pa'i mchog/ las
20a6(sha): gsum rdzogs pa'i thabs su bshad// ta ta na garba tsakra ma ni rat+na ke d+hu a ta ri sha u kra ma ta na tra las// gsum thabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//
20a7(sha): sngon 'gro thabs kyi skabs so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen pa dngos kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rten gyi gnas
20b1(sha): de ra las gzugs pa// rabs chad nag po'i khang pa dang // g.yul ba kyes dang mi phung shul// ri rgod 'gram dang thal chen dang // de dag rgyu la maN+Da la cig/ khru
20b2(sha): bzhi rgya ya dpangs khru gang // mi rta'i snying khrag pa tsan dug dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab// ba su srad bu rak+ta'i tshal// gsang pa yum gyi mkha'
20b3(sha): las dgye// thig g.yon mtshan ldan ba ra nas dra// thig gad pa byin ldan rdul tshon bri// ni rangs su yi sbyor ba yis// rak+ta dug shing nyung lim lo// kha dog
20b4(sha): lnga ldan ya shes brla pa// gzugs brnyan 'bar pa yongs la snang // ge sang mdzod dgu ldan pho brang mchog/ dbus mthing zla khams bzhi 'khor lo// de bzhin
20b5(sha): 'khor lo dmar nag sngo// gru chad mtsho gling ngam gling khrag/ sgo khyud bzhi yi 'khor lor bcas// byi yi bar khyams de bzhin no// phyogs kyi kha dog rab tu 'ab//
20b6(sha): rdo rje thod 'phreng me ri re 'bar// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo bzhi ste// sprul pa'i 'khor lo dgu gnyis ldan// bar khyams gru chad sgo khyud gnyis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
20b7(sha): bzhir ldan bya// ba ma tshan ma he nyi zla dregs// rtsa ba'i gdan lhings gzhan lo rkyang // zhing rgyan bla re thod sprul bcas// 'phreng ba g.yer sa dra byed dang // 'dod
21a1(sha): yon lha mo don rnams bsam// dbus la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab dang yum//
21a2(sha): gshed pho bdud mo bzhir ldan bcas// mu khyud dang por dgod par bya// gnyis pa 'khor lo'i rim ba la// phyogs skyong yab yum bcas pa dgod//
21a3(sha): par chod gshed kyi bdud rnams kun// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du dgod// gsum pa 'khor lo'i rim pa la// sgrol po'i ging chen bco brgyad dang // ging
21a4(sha): mo bco brgyad bka' nod tshul// khrag mtsho ro langs lce spyang rngam// bar khyams nang gi 'khor lo la// thar byed yub yum brgyad gnyis rngam// sgo khyud
21a5(sha): skrod byed 'khor lo la// ya ma bstan mra la sogs dgod// phyi yi bur khyams snam bu la// mon pa mon mo las kyi gshed// bdun bdun gnyis gnyis
21a6(sha): gnyis bcu brgyad// yang sbrul drug khri drug stong gunas// sgo bzhi sgo srungs pas mo bzhi// rten bzhi gnas kyi 'khor lo la// rten pa lha yi 'khor lo
21a7(sha): brtan// ye shes byin rlabs stobs ldan bya// rjes su mthun pa'i chos gar ldan// rten rdzas gnyis dang mchod rdzas dgram// rgyan rdzas rol rdzas gtor ma
21b1(sha): khrag/ dur khrod rdzas la rdzas dgus byug/ gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya bzhengs// rab gnas byin ldan lha tshogs dgram// sa gsum la sogs bdud rtsi khrag/
21b2(sha): sbyong bgrod dang ldan phyag rgya'i sku// dbang bskur mchod bstod lho ru dgram// dmug chen dmug chung bdud rtsi bcud// mtshan dang ldan pa'i ka pA lar// steng 'og
21b3(sha): phyag rgya'i yab yum dgod// sku gsung thugs kyi thig ler ldan// mthing nag dang bcas ru sprod gdab// phyi yi mchod pa go rims bzhin// nang gi mchod pa bdud
21b4(sha): rtsi phud/ rak+ta sna mangs thod par sbyar// dpal gyi gtor ma sna tshogs dbu la// sras mchog gtor ma sha khrag lho// las kyi ya ma'i gtor ma shar// ma mo mkha'
21b5(sha): 'gro drug gtor byang // ging bdud mon gyi gtor ma nub// zhing chen zhing chung bu ri 'phan// rgyu ma'i zhags pa thod pa'i 'phreng // mchog chen gling bu ltag sprod rnga// ban d+ha'i
21b6(sha): cha lang keng rus rgyan// bsur chen dud pa sha chen cal// tsit+tir pho long khrag gi mtsho// phyogs bcu khor yug sprin du gtibs// gri lcags mchog dang seng ldeng skyer//
21b7(sha): zur pa rtsang bcas rang rang grangs// dbus la sogs pa'i zad na la dgod// zla ba dgun 'bring nya la gdams// yang na gshin rdza gshed nyid kyis// zla ba zhag dus
22a1(sha): snying la rab// de bzang yon tan 'phel bar bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyul mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i
22a2(sha): rgyud las/ bcas pazhe rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal pos sngon du 'gro ba'i don 'di gsungs so// ma nyam
22a3(sha): nyid dag pa'i ye shes las// mkha' dkyil nyi shar brdal ba bzhin// bdag nyid gshed chen gar gyi skra// thugs kyi snying po ring du bskul// 'od zer las byung
22a4(sha): 'bar sku// snang srid bde 'chang de bzhin nyid// sprin ltar rngam sgra phyogs bcur g.yo// de bskul me ri mtshon char 'khrigs// khro bo 'bar bcas gtum rnga ma bltams// /
22a5(sha): log 'dren dam sri rdul du brlag/ skrag cing bar mtshams phyogs bcu bsrungs// chos rnams stong nyid rtogs dang bral// dmigs me da rang bzhin byang chub sems//
22a6(sha): mkha' ltar mnyam pa chos kyi dbyings// skye 'gag bral ba'i ngang nyid las// yod pa ma yin med pa min// stong pa nyid las cho 'phrul byung // de nyid ye shes rol pa'i
22a7(sha): dbyings// sems nyid ngang las g.yo ba medado// sems kyi rol pa snang ba yang // sprin dang 'jab tshon khu rlangs bzhin// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las// dngos po
22b1(sha): skye ba nyid kyis stong // chos rnams thams cad thig ler 'dus// thig le rol pa'i byin rlabs las// dug gsum sbyong ba'i 'phreng ba gsum// sreg sbyangs sel
22b2(sha): ba'i rang bzhin las// thabs dang shes rab mtshan mar 'bar// gnyis med ga bur nyon mongs lnga// gnas bdag yon tan lhun grub pa'i// 'phreng ba rin chen
22b3(sha): rim par brtsegs// rkyen dang ldan pas 'byung ba'i rim// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// rang shar mtshan ma gzhal yas khang // gdan stengs thig
22b4(sha): le 'phro 'du las// rjes 'thun cho gas rdzogs pa'i sku// rkyen ldan yab yum phyag rgya che// rgyus pa'i 'phro 'du bskyod byas pas// thig le dbyibs ldan mkha'
22b5(sha): la 'gro// de las dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // bdag nyid thig le'i rnam pa de// gtso chen thugs kyi sgo nas zhugs// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur te//
22b6(sha): dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od du 'bar// cho 'phrul gsum ldan phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor bdag nyid sras mchog nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas//
22b7(sha): dbyings nas rang bzhin shugs kyis bskyod// yang snang dkyil 'khor dbyer med mnyam// ye shes rol pa'i rang nyid las// mtshan ma lha yi phyag rgyar 'bar// snang
23a1(sha): srid 'dod yon dkyil 'khor nyid// gnyis med tshim rgyas par rol// dkyil 'khor nyid la dkyil 'khor thim// dges shing mnyes pa'i las
23a2(sha): rdzogs nas// bdag nyid gtso bo phyag rgya'i sku// thugs khar nyi zla snying po sngags// rang nyams 'od 'bar snying po gso// skad cig sngags dang 'od 'bar gsal//
23a3(sha): mi g.yo brtan pa'i shugs kyis drang // 'phro 'du'i sbyor ba gzi mdangs sdud// bde ba'i dum bu sems las blang // de yang dgongs pa'i don dang sbyar// sems kyi rdo rje/
23a4(sha): brtan thob nas// ye shes phyag rgya drod la dbab// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis grang // nyi ma rdo rje chu rlung dang // pad+ma rin chen so ma ta// nam mkha' 'khor lo gas la
23a5(sha): dang bcas// dur khrod rten dang gzhal yas bcud// snying po gsum gyi brda dang sbur// ya ma ka li'i bsnyen par bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i
23a6(sha): rgyal mtshan 'khrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
23a7(sha): rdo rje rngam pa'i rgyal po des/ phyi rtags nang du bsdu ba 'di bshad do/ bde ba'i gnas su sngon 'gro brtsams// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor ldan par bya// dam rdzas
23b1(sha): kha gsang mchod pa 'bul// de stengs khyad par rdzas bdun bsags// sma na sna ga bur la sogs pa// nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu bsag/ mtshan ldan pad+ma'i khrag sogs
23b2(sha): pa/ bdun dang bcas pa dngos grub rdzas// snying po lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// 'o ma sna lnga spos sna lngar// rin chen sna lngar bcas pa de// rje rigs la sogs ma nor
23b3(sha): ba'i/ thod pa mdzes ldan pho mo gnyis// gu gul chu yis zhen par byug/ tshil chen byugs la phyag rgya dgod// gnas gsum snying po gsum dag bri// 'phreng ba
23b4(sha): rnam gsum sku yi mthar// ye shes rigs lnga'i snying po la// 'bras bu lnga yi 'phreng bas bskor// de la rten bca' ga pur sbyar// dkar dmar dur khrod bstims la
23b5(sha): blang // dgongs pa'i drod ldan nang rtags 'byung // ye shes dngos grub rdzas su bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug
23b6(sha): stong pa'i rgyud las/ phyi rtags nang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nang rtags gsang bar bsdu ba
23b7(sha): 'di bshad do// dngos grub thod pa'i ga pu ra de// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas khang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bstan// ye shes rang snang dkyil
24a1(sha): 'khor la// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs kyi bcud// zhi khro rab 'byams gzi brjid mdangs// ye shes gshed kyi dkyil 'khor rnams//
24a2(sha): ma lus gnyis med rdzas la thim// bod kyi 'phro 'du bdag dang der// lus la ye shes 'khor lo gsal// sgra dbyangs snying po'i thig ler ldan// 'od zer sprul pa phyag
24a3(sha): rgyar 'phro// mchod bskangs bstod cing dngos grub bsdus// nyi ma'i 'od bzhin rten la bstims// ga pur me 'bar ldeg sgra 'gul// gsang rtags yul du mthong bar
24a4(sha): 'gyur// 'dren pa'i khyad par gnyis ldan bshad// don gyi snying po 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ nang rtags
24a5(sha): gsang bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang rtags mngon du phyung ba'i don 'di bshad do// /
24a6(sha): khyad par dngos grub rdzas chen de// gshin rje gshed kyi thugs nyid de// ri lu dkyil 'khor lha yis grangs// yab yum snyoms zhugs thugs kyi bcud// ye shes nyi
24a7(sha): zla'i 'od zer gyis// bdag gi sgrib pa nyon mongs sbyong // rnam rtog bag chags thams cad sreg/ ye shes lnga yi bde dbang bskur// bkrag dang gzi mdangs
24b1(sha): ye shes rgyas// rnam shes las thabs dngos grub 'beb// phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sku gsung thugs// bdag la byin gyi
24b2(sha): brlabs nas kyang // 'jam dpal nag po'i sku gsung thugs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor grub// spyod yul kun kyang phyag rgya'i tshogs// gzugs su snang
24b3(sha): pa thams cad sku// sgra sgrogs stong pa thams cad gsung // gnyis med dran shes thams cad thugs// de ltar gsang rtags mngon du 'byung // rtogs pa
24b4(sha): mngon du gyur pa yi// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po zhes// rnal 'byor de la nga yis bshad// gsang rtags mngon du dbyung ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
24b5(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ las kyi gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba 'di bshad do// gnas mchog tshang bar dkyil 'khor bri//
24b6(sha): rdzas dang sbyor ba gong bzhin bca'// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod gzung la// drod rtags tshad mas gtan la dbab// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rnyed de// ye shes lus
24b7(sha): la tshur nas kyang // las kyi ya ma'i bsnyen pa bya// rang nyid phyag rgya chen po la// lus kyi 'khor lo bstan byas la// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan pa yi// rgyan
25a1(sha): dang cha lugs rdzogs byas te// thugs kyi 'od zer lcags kyu'i tshul// lho phyogs dur khrod rol pa nas// las kyi gshin rje rngam pa'i tshul//
25a2(sha): sna tshogs me rlung 'khor lo can// sha za khrag 'thung rnga ma sgra sgrogs// kha nas nad dal dmod pa 'bebs// 'bum phrag rang dbang med par dgug/ dbang du
25a3(sha): bsdus la las la mngag/ las kyi gshin rje dregs pa kun// dbang du bsdus pa'i drod dang ldan// de nas bzlas sbyar ya tshogs bzlas// las la tshud pa'i
25a4(sha): drodri la rtag/ de yang 'chi bdag gshin rje yi// lus la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa yin// don gyi snying po 'khrul bzhir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri
25a5(sha): drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las kyi ya ma bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang gshin rje'i rgyal pos// bcom
25a6(sha): ldan 'das la gsol pa/ kye ho bde gshegs gsang ba'i sku// drag po las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'khrul 'khor don gyi snying po rnams// 'khor la rgyas par bshad
25a7(sha): du gsol// zhes zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po des/ gshin rje gshed kyis gsad pa drag po'i las 'di bshad do// dngos grub gnyis dang
25b1(sha): bde ldan na// drag po las kyi sbyor ba brtsams// dur khrod gnyanar gdug pa ru// brnag pa thun dang 'khor lo'i rdzas// 'brub khung ling kha'i rgyud rten bcas/
25b2(sha): dong gzhug mtshon cha 'khor lo bca'// de dag rgyus pa 'di lta ste// phung sa'i stegs bu dug khrag byug/ de stengs gru gsum rtsegs la// khru gang rgyu la mtho
25b3(sha): mjug chag/ thod ba rtsang phur phyir bar nang // rgya sol dug dang rak+ta byug/ phyi sa chu rjes dri ma dkru// rten bcud shun bcas drug gnyis tshad// dbang po dod pa
25b4(sha): gcal thabs gcer// ming rus dug khrag snying kha mgo/ rabs chad thod par e nang gnag/ tsher ma'i stan la glan kyal bsgyel// khrag gsum dug gsum phye gsum
25b5(sha): 'bru// khram thod sar par skam thun bca'// 'khrul 'khor drag po'i las bshad pa// ye shes las kyi bye ba gnyis// rnal 'byor drod kyi tshad dang sbyar//
25b6(sha): yab kyi 'khrul 'khor las kyi bdud// bca' ba'i rim pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod gnas na sa dpa' bo yi// ka la ka pa ma ni tog/ gos su bcas pa'i rgyu
25b7(sha): blangs la// thod pa'i snying por bcud sdu bya// de la gcod pa'i tsakra bri// dur khrod ra sa ya bam chen gyi// sma ba lnga yi thang pa bya// ni ra su yi thal ba yis/
26a1(sha): mtha' ma brgya dang rgyang bcad la// mchog phran rgyung ngam bya rog sgro// bam sgra rgyus pas par byas te// bam chen don gyi khrag dug gis// gcod
26a2(sha): ba'i 'khor lo rjes su bri// mtshon cha'i 'khor yo ngar dang bcas// rdo rje 'chang chen dregs pas myos// 'jam dpal nag po gshin rje gshed// khro rgyal kun gyi
26a3(sha): stobs dang sbyar// mthu stobs bdag po dbang phyug gi/ ya ma rA dza sa yang gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// zab cing rgya che'i chos nyid ni// gang
26a4(sha): lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sras mchog byang chub sems// zab cing rgya chen sgra sgrogs pa'i// chos nyid
26a5(sha): nga yis rgyas bshad do// sems can bsam pa tha dad pas// chos kyi bye brag thams cad kyang // mdor bsdus bshad tshul rnam pa gsum// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
26a6(sha): dgongs pa yin// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// rgyu yi theg chen tshul bshang dang // gsang sngags rnal 'byor tshul bshad dang // bla med dgongs pa'i tshul bshad pa'o//
26a7(sha): rgyu yi theg pa chen po yi// tshul du bshad pa 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos bstan pa// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// rgya chen kun
26b1(sha): rdzob bden pa dang // zab pa don dam paden pa'o// kun rdzob bden pa rnam pa gnyis// yang dag pa dang log pa'o// dang po rtog bcas rtog med pa'i// shes pa
26b2(sha): yul dang yul can te// mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa'o// gnyis pa snang la don byed ni// mi gnas pa de mi srid chos// yang na kun rdzob bden pa gsum// brtags
26b3(sha): dang shes dang brjod pa'o// don dam bden pa'ang rnam pa gnyis// zab mo gtam gyi don dam dang // 'jig rten grags de'i don dam mo// dang po skye med brjod dang bral//
26b4(sha): dngos med mngon par 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad bral// blo dang dngos po ma rig pa// gting zab brtag dka' stong pa nyid// rang bzhin med
26b5(sha): pa'i de kho na'o// gnyis pa yang dag shes pa ni// yul dang yul can bcas pa'o// de nyid gzhan du brjod med pas// rgyu che de bzhin zab pa nyid// rang bzhin/
26b6(sha): gcig phyir de kho na// so so ma yin tha mi dad// spros dang bral ba'i chos nyid do// yang na don dam bden pa gsum// don dang bsgrub dang thob pa'o// dang po
26b7(sha): chos rnams de bzhin nyid// cir yang mi gnas stong nyid do// gnyis pa sgrib med ye shes te// gang dang dbyer med dag pa'o// gsum pa rnam par byang ba
27a1(sha): yi 'bras bu ye shes dam pa'o// de dag rang bzhin tha dad min// des na rgya che zab par bshad// gsang sngags rnal
27a2(sha): 'byor theg pa yi// tshul du bshad pa 'di lta ste// snying po rang rig dngos med de// cir yang snang zhing cir yang 'grub// rol pa ma 'gags sna tshogs snang //
27a3(sha): 'khor ba phyi nang snod bcud dang // mya ngan 'das pa sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor lam dang 'bras bu'i chos// phyi nang gsang ba sna tshogs su// ma 'gag
27a4(sha): rang snang cir yang byung // rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// de dag sna tshogs cir snang yang // mtha' rnams ma spangs bral ba'i phyir// dngos med stong nyid rang/
27a5(sha): bzhin medra// skye med dngos med phyogs dang bral// cir yang ma grub pa rtag tu med// zab pa zhes su bshad pa yin// dngos po med nyid ma 'gags/
27a6(sha): snang // ji ltar snang yang dngos med nyid// gcig las ma g.yos sna tshogs 'byung // sna tshogs rang bzhin gnyis med cig/ phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhi
27a7(sha): ste/ rigs can rigs dang bral ba yin// zab dang rgya che gnyis med pa'o// ya mar dzas yang gsol pa// bla med dgongs pa'i tshul bshad
27b1(sha): nyid/ gang lags pa de bshad du gsol// zhes gsol bas// bka' stsal pa/ bla med dgongs pa'i bshad tshul la// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya//
27b2(sha): dpe yi zab cing rgya chu dang // rtags kyis zab cing rgya che ba'o// gsol pa/ dpe yi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ dpe ni nam mkha' yin pa ste//
27b3(sha): sna tshogs snang ba thims tsa de laM// nam mkha' ma khyab gcig kyang med// 'byung ba gling bzhi'i rnam pa dang / nyi zla gza' skar gzha' sprin rnams// nam mkha'
27b4(sha): nyid kyi cho 'phrul te// sna tshogs snang ba rgya che bas// ji ltar snang yang dngos ma grub// rgyu med rkyen med skye 'gag med// kha dog dbyibs med rang bzhin med//
27b5(sha): gzung du med cing brtag tu med// zad pa med cing 'gro 'ong med// klong yang sa gting rings zab par bshade// gsol pa/ don gyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol//
27b6(sha): bka' stsal pa/ don gyi chos nyid yin pa ste// chos nyid rang bzhin dag pa las// chos can dngos po sna tshogs snang // 'khor ba gnam ris brag dang // rtsi shi
27b7(sha): gling bzhi ri rab bcas// mtshan ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang // mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang // zhing khams sna tshogs gzhal yas khang // gdan
28a1(sha): rgyun longs spyod du mar snang // rgya che ba zhes bshad pa yin// sna tshogs snang yang rang bzhin med// ma byas ma bcos 'gyur ba med//
28a2(sha): gting zab brtag dka' spros med pa// blo dang dngos po sa ma rig pa// mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i ngang // chos dbyings rang bzhin stong pa nyid// rtog med dmigs
28a3(sha): med mu mtha' med// de sa na zab pa zhes bshad do// gsol pa/ rtags kyi mtshan nyid bshad du gsol// bka' stsal pa/ rtags ni sems nyid yin pa ste//
28a4(sha): sems nyid rang bzhin dngos med las// rol pa'i cho 'phrul cir yang snang // 'khor ba 'gro drug sems can gyi// lus dang bag chags las dbang sogs// /
28a5(sha): phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rten 'brel bcu gnyis chu bo bzhi// sna tshogs ma rtogs ngo la snang // myang 'das dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi//
28a6(sha): sku dang ye shes mdzad pa dang // rigs dang dkyil 'khor yon tan dang // stobs dang mi 'jigs zad par dang // zil gnon skye mched sna tshogs snang // lam
28a7(sha): dang 'bras bu theg pa'i rim// rang snang ba sa na rgya cher bshad// rang 'byung snying pos kun la khyab// dngos med rang rig ngo bo nyid// ma bcos lhun grub
28b1(sha): 'gyur ba med// sems nyid rang gsal 'dus ma byas// skye 'gag med cing mtha' dbus med// rtog med zab pa zhes su bshad// ma 'dres yongs su
28b2(sha): rdzogs pa yi// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// gnyis mdo rang bzhin rdzogs par bshad// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
28b3(sha): thams cad kyi thugs khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lta ba zab pa rgya che ba'i le'u ste nyis brgya drug pa'o// // de nas gshin rje
28b4(sha): gshed rgyal pos// rdo rje 'chang chenA dpa' bo la// bus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba btab// kye ho rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'jam dpal ye shes sems/
28b5(sha): dpa' yi// mtshan rnams brjod pa'i rim pa la// sngon 'gro yan lag brjod pa'i thabs// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan
28b6(sha): nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// rang bzhin spros med chos nyid de// rnam rtog zug rngu med pas
28b7(sha): 'jam// de rtog thugs rje 'byung bas dpal// sgrib med ye shes 'od gsal ba// rang rig rang gsal rnam dag sems// nyon mongs rnam rtog bdud
29a1(sha): 'joms dpa'// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' ste// de yi mtshan nas brjod pa la// sngon 'gro lam ni yan lag brgyad//
29a2(sha): de yang ji lta bu zhe na/ phyag 'tshal mchod 'bul sdig pa bshags// yi rangs 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba dang // skyabs 'gro
29a3(sha): dge rtsa bsngo ba'o// de dag rnam par dbye ba ni// chos dbyings 'og min phyogs bcu'i zhing khams na// skye mched chos sku longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku//
29a4(sha): sprul sku chos nyid dge 'dun sras bcas la// lus ngag yid gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod sprin rgya chen po// dngos sbyor yid kyi /
29a5(sha): rnam sprul 'jig rten bkang // sku gsum lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems sogs kun la rgyas par 'bral// 'dod chags la sogs
29a6(sha): nyon mongs dbang gis na// lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// thams cad sku gsum rdo rje'i bde gshegs dang // byang chub spyan sngar ma lus
29a7(sha): bshags par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu gsum sangs rgyas thams cad du// byang chub sems dpa' dag dang 'gro ba yi// rgya chen rab zab bsod namra dge ba'i
29b1(sha): tshogs/ de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rangs// phyogs bcu 'jig rten bsam yas dpag med na// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ bzhugs
29b2(sha): shing mnyam gzhag 'gro 'dul de dgu la// chos kyi 'khor lo bla med bskor bar bskul// dus gsum bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa// de dag kun la
29b3(sha): bdag gis thal sbyar te// 'gro ba'i don du bskal pa dpag med du// bzhugs shing thugs rjes don mdzad gsol ba 'debs// skye med ngang las ye shes kur ston
29b4(sha): cig/ thugs rje chen pos kun la khyab mdzad pa'i// dpa' bo bdud 'dul sangs rgyas thams cad la// byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi// phyag 'tshal
29b5(sha): mchod dang sdig pa bshags la sogs// dge ba gzhan gyis de dag thams cad kun// bla med byang chub chen po thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis yang dag yongs su
29b6(sha): bsngo bar bgyi'o// de ltar sngon du 'gro ba yis// lam gyi yan lag brgyad rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud
29b7(sha): chen po las/ yan lag brgyad kyi le'u ste sum brgya tham pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/ lam gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ngan
30a1(sha): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// de yi mtshan gyi gdon thabs la// gang zag mos pa tha dad phyir// bsam gyis
30a2(sha): mi khyab pa yod kyang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yin te// dbang po rab kyis brjod pa ni// mi rtog ye shes bltas te gdon// dbang po 'bring gi brjod pa ni//
30a3(sha): gsang sngags tshul du bltas te gdon// dbang po thams mtshan brjod pa// che ba'i yon tan bltas te gdon// de gsum thabs gyi sngon du ni// khrus bya ba dang sems
30a4(sha): skyed dang // dam tshig sdom pa gzung bar bya// de dag rgyas pa 'di dag ste// khrus la phyi nang gnyis yin te// phyi khrus chug tsang dri zhim btsas// dang po'i sangs rgyas
30a5(sha): rnal 'byor gyis// chu nang zla stengs a dkar bsam// bdag thugs 'od 'phros a la brim// 'od du zhu bas dri ma'i tshogs// ma lus par ni dag par bsam// lhag
30a6(sha): ma dzam+b+ha la la sbyin// nang khrus bdag med rnam dag la// lhag par mos pa'i bsam pa'o// sems skyed pa yi sbyor ba ni// ye shes lnga dang snying rje gsum// bsgoms pas
30a7(sha): mngon par byang chub pa'o// 'khor 'das la sogs sna tshogs par// snang ba'i chos rnams ma lus kun// snang ba rang bzhin med pa yi// sgrib med ye shes chen por
30b1(sha): gsal// dper na me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// sna tshogs snang yang dngos ma grub// ma yengs 'dris par rab tu blta// de ltar chos kun dngos med pas// gcig
30b2(sha): dang du mar bral ba yis// rang bzhin stong nyid chen po la// mtshan mar grub pa yang dag med// dper na nam+b+ha dngos med bzhin// skye med rtag dka' 'dus ma byas// rang
30b3(sha): bzhin dag pa'i chos de la// bzang ngan che chung ye nas med// phyogs dang ris med mtha' dbus med// mngon sum mi gnas kun la snyoms// mnyam pa nyid kyi snying
30b4(sha): po la/ ta rim par bkod pa ye nas med// de ltar rab tu gsal bar bsgoms// chos rnams so so'i mtshan nyid kyang // ma 'dres sna tshogs rnam par snang // de yang
30b5(sha): sgrib med rang gsal ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i rig pa nyid// bye brag sna tshogs rnam pa yang // rtags na rig pa'i ye shes nyid// de las gzhan pa'i chos med/
30b6(sha): bsgoms// lam dang 'bras bu la sogs te// yon tan bya ba'i 'dod don rnams// ma ba tsal lhun gyis grub pa yi// rang rig snying po sgrib med de// 'gro
30b7(sha): don shugs la grub par byed// ma 'khrul rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// de ltar ye shes lnga bsgoms mas// snying rje rnam par gsum bsgom pa/ ma rig rgyu
31a1(sha): la log rtog rkyen// des bskyed sdug bsngal phung por smin// mgon med 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor phyin// sems can de dag sdug bsngal
31a2(sha): las// thar par bsgral te don bya sbyor// chos rnams bdag med stong pa nyid// rang bzhin dag pa'i mtshan nyid las// chos kun gzhan med de bzhin nyid// de rtogs
31a3(sha): mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// bdag dang gzhan du dbyer med pas// don bya snying rje'i yul dngos med// dmigs med rang bzhin yongs dag pa'i// rang bzhin dag pa'i
31a4(sha): chos nyid bsgoms// sdom pa bzung ba'i rim pa ni// sku gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' chen por bcas// dus 'di nas ni dgongs su gsol
31a5(sha): bdag ni byang chub snying po la// nam zhig gnas kyi bar dag tu// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed kyi// rang bzhin dag pa'i chos nyid de// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid//
31a6(sha): stong nyid de bzhin nyid dbyings las// de bzhin rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// dbyen
31a7(sha): med rnam rtog kun 'joms pa// rdo rje rigs mchog sdom pa bzung // mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las// yon tan thams cad lhun rdzogs pa'i// blang dor med
31b1(sha): pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // chos gang dri ma med pa'i ngang // skyon gyis ma gos 'od gsal ba'i// rang gi mtshan nyid ma
31b2(sha): 'dres rdzogs// pad+ma rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // bla med byang chub sems kyi mchog/ thugs rje thabs rol cir yang snang // pha rol phyin sogs chos thams
31b3(sha): cad// las kyi rigs mchog sdom pa gzung // mtha' yas sems can kun don phyir// byang chub mchog tu bdag sems bskyed// sdom pa ma lus gzung
31b4(sha): bar bgyi// ngan song bdag gis bsgral bar bgyi// 'khor ba bdag gis grol bar bgyi// rgyu yi se las dbugs dbyung bgyi// sems can ma lus thams cad
31b5(sha): kun// bdag gis byang chub mchog la dgod// ces ni sdom pa gzung bar bya// gzhan gyi bzhed pa dag gis kyang // sdom pa rab tu gzung ba'o// dam tshig
31b6(sha): thun mong khyad par gyis// thun mong dam tshig dran pa ni// nyams na gso bar khas blangs te// spyi yi dam tshig bzhin du srung // khyad par dam tshig rnam bzhi
31b7(sha): / phyi nang khrul dang bya ba dang // ming tshig dag gis par ma bcang // gzhan gyis mi thos klab pa dang // kham pa zhim pangs gsol ba'o// de dag sngon 'gro
32a1(sha): yag lag go// 'jam dpal khri drug stong ba'i rgyud las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i le'u ste sum brgya gcig pa'o//
32a2(sha): lam gyi yan lag gi skabs so// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma rA dzas gsol btab pa// gang zag dbang po rab don du// mtshan
32a3(sha): ni mi rtog ye shes su// bltas te gdon pa ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gshin rje gshed kyi sras// sngon du bya ba'i las
32a4(sha): rdzogs nas// stong pa nyid kyi ngang las kyang // dang po'i sangs rgyas bdag nyid bskyed// thugs khar nyi zla kha sbyor gyi// bar du a ni dkar po bsgom// thabs dang
32a5(sha): shes rab gnyis med pa'i// don dam skye med brjod dang bral// ye shes spros bral rang bzhi ni bsgom// de las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// phyi nang snod bcud
32a6(sha): ma lus kun// chos nyid byang chub sems su spungs// bsdus te thi me pas padag nyid kyang // ye shes sgyu ma'i sku ru bsgoms// skye med yi gang shel ltar dag/
32a7(sha): shin tu gsal la dri med bsgom// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen yi ge dam pa yin// khong nas 'byung /
32b1(sha): ba skye ba med// dngos po dag la mtshan brjod pas// thugs kha'i skye med yi ge de// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// stong pa nyid kyi rang sgra 'byung // brjod pa
32b2(sha): kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ des ni stong gsum stong chen po// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas su// stong nyid rang gsal sgra bsgrags te// tshig kun rab tu gsal
32b3(sha): bar byed// bdag dang 'khor dang chos thams cad// stong nyid rang sgra rig pa des// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// brjod du med cing tha snyad med// brtag tu med cing
32b4(sha): btung du med// thog ma med cing tha ma med// 'gyur ba med cing dngos po med// mya ngan 'das med 'khor ba'ang med// ngo bo nyid med bdag gzhan med// yongs su
32b5(sha): shes par bya ba'ang med// rnam par rtog med mi rtog med// g.yo ba med cing mi g.yo med// gting zab brtag dka' ma bcos pa// blos ma rig cing sgrib med pa'i
32b6(sha): rang gsal dngos med dbyings su gsal// de ltar bsgom zhing brjod pa ni// nyin mtshan dus gsum rgyun du gdon// sgro na mtshan gyi yang snying gis// stong nyid
32b7(sha): dang po 'i sangs rgyas su// byas te yangs la rjes tho ba la// dngos po thams cad ye nas brgyan// chos nyid rol pa rang snang ba// pa de stong dbyer med klong na
33a1(sha): gnas/ de ltar bsgoms zhing lta byas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu thob// chos sku rnam dag thob gyur na// longs spyod rdzogs sku ye
33a2(sha): shes kyis// rol pa'i rang snang sprul pa'i sku// bde gshegs byang chub sems dpa' dang // sems can rnams la mngon snang ngo // 'jam dpal khri drug stong
33a3(sha): pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan mi rtog pa'i ye shes su bltas te gdon pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gnyis pa'o// // sras mchog ga shi na rjes yang
33a4(sha): gsol pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// mtshan ni zab mo gsang sngags kyis// don du bltas te gdon pa zhes// bgyi ba gang lags pa shad du
33a5(sha): gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don bshad kyi sa legs par nyon// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa yi// dngos medra stong nyid
33a6(sha): ngang las kyang // sgyu 'phrul lta bu'i tshul gyis ni// nam mkha' dbyings kyi rang bzhin bsgo mas// gsal ba skur ma lta bu yi// ye shes 'od zer
33a7(sha): las byung ba// hUM ni sngon po 'od zer gyi// tshogs dang ldan par rab tu bsgom// de las 'od zer dpag med pa'i// rtse mo la ni sangs rgyas sku// mang
33b1(sha): po rab tu 'phros pa yi// sems can rnams kyi don byas nas// slar 'dus hUM la thim gyur pas// 'od du zhu bas rdo rje che// kha dog drug ldan rtse drug gyur//
33b2(sha): khro zhal drug gis rab mdzes pa'o// bum pa'i nang du b+h+rUM dkar las// rin po che yi mchod rten ni// stong gsum stong chen tshad tsam bsgom// mchod rten
33b3(sha): de yi bu ma nang du// yi ge hri la chos 'byung ba sa ma// de nas sna tshogs rdo rje yi// lte bar b+h+rUM las gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// rin
33b4(sha): chen lnga yi rtsig par bcas// 'don yon mchod pa'i lha mos 'khrigs// rin chen pha gus rnam par mdzes// dra ba dra phyed dril bur bcas// dar bu kha dang
33b5(sha): pad+ma dang // rin che na ka ba za ra tshagasra// ta ra na da 'khor lo gdugs// rdo rje ye shes me ri ra ldan// de lta'i nang na srog chags gdan// seng ge glang chen rta
33b6(sha): mchog dang // rma bya shang shang pad+ma yi// ga dan rnams rab tu gsal bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi ga dan stengs su// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las//
33b7(sha): rnam par snang mdzad gangs chen mtsho// sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// ral pa'i dbu brgyan rgyan med bsgom// de yi
34a1(sha): thugs kha zla stengs su// d+hI las dang sposas rgyus bsgom// zhal sna phyag bzhi skyil krung bzhugs// sku mdog dkar po rgyan gyis
34a2(sha): brgyan// g.yas bzhi ral gri g.yon bzhin// shes rab po ti bzhi yang bsnams// 'od bzang shin tu 'barA bar bsgom// de yi thugs khar bsgom pa na//
34a3(sha): rten 'brel bcu gnyis dag pa ni// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis mtshon// sangs rgyas bcu gnyis bgrod pa yi// rang bzhin las byung shes rab kyi// 'khor
34a4(sha): lo lte mthar mu khyud bzhi// rtsibs drug kha dog drug dang ldan// lte bar a dkar 'phro 'du las// a nyid las thim de stobs kyis// mu khyud nang la rtswa sngags
34a5(sha): dgod/ rtsibs drug dang po nas brtsams te// sngags drug rang rang kha dog bzhin// phyi bskor mu khyud nang ma la// yang skying 'phreng sngags dag gis bskor//
34a6(sha): phyi la sgra yig gsal byed sgom// de dbus ye shes thig la yi// a ni da kar po yongs gyur las// bcom ldan ye shes sems pa'i sku// zhal drug phyag
34a7(sha): gnyis sprin dkar mdog/ zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// phyag g.yas ut+pal dmar po la// phyag g.yon ut+pal sngon po'o// steng na shes rab po
34b1(sha): ti bsnams// yod pa zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// in+d+ra ni la'i gtsug phud mdzes// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od zer 'bar// rgyan rnams rdzogs par rab tu bsgom//
34b2(sha): de yi thugs khar zla stengs su// don dam yi ge a dkar bya sgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// sems can kun gyi sgrib bsal nas// chu
34b3(sha): 'dus bdag lus snang bar bya// zhag drug dag nas 'od 'phros te// stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams// ye shes 'od kyis snang bar byas// de
34b4(sha): nas rdo rje sgo drug nas// kha dog drug gi 'od byung ste// sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad kun// ye shes 'od kyis snang byas na// sangs rgyas sems can
34b5(sha): thams cad kun// mchod dang don byas slar 'dus te// ye shes rdo rje de nyid la// lan gsum dag tu bskor byas nas// de nyid la ni rab zhugs pas//
34b6(sha): bdag med chos nyid rtogs par byas// zla ba la gnas snying po dang // sngags dang gcig tu gyur par bsgom// des ni sgrib pa ma lus pa// dag cing byang
34b7(sha): nas ye shes gsal// de ltar rgyun du yengs pa// bsgos zhing brjod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// tshe 'di ring por mi thogs par// sku dang zla ba a gsum gyi
35a1(sha): sgo nas chos sku longs spyod sku// sbrul sku rnam gsum thob par 'gyur// thun mong dngos grub sangs rgyas kyi// sku dang zhing khams bas
35a2(sha): yas mthong // spyan lnga mngon shes drug la sogs// phan yon ji bzhin thob par 'gyur// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' rtog pa'i rgyal po khri drug sto/
35a3(sha): pa'i rgyud las/ rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum brgya gsum pa'o// // de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rigs ni so so
35a4(sha): dbye ba yis// gdon thabs rnal 'byor rim pa ni// rnam par mi rtog ye shes kyi// phyag rgya rdo rje dbyings kyi dul// byang sems rdo rje bsgom pa ni// dkyi
35a5(sha): 'khor dbus kyi gdan stengs su// a ni dkar po yongs gyur las// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// dkar po gzhon tshul skyil krung bzhugs// rigs
35a6(sha): lnga'i dbu brgyan dang ldan cing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu mdzes// phyag g.yas rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul// phyag g.yon dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// de yi
35a7(sha): thugs khar dang por yi ge brgya// sangs rgyas gzhung bzhin bsgom par bya// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsgom// mu khyud sngags la sogs snga ma bzhin//
35b1(sha): rtsibs la a ra pa tsa dgod// lte ba ra a dkar gyur pa la// a ra pa tsa ye shes sems// dkar po gzhon nu zur phud lnga// rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs ldan//
35b2(sha): g.yas pa ral gri po ti g.yo na// skyil krung bzhugs pa'i thugs khar a// dkar po las ni ye shes kyi// 'od zer 'phro 'du de bzhin bya// de ltar gsal
35b3(sha): pas mtshan brjod pa// 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// shes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// theg pa chen po tshul gyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod pa
35b4(sha): bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi// sgo nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// dkyil 'khor la bstod rnal 'byor gyis// a ni
35b5(sha): 'od du zhu ba las// rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkor// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can// rdo rje skyil mo krung dang ldan// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom//
35b6(sha): de thugs 'khor lo rtsibs bcud ka ra// rtsibs la dz+nyA na mu rti dgod// lte bar a las ye shes sems// shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba// dkar po gzhon nu
35b7(sha): rgyan gyis mdzes// phyag g.yas ral gri 'khor lo g.yon// thugs khar zla ste ngas a dkar po// ye she pa 'od zer 'phro 'du ni// rnga bzhin byas te mtshan brjod
36a1(sha): sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// zhes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o//
36a2(sha): de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi// sgo nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// hUM 'od du zhu ba las mi bskyod pa
36a3(sha): sngon po sa gnon phyag rgya can// de thugs dang po sangs rgyas bsgom// thugs khar 'khor la rtsibs brgyad sngo// rtsibs la du kha rtse sogs dgod// lte bar hU~M las
36a4(sha): ye shes sems// rdo rje ral gri zhes bya ba// sngon po gzhon nu zur phud lnga// g.yas g.yon rdo rje ral gri 'dzin// thugs khar zla ba hU sngon po// 'od zer 'phro
36a5(sha): 'du bya zhing brjod// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// ces pa dag nas rab brtsams te// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o//
36a6(sha): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyis// sgo nas snang ba mtha' yas kyis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rim pa ni// dbus su hri ni dmar
36a7(sha): po las// snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bsgom// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas nyid// snying khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
36b1(sha): dmar// badz+ra tik+Sha Na 'bru brgyad dgod// de dbus hI dmar 'od zhu las// rdo rje rnon po ye shes sems// na bza' rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes// zur phud lnga pa
36b2(sha): skyil krung bzhugs// ral gri pad+ma g.yas g.yon 'dzin// thugs khar zla ra la hri dmar po// 'phro 'du bya zhing mtshan brjod pa// yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid//
36b3(sha): ces pa dag nas rab brtsams te// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gas la// zhes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
36b4(sha): shes kyi// sgo nas rin chen 'byung ldan gyis// dkyil 'khor dag la bstod pa ni// de 'od zhu las o ser po// gyur pa rin chen 'byung ldan ni// ser po
36b5(sha): mchog sbyin phyag rgya can// dang po'i sangs rgyas de bzhin bsgom// shes rab 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser// bA gI shwa ra 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar oM ni ser
36b6(sha): po las// ngag gi dbang phyug ye shes sems// sha za rgyan rdzogs zur phud lnga// phyag g.yas ral gri rin chen g.yon// thugs khar zla ba oM ser las//
36b7(sha): 'phro 'du sbar zhing mtshan brjod pa// 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// zhes pa dag nas rab brtsams te// nor bu chen po rin tog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod pa
37a1(sha): bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// sgo nas don yod grub pa yis// dkyil 'khor la bstod rnal 'byor
37a2(sha): ni// de 'od zhu bas a ljang khu// de las don yod grub pa sku// ljang khu mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// thugs khar dang po'i sangs rgyas bsgom// shes rab 'a
37a3(sha): lo rtsibs brgyad ljang // dz+nye na kA ya 'bru brgyad dgod// lte bar a ni ljang khu las// ye shes sku can ye shes sems// ljang khu rgyan rdzogs zur phud lnga//
37a4(sha): phyag ni g.yas g.yon ral gri dang // rdo rje rgya gram bsnams par bsgom// thugs khar zla stengs a ljang las// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya zhing brjod// sangs rgyas
37a5(sha): kun gyi rtogs bya ba'i// zhes dag nas ni rab brtsams te// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ ces pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o// de ltar rgyun du
37a6(sha): bstod byas nas// yon tan 'bras bu bas ma mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs 'jam dpal ye shes
37a7(sha): sems dpa' khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rigs so sor phye ba'i le'u ste sum brgya bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad
