73a4(sha): le'u ste lnga brgya bcu drug go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// sa yi snying pos bskor phyag mchod//
73a5(sha): bus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen po// byang chub sems zhes bshad pa'i don//
73a6(sha): gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas sangs rgyas gtso// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// sa mi snying po ma yengs nyon// byang chub
73a7(sha): sems don ngas pa shad do// byang chub sems zhes bya bas don// gtan la dbab thabs bsam yas kyang // mdor bsdus bshad thabs rnam pa drug/ gol sgrib
73b1(sha): brdar sha gcad pa dang // rnam grangs rnam par dbye ba dang // gtan tshigs gtan la dbab pa dang // gab pa sngon du phyung bshad dang // lta ba sgang dril bshad pa dang //
73b2(sha): ga ta ra ka gags sel bshad pa dang // zhes bka' sku la pa dang / yang gsol pa/ gol sgrib brdar sha gcad pa zhes// gsungs pa'i don bshad ji ltar lags//
73b3(sha): zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ gol sgrib brdar sha gcad pa la// spyi don gsum du bshad par bya// 'khrul pa'i sems dang lam pa'i sems// byang
73b4(sha): chub sems zhes bshad pa'o// 'khrul pa'i sems ni nges med chos// ci yang ma yin rgyu nyid las// rol pa'i 'gag med cing snang rkyen// rang gis rang ngo ma
73b5(sha): shes pas// lhan cig ma rig thog mar byung // de rgyu kun rtags ma rig rkyen// des ni 'bras bu kun gzhir grub// des rgyu bag chags bzang ngan med// rtas
73b6(sha): nas 'bras bu 'gro drug 'khyams// las pa'i sems la rnam gsum ste// sems kyi skye sa rgyu rkyen dang // sems skyes rang gi ngo bo'o// skyes 'bras
73b7(sha): bu gzhi lam gsum// gzhi ni chu shel reg ma nges// lam ni thun mong theg pa brgyad// 'bras bu thun mongs mthar phyi na// rkyen la ltos nas 'odi 'jug
74a1(sha): pa'o// sems skye ba yi rgyu rkyen ni// rgyu gnyis rkyen bzhi 'brel pa bzhi// sems kyi chos nyid ngo bo'i rgyu// shes rab der shes lhan cig
74a2(sha): byed// slob dpon slob bu don tshig 'brel// sgyus las blo cher skye ba de// bdag po rgyu dmigs de ma thag pa'i rkyen// 'brel pa bzhi ni thams cad// sems
74a3(sha): kyi chos nyid bdag nyid cig/ chos nyid shes rab gos bya byed// slob bu ga ma ngag snod dang bcud// slob dpon slob bu thugs rje las// sems kyi skye tshul rnam pa
74a4(sha): dgu// che chung blo yi rims gcig 'char// zhen dag ma dag zag bcas 'char// rims spangs ma spangs thod rgal tshogs// sems gsal mi gsal mos
74a5(sha): sgom tshogs// thugs rjes gdul bzhi dang khros// nyon mongs che chung grol khams thabs// chos nyid phyag rgya mtshan bcas med// rang stobs gzhan stobs
74a6(sha): thugs rje la// de brtsogs lam gyi dbye sgo'o// sems skyed rang gi ngo bo ni// byang chub sems ngar skye ba ste// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas rdzogs pa'o//
74a7(sha): gsol pa// rnam grangs rnam par dbye bo zhes// bshad pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas// bka' stsal pa/ rnam grangs mang yang mdor bsdus
74b1(sha): dgu/ sgrib med rang gsal rnam dag sems// rang gi rang gsal rang rig sems// ma bcos rnal mchos nyid sems// ma btsal kun rdzogs lhun grub sems//
74b2(sha): blang dor med pas mnyam nyid sems// dngas snyigs dgag pa sgrub med pa'i sems// zla med nyag gcig gnyis med sems// gdangs khyab bde chen rtog med
74b3(sha): sems/ tamatha' med yang dag bla med sems// mtshan me da mi mthun don khyad med// ces paka' stsal pa// yang gsol pa/ gtan tshigs gtan la dbab pa
74b4(sha): zhes// gsungs pa gang lags bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas// bka' stsal pa// gtan tshigs gtan la dbab lugs gsum// lung dang man
74b5(sha): ngag rig pa'o// lung gsum snyan brgyud mngon du phyung // kun la dbab dang gsum du bshad// snyan khung ba rgyud la rnam pa gnyis// bde gshegs brgyud dang/
74b6(sha): gang zag brgyud// snyan rgyud byin rlabs ngo bo dang // sdigs sdebs sbyor legs gsum du bshad// mngon byung yang la dran don nges// lam bstan lung bstan
74b7(sha): sar 'dren gsum// mthong lam 'bras bu drang don nges// nges lung dpe don rtags gsum ste// nam mkha' chos nyid sems nyid do// gtan la dbab
75a1(sha): pa'i lung la gnyis// sems can nyon mongs blo tshad la// brgyad khri bzhi stong theg pa bshad// nges par gtan la chos rnams 'bebs//
75a2(sha): snying po byang chub sems nyid do// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rig pa gtan la dbab ces pa// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gso
75a3(sha): pas// bka' stsal pa/ rig pa gtan la dpab lugs gnyis// mi 'khrul mi slu rtog bral bas// yang dag shes pas nges don 'bebs// da lta'i shes
75a4(sha): pa ma bcos pas// ma yangs rtogs med rang rig ga sa la// rig pa sa gtan la dbab pa'o// man ngag gtan la dbab pa ni// sgrib pa bag chags dri ma
75a5(sha): byang // 'dod nas rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra// kun la snyoms khyab ngos bzung med// chub pa nam mkha' kun la khyab// thams cad rang gsal 'dzin med
75a6(sha): sems// dri med nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// spyi khyab gtan tshigs dpe don rtags// kun khyab go 'byed nam mkha' dang // chos nyid ma bcos mtha' bral/
75a7(sha): don// rang rig 'od gsal sgrib med sems// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gab pa mngon byung ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/
75b1(sha): bka' stsal pa/ gab pa mngon byung lugs gnyis te// thun mong khyad par thun mong na// sems can kun la bsam pa bzhi// dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan//
75b2(sha): byang chub sems te dang po na// dge bcu mthar phyin las stobs kyi// mtho ris lha mir 'phen cing skye// gnyis pa mi dge sdig pa spyod// de las ngan song 'phen
75b3(sha): stobs skye// gsum pa dge sdig lung ma bstan// 'dzin rtog 'du shes snyoms 'jug lha// bzhi pa rang rig ma bcos gsal// ma yengs mi g.yo byang chub
75b4(sha): sems// des gnas bla med byang chub thob// khyad par bshad pa byang chub sems// rig pa dang gsal rtog 'dzin med// ma bcos dngos med rnam pa dag pa'o//
75b5(sha): zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa lta ba skung dril bshad pa zhes// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa/ bka' stsal pa/ lta ba skang dril
75b6(sha): bshad pa ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gdod nas snying po byang chub sems// mtha' las 'das pa'i ye shes nyid// cir yang gsal la bzung du
75b7(sha): med// ma bcos ma yengs sgrib med pas// dag cing dngas la dngos po med// yon tan ma bcal lhun rdzogs pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/
76a1(sha): gtar ka gags sal zhes bya ba// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol bas
76a2(sha): bka' stsal pa/ gtar ka gags sel zhes bya bas// yang dag rigs shes ma 'khrul pas// lung dang man ngag la rten
76a3(sha): nas// skal tshigs khong dbyung lan kyus gdab// ma nor gdeng ldan gtan la dbab// yang dag nges don rtogs par bya'o//
76a4(sha): zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las / byang chub kyi sems bshad pa'i le'u s+t+waM lnga
76a5(sha): brgya bcu dgu pa'o// // byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos yang gsol pa/ byang chub sems
76a6(sha): nyid lhun grub don// yang dag nges par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa
76a7(sha): sems nyid yang dag lhun grub gsum// rang bzhin rnam pa mtshan nyid do// yid spros ma 'gags dngos med stong //
76b1(sha): mtha' 'dus spros bral rang bzhin te// yi shes chos sku lhun gyis grub// sgro lnga ma 'gag cir yang snang // rnam pa sna
76b2(sha): tshogs dngos ma grub// sgo lnga sbrul lnga lhun gyis grub// nyon mongs gzung 'dzin ma bkug gsal// mtshan nyid rang rig
76b3(sha): 'od gsal bas// nyon mongs rdzogs skur lhun gyis grub// spros bral stong nyid chos kyi skur// yid shes rig pa rtsal dbang
76b4(sha): bskur// rus sral mkhar gzhong bcug pa 'dra// sems nyid rtsal 'od ma 'gags sprul// sgo lnga rig pa rtsal dbang bskur//
76b5(sha): sbrulA sku ral gri kha mdangs 'dra// rang rig ye shes longs spyod rdzogs// nyon mongs rig pa rtsal dbang bskur// rma bya dug
76b6(sha): gis 'tsho ba 'dra// rgyun grub gsum zhes de ltar bshad// ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol po// sems nyid
76b7(sha): gtan la dbab pa yi// gtan tshogs bzhi zhes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ yang dag
77a1(sha): nges don ma nor bar// gtan la dbab pa'i gtan tshigs bzhi// chos kun dngos med ma bcos dang /
77a2(sha): g+hun grub rang bzhin skye med de// spros bral rtag mtha' ngang gis dag/ de rtsal sna tshogs rang snang bas// cir snang rol pa 'gag
77a3(sha): mod du// rtsal snang chad mtha' rang gis dag/ 'khor 'das la sogs cir snang yang // sems las ma g.yos mtshan nyid
77a4(sha): gcig/ gnyis med gnyis 'dzin mtha' rnams dag/ de don rang blos rtsol med rtogs// rang sems ye shes rang grol bas//
77a5(sha): ngo bo nyid dang blo grol ba'o// zhes gsungs pas yang gsol pa/ dpe don rtags gsum gtan tshigs
77a6(sha): kyi/ yang dag nges don ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ chos nyid ye shes rang
77a7(sha): byung ba'i// dpe ni nam mkha' stong khyab yangs// go 'byed mi 'gyur ngos bzung med// don ni chos nyid ma bcos pa// mtha'
77b1(sha): yis ma reg dngos med la// rtags ni rang byung rang rig sems// ma bsgribs rang gsal 'dzin dang bral// de nyid sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin//
77b2(sha): zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa// ngang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid che// gtan tshigs rnam gsum ji ltar lags// zhes
77b3(sha): gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ ngang dang rang bzhin bdag nyid che// gtan tshigs rnam gsum don bshad pa// 'khor 'das
77b4(sha): chos rnams gdod nyid nas// bag chags rnam dag chos nyid la// de nyid rol pa rtsal ma 'gags// sna tshogs ma yangs rang
77b5(sha): bzhin no// rang 'byung sems kyi 'khor 'das las// ye khyab sangs rgyas bdag nyid che// chos nyid ma bcos ngang nyid las//
77b6(sha): rang rig ye shes rang bzhin te// rig stong dbyer med bdag nyid che// ma bsgribs 'od gsal rang bzhin te// gnyis med
77b7(sha): yang dag bdag nyid che// skye med rnam dag ngang nyid la// rol pa rtsal snang rang bzhin te// thig le nyag gcig bdag nyid che// sems nyid
78a1(sha): ma bcos ngang nyid kyis// gzugs med 'jigs pa rang dag go/ sems nyid 'od gsal rang bzhin gyis// gzugs khams zhe na la rang
78a2(sha): grol lo// sems nyid kun khyab bdag nyid kyi// 'dod khams chags pa rang sangs so// zhes gsungs pas// yang gsol pa// chos rnams snying po gsum gyi
78a3(sha): sgo// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ snying po gsum zhes bya ba'i don// yod med don gyi snying po ste// dngos med mtshan
78a4(sha): med cir mi snang // gang yang ma yin gzhi rtswa med// ma bcos med pa'i snying po yin// tshon shel yul gyis ma 'gyur 'dra// de nyid rtogs dang ma rtogs kyis//
78a5(sha): 'khor 'das chos su rang snang shar// cir snang yod pa'i snying po yin// tsho na shel yul sgyu kha dog 'dra// rang 'byung sems nyid yang dag pa// cir yang ma
78a6(sha): yin cir yang snang // snang las ma grub gnyis med gcig/ don gyi snying po tshe na shel 'dra// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bstan pa
78a7(sha): ma lus kyis// rtsa ba gzhi zhes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rtsa ba gzhi// lta ba rang bzhin snying po'i gzhi//
78b1(sha): nam mkha' lta bur phyogs 'dzin med// ting 'dzin ma yengs don mi 'bral// nyi ma lta bur sgrib med gsal// spyod pa bla dor med par mnyam// nam mkha' cho 'phrug
78b2(sha): dbyings su spyod// 'bras bu re dogs med par rdzogs// yid bzhin nor ltar yon tan 'byung // zhes gsungs pas// yang gsol pa/ snying po gtan la dbab
78b3(sha): don drug/ gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rang byung snying po don bshad drug/ lta ba dngos med rig pa gsal//
78b4(sha): skye med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// rang sems mi 'gyur ma yengs pa// ma bsgoms ting 'dzin ye shes gsal// nyams myong rim pa sems nyid rgyun//
78b5(sha): go rims ma 'khrul chos sku'i dbyings// shes rab don mthong ye shes mig/ chos rnams ma lus khyab par 'byed// don gyi lta ba gdeng med gol// bsgoms kyang
78b6(sha): ma rig 'khor bar 'khyams// phyir rgol rtsod pa gzhan gzhung skyon// tshar gcad tshad mas rang gzhung skya bo// ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ man
78b7(sha): ga rnam lngas ya bzla ba// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ la bzla man ngag rnam lnga ni// sangs rgyas sems
79a1(sha): can ma lus kun// bde gshegs snying po rgyu gcig pas// gnyis med thig le chen por bzlas// 'khor 'das rtsa ba ngo bo nyid// rang
79a2(sha): byung mnyam nyid snying por gcig/ lhun rdzogs bde chen dag par bzlas// bdag gzhan bzang ngan gzhi gcig ste// don gyi snying po rang byung bas// mnyam nyid
79a3(sha): gling dor med par bkra// yon sbyin gnyis med snying por gcig/ de kha bshad las gzhan mi dmigs// btag las ma skyengs bsgoms med pazla// largya
79a4(sha): pa nyid rtogs ma 'khrul pas// dug lnga ma spangs gnas dag pa// rang byung ye shes lnga ru gsal// de ltar lnga ru la bzla'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam
79a5(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las// don zhus pa shad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu tham pa'o// // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
79a6(sha): sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ rin chen dpes mtshon sems nyid don// gang lags yang dag bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka'
79a7(sha): skul pa/ yid bzhin nor bu rin chen la// bsod nams cha chung dbang gis ni// longs spyod bzang ngan byung ba ste// nor bu nyid la 'dzag pa med//
79b1(sha): sems nyid yon tan lhan rdzogs de// rtogs dang ma rtogs dbang gis na// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis byung yang // sems nyid rtsol dang 'dzin pa med//
79b2(sha): ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol / pa/ tshon shel dpo mtshon sems nyid don// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal ba
79b3(sha): za 'og ka shi'i ras stengs su// nor bu tshon shel bzhag pa ni// kha dog sna tshog sa snang mod kyang // tshon shel nyid las 'gyur ba med// gzhi gcig snying
79b4(sha): po byang chub la// 'khor 'das la sogs chos thams cad// dngos po sna tshogs snang gyur kyang // snying po nyid las 'gyur ba med// ces gsungs pas//
79b5(sha): yang gsol pa/ thang phrom dpes mtshon 'khrul pa'i sems// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pA/ thang
79b6(sha): phro ma dug zos mi de yis// nam mkha' dA ga yas mtshon cha 'dzag/ rang lus mchod de 'chang bar mthong // rnam pa de dngos yod dam med// ma rig 'khrul
79b7(sha): pa thang phrom 'dra// ga la de dze na zos pa'i mi// chos nyin nas mkha' 'dra ba la// des smras 'khrul pa nyon mo ba mtshon// rdzus brdza pa nyon mongs sna tshogs pa
80a1(sha): 'tshe bar mthong 'dra dngos su med// 'khrul pa'i ngo la snang tsam mo// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ ma ki rtsi sman dpes mtshon
80a2(sha): pa// gang lags rgyas par ba shad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsa la pa/ sman gyi rgyal po ma ki ta sa// rig na thang khrom nad sos pas// nam mkha
80a3(sha): mtshon chas rang med 'gyur// dug gi stobs las dngos med phyir ro// sems nyid rtogs pas sman chen gyis// ma rig dug lnga'i nad sos na// mtshan ma'i sdug
80a4(sha): bsngal rang med 'gyur// ma rig 'khrul pa'i stobs snang la// dngos su grub rten med phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'khor lo sgyur rgyal
80a5(sha): dpes mtshon pa// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bu de// mig phye mtshan dper rang las
80a6(sha): 'char// 'dod khams kyi bzhi drang dbang sgyur// rang gi las dgyes grub phyir ro// sems nyid rtogs goms rnal 'byor pas// 'bras bu chos sku rang las 'char//
80a7(sha): rdzogs sku sprul sku shugs dbang sgyur// sems nyid rtogs las gzhan med phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'bras bu khyud phrug dpes mtshon
80b1(sha): bas// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' skul pa/ khyung phrug sgo lnga gshog rgyas kyang // ma bcag bar du phur mi srid// sgong shun
80b2(sha): bor nas gos mi dgos// nam mkha'i mthongs su rang phur 'gyur// sems rtogs ma goms rnal 'byor pas// lus nang rtogs pa mngon gyur kyang // lus ma bor
80b3(sha): bar sangs mi rgya// lus kyi sbubs por bral ma thag/ sems de chos skur rang grol gyur// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ dpe don
80b4(sha): rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sa yi snying
80b5(sha): pos yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin dpes mtshon pa'i// gtan tshogs gal mdo ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas//
80b6(sha): bka' stsal pa/ gzhi ni ba sil chen ga pur 'dra// ga pur ngo bo gcig nyid la// tsha grang nad rkyen bye brag gis// sman dang dug tu shugs kyis snang // tshad pa can
80b7(sha): gyi sman du 'gyur// grang ba can gyi dug tu 'gyur// tsha ba can gyi sman dus na// grang ba'i dug ma spangs me gnas// grang ba can gyi dug dus na// tsha ba'i sman ma
81a1(sha): spangs mi gnas// gcig la tsha grang rkyen gyis 'gyur// bzhin gcig rang byung snying po la// rtogs dang ma rtogs bye brag gis// sangs rgyas
81a2(sha): sems can shugs kyis snang // rtogs pa'i ngang la sangs rgyas te// ma rtogs pa la sems can no// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus nyid na// sems can ma spangs
81a3(sha): mi gnas so// ma rtogs sems can dus nyid na// sangs rgyas ma spangs mi gnas so// rtogs dang ma rtogs rkyen gyis ni// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis snang
81a4(sha): d+he/ gzhi gcig mi 'gyur brtan pa la// sna tshogs rdzang la dngos po med// btags nas ma mthong cir yang snang // cang min cir snang rgyum chad// phyogs
81a5(sha): su ma lhung rgya mnyam nyid// rtogs pa bzang rkyen lta len nang // sangs rgyas yon tan ngo bor gnas// zhing khams 'dod yon gzhal yas khang // skra dang ye
81a6(sha): shes dkyil 'khor tshegs// yon tan 'phrin las sku gsung thugs// bde gshegs snang ba du mar snang // ma rtogs ngan rkyen blta nyes na// phyi nang snod
81a7(sha): bcud bag chags lus// ngag yid bde sdug 'khrul 'khor las// lus gnas snang ba sna tshogs snang // zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gzhi nyi
81b1(sha): rang byung snying po ste// nges pa zhig gam ma nges pa// nges yod nges pa med par nges// yod par nges na rtag par 'gyur// med par nges na chad par 'gyur//
81b2(sha): des na gzhi nyid mtha' ru 'gyur// gzhi nyid ma nges pa zhig na// dgongs pa tshad skyol nges med cing // las kyi rgyu 'bras ldog par 'gyur// nges dang
81b3(sha): ma nges gnyis med na// phan tshun rnam pa 'gal ba dang // lung du ma bstan skyon du 'gyur// tsha reg grang reg ji bzhin no// zhes gsol pas/ bka'
81b4(sha): sprul pa/ rang byung snying po lhun gyis grub// gnyis med mtha' rnams kun bral bas// cir yang snang la ngos bzung med// phyogs med phyogs kyi dngos gzhi
81b5(sha): ste// rigs can rigs dang bral ba ste// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad la// yang dag mtshan ma dngos med pas// yod cing rtag pa'i mthar mi 'gyur//
81b6(sha): shes rig byang chub sems gsal bas// med cing chad pa'i mthar mi 'gyur// mtha' gnyis las 'das ngo bo nyid// lhun grub snying po nyid shes pas//
81b7(sha): lung du ma bstan skyon mi 'gyur// de las gzhan du ma rgyur pas// laso kyi rgyu 'bras ldog mi 'gyur// de don mngon gyur yid ches pas// dgongs pa tshad
82a1(sha): bskyal yang dag nges// don rtogs yang dag the tshom med// ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ de lta bu yi gzhi nyid la// 'khrul
82a2(sha): pa rnams ni ji ltar byung // gzhi nyid 'khral pa 'am gzhan zhig 'khral// dang po gzhi rtogs sangs rgyas 'khral// 'khor de 'bad pa don med 'gyur//
82a3(sha): gnyis pa kun gyi gzhi med 'gyur// gzhi nyid 'khrul pa yin phyir dang // de las gzhan pa yin pa'i phyir ro// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhi
82a4(sha): nyid dus gsum 'khrul med de// ma rtogs pas na 'khrul par snang // blo bcos ma rIg kun brtags kyis// bde gshegs snying po las la sprul/
82a5(sha): ces gsungs nas/ yang gsol pa/ gzhi la 'khrul pa grub ma grub// grub na spang sbyang mi btub pas// 'bad pa don med dag tu 'gyur// ma grub 'khrug
82a6(sha): pa 'byung mi 'gyur// nam mkhar dngos bcas mi ldan zhing // zhes gsol pas/ yang bka' stsal pa/ 'khrul pa gzhi la grub ma grub// yang dag don
82a7(sha): la ma grub ste// 'khrul pa'i blo ngo tsam du snang // 'khrul zhes kun rtags snang phyir ro// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'khrul pa la
82b1(sha): gzhi yod dam med// yon na 'khrul pa'ang spang mi btub// med na 'khrul pa'ang snang ma rigs// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'khrul
82b2(sha): gzhi yod med gnyis mi 'gal// med pa thang khrom dug zos pas// gnam las mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'dzags// rang lus chod dam 'chi bar mthong //
82b3(sha): nam mkha' dag la skra 'dzings mthong // yod pa thag pa sbrul mthong 'dra// mtho yor mir mthong ji bzhin no// yang dag ma yin 'khrul ngor yod// des na
82b4(sha): 'khrul pa spangs sbyangs te// yang dag don la gnas par 'dod// 'khrul pa snang ba de dag kun// yang dag don snying ma rtogs 'khrul// lde rtogs
82b5(sha): rig pas 'khrul pa sangs// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rtar kA gags sel gyi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu gnyis
82b6(sha): pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad gsol//
82b7(sha): rdo rje 'chang chen sangs rgyas gtso// gzhi nyid ji bzhin ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// gdod nas gnas
83a1(sha): pa'i rang bzhin de// byed rtsol mtshan mas ma bcos te// rang lugs rang sor gnas pa na// gzhi nyid ji bzhin pa zhes bya// zhes
83a2(sha): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub ces ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ ye nas gnas pa'i de kho na// bya btsal med par
83a3(sha): thams cad 'dus// 'bras bu yon tan du ma rdzogs// lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gza' gtad bral zhes
83a4(sha): ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med cing 'dzin dang bral// phyogs med mtha' 'das rang gsal ba// gza' gtad
83a5(sha): bral ba zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gnyis su med ces ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ tha dad ma spang
83a6(sha): mi dmigs shing // gnyis snang ye nas ma grub la// mtha' med phyogs med zla med pa// gnyis su med pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa//
83a7(sha): bdag nyid chen po ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ thams cad kun la khyab cing 'dus// yon tan rtsal gyis ma lus byas// de las
83b1(sha): gzhan pa'i chos med pas// bdag nyid chen po zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ thig le chen po ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/
83b2(sha): bka' stsa la pa/ ma nor ma bcos 'gyur ba med// brdul khyab bla me du yang dag nyid// spros med mtha' las 'das pa na// thig le chen po zhes bya'o// zhes
83b3(sha): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rang byung ye shes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsa la pa/ rgyu rkyen ma bskyed gdod nas gnas// 'dus ma byas
83b4(sha): kyi rig pa nyid// sgrib med 'gag med thams cad gsal// rang byung ye shes zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ byA btsal bral zhes ji ltar lag/
83b5(sha): zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'bad rtsol sgrub pa'i mtha' las 'das// yang dag nges pa'i don dam nyid// rtsol 'das re dogs med pas na// bya ba tsal
83b6(sha): bral ba zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rnam par dag ces ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ dngos med mtshan med
83b7(sha): dri sa med// gsal la dngas shing gdangs ldan pas// sgri za med rang rig zang thal bas// rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/
84a1(sha): ngo bo nyid sku ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal ba/ 'khor 'das 'byung bas ma rig pa// rang byung rang rig rang lugs gnas//
84a2(sha): thog mtha' med cing 'dus ma byas// ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes bya// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ chos kyi sku zhes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas//
84a3(sha): bka' stsal pa/ skye med 'gag med rnam par dag/ 'dus ma byas nyid ngos bzung med// rang gsal rang 'byung 'dzin med pas// chos kyi sku zhes bya bar bshad//
84a4(sha): ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ chos nyid ces bgyi ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas nyid mi 'gyur gnas// rang bzhin//
84a5(sha): de nyid rnam par dag/ ma bcos rang sor ma smad pas// chos nyid ces brjod mi 'gyur pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings zhes ji ltar/
84a6(sha): lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ brdal khyab dngos med gong yangs pa// thams cad 'byung gnas ma bcos dag/ gting zab mu mtha' med pas/
84a7(sha): na// chos kyi dbyings zhes bshad pa yin// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka'
84b1(sha): stsal pa// chos rnams mtshan nyid rang gsal ba// chos nyid ngang du gdod nas gnas// sna tshogs nyid las ma g.yos pas// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa yin//
84b2(sha): zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ bde gshegs snying po ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams thams cad 'byung zhing 'dus// kun
84b3(sha): khyab bcud ldan kun gyi gnas// de bzhin sangs rgyas kun 'byung bas// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po yin// zhes gsungs pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin stong
84b4(sha): chen ji ltar legs// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dod nas mtshan ma las 'das pas// dngos med dmigs med ngos bzung med// blo dngos ma reg
84b5(sha): 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin stong pa chen po yin// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ mnyam pa nyid ces ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa//
84b6(sha): phyogs ris med cing rgya ma chad// bzang ngan blang dor bdag gzhan med// spyi lugs brdal khyab chen po la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya bar bshad// ces gsungs
84b7(sha): mas yang gsol pa/ gzhi lgang chen po ji ltar zags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid la// snang ba gang yang ma 'gags
85a1(sha): gsal// 'khor 'das rang snang rang gsal bas// gzhi nyid snang ba chen po yin// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ kun yin gang min
85a2(sha): ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba mya ngan 'das la sogs// thams cad kun gyi dngos gzhi la// phyogs gcig rgya chad med pas na//
85a3(sha): kun yin gang yang ma yin pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ 'gro kun yongs khyab ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rang byung snying po yang dag pa// ma
85a4(sha): rtogs ye nas kun khyab gnas// sems can snying po byang chub pas// 'gro ba yongs la khyab pa yin// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rang rig ces bgyi ji ltar
85a5(sha): lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' sku la pa/ yang dag shes rig ma bcos pas// rang gsal sgrib byed zang thal ba// gsal byed gzhan med 'dzin med pas//
85a6(sha): rang rig/ zhes su brjod pa yin// zhes gsungs so// 'ja ma dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ yang dag don gyi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu
85a7(sha): gsum mo// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// nam mkha'i snying pos yang gsol pa//
85b1(sha): bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// gzhi nyid mtshon dpes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ gdod nas gnas pa'i gzhi nyid ni// rang
85b2(sha): bzhin dag pas man shel 'dra// man shel dag cing dngas pa la// rdzas rnams snang char gzhi yod kyang // dag stobs snang la rang bzhin med// 'dod nas rang
85b3(sha): byung chos nyid la// 'khor 'das la sogs chos rnams kun// snang zhing 'bar ba'i gzhi yod dang // dngos po rang rgyud grub pa med// shel la phyi nang mdun rgyab
85b4(sha): med// dri med zang thal 'dug pa bzhin// gzhi la phyi nang la sogs med// dri med dag pa'i zang thal bas// chos rnams snang la rang bzhin med// ces gsung/
85b5(sha): pas// yang gsol pa/ lta ba mtshan dpe ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' sku la pa/ de nyid ma 'khrul rtogs pa yi// lta ba sman chen ga pur
85b6(sha): 'dra// tsha grang rkyen gyis sman dang dug/ so so lta bur snang gyur kyang // ga pur nyid du mi 'gyur gcig/ nad rkyen gnyis kyis sman du snang // ye nas
85b7(sha): gnas pa'i chos nyid la// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par gyis// theg pa che chung 'khor 'das chos// so sor tha dad snang gyur pas// chos nyid lhun rdzogs
86a1(sha): rnam par dag/ thig le chen por mi 'gyur gcig/ ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ mnyam gzhag bsgom dpe ji ltar lags//
86a2(sha): zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ mnyam gzhag bsgom pa nam mkha' 'dra// kun la khyab cing go 'byed yangs// nam mkha' nam mkha' mi bsgom pa'i//
86a3(sha): cho 'phrul mi dgag skyon mi gos// lta ba ma 'phrul rtogs pa yi// ngang la rgyun du ma yengs gsal// sems kyi sems la mi sgom zhing // sems kyi rnam
86a4(sha): rtog ci rgyu yang // sems la gzhi bsta na med pa'i phyir// rnam rtog mi 'gag rang gzhi ste// bag chags mi gso rtog med pas// gsal la ma yengs
86a5(sha): dang la gzhag/ ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ spyod pa'i mtshan dpe ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rlabs chen spyod pa me
86a6(sha): lce 'dra// me lces gang la bya ba'i rdzas/ btsal mi dgos pas reg pas tshig/ don rtogs tshad med gang spyod pa// phyi nang chos la rtag mi rgod// yul
86a7(sha): sems ci 'phrad blang dor med// chos nyid 'dzin bral gong du gnas// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'bras bu mtshan dpe ji ltar lags//
86b1(sha): zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'bras bu 'khor lo sgyur rgyal 'dra// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal mig phye na// mtshan dpe yon tan rang las 'char// rin chen sgra
86b2(sha): bdun shugs kyis 'byung // ye nas rang gnas sangs rgyas pa// rang sems rig pa ngo shes na// ye shes lhun grub rang las 'char// yon tan ma btsal
86b3(sha): lhun rdzogs pas// rdzogs sku sprul sku shugs kyis 'char// sems dpa' 'gro don mthar phyin mdzad// ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gdul
86b4(sha): bya don mdzad dpe bshad gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gdul bya'i don byed rin chen 'dra// yid bzhin nor bu longs spyad na// dbul
86b5(sha): 'phongs gtan med dgos 'dod sprod// 'dod yon longs spyod btsal med 'gyur// sems nyid sangs rgyas don rtogs na// phyogs 'dzin mtha' rnams brtan
86b6(sha): med cing // chos nyid ma bcos rang bzhin gyi// yang dag don la rgyun du gnas// 'bras bu nyi shu lnga rdzogs 'byung // zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa
86b7(sha): snang gzhi'i mtshan dpe ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsa la pa/ snang gzhi'i dpe ni rgya mtsho 'dra// chu phran chu mig thams cad kun// byung yang
87a1(sha): rgya mtsho rang las byung // 'dus kyang rgya mtsho rang las 'dus// rlabs chen gting zab rin chen gnas// 'khor 'das chos rnams thams cad
87a2(sha): kun// byung yang chos nyid gzhi las byung // 'dus kyang chos nyid gzhi las 'dus// chos nyid gting zab rtogs dka' bas// yon tan lhun rdzogs rol pa shar//
87a3(sha): ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ gdam ngag dpe don ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gdam ngag dpe ni char pa 'dra// sa gzhi spangs
87a4(sha): nas myu gu skye// ga dam ngag zab mos blo rgyud spangs// byang chub sems kyi myu gu skye// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ dgongs pa'i mtshan dpe ji ltar
87a5(sha): lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ dgongs pa'i dpa ni rlung che na 'dra// yul rlung chen po stong che ba// rnam rtog thams cad shong r+t+ta yangs//
87a6(sha): bye rlung chen po ltar che ba// rtogs 'dzin sems med chos nyid gsal// chu klung che ltar rgyun mi chad// chos nyid ngang la ma yangs gsal// ces gsungs/
87a7(sha): so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ nges don dpes mtshon gyi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas
87b1(sha): rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// nam mkha'i snying pos yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen de bzhin gshegs// nges don man ngag dpes
87b2(sha): bshad gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhi nyid yang dag nges don ni// rgyu rkyen med phyir rang 'byung ste// dpe ni 'byung ba slus gyur 'dra// dngos
87b3(sha): po med phyir stong pa nyid// dpe ni nam mkha' dngas pa 'dra// bem po min phyir rig pa gsal// dpe ni nyi ma'i snying po 'dra// re dogs med pas lhun gyis grub//
87b4(sha): dpe ni nor bu rin chen 'dra// gnyis snang med phyir gnyis med gcig/ dpe ni dbyibs dang kha dog 'dra// dri ma med phyir rnam par dag/ dpe ni man shel dag pa
87b5(sha): 'dra// phyogs ris med phyir mnyam pa nyid// dpe ni bar snang dngas pa 'dra// chad pa'i mtha' 'das rig pa gsal// rtag pa'i mtha' 'das stong pa nyid// /
87b6(sha): mtha' las 'das phyir dbus mi gnas// gcig pa thams cad ma 'dres gsal// ka shi ras stengs rin chen 'dra// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa//
87b7(sha): sems nyid nges don ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ sems nyid ngas don yang dag pa// sems nyid la gzugs rten med phyir// rang bzhin
88a1(sha): nam mkha' khams dang gcig/ sems nyid kha dog dbyibs med phyir// dngos po thams cad ye nas bral// sems nyid dmigs su med pa'i
88a2(sha): phyir/ bdi zhes bzung bar rten mi bca'// sems nyid sa bron med pa'i phyir// skye shi'i rgyun mi bzod nas chad// sems nyid rgyu rkyen med pa'i phyir// rang byung
88a3(sha): gzhan las rag ma lus// sems nyid thog mtha' med pa'i phyir// dus gsum rgyun du mnyam pa nyid// sems nyid mtha' dbus med pa'i phyir// rig pa chen po
88a4(sha): brdal khyab gnas// sems nyid dngos po med pa'i phyir// mtshan nyid nam mkha'i khams dang gcig/ sems nyid 'bad rtsol med pa'i phyir// rang bzhin ye nas
88a5(sha): rnam par dag/ sems nyid sgrib byed med pa'i phyir// rang rig rang gsal dag par gnas// sems nyid bdag 'dzin med pa'i phyir// mtha' yi sgro skur las 'das
88a6(sha): bral// sems nyid rgya chad med pa'i phyir// rigs pa phyogs med dag tu 'bar// sems nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs phyir// sna tshogs snang la ngos bzung med//
88a7(sha): sems nyid rang 'byung yin pa'i phyir// rgyu rkyen skye 'gag gdod nas med// ces gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ sems nyid mtshan nyid nges pa gang // rdo rje spyi
88b1(sha): dpal gyis bshad gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi mtshan nyid bsam yas kyang // yang dag nges don 'di lta ste// sems nyid rang gi mtshan
88b2(sha): nyid la// gdod nas rgyu med dngos po med// rkyen myed 'gyur med rgyun chad med// skye ba med cing gnas pa med// 'gag pa med cing ngos bzung med// brtag tu med
88b3(sha): cing rtog byed med// mtshan ma med cing gzung 'dzin med// rang bzhin med de mtshan nyid med// rnam par rtog med g.yo ba med// bag la nyal med 'gyur ba med//
88b4(sha): sgrib pa med cing rang gsal ba// phyogs cha med pas mtha' dbus med// spyod yul med pas bzang ngan med// mnyam pa nyid las bdag gzhan med// mu med
88b5(sha): mtha' med thog mtha' med// rnam par rtog med dri ma med// yul med 'gyur med bag chags med// phyi nang med de spyod yul med// bzung du med cing 'phel 'grib
88b6(sha): med// rgya ma chad cing phyogs ma lhung // rang byung rang rig rang gsal ba// rang shar rang dag rang grol ba// bzung du med la yang dag gsal// bag la nyal gyi
88b7(sha): 'dzin bral// rgyu rkyen ma byas rang byung ba// gnyen pos gzhi med 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin med pas stong pa nyid// sgrib byed med pas rang gsal ba// stong pa
89a1(sha): ma grub dngos po med// ye nas dag pas zang thal ba// rang byung thog mtha' med pa yi// ma bcos ma smad rang lugs gnas// yang dag snying
89a2(sha): po 'dus ma byas// rig pa brda la khyab mtha' las 'das// nges don yang dag snying po ngo bo nyid// sems nyid dngos po med pa'i phyir// las la rnam smin med pa yin//
89a3(sha): las kyi dbang bsgyur btsan nges na// yang dag ye shes rang 'byung gis// nges don snying po med par 'gyur// des na dge sdig bag chags kun// sog pa'i gzhi ngo ma grub
89a4(sha): pas// rnam dag sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin// dper na man shel dag pa la// g.ya' dang dri ma bkos mi srid// sangs rgyas dgongs pa'ang de bzhin nyid// de yang
89a5(sha): rang gi sems nyid yin// don 'di thos dang mi ldan pa'i// lha dang mi dang lha min sogs// sgro skur 'dogs dang dmyal khams bgrod// nyan thos mdo de rgyal zhing
89a6(sha): 'bog/ rnal 'byor rgyud lung skrag cing sngangs// de phyir yang dag nges don gyis// snod dkon pas na shin tu gsang // de skad rdo rje snying pos bshad// 'jam
89a7(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ yang dag dpe don gyi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// byang chub sems
89b1(sha): dpa' sems dpa' che// nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad gsol// rdo rje 'chang chen bka' nyid las// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bcom ldan sprul pa'i gsu
89b2(sha): gis bshad// de yi nges don gang lags pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis bshad gsol// ces gsol pas/ rdo rje 'chang chen gyis gsungs pa// dpag bsam shing chen
89b3(sha): rgyas pa yi// yang dag nges don mtshon pa la// dpe don rnam pa bdun yin te// gzhi dang rtsa ba sdong po dang // yal ga lo 'dab me tog dang // 'bras bu smin pas bshad
89b4(sha): pa'o// zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol ba/ de don gang lags rgyas bshad gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ gzhi ni sa gzhi lta bu ste// rang byung
89b5(sha): snying po ngo bo nyid// 'khor 'das kun gyi spyis gcig/ dngos po'i gnas lugs mi 'gyur bar// ye nas gnas pa'i chos nyid do// zug pa rtsal ba lta bu ste//
89b6(sha): de nyid nges don gsal bar ston// ma 'khrul lhag mthong mngon gyur byed// yang dag rig pa byang chub sems// rang byung ye shes rang gsal ba'o// dril ba sdong po lta bu
89b7(sha): ste// sems nyid don gyi snying po ste// yon tan chos rnams kun rdzogs pas// gnyis med mnyam pa nyid du gcig/ ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'o// gyes pa
90a1(sha): yal ga lta bu ste// de nyid lhun grub rtsal shar ba// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang snang // ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal stong nyid// sna tshogs snang la
90a2(sha): ngos bzung med// rgyas pa lo 'dab lta bu ste// stong phrag brgyad cu chos kyi sgo// gang la ci 'dul theg pa'i grangs// sna tshogs rang snang grub pa'i mtha'// rig pa
90a3(sha): 'gag med 'char ba la// gsal ba me tog lta bu ste// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams la// mi mthun med pa gcig med pas// thams cad kun gyi dngos gzhi ya//
90a4(sha): phyogs gcig rgya chad med pa'o// smin pa 'bras bu lta bu ste// yang dag nges don snying po ste// rtogs pa mngon gyur ye shes gsal// sku gsum lhun gyis rdzogs pa ste// /
90a5(sha): yon tan ma lus 'char ba dang // zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rang byung snying po yang dag pas// nges don rtogs thabs bshad du gsol// ces gsol
90a6(sha): pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rang byung don gyi snying po'i mchog/ rtogs thabs nges don rnam pa lnga// gzer bdun man ngag nges par bdun// don brda thag bcad gtan
90a7(sha): la dbab// nges pa'i don ltar mdo bsdu ba// rang byung po mnyam pa nyid// yang dag phyogs med lta ba dang // gzhi nyid mngon rtogs nyams blangs pa// ma yengs
90b1(sha): rgyun gsal bsgom pa dang // blang dor byar med lhug pa yin// don las mi bzla spyod pa dang // rtogs pa mngon gyur mthar phyin pas// sku gsum lhun rdzogs 'bras
90b2(sha): bu dang // de dag ma 'khrul ma nor bar// gtan la dbab pa'i gtan tshigs so// gtan la dbab pa'i gzer bstan ni// gzhi med dngos med rtsol bral ba//
90b3(sha): snying po rang byung lhun grub gzer// yul med rig pa rang gsal ba// chos rnams shes rab spyan rdzogs gzer// rang sems ma yangs ting nge 'dzin// mnyam gzhan
90b4(sha): rjes thob gnyis med gzer// nyams blangs ma 'khrul chos sgyur rtogs// g.yo goms mthar phyin nyams kyi gzer// rang sems 'khrul med mngon gyur pas//
90b5(sha): yon tan ma btsal snyun grub gzer// don ma rtogs pas lta gdong med// bsgoms dang don med 'khrul pa'i gzer// shes rab don gsal tshad ma yis//
90b6(sha): rang skyabs phyir rgol tshar bcad gzer// yang dag man ngag nges don bdun// chos rnams rang byung snying por gcig/ rang babs gnas pas rtsol byed nges// sangs
90b7(sha): rgyurgyas sems can gyur cig ces// gnyis su med de gcig par ngos// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa kun// gzha gcig lhun grub snying por nges// bdag gzhan
91a1(sha): bzang ngan blang dor med// gang dag mnyam pa nyid du nges// mnyam gzhag rjes thob dbyings med pas// bsgom yod bsgom med gnyis med nges/
91a2(sha): don rtogs 'khrul dang ma 'khrul med// dug lnga ye shes lngar dag nges// rang sems sangs rgyas gnyis med pas// rtogs pa mngon 'gyur 'bras bur nges//
91a3(sha): nges don gzer dang man ngag rnams// gtan la phebs pa'i gtan tshigs ni// ma 'khrul mi sla rtog bral bzhi// yang dag rigs shes tshad ma yis// ma nom
91a4(sha): nges par gtan la dbab// sna stegs chos sku'i dbyings nyid de// mthong ba mi mthun du ma'i phyir// rang bzhin skye ba med pa'i phyir// snang ba ma nges pa yi phyir// /
91a5(sha): thams cad snying po byang chub las// gzhan gyi chos ni gcig med de// snying po byang chub chos kyi sems// ye shes gnas pa'i chos nyid de// ma btsal lhun
91a6(sha): gyis grub pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ nges don man ngag gi le'u ste lnga brgya nyi shu drug go// / de nas ya ma
91a7(sha): ra dza yis// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// khro bcu gsang ba'i sdebs zhes pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis
91b1(sha): bshad gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsa la pa// khro bcu gsang sdebs mthar thug pa// drag sngags ngas ba shad khyod nyon cig/ rang byung chos sku dag pa
91b2(sha): las// ye shes rol pa phyag rgyar snang // de nyid khro bdag 'bar ba'i sku// de yi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a ni a ne
91b3(sha): a ne/ oM badz+ra shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ badz+ra sa ta nirma ka ya/ ma hA kro d+ha tsaN+Da kro d+ha rA dza ya/ u ne u ne u ne/ ba ga bag to ma hA shri he ru ka badz+ra ma
91b4(sha): hA ba la ti u U u/ badz+ra kr-i d+ha hUM ka ra badz+ra sa tang / badz+ra kro d+ha uSh+NI She tsakra wa rti/ badz+ra kro d+hA ya man+ta kr-ita dza ma rA dza ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha pradz+nyA ta krita ma hA ba
91b5(sha): le ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha pad+ma ta krita tsa na d+ha rak+Sha ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha bi ga nan ta kr-iti a mri ta ra dza ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha Tak+ki rA dza ya bi dzA ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hAM ba la u tre ya/
91b6(sha): badz+ra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da kri ta ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha Ir+ya a tsa la tsan d+ha ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha su ma pa ra dza tiSh+ThA ya/ hUM hUM hAM/ u ne u ne u ne/ kA ya bAg tsi t+ta badz+ra naM/
91b7(sha): badz+ra bab+da ma hA kro d+ha be ra pa la ya/ a si mu sa la/ a pa ri shu ba sha ha ta yaM/ u u u/ sa ha kA ya badz+ra kro d+ha ka pa ye/ ma hA tsakra badz+re kro d+ha mu kha ye/ ma
92a1(sha): hA tsit+ta badz+ra kro d+ha a pa ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ ma hA kro d+ha nir ma ya/ badz+ra rak+ShA kro d+ha pa la ti/ u u u/ sing nga ye/ bya tsamaM/
92a2(sha): du ru yaM/ u u u/ tsit+tat+tA saM/ bi ta ye/ ha la ye/ a a a/ i ai ai/ u u u/ da la yaM/ ma la yaM/ ki pa laM/ badz+ra kro d+ha hU/ sarba shat+sun/
92a3(sha): hA na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ dar ya da ra ya/ A kaR+ShA ya a kaR+Sha ya/ tsun+na bats+tshan+d+hA ya/ A kad ta ya A gad ta ya/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+hama?/ staM b+ha
92a4(sha): s+t+waM b+ha sa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ mA ra ya mA ra yA/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ de dag drag po'i gsang sdebs te/ khro rgyal thams cad 'dul ba yin/ oM badz+ra shrI
92a5(sha): / r+b+bak+Shod+hamehA pA la ti/ ni ta na~M/ mtha b+h+yaH/ banA dz+nyA ban dzAd+d+ha phaT/ gsang ba drug po mchog rdebs 'di// rdo rje 'chang chen
92a6(sha): thugs las byung // ye shes sprul pa'i rngam sgra yin// khro rgyal dmod pa'i mtshon cha yin// dbyangs yig chos sku'i so ba yin// klad gnon rgyal po
92a7(sha): longs spyod rdzogs// khro rgyal skyes bu sprul pa'i sku// chos sku dbyangs yig 'khub med la// khro bdag chen po dpung dang bcas// dbyangs yig 'khyab med
92b1(sha): klung du drangs// rgyab ri dmag mi tshan chen po// ye shes khro rgyal bcu dang gcig/ dbang sdud 'bru gsum thugs kyi bcud// dbyangs kyi 'khub med chos sku nyid//
92b2(sha): rdo rje mi shigs sku gsung thugs// rdo rje khros pa'i dmag chen dpung // dbyangs kyi 'khub med mgo 'dren te// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi yang snying
92b3(sha): bcas// chos sku'i dbyangs nyid 'khu ba med do// khro bo stobs chen 'khub med dril// pho mo yang snying sku gsung thugs// chos sku dgyes bzhad 'khub med sdud// gsang ba
92b4(sha): rno gcod yi ge dgu// rdo rje khro bo de dag gis// gdul bya ba sgral bya gang yin pa// rgyob cig choms shig sregs shig dang // zung zhig khug cig phye mar thong // drongs shig
92b5(sha): chings shig phye mar rlogs// don cig gtubs shig sod cig pa'o// dbang du bsdus la sgrol cig skrod// ye shes rgyal po khro chen gyis// mtshan gsum dgyes chags 'phrin
92b6(sha): las mdzod// brnan te sku gsung thugs stobs kyis// dpa'abo'i log gnon gdul bya sgrol// rang dbang med par brlag par mdzod// gtso bo las mkhan btang ba'o// /
92b7(sha): / gzhan yang rno gcod spu gri ni// sarba sha trun snying khrag la thum ril rba da/ tsit+ta breng shag rbad/ srog la hur thums rbad/ dbugs la sum ril rbad/
93a1(sha): bi tsu ra Na ya bi tsun+ta ya/ basmi ku ru/ ba ril rbad/ ro myags rbad/ kham shag rbad/ ma ra yarbad/ sarba big nan e yaM raM la kha su badz+ra karma nan 'drig
93a2(sha): rbad/ a a badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la s+t+wam b+ha ya ba banan nan nan/ sarba ta thA ga tA ma pa la ya nan a/ ma hA pa la pra taM ki ra pra ta ki rA/ tapye ba ni tha ru/ rig sngags kyi tshogs
93a3(sha): rnams zlog cig/ mA ra ya phaT b+h+yo/ e ka dun snying na bzlog/ du sad nan ma ra ya bzlog/ sa ma ya bzlog bzlog/ mA ra ya thums ri li li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha la/ pra
93a4(sha): pa sa ra b+ha ri sha ya phroM phrom hril hri la shar shar phob phob b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dud kar phrom phob/ shu ti phrom phob/ shar hril phrom phob/ khro rgyal bcu gcig gtso bor bcas// reg chod
93a5(sha): me lce 'bar ba yi// gsang sdebs snying po yang dag 'dis// rig sngags gcod pa'i reg chod 'dir// ral gri spu gri ma lce bzhin// gang la bab kyang thal bar rlog
93a6(sha): rig sngags gnod pa'i reg chod 'dis// ri rab srog chags mnan pa bzhin// 'byung ba brtan bzhi rngams kyis gnon// srid pa zhig kyang 'chor mi srid// rig sngags
93a7(sha): phyir bzlog reg chod 'dis// ji ltar rlung gis sprin chags sam// mun las nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'byung ba'i rgyud dang phyir bzlog na// byad sngags rbod gtong smos
93b1(sha): ci dgos// rig sngags chu 'khyags reg chod 'dis// skyi ba dang bskal pa'ang 'bebs byed na// chu 'khyags lo 'joms the tsom med// reg chod me lce 'bar ba bzhi// /
93b2(sha): ye shes lha yi snying po mtshon// srin po gsad pa'i gnam thog yin// drag sngags gsang sdebs snying por bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang dag gsang
93b3(sha): ba'i rgyud las// khro bo gsang sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// las kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
93b4(sha): rnal 'byor dbang thob dam tshig ldan// ye shes lha rnams gang rung gi/ sngon du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa yi// drod rtags thob pas las 'di brtsams// dben la
93b5(sha): brtan pa'i dur khrod du// dge bcu spyad cing tshogs 'khor bya// ngam grog brag nag ri rgod kyi// sa la maN+Dal gru bzhi bya// dur khrod g.yul 'thab ro bsregs dang /
93b6(sha): shan pa rabs chad khang sa la// gnyan ri'i chu sa sbrus 'brub khung bya// gru gsum kha khyer tshar rtsang bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ nang du drag po nyis 'gyur
93b7(sha): la/ d+hI hUM phaT dza'i thams la blang // rgyu rten drug dang sa chu shing // khang sa yul gyi rdzas rnams la// gang yin don pa'i ling ga bya// dbang po yan lagadod pa
94a1(sha): lu// ming dang snying po khong du brnag/ thod chen mi shes dong du banag/ tsha ba gsum dang drug sna tshogs// nad khrug sna tshogs byug par bya//
94a2(sha): khramathod la sogs mi shis par// dug rmo ra drug sbyang dug pa// rol mo baspu re lcag pa// mi yi shi khrag dri rims mdze// ra khyi rtan gshi khrag+sa dang // nyungs
94a3(sha): kar nyungs nag skye tseg/ bdud btsan k+Sha 'i chu yis sbyor// mthun por la chus sgyur gsher// thun snod mtshon cha'i phyag rgyas gdab// zhing chen shun dang ror
94a4(sha): la// sme balnga dang tsha ba gsum// ni rangs su yis skye bcad la// shan pa'i nyi phyed kha lhor bltas// khro bor bsgoms shing drag sngags bzlas// kang ka' ma bug
94a5(sha): pa'i sgra r+dz+dza yis// dug rtswa khrag rtswa dur khrod kyis// sol bas mtshon chas 'khor lo bri// dbus nas TIg bskor rim pa bzhin// dbus su rdo rje hUM mdzad dam// rtsibs
94a6(sha): bcu khro bo bcu po yis// rtsa ba'i drag sngags tshan re dgod// phyi rim mu khyud stong pa la// gang byed spu gri grangs med dgod// mtha' ma sbrul gyi ribs bskor//
94a7(sha): las kyi khro bo'i lto bar bca'// ral gri sdigs mdzub khro tshul 'jigs// ngar glung byin brlabs dbang bskur te// dong rtsang ling ga'i kha la lding // gtor ma
94b1(sha): sha khrag sna tshogs bca'// brnag par byin gyis brlabs la dbul// de nas rnam dag chos kyi sku// don dam yang dag snying po las// mthing nag hUM nyid yongs gyur
94b2(sha): pas// khro rgyal bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu zhabs brgyad bco brgyad phyag/ mthing nag dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyag mtshan mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// dregs
94b3(sha): pa'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// thugs khar badz+ra he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ba grad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// nyi zla'i
94b4(sha): gdan la bkyang bskum bzhugs// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral gri dril bu g.yon// rdo rje snying po 'od 'bar 'phro// dbu la rdo rje sems dpa'
94b5(sha): bzhugs// mthing kha rdo rje dril bu bsnams// phyogs bcu gtso yi mdun dag na// khro rgyal bcu gcig gsal bar bsgom// khro chung sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis//
94b6(sha): gang la dmigs pa rdul du rlog/ thun rdzas me lce thog gzer 'phro// 'khor lo mtshon chas gcod cing 'thub// brgya thun brdeg cing drag sngags bzlas// de ltar drag
94b7(sha): sngags drod thob nas// 'khor lo la btsas mchod rten gyi// rab gnas phyin can bum par gzhug/ ling ga gdug pa can la gtad// de bzhin yul rten bcud la
95a1(sha): gnas// zor 'phang spogs na bsreg thabs bya// nya stong zor 'phang kha gso bya// 'di ni gnad dbang bsrung bzlog rnams// myur du 'grub
95a2(sha): par nges pa ste// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid kyis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// khro bcu gsang sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun
95a3(sha): cu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yi// reg chod me lce 'bar ba yi// gsang sdebs
95a4(sha): sgying po 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi 'od zer gyi// 'khrul 'khor drug sngags mtshon chu 'phros// de dag drag po gsang sdebs ni// a ne a ne a na//
95a5(sha): oM shri many+dzu ya man ta ka hri sti ka la ru pa u ne u ne u ne/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti badz+ra kro d+ha ra dza ya ya man krin ta badz+ra kro d+ha ban dza na ga ra ya u usta b+ha ya ka pa ye u u
95a6(sha): ubadz+ra raka yak+Sha/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma ra dza sa to me ya ma ya ko ta mi/ u u u/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ya/ du ru ye/ u u u/ hristi pra ma ya/
95a7(sha): rni sha ku ru nIrba da ya/ shri many+dza ya man ta ka ya ma pak+ku na si/ ha pa ru mun mA ra ya hUM phaT/ klad khrag la myogasarba da ya/ ya me to ru na yau ta ya/ me ya ma k+She ta/
95b1(sha): yata yo ni ra yak+She ya ta ya mek+She/ yak+tha ya dza ni ra ma ya/ k+She pa ma me ta/ murdza ya/ mgrin khrag myogasarbad ya rak+ta tsa ra ya/ lha khrug myogasarba da ya/ mA ra ya/ snying
95b2(sha): khrag myogasarba da ya/ ya ma re ni dza yorba da ya/ ya ma ra ni dza yak+She ya/ me tak+She ya ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ tak+She ma ma maM/ a ti yo ta ru to me ya/ kA ma ma
95b3(sha): ya ta/ ya me to sa dzA ra ma ya/ ta me ma ya k+Sha/ tsi ta ye/ bi ta ye/ ha la ya/ gzhan dag de ltar bsdeb pa'o// de dag dreg sngags don bshad na// chos sku'i dbyangs
95b4(sha): yig drug 'di dang // so ba klud gnon rgyal po dang // dbyangs yig skyes bu blon po dang // dbyangs kyi 'khu ba med gnyen pos 'thung // 'khub med rgyab ri dmag
95b5(sha): mi dpung // ka ba dbyangs yig yang snying dgu// dbyangs kyi 'khu ba med spu gr-i gcod// gtso bo las mkhan log gnon dang // 'thoms pa'i mtshon chas gsad
95b6(sha): pa'o// gzhan yang reg chod me lce'i sdebs// rab tu gsang ba'i mchog 'di bshad// a ne a ne a na/ oM shri many+dza a kro te ka ya man ta ka/ ka pa ye/
95b7(sha): ka la ru pa ne sha ku/ mu kha ya/ hrik+ti bi kri ta a Na na a pa ye/ u ne u na u naM/ a hri/ ma austai / u u u/ na mo b+ha ga tha taM/ badz+raka?
96a1(sha): d+ha rA dzA ya/ ya man krig d+ha na bany+dza na ka ra/ badz+re ma hA k+Sho ta ya ma ye/ u ne u ne u ne/ ya ma tsa swa to me ya/ ma mra me tak+She/ u u
96a2(sha): u/ sing nga yaM/ byA tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsat+ta ye/ bi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u ne u naM u na/ s+t+r-i pa la/ ka pa ye/ u u u/ badz+ra rak+Sha yak+tha hristi pra ma ya/ nri sha ku ru nrirba da ya/
96a3(sha): ka ta na ma ya ka te kro a dzu na ma shri au/ u u u/ ya ma sa kyA na sa ha sa ru mun ma ra ya hU phaT/ shag pa cha la pa rbad pu nan/ klad khrag la myogasarbad ya/
96a4(sha): rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams zlog cig mA ra ya phaT N+yai/ kA ya bI ki tsit+ta badz+ra kr-i ma hA ba la/ a a a/ laM nan/ su ra yaM baM khaM/ sta ba pa baM bau nan nan+ta a nanA
96a5(sha): ta ya/ sarba big nan tsit+ta bruM ril kha tha ma nA sha ya khaM thaM nA shwa ya nan/ rAk+Sha rak+ShA swA hA/ tri ga nan hu ra thums dza/ myag thum rilarba da ya/ man tra pra taM/ ki rA
96a6(sha): pra ta ma ka ra hUM phaT/ de dag drag sngags nges don ni// spyi med dbyangs yi ge chos kyi sku/ klad gnon rgyal po sku gsung thugs// dbyangs yig 'khu ba med yang snying
96a7(sha): dgu/ pho mo snying po sku gsung thugs// dbyangs yig blon po skyes bu ste// rdo rje khro bo dbyangs kyi gnad// rgya ba ri dmag mi ka ba'i mchog/ 'khu ba med pha
96b1(sha): mo yang snying dgu// pho mo dbyangs yig 'khug med do// gnyen po brdung gnyag spu gri'i gcod// gtso bo las mkhan dpa' bo'i non// dbyangs yig sprul pa las/
96b2(sha): mkhan rgya ba// thems pa sgo bzhi gnad kyi gcod// gtso bos phyogs skyong khro bo mngags// des ni 'thoms pa'i gshed bzhi mngags// de bzhis dmigs pa sngon du
96b3(sha): sgrol// rig sngags phyir bzlog spu gris so// gnan guzir 'khum medo spu gri dang // kha bcing stobs gnan spu gri dang // bsrungs pa bdag gzhan spu gri dang // gzer
96b4(sha): dang sog dbrog gcad pa'o// khyad par reg chod me lce'i sdebs// pho mo gcig tu dril ba ste// 'khrul 'khor g.yas bskor g.yon bskor dang // stag mchod la
96b5(sha): sogs nyen bzhir bsdeb// gcig tu dril la yang bsdebs par bshad// rig sngags gnan bzlog gcad pa yi// reg chod me lce 'bar ba'i sdebs// ting 'dzin
96b6(sha): gsal dbang dam tshig ldan// ye shes lha grub dam tshig ldan// dbang thob chos nyid rtogs pas spyad// a ne a ne a ne/ badz+ra kro d+ha ra dza ya/ ma hA shri he ru ka
96b7(sha): tsa na d+ha ya/ u ne u naM u ne/ o shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta ka ka la ru ba/ shre ste b+he kri ta/ mu ka yaM/ a pa yaM/ ka pa yaM/ u u/ ya ma ra ne dza ya
97a1(sha): k+She ya/ ya k+She ya ra ni s+pho ta ya ye na ru to me ya/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ u ne u ne u n+we/ ya a hri/ ma e stAM/ ya ma a e hri k+ti/
97a2(sha): sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsit+te ye/ b+hi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u u u/ ya man ta ka badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma ra dza mo na ta nag po u u u/ a ya ma du ra tsa sha na la/
97a3(sha): nar ha sa/ u ne u ne u ne/ da la ya/ ma la ye/ ki po ye/ ya man ta kr-id hU/ shu t+yAn/ bi tsur+Na ya bi tsur+Na ya b+hAsmi ku ru snying khrag la thums ril rbad/ myags rbad/
97a4(sha): myogasarba da/ tsit+ta breng sha ga rbad/ kham shag rba da/ ro myagasarbad/ ba ri la rbad/ thu ril rbad/ ma ra ya rba da/ ai ya ra la ba/ badz+ra karma nan trig rba da ya/ a a badz+ra
97a5(sha): klo d+ha staM pa ya ba baM nan nan/ su laM sta pa ya na na na na/ ma hA pa la badz+ra kro d+ha a nan ta a/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la tsa na d+ha ya/ pra taM ki ra pra taM ki ra/ te s+ye ba/ ni pa tha ru/
97a6(sha): rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams zlog cig mA ra ya phaT b+h+yo/ sa ma ya b+h+yo bzlog/ thum ri ri li b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rig chod me lce 'dra ba 'di// dbyangs yig chos sku so ba yin//
97a7(sha): klang gnon rgyal po longs spyod rdzogs// chos sku dbyangs yig 'khub med la// khro rgyal skyes bu sku gsung thugs// dbyangs kyi 'khub med rgyab ri dmag/ dbyangs/
97b1(sha): ldan rgyab dmag mtshan dang bcas// yang snying pho mo sku gsung thugs// pho mo yang snying dgu gnyis la// dpa' bo'i log non 'khum med dbyangs// sde brgyad rgod bzhi
97b2(sha): 'khum med dbyangs// rtsa ba las mkhan rno gcod dgu// de dag snying po rtsa ba'o// rig sngags gcod pa'i reg chod 'dis// ral gri spr-i gri me lce bzhin// gang la ba
97b3(sha): kyang rdul du rlob// rig sngags gnan pa'i reg chod 'dis// ri rab srog chags mnan pa bzhin// 'byung ba gtan gzhi rngams kyis gnon// srid pa zhig kyang 'chor mi
97b4(sha): srid// rig sngags phyir zlog reg chod 'dis// ji ltar rlung gi sprin phyugs sam// mun las nyi ma shar ba bzhin// 'byung ba'i rgyun kyang phyir zlog na// byang sngag
97b5(sha): cod gtong smos ci dgos// reg chod me lce 'bar ba gsum// de bzhin srin po gdong dmar la// btab na the tsom med par gsod// ye shes lha yi snying po mtshon//
97b6(sha): de na 'di spyod sngags pa yis// dam chig srog ltar bsrung ba gces// dbang bskur gnang ba thob pa gces// ye shes lha yis drod thob gces// reg chos gsang
97b7(sha): sdebs ringo po yin// reg tshod drag po gsang ba'i sde pas// sngags rgod drod tho bo rdzogs pas spyad// a na a na a naM/ ma hA shri he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+ha ra dza ya/
98a1(sha): ma hU pa la sti hU/ u ne u ne U ne/ o a kro he/ ya mun ta/ ya ma ye/ many+dza shri badz+ra tik+Sha Na ka lA ru pa hUM a/ hri ti sa ma ya/ u
98a2(sha): u u/ ya a hre/ ma e hi/ ya ma mi ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo nI/ ra dza ni/ u ne u ne u ne/ stam b+ha ya/ ka pa ye/ badz+re rak+Sha/ ye k+Sha/ u u u/
98a3(sha): tr-I bi sha badz+ra kro d+ha/ ya ma me ta kA/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra dza ni/ u ne u ne u ne/ sing nga ye/ byA tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsi tA ye/ b+hi ta yi/ ha la ye
98a4(sha): u mu u/ badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Da la la hU~M phaT/ a yA ma du ru tsa sha nA la/ a A g+ha/ i I s+yai yu U U e au ste/ ka kha ga b+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ ta tha da d+hA nu/
98a5(sha): Tha tha Da D+hA na/ pa phe ba b+ha ma/ u naM u ne u ne/ a mu ga tri ga rba da na narba de tsu rarba da nu narba dA/ hu ru rbad thums rba da/ dza r+thad/ myag sarba da/ thu marba da/ ril
98a6(sha): rbad/ snying rbad/ khrag rbad/ khaMrbad/ shag rbad/ drag sngags gsang sdebs reg tshed 'di// so pa chos sku dbyangs kyis 'dren// klad gnon khro rgyal
98a7(sha): 'khrub med dbyangs// blon po rdo rje rnon po ste// skyes bu sku gsung thugs 'khum med// rgyab ri dmag mi 'khub med dbyings// gnyen po brdung
98b1(sha): brtag dbyangs kyis 'chun// khro bo sprul pa rgyu ba ri dmag/ dbyangs 'chun yang snying pho mo'i 'bru// sprul pa me dpung sde brgyad rno// sgra dbyangs mtshon
98b2(sha): drug 'khu ba med dbyangs// gnan ga zir srog dbrog sbyor ba gcad// srog sgying 'bru re gcod sgrol ba'o// reg chod gsang sdebs drag sngags la// las
98b3(sha): kyi sbyor ba bsam yas te// mdor bsdus gsang sdebs de dag go/ ye shes khro bo'i rol pa las// reg chod me lce 'bar ba 'phros// dge bcu ma yid
98b4(sha): rgyun du spyad// ye shes khro bo'i rgyal po yis// mchod pa gtor ma tshogs 'khor bya// ri rgod byin can lhun po dang // rin chen yod dang zhabs kyis
98b5(sha): btsugs// drag po dur khrod sra rnams la// chu bdud can chus 'jim pa bya// khru gang mchod rten byang chub cher// dur khrod tshon rtsis kha dog bsgyur//
98b6(sha): khI 'phang bzhi po dkar dmar sngo// ser po bad la gdan khri dmar// dbu ni nog po bum rten ser// khong stong gdan 'og gru gsum du// gang dmigs rgyud rten
98b7(sha): li ka banag/ ming rus srog snying byi b+hing ste/ byad du bcug la mon thod parnag/ dur khrod ras la tsha ba gsum// tsha ba'i rgyal po sme ba lnga// byugs la dug
99a1(sha): chus 'khor lo bri// lte ba rtsibs la hUM nyid dang // cha byad rdzu gri drug sngags dgod// rtsibs grangs spu gri'i sngags 'bras sbyar// rtsibs
99a2(sha): mtshan ming byang rdzogs par bri// mtha' ma'i sreg byed me dpung 'bar// khro bo khro mo'i lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas gtsid pa ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra//
99a3(sha): gcod cing bsregs pas thams cad sgrol// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung 'dra// skom zhing g.yeng bas srog sdud 'joms// mo na nam
99a4(sha): gri thod dmar mchod du// zhungs kar nyungs nag skye tse dang // gri khrag rims khrag bsnol khrag dang // ra dug spyang dug dug rgod dang // rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang //
99a5(sha): thal chen la sogs skam thun bca'// de nas rnam dag chos nyid kyi// ngang las bru ljang yongs gyur pas// mchod rten dur khrod gzhal yas khang // bum par
99a6(sha): dpal chen he ru ka/ bang rim dang por hUM las kyang // gshi na rje gshed sogs khro bo bcu// khri 'phang gnyis par sprul pa yi// khro bo rnams ni gsal
99a7(sha): bar bskyed// khri 'phang gsum pa la sogs su// rang gi lha srungs rnams kyang bskyed// gdan 'og dgra bgegs gang yin bsam// b+h+rUM las drag po'i 'khor/
99b1(sha): lo ni// lte ba rtsib sa dang ldan par bsgom// lte ba gtso bo rtsibs la 'khor// hU las rang rang snying pos bskyed// rtsibs grangs lha yi grangs dang sbyar// dbang
99b2(sha): bskur byin brlabs ye shes bstim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bu la// bskyod cing bskul te 'phrin las bcol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang //
99b3(sha): drag sngags smra ga cad bzlas par bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po dang // myur du sgra dang bcas par 'khor// gang dmigs mchod par gcad cing gtub// drag
99b4(sha): sngags brgya 'am stong stong na// thun brdeg khro chung mtshon cha thogs// bsam yas mo lce thog gzer gyis// dmigs pa lus srog rdul phran brlag/ de ltar gsal
99b5(sha): bas drag tu bzlas// thon nus 'khor lo ling ga bcas// bzlog na rgyun srang 'gram la gnan// bsrung gzir bka' rten mgon pos gnan// gsad na gdug
99b6(sha): ba'i gnyen la gtad// nya stong kha gso drag tu bya// 'di lta bu yi drag sngags kyis// mthu stobs bdag po nyid kyang 'joms// gzhan bdag kun la smos ci dgos
99b7(sha): chod rten 'khor lo ting 'dzin thun/ drag sngags spyi rgyug sbyor ba yin// a a a/ oM badz+ra thi he ru ka ma hA kro d+ha tsan d+ha hUM/ a ne a ne a ne/ d+hA na ma hA kro d+ha rA
100a1(sha): dza sa man ta na/ ka ya badz+ra kro d+ha shri many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta bA ka badz+ra kri ta ya/ kA la ru pa ni sha ku ru/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsiN+DA/ hri khyA biHkri ta/ u ne un
100a2(sha): u naM/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa two/ ru na yo ni/ ra pa dza ni/ e ya ra ba la/ u u u/ badz+ra yak+Sha rak+Sha kro d+ha ma hA pa la stim pa ya ka pa ye/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e
100a3(sha): ai/ o o/ aM aHsing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ u ne u ne u naM/ tsit+ta ye/ b+hi ta ye/ ha la ye/ u u u/ da lo ye/ ma la ye/ ki paM ye/ ni she ku ru/ a kar
100a4(sha): Sha yA/ tig nAn/ sta b+hA ya/ bA ba la nan na na/ myags thugs ril mA ra ya nri dza rbad nan/ chos sku so ba klad gnon khro bo'i rgyal// dbyangs yig ye shes khro bo sku gsung
100a5(sha): thugs/ gshin rje gshed po skyes bu 'khub med dbyangs// rgyab ri dmag bcas 'byung ba lnga yi stobs// rdo rje khro bos brdung rtag dbyangs kyis stobs// yang snying dbyug
100a6(sha): ldan rno dpal yi ge dgu// brnag pa srog 'phrog zir gnon sbyor spyod// me lce 'bar ba reg chod sdebs chen yin// chos kyi sku las rang byung khro bo'i rgyal// ye shes
100a7(sha): rol pa'i 'od zer nyi ltar 'phros// gdul bya kun sgrol byang chub lam la dgod// rtsa ba'i snying po ye shes lhun grub gces// des ni gang brtsams las rnams thogs
100b1(sha): med 'grub// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ rag chod me lce 'bar ba'i sdebs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu gnyis so//
100b2(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// bsnyen dang bsgrub dang drag po yi// ting 'dzin rim pa bshad du gsol//
100b3(sha): zhes gsol rdo rjes yang bshad pa// zhus don ngas bshad legs par nyon// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po yis// 'dzab dgongs bstan pa'i snying po ni// gang na gnas
100b4(sha): pa'i sa de na// dam can yongs kyi srog kyang gnas// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// chos nyid dbyings ni skye med las// ye shes lhun grub rol pa ste// skye ba'i cho 'phrul du mar
100b5(sha): bstan// snying po byang chub sems nyid ni// ye nas kun la snyoms khyab gnas// 'khor 'das kun gyi gzhi ma ste// ma lus srog gi rtse ba yin// de phyir dus gsum sangs
100b6(sha): rgyas rnams// kun gyi thugs kyang de ru gcig/ khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// lus ngag yid gsum de ru gcig/ byang chub sems dpa' mkha' 'gro rnams//
100b7(sha): byin rlabs snying po de ru gcig/ lha srin rje brgyad dregs pa can// srog gi snying po de ru gcig/ des na snying po byang chub sems// bstan pa'i snying po zhes bya'o// kun gzhi
101a1(sha): byang chub snying po sems// yid ni rang rig ye shes gsal// kun gzhi dbyings te yid ye shes// kun gzhi shes rab yid ni thabs// kun gzhi
101a2(sha): kun tu bzang mo lnga// yid ni kun tu bzang po yin// kun gzhi chos kyi dbyings nyid de// yid ni chos kyi sku nyid de// yid ni 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// kun ka/
101a3(sha): sbyor yum pe ta yi// yid ni dpal chen he ru ka/ kun gzhi kro d+hi shU ri yum// yid ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste// kun gzhi nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// de las dbyis
101a4(sha): dang ye shes dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byin gyis brlabs las rang byung ba'i// ye shes rol pa'i 'od zer spros// 'gro ba kun khyab don mdzad pa'i//
101a5(sha): gnad gsum dgongs pa'i don gsum dang // dgongs pa'i rtsal gsum man ngag gsum// gnad gsum snang srid thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs te ci phyir na// gzug
101a6(sha): khams sku ste 'dod khams gsung // gzugs med khams ni thugs su 'dus// man ngag rnam pa gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi// lus ngag yid
101a7(sha): gsum sgrib pa sbyong // dgongs pa'i don gsum zhes bya ba// chos sku longs sku sprul sku yis// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags gsum// skyong zhing rnam dag rtsa nas gcod
101b1(sha): dgongs pa rtsal gsum zhes bya ba// bsnyen pa dang ni bsgrub chen dang // drag po las kyi dgongs pa'o// dang po bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ni// bdag nyid chos sku'i ngang nyid
101b2(sha): las// ya ma na ta kar gnas pa yis// mgur gyi bum pa zhabs kyi long bu'i bar// khro chung ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// ska mdog mthing nag zhal gcig
101b3(sha): phyag gnyis rnga ma// g.yas pa be tshon g.yon pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng // me dpung 'bar ba'i glong nas mchongs la khad// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro//
101b4(sha): bye'u khrag chags bzhin du gtams shing 'khrig par bsgom// khro rgyal bdag nyid tsit+ta'i gzhal yas khang // rin chen gur phub 'dra ba'i nang nyid du// rang rig ye shes
101b5(sha): lhun gyis grub pa'i rtags// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang gsal bar bsgom// de yi thugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyi ma'i gdan stengs su//
101b6(sha): snying po mthing nag hUM yig gsal bar bsgom// de mthar bzlas pa'i snying po sngags kyis bskor// rang rig ye shes gnas su dag pa'i rtags// chos dbyings gting ma tha
101b7(sha): med pa'i bde gshegs nas// skye 'gro gzugs kyis bsdus pa thams cad kun// khro bo mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas kun na 'khor lo be
102a1(sha): tshon dang // ral gri dbyug tho kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing // g.yon pa kun nas khro bo'i sngags mdzub bsgreng // dur khrod chas rgyan rdzogs par kun la
102a2(sha): brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na 'jigs par bzhugs// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro// til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs par bsgom// bdag nyid ya
102a3(sha): ma na ta ka'i zhal nas sngags bzlas pas// sku gsung thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// don ni ye shes lnga 'od kha dog lnga// nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin du 'dom gang
102a4(sha): nas// gshin rje gshed kyi skur gyur gang la phog pa kun// gshin rje gshed gyur de dag zhal kun nas// gsang sngags 'brug gi sgra ltar zlog par gyur// bdag nyid
102a5(sha): gshin rje'i gshed kyi thugs kha nas// ye shes 'od zer bsam yas nyi ltar spros// chos kyi dbyings nyid gting mtha' med par khyab// 'od zer thams cad mchod pa'i/
102a6(sha): lha mor gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad thugs khar thim// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod phul thugs dam bskul// 'od zer stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten
102a7(sha): khams// mtha' yas mu med kun tu khyab pa las// sems can lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// las kyi gshin rje dregs pa thams cad kyi// srog gi snying po
102b1(sha): bkrag mdangs rdzu 'phrul mthu// las dang nus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus// sde brgyad lha srin ma mo mkha' 'gro la// thang cig 'dug dbang med pa'i bka'
102b2(sha): nyan cing // gang bcol las rnams thogs med byed par bsam// 'od zer de dag bdag la tshur 'dus thim// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa sbyangs//
102b3(sha): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// skra gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la 'dus te thi ma// sgo gsum sgrib sbyangs dbang bskur byin brlabs bsam//
102b4(sha): las kyi gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gro kun// bdag gi dbang du gyur nas las byed bsam// de ltar 'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bu ru// rgyun mi 'chad par gsal bar rab
102b5(sha): bsgoms te// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags mthong mthong drang bar bya'o// des ni ye shes lha dang las byed la// mngon du 'grub par 'gyur zhes rdo rjes bshad// 'jam
102b6(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mthar thug gi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo
102b7(sha): rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa'i 'dzab dgongs 'di bshad do// bdag nyid chos sku rnam dag ngang las kyang // khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku ru gsal// dbang bskar byin
103a1(sha): brlabs ye shes khro rgyal bstims// gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu dang ma mo dang // gling bdud sha za mon rnams gsal bar bsgom// bdag
103a2(sha): thugs ye shes lnga'i 'od zer 'phros pas// lho phyogs 'byung ba brtan bzhi rngams 'og nas// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer thod mkhar ldugs mkhar nas//
103a3(sha): las kyi gshin rje 'chi bdag dregs pa can// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe srog bdag dbang bskur// 'khor ni 'bum phrag bcas pa'i snying khar thim// tshe srog
103a4(sha): dbang bsdus bdag mdun bka' nyan cing // ci bgyi gsung stong thang cig kyang // 'dug dbang med par las byed bsam// de ltar sum cu rtsa gnyis dril la
103a5(sha): gzhag/ drod thob las kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa yin// bdag nyid ya ma na ta ka'i thugs kha nas// mthing nags las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// sngags bzlas
103a6(sha): nyi zer lta bu'i 'od zer dang // gang le phog pa'i skye 'gro thams cad kun// las kyi ga shin rje skra mdog sna tshogs pa// shin tu 'jigs shing gtu ma
103a7(sha): rnga ma khros pa'i gzugs// sha za khrag 'thung srog gaucod rus pa 'cha'// phyag g.yas kun na gong gi mtshon cha dang // me yi 'khor lo lcags kyu zhags
103b1(sha): pa bsnams// g.yon pa kun na rlung gi 'khor lo dang // lcags kyu zhags pa 'gug pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// dur khrod chas kyis brgyan cing rnga ma sgra sgrogs//
103b2(sha): kun gyi zhal nas drag po sngags kyi sgra// thog dang lce 'bab bzhin du thog chen sgrogs// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun gang bar bsam// bdag nyid ya
103b3(sha): man ta ka sa sngags bzlas pa// thugs kha'i sngags las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// gshed po gzhi yi thugs dam rgyud kyang bskul// gshed bzhi rang dbang
103b4(sha): med par las byed do// de bzhin gshed bzhis phyogs skyong bcu rnams pa skul// phyogs skyong bcu yis bdud pho mthar byed dang // las kyi gshin rje mon pa
103b5(sha): bdud rnams bskul// des ni ma mo mkha' 'gro gong po gong mo dang // gnod sbyin sha za srin po pho mo bskul// skad cig 'dug dbang med par las byed do//
103b6(sha): de dag kun gyis sa bdag klu gnyen bskul// rang dbang med par drag po'i lasau byed do// de rnams dmigs pa'i gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra bo du
103b7(sha): yod skye nas zhags pas bzung // dkar nag snying nas lcags kyus bzung nas drangs// rgyab nas rlung gis 'phul zhing me yis 'khor lo bsreg/ rtar mtshan
104a1(sha): rtsi spur mi chags pa bzhin du// bkrag dang gzi mdangs nyams sreg sol ba gzhog tu song // lus po 'dar zhing skra g.yengs gnas la/
104a2(sha): rid// 'o na thong skad dran 'dzer zhing mig rtsa rig rig nyams// de lta bu de las kyi gshin rjes yis// rang dbang med par bkug ste 'khrul 'khor gyi// gas
104a3(sha): mdzod bzhi ru bcug cing ling ga la thims bsam// de lta bu yi las mkhan tshogs rnams kyis// kho yi bsrung skyob byed pa'i lha bzhi po// rlung gi 'khor los
104a4(sha): phral zhing bskyod g.yeng nam mkhar bskul// me yi 'khor los bsreg cing thal bar brlag/ de ltar gsal bas dgug bstim lha dbye ba'i// drag sngags
104a5(sha): drod rtags mthong nas bzlas// des ni sred med bu yi bla yang khugs// don po'i bla tshe srog khugs the tshom med// 'jam dpal khro drug stong gsang rdzogs
104a6(sha): snying po'i rgyud las/ las la sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// drag po las kyi 'dzub
104a7(sha): dgongs bshad// bdag nyid ya man ta kar gnas pa yi// thugs kha'i rdo rje snying po yi ge ya// sngo nag gsal la 'tsher ba me lce 'bar// mtha' mar nyi ma
104b1(sha): bzhi pa'i sngags kyis bskor// me lce 'bar zhing tsha tshar 'phro bar bsam// bdag gi zhal nas gsad pa'i sngags bzlas pas// 'od zer 'phros pas rno
104b2(sha): myur glog ltar 'gyur// 'od zer dang ni 'gro ba thams cad kun// las kyi gshin rje sku mdog mthing nag khros// sku che yan lag rags pa mtshon che sna tshogs /
104b3(sha): thogs/ shin tu gtum rngam 'jigs pa dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i glong na mi bzad 'jigs pa'i gar// de las ye shes lnga yi 'od
104b4(sha): zer 'phros// 'od zer mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs 'gyur// zhal nas drag po gsang ba'i ngan sngags ni// spu gri sos gcod lta bu 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs//
104b5(sha): de lta bu yis stong gsum 'jig rten khams// gting mtha' med dbyings thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin// khengs par bsams te de dag thams cad kyis// brnam
104b6(sha): pa'i lus la sngags kyi 'od zer dang // mtshon cha rnon po sna tshogs tshor du phab// me lce'i kha la sbrang bus mi chags bzhin// don po'i snying kha dkar nag mtshams
104b7(sha): de ru// drag sngags 'od zer rtsa bzhinas zhugs te// sa chu ma rlung 'byung ba bzhi po de// rlung mkhris bdagan 'dus pa'i nad gzhir bsring // sha rus drod
105a1(sha): dbugs 'byung ba zhi dkrugs// chos nyid ye shes yon tan rab rgyud kyi// dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi bcad nas srog gi me mar gsod// lus ni rdul
105a2(sha): phran tsam song shes pa dngas snyigs phye// srog dbugs phyi ru phyung ste lus srog phye mar bsam// sha khrag phung po thams cad las kyi gshin rje dang // sha za srin
105a3(sha): po srin mo khrag 'thung dang // rdo rje ging pho ging mo la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// btod cing zos te the shul med par bsam// ngams ni tshangs pa lha yi tshe yod
105a4(sha): kyang // skad cig yud la 'chi 'gyur gzhan dag smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa las sngags drag po'i rgyud las/ gsad pa'i 'dzab dgongs kyi le'u ste/
105a5(sha): lnga brgya bdun cu lnga'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// nyi ma bzhi pa'i sbyor ba bshad// 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar sgo med de//
105a6(sha): mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba yis// brnag pa gcod cing rlag byed bsam// dbus kyi lcags mkhar ya las kyang // 'chi bdag gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// phyogs
105a7(sha): gzhi'i ya ma tak+She las// srog gshed bzhi yi sku ru skyed// phyi rim lcags mkhar 'khrul mig gi/ ra dza la sogs bcu gnyis so// phyogs skyong gshin rje'i sku ru
105b1(sha): bskyed// mtha' ma'i spu gri nyin bzhi po// mtshon cha sna tshogs me dpal bskyed// bar gyi snying po sku gsung thugs// ye shes 'od zer stobs chen gyis// pha rol
105b2(sha): stobs 'joms las mkhan bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa thams cad kyi// skyo rengs dang po shar ba la// 'chi bdag gshin rje 'khor bcas la// gtor ma byin te pho
105b3(sha): nyar dgye// rbad cing bla dgug lha dang dpral// ling ga'i rten la bstim par bya// de nas nyi ma dang po yi// nyi ma rtse la shar ba la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma
105b4(sha): bca'// bdag nyid gshed chen skur gsal ba'i// thugs khar nyi gdan yi ge ya// sngo nag gsal 'tsher me 'bar bsam// de mthar drag sngags 'bru bdun
105b5(sha): bskor// me lce 'bar zhing 'od zer 'phro// 'od zer 'phros pas las byed bskul// bde gshegs thugs rje'i shugs las kyang // khro rgyal ya man ta ka
105b6(sha): bskul// de ye ye shes 'od zer gyis// gshed po ya ma ra dza bskul// de yis kong rtse brag 'joms dang // rdo rje bdud 'jom a ba glang mgo bskul//
105b7(sha): de la bdung po brang dkar rngam pa dang // nag po bkrag med ma hA srog bdag bskul// de yis gshin rje mthar phyed yog 'dren mthar bskul// de yis rdo rje rigs
106a1(sha): kyi mkha' 'gro dang // ma mo dkar mo'i tshogs dang ging pho gang mo bskul// de yi klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin//
106a2(sha): klad pa'i rgyas// gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas nas byol song rgyal po ste// 'thoms pa'i gshed bskal tshangs pa'i gtsug rtswa gcad// sha rus sa yi khams las
106a3(sha): bad kan blang // klad pa dang nyams mgo 'khor las byed do// be con phyag rgya brnag pa'i spyi bor brdeg/ dgongs ka'i nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// gshed po
106a4(sha): ya ma rA dza la sogs lnga rnams la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dgra bor dmigs te dbul// drag tu bskul zhing gtor ma dgra phyogs btang // de bzhin nyi ma
106a5(sha): kun la shes par bya// khro rgyal gshed pos myos byed 'bar ba bskul// de yis ya ba ya ti phya sangs bskul// de yis nag po 'dzub med mi dur sa 'dar bskul
106a6(sha): de yis byol song thar byed yi dgas thar byed bskul// de yi shugs kyis mkha' 'gro mon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskul// de yis brnag
106a7(sha): pa gang yin lte ba yi// 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas nas dmyal ba'i dbang po ste// gsol byed sdud bskul srid pa'i rten rtsa bcad// dbugs ni rlung gi khams
106b1(sha): las rlung nad bslang // lus rgyal myos blangs yid 'khrug las byed do// ral gri phyag rgya brnag pa'i lte bar brdeg/ dgongs ka nyi ma dmar thag chad pa la// myos
106b2(sha): byed 'bar ba la sogs gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma gsum pa dag la yang // khro rgyal gshed pos Ar+ya dmar po bskul// de yis gshin rje dmigs
106b3(sha): pa mig dmar bskul// de yis swa 'dar 'khrigs pa tho yo 'thoms pa rje// bdud pho thod padag thod pa rje rnams bskul// de yis srin po mthar byed klu dbang mthar
106b4(sha): byed bskul// de yis chags pa'i mkha' 'gro ma mo dam ra nag tshogs// gang pho ging mo klu gnyan sa bdag bskal// de yis brnag pa gang yin mgrin pa yis//
106b5(sha): nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas nas lha min dbang po ste// srog gi gshed bskul ngag gi rgyun rtsa gcad// khrag gi chu yi khams las khrag nad bslang // lus zungs khrag
106b6(sha): skyug khong khrag 'dzag pa'i las byed do// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya brnag pa'i mgrin par brdeg/ nyi ma dmar thag chad na Ar+ya dmar po dang // ging bdud ma mo rnams la
106b7(sha): gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// de bzhin nyi ma bzhi pa'i las la yang // khro rgyal gshed pos ras pa tshar dgu bskul// de yis chos kyi rgyal po lha mchog
107a1(sha): rtol pa bskul// de yis ral pa spyi bcings rngam pa klu 'dul rje// sa to nag po mtshal bdud dregs pa bskul// de yis gnod sbyin mthar byed
107a2(sha): dmyal ba mthar byed dang // dam sri mthar byed dbang med las la bskul// de yi las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo sngon mo'i tshogs// ging pho ging mo klu gnyen sa bdag
107a3(sha): bskul// de yi brnag pa gang yin snying kha yi// zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas nas mi rgod shan pa ste// srog gcod gshed bskul dngas ma'i rtsa bzhi dang // srog
107a4(sha): pa rtsa bcad dbugs de phyi ru phyung // drod ni me yi khams las mkhris nad langs// spu gri'i phyag rgya bcas te snying khar brdeg/ srog gi me gsad srog gcad sha
107a5(sha): khrag rnams// las kyi gshin rje sha za srin po'i tshogs// ma mo khrag 'thung ging pho ging mo dang // srin mo la sogs tshogs kyis bstod cing sha khrag zos//
107a6(sha): rjes shul tsam yang med cing brlag par bsam// srog gi me mar gsad nas shes pa dngas snyigs phye// dngas ma 'bring gis phyag rgya gcig par bskyed//
107a7(sha): rab kyis skye ba chos kyi dbyings su bskul// mtha' ma bdag nyid lus kyi go char bya// srog gi snyigs ma thod pa'i rten la bstim// sa bdag klu gnyan la
107b1(sha): sogs gdug pa can la gtad// des ni mi 'gyur nag po'i bdud kyang gsod// srog chags mi la sogs pa kun la smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug
107b2(sha): stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las/ nyi ma bzhi pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu drug go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'khrul 'khor don
107b3(sha): rnams rgyas bshad do// drag po mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor la// man ngag don dang ma ldan na// 'khor lo bskor kyang las mi 'grub// des na don rnams rgyas
107b4(sha): bshad pa// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi ma tshugs na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gnad mi tshugs// 'khor lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dres na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka brdi ba//
107b5(sha): las kyi gshin rje mun khang 'khor// las mi 'grub pa'i skyon du 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto dral nas//
107b6(sha): sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen byung ngo // bcu na phur bzhi dang mi ldan na// las kyi gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// bsgrub pa'i las rnams don med 'gyur//
107b7(sha): kaM pa bzhi yi don ni rtsa ba'i yi ge bzhi// don ni yid la yi ge'i gzugs su gsal ba dang // ngo bo gshin rje rga shed po bzhi rngu gsal ba dang /
108a1(sha): rang bzhin mtshon cha'i rnam par gsal ba dang // nus mthu 'byung ba nang gcod gshed// nang 'thab rang gcod gsal ba'o//
108a2(sha): gdung bzhi tshangs thig bzhis mtshon nas// rtsa bzhi'i sbubs nas 'byung ba'i dpal ba sa// phyi nang snod bcud kun gyi gzhi rten byed// de la nyi ma bzhi po
108a3(sha): las gnyer gtad pa'o// yang na spyi bo mgrin pa snying lte yi// 'khor lo'i don gsal sngags bzlas las rdzogs pa'o// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi'i
108a4(sha): don ni 'di dag ste// bsnyen pa drod rtogs thob pa byin rlabs lha yi gzer// rdzas rnams tshogs pa rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer// bcu drug khang pa'i
108a5(sha): gzer dang 'phro bdun dgongs pa'i gzer// 'khor lo'i bcu na phur bzhi ni rnal 'byor dbang rnams rdzogs// man ngag gdang thob dgongs ldan sems kyi
108a6(sha): bcun phur dang // bsnyen pa bya ba tshad skyol phyi nang gsang rtags ldan// gshin rje ma mo las la tshud pa ni// rtsol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi bcu na phur dang //
108a7(sha): ye shes lha yi stobs kyis las kyi gshin rje dang // ma mo dbang med las la btsud de khu zlog mi nus pas// ye shes lha yi byin rlabs bcu na phur dang //
108b1(sha): de dag srog nas bskyal zhing las bcol te// drag sngags bzlas na dgra bo dbang med par// bla 'brel srog gcod drag po'i bcu na phur ro// gsad
