108b2(sha): pa drag sngags don bzhi shes bya ba// 'phen byed skyes bu lta bu ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i yul la mi bskyed do// skyed byed rkyen gzhu lta bu ma
108b3(sha): shes na// bsgrub bya'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya mda' 'dre'i drug sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i srog yul rgyud la mi
108b4(sha): 'phrog go// gcod byed mde'u 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i rtsa dbugs srog gzugs mi chod do// de dag don rnams
108b5(sha): gsal bar bya ba ni// 'phen byed dbus yig ya las drang bskor 'phen pa'o// skyod byed rkyen gyi ting 'dzin 'phro 'dugasal ba'o//
108b6(sha): mda' ni las sbyor drag sngags bcu drug pa'o// gcod byed spu gri'i drag sngags mtshan pa bzhis// drag po'i rtsa dbugs
108b7(sha): srog gzungs gcod pa'o// de dag rab tu gces pa'i sngags kyi sdebs brgyad do//
109a1(sha): srog gzungs gcad cing lus srog 'byed lugs ni// 'grod stabs brgyad kyis gsad pa dang // bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa dang //
109a2(sha): gnad dgu sdebs la ga sad pa'o// 'gros stabs brgyad ni gang zhe na// 'bur nag thog 'gros 'bur 'gros mgo mangs dang // 'khril ba sbrul 'gros stag mchongs
109a3(sha): drag po'i 'gros// srin bu ka ta ring 'gros bi bag rta yi 'gros// rta lam nag po'i 'gros dang rus sbal 'phye bo'i 'gro sa// bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad pa ni//
109a4(sha): rgyu bzhi bsdus te gsad pa dang // dug gsum ar la gtad de gsad pa dang // 'byung ba lnga po rtsad gcad gsad// phung po lnga yi stobs gzho ma dang // nang grol smad
109a5(sha): lnga gtub pa dang // tshogs drug sgo rnams dag pa dang // dngas ma bdun gyis rtsad gcad dang // dbugs kyi lam dgu dgag pa dang // rnam shes tshogs brgyad sgo
109a6(sha): dgeg dang // lus ngag yid ga sum mthu ba sdu dang // shes pa dang sa snyigs dbye ba dang // rten gcig me mar gsad pa'o// ga nad dgu phab la gsad pa ni// gzas
109a7(sha): pa po yi rang rgyu da la// bla ga nas sa dgu bla rte na ma tshan ma dgu// de 'dzem drag sngags dgu dang skyod byed ting 'dzin dgu// sngags rtag thu na rdzas dgu dang sngags 'jug
109b1(sha): sgo dgu dang // bag chags bsreg pa'i yi ge me 'bar dgu// gnad dgu bsdus nas 'joms pa'i man ngag dgu// shes pa dngas snyigs phye la bgrod pa'i tshul
109b2(sha): dgu'o// de dag 'khrul 'khor spyi ru dgos pa ste// spyi rgyug ces pa thabs kyi man ngag go// 'khor lo bskor thabs 'bum yod dang // bcu bdun 'bum bskor
109b3(sha): ma shes na// mtshon cha med pa'i dpa' bo 'dra// spyi rgyu go drag sngag sa bcu bdun pa// 'di yi drang thabs bskor shes na// bsgrub dang dmod dang gdab pa yi//
109b4(sha): drag sngags thams cad 'di la tshang // des na gsang sngags kun gyi mchog/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor man ngag
109b5(sha): gi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu bdun pa'o// // ya ma ra dzas yang gsol pa// rdo rje 'chang chen khro rgyal gtso// 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed
109b6(sha): sgrub pa'i// spyi yi gdam ngag ba shad du gsol// de skad gsol bas bka' sprul pa// 'jam dpal gdul dka' 'dul phyir khros// mche gtsigs khros tshul
109b7(sha): bibyings pa lta// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i sku yis kyi// gshin rje dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rdza gshed bsgrub man ngag 'di// ngas bshad legs
110a1(sha): par nyon las zung // 'jam dpal khro bo bsgrub 'dod pa'i/ sngags pa dpa' brtul ldan pa des// dang por dam tshig gzhung bzhin bsrung //
110a2(sha): dam tshig bla ma mched dang sngags// phyag rgya gsang bcu rtsa ba dang // spyad dang mi sbeng dang du blang // bsgrub dang shes bya sku gsung thugs// thun mong ma yin//
110a3(sha): yan lag dang // thun mong bdag gzhan rnam grangs dang // mdo lung rtsa ba chen po rnams// dang blangs ma nyams gzhung thub bsrung // des ni dngos grub gang /
110a4(sha): 'dod rnams// myur du 'byung zhing 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig ma bsrungs gzhung nyams na// bsgrub kyang mi 'grub brlag par 'gyur// des na dam tshig
110a5(sha): srog bzhin bsrungs// khyad par rdo rje slob dpon la'o// dam ldan phyi nang gsang dbang nod// phyi ni dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang // nang dbang rgyal thabs spyi lugs
110a6(sha): dbang // gsang dbang ba mchen brtul zhugs dbang // bum pa gsang ba shes rab ni// ye shes bde chen dbang bzhi nod// dbang rdzogs byin rlabs dngos
110a7(sha): grub 'byung // de ldan sngags pa dpa' bo yi// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde gnas der// ri bo dgu 'dul ri bran 'dud// shar gyi dngas 'phrog nub zer
110b1(sha): len// rtse mo gnam skyog sked pa lhun// rtsa ba sham ring dur khrod gnas// rtswa shing me tog ri dgas bya// spos kyi sprin chags chu bo gangs// byin che bkra
110b2(sha): shis nyams dga' ba'i// gnas der dge spyad pa skyen ba sgrub bya// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang // bsgrub pa chen po rnam pa bzhi// bsnyen pa dag la
110b3(sha): rnam gsum ste// sbyor ba goms dang sngon du 'gro'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa dngos grub blang // sbyor goms pa yi bsnyen pa ni// sa la phyag rgya bzhes pa dang //
110b4(sha): mchod sbyin gtor ma rgyo chen dang // phyag 'tshal mchod bshags la sogs kun// 'jam dpal nyid kyi gzhung bzhin bya// 'jam dpal mtshan ni yang yang
110b5(sha): brjod// 'jam dpal mtshan mchog brgya rtsa brgyad// gzungs sngags rgya chen bstod la sogs// mnyams dag par rgyun du gdon// sbyor ba goms pa'i
110b6(sha): bsnyen pa'o// sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa la// dang por gnas pa de nyid la// rtsa ba'i chus skrangs maN+Dal rtsig/ khru gang 'dom gang rgyu dang dpangs// yang na
110b7(sha): gnas kyi rgya tshad sbyar// dri dang khrag sna bdud rtsis byug/ zhing gi srad bu byin brlabs theg/ tshangs thig zur thig cha chen chung // phyed 'gres sum cha bya rog rjes
111a1(sha): legs btab rdul tshon byin gyis brlab// rus chen kha dog ma rung bye// khrag stu dur khrod sol ba dang // skyer pa me tog ut+pal rams//
111a2(sha): de dag byin gyis brlabs la bri// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// de phyir 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa// sngon po//
111a3(sha): rtsibs mtshan khrag mtsho smug/ thod skam rlon pa'i 'phreng bas bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho bar khyams phyogs// sgo bzhi lnga rtsigs 'dod yon dmar// pha gu dri phyed
111a4(sha): dar bu kad// rta babs brgyad rtsar 'khor lo gdugs// ri dwags zla phyed rdo rje sgo// rdo rje rgya gram lte ba la// rdo rje thod skam ma ris bskor// pho brang rang gzhung
111a5(sha): bzhin du'o// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gre thod lcags phur dgod// g.yas g.yon mchog chen seng ldeng dgod// 'jam dpal gshed chen
111a6(sha): khro rgyal dang // sbyor sgrol gsang ba'i yum gnyis su// rten 'brel dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs// de mdun she na shing tsher nag phur// thugs mchog yab yum
111a7(sha): byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bzhir seng ldeng skyer pa dang // sher shing 'jo mo'i phur pa bzhi// gshed bzhi yab yum byin gyis brlabs// rtsibs bcur shing
111b1(sha): lcags mchog phur dgod// phyogs skyong yab yum byin gyis brlabs// gru chad lha snam sgo bzhi ru// de bzhin rtsang phur gdug pa'i shing // ro langs las kyi
111b2(sha): gshin rje dang // lce spyang kang kau mon pho mo// ging bdud sgo bzhi las mkhan rnams// rang rang gzhung bzhin byin gyis brlabs// de ltar dkyil 'khor rdul
111b3(sha): tshon bzhengs// de nas rdzas kyi rim pa lnga// rten rdzas dam rdzas mchod rdzas dang // rgyan rdzas drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// dung chen dmu lugs gleng gsum
111b4(sha): pa/ mtshan ldan rdo rje ka pA lar// bdud rtsi grub sman bsil chen dang // g+hi haM gur kum khrag sna tshogs// gla ba spos sna chu gtsang sbyar// tshon rtsi sbyar
111b5(sha): te steng thod la// khro rgyal nyid dang thugs mchog dang // gshed po bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// 'og thod de bzhin yum rnams bri// yub yum phyag rgya
111b6(sha): gsal rdzogs bri// mtha' mar sku gsung yon tan thugs// 'phrin las sngags kyi 'khor lo bskor// phyi ru spros snu gla rtsi dang // tshil chen dr-i ldan sman
111b7(sha): gyis byug/ de ni rten rdzas zhes bya'o// smug chen sar pa mthul skams// gong gi rdzas kyi sngags rnams bri// rtse me bcu bdun hUM rnams dgod// smug
112a1(sha): chung la sogs snying sna tshogs// bdud rtsi grub sman khrag sna tshogs// 'bru sku spos sna sman sna tshogs// sbyar lugs mthing nag dar gyis
112a2(sha): dril// ru sprod rgyas btab dal bus bzhag/ de dag dam rdzas zhes bya'o// 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor me ni// dpal bshos sha chen rnam lnga sogs// sha khrag
112a3(sha): sna tshogs brgyan pa gnyis// khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// gtor ma rgyan ldan nub tu bzhag/ 'jam dpal gshin rje 'khor bcas kyi// gtor ma rgyan ldan
112a4(sha): lho ru bzhag/ ma mo yul rnams mkha' 'gro yi// gtor ma nal bu dre'u mdze// gtor ma byang shar mtshams su gzhag/ spos dang me tog mar me dang // dri
112a5(sha): chab gtsang bshos phyi mchod pasham// zhing chen ma nyams gzugs kyis mchod// rkang chen gling bu thod pa'i rnga// mi mgo'i dung 'bud sgra yis mchod// tshol
112a6(sha): chen gsung dang dri chen spos// khrag che na sha chen spos dris mchod// 'bru sna'i lha bshos tshil chen brgyan// sha rus sna tshogs ro yis mchod// zhing chen
112a7(sha): glang chen stag lpags gos// reg bya'i mchod pa bla med bsham// phud rgor rak+ta bdud rtsi bsham// de dag mchod pa'i rdzas zhes bya// zhing chen bla re zhing
112b1(sha): chung 'phan// rgyu zhugs dra ba keng rus btsal// sha chen rgyu rdum lho phyogs dgram// brten rdzas skyes bu bu don te// gzhan la mi bstan mthong mi rung // gzhan
112b2(sha): yang drag po sbyor ba'i rdzas// 'khor lo ling ga thun rdzas dang // sbyin sreg 'brub khung ma nan pa'i rdzas// thams cad ma chad rdzogs par bsham// bsgrub
112b3(sha): pa la 'jug dus chod ni// gshin rje'i lo dang zla ba dang // zhag dang dus tshod snying bzhi 'am// dgu na zla gsum spyir dbyar ston gyi// rab 'bring tha chungs mer ngo
112b4(sha): la'o// gza' spyang phur pa mig dmar lag/ pra nyen ma gru rta thogs skrag/ de dag dus la 'jug par bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sngon
112b5(sha): 'gro rdzas dang dus tshod kyi le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu brgyad do// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs
112b6(sha): bshad// dang po phyi nas gsang mtshams gcad// bdag nyid khro rgyal skur bskyed la// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir mtho brgyad gzugs// gtsang ris
112b7(sha): phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed// de nas phyogs bzhir mtho bzhi gzugs// rgyal chen bzhi ru byin gyis brlab// de la gtsang gtor mchod pa dbul// gcang
113a1(sha): ris mgon po chos skyong khyed// bde gshegs spyan sngar dam bcas bzhin// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i bar dag tu// phyi nang dam sre sho ra ra re// /
113a2(sha): nang nas dngos grub nyams pa re// zhes brjod phyi mtshams bsrung las bcol// de nas ra sogs khyi sogs la// gang gnod dam sri'i ming gzugs bri// de la
113a3(sha): sngags kyi 'od zer gyis// bkrug cing bstims la brab cing gzir// the ma 'og ma nan la sgo byang gdags// nang mtshams ma nan pa zhes bya'o// de nas sngags
113a4(sha): pa chas gos ni// nag po zhing chen skrag pa bgo// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed por bsgom// thugs las ye shes 'od zer 'phros// me lce mtshon cha khro bo yis//
113a5(sha): gsang mtshams dam du bcad cing bsrung // gshegs dang byin dbab mchod pa brlab// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom// dbang
113a6(sha): chen 'byung ba rims brtseg bsgom// gzhal yas khang bskyed gdan rnams gdings// rgyu nyid rtsa ba'i snying po las// cho ga gsum gyi 'phro 'du yi// bskyed pa rkyen
113a7(sha): gyi sngags brjod pas// khro rgyal ya man ta ka bskyed// sgrol sbyor gsang ba'i yum gnyis bskyed// rdo rje pad+ma byin brlabs te// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug
113b1(sha): pa'i// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// rgyu yi snying po hUM nyid 'phros// phyogs mtshams rtsibs kyi rang gdan la// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis gshed po bzhi// phyogs
113b2(sha): skyong bcu dang thugs mchog sras// ya ba yu ma rdzogs shing gsal bar bskyed// dbang bskur byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// lha rnams gru chad ging tshogs rnams//
113b3(sha): pho mo las byed pho nyar bcas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bskyed// sgo bzhir rgyal chen sgo ma bzhi// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs paskyed// ye shes
113b4(sha): dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bzhengs// spyan drangs phyag btsal gnyis med pa stim// phyi mchod lnga dang kun bzang mchod// phyag rgya ye shes mchod pa 'bul// nang mchog
113b5(sha): rnam lnga bdud rtsi sman// mchod pa dbul zhing dngos grub blang // bdud rtsi rak+ta mchod 'bul bstab// gsang ba sbyor sgrol mchod pa dbul// za byed chen po lhag pas mchod//
113b6(sha): 'dod yon gtor mas thugs dam bskang // dam tshig sgrib sbyang bshags pa bya// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor thugs dam bskang // gshin rje gshed la bstod pa bya// de nas
113b7(sha): sngon 'gro 'dza ba drang ste// dam tshig ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po sngags// 'dzab dgongs 'phro 'du rim pa ni// bstan pa'i snying po bzhin du bya//
114a1(sha): grangs rtags dus kyi bsnyen par bya// grangs ni bye ba sa ya 'bum// ting 'dzin ma yengs bsgrims te bya// rtags ni go chas bdag lus
114a2(sha): brgyan// rdo rje 'khor lo lag babs gsor// mchod rten la 'dzeg mgo la skyes// mon pa zhib can lho bal rnams// la sogs gcan gzan bdag
114a3(sha): go bsrun// gru dang glang chen seng ge zhon// nyi zla lag pabs gdan la 'dug/ lus las 'od byung thams cad gsal// mi bying chu bo'i tho ga nas 'gro//
114a4(sha): ri rab rtse ra phyin ging bzhi lta// nam mkha' la 'gro sngags sgra sgrogs// 'brug sgra me 'bar rlung nag 'tshub// phyag byed lha srin bdag khur pa// rmi nyams
114a5(sha): mngon sum phyi nang gsang // de las sogs te gzhan dag kyang // mtshan rtags mang po mthong mthong bzlas// de dag sngags kyi bzlas lugs ni// dang
114a6(sha): por zhi ba khro bo yis// 'phrin las gzhung srang mchod pa dbul// bstod dang 'dzab drang dgongs pa bya// de nas 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// thugs
114a7(sha): kyi 'dzab drang man ngag ni// dang po sku yi sngags sdong bzlas// de nas gsung thugs yon tan sngags// rang rang rkyang par lnga brgya bzlas// de nas
114b1(sha): dril pa stong du bzla ste// thun 'gor de bzhin thun 'jug tu// klu yi snying po brgya brgya la// gsung thugs so lnga bcu bcu gdags// de bzhin stong la brgya
114b2(sha): gdags so// au a kro te ka ya ma na ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+tsu hU phaT/ o ya ma na ka ka la ru ba hUM phaT/ o shri ste bi kri ta a na na hU phaT/ o sa ma ya many+dzu shri
114b3(sha): mu tra ya man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM dza dza/ bstod dang mchod pa sum yar dbul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo nya stong brgyad// nyi shu gnyis sogs dus la bya//
114b4(sha): yang na rgyun du byas na rab// za tshogs sum yang mchod pa dbul// de nas lhag ma'i gtor ma yis// ging dang mkha' 'gro mchod las bco la// tshogs
114b5(sha): la dang po rab mtha' ru// mchod dang bshags dang drag po'i las// bstab pa bya zhing 'gugs 'dren bya// gtor ma phud spro phyis kyi rta// gzhan gsum rang
114b6(sha): rang phyogs su btang // snron du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nas rdzas dang gtor ma gsum// dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris byas te// khyad par dngos grub
114b7(sha): blang ba'i rdzas// bdud rtsi grub lnga sman sna lnga// spos lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rnying po lnga dang b+hing rtswa'i phye// phud rgod thod pa mtshan ldan sbyar// 'brus
115a1(sha): khung 'khor ma ling gzun// bcas la 'jab dgongs gsal ldan pas// thun bzhir smra bcad ma yengs bzlas// dang por 'i wa 2/
115a2(sha): las gzung bzung // mchod pa gasmram par tshogs mchod dbul// mad+d+hasbreng zhing mchod bshags pastod// gsur chen dung brgyun mi bcad/
115a3(sha): bsgrub khang gso dang sam+b+ha ston// khyod 'bur rdzogs sgrar+m+ma can rdzogs// min dang zhib can las la chos// sa gsos nam mkha' rgyung brgad//
115a4(sha): ma brgyan mtshon cha 'byor// de tshogs mi nyams mngon sam 'byung // gsad rtags lus yang sem sa gsal zhing // sku sku mngon mthong srung ston dang /
115a5(sha): rdzu na med pa'i rnas parjod/ na mangs shes pa yul la ba 'o// rang bang med par rje na rje coM d-i bak+ku rgyaga'
115a6(sha): rang sems sgrib byungs mngon shes 'byung // de nas ting 'dzin thabs ldan pas// s+yAg+sa myung thugs kyi dngos grub tha'o// des ni bdag dang mi mas
115a7(sha): gnyis med ngo bo gcig par 'gyur// de dag gsang sngags bzlas lugs ni// blo mo snying po bcu bdun pa// rgyun du ma sangs bzlas par bya
115b1(sha): gsung dang thugs dang yon tan sngags// stong la brgya gdags brgyal bcu// de la nye bar bsnyen pa gdags// mtshan ma gsum gyi 'gugs sngags
115b2(sha): 'dis// ye shes lha tshogs mngon du 'gyuraro// ya ma snying sha sha dza dza dun// ya ma snying ru pa sha ya/ ya ma b+hing a kaR+Sha ya dza dza hU/ zhes bzlas nye ba'i
115b3(sha): bsnyen par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya bdun cu dgu'o// /
115b4(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// bsgrub pa las la sbyor ba bshad// dkyil 'khor gtor ma dam rdzas bzhin// gtor ma mchod pa
115b5(sha): la sogs pa// gong du mi btang skabs 'dir btang // dkyil 'khor zhol sbyar de bzhin no// rabs chad ro bsregs g.yul bkye ba// dur khrod ro bsregs
115b6(sha): gong gsum pa// bzhi mdo shan pa'i rten sa la// drag po'i chus sbyar 'brub khung ni// khru gang rgyal mtho gang dang // sor bzhi nang dpangs mdzub
115b7(sha): khrid de/ bar dang phyi ru shes par bya// dang por tsher rtsang srin mo 'gros// bar la thod rlon mtha' mar sbrus// nang du shi khrag sna tshogs byug
116a1(sha): phyi ru dug rtsa sol chen byug/ gting du gru gsum nyis 'gyur bzhi// hU dang phaT dang dza dang rbad// gsum gsum thems la ni blangs
116a2(sha): dgod// logs la b+h+yo gsum kun la'o// rjes sa phyi sa dri ma gcin// skra shad gos dum zhing khangs// ling gsor bcu dbang po dod// skra bsil
116a3(sha): gsar bu khong stong pa// snying khar mi bring dpral bar rus// lte bar bla la bla dag khams// gro ga la bris khong par gzhug/ pha mes bu tsha spun zla'ang gzhug/
116a4(sha): nad rims gri khrag sna tshogs dang // dug sna tshogs kyis nad phyir byug/ de bzhin sgra sgog pi pi ling // tsha ba gsum gyis phyi nas byug/ rgyu rkyen nye bar gso//
116a5(sha): pa'i rkyen// mkhar rgongs srin can bad mkhris slong // bong bu'i sa bon nad rnams 'du// sa dmar lus la tsha ba bskyed// nad khrag de bskyed dug snas
116a6(sha): gsod// drag po thod par byed du gzhug/ bdag la rgyab bstan gan gyal dang // spyi tshugs skabs sbyar dong du brnag/ drag po thun gyi rdzas rnams ni// nyungs
116a7(sha): kar srog gcod myur du gsod// nyungs nag sngags mda' bla tshe 'joms// skye tshe mi 'bar tsha ba bskyed// rdo phyes skyo 'bog gsad pa 'grub// zangs
116b1(sha): phyephyis shan dmar myur du gsod// lcags phyes srog gcod myur du 'joms// mi yi nad khrag sna tshogs kyis// rang rang nad 'bebs gsod par byed//
116b2(sha): gri khrag sna tshogs de bzhin gsod// rta khrag dri dang glang thabs gsod// khyi khrag sha zan srog la 'bebs// ra khrag sri can dur nas gsod// dug chen
116b3(sha): myur du srog gcod gsod// baspu skyo 'bog 'chal pas gsod// ra dug me 'bar tshabs gsod// spyang dug nad slong 'dus pas gsod// de dag la
116b4(sha): sogs thun rdzas rnams// rten 'brel mthu yod kun kyang bsog/ mon nu ma rabs chad thod par blugs// sha za mtshon char byin gyis brlab//
116b5(sha): rten pa sa yi 'khor lo yi// dbus dang mtshams bzhir 'brub khung lnga// ling ga bcug la thun dbab cing // 'khor lo bskor zhing phur pas gdab//
116b6(sha): dur khrod raswa sam zhing lpags pa// yi dwags klad gzhungs dri chen chu// khrag sogs rme ba lnga sbyar te// rus chen dkar pos dung phyis bya// bdag
116b7(sha): nyid khro bo'i skur gsal bas// lho bltas sngags bzlas khro sems kyis// skra shig chol chen lus byugs te// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsod byed bri//
117a1(sha): bya rog sgra rtsa'i sbu gu yis// snag tsha skra sgog pi pi ling // shing shags sa bon tsi tra ka/ dur khrod sol ba na le shAm// lan tshwa nag po
117a2(sha): nyungs nag mar// dug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs// de dag sbyar la 'khrul 'khor bri// dbus su thig bskor rim pa bzhi// 'du ba bzhi yin du slong yin//
117a3(sha): dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// lcags mkhar lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// rtsa ba drag po'i 'bru lnga dgod// mu la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yin// phyi rims lcags
117a4(sha): khar drug gnyis la// rten 'brel lus 'joms 'bru bcu gnyis// me dpal ga shed kyi 'khor lo yin// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la/ ku gsung
117a5(sha): thugs kyi snying po gsum// gnas 'thun lto sbyor gsum skrag dgod// kha ga non stobs kyi 'khor lo yin// mtha' ma mtshon cha nyi shu'i rtsibs// gsad pa srog
117a6(sha): gcod yig 'bru gnas// gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo yin// kha sbyor yab yum lto bar bri// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni// pho yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra
117a7(sha): gcod cing sreg pas thams cad 'joms// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung 'dra// skyom zhing g.yeng bas rims dal 'bebs// dug
117b1(sha): khrag dar glud thar byas te// khyams khang rtsibs mtshan ming rus dgod// dbus su rtsang phur kha la lding // mi rgyus mkhar nag shur par bcom// bdag nyid gshin
117b2(sha): rje gshed po yi// thugs las 'od zer drag sngags 'phros// 'khor lo las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par byin gyis brlab// sngags 'bru las kyi gshin
117b3(sha): rje bdud/ matsun na tshogs tshogs gtsang bsas// 'brub lung // shid kyi rnams // / med gsus thog byams da // khrod pa lcags pa blo me sa
117b4(sha): rtsang phur las kyi gshin rje dang // ma mo sha za'i tshogs su bsam// ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// de la mthu gzhug byin gyis brlab// de ltar rten 'brel sa sna//
117b5(sha): la/ rigs ngan chus sbyar gshin rje'i gzugs// 'jigs tshul lto 'phyangs khong stong bya// rgya sol khrag sna dug chus byug/ de nas ting 'dzin dgongs ldan pas/
117b6(sha): las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub sngags bzlas// rgyan rings brgya brgyas mgo drangs te// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu bdun pa// nyin dang mtshan mor bsgrims te bzlas// stong tshig
117b7(sha): 'khrugs bcas don dbul mchod// bstod dang las bcol drag tu bskul/ thun bzhir sgra gcad par mi gcad// bsgrub khang g.yo zhing sa 'gul dang // rlung nag
118a1(sha): tshub ma gnas sa khengs// me chen 'bar dang chu ched 'khrug/ bdag nyid khrab go na mtshon cha thogs// mon pa mi nag rigs mi gcig/ mtshon
118a2(sha): thogs dgra la dmag 'dren dang // sgra chen gnas sa 'brum pa skad// gcan gzan byid med a tsa ra// mang po'i dpon byas dgra la chas// gzhan yang dud 'gro/
118a3(sha): 'ching zhing 'khyig/ dgra dngos btson 'dzin skye shi gcod// khyir rngan byed phyugs gsad pa shas// brnag pa de bzhin sha bgos na// las la tshud de las rnams
118a4(sha): 'grub// de nas dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo nyi ma bzhir// bskor zhing gsad pa'i las rnams bya// las kyi gshin rje bsgrub pa dang // dung
118a5(sha): ting ka yis las la zad// bla srog bkug la lha bzhi dbye// ling ga la bstim dgra dngos pa sam// nyi ma bzhir gsad las rdzogs bya'o// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrugs/
118a6(sha): kyis// 'gros stabs brgyad kyis 'khrul 'khor bskor// 'bru dang drag sngags bdun pa rnams// bdun bzhi nyi shu brgyad du bskor// ru khugs ru khugs chen po
118a7(sha): dang // g.yu yi spyang mo dgu phrugs dang // bya rog khu 'khrig ces bya dang // g.yas bskor g.yon bskor stag mchongs dang // ro langs stag chen 'jug brdums
118b1(sha): sogs// bcu gnyis tshul gyis gsad par bya// de dag bsgrub pa chen por bshad// gsad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya//
118b2(sha): dbang ni btsun mo'i lho ru'o// dgu pa dre'u seng ge'i ltor// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o// rengs pa gyon pa'i shing la bya// rgyas pa
118b3(sha): nor lha'i gzugs su bya// zhi pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// smyo ba spre'u shan dmar ro// gnan pa ri ra ba 'og tu'o// yams dal dred mo ral can la// mdze shu
118b4(sha): rus sbrul chen po'i ltor// gri rgod shan pa khan dmar la'o// bzlog pa gnam sa 'khrug byed la'o// de ltar 'khrul 'khor las rdzogs bya'o// mtshan mo
118b5(sha): chun dril thun du dbab// sha za srog gcod pho mo'i ging // nad dang mtshon cha thog ltar 'bebs// bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs kyis// brnag pa rdul phran tsam//
118b6(sha): du brlag/ nyin bzhir drag sngags 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog lus gtubs// de bzhin rdul phran tsam du brlag/ de ltar las rdzogs rtags/
118b7(sha): mthong nas// bsreg dang mnan dang zor 'phang ba// mtha' brgya rnam gnyis gzhung bzhin bya// spogs pa ro langs stag mchongs so// oM sa ma la many+dzu
119a1(sha): shri ya man ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza ti dza dza/ trag rak+kha snying kha rak+Sha b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rag mo te thu dza dza/ kha la ma ti b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ya ya lon tsin dan ma la
119a2(sha): b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag ma srog rtswa la b+h+yo b+h+yo dza dza/ ya ma me tak+ShA/ ra tsas to// run yo ni/ ra ya dza mu tra nI/ gshin rje nag po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i snying la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo
119a3(sha): ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru ni yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She/ ya dza ni ra ma ya/ nri a kaR+Sha ya A gu sha dza dza/ de ba b+hi da dam sha ya pra be sha phaT/
119a4(sha): g+hu snyam pa mdzan na/ hri ti pra ma ya/ mur dza ya/ rak+ta ra dza ye/ mA ra yaM/ nri shwa ku ru nrirbad ya/ de dag las kyi rim pa yis// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub
119a5(sha): 'byung // 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa dang bsgrub pa chen po'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu tham pa'o// // de nas 'jam
119a6(sha): dpal rnon po yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i// lha bsgrub rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol
119a7(sha): pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyed nyon cig/ chos nyid rnam dag ye shes spros bral 'jam// thugs rje zhor 'byung 'gro don mthar phyin
119b1(sha): dpal// rig pa'i ye shes bgres rgud med pas gzhon// rigs drug ye shes drug ldan nyon mongs 'joms// de mtshon phyag rgyar snang bas zhal drug pa//
119b2(sha): 'gro ba'i dpal mgon legs sbyin phan byed lha// dngos grub byin rlabs 'byung bas bsgrub pa'o// de nyid mngon du bya ba'i bsgrub pa ni// ri rgyal lhor ltas
119b3(sha): dur khrod byin can du// sngags pa dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yis// sku ga dung sbyin gtor 'jam dpal mtshan rnams brjod// gnas kyi sa dang gshin
119b4(sha): rje'i gnas sa la// stegs bu ngos re khru do dpangs khru gang // dur khrod sol chen ni rengs skyer rtsi khrag/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dbus gnag dmar dang ldang //
119b5(sha): gru chad sgo bzhi phyogs mtshon par khyams khrag/ thod pa skam rlon 'phreng ba me ris bskor// de dbus thod pa dmu lugs smug chen chung // bdud rtsi rak+tas sngag+sa
119b6(sha): bris gtso bo'i rdzas// rtsibs brgyad pad+ma 'dab brgyad gang rung la// shar du tri shul lho ru ral gri dgod// nub tu dgra sta byang du shag ti mtshon// mtshams
119b7(sha): bzhir be tshon gru chad me ri zhing // bar khyams dur khrod sgo bzhi po tshon dgod// de ltar rdul tshon dkyil 'khor legs par bri// dur khrod ras la ri bong khrag chen
120a1(sha): rtsogs/ bdud rtsis bris sku lho ru dgram// 'bru sna gtor ma cha gsum mi rta la sogs kyi// sha khrag bcas pa bdud rtsi rak+ta dang // phyi
120a2(sha): mchod rnam par sgrib pa sbyang phyir bsham// tshil chen mar me gsur chen dud pa dang // zhing rkang gling bu thod pa ltag sprod rnga// zhing lpags bla 'phan dur
120a3(sha): khrod rgyan rnams dgram// sngags pa lhor bltas zhing chen chas gos bgo/ rak+ta'i thig laM gdong gdab 'jam dpal dpa' bo la// rjes su yi rang dbul
120a4(sha): zhing dad pa bskyed// spyi gtsug smug nag bru gsal nyi ma'i gdan// mthing nag ya li 'phro 'dus 'phags mchod 'gro don byas// slar 'dus bdag
120a5(sha): thi ma ya ma na ta kar ba skyed// dpal chen de kho na nyid glu blang ngo // de ba laM hri/ de ba la hri/ ting khro ting khro ru pa ti ho/ go ro tsa na bdud rtsi'i ril bu mu ra//
120a6(sha): lha ni tho ga ma'i mtshan mo rang nas nye'o// maN+Dal steng du 'bru sna'i lha bshos bca'// tshil chen zhab ma ut+pal sngon po sa brgyan// lha la su ma yar tshogs
120a7(sha): dbul rang yang rol// bdag ni yi dam lha mchog khyod bsgrub ces// dam bca' phyag rgya lu gu rgyud du sbrel// gshin rje gshed la dam bca' 'di skad
120b1(sha): brjod// ho/ bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs sngon nas las dang thugs rje dang // smon lam rgyun gyi rnam 'byor bdag dang
120b2(sha): 'brel// thugs dam 'brel ba'i lha mchog gashrin rje gshed// srog la bab kyang lha mchog khyod mi gtong // thugs rje rtse gcig rgyun gyis bdag la
120b3(sha): dgongs// lha mchog pa dag la dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// ska gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// byams pa'i zhal bzangs bdag la bstan du
120b4(sha): gsol// zhes brjod dam bca' mang du bya// tshi la chen gsur chen klad brten// ka ra bI ra'i me tog mchod// mtshams ni dam bcad ma yangs bya// de ltar
120b5(sha): sngon du rdzogs bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug sbyong ba'i rgyud las/ sngon 'gro bca' thabs kyi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gcig go//
120b6(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bshad// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// rnam dag chos nyid stong par gsal// kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin// /
120b7(sha): chos rnams snang la rang bzhin med// tshad med bzhi bsgom ting 'dzin rgyu// bdag nyid lus mad ting 'dzin rgyu// ma las nyid ma'i ral dbus su// rang sems
121a1(sha): mthing nag rgyu du gsal// de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa 'jam dpal thugs khar
121a2(sha): / thim/ thugs dam rgyud bskul mchod pa phul// stong gsum 'jig rten khams su 'phro sa// sems can ma lus sgrib sbyangs te// don byas slar 'dus hU la thim// bdag
121a3(sha): gi sgo gsum sgrib pa dang // bag chags ma lus bsregs sbyangs te// bdag lus 'od zhu hUM nyid las// gser gyi rdo rje rtse lngar gyur// de bzhin 'phro 'dus rdo rjer zhu//
121a4(sha): gser zhu na lta bu'i byang chub sems// de las sku ba skye da sngags brjod pas// bdag nyid khro rgyal dpal chen po// ya ma na ta ka'i sku ru gyur// sku mdog mthing nag
121a5(sha): stang zil 'dra// zhal drug phyag kyang bcu gnyis la// zhabs drug g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhugs// rtsa ba'i dbus la mthing nag khro// g.yas zhal dkar
121a6(sha): po zhi ba 'dzum// g.yon zhal dmar po ba rdzid pa bzhad// de stengs dbus zhal zhi ba ser// de yi g.yas zhal ljang khu gdangs// g.yon zhal sngo skya mche ba gtsigs//
121a7(sha): zhal re'i dpral bar rigs lnga'i zhal// zhal kun ljags 'dril mche gtsigs rnga ma// dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// thod skam ser khra sbrul gyis bsgyings//
121b1(sha): bcu gnyis phyag na bsnams pa ni// g.yas pa drug na go rims su// gser gyi rdo rje rgya gram dang // chos sbyin phyag rgya tri shul la// be tshon ral gri lcags kyu dang //
121b2(sha): sti ra'i zhing chung thur du brkyang // g.yon pa drug na go rims su// khyung khra sdigs mdzub ma 'bar ba// ba na d+ha khrag bkang sha ga ti'i mdung // ga na ma lcags mad
121b3(sha): gzhu rgyu zhags bsnams// sku stong glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag gi sham thabs mchog tshar brgyan// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i se ral kha// phyag gdub zhabs
121b4(sha): gdub rigs bzhi'i sprul// dpral bar rak+ta zla gam thig le// mkhur 'dzum thal chen tsho ma bur mtshan// kos ko zhag gi zo ris can// me dpung 'bar ba'i
121b5(sha): klong dkyil na// ma he'i gdan la brjid par bzhugs// de 'og gshin rje pho mo brdzis// kha bu ba ga na kyal byi chings gdan// thugs khar nyi ma'i gdan dkyil na//
121b6(sha): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i sku// sku mdog dkar ser 'dzum zhi bzhad// phyag g.yas rdo rje ut+pal g.yon// dbu rgyan rin chen brgyan gyis mdzes//
121b7(sha): phrugs khar rdo rje rtse lnga pa// lte bar nyi ma hU mthing nag/ mtha' ma snying po sngags kyis bzhor// thugs kyi ye shes 'dus ma byas// gzung 'dzin skya 'gag spros
122a1(sha): bral ba'i// hUM las g.yon du hUM 'phros pas// 'phro 'du la sogs de bzhin bya// bskyed pa'i sngags brjod shes rab yum// ro langs
122a2(sha): khro mo be ta li// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po yab la 'khyud// ba ra pa rdo rje
122a3(sha): / rtse gsum pa// yab kyi thugs kha ra bsgrengs nas 'dzin// mtha' ma yab kyi lte bar 'khyud// g.yon pa khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng // ba na d+ha rak+ta yab la sto ba//
122a4(sha): tha ma tri shul bsgreng ba'o// rgyun dang cha lugs yab dang 'thun// khro rgyal ya man ta ka yi// thugs las 'od 'phros sngags brjod pas// dbyug tho las ni mthing
122a5(sha): nag ya// de las sprul pa'i khro bo sras// ya ma rA dza khye'u chung sngo// spyan dmar mche gcig sa 'jigs tshul rngam// dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'khyil// zhing gi ko
122a6(sha): rlon sta ga lpags bsnams// g.yas g.yon pa tshon sdigs mdzu ba bsgrang // gtso bo'i pho nyar bka' sdod pa'o// lha rnams dal gyi pho brang na// thod pa skam rlon
122a7(sha): gzhal yas na// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor// sku las ye shes me dpung 'bar// nyon mongs dug gsum mun /
122b1(sha): khang 'joms// sprul sku sems can thams cad la// dus gsum ji ltar mos pa bzhin// gang la ci 'dul der ston pa'o// b+hU las gzhal yas khang bskyed de//
122b2(sha): de dbus khro rgyal yab yum bskyed// 'khor du ga shin rje ma mo'i tshogs// sprul pa'i las mkhan ma lus bskyed// de thugs ye shes 'od 'phros pas// phyogs
122b3(sha): bcu chos kyi dbyings nyid nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bstim// phyag mtshan phyi nang gsang mchod 'bul// dngos grub blang zhing thugs dam bskang //
122b4(sha): bshags dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya'o// oM a kro te kra yo man ta ka ha na mthA b+hAny+dza d+hU phaT/ oM AHrU paiHShik+ka rak+Sha man hU pha/ oM b+hA ba sa ta dz+nyA na phaT
122b5(sha): ya ma sa ma ya dza/ oM bud d+ha d+har+m+ma sang ge b+h+ya/ e ha hi b+ha ga ba na/ ya man ta ka kro d+hi shwa ri ya ma rA dza sa ma ya dza hU ba ho/ ya ma ye ma hA su ka ho/ sa ma yasta tiSh+Tha
122b6(sha): g+ha na/ o ya man ta ka e ka ba ri/ shri badz+dza d+hU be du/ puSh+pe bu/ A lo ke hri/ gan d+he a/ ma hA mu tra pu tsa hi/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta shri b+hA na kha ra ma kha hi/ ma hA
122b7(sha): ma ma sa kha hi ma hA rak+ta kha hi/ ma hA tsit+taM kha hi/ ma hA go ro tsa ne kha hi/ ma hA ba su ha kha hi/ ma ha pany+tsa a mri ta kha hi/ ma hA b+ha ling ta i dam gri h+ma gri h+nu
123a1(sha): kha hi kha hi/ rak+ta pi pa to/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta su ka ho/ ma hA ma ma sa rak+ta ke ma ni ri ti pan tsa ba ri ye swA hA/ o shri ba dz+ra ru pa ka ya hU/ pra ti a ra
123a2(sha): li hU/ du pa du hU/ b+ha ling ta hU/ tsan d+ha li hU/ swa ra na kha hU/ bany+tsa a mri te hU/ oM ma hA kro d+ha shri ya man ta ka a la la ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog
123a3(sha): rgyu las/ las rim bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po sa// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di bsha
123a4(sha): bdag nyid ya man ta kar gsal ba yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// de thugs rdo rje'i snying po sngags// de las sngags kyi 'phro 'du bya//
123a5(sha): bdag nyid chen por bsgrub pa'o// mdun du dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom// de bzhin 'phro 'du ma yengs bzlas// yi dam lha yi bsgrub pa'o// bdag thugs
123a6(sha): snying po 'od 'phros pas// 'dom gang phan chad khro bo'o// skur gyur sngags zlos stong gsum gyi// stong khyab sems can sgrib pa sbyangs// mu mtha' med pa'i chos
123a7(sha): dbyings khyab// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'jam dpal khro bo tshogs chen gyi// thugs thim mchod phul thugs dam bskul// tshur 'dus bdag
123b1(sha): thugs snying por thim// bdag nyid sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'dus// de ltar gsal bas ma yengs par// dus der rtags dang
123b2(sha): grangs su bzlas// bye ba bdun dang bdun 'bum khri// dus ni gnyen zla'i nya stong bsgrim// rtags ni mngon phyung bar du bzlas// sum yang mchod pa dbul
123b3(sha): zhing bstod// srod 'jing rtags byung ngam sri 'dre// yin pas mtshams bcad mnan gzir bya// nam phyed tho rangs rtags byung na// lha yin mchod dbul
123b4(sha): dngos grub blang // ban d+ha dmigs can phyag rgya bcas// sbas la lan dgur sngags glu blang // oM sa ma ya many+dzu shri mu tra ya mun ta kA pa tsa te ro ni hU dza dza/
123b5(sha): o sa ma ya a nu ra ga na pa ti/ ya ma na ta ka ha ha he/ oM ya man ta ka hU/ kA la ru pa hU/ o hriSh+Ti bi kri tra a na na hU phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya ma na ta ka ha
123b6(sha): na ma thA b+hany+dza hU phaT/ ya ma me ta kA ra tsa sa to// ru ni yi na ra ya dza ni/ hUM dza/ khro rgyal ya man ta ke yi/ thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// lho phyog
123b7(sha): dur khrod ma la ya// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer nas// skye 'gro kun srog dbang sgyur ba'i// gshin rje'i rgyal po 'chi bdag gnag/ 'khor
124a1(sha): bcas srog drangs mdun du bkug/ nag po 'jigs tshul tshe srog bdag/ khro rgyu la bka' sdod las bcol byed// 'phro 'dus rgyud
124a2(sha): bskul las byed bsam// ma yangs rtags byung bar du bzlas// sku gzugs g.yo 'gul sngags sgra sgrogs// snang srid nyi zla'i 'od kyis gang // nyams la
124a3(sha): lho sgo byed snyam byed// gza' skar mang po thang la lhung // gcan gzan mche gtsigs bdag sgo srung // bdag nyid nyams dgu rang sems gsal// rlung
124a4(sha): nag 'tshub ma sa g.yos drang // 'brug sgra chen po skar mda' lhung // yi dam lha mchog mngon gshegs nas// sku mdog nag po gdong pa gzur//
124a5(sha): mche ba ring la dmar ba gtsigs// zhal bgrad spyan rtsa dmar po bsgrigs// dur khrod chas ldan lho ba la 'dra// me dpung nang na bzhugs par ston// bdag nyid
124a6(sha): las kyi 'phro ngan na// rigs kyi bu khyod ci 'dod zer// klad du ral gri brdeg tshul ston// sran chung 'jigs na nyen che'o// mi 'jigs sran tshugs
124a7(sha): phyag rgya sngags// bdag gi 'phags pa dam pa'i mchog/ grub pa khyod kyi thugs dam ste// bsrung ba 'di lta bu zhig 'chal// gang 'dod pa yi dngos
124b1(sha): grub blang // tshig mangs mi smra sems brta na pa sa// dbyangs s+tha na dam pa'i glu 'di blang // u tra ra sa da ra ma ka/ a a ni ka na ga na d+ha yed/ e e ba ta
124b2(sha): ba ta ba ta na/ dz+nyA na si d+hi pra ma ya a tha/ zhes brjod dngos grub nges dam bca'// des ni gang 'dod las 'grub 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang /
124b3(sha): dag gsang ba'i rgyud las/ sgrub thabs rim pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// ga shin
124b4(sha): rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor bshad// dus kyi mtha' ma shar ba'i tshe// bstan pa gnyen po bsrung ba'i phyir// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bskor//
124b5(sha): des ni gdul bya sgrol zhing gcod// zhing chen du ra khrod ras dag la// sme pa lnga yis thang pa bya// ni rangs dung phyis rkyang bcad la// dug khrag rgya so la zhun ma
124b6(sha): yis// lhor bltas bya rog sgo rtsas bris// dbus nas thig skor rim pa bzhi// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi//
124b7(sha): phyi rim lcags ma par bcu gnyis ldan// de phyir rlung ri stong pa la// mtha' ma rtsibs chen dgu gnyis ldan// de la gnas shing dgongs pa ni// rtsa ba gshed
125a1(sha): kyi 'bru lnga dbus// lcags mkhar me dpal 'bru bcu gnyis// rlung ri sku gsung thugs kyi stobs// rtsibs la gcod byed mtshod dpa'
125a2(sha): 'bru// gsang mdzod rtsibs mtshan brnag pa'i ming // g.yas skor steng gcod yab kyi ltor// 'jigs tshul be tshon sdigs mdzub bsgreng // g.yon skor 'og
125a3(sha): gtsid yum gyi ltor// 'jigs tshul tri shul thod khrag bsnams// kha sbyar dong rtsang ba rnag pa'i steng // dgug dang dbye ba'i las rdzogs phyir// mtshon cha'i
125a4(sha): 'khrul 'khor bskor zhing gcod// brnag pa rdul phran tsam du 'gyur// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha gzhi gcig la// bskor bas nyin bzhir las drug 'grub/
125a5(sha): 'jam dpal zhal drug nyin nas 'byung // bzhi skor re res las 'grub 'gyur// de dag rgyas pa'i rim bshad 'di'o// stang gi dbus zhal zhi ba nas//
125a6(sha): skyo 'bog srog gcod 'khor lo 'phros/ yak+She ni rA dza sa to me/ ya ma sa to ru na yo ta/ ya me na yo ni ra yak+She/ ya ta ra ya dza ni ra ma/ steng gi zhal g.yas ldang
125a7(sha): khu nas/ rdo rje rtse gsum chu 'a khyags dbab pa 'phros// ya ta ya ma ni ra tsa/ ya k+She ya ma ya to ru/ ra ma ya ta na yo ni/ to me ya ta na yo ni/ steng gi g.yon zhal
125b1(sha): mthing kha nas// ga nam lcag sa ur mo thog dab ba 'phros// rak+ShA yo ya yo k+She ru/ to ma ya ya yo ma to/ yo k+ShI ra ya rak+She yo// ya ma to ya to ma ya/ 'og gi dbus
125b2(sha): zhal mthing nag nas// srog gcod ga shed nag 'khrul 'khor 'phros// ya ma me ta k+Sha ni ra tsa/ ya me tek+She ma sa tau ru/ ya ta k+She ma me na yo ni/ ya k+She ma me ta ra ya dza/
125b3(sha): 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas// gdug pa srog len mdze nad gtong ba 'phro sa// ya ma ni ra tsa ta yau/ ya me sa to ru k+She na ya/ ya ta na yo na ma ra/ ya k+She ra ya dza
125b4(sha): me to/ 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po nas// dmar po srog gcod dri rbod gtong ba 'phros// ya ma ra yo ta yo tsa/ ya me to ya k+She ya ru/ ya ta yo ya ma ra ni/ ya k+Sha ya ya
125b5(sha): me to dzapra ma ya/ mu ra dza ya/ rak+ta tsa ra ya/ ma ra ya/ nag ku ru nrirba da ya/ ra tsa a sa ma ya tri/ ud ma hA pra tsa lerba da/ dud kar phrom shu ti phro ma ya ma phrom
125b6(sha): ya mra hu ra sha ra b+ha ri sha ra ya shar pho ba/ badz+ra dz+wa la raM shar pho ba/ thog thog che ma chem srog la thu marbad b+h+yo/ ya ka shi bi sha tsi ru ka la ru tra sha trun sog la mA ra ya dza/
125b7(sha): tsi ri dza la rak+ta tsa ra ya na g+ha hu ma ya ba sti sha tru na b+hing khra ga ba ra la rba da/ rak+sha khram te mA ra yarba da pu na na/ tsit+ta tsha la pa khram khra ma mA ya rba da/ de dag ga shed kyi 'khrul
126a1(sha): 'khor te// drag po'i las kun 'grub par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga brgya
126a2(sha): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// thun drug gsad pa'i sbyor ba shad// phungs gsum gyi 'brub khung ni// gru gsum
126a3(sha): dpangs khru mtho gang tshad// kha khyer thod 'phreng tsher rtsang bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ de nang mon pa'ang gri thod du// rten drug ling ga ming rus bcas// tsha ba /
126a4(sha): nang khrag byugs la brnag/ gri bor mar chod thod pa ru// mi rta ra khyi dri nad khrag/ mon pa la byung thod pa ru// dug rgod ra sbyang ba spu dug/ mdze can dmar chod thod
126a5(sha): pa ru/ mdze khrag sbal sbrul chu bya'i khrag/ mi phyugs gang rung smyon thod du// de khrag nyungs kar nyungs nag 'bru// 'brong chen khrom gyi 'thom nag tu//
126a6(sha): gcan gza na sna tshogs sha za na bya'i// khrag snying mchu sder mche ba bsham// dbang drag phur pa dug ngar blud// bdag nyid khro rgyal gdong drug pa//
126a7(sha): ling ga brnag pa dngos su bsam// 'brub khung gshin rje'i khyams khang nas// thun rdzas nad dang mtshon cha'i dpal// yab kyi las kyi gshin rje 'khol//
126b1(sha): yum gyis ma mo bdud mo 'khol// kun 'dus thun gyi mtshon cha yis// brnag pa'i lus srog rdul du rlog/ de ltar gsal bas drag sngags pa zlas//
126b2(sha): khro rgyal ya ma na ta ka yi// zhal drag drag sngags gzugs la bra ba// steng dbus ser po zhi ba'i zhal// smo 'bog dpag sngags 'phros pa sa brdeg/ o//
126b3(sha): / sa ma ya many+dzu shrI ya ma na ta kri ta ma ma e ka dza ti te ka ni sha tru ma man ha ra ud ma tanr-i mA ra ya dzaH/ steng gi zhal g.yas ljang khu nas// snying gzer da ba pa sngags
126b4(sha): 'phros pas brdeg/ ya man ta ka tri sha rakra pe ta li kro d+hi ru lu b+h+yo tsit+ta tshal pa kham sha garba da// steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// mdze nad thun sngags
126b5(sha): 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma kla la hU ya na ga ra gra ti ku la phu ta ya/ ma ma kro d+hi tsi ti dzA la ha nA ya snying khrag ba ma ril rba da/ 'o ga gi dbus zhal nag po nas// klad
126b6(sha): gzer dab pa sngags 'phros pas brje ga/ ya ma tsan d+ha kra d+hA ni raka mo shan pa mA ra ya ro tsa na mun thibs shag tir+tha da/ 'og gi g.yas zhal dkar po nas// rgyu gze
126b7(sha): thun sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma rakra dza ma ya snying kha rag ba su ta rau myags khrag te rbad/ srog tig rbad/ steng nyig rbad/ 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar
127a1(sha): po nas// dri rgod dpa ba sngags 'phros pas brdeg/ ya ma rakra ya ma khrag/ ya ma tri ta ha la ya khram tirba da/ ha ri thum ril ram shag
127a2(sha): rba da 'bru yi thun gyi smyo 'bog gtong / mdze khrag thun rtsogs mdze nad 'bebs// khrag thun dmar po dri rgod 'bebs// dug thun nag pos rgyu gzer 'bebs//
127a3(sha): bya ga can thun gyis klang gzer 'bebs// phur thun nag pos snying gzer 'bebs// thun rtags me 'bar me stag 'thor// khol dang lud dang rlangs pa 'byung //
127a4(sha): sgra dang 'phrar zhing 'thor ba 'byung // sngags pa dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// des ni brag la brgyab na 'gas// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// 'jam
127a5(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ thun drug gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// sprul pa'i
127a6(sha): 'khor lo 'di ba shad do// sangs rgyas rang sde sngags pa dang // mu stegs gzhan sde'i byad sngags kyis// sbyor ba drag po gnod byed na// de bzlog rang
127a7(sha): ba sad 'khor lo ni// rang bzhin rnam dag stong pa las// bru yig sngon po yongs gyur pas// ga nam lcags 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// rnol rgya che ma
127b1(sha): 'bar bsgom// dbus kyi lte ba ra hU yig las// khro bo'i rgyal po ga shi na rje gshed// gzhon nu gdong drug ga sal bar bskyed// thugs kyi rdo rje snying po
127b2(sha): las// ye shes drug 'od zhal nas 'phros// rtsib sa drug sprul pa'i ga shin rjer gyu ra// 'og gi dbus zhal nag po nas// shar rtsibs 'od nag 'phros pa
127b3(sha): las// khro bo me 'bar bdud 'dul sprul// mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta ba rnams// 'og gi zhal g.yas dkar po nas// shar lho dkar po 'od 'phros
127b4(sha): pas// khro bo rnam rgyal ging chen sprul// dkar po 'khor lo dbyug tho bsnams// 'og gi g.yon zhal dmar po las// nub rtsibs dmar po'i 'od
127b5(sha): 'phros pas// khro bo tshe srog dbang sdud sprul// dmar po pad+ma rgyu zhags bsnams// stong gi dbus zhal ser po nas// lho rtsibs ser por 'od 'phros
127b6(sha): pas// khro bo yon tan 'bar ba sprul// ser po gsal zhing dgra sta bsnams// steng gi g.yas zhal ljang khu las// nub byang ljang khu'i 'od 'phos pas//
127b7(sha): khro bo stobs ldan bzhad par sprul// ljang khu ba chon khram bam bsnams// steng gi g.yon zhal mthing kha nas// byang rtsibs mthing nag 'od 'phros pas//
128a1(sha): khro bo khams gsum zil gnon sprul// mthing nag ral gri rgyu zhags bsnams// kun kyang zhing chen gdan la bzhugs// me dpu
128a2(sha): klong na dur khrod chas// ye shes 'khor los byin brlabs bya// mchod pa la sogs kun rdzogs bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis// gdul bya
128a3(sha): kun gcod rdul phran brlag/ gsang sngags bar chad med par bzlas// o shrI many+dzu ya ma na ta ka/ ka la ru pa sa ma ya/ badz+ra kro d+ha rA dza ya/ badz+ra ra dza mu ha
128a4(sha): naya ma rA dz+ra kro d+ha ya tsa kra tiSh+Ta wa rti/ pra ta ki ra ha na ha na/ tha ma tha ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hU phaT/ o a kro te ka ya man ta ka shrI many+tsu ka la ru pa/ badz+ra kro
128a5(sha): d+ha ya ma ye sa ma ya hU/ du na du na pa tsa pa tsa/ tshin+na tshin+na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ya ma sarba bu d+hA na ka ya ra ka sha raka sha/ sa ra sa ra/ dgra bo mA ra ya
128a6(sha): phaT/ ya ma ra dza sa twa me ya ma raka sha phung to me/ ya ma ti sha khrag to me/ ya ma yak+ka mug to me/ ya ma tsa na d+ha sbying to me/ ya ma tri ta srog to me/ myags thuma?
128a7(sha): ril rba da/ bsreg pa me yi las rim ni/ zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag po// ri lum dkar po rtsi chags pa// me thab zlum po dngul chus byug/ yam shing
128b1(sha): tsan dan dkar po dang // be dkar 'dzag dkar mtshar bu'i shing // ga bur shu dag cu gang dang // ming byang gu gul dkar po bsreg/ lha yang dkar po
128b2(sha): shel ltar dag/ bsgoms la rgya spos bre gu spos// spang spos rtsi mar me tog dkar// shing thog g+hi hang bsreg byas na// drag po smyon pa'ang zhi 'gyur/
128b3(sha): na// gzhan drag kun la gdon mi za// nyon mongs khrong khro ga dron bgegs dragra// byang sngags nad dal sdang sems can// mA lus rab tu zhi
128b4(sha): bAr 'gyur// ri rgyal lhun po rtsi shing sar// me thab gru bzhi gser gyis byug/ rtsi shing sna tshogs 'bras bu can// sbyar ba'i yam shing ming byang dang //
128b5(sha): rtsi mar spos dang shing mngar dang // pad+ma ge sar star bu dang // shug 'bru ma ku sha yung ba dang // gser gyi me tog sna tshogs bsreg/ lha yang btso ma'i
128b6(sha): gser ltar bsgom// longs spyod rigs brgyud tshe dang nor// bsod nams dbang thang dpag med 'phel// shin tu rgyas pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// lhun po
128b7(sha): dgu 'dus brjed cha'i sa// ma thab zla gam pa la shas// byugs la yam shing tsa na dan dmar// pa la sha dang gser shing la// khri dang je tso mon sran dang //
129a1(sha): g+hi hang pad+ma me tog dang // gur kum ming byang bcas pa bsnams// pad+ma dmar po'i me tog bsreg/ lha yang dmar po brjid tshul bsgom//
129a2(sha): rgyal blon sngags pa stobs can dang // yul khams dang ni bud med dang // 'dre gdon pho mo sdang byed ma lus pa// nges par dbang sdud bran bzhin 'gyur// dur
129a3(sha): khrod brag nag mtho la gzar// me thab gru gsum sol chen byug/ dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// dug dang dri spod shing me spa ra// sha sna tshogs dang tshil
129a4(sha): chen dang // khrag sna 'bru mar ming byang rgyu// gtor ma gu gul nag po bsreg/ lha yang mthing nag khros par bsgom// dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol 'joms gsod//
129a5(sha): gzir bzlog rlag par byed 'gyur ro// de dag gsang sngags smra ba cad bzlas// shan ting ku ru swA hA/ puSh+TiM ku ru spa pha ra na/ pa shang ku ru hri dzaH/ mA ra ya ku ru
129a6(sha): phaT/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyin sreg gi le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen
129a7(sha): gyis// gnan gtad sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ling ga 'khor lor bcas pa de// 'khor lo dur khrod gnas su gnas// ling gathod chen mi shis bcug/
129b1(sha): dur khro da tsha sgo dmyal chu kho la// khu rlangs ngam grog lhor ltar dmar// las kyi ga shin rje de gnas gtad// myos nas glang thabs nad kyis 'chi// ya ma pa tra
129b2(sha): ha sha na b+h+yo/ ya ma rA dza khrag to me ya/ ri nag ri mgo mdud pa 'dra// brag nAg ma tsho nag 'khyil cing 'khol// byang bltas bdud nag gnas pa'i sa// der
129b3(sha): gtada'athibs nad lkugs pa'i gsod// rakra pra ka mo ni b+h+yo/ kA la ru ta b+ha ti ya/ gangs ri bra ga da ka ra yang rtse na// mtho rtsa rgod lding rtsa nga yul na// lha rgod dreg
129b4(sha): pa 'khor bcas gnas// der gtad zer thun blang thabs gsod// de ba yak+Sha pra thun b+h+yo/ a sa pa ya de ba bra/ ri brag rko chu dmar po la// rang gzhan 'bros 'dra
129b5(sha): sa rtsub na// sha za srin po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad pho gzer thun med gsod// rag sha pra ka mo ni b+h+yo/ rak+ka bi sha tsa thun/ lcags ri chu srin kha gdengs
129b6(sha): 'dra/ chu 'thab gdug shing rkang gcig nas// ga nor sprin drag po ga nas pa'i sa// der ga tad blo bur hu ra thu mas gsod// yak+ka kha rag du na b+h+yo/ ya ka sha u
129b7(sha): kra ya ri brag thang dmar rkang gcig shing // chu mig sna tshags lu ma na// klu bdud nag po gnas pa'i sa// der gtad zha gru ma nad kyis gsod// nA ga hu ya tan
130a1(sha): ye b+h+yo/ nA ga yag sha phu ta ya/ chu mig byang bltas rlung nag 'tshug/ dgun gsum nyi ma mi 'char ba// de na klu nag gdug pa gnas//
130a2(sha): der ga ta da mdze shu nad kyis 'chi// nag po ba ma ril nA ga b+h+yo/ nA ga b+ha ti ta ku la/ thang skam srin rdo dregs pa can// rtswa med bra ma shing yod pa// sa bdag nag po
130a3(sha): gnas pa'i sa// der gtad 'bras nad phol gyis gsod// be sa khe rin tra b+h+yo/ gur lang be sa snying khas/ mtsho nag gting rings brag nag rtsar// gting gi mtsho bdud
130a4(sha): nag mo gnas// der gtad smyos nas myos pas 'chi// dun ting du med du na b+h+yo/ du la ya dza/ du la ya dza/ dur khrod brag phug gting rings na// ma mo srog zan sha
130a5(sha): pa gnas// der gtad rims ngal nad kyis gsod// ma ma snying kha ra ka b+h+yo/ ma rak+Sha ru lu dza/ sa ri dmar po gong gsum 'dus// brag dmar yul btsan kha dmar gnas
130a6(sha): der gtad dri rgod nad kyis gsod// tsa ra tri sha dun b+ho/ shu la tsa ra ya ka sha dza/ nr-i ha ra hu ra thums/ sta pa ya/ stam pa ya/ lam na na/ sngags rnams kun gyi 'jug
130a7(sha): la gdag sa// 'di ltar gtad pa'i las byas na// dmigs pa gang gtad don po de// myur du gsod byed rlag par 'gyur// thabs 'di 'jig rten lha srin rnams// /
130b1(sha): dgra srog la dbab ces bya ste// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// drag la mthu rtsa la drag ldan pas// de mtha' na ni khro bo gzhan// thams cad kun gyi lag cha 'chor/
130b2(sha): de la 'khor gyis rab bskor ba// mche ba gtsigs shing bsgyings pa ste// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyi sku yis ni// gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa// 'jam
130b3(sha): dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'khor gyis de ltar bstod byas so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gdong drug pa'i le'u ste

130b5(sha): sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i thugs rje yis// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo sku sprul pa// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal
130b6(sha): ga shin rje gshed// rnam drag chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs su gsol// gdul dka' ma lus 'dub ba'i 'phrin las mdzad// hUM/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal sprub
130b7(sha): pa'i sku// khro bo'i ming ni gshin rje gshing// me lce 'ab ra ba'i mtshon cha 'khrug/ khams gsum lha chen thams cad dang // bdud dpung rdul du brlag mdzad pa//
131a1(sha): khro rgyal ya man ta ka'i sku// zhal drug phyag rgya bcu gnyis te// zhal gcig dkar la zhal gcig dmar// zhal gcig sngo la zhal gcig
131a2(sha): ser// zhal gcig ljang la zhal gcig mthing // zhal gcig hUM phaT sgra sgrogs pas// zhal gcig zhi la zhal gcig khro// zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal
131a3(sha): gcig gdangs// zhal gcig mche ba rab tu gtsigs// zhal gcig brjid la gnon pa'i zhal// a a ha la'i sgra sgrogs pas// zhal re spa na gsum
131a4(sha): 'dzum bzhad khros// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril ba// smin ma mun ru ma glog ltar 'gyu// sma ra a ga tshoms me ltar 'bar// kham nog dbu
131a5(sha): skra gyen du 'khyil// dbu la thod skam 'phreng bas mdzes// skya yang mthing nag chen po la// sku lus che la yan lag rags// lto che khams gsum lto na 'phyo//
131a6(sha): na bzar glang chen ko rlon gsol// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs can// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i se ral ka/ sbrul nAg stong gi gdengs kas klubs//
131a7(sha): thal chen khrag zhag zhal la brgyan// tshom bu zo ris thig le can// bcu gnyis phyag rgya 'jigs par ldan// g.yas kyi phyag drug dang po na// gsar
131b1(sha): gyi rdo rje rgya gram rnams// chos nyid skye med rol pa'i rtags// phyag drug g.yas kyi gnyis pa na// sbyin pa'i phyir na phyag brgyad pas// bsgrub pa po la
131b2(sha): dngos grub gsol// g.yas kyi phyag drug gsum pa na// tri shul phyag mtshan bdud dpung 'joms// log 'dren bdud dpung rdul du rlogs// g.yas
131b3(sha): kyi phyag drug bzhi pa na// be tshon phyag mtshan dgra dpung 'joms// sdang ba'i dgra bo rdul phra na gtong // g.yas kyi phyag drug lnga pa na// nyon mongs rgyun
131b4(sha): gcod ral dri bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag drug tha ma na// rdo rje lcags kyu sngon po dang // sti ra'i zhing dbyug lhan cig 'dzin// dgra bgegs snying
131b5(sha): 'byin srog rtsa 'dre na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad nas sbyong // g.yon gyi phyag drug dang po na// khyung gi khra tshen lding ba bsnams// dam nyams kun gyi
131b6(sha): gshed mar gtong // g.yon gyi phyag drug gnyis pa na// sdigs mdzub rtse la me 'bar bas// nyon mongs dug gsum mun khang ba sreg/ g.yon gyi phyag
131b7(sha): drug gsum pa na// ban d+ha rak+ta sa bkang ba 'khrug cing gsol// 'khor ba'i bag chags sdug bsngal zad par mdzad// g.yon gyi phyag drug bzhi pan/
132a1(sha): shag ti sngon po mdung thung bsnams// bdud dang bgegs dang 'byung po dang // dgra bo'i g.yul ngo bzlog par mdzad// g.yon gyi
132a2(sha): phyag drug lnga pa na// lcags gzhu lcags mda' nag po 'phen// dgra bgegs snying la gzer cing 'bebs// g.yon gyi phyag drug tha ma na// ba su ta ye zhags/
132a3(sha): pa bsnams// dgra bgegs dbang sdud 'khor ba thugs rjes 'dren// zhabs drug rgyud drug mgo nas gnon// g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang tshul du bzhugs
132a4(sha): phyag dang zhabs gdub thams cad kun// gdug pa'i sbrul nag mang pos brgyan// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// chibs sum he sngo nag
132a5(sha): chibs// ma he gdan gyi sgrom 'og na// gshin rje pho mo gdan du bting // khro rgyal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal bstod// sdang dgra gnod bgegs thal
132a6(sha): ba rdul du rlog/ hU g.yon na khro mo nyer ga nas ma// yum chen ro langs pe ta li// khros pa'i cha lugs yab dang 'thun// zhal ras 'bar ba gzi yang
132a7(sha): che// spyan gsum gdong yang khro gnyer can// rab tu 'jigs pa'i zhal gdangs shing // gyen du smra brdzes gsus mo che// gtum mo dug hrul gos
132b1(sha): gyon ma// de byin tri shul phyag na bsnams// gzi chen rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// sku yang me lce 'bar ba can// gdong dang mig ni khros pa'i
132b2(sha): tshul// phyag dang zhabs gnyis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir ba grad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal//
132b3(sha): phyag ga ya sa dang po yab la 'khyu ra// bar pa rdo rje thugs khar gsor// mtha' ma yab kyi lto bar 'khyud// g.yon gyi dang po khro mdzub phyag rgya bsgreng /
132b4(sha): ba ra pa ba na d+ha rak+tas bkang ba yab la stob// mtha' ma tri shu la dug gsum 'joms// bde gshegs sras kyi bka' sdod ma// yum tshon ro langs pa
132b5(sha): ta li/ yab kyi sku la dgyes par 'khri la// rtse gcig bsnyen cing bsgrubs pa'i lha// dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub gsol// sdang dgra gnod
132b6(sha): bgegs thal bar rlog/ hAM'ajam dpal thugs las sprul ba'i sraso// ya ma ra dza 'jigs pa'i sku// mthing nag spu na dmar mche ba gtsigs/
132b7(sha): na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// dbu skra kha ma nag gyen du bsgreng // phyag na be chen sngon po bsnams// sdang dgra gnod bgags thal ba' rlog
133a1(sha): thod pa skam rlon 'phreng bas brgyan// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na// gtso bo'i bka' nyan las rnams byed// dbang phyug nyi shu
133a2(sha): rtsa brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// dgra dpung shig la bdud dpung choms// 'di skad pastod bskul las rnams 'grub// ye shes lha rnams chos kyi dbyings nas
133a3(sha): bskul/ byin dbab dam tshig gnang nas bskul ba ni// hU/ nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam pa'i dbyings nyid na// bcom ldan rdo rje khro rgyal gshed chen yab yum
133a4(sha): dang // rgyal ba'i sras bcas srungs ma dam tshig can// mkha' 'gro tshogs dang bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod// bdag ni rgyal srid mtho ris longs skyo
133a5(sha): dang // 'dod pa'i yon tan sgrub pa ma lags te// 'gro ba rnams la snying ba rtse sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs// bstan pa 'jig byed bsgral bar don brtson pa//
133a6(sha): ye shes sgrib med khyed kyis sa la mkhyen// bcom ldan 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// tshe rabs ston nas smon lam 'brel pa'i lha// sngon gyi thugs
133a7(sha): dam rnal 'byor bdag dang gcig/ sngon tshe lha mchog khyed nyid bsnyen cing bsgrubs// de ltar bdag gi rtse gcig yi dam lha// thugs dam 'brel ba'i lha mchog
133b1(sha): bdag bsgrub na// thugs rje rtsa gcig rgyun gyis bdag la dgongs// bdag lus dum bu stong du gtu bas gyur kyang // yi dam lha mchog khyod ni gtan mi gtong //
133b2(sha): mi srid srid pa'i dgra dang bgegs byung yang // khro rgyal mthu chen khyod kyis mthu gsol cig/ bcom ldan dbang chen khyod kyis dbang bskur cig/ thugs rjes bdud 'dul
133b3(sha): gshin rje gshed kyi lha// khro rgyal gshin rje gsher ni 'dir gshegs shig/ gshegs nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub gsol// dus kyi bskal ba me chu rlung 'khrug
133b4(sha): kyang / khro rgyal khyod nyid gcig pus thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// nad mtshon mu ge'i bskal pa 'joms mdzad pa// gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal 'dir gshegs la//
133b5(sha): thugs rje'i zhal bzang bdag la bstan du gsol// dkon mchog spong zhing dam chos 'dral byed pa// thal bar rlog cig khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// de skad byin dpab
133b6(sha): dbyings nas bskul// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po mchog gi rgyud las/ gshin rje gshed la bstod cing dbyings nas bskul ba'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa
133b7(sha): brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya mA ra dzas 'di skad gso pa// spyi yi don bshad klu nag po// de la gtad pa ji ltar lags//
134a1(sha): de skad zhus pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don rgyas bshad khyod nyon cig/ 'khor lo'i spyi don rgyas bshad pa// rnam pa brgyad dang ma ldan na//
134a2(sha): 'khor lo bskor kyang don mi 'grub// spyi yi don brgyad gang zhe na// 'khor lo'i ka bzhi mtshugs na// steng 'og sngags kyi ka brdib// las kyi gshin rje mun
134a3(sha): nag 'khor// las mi 'grub pa'i skyon 'byung ngo // 'khor lo'i gdung bzhi ma 'dris na// 'khor lo kha sbyor gdung 'khrul te// gnad kyis mi tshugs skyon du
134a4(sha): 'gyur// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi ma thebs na// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo lto bral na// sngags pa'i 'khor du rkyen 'byung ngo // mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po yi/
134a5(sha): bcu na phur bzhi dang ma ldan na// las kyis gshin rje gnas 'khyams nas// las byas don med rang 'khor 'gyur// de bzhin 'khor lo spyir gces pas// 'khor
134a6(sha): lo'i don bzhi shes bya'o// de dag gang dang gang zhe na// ka ba bzhi zhes bya ba'i don// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bzhi yin te// de don yid la gsal
134a7(sha): bya ba// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs su gsal// ngo bo srog gshed lha bzhir gsal// rang bzhin mtshon cha'i rnam par gsal// nus mthu me lce spu gri dug
134b1(sha): 'byung ba rang gcod rnon por gsal// gdung bzhi tshad thig bzhis mtshon nas// chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang // rang rgyud rtsa ba'i sbubs nang nas// sa dang
134b2(sha): chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba'i dngas ma bzhi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcu da thams cad kyi// gzhi rten snying po byed pas na// de ni nyi ma bzhi pa yi//
134b3(sha): las gnyer gtad pas nges 'grub pa'o// spyi bo mgrin pa snying kha dang // lte ba bzhi yi 'khor lo yi// don gsal bsad pa'i las rdzogs te// chags
134b4(sha): sdang bzhi las grub pa yi// 'thoms pa'i gshed bzhi bskul byas pas// nyin bzhi'i 'khor los gsod byed pa'i// 'khor lo'i gzer bzhi zhes pa ni//
134b5(sha): bsnyen pa drod rtags thob pa ni/ byin rlabs lha yi gzer zhes bya// rdzas rnams tshang bar 'tshogs pa ni// rten 'brel sbyor ba'i gzer zhes bya// 'khrul mig
134b6(sha): lcags mkhar gshin rje yin// bcu drug khang pa'i gzer zhes bya// drag po'i ting 'dzin rdzogs gsal ba// 'phra bdun dgongs pa'i gze ra zhes bya// 'khor
134b7(sha): lo'i bcun phur bzhi zhes pa// rnal 'byor dam ldan dbang rdzogs na// man ngag gdeng ldan rang nyams kyi// dgongs ldan sems kyi bcun phur ro// bsnyen
135a1(sha): pa bye ba tshad stsol te// phyi nang gsang ba'i rtags ldan pas// las kyis gshin rje ma mo rnams// dbang med las la chud pa ni// rtsol ba
135a2(sha): ting 'dzin bcu na phur ro// ye shes khro rgyal gshed stobs kyis// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// rang dbang med par las la chud// 'khu ldog mi nus las byed
135a3(sha): pa// ye shes byin rlabs bcun phur ro// las kyi gshin rje ma mo rnams// srog nas bskul zhing las bcol te// dmod pa drag po'i sngags bzlas pas//
135a4(sha): dgra bo rang dbang med pa ru// bla dang 'bral zhing srog gcod pas// drag po las kyi bcun phur ro// drag po gsad pa'i las dus su// drag
135a5(sha): sngags don bzhi shes par bya ba ni// 'phen par byed pa skyes bu lta bu yi// drag po sngags don nges par ma shes na// bsgrub bya dmigs pa'i rgyud las mi bskyod do//
135a6(sha): myur bar 'gro skyon gzhu rgyud lta bu ma shes na// gzas pa'i yul la sngags kyi gzer mi 'phro// 'phang bya drag po ma de 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// dmigs pa'i
135a7(sha): yul dang rgyud la mi 'phog go/ gcod byed mde 'dra'i drag sngags ma shes na// don po'i rtsa dang srog gzungs mi chod do// de don gsal bar bshad de zhes bya ba//
135b1(sha): 'phen byed skyes bu yi ge ya yin te// dbus kyi snying po ya las drangs nas bskor bas 'phen par 'gyur// skyod byed gzhu 'dra rkyen gyi ting nge 'dzin// 'phro 'du bying
135b2(sha): rgod ma song gsal ba'o// 'phang bya mda' 'dra ba'i sngags ni// las sbyor drag sngags bcu drug 'bru yin no// gcod byed mde'u lta bu'i drag sngags ni//
135b3(sha): spu gri drag sngags rnon po'i tshan bzhi yis// dgra bo'i rtsa dang srog gzungs gcod pa'o// de dag rab tu gces pa yi// 'khor lo'i man ngag sdebs brgyad do//
135b4(sha): ba rnag pa srog gzungs gcad cing lus srog 'byed lugs ni// 'gros stabs brgyud kyis gsad pa dang // tshul bcu gnyis kyis gsad pa dang // gnad dgu
135b5(sha): sdebs la gsad pa'o// 'gro sa stabs brgyad ni gang zhe na// 'bur nag thog 'gros 'bur 'gro mgo mangs dang // 'khyil pa sbrul 'gros stag 'phyos drag po'i
135b6(sha): 'gros/ ka ta ri srin 'gros dang bi bag ta yi 'gros// rta la ma nag po'i 'gro dang rus sbal 'phye bo'i 'gros// 'khrul 'khor bskor ba'i 'gros stabs brgyad
135b7(sha): ces bshad// tshul bcu gnyis kyi sa gsad pa ni// rgyu bzhi bsdus te gsad pa dang // dug gsum a ra gsad gtad pa dang // 'byung ba rnam lnga rtsad gcad
136a1(sha): dang / phung po lnga yi stobs gzhom dang // nang grol sma lnga gtub pa dang // dbang po tshogs drug sgo dgag dang // dngas ma bdun gyi
136a2(sha): rtsa bcad dang // dbugs kyi lam sgo dgu dgag dang // rnam shes tshogs brgyad sgo dgag dang // lus ngag yid gsum mthu ba sdu dang // shes pa dngas snyigs
136a3(sha): dbye ba dang // rten cig me mar gsad pa'o// gnad dgu dbab pa'i don bshad pa// rgyud la bla ga nas sa dgu dang // bla de rten pa'i mtshan ma dgu// bla 'jom//
136a4(sha): gsad pa'i drag sngags dgu// skyed byed rkyen gyi ting 'dzin dgu// drag sngags bskyod rta thun rdzas dgu// drag sngags 'jug pa'i sgo dang ni// bag chags
136a5(sha): pa sreg pa'i yi ge dgu// ga nad dgu bsdus 'joms man ngag dgu// shes pa dngos snyigs phye la bgrod pa'i tshul dgu'o// de dag 'jam dpal gshin rje
136a6(sha): gshed// spyi rgyug 'khrul 'khor ma na ngag go/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi spyi don bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya brgyad cu rtsa
136a7(sha): dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// klu rgyal gdug pa'i drag sngags bshad// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir//
136b1(sha): bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan la// gdug pa'i klu rgyal mi bzad pas// mdze nad dbab cing gsad pa yi// ngan sngags drug po'i sbyor ba 'di// gshed kyi
136b2(sha): sgrub sngags thams cad kyi// spyi rgyu ga las kyi mtha' rgya yin// stag pa'i shing ngam ro ras la// sme ba lnga yis thang ba bya// sku gu bya rog sgro rtsa yis//
136b3(sha): dug sna gdug pa'i khrag dang chu// khrag chen sbyar bas 'khor lo bri// bdag nyid klu rgyal skur bsgoms te// lhor bltas thig bskor zlum po lnga// dbus
136b4(sha): su gru gsum zla gam gsum// gru gsum brnag pa'i ming rus gzugs// zla gam rigs drug klu yi sprul// phyi rim lcags mkhar nag po la//
136b5(sha): gdug pa klu yi 'bru bcud dgod// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// spu gri drag sngags tshan re dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la//
136b6(sha): mdze thun drag sngags tshan re dgod// mtha' ma'i mu khyud zlum po la// sbrul dang sbal pa sdig pa sdom// lcong mo rkang mangs rabs bskor// rtsibs can
136b7(sha): brnag pa'i ming rus dgod// sdig pa pho mo'i lto ba ru// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyor bri// rgyu drug ling ga'i snying khar gzhug/ mdze thor bcu
137a1(sha): la dngos su brnag/ gdug pa'i snying khrag dug thun brab// bdag nyid khro rgyal gshin rje mdun du yig 'bru phu nag po// 'od du
137a2(sha): zhu ba sa klu nag po// mgo dgu mig gsu ma mche ba gtsigs// lag pa bco brgyad g.yas dgu na// sbrul dgu'i zhags pas brnag pa 'ching // g.yo na/
137a3(sha): dgu nad kyi rkyal pa dgus// da gra la mi nar sna dgu ga tong // mig nas mtshon cha'i char pa 'bebs// kha rlung nad kyi bskal pa gtong // ro sma ra sbrul nag
137a4(sha): 'khyil ba la// shin tu 'jigs shing rngam par bsgom// klu bra na thams cad pho nyar 'gyed// phu dang hu yi'i sngags sgra sgrogs// der bsgoms khro rgyal
137a5(sha): thugs kha na sa// ye shes sngags kyi 'od re 'phros// klu yul rgya mtsho'i gling chen nus// klu rgyal 'khor bcas bkug la bsti ma// klu rgyal nag po'i
137a6(sha): thugs kha nas// gdug pa'i klu gnyan sa ba dag rnams// mang po 'phros pa sa ling ga de// dgra bo dngos su gsal ba yi// dkar nag snying gi mtshams
137a7(sha): nas zhugs// mdangs 'phrog sa lus chul srog gcod de// sha khrag stod cing zos par bsam// sha khrag gtor ma dgrar dmigs dbul// drag sngags
137b1(sha): bzlas shing 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyis gcod// o nag po ti pa tsa nA ga rakra/ che ge mo ti ku la phe pha na shan phos phos/ shig
137b2(sha): shig chu ma chu ma/ hu ya hu ya klu nag po mgo dgu pa/ che ge mo la dza dza/ oM nag po baM ri la rtsi rtsi rgyas tsit+tha rgyas/ yan lag sdoms sa ma ya sa ma ya/ mA ra ya/
137b3(sha): tsi tsi ti dz+wa la khrag skyugs/ he he nA ga 'dus/ khram ba ma ba ru na tsi tsi rgyas// kha khrag snying la rgyas/ nA ga ru pa ru pa/ sU ya ya phaT/ nA ga rA dza sa ma ya
137b4(sha): snying khrag du na dmugs du ma dza dza/ mA ra ya myog rba da/ ces bzlas bye ba brgya thon nas// nag po klu la gtad byas na// lo dus na ni don po de// mdze nad
137b5(sha): btab nas srog 'chad par// the tshom med de nges pa'o// gnan pa drag po'i sbyor ba ni// 'khor lo rgyu rten ling gar bcas// drag po gnad kyi
137b6(sha): rdzas byugs la// sbrul chen po yis byad du gzhug/ khro rgyal stobs kyis gdug pa gtad/ gdug pa'i klu la rigs lnga ste// rgyal rigs shar lta dkar la
137b7(sha): 'khrug/ rus sbal khog par gtad byas na// smyo 'bog 'tshal pas gsod par byed// rje rigs lhor lta ser la dal// rabs chad thod par bcug gtad na//
138a1(sha): skyugs dang phol 'bras nad kyis gsod// bram ze nub lta rtsa dmar 'phung // mdze can dmar gcod thod par gtad// klu gangs dmu chu'i nad
138a2(sha): kyis gsod// dmangs rigs byung lta ljang la mgyogs// dri bo'i thod par bcug gtad na// dri rgod lkugs pas nges par gsod// dmar nag chung chub nyams
138a3(sha): mi dga'// dgu na ga sum nyi ma mi shar ba// gdug pa chen po'i gnas yin te// mo na pa'i thod par mnan ga tad na// spos nas gzer thabs nad kyis gsod//
138a4(sha): kun gyis mdze nag drag po 'bebs// o ka la ti pa tsa nA ga rak+ka badz+ra pa la/ oM badz+ra nA gA be rag sha dza la hU sha tru nan/ oM kA la ti pa tsa phe phu rak+kha u nan tI/
138a5(sha): tri nA na nri nan la sha nan/ ku ru tsa ya ya yaM dgra bo mA ra ya dza dza ne na/ o kA la ti pa tsa u phu she rba da/ ka la sha pa ti bi ta rba da nan/ pa ru na be sha na nA garba da/ nA ga be
138a6(sha): se be/ a kri ya nA ga dgra bo na na/ de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// gang yang myur du gsod byed do// gzhan yang mdza nad dbab bsad las//
138a7(sha): shin tu gnyan ra gdug pa yis// ru sa sbal dngos dang sbrul nag dngos// de la sbal sbrul sdig pa dang // nal bu mdze can dri bo yi// sha chen khrag chen
138b1(sha): tshil bu dang // brnag pa'i dri chen ming byang sogs// ba dmar 'o ma dme khrag rnams// khar rnyed rus sbal mdog 'gyur na// gtum po me yi sreg sbyor
138b2(sha): bya// yang na ga nyan ra ga dug pa'i gnas// na tri'i shing la gtum me sba ra// gong gi rdzas bsreg drag sngags brdeg/ rus sbal sbrul nag gnas su
138b3(sha): gtad// zhing brdab khrag bsgreng dbang gzugs rbad// btsan thabs las 'dis zla bdun las// mi 'gyang don po lus srog 'bral// lus rul gsod par
138b4(sha): the tshom med// yang na gnyan ra gdug chen po// dgu yis sogs rdzas rnams dang // thang dmar shing cig brag rgya'o// dur khrod klu gdug sha khrag la//
138b5(sha): rus sbal nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// kha gdangs mche gtsigs mig dmar bgrad// gong gi rdzas byugs sme ba bya// brnag pa'i bdun brgyud ming dang rus//
138b6(sha): de rang pha mes sogs pa la// bis la rgyu rten khrag chen byug/ rus sbal khar gzhug ro ra sa dkri// ma rnyed bya kri'i shun pa la'o// de nyid klu rgyal nag po'i sku//
138b7(sha): 'chi bdag nag por bskyed la bstim// mnga' gsol ngan sngags drod ldan 'das// gdug pa chen po'i gnas su sba// rang gis mnyes dbang gzugs shing //
139a1(sha): kho yis nyes pa'i dmod pa bor// klu rgyal gdug pa rnams la'o// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang
139a2(sha): gsod// srog chags mi rnams smos ci dgos// zla bzhis lus rul srog 'chad nges// de dag drag sngags me dang 'dra// ting 'dzin ma yengs smra gcad bzlas//
139a3(sha): oM ka la ti pa tsa nA ga ra rak+kha rA dza/ tsa na d+ha ma hA pa khre pa ya/ ti kra la ya/ ka la ba ri la tsi ti dza la rgya sa/ tra ga thu ra tsi ta dzA la khrag skyugs/ sha traM da ra da ra/ dgra
139a4(sha): bo tsit+ta tshal pa tshal pa/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA ga rak+ka rA dza/ sha tru snying khrag thum ri la/ mA ra ya rbad/ drag po'i las sbyor gang byed dang // snying
139a5(sha): bzhi ma nor las byas na// las rnams 'grub par the tshom med// klu rgyal mdze nag 'khor lo 'dis// gang la bskor kyang rlag par byed// sngags pa dam nyams
139a6(sha): dbang ma thob// rdo rje slob dpon thugs ma mnyes// drag sngags ma grub man ngag med// rang la ldog pa'i rtags byung na// log pa'i 'phar gnon sbyor ba bya//
139a7(sha): sbal sbrul sdig pa kha gdangs dang // pa dmar glang dmar ru 'dar 'bu// sbrul chen brang brdung ngu ba dang // 'khor lo 'bar ba mthong na bzlog/ de dus log pa 'phar
139b1(sha): gnon bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal gshin rje gshad// dbu la bya rgyal khyung chen lding // gser lus 'khor lo mtshon gshog pa// rdo rje'i mchu la gnam lcags
139b2(sha): sder/ thugs khar rdo rje gsang bdag bsgom// mthing nag rigs drug sbrul gyi sa brgyan// khros tshul rdo rje sbrul zhags bsnams// thal chen phag tshil lus byug/
139b3(sha): bdug/ spu dang bla ba'i go bgo brab// klu rgyal 'chi bdag nag po ni// 'khor bcas bka' nyan las byed mngags// klu yi dug gsum shing lcug bra ba// srid
139b4(sha): ba'i klu gnyen gdug pa can// ma lus khro rgyal gshed po yis// sprul pa'i khro chung bsam mi khyab// skar ltar 'khrug pa rnams kyis dkrug/ nyin mtshan po mo ste
139b5(sha): dkrug bya// klu rnams dbang med las la bcug/ gnas sa dkrug nas dgra srog gcod// rang la ldog pa dgra la 'gro// des na log pa 'phar non no// drag
139b6(sha): sngags me lce gong ltar brdeg/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ klu la gtad pa'i le'u ste lnga brgya dgu bcu tham pa'o// // de nas
139b7(sha): sa ma rA dza yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// 'jam dpa la thugs kyi 'od zer las// spros pa'i khro bo dregs pa can// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
140a1(sha): rten pa'i// cha bzung sprul pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// chu 'khyags dbab pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsol
140a2(sha): pa sa bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas pa sha da khyed nyon cig/ khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po yis// ya ma rA dza myos byed 'bar// dmar po ral pa tsha ra dgu ste//
140a3(sha): drag po gshed chen bzhi rnams bskul// de ni las kyi gshin rje bzhi// chos kyi rgyal po ya ba ti// a ba glang mgo bdud 'joms rje// rang dbang med par
140a4(sha): las la bskul// des ni tshangs pa drag po dang // nye dbang khyab 'jug las la bskul// des ni lha bdud ma mo klu// dmu btsan la sogs sde brgyad kyi//
140a5(sha): / dregs pa can rnams las la 'jug/ de yang ji lta bu zhe na// khro rgyal ga shin rje gshed po yi// thugs las sprul pa'i gshed chen bzhi// ya ma rA dza las
140a6(sha): mkhan sprul// gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po yin// de yi sprul pa tshangs pa lha// myos byed 'bar ba las mkhan sprul// gshin rje a pa glang mgo can//
140a7(sha): de yi sprul pa drag po yin// ar+ya dmar po las mkhan sprul// gshin rje ya ba ya ti rje// de yi sprul pa nye dbang po// ral pa tshar dgu'i las mkhan sprul//
140b1(sha): gshin rje rdo rje bdud 'joms rje// de yi sprul pa khyab 'jug yin// de dag las mkha na sprul pa ni// gling bzhi kun la dbang sgyur ba'i// lha bdud rgyal po
140b2(sha): gnod sbyin dang // dmu pa tsan srin po klu sa bdag/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma mo dang // sra ni mo bdud mo stong khri 'bum// sde brgyad pho mo thams cad
140b3(sha): do// gshin rje gshed pos gshed bzhi bskul// gshed bzhis las kyi gshin rje bskul// las kyi gshin rjes lha bzhi bskul// lha bzhis
140b4(sha): snang sred lha 'dre bskul// srid pa gsum gyi rtsi 'bras la// chu 'khyags bsgral pa'i skyo 'dung 'bebs// tshangs pas sum cu rtsa gsum nas//
140b5(sha): tshangs ris man chad 'khrug par byed// dbang phyug chen po rgyal chen bzhi// ri bdun rol mtsho 'khrug par byed// drag pos gling bzhi 'jig rten kham//
140b6(sha): lhag sa ri tshun chad 'khrug par byed// khyab 'jug de kun par snang khams// nyi zla dang ni gza' skar 'khrug/ de 'khor lha srin sde brgyad dang // las
140b7(sha): kyi ma mo mkha' 'gro yis// sa yi steng nas klu dang gnyan// sa bdag yul rnams 'khrug par byed// de ltar 'jig rten kun dkrugs nas//
141a1(sha): chu 'a khyags bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// de ltar dregs pa'i lha rnams ni// smi na ma khro ga nyer glog ltar 'gyu// zhal gyi rnga ma sku
141a2(sha): 'brug sgrogs pa// spyan nas khrag gi thog gzer 'bebs// shangs nas rlung na tshub mar 'khyil// tshems nas gnam lcags bu yug 'bebs// zhal gyi ngang rlangs
141a3(sha): sprin du 'thibs// ljags dang gzi mdangs glog tu 'gyur// ga nam nas bskul pa'i 'brug chen sgrogs// zhal cha ba chu 'khyags spyi 'dang 'bebs// srid gsum
141a4(sha): thog ser bskal pas 'gengs// de ltar thog ser 'bebs byed pa// gzhi ni klu yis rting pas klu gdug bsdigs// dmag dpon gshin rjes byed pas gshin rje
141a5(sha): bsgrub// dbang ni lha yis byed pas lha rgod gdul// g.yos ni ma mos byed pas ma mo brten// rgyab nas bdud kyis byed pas bdud rnams dkrug/ rgya ba ni gza' yis/
141a6(sha): byed pa sa gza' rgod bskul// sna 'dren gnod sbyin byed pas gnod sbyin rba da// byad mkhan lha ma yin gyis byed pas lha min bkol// kha lo dri zas sgyur bas dri za mngag/
141a7(sha): phung bar srin pos byed pas ga za na la dab pa// de ltar drag po'i lha rnams kyis// gang la dmigs pa'i yul khams su// chu 'khyags thog ser bskal pa 'be bya//
141b1(sha): sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi snying po las/ lha ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu pa'o//
141b2(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// de dag mngag pa'i sbyor ba bshad// dben la nyams dga'i dur khrod dben// lha srin thams cad 'du gnas su// rten 'brel
141b3(sha): sa la maN+Dal rtsig/ gang 'bebs yul gyi rdzas kyis byug/ de stangs thod pa mtshan ldan du// 'bru sna tshogs dang sha chen dang // sha sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bca'//
141b4(sha): mon pa'i rabs chad nag po 'am// thod pa mtshan ngan gling bzhi'i bar// gshin rje bzhi yi rten pa'i rdzas// las byed bsregs pa'i rdzas dgod de// gli gcig
141b5(sha): la ni tshangs pa'i rdzas// khyi dkar sna dmar snying la dgod// gling gcig la ni khyab 'jug rdzas// tsa ra rog po'i tsit+ta dgod// gling gcig dbang phyug chen po'i rdzas//
141b6(sha): mi yi snying chen sbram po dgod// gling gcig dag la khyab 'jug rdzas// thog gi bu yug thog lkugs dgod// gzhan yang dug sna khrag sna tshogs// lcags phye zangs phye/
141b7(sha): gu gul gnag/ nyungs kar mngag la thod par blugs// de nas sngags pa ting nge 'dzin// rnam par mi rtog ngang nyid las// 'jam dpal ya ma n+ta kar bsgom//
142a1(sha): thod pa gzhal yas dur khrod gnas// de ru las kyis gshin rje bzhi// tshangs pa dkar po be tshon thogs// drag po mgo dgu dud ka ba/
142a2(sha): zor ba zhag pa ro smad sbrul// nye dbang dmar nag thod khrag 'phen// khyab 'jug nag po ral gri thogs// gnam lcags thog gi bu yug ma// nag mo ban d+ha rak+ta 'thor
142a3(sha): de bzhi'i sring mo ma mo'i gtso// de ltar gsal bsgoms spyan drang bstim// de nas drag po'i sngags bzlas pas// thugs las 'od zer bsam yas 'phros//
142a4(sha): 'od zer de dag thams cad kun// las kyi gshin rje ma mo dang // gnod sbyin dregs pa ba sa ma mi khyab// lag nas dbyug tho zor ba thogs// 'jig rten khams
142a5(sha): rnams thams cad khengs// zor ba rnga bzhi ber ka sa rdung // ral gris 'thub cing skon pas 'phyag/ lo thog thams cad rlag par byed// de ltar bsgoms la drag
142a6(sha): sngags bzlas// drag sngags sgra gcad bzlas lugs ni// dang por yang snying rtsa sngags drang // de nas bsgrub pa'i drag sngags drang // mtha' mar dbab pa'i
142a7(sha): drag sngags drang // de grub rtags kyi rim pa ni// chu rdzing chen por bskyil ba dang // 'khyags pas gtams dang chu chen 'brug/ mi nag mang po bud med mang
142b1(sha): skya shar lo thog rdzi ba dang // dgra yul chu klung chen pos khengs// 'di 'dra'i mtshan rtags byung ba dang // gong gi thod pa'i rdzas rnams dang // 'khor lo khyi nag
142b2(sha): re rog po// lug nag po yi ga yang gzhir gtum// dgra yul lha mchod rten nam// yul lha'am klub ma btsan dag la// gza' rgod rgyu dus rta dmar gzhug/
142b3(sha): phur pa'i zor gyi sa lam drangs la// zor khrag yul dbus rten la brteg/ dus ni spyi ba dang chu 'khyags kyi// bskal pas dgra yul brlag par 'gyur//
142b4(sha): spogs na rten la sreg thab bya// srid pa gsum gyi lham srin// 'khrug nas chu 'khyag ri ltar gtibs// o a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/
142b5(sha): ya ma badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da d+ha sarba duSh+ya na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ ru tra phro ma/ dud kar phro ma/ shu ti phro ma/ yu ma phro ma/ badz+ra kha rin tra b+h+yo/ ya ma pa tra ha sham
142b6(sha): na b+h+yo/ d+harma d+hA du b+h+yAM/ de ba yak+ka pra dun b+h+yo/ rag sha pra ka mo na b+h+yo/ nA ga hu ya stan ya b+h+yo/ yag sha kha rag dun b+h+yo/ tI yag sha shag tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu dun
142b7(sha): b+h+yo/ oM a kr-i taM ka ya man ta ka ya ma ra dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yau ni ra sa k+She ya dza na ra ma ya/ hri ti a mu ka/ yu lo cha ga mor drag tu tsar
143a1(sha): shar ti phrom dun phro ma da ka ra phro ma/ shu ti phro ma/ ya ma phro ma/ sha ra ra shal lta pho ba ya/ ya ma ra dza dun b+h+yo/ ra ra ril ril shar shar ma ma ril ril//
143a2(sha): nA ga raM raM/ sa du raM raM ri la ril b+h+yo phob/ ya ma ra dza ra ra/ ru lu ru lu ling ling hri la hri la du shug ri la sa ri las cho la shar shar/ sha ra ra ra che ge mo'i lo tog la ma rA ya phaT/
143a3(sha): long long 'ubs 'ubs hri la hri ya/ ri las lo la phrom phro ma/ tor tor sha ra shar che ma tsham nal nal lo la mA ra ya phaT/ dregs pa pho mo kun 'dus pa'i// skyi 'dang chu
143a4(sha): 'khyags drag sngags yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ chu 'khyags sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gcig pa'o// /
