143a5(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'khrul 'khor skyi 'dang 'di bshad do// rnal 'byor dpal po mnyam bzhag ste// sngags pazlas dur khrod ro/
143a6(sha): ras sam// shing lo'am gro ga shing shun la// skye tshe lan tshwa nim pa dug/ ro sol ra khrag skyil 'dang rdzas// lhor bltas bya rog sgro rdzas bris// mu khyud thig
143a7(sha): skor rim pa bzhi// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// yang log drug gnyis
143b1(sha): chu ri'i mkhar// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su skyi ba dang rlung chen 'bru// gshed gdug thugs kyi dmod pa yin// 'khrul mig bzhi la gshed chen
143b2(sha): bzhi// thugs kyi snying po mtshon pa dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu gnyis la// srog gshas dmod pa'i rgyal po dgod// yang logs chu ri'i khang pa la//
143b3(sha): skyi ba dang drag po'i mtshon cha dgod// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// chu ri khang pa shar phyogs su// gshed chen ya ma rA dza dang // chos kyi rgyal po'i snying po ste//
143b4(sha): ma las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// ru dang tra dang phro ma dang gsum// lha chen tshangs pa'i mtshon cha ste// shar phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang // shar phyogs
143b5(sha): lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// chu ri khang pa lho phyogs su// gshed chen myos byed 'bar ba dang // a ba glang mgo'i snying po ste// me las skyi 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros
143b6(sha): dung dung dkar dang phrom dang gsum// drag po gza' rgod mtshon cha ste// lho phyogs lo thog bcud la dbang // lho phyogs lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// chu rmi kha
143b7(sha): la nub phyogs su// gshed chen Ar+ya dmar po dang // ya ba ya ti'i snying po ste// ha las skye 'dang 'bru gsum 'phros// shu dang ti dang phro ma dang gsum// dbang
144a1(sha): phyug nye dbang mtshon cha ste// nub phyogs thog dang bcud la dbang // nub phyogs lo thog 'joms par byed// chu ri kha la byang phyogs su//
144a2(sha): gshed che na ral pa tshar dgu dang // rdo rje bdud 'joms snying po ste// k+Sha las skyi ba dang 'bru gsum 'phros// ya dang ma dang phro ma dang gsum// khyab 'jug nag po'i
144a3(sha): mtshon cha ste// byang phyogs lo thog bcu la dbang // byang phyogs lo thog 'bras bu 'joms// tha ma'i chu ri zlum po la// dbab pa'i drag sngags grangs med bskor//
144a4(sha): rtsibs mtshan ser srun yul ming bri// sngags bdag bzhi yi 'phang bar gzhug/ 'khor lo byin rlabs rta dmar gzhug/ rta thod zor gyi thod pa la// dbab sngags
144a5(sha): 'khor lo ltar du bri// dbus su rtsa sngags de phyir bsgrub// tha mar dbab sngags drag pos bskor// dbus su yul gyi ming bri'o// nyi ma bzhi ru 'khor lo bskor//
144a6(sha): spogs na g.yon bskor stag mchongs bya// ga nam gzer gsang ba zhes bya ba// dmigs pa'i yul gyi nam mkha' la// chu 'khyags 'khor lo chen po bsgom//
144a7(sha): de yi steng du lha rnams ni// skyi 'dang chas dang ldan par bsgom// de las sprul pa mang 'phros pas// dgra yul pho mo thams cad kun// rang dbang med par las la
144b1(sha): bskul// lo thog thams cad rlag byed bsam// chu rgod 'khyags pa'i 'khor lo las// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i ri bstims nas// lo thog rdul du brlag par
144b2(sha): ba sam// bdag nyid ya man ta ka yis// las kyi gshin rje gshed bzhi bskul// des ni dregs pa rnam pa zhi bskul// lha chen tshangs pa'i thugs kha nas//
144b3(sha): raM las me yi 'khor lo 'phros// dregs pa gza' rgod thugs kha nas// ya las rlung gi 'khor lo 'phros// dbang phyug nye dbang thugs kha nas// baM las chu yi
144b4(sha): 'khor lo 'phros// khyab byed nag po'i thugs kha nas// trag las ga nam lcags 'khor lo 'phros// bar snang khams su yig 'bru bzhi'o// 'byung ba ma
144b5(sha): grang 'thabs pa las// 'byung ba me tshu rlung 'khrugs nas// ma mo rnams kyi byan mkhan byas// dgra yul skyi 'dang chu rlung gis// brlag cing stongs par byed par
144b6(sha): bsam// des na yul khams rlag par 'gyur// gzhan yang dregs pa can rnams kyi// 'jig rten khams su chu 'khyags kyi// bskal pa dbab pa'i las bya
144b7(sha): na// ban d+ha dmar cod gling bzhi par// 'bru nag sna tshogs gtor ma bca'// de la dur khrod sol chen byug/ bag phye'i klu gzugs sna tshogs bya// sngon dmar
145a1(sha): kha dog sna tshogs bsgyur// sbal sbrul lcong mo'i rdzas kyi bsre// de dag kun kyang gtor mar gzhug/ khrug sna tshogs kyi zor kyang bca'//
145a2(sha): de nas ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// drag sngags mtshe na rtags byung byung bzlas// yug skra la sogs thag khre'u// sbrul du bsams la thod par dkri// 'bebs na gza' rgod
145a3(sha): rgyu dus la// klu yi chu mig ga nyan po ru// klad la gsum bskor 'o dod 'bod// gtor ma dang ni zor rgyab na// 'bros long med par yul khams kun// skyi' dang rlung
145a4(sha): gis khyer bar nges// ser ba tshogs khrid byed 'dod na// thod pa'i rdzas dang khrag sna tshogs// thal chen bsres la drag sngags bzlas// gang du 'gro bar rdzas khyer na//
145a5(sha): khyi bzhin shul du 'breng bar 'gyur// gang 'dod tsam na khrag sna dang // thal chen thod pa'i rdzas gtor bas// skyi 'dang chen po dbab par nges// gzhan yang chu 'khyags/
145a6(sha): 'bebs 'dod na// sngan ma mo skyes phyi ma pho// skyes pa'i bud med mngal khrag dang // ra dug re lcags spyang tsher rtsa// bong nga nag por rog khrag/ khyi na ga khrag
145a7(sha): sbyar dred shun gtums// ting 'dzin gsal bsgom drag sngags bzlas// rtags thon gza' rgod rgyu dus su// dgra yul klu yi chu mig tu// byang du kha bltas rlung
145b1(sha): nag 'tshub// der bcug klu la chu mig dkrug/ rta rmig gis dkrug bra lcag brab// sngags bzlas chu 'khyags skyi 'dang gis// yul khams thams cad brlag par
145b2(sha): 'gyur// ya ma rag sha pra pa sar phob/ na gshed ma ram pho ba/ pu yu pu yu/ ya ya/ shar shar ka dun phob/ ra ga du na pho ba/ ra ka sha a bi ni phob/ bi bi shar shar
145b3(sha): phob mang ga ni mang ga ni pho ba/ su rab sha ga ti nA ga phaT phaT/ pi bi ri li ri li b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ su ru su ru/ oM phaT phaT/ nA ga li nA ga li/ dum bu dum bu/
145b4(sha): hu ya hu ya/ shar shar phob phob/ 'ur 'ur/ thug thug/ che mchem/ nal na la/ pr-i phreM/ shar shar/ hri la hri la/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phob phob/ dang por bsnyen pa rtsa ba'i
145b5(sha): sngags/ grub par bzlas te las byas na// chu 'khyags bskal pa'i spyi 'dang 'bebs// rnal 'byor dbang dang ldan pas spyad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa yang snying
145b6(sha): gsang ba'i rgyud la sa/ skyi 'dang 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// sprul pa rdo rje
145b7(sha): thugs las dgye// khro bo dag 'bar bas don bshad pa// drag po khyab 'jug nag po yi// drag sngags gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di// bstan pa gnyen po srung phyir
146a1(sha): bshad// 'dzam gling 'jig rten lo thog la// chu 'khyags skyi 'dang 'dab pa'o// drag po'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod byin cha'i dben
146a2(sha): gnas su// dge bcu tshogs dang sbyin gtor btang // yul sa'i stegs bu yul rdzas byug/ khru gang khru do rgya dang dpangs// mu gsum zla gam thod 'phreng bskor//
146a3(sha): mthing nag dmar po skam rlon spel// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldang khur bya// ra rog pad+mar snying la brten// thod pa mtshan ldan gling bzhi par// sha rus
146a4(sha): khrag rus btsos dang rjen// la phug til sman gtor ma bsham// 'khar gzhong dkar gsum mngar gsum dang // gu gul klu sman 'bras bu gsum/
146a5(sha): 'bras chen po yi gtor ma ba sham// rabs chad la sogs thod pa ru// mi rtar khyi mngal khrag sogs// dug dang sngo sna yungs kar gnag/ zir skye tshe
146a6(sha): zor thun rdzas// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad la// sngags bris dug khrag ngar blud la// gru gsum mthing nag dbus su gzugs// dus brgyad rang ra rdzas
146a7(sha): brgyad bca'o// yul ming dbyibs dang lha klu dang // ser srun ming dang lo thog sngo// bsnol gri'i thod par sngags dang bcas// de ltar dam rdzas 'tshogs par
146b1(sha): bya// bdag nyid khro rgyal chen por bskyed// rtsa ba'i snying po 'bum drang bstod// gru gsum dbus su hU las kyang // gza' bdud chen po mgo dgu pa//
146b2(sha): dud kha zor ba chu srin zhags// mgo lus mig khengs ro smad sbrul// glog 'byin 'brug sgrogs bu yug 'tshub// rlung nag chu 'khyags skyi 'dangs 'bebs//
146b3(sha): sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa bskyed// bdag thugs hUM las 'od 'phros pas// ri rab phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad nas// khyab 'jug nag po lo zan
146b4(sha): dgug/ dza dza stobs kyis spyan drangs bstim// rtsa sngags zhabs la mchod sngags btagaso// gtor ma sha khrag mchod pa dbul// nyin mtshan gnam
146b5(sha): sa gtor ma btab// yang na mchod pa'i las gzhung bsrang // khyab 'jug snying po rab sngags bskor// bdag nyid thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// 'phro
146b6(sha): 'dus mchod phul thugs dam bskul// bkrag mdangs mthu stobs bdag dbang 'dus// de ltar sum yar mchod dbul bzlas// smra bcad drod rtags
146b7(sha): tshad mas rabab// mi nag zor thogs rlung nag 'tshub// me 'bar sha rgal chu chan 'khrug/ dngos su mthong ba chu dri bya// de bzhin stong cho gas mchod pa dbul//
147a1(sha): dgra yul la sogs 'bras bu btab// dgra yul nam mkhar spyi 'dang gi/ chu 'khyags 'khor lo 'khyil cing 'phro// lha nyid gsal bas
147a2(sha): drag tu bzlas// lug khyu ser po dngos su 'bab// mi nag zor thogs lo thog rnga// skya shar ber thogs g.yul byed dang // skyi 'dangs sha rgal mang po yis// lung pa
147a3(sha): dmar zangs bkrus pa 'byung // 'khyag pa rgya mtsho rba rla ba sa 'tshub// rtags de byung nas dbab par bya// o ra hU la a kro ya ra la shag ti hri la hri la shig shig dun
147a4(sha): b+h+yo// oM pa sha mi ki du ru ma shi ki dza la ti a ta swAhA/ oM tsa pa ti ra hU la ma hA kro d+ha ka ta sha ra/ shalta shwa ra hUM phaT/ ya ma snying ya ma khrag ra hU la hri la tril shig
147a5(sha): shig phe na ya hri la b+h+yo/ su badz+ra yakra ke ta/ badz+ra yak+ka phro phro/ drag po dbab pa'i las dag ni// bdag nyid ye shes khro rgyal sku// las byed gza' rgod bka' sdod
147a6(sha): pa// gang byed kho dang sdongs la dbab// gang 'bebs yul gyi rten rdzas la// thun dang drag sngags brdeg cing dbab// tshes bzhi'i sod la nub phyogs nas//
147a7(sha): shar du kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs nag thog lcags phur pas brdeg/ nam mkha' dpangs stod kham nag sprin// nag mo 'jigs tshul ral pa can//
147b1(sha): thod pa'i khrag 'thor ma mor sprul// rlung khrag thog dang rdzi kha sgyur// ma ma sa ma ya tra ga rak+ka ma tri ga na sa kha ya ku ru/ te tso b+ha la a u ta ra ha ra da ra/ un ma na ni sh+tsA
147b2(sha): tru na sha ya ni dza dza pho ba/ ljang sngon chen po'i drag sngags so// tshes brgyud nyi dros shar lho nas// nub byang kha bltas drag sngags bzlas// nyungs kar bya rgod gshog/
147b3(sha): phur brdeg/ sngo skya gri thogs 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rlung zhon skyod byed dgra blar sprul// lto tshil sprin 'dra ser ba sgra// tri dkar dul dul/ snying khrag la ril ri la/
147b4(sha): chom chom rtsal thun shig lo thog mA ra ya dza phob// drang srong khros pa'i drag sngags so// bcu gcig 'jing la byang phyogs nas// lho ru kha bltas drag sngags bzlas//
147b5(sha): nyungs nag gri lcags phur pas brdeg/ nag po ri nag zhags pa thogs// rta na gzhon te bdud du sprul// sems can gzugs 'dra shing lo'i sprin// dus min mtshan
147b6(sha): ma mang po byung // ru tra tri ni ra tI san tri ya/ ma tri ya b+h+yo/ khaM kha so ba rba da/ lo thog la thu na dza ni dza/ pho ba/ rog ti bdud nag drag sngags so// bco lnga nyi phyed lho nub
147b7(sha): nas// byang shar kha bltas drag sngags bzlas/ sha rul khrag rul mchog phur brdeg// sngo sgyu mche gtsigs sdang mig bgrad// 'jigs byed za tshul mda' gzhu
148a1(sha): thogs// mdug shing g.yag 'dra'i sprin 'byung zhing // rlung nag 'tshub mar bcas te 'ong // ma hA tsan d+ha rag sha/ tri tha tri mA ra ya thA/ ru tri m+bA ra ya/
148a2(sha): lo thog la tri b+h+yo phob/ bi ti pa ta'i drag sngags so// bco brgyad nam phyed yol ba la// shar nas nub tu kha ltas bzlas// ngar khrag seng ldeng phur thun brdeg/ dmar po khrag
148a3(sha): thig dgra sta thogs// 'jigs tshul gang zhon dmu ru sprul// phying ba brkyang 'dra sprin nag 'khrug/ rmu tI tsan d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rakra thum ri li li/ kha sha ba
148a4(sha): raka sha sta thu ri li li phob// hA li ka li drug sngags so// nyi shu gnyis kyi nyi ma bskur// nub byang mtshams nas shar lhor bltas// sngags bzlas skye tshe rkang
148a5(sha): phur brdeg/ nag po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo thogs// dregs pa'i gtso bo gshin rjer sprul// srin mdog dmar nag hra la hra la po// glog dang 'brug
148a6(sha): sgra ches te 'ongs// ya ma rU dza yaM ra/ ya ma tsa na d+hA ri da dza la tsakra d+ha ra na sha ya/ dgra yul ni dum+bA ra ya phob phob cho mchom shig b+h+yo/ du ba mjug rings drag
148a7(sha): sngags so// nyi shu lnga yi skya rengs la// lho nas byang du kha bltas bzlas// tsa ra dmar po'i khrag thun dang // bya mtshal pu yi gshog phur brdeg
148b1(sha): dmar po sbrul zhags thogs pa 'jigs// sbrul nag 'khyil ba zhon nas rgyug/ sprin dmar hra la thibs glog dang bcas// nA ga rA man Ni na ya ya Ni na ta nA ga dza sha
148b2(sha): ti sa na d+ha ra shu na tsi ta b+hasmi ku ru da gra yul du b+h+yo pheb// khyab 'jug chen po'i drag sngags so// nyi shu dgu yi nyi ma mdung gang na// byang shar mtshams nas lho nub kha
148b3(sha): bltas zlas// sha ru la khrag rul ra mchi na thun du brdeg/ dud kha mgo dgu ro smad sbrul// zor ba chu srin zhags thogs sprul// rlung nag 'tshub ma dud kha'i sprin
148b4(sha): 'brug 'byung // ma hA b+h+ye d+he pa tra bi nu tsan d+ha ru pi ni ra hu la dgra bo'i lo thog la b+huny+dza ho la hi he ka li ma hA tsan d+ha ma rA ya dza dza phog/ sgra gcan 'dzin gyi drag sngags so//
148b5(sha): tsa ba ti ra hU la phob// kri tI kro la sha phob/ ra dza thal ba ni phob/ hu ru hu ru phob/ ma ma raM ra ril ril phob// shar shalta nA ga phob/ nA ga li nA ga li phob/ rul nal
148b6(sha): dul na la phob/ ta ka ra dza ti pa tsi ti phob/ rak+ka dud phrom/ kar phro ma phob/ li tsarbad phrom pho ba/ drag po sngags kun spu gri yayin// de ltar drag po'i sngags bstan pa/
148b7(sha): 'di ni tho zhes lung ston nam// mtshan ma bzang po byung ba na// rta ma yul rten bcud la gzhug/ gzer gdab drag po'i gsum nyid do// gzer gdab lo la drag tu
149a1(sha): mdog/ dus brgyad drag sngags bsdebs la gtong // klu sogs lha btsan yul ba dag la// gdug pa can gyi shing ma spar// dkar dmar sngo thabs
149a2(sha): bskol la sbub// thal 'jim gtor zhing drag tu rmed// des ni chu 'khyag skye 'dang 'bebs// srid pa 'jig pa tsam du 'byung // dam tshig dbang thob the tshom med//
149a3(sha): drag po'i spyi 'dang sbyor ba 'dis// gnams thams cad 'khrug par byed// dus kyi bskal pa'i skyi 'dang 'bebs// ri rab bskul zhing rgya mtsho bskol// chu rgod 'khyag
149a4(sha): pa ra tir gtibs// gang dmigs lo thog rdul du rlog/ rtsi thog bcud sdud rno dpal mtshon// 'phra men las kyi sbyor ba can// gang 'dod nges par 'grub par 'gyur//
149a5(sha): yang gsang brnag pa'i las su bshad// 'jam dpal khri drag stong gsang ba'i rgyud las/ chu 'a khyag drag po'i le'u ste drug brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// /
149a6(sha): / de nas sprul pa'i rdo rje yis// khyab 'jug las kyi sbyor ba bshad// sbrul sngon dag gi shun pa yi// nang du rten 'brel rdzas blugs la// yul lha yul srung
149a7(sha): ser srun gyi// ming rus klu gnyen la sogs gzhug/ thod pa kha sbyar ga'u ru// 'khyil ba'i tshul du btsugs byas la// yul rdzas maN+Dal steng du bzhag/ sha rul
149b1(sha): ha ru la khrag rul dang // ra mchin btsos rjen gu gul gnag/ la phug tel sgog pa dang 'thun// sngags bzlas mtshan mo gdab par bya// dkar gsum mngar gsum
149b2(sha): klu sman tshogs// gu gul 'bras chan ma dang mthun// sngags bzlas nyin zhing gdab par bya// ra rog mi snying rang gi rdzas// sngags bzlas dgongs ka nam nangs gdab//
149b3(sha): gri thod 'khar gzhong nang du blugs// ye shes khro bo'i sku gnas te// khyab 'jug sde brgyad las la mngag/ dus tshod brgyad la gtor ma sbyin// dmigs pa'i lo /
149b4(sha): thog bsam la dbul// grub rtags mthong nas thun bra ba dbab// stong thon ga bur rdzas kyis brab// de nas lha srin sde brgyad kyis// sprul pa drag sngags brgyad//
149b5(sha): kyis brdeg/ zla gcig dus brgyad phyogs nas gdong // ling ga gang rgyu'i gdong phyogs bzhag/ thun rdzas brub cing phur pas gdab// ches grangs thim nus
149b6(sha): grub rtags 'byung // sngags par mchod cing gtor ma dbul// tra ka raka sha ra ka mo hI la sha gar+tha da/ ser hI la shar b+h+yo/ nal bu dang ni dme sha'i gtor ma sbyin//
149b7(sha): ma mor sprul po'i drags sngags so// oM a le ma b+h+yoru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha hil shar b+h+yo/ rgya tshes rtsi ma rar lug dkar// sha khrag 'o ma'i gtor ma
150a1(sha): sbyin/ dgra lha'i rgyal mo'i drag sngags so// oM pa sha mi ki ra hu la hUM shag shar shar hril b+h+yo/ ra lug nag po'i sha khrag dang // 'bru nag po yi
150a2(sha): gtor ma sbyin// bdud nag sprul pa'i drag sngags so// oM ser shar khrag la mu sha gtubs swA hA rak+ka se b+ho/ sha chen sha sna'i gtor ma sbyin// srin po sha zan drag
150a3(sha): sngags so// o ra tA thun/ shag thum ril ra shar b+h+yo/ ra rgya lug sma ga smug bya yi/ sha khrag 'bru sno'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa dmu yi drag sngags so//
150a4(sha): ya ma rA dza ra raM hri la hri shA ra raM b+h+yo/ mi sha rta sha bdud rtsi khrag/ sbyar ba 'bru sna'i gtor ma sbyin// sprul pa gshin rje'i drag sngags so// oM nA ga hri la shag sen
150a5(sha): shag sang du na sa ma ya hri la b+h+yo/ klu sma na da kar ga sum mang ra gaM su ma dang // ra da ma ra sha khrag gtor ma sbyin// klu pa tsa na spul pa'i dra ga sngags so// o ya ma
150a6(sha): snying ya ma khrag ra hu la hri la hri la shig shig sen se na ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo/ raM raM hri la hri la b+h+yo/ rdzas kun 'tshogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i drag sngags
150a7(sha): so// de ltar drag sngags rdzogs pa dang // sbrul sngon zhing dbul klu la gzhug/ ga na ma gzer sa gzer bar gzer gsum// rtse bskyed dbus dang kha 'dren
150b1(sha): tshul// dmar ring dus la zor 'phang dbab// dkar thab dmar thab sngo thab gsum// gsum du bcas la gcig tu dbu la// 'dis ni chu 'khyags skyi 'dang
150b2(sha): 'bebs// pha ni srin po'i drang song ste// ma ni klu mo ha sha ma tri// bu ni nag po ra hu la// ya ba ni yag sha glog 'phreng can// yum ni sbal mgo khrag mig ma//
150b3(sha): bu ni gza' bdud ke'u kang bdag/ gnam lcags lce' ba bi rmu rdo dang // chu 'khyags mi phyugs nad 'bebs so// dug sna khrag sna gu gul gnag/ zangs
150b4(sha): 'khar thog lcags phye ma la// bsngags te yul gyi lha rten dang // chu mig gnyan po la sbas na// yul de ring po mi thogs par// skyi ba dang rlung gis 'khyer//
150b5(sha): bar 'gyur// rdzas de dag la ril bur byas// sngags bzlas dgra yi khang pa gram sba// khang thog sbas te zor brgyapa na// khang pa 'jig cing 'gas par
150b6(sha): 'gyur// rdzas de dag la sngags btab ste// chu mig byang bltas nang sbas na// gang 'dod shwa dang ser ba 'ong // srin rdzo 'khar ba thog lcags la/
150b7(sha): sngags bzlas dug rgod sna sbyar te// brag nag byang ba lta so gseb sbas te// rdzas zong don po'i mkhar la brdeg/ drag po'i thog chen 'bebs par 'gyur//
151a1(sha): chu srin sder mo 'bru sna tshogs// 'brug rus khrag sna la mngags te// 'og tu sbas te phyogs bcur gtor// ser ba khrag tu 'bab par
151a2(sha): 'gyur// dred zhab mang ga ya ti la// sngags bzlas gtor na thog bzlog 'gyur// nyungs kar rdzas sbyar sngags bzlas te// gtor sha rgal dang ser ba bzlog
151a3(sha): de dag sbyor ba'i las yin no// gzhan yang gnam lcags 'bar ba yi// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad pa ni// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa gong bzhin du//
151a4(sha): bsnyen pa'i drod rtags thob pa des// khyad par gnam lcags dbab pa ni// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa dang // mon thod srubs drug kha sbyar te// gri khrag dug
151a5(sha): snas drag sngags bri// mi phyugs thog grir shi ba yi// snying dang khrag sna khrag sna tshogs// thog lcags gri lcags khro chu dang // gser zangs 'khar ba lcags
151a6(sha): phye rdul// 'brug skyugs glog rdzas ra rog khrag/ thog grir shi ba'i sha rus khrag/ dug sna tshogs dang gri khrag blugs// thod pa'i dkyil du sde brgyad dbab sngags
151a7(sha): bri// mtha' mar dgra bo'i ming rus lo khams bri// rgyu drug ling ga ming byang thod par brnag/ nyungs kar nyungs nag skye tshe'i thun gyis brag/ ling ga sgyur zhing sde
151b1(sha): brgyad sngags thun brdeg/ zhing chen pags la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri// dbus su brnag pa'i rtsibs la sde brgyad sngags// bkod la sngags bzlas rtags
151b2(sha): 'di 'byung // rdzas la me 'bar rdzas zhu me stag 'thor// tseg sgra dngos su byung na 'khor lo thod par bcas// thog rta brnag pa'i mkhar gyi 'gram le swa//
151b3(sha): ki kang rgyu dus brgyad la thog zer dgra la 'phang // gri mda' 'ug srin khra yi sgra yis sgron// gri thor mde'u bcug la mda' zor thod zor 'phang // gri thod
151b4(sha): mde'u bcug la mda' zor thod zor 'phang // lha dang sprul pas thog chen bskal ba 'babs// dgra bo lus sogs rdul phran tsam du brlag/ 'dis ni gnam
151b5(sha): lcags thog chen nges par 'bebs// 'ur che ma mA ra ya nise nis kha la rbad du dza dza/ badz+ra dz+wA la ra mA ra ya rbad/ ra hU la ma hA kha la rag shra hri lu hI la 'brug
151b6(sha): 'brug thog thog ru ma thog ru ma thog cha ma che ma shad shed na la nal b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ke'u kang b+h+yo/ drag por pho ba/ thog thog tshal tshal/ thum thum/ ril li li rbad rba daM/
151b7(sha): srog la nal la nal shig shog mA ra ya phaT/ gnam lcags tho ga tshon sbyor bar bshad// gsad pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni// gong bzhin bsnyen bsgrub rtsa ba yi//
152a1(sha): bca' thabs la sogs rtags thob bya// khyad par phung sna'i 'brub khung la// dgu swA shi khrag sna tshogs byug/ de na rlabs chud gri thod du/
152a2(sha): rgyu rten drug gi ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag rdzogs// snying khar ming bris dpral bar rus// lte bar bla dgas snying kha raro nr-i// shi khrag gro ga la bris
152a3(sha): gzhug/ sngags pa ye shes khro bo'i sku// khyab 'jug las mkhan sdongs la brdeg/ ling ga dgra bo dngos su gsal// thun rdzas nad mtshon tsha tshur 'phros//
152a4(sha): lus srog rdul phran tsam du brlag/ gsal bas ling ga bsgyur zhing bzlas// drag sngags brgya na thun brdeg cing // gtor ma gsum yang dgra bo yi// sha khrag
152a5(sha): dngos su dmigs la dbul// srog chags bsad bcing sha dgos na// grub pa'i rtags de sbyor kha bya// zla gcig dus tshod brgyad la brdeg/ thon nas ling ga 'khor
152a6(sha): lor bcas// khram thod dregs bcing gdugs pa yi// lha 'dre mi bzad pa la gtad// zhing chen shun la dug khrag gis// rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo dbus su ming //
152a7(sha): rtsibs brgyad drag sngags chen brgyad dgod// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo srog gcod bsam// dus brgyad kha gso bor 'phang bskul// des ni gang yang srog gcod 'gyur/
152b1(sha): srog la hu la bruM ril tsit+ta shag rbad mA ra ya dbugs la thums thums/ snying tshal pa mA ra ya rbad/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ laM su baM snyam pa ya nan/ lha yi tshe dang ldan pa yang /
152b2(sha): skad cig yud la gsod 'gyur na// srog chags gzhan la smos ci dgos// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las/ khyab 'jug chen po dreg sngags
152b3(sha): kyi le'u ste drug brgyu lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas sangs rgyas spyi dpal mchog/ bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// gsang bdag rdo rjes yang
152b4(sha): gsol ba// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags ba dag/ chos sku'i ngang las gzugs skyo bzhengs// khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka'i// thugs kyi snying po mchog 'dus
152b5(sha): pa'i// drag sngags sbyor ba bshad du gsol// de skad gsol bas yang gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bdag la sogs nyon// dpal chen he ru ka la sogs//
152b6(sha): khro bo 'dus pa'i drag sngogs ngas bshad do// chos nyid skye med rnam par dag/ rang byung ye shes rang gsal dang // mu mtha' dngos med ma bcos pa// chos kyi
152b7(sha): dbyings nyid skye 'gag med// gdod nas gnas pa'i bde chen po// de nyid ngang las rang shar ba// gdul bya thugs rje gdul dka'i phyir// zhi dang khros pa'i sgra ru
153a1(sha): snang // de nyid gdul bya'i sems can la// thugs rje chen po gnyis su skyes// theg pa thun mong thugs rje gsum// 'gro drug sems can thams
153a2(sha): cad kun// sdug bsngal dang bral bde la dgod// sems can la dmigs thugs rje'o// bdag med gnyis su dag par gsal// chos la dmigs pa'i thugs rje'o//
153a3(sha): chos kun rang bzhin dngos po med// dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje'o// thun mong ma yin thugs rje bzhi// rtag pa rgyun du skye ba ni// chu bo chen po'i gzhung dang 'dra//
153a4(sha): rang bzhin shugs kyis skye ba ni// nyi ma'i snying po sprin med 'dra// yul dang phrad pas skye ba ni// 'gro bzangs rgyan gyis bskyegs pa 'dra// bskul zhing gsol btab skye ba
153a5(sha): ni// smran 'bangs kha nyin sdug bsngal 'dra// de ltar thugs rje cher skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i mdzod// rab 'byams bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs// /
153a6(sha): de dag snying po don dril ba// sangs rgyas khro rgyal kun 'dus pa'i// drag sngags don kun 'grub byed 'di// thun mong gang brtsams las rnams 'grub// khyad par bla med
153a7(sha): byang chub thob// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas spyad// de ma yin na dngos mi 'grub// de dag sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ri bo dgu 'dus ri phran 'dus// shar gyi mdangs 'phrog/
153b1(sha): nub zer len// ljon shing me tog dur khrod gling // rtse mo gnam rnyog lhun rdengs che// nyams dga' byin che'i gnas mchog der// dge bcu spyad cing sbyin gtor btang // mdo
153b2(sha): sde gsung bsgrags tshogs 'khor bya// gnas sa de nyid maN+Dal bya// chu gtsang sman spos bdud rtsis byugs// ni ra ba kha dog lnga phyis la// rigs lngar byin brlabs
153b3(sha): dkyil 'khor bri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi rtsibs bcu la// dbus mthing phyogs mtshon bzhi mtshams mdzes// rtsibs bcu dmar ser rtsibs mtshan ldang // bar khyams
153b4(sha): sgo bzhi phyogs bzhin te// shar dkar nub dmar lho ser po// byang ljang rtsig pa lnga dang ldan// 'dod yon pha gu dra phyed dang // rta babs lugs bzhin rdo rje me// lte ba
153b5(sha): thod rlon rtsibs bzhi skam// rtsibs bcu rdo rje'i ra bar ldan// dbus su thog lcags mchog pur dgod// he ru ka dpal yab yum bskyed// rtsibs bzhir gri lcags shi
153b6(sha): shing dang // seng ldeng mchog phur bzhi dgod de// rigs bzhi'i he ru ka ru bskyed// rtsibs bcur seng ldeng skyer ba sogs// phung po khro bcu yab yum bskyed// dur
153b7(sha): khrod rgyan 'gram bris sku dgram// dung chen mtshan bzangs nang nyid du// stang du cha mchog ha dru ka/ 'og tu kro d+hi shwa Ti yum// sku dang sngags bris rab gnas bya// nang
154a1(sha): du don chen sngags bris dang // bdud rtsi rin chen sman sna tshogs// gsang ba'i dam rdzas dbus su gzhag/ 'bru sna tshogs kyi gtor ma la/
154a2(sha): sha chen la sogs sha sna tshogs// brgyan pa snod bzang bskang mchod rdzas// bdud rtsi rak+ta phyi mchod lnga// gzhan yang phung sa gsum la sogs// ri rgod sa la klu
154a3(sha): chus sbyar// 'brung khung gru gsum sum brtsegs pa// khru gang rgyal mtho gang dpangs// kha khyer dang po thod pas bskor// bar ba rtser tsang srin mo 'gros// mtha'
154a4(sha): ma rigs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// nang du dug sku khrag sna bsku// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byugs// gzhan yang dri thod mon thod dang // spyang khu phag pa'i thod pa ru//
154a5(sha): yungs kar yungs nag skye tse dang // gri khrag mi rta khyi khrag sogs// dug rgod 'dug spyang dug sogs// rdo lcags zangs phye tsher ma'i tshogs// thod pa re ru ma 'dres
154a6(sha): bsham// dgra bsad rgyu rten drug la bya// bgegs gzir sa chu rtsa shing rdo// de la ling ga dbang po dang // ming byang snying po snying khar brnag/ mdze thod bcug la
154a7(sha): dong du brnag/ 'khor lo drag po bskor zhing bca'// de nas sngags pa dbang bgrod pas// dam srungs gdan bsam brtan par bya// chos nyid ma bcos skye med
154b1(sha): dbyings// sems nyid 'od gsal dag pa'i las// yi ge hUM dang rdo rje nyid// yongs su gyur las sku bskyed pa// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// khro rgyal
154b2(sha): che mchog he ru ka/ chos nyid ma bcos 'gyur med pas// sku mdog mthing nag rnga ma zhing brjid// dbu dgu theg pa dgu don ldan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
154b3(sha): dbus mthing rtsa// g.yas ser g.yon ljang sngo skya dbus// dbus ljang g.yas smyug g.yon dud kha// g.yas gsum 'dzum bzhad mche ba gtsigs// g.yon
154b4(sha): gsum tshems bsdams rngam pa'i gdong // dbus gsum zhal gdangs 'jigs tshul can// kun kyang spyan gsum sma ra ser// dbu skra kham nag thod skam
154b5(sha): brgyan// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma 'dres pa// bco brgyad stong nyid mtshon pa'i phyir// phyag rgya bco brgyad phyag mtshan ni// dang po rdo rje dung dmar 'khrug/ gnyis
154b6(sha): pa zhing chung snying sbram bsnams// gsum pazhing dbyug ril med pa skams// bzhi pa be con rgyu zhags bsnams// lnga pa zla ba nyi ma bsnams// drag pa khyung
154b7(sha): dang 'ug pa bsnams// bdun pa me dpung rlung 'khor lo// brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho khol// dgu pa rin chen ga'u bsnams// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa phyag rgya bzhi// /
155a1(sha): rnam thar brgyad ldan zhabs brgyad bgrad// thod rlon 'phreng ba'i do shal brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul dang rin po ches// dbu dang phyag zhabs
155a2(sha): snyan char brgyan// glang chen ko rlon zhing chen stod// stag gi sham bu rus pa'i brgyan// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyag che// khyab 'jug pad smad gdon du mdzad//
155a3(sha): nyi zla pad+ma gdan du 'bar// rdo rje gshog pa nam mkhar ldongs// me dpung glong na rnga ma brjid khro// snying po phyag rgya 'od du 'bar// chu las nya 'phar bzhin du bsgom
155a4(sha): g.yon na shes rab yum chen mo// dpal 'bar kro d+hi shwa ri ni// mthing na ga zhal gsum phyag drug ma// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// g.yas dkar
155a5(sha): g.yon dmar dbus mthing khro// dang po kha TA dung dmar stob// bar pa 'khor lo rgya gram bsnams// tha ma spu gri gsal shing 'dzin// btud de dge sbyor tshul
155a6(sha): du gzhug/ dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// dbu la kun tu bzang po bzhugs// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing //
155a7(sha): zhi ba'i tshul ston rgyan dang bcas// mnyam gzhag rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs// thugs kar badz+ra he ru ka/ rdo rje'i rigs mchog badz+ra he ru ka/ g.yas dkar
155b1(sha): g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje be con dgra sta g.yas// dril bu thod 'phreng dung dmar g.yon// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ phyag gi dpung pa g.yas pa la//
155b2(sha): de bzhin rigs mchog bud+d+ha he ru ka/ g.yas ser g.yon ljang dbus smug nag/ 'khor lo dbyug pa tri shul g.yas// zhing drabyug med pung sdig mdzub g.yon//
155b3(sha): he ru ka yi dpung g.yon du// rin chen rigs mchog rat+ne he ru ka/ g.yas mthing g.yon smig dbus ser nag/ rin chen ri rab sbrul zhags bsnams//
155b4(sha): nyi ma zla ba tho ba g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yas su// pad+ma'i rigs mchog pad+ma he ru ka/ g.yas sngo g.yon ser dbus dmar nag/ pad+ma rgyu zhags lcags
155b5(sha): kyi g.yas// zhing dbyug khyung khra ril mid g.yon// he ru ka yi bla g.yon du// las kyi rigs mchog karma he ru ka/ g.yas smug g.yon dkar dbus
155b6(sha): ljang nAg/ rgya gram ral gri gsal shing g.yas// rlung ri dgra sta sdigs mdzub g.yon// dur khrod sbrul rgyan rdzogs par ldan// dpal chen bla med he
155b7(sha): ru ka'i// mgur gyi mgrin par khro rgyal po// rdo rje gzhon nu mthing nag rngam// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
156a1(sha): dbus mthing zhal// dang po rtse dgu med dpung 'bar// bar pa rtse lnga kha tA ga/ tha ma ri rab phur pa 'dril// dur khrod rgyan cha rdzogs
156a2(sha): par ldan// nyi zla pad gdan me dpung 'bar// rdo rje srin po zhes bya ste// 'phrin las mdzad pa'i lho ru bshad// dpal chen bla med he ru ka'i// phyag gnyis
156a3(sha): zhabs gnyis sta zur gnyis// byin pa gnyis dang lte gsang du// ye shes khro bo chen po bcu// hU mdzad mthing nag rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje sngo nag pa
156a4(sha): con bsnams// stobs chen ser nag 'khor lo bsnams// rta mchog dmar nag pad+ma bsnams// mi g.yo ljang nag ral gri bsnams// bdud rtsi
156a5(sha): sngo nag rgya gram bsnams// dbyug sngon mthing skya dbyi ga pa bsnams// 'dod rgyal da kar po dgra sta bsnams// phyag rdor ljang nag rdo rje bsnams// gnod
156a6(sha): mdzes dud kha rdo rje bsnams// kun kyang dpa' sgeg rgod gshe 'jigs// glang chen thugs rje khyab pa'i gos// zhing lpags phyi nang gsang bar sdud//
156a7(sha): stag sham thabs mkhas 'phrin las gos// dur khrod chas brgyad sbrul rigs rgyan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// me dpung glong na brkyang bskum bzhugs// 6
156b1(sha): ka nyid thugs ka ru// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phro 'bar// de ltar gsal zhing 'dris bsgoms na// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos nyid dbyings kyi pho brang
156b2(sha): nas// ye shes khro bo de bzhin nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs gsol dang // phyi nang gsang mchod la sogs bya// de nas drag sngags rtsa ba'i 'dzag/
156b3(sha): drang zhing dgongs pa ma yengs bya// rdo rje snying po 'od 'phros pas// ye shes khro rgyal spyan drangs bstim// ye shes 'od 'phros chos kyi dbyings// gting mtha' med par
156b4(sha): khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas rdzogs longs sprul pa'i sku// phyogs bcu kun dang byang chub sems// kun la mchod sprul dngos grub bsdus// bdag gi sgo gsum sgrib
156b5(sha): sbyangs dag/ dngos grub byin rlabs 'dus par bsgom// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo mthu stobs can// ma lus rang srog dbang bsdus
156b6(sha): te// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ de ltar gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// rtsa ba'i drag sngags smra bcad pas// de nas ring po mi thogs par// sa chu ma
156b7(sha): rlung nam mkha' sogs// zad par skye mched lnga yang mthong // dam tshig gtsang zhing dbang rdzogs na// phyag rgya'i sku nyid mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas sku dang zhing
157a1(sha): khams dang // nyi zla dbang byed chos 'khor bskor// nam mkha' bdag 'dug 'od zer 'bar// mchod rten la 'dzeg rdo rje gsor// de sogs
157a2(sha): mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // bla ma slob dpon lung ston rab// rmi nyams mngon sum phyi nang gsang // sems gsal mngon shes che phra 'byung // bde ba'i ro myong
157a3(sha): nyams dga' ba// de btson mtshan ma bzang po 'byung // des ni byin rlabs dpag tu med// bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yi//
157a4(sha): gsang sngags rgyal po spyi 'dzab 'di// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur ba//
157a5(sha): de ni nga yis bshad par bya// o a a a/ d+har+m+ma kA ya dz+nyA na/ d+hA 'du badz+ra tsit+ta pa tra sa man ta sarba ta thA ga hri da ya garba/ d+har+m+ma sa ma pho ni ra ma kA ya bA ga tsit+ta badz+ra/
157a6(sha): d+hAd+ha du a/ hU sarba bud+d+ha kA ya ma hA kro d+ha shri he ru ka/ tsa na d+ha kro d+ha ya badz+ra ma hA pa pra u kra ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta kro d+ha rU dzA ya shrI he ru ka/ a ne a ne a n+we/ mahA
157a7(sha): badz+ra kro d+ha bo di sa tA ya kro d+ha ni/ hUM ka ra/ ya man ta ka/ ma hA ba la ya ha ya grib/ badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ bud+d+ha shri he ru ka/ rat+na shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma shrI he ru ka/
157b1(sha): karma shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra ki li ki la ya/ badz+ra rak+ka ma hA kro d+ha shrI badz+ra ku ma ra ya hU/ a N+ya a rtsa la/ a mri ta kuN+Da li nI la daN+Da/ Tak+ki rA dza/ badz+ra pA Ni/ su pa
157b2(sha): rA dza/ u ne u ne u ne/ badz+ra dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la kro d+ha/ pradz+nyA d+h+waM du pa mi ta ya/ kro d+ha shwa ri ba pra ya/ badz+ri ma hA sho ro sarba da du kro d+hi ma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu/ sarba/
157b3(sha): ma hA kro d+ha kro d+hi tsan d+har+m+ma b+h+yo dza dza/ chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// thabs dang shes rab kun 'dus pa'i// ye shes lhun rdzogs gsang sngags 'di// 'jig
157b4(sha): rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro rigs 'dzin dang // chos skyong mgon po bdun cu gnyis// 'jig rten dregs
157b5(sha): pa'i gtum po dgod// gang gis thos par gyur pa rnams// rab dga' shin tu yi rang mos// phyag 'tshal bskor dang las rnams byed// rnal 'byor gtsug khur
157b6(sha): ci bcol nyan// thal sbyar sbyangs ldan gnod pa sel// de yis dgra bgegs thal bar rlog/ chos kyi dbyings na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs sku rigs lnga'i
157b7(sha): sangs rgyas dang // zhing khams kun na bzhugs pa yi// sprul sku'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sa gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang
158a1(sha): rgyal thams cad kyis// gsan nas dgyes nas mnyes 'gyur te// gdug pa dbang bskur byin gyis rlobs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub
158a2(sha): 'bebs// byin rlabs mthu stobs dpag tu med// de nas ring po mi thogs par// bla med byang chub yang dag tho ba// yi ge 'khor lo'i sa chen non// 'jam
158a3(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las// rtsa ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal
158a4(sha): las kyi dngos grub bshad// sangs rgyas sku gsum thams cad kun// gdul dka' drag po gdul ba'i phyir// khro rgyal sprul pa kun 'dus pa'i// drag po
158a5(sha): sngags kyi sbyor ba la// las kyi dngos grub rnam pa gnyis// thun mong dang ni mchog nyid do// thun mong byin rlabs rnam pa bzhi// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung
158a6(sha): ba'i phyir// gsad pa me lce lta bu dang // bsrung ba rdo rje lta bu dang // phyir bzlogs ri lta bu dang // dbab la skyispyi 'dang lta bu'o// dang po gsad pa'i sbyor ba
158a7(sha): ni// 'brub khung thun la ling ga bca'// sngags pa khro rgyal 'dus par bsgom// 'brub khung srid pa'i khyams khang du// ling ga dgra bo dngos su bsam//
158b1(sha): bdag thugs 'od 'phros thun la thim// 'bru gsum khro tshogs 'jigs par bsam// dug sna sha za mtshon thogs bsam// khrug 'thung ma mo nad 'bebs
158b2(sha): bas ma// klad pa gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'thoms pa'i gshed// bskul bas klad rtsa gcad de myos// nyi dros nyi phyed khrag thun dpag/
158b3(sha): mgrin pa nga rgyal dregs pa'i gnas// lha min dbang po gsod pa'i bdud// bskul bas ngag rgyun mgrin rtsa bcad// nyi phyed yol mthar dug thun dbab// snying
158b4(sha): kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi rgod shan pa srog gi gshed// bskul bas rtsa bcad dran pa nyams// lte ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas// phyed yol dgongs
158b5(sha): par phyed thun dbab// dmyal ba'i dbang po gsod pa'i gnas// bskul bas srid pa'i rten rtsa bcad// mtshan mo srod dang nam gung dang // gung yol tho rangs
158b6(sha): bar dag tu// de bzhin rim pa thun bzhi dbab// ye shes lnga yi rang 'od 'bar// thun gyi rta skyon yul la bskyod// 'od kyis dug lnga gnas su 'joms//
158b7(sha): 'od de sgo dgu'i srog rtsar gzhug/ me rlung snying po dmar nag dbus// srog de 'phrog gcod yig 'bru bdun// phyogs bzhi steng 'og srog rtsar gnas/
159a1(sha): dkar nag snying dkyil zhu zhi khol// hUM gis 'phrog rtsa thums kyis gsod// dza yis 'gugs shing ya yis 'phrul// ra yis sreg cing ma
159a2(sha): yis gsod// rbad kyis srog gcod me 'bar gsod// sku lnga ye shes lnga ru smin// de dag drag sngags tsan dug 'dra// hU a ne a ne a ne/ sarba d+harma d+ha du bi
159a3(sha): shud+d+he ga ga na a b+hA wa/ d+harmA kA ya shu nu ta gar+b+ha/ sa b+hi ka ya rat+na a ti sa ba haM/ nirma ka ya b+hi sha de a hU sa ma na ta pa tra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra na/ badz+ra sa twa
159a4(sha): ni ra ma kA ya badz+ra shrI he ru ka ba ka bgra ta~M badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ ka ya kr-i d+ha/ bka kra ti/ tsita tsan d+ha badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ badz+ra rak+ki kro d+ha hUM/ prad+ha shrI he ru ka ta thA ga
159a5(sha): ta kro d+ha b+h+rU~M/ rat+na shrI hrI ru ka tsan dkri kro ta hUM/ pad+me shrI he ru ka/ mahA ba shang kro d+ha hUM/ kar+m+ma shrI he ru/ badz+ra yak+ka kro d+hAng+ku/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ d+hu kA ras
159a6(sha): tA ya/ ya man+ta ka h+yaM ti ka la ru pa ya/ ma hA pa la staM pa ya/ ha ya gri ba tsan d+ha ya/ ar+ya a tsi la ro tra na ya/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li rak+ka ya/ nI la dan
159a7(sha): a kra ya/ thak+ShI rA dzA tsa pa la ya/ badz+ra pA ni badz+ra rak+ka ya/ sum pa ra tsa ha la ha la/ badz+ra kI li kI la/ shrI ri badz+ra ku ma ra hUM/ ma hA kro d+ha u tshus ma
159b1(sha): kro d+ha badz+ra rakra/ dz+nyA na kro d+ha da sha pa la ti hU/ pradz+nyA sa man+ta b+hU tra ma h+yA kro d+hI shA ri ma ma dz+nyA na ta ki ni/ dza la sam ba ri/ kro tI ra ka sha/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo/ sa
159b2(sha): man dza/ ma hA kro d+hi nir ma badz+ra/ ma hA kro d+hi karma kr-i ta da kri ni b+h+yo dza hU~M/ sangs rgyas thams cad sprul pa yi// ye shes khro bo thams cad dang // dbyings kyi ma
159b3(sha): mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// kun 'dus snying po rtsa ba yi// gsang sngags rgyal po lhun rdzogs 'di// gang gis thos pa dbang du 'du// mos gus dad pas
159b4(sha): ci gsung nyan// bsad pa drag po'i ngan sngags 'di// me lce 'am tsan dug khol ma 'dra// badz+ra rak+ka thun ya rbad/ yag sha la thibs thums rba da/ kro d+ha
159b5(sha): raM shag snying rtsa rbad/ ru tra ra tsa srog rtsa la rbad/ ma ma tra ga rak+ka srog pa la thums ril rba da/ yag mo ka li thang thang snying khrag la rbad/ ra ka mo kro d+ha thun rmugs
159b6(sha): rbad/ karma DA ki ni sha na pa dgra po mA ra ya dza dza/ sha tru snying khrag la bi ril rbad/ tsit+ta tshal pa ba ril rbad/ dbugs la subs ya thum ril rba da/ srog la hur
159b7(sha): thams rba da/ srog la hur long rba da/ rak+ta rmugs thibs rbad/ dbugs la su bas thum sarba da/ tsit+ta brang sha ga rba da/ che ge mo mA rA ya yaM/ myogs myogs/
160a1(sha): thums thums/ rbad rbad/ dza dza/ sod sod/ gsang ba ngan sngags spu gri 'dis// rnam 'byor dam ldan dbang thob cing // rtsa ba'i
160a2(sha): snying po rdzogs gyur na// brag la brgya pa dang 'gas gyur na// srogs chags dag la smos ci dgos// dud 'gro gsad pa la sogs te// drod rtags
160a3(sha): mtshan ma byung ba na// gdug pa can la sogs par mnan// thun 'phang lo dus bzhin du sgrol// gsad pa rgod kyi sbyor ba yin// 'jam dpal khri drug
160a4(sha): spyong pa bstan pa'i snying po'i rgyud las/ bskul ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// phyir bzla
160a5(sha): so ri lta bu bshad// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten la// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas nyid// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// dregs pa pho mo'i rig
160a6(sha): sngags kyis// gnod byed sngags pa de nyid la// phyir la bzlog ste rang gshed dbab// de nyid gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// dbang thob dam tshig ldan pas
160a7(sha): spyad// rtsa ba'i snying po thams rdzogs nas// chos nyid rnam dag rang nyid las// dmar nag zla nyid yongs gyur las// badz+ra tsakra b+h+yAM brjod pas// mtshon
160b1(sha): cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// steng po ga rtsibs gnyis bcu bzhi ste// dbang drag stobs ldan dmar nag pa// shin tu rno la rgya cher bsgom// de nyid dbus
160b2(sha): kyi lte ba la// mthing nag hU yig yongs gyur pas// bskyed pa'i snying po sgra dbyangs kyis// bla med khro rgyal he ru ka/ ya ba yum gsal la rdzogs par bskyed//
160b3(sha): dbu la kun tu bzang po nyid// thugs khar badz+ra he ru ka/ mgrin par rdo rje gzhon nu bskyed// thugs las rtsibs la 'od 'phros pas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdon du
160b4(sha): gyur// de stengs thugs kyi snying po las// ye shes rang gsal 'od 'phros pas// snying po hUM yig bcu bzhir gyur// de dag yongs gyur rang sngags kyis//
160b5(sha): shar rtsibs bud+d+ha he ru ka/ lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka/ byang rtsi bas karma he ru ka/ steng rtsibs rdo rje hUM mdzad de// 'og rtsibs gnod mdzes/
160b6(sha): rgyal po'o// shar stod shar lho'i rtsibs gnyis la// gshin rje gshed dang stobs po che// lho stong lho nub rtsibs gnyis la// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dbyug sngon
160b7(sha): bo// nub stod nub byang rtsibs gnyis la// rta mchog dpal dang mi g.yo ba// byang stod byang shar rtsi bas gnyis la// phyag na rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil// de ltar rab
161a1(sha): tu gsal rdzogs nas// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched rlab// thugs las ye shes 'od 'phros pas// chos kyi dbyings nyid pho brang
161a2(sha): nas// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'i// mchod pa dbul zhing bdud rtse blang // bdag nyid gtso bo'i snying dbus su// 'khor le
161a3(sha): rtsibs bzhi dmar ser bsgom// lte bar badz+ra he ru ka/ rtsibs bzhir hU bzhi kha dog bzhin// rtsibs kyi kha la chags sdang bzhi// gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog dang //
161a4(sha): 'dod chags zhe sdang yig 'bru bzhi// a dkar ma ser raM dmar po// ha ni nag po bzhin du brtags// phyi yi 'khor lo'i kha rtsibs la// nyon mongs phung po lha yi bu//
161a5(sha): 'chi bdag bdud bzhi dkar ser dmar// nag po'i mdog ste dngos su na// dga' rab dbang phyug lha sbyin dang // nags kyi rgyal po mu khyud bzang // de nas phyi dang
161a6(sha): nang nyid du// yig 'bru bdud las rang 'od 'phros// chags sdang gnod byed bkug bsdus bstim// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rnon po de// drag tu sgra dang bcas par
161a7(sha): 'khor// de dag rdul phran tsam du bcad// byad sngags rbod gtong dgra dang bgegs// nad dang rims dang gnod byed rnams// gcad bya rdul phran tsam du rlag/
161b1(sha): de ltar drag sngags smra gcad bzlas// 'di lta bu yi 'khor lo yis// 'byung ba'i rgyun dang zlog 'gyur na// dam can rbod gtong smos ci dgos// rang srog rdo rje
161b2(sha): bzhin du 'gyur// nad bgegs rkyen gyis tshugs mi srid// nyon mongs chags sdang kun bcad nyon mongs gcod// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lo yin//
161b3(sha): bsad na rten drug gzugs la brdeg/ bsrung gzir rdzas kyi ling ga la'o// mthar ni rgyun srang mgon pos mnan// des na stobs chen rgyal po'ang 'joms
161b4(sha): gnod byed rnams la smos ci dgos// gzugs can dgra la ngos su gnas// gzugs med bgegs la bag chags tshul// dbang thob dam ldan sngags
161b5(sha): pa yis// rtsa ba'i snying po drod thob bya// de nas las sbyor gang brtsam 'grub// de ma yin na don mi 'grub// he ru ka dpal la sogs te// ye shes khro/
161b6(sha): / bo thams cad 'dus// de dag drag sngags 'di lha ste// sarba ta thA ga ta ya ni ra ma/ badz+ra kro d+hA rA dzA ya// ma hA pa la ti/ tsan da kri ta ya/ sarba sha trUM/
161b7(sha): man+ta pra lo ga po ta ya sa ma ti/ sarba duSh+mA/ Na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi tsu rna la bi tsu rna ya/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ bi dAn
162a1(sha): sa pa/ be dA na sa ya/ a bi tsu rna la/ a bi tsun pa/ tsakra tik+ta war+t+ti/ pra ta ka ri/ pra ta ka ri/ mA ra ya/ mA ra sa/ ku ru ku ru/
162a2(sha): shrI he ru ka/ ma hA kro d+ha badz+ra pa la/ da shra a kra ya/ b+h+ru~M b+h+rUM b+h+yaH/ ta s+ye pa/ ne pa tha thu/ pra hi ki ra/ hU hU hU/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra rakr-i dgra srog la hu ra thumra
162a3(sha): dza tsit+tA tshal bArbad/ dbugs la thum ril rbad/ mar morbod/ phyir bzlog drag sngags rtsu bar bsdeb// bsrung gzir drag sngags rgod chen 'di'o// @
162a4(sha): mahA kro d+haSh+NI he ru kA/ sarba bud+d+ha ma hA pa la/ bud+d+ha ba bud+d+ha/ ha sa ha~M/ sarba big+h+nAn/ badz+ra kro d+ha a kra ya/ myag thum ril rbad nAn/ badz+ra ran kro ta nA sha ya thur nan/
162a5(sha): badz+ra mahA kro d+ha ya tri ga nan/ sarba tathA gA ta/ kA ya bA kaM tsit+ta badz+ra ma hA bo lasta pe ya nan/ badz+ra yak+Sha sarba duSh+TAn rtsa khrag tsi ti thums ril nan/ oM nan unan su
162a6(sha): lwa ba r-i nan/ badz+dza yakra sarba duSh+TAn bi g+h+nA na ni/ ha ra ha ra dzaM/ a ku sha ya dza/ A kar sha ya dze/ da re na pa dza/ da ra na ya dzA/ hur thums dza/ badz+ra
162a7(sha): tig snga raka kro ta tsit+ta breng shag rmed/ srog la ro myag zad/ nA sha ya rbad/ tsun+da ma rbad/ tsit+ta kha sha ga rbad/ phyag thum ril rbad/ mA ra marbad nan/
162b1(sha): zhi khro dag nas the brang bar// gzir na mi 'joms gang yang med// thams cad gan 'bu ba myos brgya la rlam// rang 'khor rdo rje ltar du 'gyur// bsrung
162b2(sha): gzir kun gyi mchog tu bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las// phyir bzlog gi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// /
162b3(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// dbab pa sbyin thang lta bu bshad// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sdang byed bsdug
162b4(sha): pa'i lo thog la// chu 'khyags sbyin 'a dang dbab pa ni// gong gi thun rdzas gcig tu bsre// thun snod gzhal yas khang nang du// ye shes sprul
162b5(sha): pa'i khro bo tshogs// kun kyang mthong nag 'jigs tshul can// phyag na ral gri zor ba dang // be con gtun shing ber ga bsnams// dgra yul lo thog
162b6(sha): bcud rnams kyang // rdzu zhing 'thub cing brdung bar bsam// bdag nyid khro rgyal 'dus par bsgom// 'brub khung dgra yul rdzas la bya// de nang yul ming
162b7(sha): sar bsrung gtso// ming bris bcug la zor gdan bya// drag sngags bar chad med par drang // gnam gzer dgra yul nam mkha' la// chu 'khyags
163a1(sha): 'khor lo'i gdan stangs na// de ltar sprul pa'i khro bo rnams// pho brang btab ste chu 'khyags kyis// bskal pa'i sbyin 'dang 'beb
163a2(sha): pa ra bsam// 'og nas khyab 'jug gza' rgod kyi// dmag/ 'gros dgra yul rlag par bsam// de lta nga lha rnams thams cad kun// kha rlangs na bu na
163a3(sha): s+thin du gtibs// spun mig gzi ma dngas glog tu khA gya// rngam sgra nga ro 'brag tu sgrog/ zhal cha ba skye 'dang chu 'khyags 'bebs// ye shes khro rgyal
163a4(sha): 'dus pa yis// khro bo las la bcug/ des ni gza' rgod dbang med bskul// des ni yul gyi lha klu bsnyungs// ma mo mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin
163a5(sha): no// 'dod khams gnas ris lha yul nas// gling bzhi lcags ri'i nang tshun chad// gdug pa klu yi yul yan chad// 'khrugs te chu 'khyags sbyin
163a6(sha): 'dang 'bebs// rta ma yul dbus rten la gzhug/ khyab 'jug dus brgyad zor 'phang dpag/ spogs na dur khrod rtsub mo btang // dgra yul lo thog sngo//
163a7(sha): na bsreg/ gsur tshen zor khrag thab kyang bya// thal 'jim gtor zhing dbab sngags bsdus// 'dis ni chu 'khyags bskal pa 'bebs// badz+ra
163b1(sha): yak+ka kro d+ha pra pa sa ra ya phrom pho ba b+h+yo/ badz+ra rak+ka dud kar phrom phob b+h+yo/ badz+ra tsan dar thu tri ya ma phrom phob b+h+yo/ su badz+ra ya kra ke ta phro ma sha ra pho ba/ badz+ra
163b2(sha): rak+ka ga te sha ra ra sha lha drag tu pho ba/ ra hu la rak+ka sa tri dud kar phro ma shar pho ba/ rag mo khrag la mu sha ma b+hai ri sha sad drag tu phob/ a ya du ra tsa sha na
163b3(sha): pa u kru ya phro ma hri la sha ra b+h+yo drag tu pho ba// da sha lo ka pa la ti ta ki ni nA ga li de ba a su ra tsa ra ti shaM ma ma ra ka mo/ thog la bur bur thug thug shar
163b4(sha): shar hri la hril ru tra b+h+yo b+h+yo phob phog rnal 'byor dbang rdzogs dam ldan na// chu 'khyags skyi ba dang bskal pa 'bebs// khro rgyal thams cad 'dus pa
163b5(sha): yis// drag sngags 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// gsad dang phyir bzlog 'khor lo ni// ro ras zhing lpags dag la bri// bsrung gzir 'khor lo rgya shog
163b6(sha): la'o// ser ba'i 'khor lo chud ral// bri ba'i rdzas kyi rim pa ni// phyir bzlog gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// dug sna skye tshe lan tshwa dang // khrag sgra
163b7(sha): tshogs kyis bri bar bya// bsrung ba ga bur gi hang dang // gur kum pad+ma'i rak+tas bris// sar pa gang 'bebs yul de mi// sngon lo thog chu sna bri//
164a1(sha): nyi phyed kha ni lhor bltas bri// gsum ka 'thun par bri lugs ni// thig bskor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus kyi lte bar hUM bzhi bri//
164a2(sha): rgyu ma rtsibs bzhir hU~M bzhi bri/ de phyir rtsibs bcur thu barba b+h+yo// tha ma'i mu khyud stong bra la// sad dang sar ba dbab pa dang // bsrung dang
164a3(sha): dang phyir zlog pa dang // chu 'khyags ser pa dbab pa yi// spu gri'i drag sngags gang byed bskor// bsrung ba yig mgo phyi ru bstan// gsum po'i
164a4(sha): yig mgo nang du bstan// sprul pa'i khro bo sngo nag pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs tshul rngam// g.yas g.yon ral gri lcags kyu thogs//
164a5(sha): ro ga dan bzhugs pa'i lto bar bri// 'khor lo bar snang bdun bkram ste// bdag nyid lhar bskyed byin gyis brlab// hUM badz+ra tig sha pa kra kaM pa la hU/
164a6(sha): zhes mtshon cha yi 'khor lo ni// rno drag gang la bskor ba rnams// thams cad gcod par byed pa bsam// hUM las rang rang rtsa sngags kyis// khro bo
164a7(sha): rnams su gsal bar bskyed// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs par dbul// de nyid dong rtsang kha la lding // ting 'dzin
164b1(sha): ldan pas drag sngags bzlas// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo myur 'khor bas// don po gang yin dbang po lus// rdul phran tsam du gcod cing 'thub// rtsibs las
164b2(sha): 'od zer tsha tshar 'phros// dmigs pa thal bar rlag par byed// ser ba 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// chu 'khyags sbyin 'dang bskul bar 'phros// kho thog
164b3(sha): rdul phran tsam du rlag/ bsrung na bdag nyid lte ba la'o// gsad dang bzlog dang dbab pa la// rtsibs mtshan dgra bgegs yul ming bri// drag sngags sbyor ba
164b4(sha): thob pa dang // drag po mtshon cha'i 'khor lo de// gsad na la btsas gdug par mnan// phyir zlog 'khor lo'i rgyun srang du'o// dbab na yul dbus mu ma
164b5(sha): la/ bsrung na rang lus dpung pa g.yon// des ni gang brtsams las rnams 'grub// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lo yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi
164b6(sha): snying po'i rgyud las/ chu 'khyags kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'phrin las
164b7(sha): zang bzhin bshad do// hU ma rig nyon mongs las dbang gis// nag po gdug pa srad gsum bdud// bsgral zhing log rtog rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas
165a1(sha): thams cad khro bor mdzad// hUd chos nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag/ ye shes dngos med rang snang bas// chos rnams snying po byang
165a2(sha): chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// dbang chen lnga yi rim par gnas// snang ba ma bcos chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs//
165a3(sha): 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // hU chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// chos sku'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gdul bya rnams sbyangs mthar bsgral phyir//
165a4(sha): ye shes rol pa rang snang ba'i// khro rgyal gzugs skur bzhengs su gsol// hUM/ ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor tshogs//
165a5(sha): thugs rje thabs kyis spyan 'dren na// dbyings nas bskyod med gshegs su gsol// hUM skye med chos skra dag pa las// ye shes khro mchog rngam pa'i skra// thabs
165a6(sha): dang shes rab dkyil 'khor la// sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rang snang dkyil 'khor la// rang bzhin brtan par bzhugs su gsol// hU
165a7(sha): ye shes khro dpal dkyil 'khor la// bdug mchog me tog mar me sgron// dri chab gtsang bshos mchod par dbul// thugs rje bzhes te dngos grub stsol/
165b1(sha): d+hA rlung srid ye shes rang shar bu'i// b+hag tu'i dkyis 'khor bsam mi khyab// mdzad pa 'phrin las grub pa'i rtags// ye shes gyur gyi mchod par bshes/
165b2(sha): hUMrang byung rnam dag dug lnga sel// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i sman// bdud rtsi dam rdzas mchod pa 'di// ye shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod
165b3(sha): par dbul lo bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// hUM/ chos kyi sku las rang shar ba'i// ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// bcom ldan
165b4(sha): dpal chen he ru ka/ kro d+hi shwa ri dbyings kyi yum// gshin rje gshed po la sogs te// khro bo'i rgyal po shes rab thabs// gtse 'khor yab yum sprul pa dang /
165b5(sha): phopho nya phyag brnyan bran g.yog bcas// khro bo 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la// bla med mchod pa 'bul ba ni// snang srid mchod pa'i longs spyod mchog/ ye shes
165b6(sha): 'dod yon sna tshogs snang // phyogs bcu'i rabu 'byams rnam dag zhing // rin chen gzhal yas dpag bsam shing // 'gro drug lha dang lha mo'i tshogs// snang
165b7(sha): srid kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin// gzugs mdzes sgra snyan bsam mi khyab// dri zhem zhal zas ro mchog tshogs// reg bya mdzes sdug sna tshogs rnams// ye
166a1(sha): shes khro rgyal dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// hU snang srid rtse bcud
166a2(sha): zhal zas tshogs// sha khrag sna tshogs 'bru bcud chang // ro mchog brgya ldan bza' btung mchog/ 'dod yon lha mos mdzes par brgyan// stabs byed/
166a3(sha): ga ra bsgyur glu dbyangs len// snang srid rnam dag mchod pa 'di// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor tshogs la 'bul// thugs rje che dgongs dbang dang dngos grub
166a4(sha): stsol// hU/ khyad par rmad du byung ba yi// 'bru thog longs spyod gtor ma dang // sha chen sna tshogs khrag sna tshogs// sa yi snying por sa yan// zhal zas
166a5(sha): mchog gi mchod pa 'di// ye shes rang shar sprul pa'i sku// khro rgyal 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du// mchod pa 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// thun mong mchog
166a6(sha): gi dngos grub stsol// ma rig lus ngag yid gsum gyis// nyams shing 'khrul pas nongs bgyis rnams// ye shes khro rgyal spyan lam du// gnong zhing 'gyod pas
166a7(sha): mthol lo bshags// tshangs pa bzhes la dngos grub gsol// e h+ye hi b+ha ga wa na/ ma hA shri ha ru ka/ badz+ra kri ta rA dza ya/ ma hA ka ru ni/ ka tri sha ho/
166b1(sha): sa ma ho/ sa ma ya sto/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU/ dza hU ba ho/ sa ma ya mu tra kra b+ha na tsa kra hUM phaT/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri badz+ra DA ki ni/ hri da ya/ sarba badz+ra kro d+ha/
166b2(sha): A gadz+dza ya/ A gadz+dzA ta ya/ b+ha na d+ha ya/ b+ha na d+ha ya/ to sha ya/ to sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be she ya/ dza hUM ba ho/ saM ma ya/ man+da la hU dza/ ma hA su kaM/
166b3(sha): a ti pu ho/ pra ti pu ho/ sa ma ya sto/ tiSha tha lha na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni ma kA ya/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ dza hU baM ho/ shri he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya/ mu
166b4(sha): tra ma rang pra ban tsakra dz+nyA na badz+ra ma hA pA la kro d+ha rA dzA ya/ he b+ha ga bA na/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+nyA na Da ki ni pradz+nya du badz+ra d+hi ra/ au ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ bag sha ya/
166b5(sha): bag sha ya/ bi ta sa ya/ bi taM sa ya/ bud+d+hak+She tra~M d+hU ba a kAs+t+wam pa ka/ sarba ma~MhA badz+ra kro d+ha/ kA la badz+rI tri ta ya~M/ bAka badz+ra u tra so+o/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsan+da
166b6(sha): ya/ dza hU ba ho/ na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yAM/ bi shA mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khang ud khang haM/ s+pha ri Na i maM na/ ga ga ne kha swA hA/ au shri badz+ra ra ga du be du/
166b7(sha): puSh+pe pu/ A lo ke hri/ gan d+ha a/ na wi d+ya a/ pu tsa me g+ha sa mu draSh+pa ra na sa ma yaM swA hA/ mu tra pu to/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pany+tsa a mri ta shri
167a1(sha): kha raM kha hi/ kA ya badz+ra sid+d+ha au/ bAka badz+ra sid+d+hi a/ tsit+ta badz+ra sid+d+hi hU/ o na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pu tsa me ga s+pha ra na/ badz+ra
167a2(sha): swa b+hA wa At+ma ko ha/ sa ma ye swA h+ma/ dzaHhU ba hai/ ma hA pU tsa/ badz+ra sa ma ye/ ma hA maM sa/ ma hA rak+ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA tsit+ta/ ma hA go ro tsa na/
167a3(sha): ma hA me tha/ ma hA pany+tsA a mr-i ta/ khA hi khA hi/ sha ra la gats+tsha mi/ spros med snying por rdzogs bsgoms pa// khro rgyal bla med he ru ka'i// thugs las ye shes
167a4(sha): 'od 'phros pas// phyi snod rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// rnam dag mu mtha' med par gsal// nang bcud rnam dag chos kyi sku// ye shes sgrib med rang rig
167a5(sha): gsal// gnyis med byang chub sems su gnas// 'od 'dus phyag rgya thugs la rdzogs// de nyid snying po byang chub sems// rang byung ye shes rang
167a6(sha): nyid du// rdzogs gsal ma bcos thig le che// der gnas chos sku nyid du grol// rdzogs sku sprul sku shugs las byung // zhes gsungs so//
167a7(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen la// ya ma rA dzas gsol btab pa// bcom ldan rdo rje 'tsho nga rgyal po// chos sku rnam dag dngos med las/
167b1(sha): longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dper ldan// sbrul sku khro ba dag 'gro ba 'dul// rdo rje 'dus ma byas pa'i sku// lhun grub mngon par byang chub sku//
167b2(sha): phyi dus lnga brgya tha ma la// sangs rgyas bstan pa gnyan po 'di// rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud rgyal 'di// 'khran/
167b3(sha): 'khor sngags kyi sbyor ba la// bskor ba'i thabs dang rnam grangs dang // thun mong khyad par yang gsang mchog/ snying po don dang las tshogs grangs//
167b4(sha): nyi ma bzhi pa'i sbyor ba'i tshul// de dag sngags kyi tshad ma rnams// 'khor la rgyas par ba shad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang //
167b5(sha): bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa rgyus bshad do// nyon cig gshin rje rgyal po mchog/ gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal po//
167b6(sha): yab yum 'khor dang sprul par bcas// ga/ dul da ka ra drag po 'dul ba khri phyir// ye shes rol pa las byung ba'i// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi rim pa
167b7(sha): rnams// rgyas par dbye ba 'di lta ste// 'khyil pa sbrul 'gros drag sngags bdun// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bru ded kyis// drag sngags nyi ma bzhi pa ni//
168a1(sha): dbus nas rdo rje'i phyogs bskor te// rin chen phyogs nas dbus nyid du// 'bru dad bdun du grang bar bya// de bzhin dbus nas
168a2(sha): rin chen phyogs// pad+ma'i phyogs bskor dbus su dril// pad+ma'i phyogs nas 'bru dad bskor// las kyi phyogs nas dang po'i sar// las kyi phyogs
168a3(sha): nas rdo rje ya// phyogs pa skor dang po'i gnas nyid du// ya ma rA dza sa to me ma rA tsa sa to me ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya ma/ tsa sa to me ya ma ra/ sa to me ya ma rA
168a4(sha): to maM s+ya ma rA dzA sa/ me ya mAR+YA tsa sa to// ya mai t+ton+dan mo te/ me t+yo nA na pi tA ya/ to ru na yo tA ya maM/ ru na mo ta ya me t+to/ na ya ta ya mye ton+ta nA/
168a5(sha): ta ya me to ru na mo/ ya ta yo ni ra yAk+She/ ta yo ni ra ya k+Sha ya/ yo ni ra ya k+Sha ya ta/ ni ra ya k+She ya ta yo/ ra yA k+She ya tA yo ni ra/ yak+She yo ta maM na
168a6(sha): ra/ k+She ya ta mo ni ra ya/ yak+She la tsa ni rAm/ k+Sh+mA ya tsa ni r+yA mA ya/ pa tsa ni ra ma yAk+ShA/ tsu ni rAm pak+Sh+me ya/ ni ram+ba la k+She pa tsa/ ra ma ya k+ShaM pa tsa ni/
168a7(sha): ma ya k+She ya tsa ni ra/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ rnal ma 'bru
168b1(sha): ded drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bzlog pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// /
168b2(sha): dbus nas rdo rje phyogs bskor te// las kyi phyogs bskor dbus su dril// de bzhin 'bru ded dang po'i rtsar// de bzhin dbus na sa las kyi phyogs// pad+ma /
168b3(sha): phyogs bskor 'bru ded bskor// de bzhin dbus nas pad+ma'i phyogs// rin chen phyogs bskor 'bru ded dbus// rin chen phyogs nas rdo rje phyogs// bskor
168b4(sha): te 'bru ded dang por bskyal// ya ma ri ni tsa yak+She/ ma ra ni tsa yak+She/ ra ni tsa yak+She yu ma/ nu tsi ya k+She ya ma ra/ tsa ya k+She ya ma ra ne/ yAk+She ya ma ra ni tsak+Sha
168b5(sha): ya ma ra ni tsa ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta/ k+She ya ra na yo ta ya/ ya ra ni yo ta yak+She/ ra ni yo ta ya k+She ya/ ni yo ta yak+She ya ra/ yo ta yak+She ya ra ni/ ta ya k+She ya
168b6(sha): ra ni yoya ta yo na ru to me/ ta yo na ru to me ya/ yon ru to me ya ta/ na ru to me ya ta yo/ ru to me ya ta yo ni/ to me ya ta yo na ru/ me ya ta yo na ru to//
168b7(sha): ya me to sa tsa ra ma/ me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ tos tsa rA ma ye/ sa tsa ra ma ya me to/ tsa ra ma ya me tos/ ra ma ya me tos tsa/ ma ya me tos tsa ra/ gshin
169a1(sha): rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyis rgyal po chen po las/ bzlog pa'i 'bru ded
169a2(sha): drag sngags bdun pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan che mchog gis// las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad/
169a3(sha): do// 'khyil pa sbrul gyi 'gro sa stabs kyis// dang po bsad pa'i nyi ma bzhi// ya ma me ta k+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ de bzhin g.yon
169a4(sha): bskor drag sngag sa ni// bsad pa gshin rje nyid la ste// ya ma ta k+She ma/ to ru na yo/ ni ra ya tsa/ ni ra sa tsa/ dbang ni btsun mo'i lho ru'o// ya te k+She ma
169a5(sha): meyo ni ra ya/ tsa nI ratsas to ru na/ lto thog gzhom la lto 'phye'i gzugs// ya k+She ma me ta/ ya tsa ni ra/ tsa sa to ru/ na yo ni ra/ de
169a6(sha): bzhin bzlog pa sbrul gyi 'gros/ rgyas pa nor lha'i gzugs su'o// ya ma k+She ta me/ ra ni tsa la/ ra ni yon/ ru to sa ta/ zhi ba zla ba'i dkyi la 'khor de//
169a7(sha): ya k+Sha ta me ma/ ya ra ni yo/ na ru to sa/ tsa ra na tsa/ dbye brta dang ma he gnyis// ya ta ma ma kA/ yo na ru to/ sa tsa ra ni/ tsa ya ra ni/ lkugs pa lug gi khong
169b1(sha): du bya// ya ma ma k+She ta/ to sa tsa ra/ ni tsa ya rA/ ni yon ru/ gzhan yang stag mchongs sbyor ba ste// 'bog pa shan dmar rgyab tu'o// rlung sa reg bya mkha'
169b2(sha): rig sgra// chu ro lus me gzugs mi A// yid lU dri dang dus su sbyar// ya ma? tak+taM maM/ to ma yo r+ra/ ni tsa sa tsa/ tsan ru ni/ smyo ba spre'u'i rgyab tu'o//
169b3(sha): / rlung sgra na ma mkha' sa reg bya/ lus me ro chu lta bya da lU// dus yid sna dang sna ba dri dang gzugs// ya mak+Sha ta ma ta/ yo ra ya to// tsa ru ni tsa/ sa na ra ni/
169b4(sha): myos pa srog dang bral ba'i lus// rlung regs smra nam mkha' dang // ro chu dri lus sna ma lce// dus mig gzugs dang rna ba yid// ya ta ma ma k+Sha/ ya to
169b5(sha): ra yo/ sa ra ru ni/ tsa ni na tsa/ rengs pa gyen pa'i shing la bya// rlung dang nam mkha' sgra reg bya// me lus chu ro sna dri yid rna ba// lta byed gzugs dang lce
169b6(sha): du sa sbyar// yak+She me ta ma/ ra yo to ya/ sa ra tsa na/ tsa ni ru ni/ gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya'o// rlungs reg bya sgra nam mkha'// chu ro lus me
169b7(sha): du ba dang rna ba dri yid g+ha// gzugs dang lta byed skye zu rdze bas// ya ma ta me k+She/ to la yod/ ni nar tsa/ sa ni tsa ru/ sa ni tsan/ dbang po gzhom la dru smin
170a1(sha): te// rlung reg sa sgra nam mkha' chu// ro me lus dus rna ba dri// sna yid lce gzugs lta byed sbyar// ya ta ma me k+She/ to ya ra yo/ ni na
170a2(sha): ra sa/ tsa ru ni tsa/ yi dgas lus kyis longs spyod gzhom// rlung dang nam mkha' sgra reg pa// lus me chu ro rtswa dri dus// rna ba gzugs mig lce dus sbyar//
170a3(sha): ya k+She me ta ma/ yo ra to ya/ sa ra ni na/ ni tsa ru tsa/ bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o// rkang pa'i 'bru lnga ga yas g.yo na gnyis// bdun ba dun dag tu bsde pa pa ra bya//
170a4(sha): ra ma ya ta yo me k+She/ to me ya k+She ya ta ma/ yo ta ya ma rak+She me/ yak+She ya ma to ma ta/ khams gsum gzhom la me yi gzugs// dang po g.yas g.yon rkang lnga
170a5(sha): bzlog/ kI ma yai ta ya ma ra/ ma ta yak+She ya me to// mai k+She ra ma ya ta yo/ ta ma to me yak+ShA ya/ lus gzhom pa la sbrul gyi gzugs// ro chus rlung rlung me
170a6(sha): ga nam/ lus rlung ro reg chu rlung lus// sgra dang dri ru rnam par sde pa// ya to ma ya ya rak+She yai/ ya ya ta to ya yo ma ra// lo thog ga zhom la 'phye'i gzugs//
170a7(sha): rlung me'i gzugs yi nam mkha' ro// dus reg lus sna lce sgra chu// sna migs ru rnam par sbyar// ya ra ni tsak+Sha/ ya ra ni ta/ yo na ru me/ tos tsam
170b1(sha): gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ba du ma'i le'u ste bdun brgya gsum
170b2(sha): mo// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// sbyor ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// tshogs drug sgo dgaganyi ma bzhi// nang gi dang
170b3(sha): po 'bru re bor// sbrul gyi 'gros bzhin dbus su dril// ra tsa sa to me ya/ to ru na yo ta ya/ yo ni ra yakle ya/ ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ phung po lnga ni rtsad bcad nas/
170b4(sha): de bzhin gong du 'bru gnyis por// tsa sa to me ya/ ru na yo ta ya/ ni ra ya k+She ya/ tsa ni ra ma ya/ dug gsum ar la gtad pa ni// rkang bzhi mtha'
170b5(sha): nas dbus su dril// ra ma ya/ to me ya yo ta ya/ yak+Sha ya/ 'byung ba rgyu bzhi nad du bslang // rlung sa ro me rlung sgra dri// chu rlung reg bya chu lus rlung // nA ma/
170b6(sha): mkha' lus dang ro ru sbyar// ya ma pa rA/ ya mer to/ ya ta to saM/ yak+Shai yo ya/ mdze nad dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni// nam mkha' ga yon bskor sgrub bzhin
170b7(sha): dbus// chu na sa g.yon bskor 'bru bzhin blang // k+She ta ma ma ya/ tos ce/ ni yon ru/ ni tsa ya rba/ rims nad dal yams dbab pa ni// dus
171a1(sha): mig yid snams rlung // sna mig lce sna chu sgra rlung // rna ba lce gzugs dri lus reg/ rlung dri gzugs yid dus ro ga nam// rlung
171a2(sha): dang rnam par bsdabs par bya// ni tsa tsa pa ra ma ya/ sa tsa ru na tau maM ya/ na ru ni ra yau ta ya/ ra ni tsa ni yak+She ya/ blo bur gzer thabs sbyor ba ni// me sgra
171a3(sha): lus rlung chu reg ro// rlung lus nam mkha' me rlung ngo // sa chu rlung du sbyar bar bya// ra me yo ya/ to ta yAM ya/ yo k+Sha ra ya/ ya ma tau ya/ ga shin rje
171a4(sha): gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ sbyor ba gnad kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bzhi
171a5(sha): pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khyad par 'khrul 'khor rgyas bshad do// dbang du bya ba'i nyi ma bzhis// lhun po
171a6(sha): rgyu bzhi dbang gyur na// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// ya ma me tak+She tsa ni ya/ ya me ta/ k+She ma sa tsu ra/ ya tak+She ma mi run to/ ya k+She ma mi
171a7(sha): ru na te/ ya k+She ma me ta ni ra yo/ gzhan yang bskrad pa'i nyi ma bzhis// rgyal po'am blon po'am gzhan sde sogs// neg po gdug pa'i sems
171b1(sha): 2ma kun/ tha bor 'phar ma'i yul du bskrad// ya me k+She ma/ ya tak+Sh+me ma me ni tsa ra/ yak+Sha ma me ta sa ru to/ ya ma me tak+ShA na ni yo/ gzhan yang
171b2(sha): 'bog pa'i nyi ma bzhis// sgrib med sems dang ldan pa na// 'bog cing dran pa 'chal nyams na// gzhan lta kun la smos ci dgos// ya tak+She ma
171b3(sha): me ru nA ya/ ya ma me tak+Sha ni ra ra/ ya me ta kle ma tsan ni te/ ya ta k+She ma mo tsa sa yo/ gzhan yang dbye ba'i nyi ma bzhis// rigs gcig rgyud dang
171b4(sha): 'byed nges na// mi mthun rigs 'byed smos ci dgos// ya k+She ma me ta ni ra ya/ ya ma me tsa kle tsa ni ra// ya me ta k+She ma tsa sa to/ ya tak+She ma me ru na po//
171b5(sha): gzhan yang gzir ba'i nyi ma bzhis// stobs kyi rgyal po mchog nyid kyang // gzir na gzhan la smos ci dgos// yak+ShA ya tsa ni ra tsa si to me ya
171b6(sha): de bzhin nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// gzhan yang smyo ba'i nyi ma bzhi// dran pa gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur tAM// ya mar tsa sa to ru na yo ta ya/ gzhan yang lkugs
171b7(sha): pa'i nyi ma bzhi// cang shes smra la hri te ya lkugs 'gyur gzhan la smos ci dgos// ya me to ru na yo ni ra ye k+ShA ya/ gzhan la rengs pa'i nyi ma bzhi//
172a1(sha): 'phrul dga'i lus g.yo lta bu yang // rengs 'gyur gzhan la smos ci dgos// ya ta yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ de dag drag sngag
172a2(sha): mgo drangs la/ de dag bzhin du nyi ma bzhi ru bskor// gzhan yang spogs pa'i sbyor ba ni// bzlog pa'i las te g.yon bskor ro// dbang du bya ba'i ri me /
172a3(sha): ni// ya ni tsak+She ta me ma ya/ de bzhin gzhan yang shes par bya// bskrad pa la sogs g.yon bskor ni// ya tsa ra ma k+She ta me ya/ de bzhin 'bo gas pa la/
172a4(sha): spobs pa// ya na ru me ma k+She ta yA/ dbye ba dag la sgrogs pa ni/ ya ra ni ta/ mA ma k+She ya/ gzir ba'i las la spogs pa ni// ya me to sa tsa ra ni tsA ya k+ShA
172a5(sha): ya/ smyo ba'i las la spogs pa ni// ya ta yon ru to sa tsa ra ma ya/ lkugs pa'i las la spogs pa ni// yak+She ya ra ni yo na ru to me ya/ rengs pa'i las
172a6(sha): la spogs pa ni// ma ya ra ni tsa ya ra ni yo ta ya/ de ltar mgo drangs nyi ma bzhir// bskor na las kun nges par 'grub// gzhan yang ser ba dbab pa
172a7(sha): la// spogs pa'i g.yon bskor nyi ma bzhis// sbyin 'dang chu 'khyags 'bebs par nges// k+She tsa ni ra ya/ ta ni ra ya/ me ru na yo/ ma tsas to//
172b1(sha): 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud chen po las/ las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya lnga pa'o//
172b2(sha): / gzhan yang 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ni// tshogs drug sgo dgag dag la yang // spogs pa'i g.yon bskor nyi ma bzhi// ya me to sa tsa ra/
172b3(sha): ya ta yo na ru to/ ya k+She ya ra ni yau/ ya ma ra ne tsa ya/ phung po lnga yi rtsad bcad la// spogs pa'i g.yon bskor bzlog pa ni// ya me lto sa tsa/
172b4(sha): ya ta yo na ru/ yak+She ya ra ni/ ya ma ra ni tsa/ rgyu bzhi nad du bslang ba la// bzlo ga cing sbo gas pa'i g.yon bsko ra ni// ra ya ma ya/ to ra me ya/
172b5(sha): yo to ta ya/ ya yo k+Shi ya/ dug gsu ma a ra la ga ta da pa la/ spogs pa'i g.yon bskor sbyor ba ni// ya ma ra/ ya to me/ ya ta yo ya k+She ya/ gzhan
172b6(sha): yang stag mchongs dkrug pa yi// sgrogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// tshogs drag sgor ga ga drag sngags ni// ya ra sa ma tsa to/ ya to na ta nu yo/ ya yo
172b7(sha): rak+She na ye/ ya ya ni ma tsa ra/ phung po lnga yi rtsad bcad ni// ya tsa to sa me/ la ru yon te/ ya ni ya rak+ShA/ ya tsa ra ni ma/ 'byung ba rgyu bzhi
173a1(sha): nad du bslang // ya ya ra ma/ rA ya to me/ to ya yo ta yo yA ya k+She/ dug gsum a ra la gtad pa ni// ya ra ma/ ya to me/ ya
173a2(sha): yor/ ya ya k+She/ gzhan yang khyad par drag sngags ni// tshogs drug sgo dgag nyi ma bzhi// bla rtags dag dang sbyar la brdeg/ 'od dang sgra dang dud pa sbyin//
173a3(sha): rlangs dang na bun byung na brdeg/ ra sa ma ma tsa to// ton ta me ru yo/ yo rak+She ta ni ya/ ya ni mak+She tsa ra/ phung po lnga la brdeg pa yi/ drag sngags khyad par bzhi/
173a4(sha): sku gzugs shing chen ri dang lha// che phyugs bla rtags byung na brdeg/ ya ra sa me ma/ ya to na ta me/ ya yo ra k+Shi ta/ ya ya ni ma k+She/ rgyu bzhi 'byung ba'i bla
173a5(sha): rtags ni/ sa chu ma rlung byung na brdeg/ ma to ru ya/ me yo ni ya/ ta yA tsa ya/ k+She ra tsa ya/ dug gsum rtags bya phag sprul// byung na ar gtad drag sngags
173a6(sha): brdeg/ ya ra to// ya to yo/ ya yo ya/ ya ya ra/ gzhan yang khyad par drag sngags ni// nyi ma dang po shar dus ni// sa li khams las bad kan bslang // nyi ma
173a7(sha): gnyis pa drod nyid ni// me yi khams las mkhris pa slong // nyi ma gsum pa khrag nyid ni// chu yi khams las khrag nad slong // nyi ma bzhi pa dbugs nyid ni//
173b1(sha): rlung gi khams las rlung nad slong // ya ra tsa ni ma tsa sa/ ya ro tsa sa ma ru na/ ya yo ru na/ ti ni ra/ ya ya ni rak+ShA tsa ni/ rlung gis khrag 'khrug dang po'o// khrag gis
173b2(sha): bad ka na 'khrugs pa gnyis// bad ka na dag gi mkhris 'khrugs gsum// mkhris pa rlung 'khrugs bzhi pa'o// ya ra k+She ni ya tsa ma/ ra to ma sa ya tsa me/ to
173b3(sha): yo me na ya ru ta/ yo ya ta ra ya ni k+Sha/ chos nyid rtsad pa cad nyi ma gcig/ yon tan rtsad gcod nyi ma gnyis// ye shes rtsed gcod nyi ma gsum// rang rgyud rtsad
173b4(sha): gcod nyi ma bzhi// ma tsa sa nI tsa ra ya/ me tsa na sa ru to ya/ ta ru ra na ni yo ya/ k+She ni ni ra tsa ya ya/ drod kyi dang sa ma me la thim// khrag gi dang sa ma chu la thim/
173b5(sha): dbugs kyi dngas ma rlung la thim// sha rus dang sa ma sa la thim// ya ru ra na ni ma ra/ ya ni ni ra tsa me to/ ya tsa sa ni tsa ta yo/ ya tsa na sa ru k+She ya// 'byung ba bzhi
173b6(sha): yi dang sa ma de// snying po thig ler thim gyur te// lus srog dbye ba'i nyi ma bzhi// tsa sa ra ma ya sa to me ya/ nu to me ya na yo ta ya/ ni yo ta/ ya ra ya
173b7(sha): k+She/ tsa la k+She ya ni ra ma ya/ dgra bo dngos su byung ba na// skye mched bcu gnyis la brdeg pa'i// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ya ma ta me k+She ra ho yo
174a1(sha): ya na/ ya me k+She ta ma to/ yo ya ru ni na ra/ ya ta mak+She me ni tsa yo ya ra ra ni/ yak+She ma ta tsa tsa ya ra to ni sa/ sha ba la sogs yang spru la ni//
174a2(sha): bcu gnyis dag gi rtags byung na// rten 'brel bcu gnyis rtsad bcad pa'i// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// sa ni to ra ya tsa tsa ta ma me k+She ya/ ni ra ra ya
174a3(sha): yo tsa ni me k+Sha ma ta ya/ ra na ni ru ya yo to ma ta k+She ma ya/ nA sa ru tsa yo to rak+She me ta ma ya/ pha gu la sogs bla yi ni/ sprul pa brgyad kyi rtags byung na// brdeg pa'i
174a4(sha): drag sngags sbyor ba ni// ya na ma sa ta ru me tsa ye ra me nak+She ni ta ru/ ya ni ta ra ma ra k+Sha ya/ ya sa k+She ni me to ma ra/ chu chen blugs dang me tshon 'bar// rlung chen 'tshub
174a5(sha): dang rin che na snyil// bla chen bzhi yi rtags byung na// brdeg pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni// k+She yo ra ti/ ma ya to yo/ me yau ni tsa/ ta ya tsa tsa/ 'jam dpa la khri
174a6(sha): drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ bsad pa drag po'i le'u ste bdun brgya drug pa'o// // rdo rje 'chang chen gyis
174a7(sha): yang gsungs pa/ bsad pa las kyi drag sngags bdun// gcig bor gcig blangs sbyor ba ni// ya ra sa me ma tsa to/ ma tsa to ya ra sa me/ ra sa me ma tsa to ya/
174b1(sha): tsa to ya ra sa me ma/ sa me ma tsa to ya ra/ to ya ra sa me matsa/ me ma tsa to la ya ra sa/ ya ton ta ma ru yo/ me ru yo ya ton ta/ ton ta me ru yo ya/ ru yo ya
174b2(sha): ton ta me/ na ta me ru yo ya to// yo ya to na ta me ru/ ta me ru to ya to na/ ya yo ra k+She ta ni ya/ ta ni ya ya yo ra k+She/ yo ra k+She ta ni ya ya/ ni ya ya yo rak+She ta/ rak+ShAM/
174b3(sha): ta ni ya ya yo/ ya ya yo rak+She ta ni/ k+She ta ni ya la yo ra/ ya ya ni mak+She tsA ra/ k+She tsa ra ya ya ni ma/ ya ni me k+She tsa ra ya/ tsa ra sa ya ni ma k+She/ ni ma k+Shi tsa ra ya ye
174b4(sha): ra ya ya ni ma k+She tsa/ ma k+She tsa rA ya ya ni/ gzhan yang lo thog gzhom pa yi// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i sbyor ba ni// dkrugs pa'i ma ni ngag ny+tsi ma bzhi//
174b5(sha): k+She ya ra tsa ni/ ta ra ni ya/ men ru yo/ mu sa tsa to/ sprin dang 'brug dang glog dang ni// 'byung ba bzhi yi nus pa dril// lo thog 'joms shing sbyin 'dang
174b6(sha): 'bebs// drug sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni// ya ra yak+Shi ni tsa/ ya to re me mas tsa/ ya yau tota me na ru/ ya ya yo k+She ta ra ni/ 'bur nag thog 'gros
174b7(sha): drag sngags kyis// rdo rje thog chen gnam lcags dbab// ni mkhye ta ni/ sa maM k+She tsa/ na tsa me ma tsa/ rak+She ta ma du/ gzhan yang khyad par dag rdzas/
175a1(sha): dbang du bya ba'i stag mchongs ni// ram yo ta sa tsa ya/ ya k+She to me ni tsa ya/ yo ta ra mar ni ya/ to me yak+She na ru ya/ gzhan yang
175a2(sha): bskrad pa khyad par gyi/ drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni// ya ma ra ta yo tsa ya/ ya me tok+Sha ya ru na/ ya ta yo na mar ni rA/ ya k+She ya mai to tsa ni/ gzhan yang
175a3(sha): 'bog pa khyad par gyi// drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni// ya ra to me yo ta k+She/ ya to yo ra ye k+She ma/ ya yo ya to ra ma me/ ya ya ra ra yo to me ta/ gzhan ya
175a4(sha): dbye ba'i khyad par gyi// drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni// ma ra tsa me to sa ya/ me to ru na yon ya/ ta yo ni k+She ya ra ya/ k+ShaM ya tsa ma ra nI ya/ gzhan yang
175a5(sha): gzir ba khyad par gyi// drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba ni/ ya me ra to sa tsa/ ya me tau ta yo na na ru/ ya tak+She yo ya ra ni/ yak+She ra ya ma ni tsa/ khyad par smyo
175a6(sha): ba'i drag sngags bdun// ya sem ma ra te tsa/ yan ta me to yo ru/ ya rak+She tA yo ya ni/ ya ni ma k+She ya rA tsa/ khyad par lkugs pa'i drag sngags bdun/
175a7(sha): ya ra ya ni ma tsak+She/ la ya yo rak+She ni ra/ ya yo ton ta ru me/ ya tor sa me tsa ma/ khyad par rengs pa'i drag sngags bdun// ra ma ya ta yo tsa ni/ to ma ya
175b1(sha): ya tsA sa/ yo ta ya mA ra runA/ ya k+She mi to ni ra/ dbang po lnga yi sgo dgag cing // nang grol smad lnga gtub pa ni// yam ni ra tsa/ ya me sa two ru/ ya me tan po ni/
175b2(sha): yak+She ra ya tsa/ phung po lnga yi stobs 'joms shing // sgo lnga rnams shes rgyun bcad pa// ra ma me yak+She/ to me ta ya ma/ yo tak+She ya me/ yak+She ma ya to/
175b3(sha): gzhan yang ltas ngan cho 'phrul gyi// drag sngags thod pa rgyug shes ni// ya tsa ni ra tsam/ ya tsa sa ti ru na/ la ru na yo ni ra/ ya ni ra ya tsa ni/ gdug pa klu
175b4(sha): yi ltas ngan dbab// ni tsa ya ra ni ya/ ya ni yon ru ya/ na ru to sa tsa ya/ dud 'gro'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs dbab// sa ya tsa tsa ra ni/ na ya ru tsa to sa
175b5(sha): ra ya ni ru yon/ ni sa tsa ni ya ra/ gzhan yang rdo rje thog dbab pa'i// drag sngags 'bru drug sbyor ba ni// ra to me ya k+She ya/ to mo ta ya ma ra/ yo ya
175b6(sha): k+She ya me to/ ya ra ma ya ta yo/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u /
175b7(sha): bdun brgya bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'khrul 'khor khyad par sbyor ba bshad// bsad pa'i las rnams
176a1(sha): thams cad la// rtags med 'gor zhing thag ring na// khyad par lo langs drag po 'dis// gshin rje ma mo ga nad la 'bebs//
176a2(sha): bcu bdun drag sngags nyin bzhin bskor// ya ma ta k+She me ra ya to ra sa na ni ru tsa ni tsa/ ya me k+She ma ta to ya/ ra yo ni na ra sa ni tsa tsa/ ya ta ma me k+She yo ra to ya sa ra
176a3(sha): ni nA ni tsa tsa ru/ ya k+She me ta ma ya to yo ra na ni sa ra tsa tsa ru ni/ bon po 'am mu stegs la sogs te// gzhan gyi lha srungs dbang bsdu ba'i// drag sngags 'bru bcu
176a4(sha): gnyis pa ni// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ru na yo ta ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She tsA ni ra ma tsa sa to me ya/ sangs rgyas rang sde la sogs
176a5(sha): pa'i// 'jig rten lha 'dre gang yang rung // dbang bsdu'i drag sngags de nyid bzlog/ ya ta yon ru me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ yak+She ya ra ni ta yon ru/ to ma ya/
176a6(sha): ya ma ra ni tsa k+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ ya me tos tsam ra ni tsa ya k+She ya/ rang sde sngags pa gang yin gyi// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha bsrungs rnams// dbang bsdu
176a7(sha): gnad la phab ste gsad// gnyis gnyis 'bru dor stag mchongs te// khyad par gnad kyi ro lang yin// ya tsa me yo mas ru ta ra to ne ya/ ya ru ta/
176b1(sha): ya me nA ni k+She to yo ra ya/ ya ni k+She ra ta ra tsam yo ya ni ya/ ya tsam tok+She ni tsa maM ya ra sa ya/ dam tshig gnad la dbab pa yi// drag sngags 'bru dgu'i
176b2(sha): stag mchongs 'dis// bu ga dgu nas khrag 'dzag cing // dbugs rgyun lam dgu dgag ste gsad// sa ma ya mo ma to ra sa tsa/ sa ma ya ta me yo ton ru/ sa
176b3(sha): mi yak+She ta ya yo ra ni/ sa ma ya ma k+She ra ya ni tsa/ rnam shes tshogs dang dgu/ rtsad bcad stag mchongs ngan sngags yin// ma ra ya ma me ra to tsa ra/ ma ra ya me
176b4(sha): ta to yo ru ni/ ma ra ya tA k+She yo ya ni sa/ ma ra ya k+She yo ya ni sa/ ma ra ya k+She ma ra ya tsa tsan/ rnam shes lnga yi rgyun bcad cing // dbang po lnga yi sgo dgag pa/
176b5(sha): ya ma ra tsam tor mar mi ra/ la ma ra tsa me yo to ta ni tsa/ ya ma ra tsa ta ya yo kAM sa tsA/ ya ma ra tsak+She ra ma yin ru/ lha srin sde brgyad gnad phab ste// rnam shes
176b6(sha): tshogs brgyad rtsad bcad pa'i// khyad par stag mchongs drag sngags 'di// ya to tsa ma ra swa me ma/ ya yo ru me ton ta me/ ya ya ni ta yo rak+She ta/ pa ra tsuk+ShA/
176b7(sha): yan ma k+She/ sgom gsum rtsad bcad 'byung bzhi dkrug/ khyad par ngan sngags 'bru bdun ni// ma tor sa me tsa ya/ me mo ton ta ru ma/ ta ye yo/ rak+She ni ma/
177a1(sha): k+Sha ras ni me tsa ya/ gzhan yang mnan pa'i nyi ma bzhi// 'byung ba dbang chen stobs kyis mnon// mu pa me rA tsa sa to mame sata to ru na mo ma
