177a2(sha): ta yA k+She yo ni rA ya ta/ k+ShI ya ma ta ra ni tsa k+She/ mnan pa'i stag mchongs drug sngags 'dis// 'byung ba brtan gzhi rngams kyis mnan// ya ra ya yo tom/
177a3(sha): ya ni ra nas k+She/ ya tsa ni ru tsa ta/ ya sa ne rA me/ gzhan yang stag mchongs spogs pa'i las// dbang du bya ba'i drag sngags ni// ya k+She me ma ta ya ni tsa/
177a4(sha): bskrad pa dag gi drag sngags ni// ya ta muk+She me tsa ya rA// 'bogs par bya ba'i drag sngags ni// ya ma ta me k+She ya ru/ dbye bas bya ba'i dreg sngags ni//
177a5(sha): ya mai k+She ta ma ra ya ni/ gzir bar bya ba'i drag sngags ni// ya ra to ya tsam tsa/ sak+She ni yA ni/ lkugs par bya ba'i drag sngags ni// ya to mo ra ru ta can
177a6(sha): ma sa yi/ smyo bar bya ba'i drag sngags ni// pa yo ya to ni k+ShI ru ra men ya/ rengs par bye ba'i drag sngags ni// ya ya ra lo tse min ni ta ra ya/ 'jam dpal
177a7(sha): khri drug stong pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun brgya brgyad pa'o// // de nas
177b1(sha): bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// spu gri'i drag sngags 'di bshad do// hri ti pra ma ya/ mu ra tsa ya/ rak+ta tsa rA ya/ ma rA ya/ a mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/
177b2(sha): rnal ma dag gi spu grir bshad// hri sti/ ya me pra/ ya tsa ra mu ra/ ya ra tsa tA rag/ ya ra ma/ u mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru nr-irba da ya/ bsad pa spogs pa bzlog
177b3(sha): pa yin// hri sti/ pra mur rag ma tsa ta ra ya ya tsa ya ra ya/ a mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru nIrba da ya/ stag mchongs dkrugs pa'i spu gri yin// hri sti/ ma ya pra//
177b4(sha): tsa ya mu ra/ tsa ya ta ra rag rA ya ma/ a mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru nr-irba da ya/ ro langs drag pa'i spu gri yin// hristi/ ma pra ya/ tsa mu ra ya/ tsa rag ya ta rag/
177b5(sha): ra mA ya/ a mu kaM/ nri sha ku ru nIrbad ya/ sngags pa nang rgyas gsad pa ni// gzhan yang sna tshogs spu gri ni// mtha' bsgyur 'bru bdun por byas la//
177b6(sha): de yi rjes la bsdeb par bya// dab ni btsun mo'i lho ru bya// a mu kaM/ a kaR+Sha ya hri dza dza/ a mu ka/ puSh+TiM ku ru swa ra ya ho/ rgyas pa nor lha'i
177b7(sha): gzugs su'o// a mu ka/ shan+ta ku ru stA hA/ zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// ni sha ku ru ni pra bi sha ya phaT phaT/ dbye ba rta dang ma he'o// ni sha ku ru mu
178a1(sha): kha big+h+na na sta pa ya laM/ lkugs pa lug gi khong du'o// pra ma ya ha ra tid thum ril rba da/ 'bogs pa shan dmar rgyab tu'o// nr-i sha ku ru
178a2(sha): nr-i ud ma ta yarbad ya/ smyo ba spre'u'i rgyab tu'o// ya ma myos myos ya mthu ma ril dza/ myos pa sog dang bral ba'i lus// lam swa s+thA naM staM ba na ku ru la ma nir
178a3(sha): ma ya hUM/ rengs pa ge na pa'i shing la bya// ma hA pa la badz+ra kro d+ha tIg nan/ gzir ba stobs kyi bdag pos bya// ni sha ku ru ni su laM staM pa ya Na na na/ mnan pa lA
178a4(sha): kyi rgyal pos bya// ya mu yu na da ta ting dar rnga marba da/ dbang po gzhom la chu srin no// ya me kha la da rod b+ha ti phaT phaT/ yi dgas lus kyi longs spyod gzhom/
178a5(sha): u tsa ta ya u tsa ta ya pra bi sha phaT/ bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o// hu ti rag sha ku ru thum ling rba da/ khams gsum gzhom la me yi gzugs// ba ril rngam
178a6(sha): dzi la yam tig sna phaT/ lus gzhom pa la sbrul gyi gzugs// ru tru phrom dud phro ma kar phrom/ shu ti phro ma/ yA ma phrom/ ya ma hur shar shar phob phob/
178a7(sha): lo thog gzhom la lto 'phyo'i gzugs// gzhan yang drag sngags spu gri ni// dz+wa la shu kr-i baM ril tsi ti dz+wa la s+pha ra ya ri/ mdze nad dbab pa'i spu gri'o// ni sha ku ru
178b1(sha): nr-i ro ga thibs thibs ro myagasarba da/ rims nad dbab pa'i spa gri'o// ru ru rnga ma rak+ta thun b+h+yo sma ra narba da thun b+h+yo/ blo bur gzer thabs spu gri'o// badz+ra dza la raM shad shad
178b2(sha): b+h+yo mA ra ya raM rbad/ gnam lcags thog chen dbab pa'o// nga ling has pho ba/ ltas ngan dbab pa'i spu gri yin// ro ling kha shag ni rbad ya/ ba ril mA ra ya dzA
178b3(sha): ro langs drag po'i spu gri yin// b+hu ta baM hri ti ba to la ma hri ma ma pa shang ku ru hri pa sha a na ya ho b+ha sha ta hri/ ma ra ya dza/ gzhan gyi lha srin dbang bsdu zhing /
178b4(sha): gnad la phab ste gsad pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ drag sngags spu gro'i le'u ste bdun
178b5(sha): brgya dgu pa'o// // 'khrul 'khor gyi khyad par gyi skabs so// / de nas bcom ldan tshe mchog gas// 'khor
178b6(sha): du 'dus pa'i tshogs chen la// sangs rgyas snyan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// mchog gi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// nyon cig 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshogs// lnga
178b7(sha): dus kyi tha ma la// bstan pa dar la ma smin pa// dam pa chos kyi bdud rtsi ni// spyod mo byis pa kun gyis spyod// srung ni chos byed kun mi srung // chos byed
179a1(sha): gcig gis gcig smod gshad// pha ngag bu mi nyan pa'i dus// rnal 'byor grong snyen pa yi tshe// dbang ma thob par gsang sngags bsgrub/
179a2(sha): rang ma grol bar gzhan grol byed// rang dbang ma thob gzhan dbang bskur// gdeng nyams med par 'ab ba chol spyod// dgongs nyams ldan la skur pa 'debs//
179a3(sha): chos byed rnams la rtog 'dzud gshed// nyes byed rnams la bstod cing smon// rnal 'byor zhe sdang nang dme 'khrug/ de dus ngan pa shar tsam na// 'phags pa kun gyi
179a4(sha): dngos grub yal// chos skyong mgon po'i byin rlabs yal// ma mo mkha' 'gros 'chad pa 'bebs// de tshe bstan pa nub kha ru// 'phags pa'i nang na gshin rje
179a5(sha): gshed// lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can// 'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan// yal te 'byung bar ga la 'gyur// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i lha// rnam par
179a6(sha): gzigs la sogs pa yi// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun kyang nga // de ltar bzhugs pa'i shAka thub // ma byon byams pa la sogs te// mos pa'i mthar thug nga las
179a7(sha): med// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// nga yi bstan pa de dus 'byung // nga yi dngos grub de ru 'char// nga yi byin rlabs de tshe che// de tshe bstan pa gnyen srung phyir// ngan
179b1(sha): sngags 'khrul 'khor bskor bar bya// spyir yang bsam gyis mi khyab las// 'khor lo bskor thabs 'bum yod kyang // bcu bdun gsum bskor ma shes na//
179b2(sha): dpa' bo go mtshon med pa 'dra// don yang mi 'grub rang yang rlag/ dngos grub 'byung bar ga la 'gyur// des na 'khrul 'khor bskor thabs la// rab tu 'bad/
179b3(sha): nan tan bya// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor stag mchongs gsum// rnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrug yin// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni//
179b4(sha): pho yi 'khor lo me dang 'dra// gcod cing dregs pas thams cad bsgrol// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// mo yi 'khor lo chu klung 'dra// skyom zhing g.yeng
179b5(sha): ba'i sbyin zang 'bebs// pho lto mo yis dkrug par bya// mo lto pho yis dkrug par bya// lte ba 'khor zhing rtsibs rnams gcod// rtsa ba 'khor zhing rtse mo gcod//
179b6(sha): 'khor zhing gcod phyir 'khor lo'o// gang yang las rnams 'khrul 'dod pas// 'khrul 'khor zhes ni bya bar bshad// 'jam dpal thugs kyi
179b7(sha): nyid khu 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ 'byung ba dus kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu pa'o// /
180a1(sha): de nas bcom ldan dpal chen gyis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa rgyas bshad do// 'jam dpal ya man ta ka yis// gshin rje'i tshogs
180a2(sha): rnams ma lus kun// las la rang dbang med bcug ste// khrag nad btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra
180a3(sha): ya k+She ya yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ ya na sa drangs la ya la bskyal// gshed chen ya ma rA dza yis// ma mo'i tshogs rnams las la bcug/ rims nad dbab
180a4(sha): pa'i 'khor lo ni// ma nus drangs la ma la bskyal// ma ya ra tsa sa to me ma/ me me to ru na yo ta ma/ ma ta yo ni ra ya/ k+She ma ma k+She ya tsa ni ra ya ma/ gshed
180a5(sha): chen myos byed 'bar ba yis// bdud mo'i tshogs rnams las la bcug/ mkhris nad btang bsad 'khor lo ni// me nas drangs la me la bskyal// me ma ra
180a6(sha): tsas to ya me me ya to ru na yo ta ma/ me ta yo ni ra ya k+She me/ me k+She ya tsa ni ra ma me/ gshad che na aR+ya dmar po yis// dri za'i cho gas rnams las la ba ko la//
180a7(sha): sgyu rba ba btang ba sad 'khor lo ni// ta nas drangs la ta la bskyal// ta ma ra tsa sa to me ta/ ta me to ru na yo ya ta/ ta ya yo ni ra yak+She ta/ tak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ta/
180b1(sha): gshed chen ral pa tshar dgu yis// rlung lha gnod sbyin tshogs bkol te// rgya nad mig ser 'khor lo ni// k+She nas drangs la k+She la bskyal// k+She ma ra tsas to me k+She/
180b2(sha): k+She me to ru na yo tak+She/ k+She ta yo ni ra ya ya k+She/ k+She ya ya tsa ni ra ma k+She/ gshed po rdo rje bdud 'joms kyis// btsan gyi tshogs rnams las la bcug/ gri rgod bta/
180b3(sha): ba'i 'khor lo ni// ra nas drangs la ra la bskyal// ra ma ya tsa sa to me ra// ra ta ya ni ra yak+ShaM/ ra ra me to ru na yo ta ra/ rak+She ya tsa ni ru ma ra/ gshed po kong rtse
180b4(sha): brag 'joms kyis// sha za dri bo'i tshogs bkol te// gzer nad btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// tsa nas drangs la tsa la bskyal// tsam ra ya sa to me tsa/ tsa me
180b5(sha): to ru na yo ta tsa/ tsa ta yo ni ra ya k+She tsa/ tsak+She tsa ya ni ra ma tsa/ gshed po a pa glang mgo yis// sa bdag tshogs rnams las la bkol// skrangs nad gta
180b6(sha): bsad 'khor lo ni// sa nas drangs la sa la bskyal// sa ma ra tsa ya to me sa/ sa me to ru na yo ta sa/ sa ta yo ni ra ya k+She sa/ sa k+She ya tsa ni rams/
180b7(sha): gshed po ya ba ya ti yis// bdud kyi tshogs rnams las la bkol// cog 'gyel gyis bsad 'khor lo ni// to nas drangs le tol bsgyel// to ma ra tsa sa ya
181a1(sha): / tom ya n+dan t+tAt+to/ to ta yo ni ras TI to/ tok+Sh+Na ya tsa ni ra ma to// gshin rje gshed po bya sa ngas kyis// srin po'i rdzogs
181a2(sha): rnams las la bcug/ khrag byug btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// rba nas drangs la nu lu bsgral// nu sa ra tsas te sa na?/ tsam+be to mAn mr-i t+tArba/ ru ta maM ni ra sa t+kA rA/
181a3(sha): ruk+ShA ya tsa ni ra ma ru/ shin rje gshed po dmigs pa yis// gdug pu klu yi tshogs bkrol te// mngon du btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// na nas rlangs la ni ma
181a4(sha): bsgyeg// na ma ra tsa sa to min/ na ne te mnA ya sitwA na/ nA ta ya nai re sek+Sh+me na/ nak+ShA ya tsan+ti man/ gu shrIn rje ga she po nyal ba phyis// b+hU smin tshegs rnams
181a5(sha): las la bcug/ bslang thabs btung ba'i 'khor lo ni// yo nas drangs la yo la bskyal// so ma matsas tom mo// mo me to R+Ya sa twa mo/ so tA sa nai ra sak+Sh+me /
181a6(sha): mok+She ya tsa nI ra ma lo// gshed po b+hU sachog dud kha ni// dmu bdud tshogs rnam sa bcug/ gzhog bskams btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// ni nas drangs la ni
181a7(sha): bskyal// ni mar dzas to ma ni/ ni mi te run tan/ ni ta yo ya ra ma k+She mi ni/ ni tA ya tsa ni ram ni/ gshed po chos kyi rgyal po yis// bdud pa can tshogs rnams
181b1(sha): las la bcug/ 'phres nad btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// ra nas drangs la ra la bskyal// ra ma ra tsa sa to me ra/ ra me to ru na yo ta ra/ ra ta yo ni ya ya k+She ya ra/ gshin
181b2(sha): rje gshed po mig dmar gyis// brag srin tshogs rnams las la bcug/ pho log btang ba'i 'khor lo ni// ya nas drangs la ya la bskyal// ya ma ra tsa
181b3(sha): sa to me ya/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She ya ni ni ra ma yA/ gshin rje gshed chen nag 'joms kyis// rgyal po'i tshogs
181b4(sha): rnams las la bcug/ smyo 'bog btang ba'i 'khor le ni// tsa nas drangs la tsa la bskyal// tsa ma ra tsas to me tsa/ tsam to ru na yo te tsA/ tsa ta yo ni ra/
181b5(sha): ya k+She tsa tsa kI ya tsa ni ra mau tsa/ gshed po stag mgro nag po yis// klu bdud tshogs las la bcug/ 'brum nag gtang ba'i nyi ma bzhi// ni nas drangs
181b6(sha): la ni la bskyal// ni ma ra dzas to me ni/ ni ta yo na ra yak+She ni/ ni me to ru nA yo ta ni/ ni k+She ya tsa ni ra ma Ni/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal
181b7(sha): po 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud las/ g.yas bskor gyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'khru
182a1(sha): 'khor sbyor ba 'dir bshad do// gshin rje tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// khrag nad btang zhing gsad pa yin// g.yon bskor yig 'bru/
182a2(sha): de bzhin bskyal// bzlog pa'i las zhes bshad yi// ya ma ra ni tsa yak+She ya// yAk+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ yo ta yon ru to ya/ ya me tos tsa ra ma ya/
182a3(sha): mo'i tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// rims nad dbab ste bsad pa ni// ma pa ra ni tsa yak+She ma/ ma k+She ya rA ni ya tA ma/ mu ta yon nu to me ma/ ma me to
182a4(sha): sa tsa ra ya ma/ bdud mo'i tshogs kyi drug sngags kyis// mkhris na dA tsa ya btang ste bsad// me me ra ni tsa yak+ShaM/ mek+te ya ra ni yau ta me/ me ta yon
182a5(sha): ru to ya me/ me ya to sa tsa ra ma me/ dri za'i tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// skya rba ba btang ste bsad pa ni// ti ma ra ni tsa yak+She to// tak+She ya ra ni ta
182a6(sha): ya/ tA ya yon ru two me na/ ta me tos tsa ra mA tA/ rlung lha gnod sbyin drag sngags kyis// rlung nad rgyan du btang ste bsad// k+She ma ra ni tsa la yi k+ShaM/ k+Sh+mA ya
182a7(sha): par ni yo tak+She/ k+She ta po na ru to me k+Sha/ k+She ma ta sa tsa ra me k+Shi// bdu btsan tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// 'phres nad bting ste bsad pa ni// rams
182b1(sha): ni tsa ya k+Sha ra ni yo ta ra/ ra ta yo na ru to me ra/ ra me to sa tsa ya ma ra/ sha za dri bo'i drag sngags kyis// gzer nad btang ste bsad pa ni// tsa ma ra ni
182b2(sha): ya k+She tsa tsak+She ya ra ni yo ta tsa tsa ta yo na ru to me tsa/ tsa me to sa ya ra ma ts+ra/ sa bdag tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis/ skrangs nad gzhogs skams btang ste
182b3(sha): bsade// sa ma ra ni tsa la k+ShA ya/ sak+She ya ra ni yo ta sa/ sa ta yon ru to mes/ sa me to sa tsa ra ma sa/ bdud kyi tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// cog
182b4(sha): 'gyel btang ste bsad pa ni// to ma ra ni tsa yak+She to/ tok+She ya ra ni yo ta to/ to ta yo na ru ya me to// to me ya sa tsar ma to/ srin po'i tshogs kyi drag
182b5(sha): sngags kyis// khrag skyug btang ste bsad pa ni// ru ma ra ni tsa ya k+She ru/ ruk+She ya ra ni yo ta ru/ ru ta yo na ya to me ru/ ru me to sa tsa ra ma ru/ klu yi tshog
182b6(sha): kyi drag sngags kyis// mdze nad btang ste bsad pa ni// na ma ra ni tsa ya k+She nak+She ya ra ni tsa ra ni yo ta na/ na ta yo ya ru to me na/ na me tos car ma ni/
182b7(sha): lha srin tshegs kyi drag sngags kyis// grang thabs btang ste bsad pa ni// so mer ni tsa ya k+Sha yo/ mo k+She pa ra ne ya ta mo/ yo ta ya na ru to ma yo/ yom
183a1(sha): tos tsa ra ma yo/ dmu bdud tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// gzhogs skams 'thibs nad btang ste bsad// ni ma ra ni tsa yak+She ni/
183a2(sha): ni k+She ma ra ya yo ta ni/ ni ta yo na ru to me ni/ ni me to sa tsa ra ma ni/ ba tsan gyi tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// gri rgod chu dri btang ste bsad// ra ma ra ni tsa ya
183a3(sha): k+She ra/ rak+She yA ya ni yo na ru to me ra/ ra ta yo na ru to me ra/ ra me to sa tsa ra ma ra/ brag srin tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// pho lo glang thabs btang ste bsad/
183a4(sha): ya ma ra ni tsa ya k+ShaM ya/ yak+She ya ra ni yo ta ya/ ya ta yo na ru to me ya/ ya me to sa tsa ra ma ya/ rgyal po'i tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis// smyo 'bog btang ste/
183a5(sha): bsad pa ni// tsa ma ra ni ye yak+She tsa/ tsak+She ya ra ni yo ta tsa/ tsa ta yo na ru to me tsa/ tsa me to sa ya ra ma tsa/ klu bdud tshogs kyi drag sngags kyis/
183a6(sha): 'brum nag btang ste bsad pa ni// ni ma ra ya tsa yak+She ni/ ni k+Sh+me ya ra ni yo ta ni/ ni ta yo na ru to me ni/ ni me tos tsa ra ma ni/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong
183a7(sha): pa 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud las/ g.yon bskor gyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// /
183b1(sha): / de nas bcom ldan rgyal po yis// lto dkrugs 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// gshin rjes khrag nad btang ba ni// ya ra ma me ma tsa to ya/ ya ton
183b2(sha): ta me ru yo ya/ ya yo rak+She ta ni ya ya/ ya ya ni ma k+She tsa ra ya/ ma mos rims nad btang ba ni// ma tsa to ya ra sa me ma/ ma me ru yo ton tAm/ ma ta ni la yo
183b3(sha): rak+Sha ma/ mak+She tsa ra ya ni ya ma/ bdud mos mkhris na da btang ba ni// me to na ta ya ru yo me/ me yo ra k+She ta ni ya mi/ me ya ni mak+She tsa ra me/ me ra sa ya ma
183b4(sha): tsa ti me/ dri zas sgyu rbab btang ba ni// ta ma? tsA to ra sa me ta/ ta tron yo ma ru yo ta/ ta yo rak+ShA ya ni ma ta/ ta ya ni ma k+She tsa ra ta/ rlung lhas rlung nad btang ba
183b5(sha): ni/ k+She ra sa me ma tsau tok+ShI/ k+She ton ta ma ru yo k+Shau/ k+She yo ra ya ta ni ya k+She/ bdud ba tsan 'phres nad btang ba ni// ra ya sa me ma tsa to ra/ ra tona? ta ma nu
183b6(sha): yo ra ra ya rak+She ta ni ya ra/ ra ya ni mak+She tsa ra ra/ sha zas gzer nad btang ba ni// tsa ra sa me ma ya to tsa/ tsa to na ta me ra yo tsa/ tsa yo rak+She ta ni yA
183b7(sha): tsatsa la ni mak+saM tsar tsa/ sa bdag bskangs nad btang ba ni// sa ra ya ma ma tsa tos/ sa ton ta me ru yos/ sa yo ra k+She ta ni ya sa/ sa ye ni ma kle
184a1(sha): / bdun kya/ 'a gyu/ rnam / un tam k+ku nasat+to/ tu/
184a2(sha): srin pas khrag gyu/ ba/ nga d+ha nI// nAr sa ma ma b+h+yoH/ tron tam pa son+yA/ nu sor te/ tani sranra/ sa ni mab+he tsarAn+te/ sbrums 'dzin du byung ba ni/
184a3(sha): naras mematsa ton/ na to pa ta mA ru yon/ nA yo rAk+ShA ta naM pan/ na ya ni ma thAM tsa ru na/ lha srin glang thabs btang ba ni// sau rA sra me mU rtsi to mo/
184a4(sha): n+yAtAnA nu pa mo// no ya rAk+She tA ni ma ma/ oMg+h+nA ni s+t+raitsar ye/ dam+b+ha bdud gzhogs skams btung ba ni// nIr sa mi m+b+ha tsa t+tone/ ni ton tam nu mon/
184a5(sha): ni mo rak+Shi ta prA sa ni/ ni ya ni mek+Sha tsa ra ni/ btsun gyis kyi thibs btang ba ni// r+ya ra sa mamA tsa t+tor/ ru ton ta ma nu s+phor/ ra sor k+Sha ra ni lurA Sh+Ta sa n+ti
184a6(sha): rA/ thig srin po log btang ba ni// yar su ma ma tsat+to la/ pra ton ta me ru sros/ masor k+Sha ta ni y-i/ y-in paN+De tsa ra sa/ rgyam po'i rgyo breg kyang
184a7(sha): ba ni// tsa ra sa me sa tsa to tsa/ tsa ton ta me ru lo tsa/ tsa yo rak+She ta ni ya tsa/ tsa la ni ma k+Sha sa ra tsa/ klu bdud kyis ni 'brum nag btang // ni ras me mo tsa to ni
184b1(sha): ni to na me ru yo ni/ ni yo rak+She tA ni ya ni// ni ya ya ma k+She tsa ra ni/ gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud khri drug stong pa'i rgyud
184b2(sha): las/ stag mchongs kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis// spu gri'i drag sngags 'di bshad do//
184b3(sha): ya ma dam pa dum bu sha t+yA mA ra yarbad/ gshin rjes khrag nad btang ba'i drag sngags so// yag mo ya khas sha tru mA ra ya rbad/ ma mos rims nad btang ba'i drag sdug/
184b4(sha): so/ trag rag sha tsit+ta sha tru ma ra yarbad/ bdud mos mkhris nad btang ba'i drag sngags so// ur ka ra na shi sti pa ya sha tru mA ra yarbad/ dri zas sgyu rba ba btang ba'i drag
184b5(sha): sngags so// de ba a pu ra sha tru mA ra yarbad/ rlung lhas rgya nad btang ba'i drag sngags so// yag sha zhung kha rag sha tru mA ra yarba da/ bdud btsan 'phres nad btang ba'i
184b6(sha): drag sngags so// tri A ka ra sha ya truM mA ra yarbA da/ sha zas gzer nad btang ba'i drag sngags so// byi la A tse du ru du ru sha traM mA ra yarba da/ sa bdag gzhogs skama?
184b7(sha): btang ba'i drag sngags so// lag sha ra ShArbad pu tsit+ta myogs sha tru mA ra yarbad/ bdud kyis cog 'gyel btang ba'i drag sngags so// ra ka sha kha rag sring sha truM mA ra ya
185a1(sha): rbad/ srin pos khrag skyug btang ba'i drag sngags so// nA ga gu gur lang nan shatru mA ra yarbad/ klu yis mdze shu btang ba'i drag sngags so//
185a2(sha): de ba puM trig sha tru mA ra ya rbad/ lha srin glang thobs btang ba'i drag sngags so// tshal pa tshal pa dum bu sha tru m+ba ra rbad/ dbu bdud gzhogs snyoms btang ba'i drag sngags
185a3(sha): so// kha da kha da ya ka sha da ra sha tru mA ra ya rbad/ btsan gyis chu dri btang ba'i drag sngags so// te kro ma krod ma krod sha tru sha tru mA ra yarbad/ brag srin pho log bta
185a4(sha): pa'i drag sngags so// tshal pa tshal pa dum bu sha trUM mA ra ya rbad/ dmu bdud gzhogs skams btang ba'i drag sngags so// kha~M kha da ya ka shra dar sha truM ma ma ra yarbad/
185a5(sha): btsan gyis chu dri btang ba'i drag sngags so// te kr-id ma kro da sha truM sha tru mA ra yarba da/ brag srin pho log btang ba'i drag sngags so// ra tsa si ta tsa pa la sha tru mA ra ya rbad
185a6(sha): rgyal pos smyo 'bog btang ba'i drag sngags so// nA ga yag sha thabs sha truM mA ra yarba da/ klu bdud 'brum nag btang ba'i drag sngags so// de ltar dregs pa gang yin
185a7(sha): gyi/ rtags dang sbyar ba las re bya// 'khor lo bskor zhing gnan pa bya// gang yang 'grub par the tshom med// bcu bdun drag sngags gsum bskor bshad// gshi
185b1(sha): rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud las/ drag sngags spu gri'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu bzhi pa'o// /
185b2(sha): / gsang ba'i 'khrub 'khor gyi skabs so// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // thugs kyi ye shes rol pa las// drag po
185b3(sha): sngags kyi 'khor lo 'phros// gdul da ka' drag po bsgral zhing spa ra// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar zhing rgyas// bdud dang mu stegs thal bar brlug
185b4(sha): gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges// de yi 'khrul 'khor drag sngags ni// thugs las thon te spu ru gsal// dbus nas mtha' ru spros pa yi//
185b5(sha): shaM kra shri ba na tsa yi 'phros// rdo rje rgya gram 'khor lo 'dis// dbang chen 'byung ba rI rab bcas// stobs kyis thams cad gnon pa'i mchog/ gang yang
185b6(sha): 'khu ba med nges pa yin// ya ma ra sa tsa tsa ni// ya me ton ru tsa sa// ya ta yo ra ni ru na// yak+She ya ni tsa ni ra// g.yung drung 'khyil ba'i 'khor lo 'dis//
185b7(sha): bdag nyid che dang dbang thang 'phel// gzhan gyi nus pa 'khu ba med gzir// phan gnod gnyis ka 'grub par nges// sa tsa ra ma ya ta yo ni ra/ na ru to ma yak+Sha/
186a1(sha): tsa ni/ ra ni yo ta ya dza rA dza sa/ ni tsa ya k+Sha ya me to ru na/ g.yung drung 'gyur med 'khor lo 'dis// tshe dbang rig 'dzin thob par 'gyur//
186a2(sha): tsa ni ra ma ya ta yon ru/ tsa sa to me yak+She ya ra ni/ ru na yo ta ya ma ya ni tsa/ ni ra yak+She ya me to sa tsa/ las kyi rdo rje 'khor lo 'dis// pha rol lha srin stobs
186a3(sha): rnams dang // lus can dgra bo gnon pa'i mchog/ ya mar tsa sa ya me to tsa na/ ya ta yo ru ra/ ya k+She ya ni ni// rdo rje rtse gdengs 'khor lo 'dis// rang la cis kyang mi
186a4(sha): tshugs shing // phar ni thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// sngags pa nang rgyas dag la bsngags// ya ma rA ni tsa ta yo na ni/ ya me to sa ruk+She ya ra tsa/ ya ta yo ni nam
186a5(sha): ra ni tsa/ yak+Sh+me ya ra tsa me tos ru/ rlung ri 'phro ba'i 'khor lo 'dis// yul khams kun tu sbyin thang gi/ chu rlung dag gis rlag par byed// ya tsa sa ya ma ra//
186a6(sha): la ru na ya me to ya nA ri ya ta yo/ ya tsa ni yak+She ya/ sbyin thang 'phrul gyi 'khor lo 'dis// yul khams dmigs pa'i lo thog la// rtsa dang ser ba sprin dang 'bru//
186a7(sha): ba mo drum skams stong par nges// ra ma ya te yo ni ni/ to me ya k+She ya ra tsa/ yo ta ya ma ra ni tsa/ ya k+She ya me tos ru// gnam lcags srog gcod 'khor lo
186b1(sha): 'dis// dbyar thog gcig la mkhar spre'u// gcig la thog dgu nges par 'bebs// ra ni tsa tsa sa ma ya ta/ to su ru tsan me ya k+She/ yo ni nu ru ra ta ya ma/ ya ra
186b2(sha): ni k+She ya me/ ma dpal thog 'gros 'khor lo 'dis// gang la dmigs par thog chen 'bebs// brag 'gams ri snyil rgya mtsho kho la// ni ta k+She ma ni/ tsak+She ma me sa/
186b3(sha): tsa me me tan/ ru me ta k+Sha ra/ phyogs bzhi gyad gnon 'khor lo 'dis// gzhan gyi dmag dpung bzlog pa dang // pha rol stobs chen 'joms par byed// ya ra
186b4(sha): toyo ya ra ma/ ya yo ya re to ma/ ya yA ra to yo to// 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ drug sngags
186b5(sha): du ma'i le'u ste bdun brgya bco lnga pa'o// // de nas khro rgyal chen po yis// drag po sngags rgod sbyor ba bshad// chags sdung bzhi las grub
186b6(sha): pa yis// rang rgyud 'khor lo rnam pa bzhis// rang gsher rang la 'bebs par byed// klad pa gti mug rmongs pa'i gnas// byol song rgyal po 'thom pa'i gshed//
186b7(sha): bskul pas rang srog rang gis gcod// ra ma ya to me k+She ya/ to me la yo ta ma / yau ta ya ya k+ShaM me to/ yak+She ya ra/ ma ta yo/ mgrin pa nga rgyal dregs pa'i
187a1(sha): gnas/ lha min dbang po gsod pa'i bdud// bskul bas rang srog rang gis gcod// ma ra ya ta sa tsa/ me to ya k+She na ru/ ta yo ya mar
187a2(sha): ni/ k+She yA ya me ni tsa/ snying kha zhe sdang gtum pa'i gnas// mi rgod shan pa srog gi gshed// bskul bas rang srog rang gis gcod// tsa sa ni ra ya ma/ ru na ya tsa ni
187a3(sha): mni ra ya sa tsa ta/ tsa ni ya ru na k+She/ lte ba 'dod chags zhen pa'i gnas// dmyal ba'i dbang po gsod pa'i bdud// bskul bas rang srog rang gis gcod//
187a4(sha): ya ra to yo ya ma ni/ ya to yo ya ra mes/ ya yo ya ra to tanA/ ya ya ra to yo k+She ra/ khrag las rang byung 'dod chags bdud// drod las to byung zhe sdang bdud/
187a5(sha): dbugs las yo byung gti mug bdud// gsum 'dus ma rig ya yi bdud// ra ma ya sa na/ to me ya na ra/ yo ta ya ra ni/ yakle ya tsa tsa/ bsreg pa me yi//
187a6(sha): 'khor lo 'dis// drug po gtum po'ang g+hun ner 'gyur// gzhan lta zhi bar smos ci dgos// ya ra to yo ya ma ni/ ya to yo ya ra me yi/ ya yo ya ra to ta na/
187a7(sha): ya ya ra to yo k+She ra/ sdong gcig yal galo 'bras 'phel// gzhan lta rgyas par smos ci dgos// ni ma ya yo to ra ya/ sa me ra ya yo to ya/ na ta to ra ya yo ya
187b1(sha): rak+She yo tor ya ya/ shing skams rtse mo rtsar 'gugs na// shes ldan dbang 'gugs smos ci dgos// yo ni ya to ma ra ya/ ya sa ya yo me tor/ ra na ya ya ta
187b2(sha): yo tau/ to ya ya rak+She ya yo/ tshangs pa'i che ldan 'chi byed na// srog chags gzhan gsod smos ci dgos// ma ra ya ni ya to yo/ me to ya sa ra yo ya/ ta yo
187b3(sha): yan to ya ra/ yak+Shi ya ra yor to// las ni gang yang rdugs par 'gyur// rang bzhin gnad kyi ro langs 'dis// ye shes gshin rje gnad la dbabs// par
187b4(sha): yo tsa ma sa k+Sha/ ya to ya ru ma nak+She/ ya yo ra ni ta ra k+ShaM/ ya ya to tsa k+She ni k+She/ drag po gA nad kyi ro langs 'dis// las kyi gshin rdzag nad la 'bebs// ya ra sa
187b5(sha): ruk+She/ ya ti na ra k+She/ ya yau tsa nik+te/ ya ni tsa rak+ShA/ btsan thabs gnad kyi ro langs 'dis// dam tshig gshin rje gnad la 'bebs// ya tsa ru ne tsa ma k+She/
187b6(sha): ya sa na ra ni me k+She/ ya ru ni tsa tsa tA k+Sha/ ya nI ra ni sa k+She k+She/ rang gzir stobs kyi ro langs 'dis// ma mo grashin rje gnod sbyin sogs// lha srin thams cad
187b7(sha): gnad la 'bebs// ya ra ta tsa ru k+She/ ya to k+She ru tsa / ya yo ma ni tsa k+She/ ya ya men tsa k+Sha/ 'jam dpal khre drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po yas/ bsad pa las bzhi
188a1(sha): ro langs kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu drug pa'o// // gzhan yang drag sngags 'khrul 'khor ni// sangs rgyas sngags
188a2(sha): pa nang rgyas na// phyir bzlog bsad pa'i 'khor lo 'dis// dbus nas phyogs bzhir spros la drang // ya ma ra sa tsa sa ni/ ya me ton tsa ru sa/ ya ta yo ra ru ni
188a3(sha): na/ yak+She ya ni na/ la k+ShA ya ni ni tsa ra/ ngag 'khyal bon po dang rgyus na/ rkang mgyogs slar log 'khor lo 'dis// phyogs bzhi dbus su dril la gsod//
188a4(sha): ra sa tsa tsa ne ma ya/ ton tsa ru sa ma ya/ yo ra ru ni na ta ya/ ya ni ni tsa ra k+She ya/ mu stegs pa dang rgyas gyur na// rig byed bshig pa'i 'khor lo 'dis//
188a5(sha): thad nas thad du rnal ma sa ba sad// ra ma ya ta yo ni ra/ to mo ya k+She ya tsa ni/ yo ta ya ma ra tsa sa/ yo k+She ya me to ru na/ rgyal rigs bsad pa'i 'kho ra le
188a6(sha): 'dis/ thad nas thad du bzlog la drang // ra ni yo ta ya ma ra/ ni tse ya k+She ya me to/ sa tsA ra ma ya ta yo/ na ru to me ya k+She ya/ rje'u rigs bsad pa'i 'khor
188a7(sha): lo 'dis// gcig por gcig blangs thad nas dgug/ ra ya yo ra ma ta ni/ to ya ya ni me k+She tsa/ yo ya ra sa to ma tsa/ ya ya to na k+She me ru/ phal pa dmangs
188b1(sha): bas 'khor lo 'di'o// sa ya ra ni ya tsa/ ru la tsa ni ya na/ ni ya tsa sa yar/ tsa ya ru na ya ni/ bud med bsad pa'i 'khor lo 'di'o// ya tsa sa ni ra/ ya ru na
188b2(sha): tsa ni/ ya ni ra tsa sa/ ya tsa ni ru na/ bram ze'i rigs pa sad 'khor lo 'dis// ya ra to ya to yo/ ya yo ya ya ya ra/ rdo rje slob dpon dang rgyas na// sku ni sgyu
188b3(sha): ma'i phung po las// thugs ni rin chen rgyal sa ra dbyung // de yis drag sngags 'khor lo 'di'o// ya ma me sa tsa/ ya me ta ru na/ ya ma ta ru na/ ya ta kr-I ni raM//
188b4(sha): ya k+She ma tsa ni/ slob bu dag dang rgyas gyur na// rme theb nag po'i lto bas// ra ma ya to ma ya/ to me ya yo ta ya/ yo ta ya yak+She ya/ ya k+She ya ra ma ya/ dam tshig
188b5(sha): gcig pa'i mched rgyas na// gcan gzan kha 'thab 'khor los bsad// sa tsa ya/ ru nA ya/ ni ra ya/ tsa ni ya/ gzhan gyi sde pa dang rgyas na// srin po sha na
188b6(sha): dmar 'khor los bsad// ma ra ya/ me to ya/ ta yo ya/ kA ya/ sngags pa nag po spyi rgyas na// kho rang lha bsrungs phyir bzlog pa'i// rdo rje rma thab 'khor
188b7(sha): yos bsad// pa la tsa to me/ me ya ru lo ta/ ta ya ni ya k+She/ k+She ya tsa ra a/ 'byung ba bzhi yis mthu bsdus te// gnam lcags ur mo dbab par bya//
189a1(sha): ya me ra me/ ya me to ta/ ya ta yo k+She/ ya k+She ya ma/ de bzhin 'byung bzhin 'khrugs pa'i mthus// chu 'khyags sbyin 'dang dbab pa ni/
189a2(sha): ya tsa sa to// ya ru na yo// ya ni ra ya/ ya tsa ni ra/ dud 'gro mtha' dag bsad pa yis// 'khor lo drag po'i rim pa ni// ya ra sa/ ya two na/ ya yor/ ya ya ri
189a3(sha): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ bsad pa drag po'i le'u ste bdun brgya bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/
189a4(sha): b+hu gri'i drag sngags 'di bshad de// many+dzu pa la ya ma ra ba suM laM sta pa ya na na nan/ dbang chen stobs kyis mnan pa'o// ma d+hA A yu she badz+ra sha tru staM pa na la trig nan
189a5(sha): hUMbadag 'phel gzhan gzir gnyis 'grub po// nr-i bru hU badz+ra a yu she hUM a/ g.yung drung 'gyur med tshe dbang thob// badz+ra karma staM b+ha ya tsa kra dzA la ya ma
189a6(sha): nA na/ las kyi rdo rjes gnan pa'i mchog/ ma hA ba la badz+ra ya ma ye dgra bo mA ra ya nA sha ya hA phaT/ rdo rje kha gdengs nang rgyas so// bo ga ling ni du sha truM ha ra ya ba
189a7(sha): phreM b+h+yo phaT/ rlung ri 'phro bas sbyin thang dbab// kha lad rod dag de we sha b+h+yo/ sbyin thang 'phrul gyis drung skams btang // srog la ram shad badz+ra dz+wa la
189b1(sha): raM mA ra ya rbad b+h+yo/ gA nam lcags srog gcod dgu thog dbab// sing khrol trag thog mA ra ya shad shad srog la breng shag rbad/ me dpal thog chen drag tu 'beg/
189b2(sha): nri ma ra du pa la na? ta ki ra b+h+yo dz+wa la hU phaT/ pha rol stobs 'joms dmag dpung ba zlog/ baM ril dun ting sti ra ya kar mon ta ro tsa na mA ra yarba da/ klad pa gti
189b3(sha): mug byol song gshed// rag sha b+ha sti hri ta ni ma ra yarba da/ mgrin pa nga rgyal lha min bdud// bi sha tsi yag sha ka la tsit+ta ma ra yarba da/ snying kha zhe sdang
189b4(sha): mi rgod gshed// kha la da rod ya ma ra gA ta mA ra yarba da/ lte ba 'dod chags dmyal ba'i bdud// ha la hri ni mA ra ya rag sha khram rba da/ dug gsum 'dus
189b5(sha): dang bzhi yis bsad// shan ting ku ru a dz+wa la raM/ puSh+Ti pa ra ya ku ru dza la ra/ pa shang a na ku ru dz+wa la ra/ ma ra ya u krA ya ku ru dz+wa la ra/ las
189b6(sha): bzhi sbyin sreg 'khor lo yin// ya ma yaM sa ma ye karma sa ma ma re kA ro lid rba da ya tsi ta ro myags pa rilA rbad/ ro langs rnam bzhi'i drag sngags yin// hI
189b7(sha): ti/ ka pa ye/ bra ma ya/ mur tsa ya/ rag ta tsa ra ya/ pra ti ga ra tsa tha wa ra ti tig sna dzu ril/ nr-i sha ku ru nr-i rbad ma/ sangs rgyas mu stegs bon po
190a1(sha): dang / slob dpon slob bu dam tshig gcig/ gzhan sde spyi rgyas bsad pa yin// 'bru bcu gnyis bor rgyal rigs rje'u// phal pa
190a2(sha): bram ze bud med ba sad// yaM raM srog la rbad ba su dzA la rag sha mA rarba da/ 'byung bzhi gnam lcags ur mo dbab// ya ma phreM pr-i hri la hri la shar shar drag tu phog
190a3(sha): b+ha ri sha ya phob phob/ chu 'khyags sbyin thang 'bebs par byed// bi sha tsi snying khrag dbugs la rba da dza he dum ling rba da/ dud 'gro'i rigs rnams bsad par
190a4(sha): bshad// 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las/ drag sngags spu gri'i le'u ste bdun brgya bco brgyad
190a5(sha): pa'o// tayang gsang mchog gi skabs so// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// snying po don gyi 'khrul
190a6(sha): 'khor bshad// 'jam dpal gshed chen dpa' bo yis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// stong pa'i ye shes dbus nyid dngos// gsal bas ye shes
190a7(sha): bzhir ldan te// nyon mongs gcod pas 'khor lo'o// dug gsum sreg pa nyi ma'o// log lta sgrol bas gshin rje gshed// dngos po sangs rgyas kun gyi
190b1(sha): sku// ye shes rang shar 'khor lo 'di// gdul bya gang yang sgrol bar nges// rnal 'byor can gyis nyams su blang // dri rgod khrag mdar 'phang ba yi// btsan
190b2(sha): dmar drag ba tsan 'khor lo ni// ra ma ya me to ni/ to me ya ta yo tsa sa/ ya ta ya k+She ya ru na/ ya k+She ya ma ya ni ra/ mdze nad dug mda' 'phang ba yi// gdug pa
190b3(sha): klu bdag 'khor lo ni// to ma ya ma ra ni tsa/ ya k+She ya ta yo na ru/ ra ma ya k+ShA ya ra ni/ smyo 'bog nyangs mda' 'phangs pa yis// rgyal po 'od can 'khor lo ni/
190b4(sha): ra ya to tsa ma me ya/ to ya yo ru me ta na/ yo ma ya ni ta k+She ra/ ya ya ra tsa k+ShI ma ni/ gzer thabs thabs mtshon mda' 'phang ba'i// gnod sbyin dregs ma'i 'khor
190b5(sha): lo ni/ ya tsa ni ra tsa sa ma/ ya tsa sa to ru na me/ ya ru na yo ni ra ta/ ya ni ra ya tsa ni kAM/ gzhan yang dud 'gro chags ma yis// 'debs pa'i 'khor lo zhes
190b6(sha): bya ste// gcan gzan rigs rnams gang yang gsod// ma sa tsa ra ni tsama?/ ya na ru to sa tsam// ya ra ni yo na ru ta/ ya ra ni ye na ru ta/ ya ni tsa ya ra ni k+She/
190b7(sha): 'dab chags rigs rnams gang yang gsod// ma nga ya tsa ni tsa sa/ me to ya tsas ru na/ ta yo ya ru na ni ra/ k+She ma ya ni ra tsa ni/ ri dgas gang la btab kyang gsod
191a1(sha): ya ni ra tsa ma/ ya sa to ru me/ ya na yo ni ta/ ya ra ya tsak+She/ thod pa rgyug shes 'khor lo 'dis// brda ngan cho 'phrul 'bebs shing phung // ya tsa
191a2(sha): ra sa ya/ ya tsa to na ya/ ya ru yo ra ya ya ni ya ni ya/ me skyogs dpal 'bar 'khor lo 'dis// yul khams mkhar sde'u rlag par byed// tsa ru na sa to me ya
191a3(sha): ru ni na ra yo ta ya/ ni tsa ra ni ya k+She ya/ tsa tsa ni sa ra ma ya/ rdo rje nag po'i 'khor la 'dis// bdag gzhan bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// ya ma tsa ni ra tsa sa
191a4(sha): ya maM tsa sa to ru na/ ya ta ru na yo ni ra/ ya k+She ni ra ya tsa nI/ sbyin thang kha gnon 'khor lo 'dis// shargal chu rlung bzlog pa yin// ya ni tsan ni ma/ ya sa ru ra tsa ma/
191a5(sha): ya na ni ni tsa ta/ ya ra tsa sa ru ka/ lo thog bcud ldan 'khor lo 'dis// sad ser srung ba'i mchog yin no// ya cas/ ya can/ ya ru ra/ ya ni ni/ 'jam dpal
191a6(sha): khri drug stong pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi rgyud chen po las/ phan gnod drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun brgya bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang
191a7(sha): chen gyis// drag sngags snying po'i 'khor lo bshad// dpung bshig nag po'i 'khor lo 'dis// mi rigs mi mthun gzhan la sogs// dmag dpung thams cad
191b1(sha): 'joms par byed// ma ra ya ni tsa sa tsa ta yo/ me to la sa ru na tsak+Sha ya/ ta yo yan ni ra nu mA ra/ k+Sha ya ya ra tsa ni ni ma to// chu rlung 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lo 'dis/
191b2(sha): yul khams dag ni thams cad du// sbyin thang chu rlung sha rgal 'bebs// ya ma ra dza ya ta yo ni/ ya me to ru ya k+She ya tsa/ ya ta yo na ya ma ra ni/ ya k+She ya ra ya me tos/
191b3(sha): zhe sdang dpal 'bar 'khor lo 'dis// yul khams thams cad 'khrug par byed// sa tsa ra ma ya ta yo ni ra/ na ru to me ya k+She ya tsa ni/ ra ni yo ta ya ma ra tsa ma/ ni tsa
191b4(sha): ya k+She ya me to ru na/ si la nag po'i 'khor lo 'dis// dgra bo ga nas dang dpral ba yin// ya ma me tsa sa yo/ ya me te ru na ya/ ya ta k+She ni ra ra/ ya k+She ma tsa ni
191b5(sha): to/ skya mul dong thogs 'khor lo 'dis// dgra bo yo byad rdzas dang dpral/ ya yo sa tsa me ma/ ya ya na ru ta me/ ya sa ra ni kle ta/ ya to ni tsa mak+She/ sogs pa gdo
191b6(sha): rings 'khor lo 'dis// dgra bo'i spe'u bshig pa yin// ya tsa yo ma sa me/ ya ru ya me na ta/ ya ni ra ta yak+She/ ya tsA tak+Shai ni ma/ khrag 'thor nag pa'i 'khor le
191b7(sha): 'dis// stobs chen rgyal po'i dmag dpung 'joms// yo ta tsa sa ni ya ra ma/ la k+She tsa na rus pa tom/ rim ru ra min pa po te/ to ma mi ni tse ra pa ya k+She/ raka sha
192a1(sha): ka la'i 'khor lo 'dis// rgya bod hor bal la sogs te// mi rigs mi ya ma tsa ta ra sa tsa ya ni/ ya me ruk+She ton tsa ya sa/ ra ta ni ma yo ra ya ru
192a2(sha): na/ tok+She tsam ya ni ya ni ra/ 'khor ba rgyun gcod 'khor lo 'dis// dgra bo rabs chad rtsa ba gcod// ni yo ta ya tsa ra ma ra ya/ ni ra ma ya na yo ta ya/ sa to me ya
192a3(sha): ra ya k+She ye/ phung sri nag po'i 'khor lo 'dis// pho sri mo sri dgra sri sogs// dgra la sri dgu 'bebs par byed// tsa ni ya ya yo ma ta ra/ ru tsa yo ya ya me k+She to//
192a4(sha): na ni ya ya ra ta ma yo/ ra sa ya yo to k+She me ya/ rang gshed drag po'i 'khor lo 'dis// kho rang lha dgu bdud du 'bebs// ra ni yo ta ya ma ra sa tsa/ ni tsa ya k+She ya
192a5(sha): me to ru na/ ra sa tsa ra ma ya ta yo ni ra/ ne ru to me ya k+She ya tsa ni/ nye 'byed nag po'i 'khor lo 'dis// dgra bo nang 'thab 'byed par 'gyur// ya ra sa ta ni tsa ra yo ma/
192a6(sha): ya ni na k+She tsa to me yo ya// ya sa ra ma tsa ni ma yo ta/ ya na ni me ru tsa to tsa ya// 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud la sa/
192a7(sha): drag sngags du ma'i le'u ste bdun brgya nyi shu pa'o// // gzhan yang drag sngags 'khrul 'khor ni// sbyin thang chu khrus 'khor lo 'dis//
192b1(sha): nyin gcig bzhin du chu 'khyags 'bebs// ra me ya ta yo te me k+She to ya tsa ni/ to me yak+Sh+me ya yo ta ma ra tsa sa/ yo ta ya ma ra ya k+ShA me to ru ni/ ya k+She ma me to ra ma
192b2(sha): ta yo ni ra/ blo bur btsan thabs 'khor lo 'dis// ser ba btsan thabs drag tu 'bebs// ni tsa yak+She me to yo ta ya ra ma/ se tsa ra ma ta yo yak+Shi ya me to/
192b3(sha): na ru to me k+Sh+me ya ra ma ya ta yo/ ya ni yo ta ma ra to me yak+She ya/ lo thog bcud bsdus 'khor lo 'dis// dbyar thog gcig la 'khor gsum 'beb// to ni
192b4(sha): ra po tsa ma mai ya yak+She ta/ yo sa to ya tsa me ta tsa ya me k+She/ ya na ro ra ru tak+She to yaM ma me/ ra ya ra ma kA ni to ya yo me ta/ gnam ldugs me 'bar 'khor lo 'dis/
192b5(sha): rdo rje 'phro ba'i thog chen 'bebs// sa tsa ya ma me ra to// na ru ya me ta to ya/ ra nI ya ta k+She yo ya/ ni tsam k+Sha ya ma ra/ gser gyi thog chen 'bebs par byed/
192b6(sha): tor me ma ya tsa sa/ to yo ta me ya ru na/ ya yo k+She ta ya ni ra/ ra ya ma k+She ya tsa ni/ lcags kyi thog chen 'bebs par byed// ma to ra sa tsa me ya/ me yo na ru to ya
192b7(sha): ta ra ya ni yo ma k+She/ k+She ni ra tsa ya ma/ lhas ngan than pa'i 'khor lo 'dis// khyi du wa rgyal bya mtsher cing // bla ba srin bya ngag margod// sna tshogs stas
193a1(sha): ngan 'byung bar 'gyur// ya sa ra ya na ni/ na to ya/ s+pha ni ru/ ya tsa ni/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa'i rgyud las//
193a2(sha): sna tshogs sbyor ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje yis// spu gri'i drag sngags 'di bshad do// tsa ra
193a3(sha): tshil ma tri shaM dz+wa la rag shang dza la ra ga sha rba da b+h+yo/ gri rgod khrag mda'i drag sngags so// nA ga dz+wa ba la tsit+ta rak+ta thibasarba da/ mdze nad dug mda'i drag sngags so//
193a4(sha): ra tsa ud ma ta ni mA ra ya rba da/ skyo 'bog nyungs mda'i drag sngags so// yag shi ni ha ra na mA ra ya rbad dza/ gzer thabs mtshon mda'i drag sngags yin/
193a5(sha): rag sha ti rgya lag sha stam b+ha nu mAM ra ya he du ma ling rba dra/ gcan gzan 'dab chags ri dgas sogs// dud 'gro'i rigs rnams bsad pa yin// ka pa la ti
193a6(sha): rgya ha la ha la b+h+yo/ thod pa rgyug shes drag sngags yin// ya ma su pi ta ra raM ya ma ka sa ru b+h+yo/ me sgyogs dpal 'bar drag sngags yin// badz+ra ka la a da
193a7(sha): ma sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha hU hU/ rdo rje nag po'i drag sngags yin// ra ti ya k+She b+h+yo to sa pa ti sha ya b+h+yo/ sbyin thang klu bzlog 'khor lo yin// b+ha ri sha truM pra sa ra sta pa
193b1(sha): ya nA sha ya hU phaT/ sad ser lo srungs drag sngags yin// badz+ra ni ra ma ra ya pra ta ra staM pa ya phaT/ dmag dpung 'joms pa'i drag sngags yin// rag sha b+ha ri rag
193b2(sha): ya br-i sa ra ha ra ni b+h+yo/ sbyin thang rlung 'bebs drag sngags yin// pra ta ni ra ha ha la ru sha shag ti b+h+yo na na phaT/ yul khams 'khrug byed drag sngags yin// ya ma
193b3(sha): du rtse ra li hU ya mo khal du mun rbad ye sa b+h+yo/ dgra bo ga nas dang dpral ba'i drag sngags yin// ya ma kha la ma ra ting ting ru shag ru shag rlu shi phaT/ dgra bo
193b4(sha): yo bya da rdzas dang dpral ba'i drag sngags yin// du na ra yaM dri tri du na ma sha paM ti tsa dgra bo'i mkhar la yangs b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i mkhar sde'u ba shig pa'i drag sngags
193b5(sha): yin// ya ma rag sha ra tsa sha tru pa la la ha ra ha ra a kar sha hU phaT/ rgyal po'am mi rigs mi mthun pa'i// dmag dpung 'joms pa'i drag sngags yin//
193b6(sha): ni ra pu tra ba shang tse ta rbad nan/ rab brgyud bcad ba'i drag sngags yin// ya ma rag shwa kha thum pra ti mA ra yarba da/ sri can dgu 'be bas dre ga sngag sa yin//
193b7(sha): de ba a su sha tru ru tra pho ba/ lha bdud dbab pa'i drag sngag le yi na// ya ma sha tAM pra Shi sha phaT b+h+yo/ nadza bzla ba nye 'byed drag sngags yin// ya phreM log
194a1(sha): ri sha ya phob phob/ nyi gcig bzhin du dbab pa yin// pro hri la rag shra sa ti dud kar phreM phob/ ser ba btsan thabs 'bebs pa yi// pra sa rA ya
194a2(sha): pro shor hri la b+h+yo/ 'khor gsum dbab pa'i drag sngags yin// raM shar pho ba/ rdo rje khro chu'i 'phro thog 'bebs// trag tshams phob/ gser thog dbab pa'i
194a3(sha): drag sngags yin// ga nam lcags/ ur mo srog la ya// lcags thog dbab pa'i drug sngags yin// ru pa b+hi sha khu tsa he b+h+ye phob/ ltas ngan sna tshogs dbab pa'i drag
194a4(sha): sngag sa yin// 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ spu gri drag sngags kyi le'u ste bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis po'o// // snying po
194a5(sha): den gyi skabs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// nyi ma bzhi pa'i man ngag bshad// 'jam dpal thugs kyi nyid khwa las// drug po
194a6(sha): ga nad kyi 'khrul 'khor la// tshad can sbyor ba nyi ma'i grangs// rim bzhin thabs kyis dbye bar bya// nyi ma bzhi yi skya rings la// mi yi sha khrag la sogs te//
194a7(sha): sna tshogs gtor ma char bca'// bdag nyid gshed bdag gsal bsgoms te// nyi ma dang po'i sngags bzlas pa sa// ye shes rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis//
194b1(sha): gshed po ya ma rA dza de// rang dbang med par las la ba chug/ de sa ni nag 'joms phya sangs dang // kong tse brag gyon las la bcug/ des ni ri che 'gong yag dang //
194b2(sha): 'chi ba dag mi dur sa dar rje// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ des ni srin po'i sgrol ging ste// pra ma rA dza las la bskul// snang srid lha 'dre yod tshad bskul//
194b3(sha): nyi ma dang po'i las mthar rdzogs// de yang srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // gdug pa gsum gyi sa las mtha' brtul// dmar thag chad nas de rnams paskul//
194b4(sha): gtor ma dgra yi phyogs su btang // nyi ma gnyis pa'i skya rings la// gtor ma bcas te khro ba dag bsgom// gshed po myos byed 'bar ba bskul// des ni glang
194b5(sha): mgo ya ba ti// gsod byed rje rnams las la bcug/ des ni tho yo nag po rje// ya ba dkor nag bkos pa dag dregs// bskul te des ni ga shin rje'i gying //
194b6(sha): ya ma ga sha las la bcug/ snang srid lha 'dre thams cad bskul// nyi ma gnyis pa'i las mtha' rdzogs// de yang gshin rje'i tshogs rnams dang /
194b7(sha): gdug pa gsum gyis las mtha' ba rtul// dmar thag chad nas de rnams bskul// gtor ma dgra phyogs de bzhin btang // nyi ma gsum pa'i skya rings la//
195a1(sha): gtor ma bcas te gshed pa dag bsgom// sngags bzlas ar+ya dmar po bskal// des ni thod du byug dmigs pa dang // dmar po dbang med
195a2(sha): las la bcug/ des ni tho yo mtshams su rje// brang dkar rngam pa mtshams ba dud dregs// bskul te des ni bdud kyi ging // da sha gri ba las la bcug/ des ni snang
195a3(sha): srid lha 'dre bskul// nyi ma gsum pa'i las mtha' rdzogs// de yang ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang // gdug pa gsum gyis las mtha' brtul// nyi ma dmar
195a4(sha): thag chad pa dang // de rnams drag bskul gtor ma btang // nyi ma bzhi pa'i skya rings la// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma bcas// khro rgyal ye shes byin rlabs
195a5(sha): kyis// gshed po ral pa tshar dgu bskul// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ des ni rtol pa bdud 'joms dang // chos kyi rgyal po dbang med bskul//
195a6(sha): des ni ga ti mug phag mgo rje// rngam pa glo zan swa 'dar rje// rang dbang med par las la bcug/ dres ni gnod sbyin sgrol ging ste// ya ga sha re tsa dA bang
195a7(sha): med bskul// des ni snang srid lha 'dre rnams// yod ched rang dbang med par bskul// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las mtha'i rdzogs// de yang gnod sbyin
195b1(sha): bdud kyi tshogs// gdug pa gsum gyis las mtha' brtul// nyi ma dmar thag chad pa dang // de rnams bskul la gtor ma btang // nyi ma bzhi yi gtor
195b2(sha): ma la// bcas dang nyi phyed gtong kha ru// khugs dang byin rlabs mchod pa dbul// nyin re drag sngags khri gsum re// las rnams gang yang 'grub pa yin//
195b3(sha): sngags re lha re las mkhan ro// gdug pa'i dpal re mi mthun pas// nyi ma bzhi zhes de phyir ba shad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ nyi ma bzhi
195b4(sha): yi man ngag gi le'u ste bdun brgya nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // thugs mchog ya ma rA dza yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// drag
195b5(sha): po sngags rgod sbyor ba la// rtsa ba'i nges don du dang ldan// 'khor la rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas yang bshad pa// drag sngags rtsa ba'i
195b6(sha): sbyor ba rnams// rgya chen po ni zhus pa nyon// chos sku'i rol pa rang shar ba'i// drag sngags rtsa ba'i sbyor ba la// don gyi rim pa bcu dang bdu na// de dag
195b7(sha): rgyas pa 'di lta ste// rtogs pa bzhi dang dgrod pa gsum// 'dun pa gsum dang g+ha sta nges bzhi// yin pa bzhi dang 'char lugs gsum// gsad
196a1(sha): lugs gsum dang man na lugs gsu ma// rang shar rang la dbab lugs drug/ sdebs gsum drag sngags las drug dang // mkha'
196a2(sha): 'gro gzan la dbab lugs gsum// gsal ba gsum dang gdul thabs gsum// drag sngags sbyor ba smin dus lnga// yi ge'i don gsum 'pho ba gsum//
196a3(sha): de dag drag sngags rtsa bar bshad// ya ma ra tsa sa yang gsol pa// rtog pa bzhi zhes bya ba'i don// ji ltar rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas//
196a4(sha): bka' stsal pa/ rtog pa bzhi yi gtan tshigs ni// rgyu gcig yig 'bru byin gyis brlabs// mngon sum pa ru rtogs pa'o// rgyu gcig rtogs pa
196a5(sha): 'khor 'das chos// thams cad ma rig ye shes rgyu// de rgyu bde gshegs snying por gcig/ yig 'bru sems can lus ngag yid// snang stong gnyis med/
196a6(sha): sku gsung thugs// med snang dbyer med yig 'bru gsum// byin rlabs 'khor 'das chos thams cad// de bzhin nyid du des byin brlabs// lcags la
196a7(sha): gser 'gyur thebs bzhin 'gyur// mngon sum thams cad sems nyid las// gzhan med yang dag don de nyid// rang rig mngon sum gsal ba'o// zhes
196b1(sha): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ bgrod pa gsum zhes bgyi ba'i don// ji ltar rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' spru la ra/
196b2(sha): bgro pa gsum zhes bshad pa ni// snod sbyang phyir na bum pa'i dbang // don rtags phyir ni dur khrod brgyan// brtul zhugs ldan phyir baM chen dbang //
196b3(sha): de ltar bgrod pa rab tu gces// zhes bka' stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ 'dun pa gsum zhes bgyi ba'i don// ji ltar lags pa rgyas bshad gsol//
196b4(sha): ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dun pa gsum zhes bya ba'i don// zhi khro the brang la sogs par// snang srid lha srin thams cad kyi// srog snying
196b5(sha): rnam shes e la 'dus// phan gnod las rnams ka la 'dus// las srog 'dus pa'i 'dun pa'o// des na drag sngags dmod bzlas pas// ya tha rgyal ba
196b6(sha): zhi khro nas// ma tha sa srin the brang bar// gang gcol las rnams myur byed cing // yi ge rang ga nad rgyud las grub// des na gzir zhing 'dul 'dod na//
196b7(sha): mi thub gcig med 'dun pa'o// de dag ngo bo'am 'dug tshu la ni// gdod nas chos nyid stong pa nyid// rnam dag dbyings su kun gcig pas// chos nyid chos
197a1(sha): nyid rol pa yin// snang ba'i gzugs dang sku thams cad// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang bas// longs spyod rdzogs skur gcig pas na//
197a2(sha): ye shes ye shas rol pa yin// las dang thugs rje ji snyed kun// sprul pas 'gro ba'i don byed pas// sgyu ma la ni skye ma rol// yin pas sgrib par 'gro
197a3(sha): rgyu// rdal tsam med pa'i 'dun pa'o// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyis// rdo rje 'chang chen spyan sngar ru// rang srog snying po phul dus su//
197a4(sha): srog dang las rnams thams cad kun// e ka la ba sus 'dun pa dang // bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// lhun grub che bdag gis 'khor na// bde
197a5(sha): gshegs rdzogs sku ba rtul zhugs can// dreg sa pa pho mo rnga ma sprul 'khor// lha 'khor rigs bzhir rtogs pa kun// mngags na thog sa med las//
197a6(sha): don 'grub// gnod na rang ga na da stobs kyis gzir// srog dpra la thogs med 'dun pa'o// thams cad ye shes rol pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas
197a7(sha): thebs pas// sdig pas mi gos 'dun pa'o// zhes bka' stsa la pas/ yang gsol pa/ lta stangs bzhi zhes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka'
197b1(sha): sprul pa/ don las yid ches bya ba'i phyir// lta stangs rnam bzhi 'di lta ste// glang po che yi lta stangs kyis// bla med bde ba mchog la dmigs// gung
197b2(sha): po 'phen gyi lta stangs kyis// thams cad thugs rje chen pos bzung // ltom po rgod kyi lta stangs kyis// 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya mngon du dmigs// myur ba sad
197b3(sha): ge'i lta stangs kyi sa// thams cad zhing yang zil gnon sgrol// de dag rgyas par bshad pa ni// glang po che yi lta stangs kyis// drag sngags dgos pa las
197b4(sha): mtshon dpe// glang chen spu gsebs chus btab// snre la ral gri kha mangs btags// car sha ri yi che blud nas// yan lag lcags thag la bstod de//
197b5(sha): shang sang dgra la kha bstan bzhag/ phas kyi dmag 'joms rang yul bsrung // de bzhin sngags pa dbang dang ldan// dpal chen khro rgyal ska ru gsal//
197b6(sha): lus rnams khro bo'i go chas brtabs// drag sngags gdug pa'i mtshon bzlas pas// gzhan gyi las dang sbyor ba dang // rdza dang srog gzungs gcod byed cing //
197b7(sha): rang 'khor lus srog srung skyob byed// gung po 'phen gyi lta stangs ni// bung bas drag sngags yon tan mtshono// bung bas me tog bcud blangs pas// rang gi ru//
198a1(sha): gso 'tsho bar byed// de bzhin srog byed 'bru gsum gyis// gzhan gyi srog snying bcud 'byin cing // rang srog rigs brgyud spel ba'o//
198a2(sha): ltom po rgod kyi lta stangs kyis// bya rgod drag sngags brtul zhugs mtshon// bya rgod gnam la gzan babs na// gtsang sme med par za ba bzhin// drag po sngags
198a3(sha): rgod byin rlabs kyis// zhi khro nas ni the brang bar// dka' sla re dog med 'joms pa'o// myur ba seng ge'i lta stangs ni// drag sngags nus mthu stobs mtshon
198a4(sha): dpe// seng ges gcan gzan la sogs rnams// ral pa gsegs shing mche ba gtsigs// thams cad brgyal zhing sngangs par byed// gsad na mi thub gang yang
198a5(sha): med// drug sngags nus mthu byin rlabs rnams// ye nas rang bzhin grub gnas pas// bsnyen bsgrub bya btsal mi dgos te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ye nas
198a6(sha): sngon// byin gyis brlabs shing lhun grub pas// thams cad 'joms shing srog gcod pa'o// yang na lta stangs rnam bzhi ni// glang po ches ni rang nyid kyis//
198a7(sha): sgo gsum lha ru ma yangs gsol// bdag bsrungs gnod byed 'joms sgrol ba'o// bung bas rang 'khor rigs brgyud spel// bgegs kyis mi tshugs bsrungs
198b1(sha): pa'o// bya rgod gtsang sme med pa bzhin// gang la bya ba'i gdul byed// dka' sla re dog med 'joms pa'o// seng ge gang yin gdul bya la// bsnyen bsgrub/
198b2(sha): brtsol med 'joms pa'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa'i rgyud las/ don gyi rtsa ba'i le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu pa'o// /
198b3(sha): / ya ma ra dzA sa yang gsol ba// yin pa bzhi zhes gang sngags pa// don de rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/
198b4(sha): drag sngags dang ni 'khor lo rnams// rnam pa rtsa dang yi ge yin// rang bzhin lha dang gzhal yas khang // nus mthu rno dpal mtshon cha yin// zhes bka' sprul
198b5(sha): pas// yang gsol ba/ drag po sngags kyi 'char lugs gsum// rnam pa rtsa dang yi ge yin// rang bzhin lha dang gzhal yas khang // nus mthu rno dpal mtshon cha
198b6(sha): yin// 'phrin las sna tshogs 'grub byed yin// zhes bka' stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ drag po sngags kyi 'char lugs gsum// phyi nang rgyas par bshad du
198b7(sha): gsol// zhes zhus pas bka' stsal pa/ chos nyid don dam glo bya'i phyir// drag po sngags rgod 'char lugs gsum// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad
199a1(sha): kyi// dngos gzhi chos kyi sku yin pas// ci spyad thams cad chos nyid rol par 'char ba dang // snang grags dngos kun sgyu mar snang // ye
199a2(sha): shes lhun grub rdzogs skur gsal// des na byed spyod ye shes la// ye shes rol par 'char ba dang // 'khrul pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// sprul pa thabs kyi rol
199a3(sha): pa nyid// ma 'gags sna tshogs 'char bas nang // sgyu ma la yang sgyu mar rol// drag sngags ye shes rol pa ru// rang bzhin nyid kyis 'char ba'o// zhes bka
199a4(sha): stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ gsang lugs gsum zhes ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ drag sngags las smin bya ba'i phyir//
199a5(sha): gsad lugs rnam pa gsum yin te// rten med gsad dang rten can gsad// sbyor ba thun mong gsad pa'o// rten med gsad pa zhes bya ba// gnag pa rang
199a6(sha): rgyud snying gi 'khor lo la// drag sngags yi ge rang grub tu gnas pas// drag sngags gzas dang ting 'dzin rkyen dag gis// rtsa dang srog gzung nang nas rang bcad de/
199a7(sha): bag chags khrag skam bdag gi thugs ka yi// rus sbal gsang mdzod nang du sdud pa'o// yang na srid pa'i rus sbal lto ba ru// dgra bo gang yin snyigs ma'i srog
199b1(sha): bsdus la// ye shes mes bsregs dang ma hUM gi tshul// tshangs pa'i lam bton skye med dbyings su thim// sngags 'od zer gyis me rlung 'khrugs// bag chags
199b2(sha): khrag sregs lus dbang ri bshig pa'o// rten can gsad pa zhes bya ba// brnag pa stobs can gcig la kun gyis srog rnams bsdus// drag sngags bzlas la snying //
199b3(sha): dkyil gsang ba dang // mgrin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo bzhi la thim zhing bskul// rtsa gcad srog bsdus rus sbal gsang mdzod sdus// yang na dmigs pa'i ming rus
199b4(sha): dbus su nr-i bris la// mtha' ma drug sngags kyis bskor la dril byas te// rdzas kyis rus sbal lhor gzhug phag ltor brtag/ mchod rten nag po bskor zhing gsad
199b5(sha): pa'o// sbyor ba thun mong gsad pa ni// sbyor ba'i yan lag gang brtsams mthar// thod par srog bsdus mnan pa'o// 'khor lo'i rgyud rnams so sor las kyi
199b6(sha): dmigs dang sbyar// rus sbal lto bar bcas te dug dang khrag la sogs// rten 'brel rdzas bskus ming rus li ga bris// 'khor lo kha sbyar 'brub khung gsad
199b7(sha): pa'o// zhes bka' stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ mnan lug la gsum zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol bas/ bka' stsal pa/ las de
200a1(sha): brtan zhing spags pa med bya'i phyir// gnan lugs gsum ni gnam sa par snang ngo // nam mkha' la gnan rnam pa gsum yin te//
200a2(sha): 'gyur ba med pa chos nyid lhor ga nan ni// srid pa rus sbal tsit+ta'i pho brang du// e yi khongs su nr-i bsdus gnan pa'o// yang na skye med a yi rang bzhin las//
200a3(sha): drag po'i skye ba'i cho 'phrul e zhes pas// thams cad srog bsngas thugs kha'i khyams khangs su// yan lag ka rten drug gi ge nan pa'o// sna tshogs nam
200a4(sha): mkha' chos 'byung lhor gnan pa// rus sbal rtsa yi steng sgo ba// snying po thams cad bsdus pa'i mchog/ e gnas lto bar nr-i bsdus gnan// yang nA rus sbal
200a5(sha): tsit+ta ni// rin chen 'od 'bar gnas de ru// brnag pa kun gyi srog bsdus te// dang se ma bzhi yi stobs kyis ga nan// mtshan bsdus chos dbyings lhor mnan
200a6(sha): pa ra// rus sbal lto ba pra 'chang gsang mdzod du// brnag pa du yod che srog bkrag mdangs kun// hU nri dza ma bzhir bsdus 'chang ba'o// yang na ya mA ra tsa
200a7(sha): la sogs te// gsang ba'i gshed po bzhi lto bar srog bsdus te// rang gnas lha yi stobs kyis mnan pa'o// bar snang la gnas gsum yin te//
200b1(sha): bde chen po yi ltor mnan pa// mchod rten khri 'phang la mnan pa'o// rin po che yi rdzing mnan pa// mchod rten ga dan khriri 'og mnan pa// sa gzhi ga nan
200b2(sha): pa drug yin te// seng ge'i khog par mnan pa ni// byin can dkyil 'khor 'og mnan pa'o// stag gi 'dzum pa mnan pa ni// ri gzar kha nas chu 'bab
200b3(sha): bam// chu chen 'gab kyi chu mig la'o// gzig gi thig ler mnan pa ni// lu ma 'khyil bar mnan pa'o// 'brong gi thod khrag mnan pa ni// ri gsum bar gyi
200b4(sha): thod khrag lam// ri gnyan rtse 'am gong gsum patsan// la rdzas dag la gnan pa'o// srin mo'i sgroms su mnan pa ni// ri brag dmar la gzar ba yi//
200b5(sha): bar nas 'bab pa'i chu mig gnyan// rtsi shing nags tshal sran spun yod sar ma nan// mun pa'i gleng du mnan pa ni// dur khrod mchod rten ro khung du'o// zhes
200b6(sha): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rang gshed rang la dbab lugs drug/ ces gsungs rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa//
200b7(sha): rang gshed rang rang dbab lugs drug ni// seng ge khog pa bshig pa ni// slob dpon dang rgyas pasgral ba ni// stag mo kha 'thab zhes bya ba// sngags pa nang
201a1(sha): rgyas bsad pa ni// seng ge mtshams sbyar zhes bya ba// sgrub sde gcig pa bsad pa yin// rdo rje rme 'thab zhes bya ba// slob bu dam
201a2(sha): nyams bsad pa yin// pho nya rkang mgyogs slar bzlog pa// bon po'am mu stegs bsadra pa yin// gnam lcags ur mo nang 'thab pa// drag sngags
201a3(sha): mkhan nang bsad pa yin// de la 'char lugs rnam pa gsum// chos nyid las ni ye shes kyi// rol par 'char ba zhes bya// stong nyid rig par
201a4(sha): 'char ba'o// ye shes las kyi phyag rgya yi// rol par 'char ba zhes bya ba// rig pa gzugs skur 'char ba'o// phyag rgya las ni thugs rje yis//
201a5(sha): rol par 'char ba zhes bya ba// don mdzad thugs rje bzhir 'char ba'o// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ rtsa ba don
201a6(sha): gyi le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so gcig go// / ya ma rA dzas yang gsol pa// sdebs gsum zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// zhes gsol
201a7(sha): pas/ bka' stsal pa/ sdebs gsum ni gang bshad pa// thun mong khyad par yan lag sdebs// dang po thun mong sdebs zhes pa// gang rung sngags rgod/
201b1(sha): rtsa ba dang // spu gri srog dang ming rus khams// brda dang snying po gcig bsdebs pa'o// gnyis pa khyad par bsdebs zhes pa// ye shes lha dang ma mo dang //
201b2(sha): gnod sbyin las byed bsnyen pa dang // drag sngags gcig tu lto sdebs pa'o// gsum pa yan lag sdebs la gsum// shi men bdud kyi sbyor ba bzlog/
201b3(sha): gzhan gyi stobs can gzir ba dang // mkha' 'gro gzas kha dgra la dbab// sngags kyi dug mda' phab pa dang // srog gcod yi ge rgyud las bslangs//
201b4(sha): rang gshed dbab cing lus srog dbye ba'o// zhes gsungs pa'o// yang gsol pa/ drag sngags las drug ces bgyi ba// ji ltar rgyas par bshad du
201b5(sha): gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsa la pa/ drag sngags las drug ces bya ba// nam mkha'i dkyil du mthing nag gi/ phyar ba sprin pa kra ma bshig pa
201b6(sha): dang / bar snang khams su nyi zla yi// 'od zer spros la bzung ba dang // ri rab rtse la ga nam lhags kyi// mtshon dbal ba dar la bcad pa dang //
201b7(sha): ri dang mtshams su zhe sdang gi/ gzhu de bcag la gzir ba dang // me rlung 'obs su srid pa yi// ri bo bsgyel la gsad pa dang // rgya mtsho'i gting du mun pa yi//
202a1(sha): dmag rnams bsdus la gnan pa'o// de dag rgyas pa 'di lta ste// dang po khro rgyal spyi bo ru// bya khyung gsal bsgoms gshog pa yi//
202a2(sha): phyi nang 'og chungad zil ga nan pa'o// phyi snod gru gsum mthing nag 'bar// nang bcud khro bo bsam mi khyab// de ltar thams cad sgrol zhing 'joms pa'o// ga
202a3(sha): pa bya khyud spyan gnyis las// nyi zla'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros// gzas pa'i tshe srog bzung bsdus nas// rus sbal srid pa'i lto 'chang ba'o// drag po sdug
202a4(sha): rgod bzlas byas pas// 'od zer me lce thog ltar 'phros// gzas pa'i bla sog bsdus shing bzung // 'brub khung rten la bstim zhing bsad// gsum pa bye
202a5(sha): khyud gshog pa dang // spu dang sder mos mchu dpal gyis// rtswa srog sbyor ba gcod pa'o// drag po'i thun rdzas byin rlabs can// thog gzer tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas/
202a6(sha): dmigs pa dngul chu glag byed pa'o// bzhi pa lha rnams mthu stobs kyis// gnod byed don po'i tshe bkrag phral// gzir zhing rang 'khor bsrung ba'o// bdag
202a7(sha): nyid khro rgyal dpal chen gyi// zhabs 'og gdan du kun 'dus pas// gnod byed srog snying gdan 'og bsdus// rang dbang med par gzir ba'o// lnga pa 'khor
202b1(sha): lo'i thems par de// thod mkhar nang dang rus sbal ltor// gnod byed bla srog tshe bkrag bsdus// gzugs kyi ri bo bshig pa'o// drag po las kyi 'brub khrung ni//
202b2(sha): srid pa bla yi khyams khang du// don po'i bla srog ling gar bsdus// mtshon cha drag pos bsad pa'o// drug pa bsad dmigs srog bsdus te// 'byung ba brtan gzhi rngam
202b3(sha): 'og tu// rang dbang med par gnan pa'o// brnag pa'i tshe srog bag chags bla// snying po yig 'bru nau la bsdus// gang dmigs gdug pa'i sar mnan pa'o// zhes
202b4(sha): gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab lugs gsum// zhes gsungs rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa/
202b5(sha): mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab lugs gsum// rang gnod lto dkrug drag pos dbab pa dang // sbyor ba thun sreg drag pos dbab pa dang // drag po gzir thabs dag gi/
202b6(sha): dbab pa'o// dang po phas kyi bsrung ma gang yin pa// rang gi snying pos gnas su dbang med dgug/ drag po stobs kyi gzir te kho yi gsad sngags dang // drug sngags
202b7(sha): rang gi 'khrul 'khor la btab ste// dug shing dud pas bdugs la sngags rnams dkrug/ rang dbang med par gzas la dgral 'pho// gnyis pa rgyu rten langag thod
203a1(sha): par gnag/ thun bzhi'i sbyor bas kho yi lha srungs dang // ling ga drag po'i gnad kyi rdzas kyis bdug/ thu na brag sreg
203a2(sha): mthar zor 'phang mnan pa'o// gsum pa rus sbal lto bar 'khor lo dbus// drag po'i gnas su kho yi srungs ma sngags// snying po
203a3(sha): ming bcas dgra yi ming rus dgod// drag sngags stong gis gzir zhing gri yis bsadra// tshes gcig dag la dbu btsugs bcu drug
203a4(sha): gdon// yang na bcu drug dbu btsugs gcig la gnon// 'khor lo dgra yi sgrub khang gnan byas pas// rang dbang med
203a5(sha): par gzas kha dgra la 'pho// zhes gsungs so// yang gsol pa// / gsal ba gsum zhes bgyi ba ji ltar

203a7(sha): bdag nyid lha yi sku ru bsgoms// don rtags ldan par lus dang rtog gnas dang // snying po chos kyi 'khor lor lha rnams bsgom// sgrib sbyang
203b1(sha): don mtshon 'bras bu thob par gsal/ sngags gsal bdag nyid khro bdag thugs kyi rtser/ mthing nag hUM gsal gshin rje
203b2(sha): gshed la yang // phyag na rdo rje lnga hUM yum la ma// bya khyud khrom ste dam mthar rtsa ba'i sngags// grwar bzlos pa yis bskor bar
203b3(sha): gsal ba'o// sprul gsal ba ni gzas pa'i dgra bgegs kyis// rnam pags la byas drag po'i sngags bzlas pas//
203b4(sha): lha rnams ba spu las ni me rlung 'khor lo phyung // dgra bgegs lus srog dbang po'i nang grol blang // rang dbang med par dkrug nas
203b5(sha): gsang mdzod 'jug/ thog zer mtshon chas myos brgyal srog gcod gsal// de dgra gsal ba gsuma? zhes bshad//
203b6(sha): ces bka' stsal pas/ yang gsol pa/ gdul thabs gsum zhes gsungs pa ji ltar lags/

204a1(sha): ltas 'dul dregs pa sdes 'dul dang // ma nyams rang gis rang 'dul gsum du bshad//
204a2(sha): dang po ye shes khro rgyal gnyen po'i lha// gang rung bsgoms bsgrubs drag sngags bzlas// de yi stobs kyis gang dmigs
204a3(sha): 'dul ba'o// gnyis pa srog snying drug po sngags gnad kyi/ gang gnod gdon chen rang sde 'thun pa yis/

204a5(sha): ting 'dzin gnad kyi byin rlabs kyis// me ltar 'bar te spyi gtsug bu gar mched// lus srog thal bar gnas nas 'dul ba'o//
204a6(sha): zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ drag sngags sbyor ba smin dus lnga// zhes gsungs rgyas
204a7(sha): par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' snre la pa/ drag sngags sbyor ba
204b1(sha): smin byed pa'i// dug lnga khyad par 'di lta ste// stug rgya khyu rlangs 'don dus dang // gnod sbyin d+ha rgu'i dus rnams
204b2(sha): dang // srin po lto la 'bru ba dus dang / rus sbal khong du yan dus dang // chu srin rnga ma 'khyog dus so//
204b3(sha): dang po drag sngags 'od zer 'phro// tho rangs skya rengs dang pa'o// gnyis pa drag sngags 'od zer gyis//
204b4(sha): srog sdud nam gyi gung la'o// gsum pa dgra yi phung po la// shu za drug khri bstod cing rol// de nyid srod li dbying/
204b5(sha): la'o// bzhi pa rus sbal lta ba ru// skye ba bdun brgyud tshe srog 'chang // nam phyed yol na las byed do//

204b7(sha): gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las/ rtsa ba don gyi le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so gnyis pa'o// /
205a1(sha): ya ma rA dzas yang gsol pa// yi ge'i don gsum ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pas yang gsungs pa// yi ge'i don la rnam/
205a2(sha): gsum ste// rang rgyud gnas pa'i yi ge dang // srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge dang // las dang sbyor ba smin pa'i yi ge'o// rang rgyud gnas pa'i yi ge ni// bdag
205a3(sha): nyid dpal chen khro bo'i rgyal// ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo lo// rtsa chen bzhi dang rtsa bran brgyad// dngas ma'i rtsal rtsa ba'i
205a4(sha): sngags drag sngags ye nas rang grub tu// ye shes 'od kyis rnam par gnas// des ni bdag gi lus srog tshe// srung skyob go char gyur pa ste/
205a5(sha): lhahrI rgyu rlugs lnga phyir ro// drag sngags mthu stobs dgra bgegs la// bskyod cing bskul bar byed rkyen no// brtag pa rang b+h+yod r+b+ho dang 'khor lo la// drag sngags
205a6(sha): spu gri mo chen cha'i rnam par gnas// de dag dbus na khrag gi sprul pa ni// bye'u lan cha'i mgo bo tsam cig gnas// de yi lto na snying sgo yi nag po// 'og sgo med mar 'ad
205a7(sha): tshigs zhe sdang dngos// ba ra na gti mug bskyed pa'i ma nag mo// khongs na srog gi ngo bo nr-i ljang khu// de yi tshul ni sprin dang zhun thab dang // khrag khol lta bur gnas
205b1(sha): la drag sngags dmod pa bzlas// sngags kyi 'od zer nyi ma'i zer ltar 'phros// brnag pa'i bu ga spyi bo snying ltar zhugs// rang rgyud gnas pa'i sngags las mtshon
205b2(sha): char 'bar// nang nas rang gcod mtshon chas rang rtsa gcad// mar mo'i 'og gri ya las me 'bar bas// steng gi nag po yid khrag tu bzhu// khrag gi mar
205b3(sha): mo ya srog me 'bar gsad// khrag dang bag chags skams mas shes pa dang sa snyigs phye// dngas pa tshangs pa gser gyi bu ga nas// hU gis rnam pa bton
205b4(sha): nas rab 'bring tha ma yis// ye shes bla ma'i sa dang lha yi sku rgyan pa// rang gi lus kyi go cha tshe yi grogs su byas// don po srog gi snyigs ma nr-i ni ljang khu ste//
205b5(sha): 'phrog byed yi ge 'bru gsum thems la blangs// seng gi spar bas srog chags bsams ltar gnas// ze la khab 'du'i tshul du rang dbang med par 'du//
205b6(sha): rus sbal lto bar ling gi ming la thim// dregs shing gdug pa can gyi lag tu ga tad// des ni brnag pa gang yang 'tshor mi sra// srog dang rgyan gyi yi ge ni//
205b7(sha): sog ces bya ba rtsa ba'i sngags// lha rnams srog snying rang bzhin no// rgyan gyi drag sngags spu gri ste// skabs kyis du mar sna tshogs pa sgyur// des ni kas
206a1(sha): drabab bsrung gzer bzlog/ las rnams du ma 'grub pa ste// mtshon cha'i rgyal po me rlung sbyin 'dang gi/ 'bru rgod dug rar blud pa'o//
206a2(sha): las dang sbyor ba smin pa'i yi ge ni// rang rang sbyor ba sgyus bzhin bcas// drag sngags rtsa ba spu gri yis// bai rau du bsgrub bya bcug cing bzlas// baM sad
206a3(sha): gzir dbab bcad pa srung bzlog rnams// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'grub byed cing // gang 'dod 'bras bu smin pa'i// zhes gsungs pas// yang
206a4(sha): gsol pa// 'pho ba gsum zhes bya ba'i don// ji ltar gang lags bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas// bka' stsal pa// 'pho ba gsum zhes
206a5(sha): gang bshad pa// rnal 'byor pa yau lus ngag yid// lha yi sku gsung thugs su 'pho// dgra bgegs dmigs pa gang yin gyi// lus ni sha za'i tshig
206a6(sha): su 'pho/ ngag ni sna tshogs mtshon char 'pho// sems ni ye shes gsal bar 'pho// ci phyir drug sngags ting 'dzin dang // sbyor ba'i byin gyis brlas
206a7(sha): phyir ro// yang na rnal 'byor dgongs ldan pa'i// lus ni snang la rang bzhin med// chu zla yid kyi lus su 'pho// ngag ni grog stong gnyis su med//
206b1(sha): brag cha lta bu'i gsung du 'pho// sems ni sgrib med rnam par dag/ nyi ma lta bu'i ye shes 'pho// gdul bya dmigs pa gang rung gi/ gzugs phung
206b2(sha): dregs pa gtum por 'pho// ngag ni rang gcod sngags su 'pho// yid ni dngos med stong par 'pho// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal khri drug stong
206b3(sha): pa kun 'dus mchog gi rgyud las// mngon par rtog pa'i le'u ste bdun brgya sum cu so gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang che na

206b5(sha): sbyor ba ni// dur khrod la ma mdo chu 'gram dang // shing gcig mtshan ma gcig pa dang // grog mkhar ri rgod rtse mo dang // ma mo'i khyim dang lha khang
206b6(sha): dong / las kyi ga shin rje'i gnas sa la// btsan dang li yi khyi chu dang // chu rgod ga nyan chu gri khrag gis// sbyor te ga shin rje nag po'i gzugs//
206b7(sha): zhal gcig phyag gnyis khrug 'tshad// kha gsangs mche ga rtsigs gsus ldir che// mig bsgribs sma ra smin ma ser// sgra ni kham nag rgyan du 'khyil//

208a3(sha): 'grub/ dgra bo'i rgyu rten gzugs ming rus// sku de'i zhal dang lto bar gzhug/ 'od zer rno myur lcags kyu 'dras// don po bkug ste gzugs la bstim

209a1(sha): rje'i gdan la bzhugs// o ta thA ga to dzi na dzig badz+ra nir ma kro d+ha ya man ta kA hUM/ khro bo chen po sgra che ba// zhe sdang gshin rje'i bdud

209b1(sha): swa b+ha ba rat+na d+h+r-i ka gu na sa ka ya man ta ka hUM/ 'jig rten sgra ste rab kyis mchog/ 'dod chags gshin rje'i bdud 'dul ba// kun rtogs ye shes rang shar sku/

209b3(sha): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus dmar zhal// dang po pad+ma kha T+wAM kha// bar pa dgra sta b+h+ya zhags 'phen// mtha' ma lcags kyu ril ming bsnams//

210a7(sha): nag ral gri dung dmar bsnams// bdag 'dzin bdud kyi gdan la bzhugs// oM pradz+nyA badz+ra ra tA taM/ kun kyang khro mo 'jigs tshul rngam//
210b1(sha): dpa' sgeg byams pa'i ma dang sa kyis bzhugs// rtag par 'dzin pa ga shi ne rje'i sgra// rdo rje ral gri mthing nag khros// oM badz+ra kha D+ha d+hi ga/ chad par 'dzin
210b2(sha): pa ga shin rje'i sgra// rdo rje be tson ser nag rngams// o badz+ra danA d+hig/ bdag tu 'dzin pa ga shin rje'i sgra// rdo rje pad+mA da ma ra nag pa rdzid// oM pad+ma d+h+rig/
210b3(sha): mtshan mar 'dzin pa gshin rje'i dgra// rdo rje tho ba ljang nag ga tu me// oM badz+ra mud ka ra d+hig/ ku na kyang ga shi na rje'i gdan la bzhugs// spyan gsum mche
210b4(sha): gtsigs khro bo'i sku// ma dpung klong na brkyang ba skum bzhugs// dur khrod chas kyis rab tu brgya na// yab yum gtso 'khor thams cad la// rus pa'i chas

211a1(sha): rtogs las rim 'di bshad do// oM gdod nas rnam dag byang chub sems// bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin las// bdag
