211a6(sha): AMt+ma ko ha hUM rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa yi// ye shes sgyu ma cir yang snang // snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// thams cad gzhe' tshon bzhin du gsal/
211a7(sha): oM d+harmA d+ha du swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&hahU chos rnams snying po byang chub sems// ye shes rol pa rang shar las// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rjer snang //
211b1(sha): oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ye shes rtsal shar khyad par las// me rlung chu yi snying po yis// 'jig rten khams rnams bsregs sbyangs bkrus// raM yaM khaM/
211b2(sha): steng 'og nam mkha' sa gzhi kun// 'khor lo pad+mA shes rab thabaso// oM sarba d+harma pu na da tsakra Ang+ge ko&haM rdo rje thugs kyi snying po las// zad par lnga yi
211b3(sha): skye mched 'phros// e yaM ra la khaM su b+h+rUM// e yi ye shes rol pa las// nam mkha' go 'byed kun khyab yang // yaM gyi ye shes rol pa las// dngos med
211b4(sha): kun khyab 'degs byed rlung // ra gyi ye shes rol pa a// 'od gsal smin sreg me dpung 'bar// kha gyi ye shes rol pa las// gnyen sdud dag pa chu yi kham//
211b5(sha): la gyi ye shes rol pa las// swA brtan 'degs byed rin chen sa// sum g+hi ye shes rol pa las// rin chen ri rab yon tan rgyas// b+h+rUM gyi ye shes rol pa la//
211b6(sha): chos dbyings mtha' dbus med pa yi// phyi dang nang med gzhal yas khang // rdo rje rgya gram mu khyud bcas// gru chad sgo bzhi rdo rje me// dur khrod chen po me rir 'bar//
211b7(sha): de nas rang rang ga dan stengs su// phyag rgya chen po gsal bar bskyed// e badz+ra shu n+ya ga ga na hUM/ yaM ba yu maN+Da la karma hU/ raM dz+wa la maN+Dal hUM/ khaM sa mud ta
212a1(sha): maN+Dal hUM/ laM sarba ti sha maN+Da la hUM/ su badz+ra rat+na maN+Da la hUM/ b+h+rUM bi sha bi shud d+he/ dz+nyA na badz+ra karma da du maN+Da la hU/ gshin
212a2(sha): rje nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// phyogs bzhi la sogs dbus su gi dang // rdza ma ru tra tir badza ma tri pa ti ra baM/ dza ma ra ka sha ti ra gadzamasan
212a3(sha): ma sur+ya maN+Dal a tsan+ta maN+Da la/ pa pun da maN+Da la/ ya ma me ta k+She/ ya tsa ni ra dza sa to ru na yo ni ra s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hU/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ rdo rje rgya gram
212a4(sha): lte dbus su// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyi//
212a5(sha): khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje'i sku// shin tu khro gtum sgeg par gsal// ya yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje dbyings phyug ri langs ma// thabs dang shes rab
212a6(sha): geganyis med pa'i// thugs kyi snying po 'od 'phros pas// sku gsungs thugs kyi cho 'phrul las// ye shes khro bo'i dkyil 'khor snang // ma yi ye shes rol pa
212a7(sha): las/ shar du zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// dza yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje tsa tsam ka gnyis gsal// me yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru ser sna rdo rje nyid//
212b1(sha): sa yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje phag gdong gsal bar bskyed// ta yi ye shes rol pa las// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje dang // rdo yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje
212b2(sha): dbyangs can gsal bar bskyed// k+She yi ye shes rol pa las// byang du phrag dog rdo rje dang // ru yi ye shes rol pa las// rdo rje mdzod ldan gsal bar bskyed//
212b3(sha): ya yi ye shes rol pa las// shar du rdo rje tho ba bskyed// tsa yi ye shes rol pa las// lho ru rdo rje be tshon bskyed// ni yi ye shes rol pa las// nang du rdo rje pad+ma
212b4(sha): bskyed/ rwa yi ye shes rol pa las/ byang du/ rdo rje ral gri bskyed// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// na yig 'dus pa'i gshin rje gshed//
212b5(sha): go sha na ti zhes bya'o// ni yig de ltar gshin rje gshed// stobs mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o// ra yi ge ma yig ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed// rga ba'i
212b6(sha): rgyal po zhes bya'o// bdag nyid dbus kyi sangs rgyas ni// gti mug rdo rje khro bo'i sku// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed chen dang // rdo rje dbyings phyug khro rgyal
212b7(sha): mo// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med par// sbyor bas byang chub sems su zhu// rtog med ye shes 'od du gyur// chos sku rnam dag dzang du gas la//
213a1(sha): tsa tsi ka sogs lha mo bzhis// dkyil 'khor bdag po sangs rgyas gtso// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje la/
213a2(sha): snyan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis bskul ba// kye/ chos sku byang chub snying po a// 'gro ba thugs rjes gzung ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun bdag khro bo'i rgyal//
213a3(sha): dpa' bo chen po'i sku mchog bzhengs// thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ zhes bskul gnyid log sad pa bzhin// ngo mtshar rdo rje'i sku ru bzhengs// mtshan dang
213a4(sha): dpe byad ldan pa ste// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs par snang // thugs las ye shis 'od 'phros pas// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas nam mkhar bsam// rigs
213a5(sha): mthun lha mo ba sam mi khyab// ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum chu yis// dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dbang bskur bya// ye shes rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas sku//
213a6(sha): dbus su rnam par snang mdzad de// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' 'o// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas so// byang du don yod grub
213a7(sha): pa'i gtso// dbus su de bzhin rigs lngas brgyan// gnas gsum yi ge 'bru gsum las// dkar dmar mthing kha'i 'od zer 'phros// sems can
213b1(sha): sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// dngos grub gsum bsdus thim gyur pas// lus ngag yi de gsum sku gsung thugs//
213b2(sha): rgyan gyi rdo rjes byin gyis brlab// ga nas ga sum rtog pa pad+ma ga ra// mi 'khrugs sangs rgya sU ru gyur// k+She traM hri dzI me b+h+r-i/ sa snying nam mkha'i spyan ras gzigs/
213b3(sha): phyag na rdo rje byamos pa dang // sgrib sel skye mched rnam drug brlab// oM ma hA shU dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ oM ma hA a ta ri sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA sa man ta dz+nyA na
213b4(sha): oM ma hA pra ta be sha dz+nyA na/ oM ma hA krit+ta a nu ta dz+nyA na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAk+ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ oM sarba ta thA/
213b5(sha): ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha/ de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bar bskyed// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi da gongs pa'i rgyud las/
213b6(sha): rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mngon rtogs rim pa rgyus
213b7(sha): bshad pa// hUM chos kyi sku las ma g.yos kyang // ye shes zang shar rig pa'i sku// gshin rje gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// rnga ma brjid khro bo'i
214a1(sha): rgyal por sprul// phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdo rje las// gti mug mun ltar gtibs pa yi// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas//
214a2(sha): gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug shes rab yum// thugs rje shugs kyis
214a3(sha): gshegs su gsol// zhe sdang me ltar mched pa yi// srog gcod gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo
214a4(sha): rje mi bskyod pa// rdo rje ci tsa shes rab yum// thugs rje byams ldan gshegs su gsol// nga rgyal brag ltar gtams pa yi// tshe 'phrog gshin rje'i gdan
214a5(sha): stengs nas// nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rin chen dbang // rdo rje phag gdong shes rab yum// thugs rje kun snyoms
214a6(sha): gshegs su gsol// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrug pa yi// khrag 'thung gshin rje'i gdan stengs nas// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms
214a7(sha): mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje snang mtha' yas// rdo rje dbyangs can shes rab yum// thugs rje dbang gis gshegs su gsol// phrag dog rlung ltar
214b1(sha): 'tshubs pa yi// dbugs len gshin rje'i gdan stangs nas// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje don yod grub// rdo rje
214b2(sha): mdzod ldan shes rab yum// thugs rje 'dul mdzad gshegs su gsol// shar phyogs rdo rje'i rigs las sprul// rdo rje tho ba gshegs su gsol// lho
214b3(sha): phyogs rin chen rigs las sprul// rdo rje be con gshegs su gsol// nub phyogs pad+ma'i rigs las sprul// rdo rje pad+ma gshegs su gsol// byang phyogs
214b4(sha): las kyi rigs las sprul// rdo rje ral gri gshegs su gsol// bde gshegs rigs lnga sprul par bcas// gdul dka' 'dul phyir khro bo'i sku// ma lus
214b5(sha): spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol// hU/ rnam dag chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan lhun rdzogs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sna tshogs rang snang sku la phyag
214b6(sha): 'tshal lo// rang byung mi shigs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// ma chags mi g.yo'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// chos dbyings ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal
214b7(sha): gti mug rdo rje la'o// me long ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal zhe sdang rdo rje la'o// mnyam nyid ye shes rang shang sku// phyag 'tshal ser sna rdo rje la'o//
215a1(sha): kun rtogs ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal 'dod chags rdo rje la'o// bya grub ye shes rang shar sku// phyag 'tshal phrag dog rdo
215a2(sha): rje la'o// nam mkha'ago 'byed kun khya ba ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyings phyag ma'o// sa brtan mi 'ugyur brtan ldan ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje tsa tsi la'o//
215a3(sha): bsnyen sdud rnam par dag byed ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje phag gdong la'o// sgrib med kun gas la smin bye da ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dbyangs can la'o// thogs med
215a4(sha): khyab byed yang bskyod ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje mdzod ldan la'o// rdo rje tho ba bi con dang // rdo rje pad+ma ral gri ste// ye shes sprul pa'i lha chogs la// sgo gsu
215a5(sha): dang bas phyag 'tshal lo// hU rigs lnga ba de gshegs shes rab thabs// sangs rgyas khro dpal gshin rje gshed// sgrib sbyang dngos grub
215a6(sha): rtsal ba'i phyir// gnas 'drir brta na par be zhug sa su gso la// e h+ya hi b+ha ga wa na shrI ya man ta ka ma hA ka ru ni kri snA ya ma ri sha hUM sa ma ya ho//
215a7(sha): sa ma ya stau/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ a ti pu ho/ pra ti bu hai/ ma hA su ka sa ma ya hau/ sa ma ya stau/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen
215b1(sha): po'i rgyud las/ spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mchod
215b2(sha): pa'i rig pa 'di bshad do// hU bde bar gshegs so khro rgyul ga shin rje gshed// rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes pa sam mi khyab// srid pa rgya mtsho
215b3(sha): mtha' ya sa brjod mi lung // kun bzang mchod sprin rgya mtsho mchog tu rol// hUM dri mchog sman sbyor chu gtsang ba de gshegs khrus// khro rgyal
215b4(sha): gshin rje gshed po 'khor bcas la// mchod pa phul lo thugs rjes dngos grub gsol// dri zhim rgyas pa'i gu gu la spos kyi sprin// kha dog dbyibs legs
215b5(sha): me tog pad+ma'i mdangs// sgrib med 'od gas 'dug sreg sgron mo 'di// ro mchog brgya ldan gtsang ma bdud rtsi bshos// oM na mA sarba tA thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hi
215b6(sha): pa tra pu tsa mi ka sa man ta swA hI/ oM shri badz+ra gan de a ha ra swA hA/ shri badz+ra du be du/ shri badz+ra puSh+pe pu/ shri badz+ra a lo ke hri/ shri badz+ra ga na te a/
215b7(sha): shri badz+ra ni bi te hUM/ hUM/ chos kyi sku las rang byung ba// khro rgyal bdud 'dub gshin rje gshed// shes rab khro mo yum dang brtsas// snang srid ye shes
216a1(sha): phyag brgyar gsal// grub pa rtags kyi phyag brgya dang // mdzad pa 'phrin las phyag brgya dang // bca' ba las kyi phyag brgya
216a2(sha): rnams// dbu gsum rnam par thar pa gsum// chos sku rdzogs sku sprul skur gsal// phyag drug pha rol phyin pa drug/ sgrib med ye shes drug tu
216a3(sha): gsal// zhabs bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi// tshad med bzhi dang phyag brgya bzhi// rab tu rdzogs pa'i mchod par ba zhes// ma hA mu tra pU tsa sa ma ye swA hA/
216a4(sha): hUM/ rang byung rnam dag bdud rtsi sman// ye shes lnga rdzogs dug lnga sel// byin brlabs grub mchog ra sa yan// khro rgyal gti mug rdo rje dang // rdo rje dpyid/
216a5(sha): phyug yum tshan la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// thugs rjes dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// sarba pany+tsa oM
216a6(sha): mr-i ta shri ban kha raM kha hi/ khro bo zhe sdang rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje tsa tsi la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal ser sna rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje
216a7(sha): phag gdong la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// khro rgyal 'dod chags rdo rje dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyangs can la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes
216b1(sha): mchod 'bul// khro rgyal phrag dog rdo rje dang // sum chen rdo rje mdzod ldan la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// ye shes thugs las sprul pa yi//
216b2(sha): khro bor 'bar ba bzhi rnams la// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bu la// khro bo rdo rje tho ba la// khro bo rdo rje be tson la// khro ba rdo rje pad+ma la// khro ba rda rje
216b3(sha): ral gril// rnam dag bdud rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// gzhan yang gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor// ma lus sprul par bcas pa la// rnam dag bdud
216b4(sha): rtsi mnyes mchod 'bul// hUM dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// bde chen gar dbang sku gsung thugs// mi bzad rgyan gyi 'khor lo yi//
216b5(sha): dngos grub mchog rdzogs dus 'dir gsol// kA ya sid+d+hi badz+ra o/ bAk+ka sid+d+hi A/ tsit+ta sid+d+hi hU~M/ hUM/ oM ldan dri med dag pa'i smran// o ldan
216b6(sha): chags mchog dbang gi rdzas// hUM ldan longs sprod phun sume tshogs// rdo rje tshog sa chen snod gtams nas// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la//
216b7(sha): mchod pa 'bul yo ba zhes su gsol// maN+Da oM mri ta bu rtsa khA hi/ d+hu rak+ta dmar chen chags pa'i bcud// don khrag dang la ma pad+ma'i khrag/ khro rgyal
217a1(sha): dkyil 'khor lha tshogs la// chags pas gol ba'i mchod par dbul// ma hA rag+ha pU tsa khA hi/ hUM/ thabs dang shes rab
217a2(sha): gnyis med pa'i// bde ba chen po'i byang chub sems// thig le'i 'phro 'du dgyes pa che// dkyil 'khor tshogs mchog mnyes gyur cig/ oM gu ha rak+ta gu ha bu de
217a3(sha): tsit+ta ma hA su ka ho/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i zhing gyur rnams// gnyis med skye 'gag med par bskul// srog dbugs longs spyod mchod pa 'dis// dkyil
217a4(sha): 'khor tshigs la 'bul lo bzhes su gsol// oM sarba sha hUM ma sa rak+Sha pany+dza r-i yi swA hU/ hUM/ nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// nga ni khro bo kun gyi rje// da ni
217a5(sha): gsum mngon pa'i lha// nga ni srid gsum snying rje'i mchog/ nga ni khams gsum sgrol ba'i gang // nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo mkha' 'gro'i
217a6(sha): yab/ nga ni rang byung rdo rje'i sku// nga ni gdul dka' 'dul ba'i mchog/ nga ni tshe srog kun gyi bdag/ khams gsum srog la rang dbang sgyur// bstan pa ga
217a7(sha): po 'jig byed pa'i// log lto dgra bgegs thams cad kun// byang chub sems su bsgral byas te// sha bza' rus 'cha' khrag 'thung ngo // ma hA ma sa
217b1(sha): khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta khA hi/ ma hA tsit+ta khA hi/ ma hA ba su ta khA hi/ ma hA go ro tsA na khA hi/ ma hA me tha khA hi/ sarba sha trAM khA hi/ hUM khyad par rmad du byung ba yi
217b2(sha): 'bru bcud dngas ma'i gto rim dang // sha khrag bdud rtsi mchod pa 'dis// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// yab yum 'khor dang bcas pa yi//
217b3(sha): thugs dam skong phyir bzhes su gsol// ma hA b+ha langi ta pu tsa khA hi/ hortabadag cag ma rig dbang gyur te// ye shes blo dang ma ldan pas//
217b4(sha): nyams chag 'gal 'khrul ci mchis pa// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor spyan snga ru// gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// bzod pa re bzhes la dngos
217b5(sha): grub gsol// sha ra li gats+tsha me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud las// las kyi rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu gsum mo// /
217b6(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// 'jab kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas bshad do// sku gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi snying po
217b7(sha): yang dag pa// hri sti sngags kyi rgyal po yin// de bzhin chos nyid thams cad kyi// sog snying las rnams thams rtsad 'jus// des nagasang sngags
218a1(sha): mchog tu bshad// de yang gang du gang zhe na// a ni stong nyid rdo rje ste// skye med rnam dag byang chub sems// oM ni gti mug rdo rje ste//
218a2(sha): rigs lnga sangs rgyas sku lnga yin// shri zhe sdang rdo rje nyid// na zhes ye shes rdo rje'o// b+hi zhes nga rgyal rdo rje bshad// hri zhes 'dod chags rdo rje la// kri zhes phrag dog rdo
218a3(sha): rje yin/ tA zhes rdo rje tho ba ste// Na zhes rdo rje be con no// hUM ni rdo rje pad+ma ste// phaT nI rdo rje ral gri'o// de lta rA yA shes snying po'o// de bzhin chos skyong
218a4(sha): snying po ni// o zhes ye shes lnga yi lha// hri zhes dbang phyug lha dbang po// Sh+Ti zhes gshin rje srog gi bdag/ b+hi ni chu bdag kun tu g.yo// k+She ni gro nod sbyin
218a5(sha): lus ngan po// ta ni dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid// a ni drang srong me yi lha// na ni bden bral srin po ste// Na ni kun khyab rlung gi lha// hUM ni dri med
218a6(sha): zla ba ste// hUM ni 'od gsal nyi ma'o// phaT ni tshangs pa lha chen po// phaT ni sA 'dzin sa yi bdag/ swa ni khyab 'jug drag po ste// ha ni log 'dren
218a7(sha): 'byung po'o// de ltar chos skyong mgon po nyid// de bzhin thar byed chen po dgu// oM ni khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// hri ni gshin rje thar byed do//
218b1(sha): ShI zhes log 'dren thar byed do// b+hi ni byol song thar byed do// k+Sha ni gnod sbyin thar byed do// tra ni yi dgas thar byed do// Na ni dmyal ba thar byed do// na ni
218b2(sha): dam sri thar byed do// hUM ni klu dbang thar byed do// phaT ni srin po thar byed do// de ltar thar byed dgu zhes bya// ye shes khro rgyal he ru ka/ dpal rmen khrag 'thung
218b3(sha): dgu yin te// oM ni tshe mchog he ru ka/ hri ni pad+ma he ru ka/ hUM ni badz+ra he ru ka/ Sh+Thi ni rat+na he ru ka/ b+hi ni bu d+d+ha he ru ka/ phaT ni karma he ru ka/ kr-i ni rag sha he ru/
218b4(sha): ka/ ta nI ya ka sha he ru ka/ Ni ni guH/ ru ka/ nA ni sa nu he ru ka/ de ltar khro rgyal bcu zhes bya'o// gzhan yang yig 'bru bcu bdun pa// gshin rje gshed
218b5(sha): kyi snying po yin// ya zhes gshin rje gshed chen nyid// ma ni ya ma ra dza gshed// ma ni myos byed 'bar ba'o// ta ni ar+ya dmar ru rtse// ka ni ral pa tshar dgu'o//
218b6(sha): ra ni rdo rje bdud 'joms yin// tsa ni phya sangs srid pa'i bdag/ sa ni kong rtse brag gyon rje// tau ni a pa glang mgo rje// ru ni gshin rje ya ba ti// na ni gshin
218b7(sha): rje mig dmar yin// yo ni gshin rje smig pa yin// ni ni gshin rje rtol ba yin// ra ni gshin rje lha mchog min// ya ni chos kyi rgyal po rje// dza ni gshin rje
219a1(sha): 'chi bdag yin// bi ni gshi rje thod dbyug rje// de ltar gshed chen bcu bdun no// de bzhin 'jig rten dregs pa can// stobs kyi rgyal po
219a2(sha): bcu bdun yin// ya ni las kyi gshin rje yin// ma ni las kyi ma mo yin// me ni bdud mo nad kyi bdag/ ta ni dI za'i rgyal po yin// k+She ni rlung lha gnod sbyin no// ra ni
219a3(sha): bdud btsun srog gi bdag/ sa ni sa bdag nag po yin// to ni bdud nag 'thoms pa'i gshed// ru ni srin po srog gcod yin// na ni klu rgyal gri dug pa can//
219a4(sha): yo ni sgyu smin dregs pa'i gtso// ni ni dmu bdud nag po yin// ra ni bdud btsan drag po yin// ya ni brag srin nad kyi bdag/ dza ni sha za dri bo yin// NI ni klu bdud
219a5(sha): nag po yin// de ltar thams cad 'dus pa ni// sngags kyi snying po zhes su shad// bdag nyid phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// ye shes sems dpa'
219a6(sha): spyan drang ba stim// ye shes sems dpa'i snying dbus su// rdo rje rab 'bar lte ba la// 'od 'bar gdan la snying po gnas// kun 'dus gsang sngags
219a7(sha): 'phreng ba yi// 'khor lo bskor te ye shes 'phros// dbyings nyid gting mtha' med pa na// til gang bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rgyud bskul mchod
219b1(sha): phul dngos grub bsdus// gnas thim sgrib spangs dngos grub thim// byin rlabs mthu stobs bsam mi khyab// de bzhin byang chub sems dbang po// chos skyong mgon po
219b2(sha): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dregs pa gtum po rgod la sogs// ma lus mthu stobs bsdus te thim// gsal bas bar chad med par bzlas// 'od 'bar sku nyid
219b3(sha): mthong la sogs// mtshan ma bzang po byung gyur na// las kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya// dngos grub blang zhing byin gyis brlabs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub
219b4(sha): kun/ ma lus thob cing 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bsam gtan ni// bdag nyid gzugs kyi phung po nyid// gti mug rdo rje'i sku ru gsal//
219b5(sha): rnam shes zhe sdang rdo rje'i sku// tshor ba nga rgyal rdo rje nyid// 'du shes 'dod chags rdo rje'o// phrag dog rdo rje 'dul byed do// nam mkha' rdo rje dbyings phyug ma//
219b6(sha): sa nyid rdo rje tsa tsi ka/ chu nyid rdo rje phag gdong ma// me nyid rdo rje dbyangs can ma// rlung nyid rdo rje mdzod ldan ma// de ltar 'byung lnga yum gyi ngang // de bzhin
219b7(sha): dbang po skye mched la// phas kyi sems dpa' bzhi nyid gnas// mig la rdo rje tho ba ste// rna ba rdo rje be tshan no// sna la rdo rje pad+mo nyid// lce la rdo rje ral gri ga na//
220a1(sha): rtogs nas ye shes phyag rgyar gsal// des ni bla med byang chub thob// gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// gzhan yang bsam
220a2(sha): gtan rim pa ni// chos kyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thig le gti mug rdo rje 'chang // chos nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// ye shes se ra sna rdo rje nyid// yon tan 'dod
220a3(sha): chags rdo rje'o// rang rgyud phrag rdo rje'i sku// dngas ma lnga la yum lnga rdzogs// chos nyid rdo rje tho ba dang // rdo rje be con g.yas g.yon nyid// yon tan rdo rje pad+ma
220a4(sha): dang // rdo rje ral gri de bzhin no// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal rdzogs na// ma yengs rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// ye shes rol pa de bzhin nyid// chu la gzha' tshon
220a5(sha): rnam pa'i tshug/ thig le byang chub sems su gsal// yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // skye med rnam dag rang du gnas// de ltar gsal zhing 'dra
220a6(sha): bsgoms te// snying po bar chad med par bzlas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsgom pa'o// des ni tshe 'dis byang chub pa// ring po mi thogs non gyur te// bla med
220a7(sha): byang chub yang dag thob// las rnams gang brtsams thogs med 'grub// rtsa sngags brgya stong sngon du ste// bcu bdun bcu pa nyin mtshan no// oM hriSh+Ta wi
220b1(sha): kri tA na na hUM phaT/ ya ma me tak+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya dzA ni/ thams cad kun 'dus snying po ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// 'jam dpal khri
220b2(sha): drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya lnga bcu bzhi'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis//
220b3(sha): las kyi 'khor lo 'di bshad do// rtsa ba'i bsgrub pa rdzogs pa des// rang gzhung bde ba'i dben gnas su// gang 'dod rab sbyor 'khor lo bskor//
220b4(sha): gtsang ma'i ras la rdzas kyis byug/ thig bskor rim pa bzhi ru bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// gsang mdzod bzhi dang 'khrul mig lnga//
220b5(sha): phyi rim 'khrul mig drug gnyis la// yang logs lcags mkhar gnyan po bcu// de la gnas zhing dgod pa ni// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga dgod//
220b6(sha): gsang mdzod dmigs pa'i rnam pa'o// drug gnyis ma dpal gshed kyi 'bru// bcu la thugs kyi snying po bcu// tha ma'i mu khyud stong pa la// gang dmis
220b7(sha): las grub gsang sngags dgod// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyar la// sngags kyi bdag po'i lto bar dri'o// de ni s+thi ru shes par bya'o// zhi ba las
221a1(sha): kyi 'khor lo ni// cong zi dkar dang sa zhag dkar// gtsang ma'i chus byugs dngul chu dang // ga bur tsan dan dkar po dang // cu gang
221a2(sha): shing thog g+hi ha dang // lhang tser dkar pos 'khor lo bri// ri zlum snum la 'jam pa'i gnas// der bsgrub de sa'i ga'ur gzhug/ ras kyi skud pa dkar pos
221a3(sha): dkre// lha rnams man shel lha pur bsgom// me tog dkar po se mchod par bya// sbrang rtsi mar dkar sbyor bas byug/ byams pa dang ba'i sems ldan pas//
221a4(sha): 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du bya// bsgrub bya gang yin snying khar thim// sdang sems gnod sems zhi 'gyur te// byams sems dang ba'i sems ldan te//
221a5(sha): nyon mongs zug rngu dag cing zhi// der bsam ga 'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan dkar po'i me la bsro// sngags bzlas rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo de// bka' rten rab
221a6(sha): gnas byin can nam// byin ldan zhi ba'i sku gdan sba// des ni dgra sdang gnod byed gdon// nad dang mtshon cha gcan gza na sogs// gnod byed nyon mongs
221a7(sha): thams cad kun// rab tu zhi zhing byams par 'gyur// drag po gtum po'ang zhi bar nges// 'di la the tshom med par bshad// sarba ma na a a me tri shan ting
221b1(sha): la ha he shan ting ku ru swA hA// a ho/ dbang gi las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri bo dgu 'dus chu klung 'gram// gnas der rgya skyegs tsan dan dmar// g+hi haM pad+ma'i ma
221b2(sha): tog dang // rak+ta mu la me tog dmar// khye'u dang rngu tse mo na sran gyis// 'khor lo legs bris sngags rnams dgod// gnas sa de nyid ga'ur gzhug/ skud pa
221b3(sha): dmar po stobs ldan dkri// lha bsgom byi ru'i sdong po 'dra// sna tshogs me tog dmar pos mchod// sbrang rtsi mar dang pad+ma sa byugs// chags pa dbang sdud
221b4(sha): sems ldan pas// 'od zer dmar po lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsgrub bya gang yin snying khar thim// yid dang shes pa srog dbang po// rang dbang med par
221b5(sha): dbang du 'dus// tshur 'dus bdag thim bdag dbang 'dus// de gsal ga'u 'khor lo de// tsan dan ser ldan pad+ma ka'i// me la bsro zhing sngags bzlas
221b6(sha): te/ bdag nyid 'og tu sbas byas na// skye 'gro ma lus thams cad kun// rang dbang med par bdag dbang 'gyur// gang sgrub lha dang gzhan rbad dang // 'jig
221b7(sha): rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha srin pho mo ma lus pa// nges par dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// lhug po rgyu bzhi yang dbang 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun la
222a1(sha): smos ci dgos// pa shang a na ya b+hA sha ta/ pa shang wa shang ku ru hri hU dza dza/ rgyas pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri bo lhan stag nags tshal dang //
222a2(sha): 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i sar// ku sha star bu tsan dan dang // 'bras bu me tog rgyas pa'i sar// 'bras bu mar yod shing bcud dang // gser dang ldong ros ha ri ta//
222a3(sha): yu ba zangs lcags dngul dang sprug/ 'o ma bishas 'khor lo bri// sngags rgod longs sdod rgyud ldan pa'i// ga'u skud pa ser pos dkri// lha rnams gser gtso 'dra
222a4(sha): bar bsgom// me tog ser po sna tshogs mchod// sbrang rtsi lan tshwa rtsi mar byug/ dga' ba yid bzhin rgyas pa yis// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing //
222a5(sha): 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// sems dang ldan pas sngags bzlas zhing // 'od zer ser po yid bzhin rgyas// rgyal srid 'bru nor longs spyod rnams// rab tu 'dus
222a6(sha): shing 'phel rgyas bsgom// ga 'u 'khor lo ser po'i shing // byi thang tsan dan me la bsro// skyed mos tshal dang mdzod phugs pa// des ni rigs brgyud nor bu
222a7(sha): 'bru// thams cad rgyas shing 'phel 'gyur te// longs spyod rgyal chen bzhi dang mnyam// sdong go cig zhalag 'phel 'gyur na// gzhan dag kun 'phel the tshom med//
222b1(sha): raN+Da gun hri b+ha'u sha ta po/ sha na ma de ba d+had de ya b+hA'u sha ta/ puSh+Ti s+pha ra ya ku ru ho/ dgug pa las kyi 'khor lo ni// ri phrag phyag bdud ri bo bdud// rang byung khrag dang
222b2(sha): pa la sha/ mu la rag+ha g+hi hAng gis// 'khor lo sngags bri hri dza sde la// bud med thod pa kha rgya nang du gzhug/ skud pa rten 'brel dmar pos dkri// lha rnams dmar
222b3(sha): smyug chags pa'i mdog/ me tog dmar pos mchod cing bzlas// tsong zi dmar pos ling gi byug/ gdungs shing dbang sdud sems ldan pas// 'od zer lcags skya
222b4(sha): dmar po yis// bsgrub bya'i snying kha'i srog rtsa zung // mgrin pa zhags pa dmar pos bcings// rlung gi shugs bzhin myur 'ong ba sem// seng ldeng tsan dan mo
222b5(sha): la bsro// sngags bzlas ga'u rang 'og gzhug/ rtag pa rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bya// shing lo skam po rlung 'das bzhin// bsgrub bya rang dbang med par 'gugs//
222b6(sha): shing skam rtse mo b+hur 'gugs na// shes ldan rnams la smos rtse dgos// ha ra ha ra dza/ A kaR+ShA ya dza/ A kaR+ShA ya hriH/ rengs pa las kyi 'khor lo ni//
222b7(sha): dur khrod ras la yung bas bri// lam dang ming spel sngags rnams dgod// nags ma shing gi zlang chu dang // gar sprin tshal gu gul gnag/ de sbyang ri rab chen po
223a1(sha): yi// sa yi ga'u kha sbyar gzhug/ ri rab ri bdun bcas pa bri// ser po hUM baM la gyis sprul// rdo rje rgya gram dbus nyid mnan// ga'u/
223a2(sha): skud pa ser pos dkri// lha rnams gser mdog 'dra bar bsgom// lhor bltas sngags bzlas 'od zer ni// ser po 'phros pas dmigs pa de// ser po
223a3(sha): ri yis mnan par bsam// ri rab rdo rjes mnan byas te// 'jigs pa'i me 'dres bcings par bsam// 'khor lo rkang gcig shing gnyan nam//
223a4(sha): ri rab chen po'i 'og tu mnan// lcags kyi khyud mos bcings pa bzhin// dmigs rings gnas nas 'gul mi nus// la spa s+tha ne swa ba na lAM laM yA thA pra ra d+ha ka/
223a5(sha): ra spya/ kri tru trang/ staM b+ha ya/ nan ku rU la/ bskrad pa las kyi 'khor lo nI// gro ga shing shun 'khor lo bri// bya rog rkang skyug khrag gis bri// rlung
223a6(sha): gi dkyil 'khor ming byang spel// smyon pa'i thod pa kha sbyar gzhug/ nim pa shing gi bcud dang sbyar// yugs sa mo'i skra'i skud pra neg pos dkI// lha rnams
223a7(sha): sku mdog ljang sngon bsgom// brnag pa bdag 'dun gsal byas te// 'og tu ya las rlung gi dal// sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs pa dan bzhi// de stengs rlung
223b1(sha): gi rnga mo ni// sngon po kha ser de rgyab tu// brnag pa bzhag ste de rgyab tu// khro bo gshin rje sngo nag pas// dbyug thos brdeg cing lho phyogs su// rang
223b2(sha): dbang med par de nas 'gro// bsam zhing bzlas pa'i sngags rdzogs nas// dur khrod ri mthon rtse la sba// bya rog skyer gdags rlung la spur//
223b3(sha): 'dis ni bsgrub bya gang yin de// rigs mi gcig gi yul du skrod// stobs chen gyis kyang mi zlogs so// hU phaT s+pho ra na ya phaT/ phaT u tsa ta ya
223b4(sha): u tsa ta ye yaM ya hUM phaT/ b+ha ya b+hA u tsa ta ya hUM phaT/ dbye ba las kyi 'khor lo ni// rta dang ma he'i khrag gis bri// gnas bdun sa la de gnyis
223b5(sha): gzugs// de yi snying khar 'khor lo gzhug/ gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag ste// de gnyis thod pa'i ga'ur gzhug/ skud pa rten 'brel sngon pos
223b6(sha): dkri/ bya rog 'ug pa rlung la 'thab// bsam gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas pa// bdag nyid gshin rje gshed bsgoms te// mdun du rta dang ma he
223b7(sha): gnyis// steng du brnag pa zhon dmigs te// gnyis ka'i lag na mtshon cha thogs// gcig la gcig brdeg khro sems kyis// 'thab cing khro brdeg
224a1(sha): 'thab par bsam// sngags bzlas 'khor lo thod par bcas// nyi ma phyed na dur khrod sba// nyi ma dus tshod dgra gshed la'o//
224a2(sha): rgyud gcig gnyis su 'byed 'gyur na// lus can gnyis la smos ci dgos// nri a shag sha ga ya ma nri shag pra bi sha ya phaT/ bi de sha ya phaT phaT/ de ltar 'khor lo'i sbyor ba lnga//
224a3(sha): las rnams myur du 'grub 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyor ba'i le'u sta brgyad brgya lnga bcu nga
224a4(sha): lnga'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po gsad pa'i 'khor lo bshad// dur khrod ro ras zhing lpags la// skye rtsa
224a5(sha): dug dang nim pa dang // dur khrod sol ba tsha ba gsum// d+ha du ra dang tsi tA ka/ tsha ba'i mar khu sme ba lnga// tsan da bi dza srin lag khrag/ ka na ka yi khu ba
224a6(sha): yis/ nri rangs rgya dang skya bcad de// ldum bu thang phrom kha shog pa// shi khrag dug sna rgya sol gyis// ska bshig lhor bltas sha che na mu ra// kang ka 'ug
224a7(sha): pa'i sgro rtsa 'am// dri bo rkang gis 'khor lo bri// mar ngo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la// nyi phyed mtshan phyed khro sems kyi// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo drag po ni//
224b1(sha): gong bzhin legs par bris byas la// gsang mdzod don po'i ming byang bri// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor kha sbyar te// yab yum gnyis kyi lto bar gzhug
224b2(sha): rgyus pas kha btsem dong rtsang brnag/ rgyu rten ling kha ming byang bcas// mon pa khram tho ba snol thod brnag/ 'khrul 'khor ngar thar dam bskur brlab//
224b3(sha): sngags pa khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// dkyil 'khor gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// drag sngags bar chad med par bzlas// shin tu ga tu ma rnga ma 'jig
224b4(sha): la khros/ dus mtha' bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// thugs ka'i sa bon 'od zer 'phros// pa spu'i bu ga thams cad nas// khro bo mdog nag zhal gcig la//
224b5(sha): phyag gnyis 'khor lo lcags kyu thogs// de sogs mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// 'jigs khros tsha tsha ltar 'phros pas// bsgrub bya gang yin lus la thim//
224b6(sha): rnam shes dbugs ma dngas srog phrogs nas// 'brub khung rten gyi gzugs la thim// gong ltar khro bo 'jigs tshogs sngos// bsgrub bya sna tshogs
224b7(sha): nad rnams kyis// gdungs shing mnar te ring la skams// gcer bu sdug bsngal yid mug pa// shu bas lus khongs mig rtswa riga.a do ngan khro tsho
225a1(sha): sha zas bskor// ral gri phur pa 'khor lo mda'// mtshon cha tshabs cher btab cing gtubs// rlung chen gyis g.yengs
225a2(sha): glang 'khyags 'dar// mdangs med lus la me chen 'bar// tsha bas gdungs shing sreg par byed// chu bo 'jigs pa rba drag pa// rlabs chen po
225a3(sha): yis khyer zhing bying // nyam chung sas nub ri yis mnan// stobs zad lcags kyi khyud mos bcings// de la ce spyang seng ge stag/ wa khyi dom dred ga can
225a4(sha): gzan gyis// gtub cing sha za khrag 'thung ba sam// kang ka bya rgod 'ug pa khra// bya gcan ma chu rings rngam pa yis// zo zhing snying 'byin rgyu ma 'dren// ga sod gcod
225a5(sha): sgra sgrogs gsod par bsam/ rgyal ba khrag gis gang ba la// mtshon gyis brtsogs bzhin khrag 'dzag pasam// brnag pa'i ling ga de nyid la// skye rtse dang ni lan
225a6(sha): tshwa dang / nad khrag sna tshogs dug sna tshogs// tsha ba'i mar khu bas khrag byug/ gdug pa can gyi tsher ma rno// rtsang dang phur pa gri thog lcagaso// bar
225a7(sha): mtshams med par gdab cing phug/ de yi go cha bsrung ba rnams// phrogs nas thugs dam snying por bsdu// de lus khong stong lta bur bsam// bdag nyid
225b1(sha): thugs las rab sprul pa'i// khro bo 'jig pa mtshon cha thogs// shin tu mi bzad rnga ma sgra sgrogs// gsod cing 'thub cing sha rnams za// khrag 'thung rus
225b2(sha): ba 'cha' bar bsam// de nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// dregs shing gdug pa'i du ra khrod du// gtad rtsang ba sreg dang 'phang bar bya// spyod
225b3(sha): lam rgyun gyi ting 'dzin bya// ya ma ra dzas to me pa pha me to ru na mo ta ya/ pa ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ ya k+She ya dza ni ra ma yaM/
225b4(sha): mo hrISh+NI bi kr-i te/ A na na hU hU phaT phaT/ snyam pa ya/ sta ba ya/ nA sha ya/ na sha ya/ mA ra ya/
225b5(sha): mA ra yaM/ hU hUM phaT phaTamA ra ya dza/ mA ra yA phaT/ mA ra ya ts+tsha/ mA ra ya nan/ oM shrI ba ra
225b6(sha): ya k+ShaM gu h+ya sarba ti ki badz+ra ka la ru bu ma ra na phaT/ oM sa ma badz+ra tsan da hri sti badz+ra rak+She ya me ba baM khI hi hU hUM a mu ka pa shaM ku ru hri la hri la/
225b7(sha): mA ri la dz+ra/ mA ra ya dza/ oM au oM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 'dus 'dus rar yaM yaM re raM hring hring duni b+h+yo dun b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT phaT
226a1(sha): a mu kaM mA ra ya dun b+h+yo/ gshin rje gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad gshin rje yi// dgra gshed
226a2(sha): sprul te 'dul mdzad pa'i// drag po sngags kyi rim pa'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po mchog gi rgyud las/ drag po 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste
226a3(sha): brgyad brgya lnga bcu drug go// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ra spyi dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nus 'di skad
226a4(sha): ces gsol to// rdo rje 'chang chen la gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs 'jam dpal khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi//
226a5(sha): rtsa ba'i dngos grub pa sgrub thabs la// sku yi phyag rgya chen po dang // de nyid sgrub thabs rnam grangs dang // rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // mthar thug
226a6(sha): drag po'i sngags rgod dang // man ngag gsong ba'i gnas rnams dang // bla med byang chub thob bya rnams// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol//
226a7(sha): de skad ces ni rab zhus pas// rdo rje 'chang chen gyis gsungs pa// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// thun mong khyad par dngos grub rnams// sgrub
226b1(sha): thabs rgya chen zhus pa rnams// ngas bshad khyod nyon legs par zung // chos nyid dbyings las rang shar ba'i// rdo rje 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed//
226b2(sha): sku yi phyag rgya chen po ni// ye shes rol pas shar ba ste// sku mdog mthing nag khros pa la// zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu bzhi// zhabs ni bcu drug brkyang
226b3(sha): bskum bzhugs// pho mtshan gyen du sgreng ba ste// rtsa ba ma he'i gdong khros pa// de stangs srin po 'jigs pa'i zhal// dmar po zhal nas khrag 'thung
226b4(sha): 'jog/ de stangs 'jam dpal ser po'i zhal// 'dzum bcas yid tsam khros pa'o// gzhon nu zur phud lnga dang ldan// rA yi g.yas na zhal gsum ni//
226b5(sha): sngon po dmar po ser por khros// rwa yi g.yon na zhal gsum ni// dkar po dud ka nag por khros// zhal dgu spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// smar smin ma
226b6(sha): glog ltar 'gyu// shin tu gtum rnga ma 'jigs tshul bzhugs// khro gnyer ljags 'dril sha khrag za// ha ho pho mo'i rnga ma sgra sgrogs// phyag g.yas dang
226b7(sha): po'i gri gug pasnams// gnyis pa mtshon cha rtse gcig pa// gsum pa gtun shing bzhi pa gri// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig pa// drug pa sta re bdun pa
227a1(sha): mdung // brgyad pa mda' chen dgu lcags kyu// bcu pa dbyug tho bcu gcig kha T+wAM kha// bcu gnyis 'khor lo bcu gsum rdo rje
227a2(sha): bsnams// bcu bzhi rdo rje tho ba bco lnga ral gri bsnams// bcu drug pan cang te'u/ g.yon gyi dang po thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// gnyis pa tshangs pa ste
227a3(sha): yi mgo// gsum pa phub ste bzhi pa rkang // lnga pa zhags pa drug lag pa// bdun pa rgyu ma brgyad pa gzhu// dgu pa thod tshal bcu pa ras// bcu gcig gsal
227a4(sha): shing bcu gnyis me thab 'bar// bcu gsum dril bu bcu bzhi sdigs 'dzub bsgreng // bco lnga 'phan rtse gsum pa bsnams// bcu drug rlung gis bskyod pa'i
227a5(sha): ras/ phyag gnyis glang chen ko rlon ba snams// zhabs brgyad g.yas kyi dang pos mi// gnyis pa ma he gsum pas glang // bzhi pas bong bu lnga pas rnga mo'o// /
227a6(sha): drug pas khyi dang bdun pas lug/ brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis wa mnan pa'o// zhabs g.yon dang pos bya rgod man na// gnyis pas lug pa gsum pas bya rog
227a7(sha): mnan/ bzhi pas ne tso lnga pas khra// drug pas khyung chen bdun pas ri skeg mnan// brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis bzhad mnan pa'o// ral pa dmar ser gyen
227b1(sha): du brdzes// thod pa skam po'i dbu rgyan can// gcer bu gsus khyim che la brjid// thod rlon khrag 'dzag do zhal can// keng rus dur khrod rgyan gyis mdzes//
227b2(sha): pho mtshan gye na bsgreng med pung klong na bzhugs// ha ha phem mo'i sgra sgrogs pas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che// khyab 'jug gzhon nu za bar byed//
227b3(sha): khams gsum dregs pa gsol bar mdzad// 'jigs byed chen po'ang 'jigs par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams kun la bsdigs
227b4(sha): mdzub bsgreng // gshin rje 'jigs byed dregs pas 'joms// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i ma mo dang // mkha' 'gro lha dang gnod sbyin dang //
227b5(sha): ro langs gtum po rgod rnams dang // dregs pa can rnams bran du 'khol// de lta bu yi gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po de// dur khrod dkyil
227b6(sha): 'khor dbus na bzhugs// dpa' bo gcig pa'i khro rgyal yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// sku phyag rgya chen po'i le'u ste
227b7(sha): brgyad brgya bdun cu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// de nyid bsgrub thabs rnam grangs bshad// rtog pa bdun pa'i rim pa
227'a1(sha): ni/ rtog pa dang po dkyil 'khor bstan// sgo gcig pa ni dbye bar bya// lhag ma yongs su bcad par bya// rtog pa gnyis pa las kun
227'a2(sha): 'grub// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba zhes// nyi ma bdun gyi mtsha'o bshad// rtog gsum pa sngags btu ba// ji lta ba yi cho ga zhes// sgra dbyangs A li kA/
227'a3(sha): li ste/ 'bru bcu sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // 'bru lnga 'bru drug btub yin// rtog pa bzhi pa bsgom pa ste// shin tu mnyam par gzhag bya ba// dpa'
227'a4(sha): po'i gnas la gnas pa'o// zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag gnas// rtog pa lnga pa bris sku ste// 'tshogs par byin gyis brlab par bya// rtog pa drug pa
227'a5(sha): sbyin sreg ste// rje btsun mdun du sha chen dang // chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug/ cices pa ga dmas ngag gnas yin no// rtog pa bdun pa bsam gtan
227'a6(sha): gyi// las rnams bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba ste// snying rje chen pos yid rlan pa// zhes nas bsam ste zhes pa'i bar// de dag gdams ngag gnas yin no//
227'a7(sha): gzhan yang rtog pa bzhi pa nas// de kho na nyid sbyor ba las// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yi// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// zhes pas rdzogs
227'b1(sha): ba'i rim par bstan// rgya che zab dang zung 'jug go// de dag rgyas par bshad pa'o// rtog pa bdun pa zhes bya ba// bskal pa dum bu'i rgyud yin zhes// /
227'b2(sha): rgyud rgyal 'di las rgyas par bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgya che rol pa'i rgyud las// rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste brgyud brgya don gcig pa'o// /
227'b3(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdo rje 'jigs byed sgrub thabs bshad// rdo rje 'jigs byed khro rgyal mchog/ bsgrub par 'dod
227'b4(sha): pa'i sngags pa yis// rgyud chen 'di nyid dbang bskur zhing // dam tshig ldan pas bsnyen pa bya// de nas bsad dang bskrad pa dang // dgug dang dbang
227'b5(sha): ba sdu dbye dang rengs// ral gri mig sman ril bu ro// bcud len 'byung po ro langs dang // sha za gnod sbyin pho mo dang // ma mo mkha' 'gro klu sa bdag/
227'b6(sha): la sogs sna tshogs yid bzhin gyis// nor bu 'dra ba bsgrub par bya'o// dur khrod nang stong mtshan ma gcig/ chu 'gram shing gcig ri yi rtse// grong khyer
227'b7(sha): g+ha khang ma mo zhi khyis// khang spong bzhi mdo 'thab mo'i gnas// byin tshwa tha kra shes pade gnas su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bshad de// shin tu mnyam
228a1(sha): bzhag sngags pa yis// 'byung ba'i tshes ni bcu bzhi la// mtshan mo yar byed mar byed na// gcer bu sgra gsil thal chen
228a2(sha): dang // rnam par snang mdzad tshil chen gyis// lus byug khrag chen thig le gdab// bdud rtsi rnam lnga sha chen bza'// cang te'u dkrol zhing dur khrod kyi//
228a3(sha): gnas su ha ha zhes brjod cing // ga ra stabs bya zhing sngags pazlas bsgom// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dges// ci 'dod pa la dngos grub sAr//
228a4(sha): dur khrod gnod sbyin mkha' 'gro de// thams cad rab dga' las byed khur// de nas sngags pa dpa' bo yi// g.yas pa rjes snang ral gri thogs//
228a5(sha): g.yon pa thod po rlon pa thogs// dkyil 'khor lho phyogs gom pa ba dun// bor ba'i sa der dong khru gang // gru gsum bskor ba'i sa dag dang /
228a6(sha): gnas bdun grog mkhar sa rnams la// las kyi gshin rdza 'jigs byed cing // g.yas g.yon gri gug thod pa thogs// byas la byang du kha
228a7(sha): bstan bzhag/ chos nyid rnam dag sngags kyis sbyang // stong nyid hUM la saM gri gug gyur// de las las kyi 'jigs byed gyur// de las 'chi bdag
228b1(sha): mdung gri phug/ lce spyang stag dom gcan gzan tshogs// ro la 'drad cing bya rog kha/ kang ka 'ug pa sha za bri// rnal 'byor gcer bu bsgrub pa po//
228b2(sha): ska ba shig phyag rgya lnga dang ldan// thod pas dbu brgya na ha ha rgod// thod pa cang te'u kha Ta 'dzin/ bcom ldan khro sa la rtse gcig lta// dur khro da
228b3(sha): gi nas der 'jug pa bri// gzhan gyis mi mthong rab ga nas bya'o// dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi lho phyogs dgram// gzhan yang zhing chen zhing chung gi/ bla re
228b4(sha): 'phan 'phran rgyu zhags dang // mi rkang gling bu thod pa'i rnga// dur khrod keng rus rdzas rnams dgram// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// dam rdzas
228b5(sha): mchod rdzas rgyan rdzas yin// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don gnyis
228b6(sha): pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed la// mchod pa'i las rim 'di ba shad do// oM ma
228b7(sha): g+ha shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra sa ma ti hU/ oM d+harma na swa b+hA at+ma ko haM/ a d+hi/ o a ra pa tsa na d+hi/ o ya man ta ka hU phaT/ o hri ShI bi kri tA na na hU
229a1(sha): phaT/ ya mar dza sa ho me ya/ ya me to rA na yo ta ya/ pa twA yo ni ra yak+She ya/ lak+She ya dza ni ra ma ya/ dza d+hU ba ho badz+ra sa b+hA sa/
229a2(sha): o gr-i badz+ra/ d+hU p+tA/ puSh+ma/ A lo ka/ gan d+he/ ni bi te swAhA/ i ba la ti/ sarba sha trUM/ mi hA ma sa/ ma hU s+yA// ma hAH
229a3(sha): kha kha khA hi khA hi/ grih+Na grih+na/ pU dza sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa oM mri ta ar+g+ha pra ti dza ho/ kha ra khaM hai/ kA ya badz+ra sid d+hi au/ bA ka badz+ra sid d+him+b+ha
229a4(sha): tsit+ta badz+ra sid d+hI b+hU/ bla ma yi dam rdzogs sangs rgyas// dbyings nas spyan drang phyag 'tshal mchod// sdig pa bshags shing longs spyod tshogs// bsgrub bya
229a5(sha): rnam par sbyangs spel brlab// mchod dbul mnyes bya mnyam bzhag ste// dpa' bo'i gnas la rtag tu 'dug/ sngags bzlas ma yangs bsgom par bya'o//
229a6(sha): 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ mchod pa las rim gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don gsum pa'o// /
229a7(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa'i rim pa bshad// rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor lhor 'dug ste// snying khar a las nyi ma'i dal// de
229b1(sha): stengs hU las rdo rje che// sngon po rtse dgu kha gyes gdengs// lte bar hU yig sngo nag la// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// bla ma dkon mchog rig pa'i
229b2(sha): g+ha/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams// mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs te// phyag 'tshal bdun po rnam dag bya'o// de la sngar gyi tshig bcad kyis//
229b3(sha): 'dod pa'i don gyis gsol ba gdab// rjes su gnang ba byin bsams te// badz+ra mu yis gshegs su gsol// de nas bsgrub par bya ba ni// tshangs
229b4(sha): pa'i gnas bzhi tshad med bsgom// sdig tho mi dge'i chos rnams spangs// dge ba rnam par spyod pa ste// sems kyi rgyud cig yongs su dag/ sdug bsngal
229b5(sha): rgyu 'bras bral ba dang // bde ba'i rgyu 'bras phrad par ldan// de nyid mi 'bral rgyun brtan dang // thams cad kun snyoms chos brgyad bral// de ltar tsha de
229b6(sha): meng rnam bzhi bsgom// de nas sngon du chos thams cad// bdag med spros bral ma bcos dang // rang bzhin rnam dag byang chub sems// de yi ngang
229b7(sha): las chos thams cad// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas ra las nyi ma'i dal// hUM la sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom// lte bar hU 'od zhu ba lnga//
230a1(sha): rdo rje'i sa gzhi rU ba gur// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings nyid du// ya las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// sngon po rgya gram pa dan mtshan/
230a2(sha): de stengs a las gyur pa yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dri med dmigs// de stengs dmar ser d+hI ru gsal// de las ral gri d+his mtshan pa// ral
230a3(sha): gri d+his mtshan yongs gyur las// 'jam dpal rdo rje gser mdog can// zhi ba'i tshul 'chang rkyen gyis mdzes// ral gri ut+pal po ti bsnams// a
230a4(sha): las thugs khar nyi ma yi// dkyil 'khor gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa yi/
230a5(sha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' lha mo'i tshogs// ye shes khro bo spyan drangs la// nyi ma la thim 'jam dpal dang // de
230a6(sha): bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems// thams cad ro gcig chos nyid gyur// sku yi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'bros pas// phyogs
230a7(sha): bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// dpag tshad stong phrag 'bum khyab las// gsang sngags byin brlabs kun bsdus te// thim pas de nyid hUM du gyur// mthing
230b1(sha): nag 'od zer lnga ldan bsam// gsung gi zhing khams dag pa'o// de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems// la
230b2(sha): sogs phyag 'tshan bsdus te thim// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu pa// kha gyes 'od zer lnga ldan 'gyur// lte bar nyi ma'i gdan la hU// rdo rje lte hUM sangs rgyas
230b3(sha): las// 'od 'phros sangs rgyas zhing yang dag/ sems can yongs su smin byas pa// thugs kyi zhing khams dag pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i 'od zer gyis// sangs
230b4(sha): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // ye shes khro mo lha mo rnams// nam mkha' til gyi gang bu ltar// gang ba nyi ma la gnas bsam// de dag rnams kyi mchog
230b5(sha): bsdus nas// yongs su smin sbyangs byang chub bkod// 'dus nas rdo rje la rab thim// rdo rje de nyid yongs gyur pas// shin tu mi bzad gshin rje
230b6(sha): gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku ru gyur// shin tu khros shing rngam pa'i gdong // dus mtha' me ltar 'bar bar bskyed// de la ye shes rigs dbang
230b7(sha): bskur/ rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan la// sku gsung thugs nyid byin gyis brlab// skye mched drug kyang byin gyis brlab// gong bzhin gzhal
231a1(sha): yas khang nang bsgom// de bzhin rdul tshon dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin khro bo sems dpa' bsgom// thugs las ye shes
231a2(sha): 'od 'phros pas// rang bzhin dbyings kyi gnas chen nas// ye shes sems dpa' khro rgyal nyid// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal gnyis med bstims//
231a3(sha): sngon du byon la mchod pa dbu la// yang na bdag nyid rab gnas pas// de la de bzhin mchod pa dbu lo// mchod pa'i rnam pa de dag kun//
231a4(sha): lugs bzhin byin gyis brlabs la dbul// ser mo spos khang thogs la sogs// phyi yi mchod pa byin brlabs dbul// yaM raM a traM khang
231a5(sha): las ni// rang rang byin brlabs sngags brjod pas// bdud rtsi rak+ta gtor ma gsum// stong gsum gang bar byin brlabs dbu la//
231a6(sha): yang na 'dod yon lha mor dbu la// de dag bsnyen pa'i skabs su'o// bsgrub dang drag po'i skabs rnams su// snang mdzad tshil chen bdug
231a7(sha): spos te/ bkrag mdangs yid 'ong me tog la// drod dang tshil chen mar me 'o'o// dri cha ba de bzhin shes par bya// rak+ta de nyid srog gi khrag/
231b1(sha): gtor ma sha rus tshil la sogs// bdud rtsi bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// de ltar byin gyis brlabs la dbul// dngos su gsol mnyes tshims
231b2(sha): par bsam// de nas dkyil 'khor lho sgo nas// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i gnas 'jug 'dug/ sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pa yis// ye shes
231b3(sha): 'jigs byed khros la gsol ba gdab// dpa' bo'i gnas la sngags bzlas bya// bdag nyid thugs khar nyi ma'i gdun stengs su// ya yig sngon
231b4(sha): po khong stong de dkyil na// rdo rje sngon po rtse dgu kha gdengs pa// lte bar yi dkyil nyi ma hUM nag po// de la yig 'bru lnga drug bcu pa dang /
231b5(sha): bcu bdun sum cu rtsa gnyis sngags kyis bskor// bdag dang mdun gyi 'jigs byed gnyis la bsgom// gsang sngags bzlas pa gang byed dus
231b6(sha): nyid du/ bdag nyid ma he'i zhal nas sngags 'od 'phros// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer zhugs// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal gyi thugs
231b7(sha): khar thim// dngol grub mthu bsdus bdag gi thugs khar thim// mthu stobs byin
232a1(sha): brlabs bdag la dngos grub 'dus// mdun gyis ma he'i zhal nas 'od zer byung // bdag gi ma he'i zhal du 'od zer zhug/
232a2(sha): bdag nyid khro bo'i thugs kha nas 'od byung // mdun gyi 'jigs byed rdo rje'i thugs kar zhugs// thugs dam rgyud paskul sgo gsum dngos grub
232a3(sha): bsdus// mdun gyi 'jigs byed thugs nas 'od zer byung // bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed thugs khar thim// bdag gi lus ngag yi gsum
232a4(sha): sgri'i ba sgyud ste// khe rgyas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos sgrub 'dus// bdag dang khro rgyal pob+hU snrubs gnyis med gyur// de ltar gsal bar 'khor
232a5(sha): ltar bsgom zhing // gsang sngags bar chad med par ma yengs bzlas// thun mtshams dus su me mar gcig las kyang // gnyis su mche da ltar
232a6(sha): gnyis byas bzlas pa bya// nang du 'jug du sa gnyis po gcig tu thim// sngar bzhin bsam gtan ma yengs bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i dus su
232a7(sha): bdud rtsi ril bu 'am// me mar chen po kha ru bcug la bzlas// thun mtshams dus su tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya// mchod dbul bstod bskul gang
232b1(sha): 'dod 'phrin las bcol// drod rtags mtshan ma byung byung bzlas// de dus dngos grub blang zhing gnyis med 'gyur// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor phyags la
232b2(sha): chu bor dor// yang na sna tshogs nad zor dgra la 'phang // grangs kyi bsnyen pa bye ba tshig 'bum gsum// dus ni rlung nag 'brug sgra 'chub nag g.yos// mtshan
232b3(sha): ma phyi nang gsang ba gsum du 'byung // sngags pa dbang thob dam ldan pas// ma yangs rtse gcig bsgom bzlas na// thams cad las ni thogs med 'grub//
232b4(sha): 'di yi rnal 'byor la gnas na// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams// ma lus myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di la the tshom med par nges// de skad rdo rje 'am
232b5(sha): gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang sngags snying po'i rgyud las// ba sam gtan gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya don bzhi pa'o// /
232b6(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po bsgrub pa'i las rim bshad// mi bsad g.yul bkye ro bsregs dang // dur khrod mi phung khang sa la// 'brub khung gru
232b7(sha): gsum khru gang ba// tshar shi kha dmar ga tsang gis bskor// thod dron 'phreng bas kha dgyer bskor// phyi nang dug sna khrag snas byug/ sngags pa'i g.yas phyogs
233a1(sha): de ltar bya// bsrub bya'i dri chen dri chu dang // rjes sa s+tha shad ngar snabs gos// dri ma grog mkhar sa rnams la// ling ga mtho gang dbang po
233a2(sha): dod/ dpral bar rus bris snying kha ni// bla la bla gdag sa lto bar ming // dug dang khrag snas bris la gzhug/ gri mon rabs chad thod par brnag/ dong du bcug
233a3(sha): la byad kyis bcing // gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig dang // chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // grog mkhar mtshan ma gcig pa dang // rgyal po'i sgo dang ri rgod sa//
233a4(sha): las kyi gshin rje gnas sa la// chu rgod shi khrag lngas sbyar te// gshin rje'i gzugs bya khru gang tshad// zhal gcig phyag gnyis gsus khyim che// gcer bu
233a5(sha): ska ba sil mche ba gtsigs// g.yas g.yon ral gr-i zhags pa 'dzin// dur sol shing khrag rams kyis byug/ snying khar gru gsum brnag pa gzhug/ de la
233a6(sha): dur khro da thod ma khar nas// las kyi gshin rje bkug la ba stim// gtor ma byin te las rnams bcol// 'bru ba khung gzugs la kha bstan bzhan/
233a7(sha): de nas 'khrul 'khor gzhung bzhin bri// dkyil 'khor bri zhing gtor ma bsham// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'khor lo bzhag/ yang na 'brug khung steng du lding //
233b1(sha): ting nge 'dzin dang rab ldan pas// slob dpon lho nas drag sngags bzlas// grogs gcig sha ra nas ling ga dang // drag po rdzas kyi sbyin sreg bya// byang nas ling kha
233b2(sha): gtor ma dbul// gcig gis nub nas tshogs mchod bya// thun mtshams bcol bskul dgra la rbad// de yang dang po'i thun la 'jig rten dang // 'jig rten
233b3(sha): 'das pa'i thun mong sbyin sreg bya// gnyis nas bzhi pa'i bar du ling ga rus chen dang // sha khrag tshil dang tsha ba'i mar khu sbyar// bsnyen pa gang ba skyal sngags kyi
233b4(sha): sbyin sreg bya// mtha' ma'i thun la grogs po bzhi log ste// drag po bsad pa las kyi sbyin sreg bya// yang na rnal 'byor bdag nyid gcig pus bya// de nyid
233b5(sha): dus kyi bsam gtan ting 'dzin ni// bdag nyid khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// zhabs brgyad g.yas nas nad brgyud spro ba dang // zhabs g.yon 'og nas 'phra
233b6(sha): men ma brgyad spro// thugs kha dag nas zhags pa lcags kyu thogs// mtshon cha thogs pa'i 'jigs byed grangs med spros// brnag pa gang yin thal bar byas par
233b7(sha): bsam// de ltar rtags byung bar du bsgrub par bya// drag po bsang ba'i sbyor ba dang // dbang drag la sogs las rnams bya'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnam
234a1(sha): 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ drag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya don lnga pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// bsad
234a2(sha): pa drag po'i 'khrul 'khor bshad// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas pa// thal che ni lus byugs smra bsil ha ha ra rgod// sha chen bdud rtsi ril bu kha ru myur/
234a3(sha): las kyi 'jigs byed dbang gzugs gtor ma btang // dpa' bo'i gnas 'dug dal bsgru ba mchod pa bya// 'byung po'i nyi phyed yol nas lhor bltas te// drag po
234a4(sha): mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod ras sam zhing chen bags pa la// lan tshwa skye tshe nim pa du rus// dug sna khrag sna tsha ba gsum// rme ba lnga dang ni ra su// sgyu bcad dung
234a5(sha): / phyis legs bya te// ka ka ni rangs skug gu yis// le tshe bcu drug 'khrul 'khor bri// sum cu rtsa gnyis bcu pa yi// sngags dgod hUM brgyad bri bar bya// de phyir spu gri drag po dgod//
234a6(sha): kha sbyar bsgrub bya'i ming byang dgod// me gnyis dbus su bzhag la bsad// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ yang na gzugs brnyan lto bar gzhug/ 'khor lo bri ba'i rim pa'o// de
234a7(sha): nas 'khrul 'khor byin brlab pa// dbus kyi ya yig yongs gyur las// 'chi bdag ga shi ni rje'i grong khyer bas ma// 'khrul 'khor me gnyis bsreg pa de// 'gro ba rigs drug khang
234b1(sha): par bsam// drag sngags me gnyis ma dpung 'bar// sngags gzhan 'jigs byed pho brang 'jug/ sngags rnams las kyi gshin rje mtshon// gang la reg pa gcod par bsam// ming
234b2(sha): byang ling kha dgra bo dngos// tshe srog las kyi gshin rje yi// mtshon cha'i khang par 'chang zhing gcod// de ltar bsam gtan sbyor ba bya// thab khung nang du 'khrul 'khor de// nim pa'i shing
234b3(sha): gi me la bsro// bdag nyid 'jigs byed khro bor bsgom// rkang pa g.yon pas 'khrul 'khor mnan// drag sngags thang gcig bzlas byas te// dkyil 'khor dbus sam
234b4(sha): dong khar lding // sngags pa mnye bzhag dpa' bor 'dug/ gcer bu skra ba shig kha lhor lta// tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs te// snang mdzad thal che na rak+ta sa
234b5(sha): bsgyur// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// 'khor lo rkang skyed gsum khar bzhag/ dur khrod me la rab tu bsro// shin tu khros pas drag sngags
234b6(sha): bzlas// gtum po'i me la 'dug byas na// the tshom med par 'chi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// gshin rje mtshon cha'i
234b7(sha): 'khor lo de/ bsgrub bya'i rgyu rten ling kha mo/ snying khar sngags dang 'khor lo brnam// rabs tshad mon thod ga bur gzhug/ las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs brnyan gyi//
235a1(sha): nyid chor pa'i ga'u gzhug/ ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// gnas lngar mi rkang phur pa gdab// tsher ma rnon po sna tshogs kyis// tshigs
235a2(sha): rnams kun la gdab par bya// drag tu sngags bzlas 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs nas nyin mtshan phyed dus na// dur khrod gnas sam ro bsregs par// shin
235a3(sha): tu gting rings gru gsum brko// gzugs brnyan mgo bo lhor bstan te// kha ni thur du phu ba la sba// slar 'ongs rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rnal 'byor shin
235a4(sha): tu gsal byas la// drag tu sngags bzlas ming byang sbrel// nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'chi'o// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// don po'i bshang gcis ling
235a5(sha): ga bya// ming byang dang bcas dug gis byug/ sba ba shig padag kha lhor bltas te// ma he gdong gi rnal 'byor gyis// dur khrod me la mtshan phyed na// gzug
235a6(sha): brnyan gtubs te bsreg bya zhing // ming byung dang bces drag sngags bzlas// skad cig gis ni nges par 'chi// rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid kyis bshad// gzhan yang

235b1(sha): gnas su bdag nyid kyis// lus la rnam par snang mdzad byug/ bdag kha lhor bltas rnam par brtsigs// ma he'i gdong gnas drag tu bzlas// mtshon chas
235b2(sha): gtums la ro bsregs kyi// mer bsregs myur du 'chi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rims kyi thebs 'dod na// ga shin rje'i 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha de// mi yin
235b3(sha): phyis ga 'ur gzhug/ dur khrod me la rab bsros te// de nyid kyis ni 'og sbas na// rims nad drag pos 'dzin par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni//

235b5(sha): zan gtogs lhag ma dang // rnam par snang mdzad rgyu rten sbyar// dur khrod rjes la byu ga byas la// sngon bzhin cho gas 'khor lo bri// de ltar sbyor ba

236a1(sha): bsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// de dag bsam gtan rim pa ni// rnal 'byor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// sbyor ba nyid la gnas pa yis//

236a3(sha): bya gce raM bu ni// ska ba shig bred par gyur pa de// bdag nyid mdun du gnas par ba sam// bdag lus khro bo mang po spros// ral gri btab nas khrag 'thung zhing //

242b7(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// thams cad rgyas pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya brgyad cu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang
