250b7(sha): ya ma ni mar du pa tsa pa tsa raM shang rbad/ ser po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// rkang pa ba glang bla gnas 'joms// ya ma ni thums rmugs mA ra ya nA
251a1(sha): sha ya nA sha ya rba da/ rA ni g.yon gyi zhal gsum ste// dkar po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lag pas ri dgas bla ga nas
251a2(sha): 'joms// ya ma kri tA ni sha tru mun thibs rba da/ dung ka 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// kha yi nya sram bla ga nas 'joms// kra na ya mA rak+Sha tsit+ta sha ga ma ra
251a3(sha): thum sarba da/ nag po 'jigs zhal sngags 'phros pas// lus kun nye drung bla gnas 'joms// rus pa mA ra ya ha ra ti ya ma ma kA la rag sha nri rbad phung pa'i
251a4(sha): 'brub khung dug khrag byug/ rten drug ling kha ming byang bcas// rabs chad mo na pa srubs drug gnag/ ya na lag ga na rgyal byed du gzhug/ yungs ka ra yungs
251a5(sha): nag ske tshe dang // dri rims khrag chen rak+ta khyi// ra dug spyang dug dug rgod sbyar// dra lo sgrol byed rab gnas bya// gshin rje srin po bya ga can tshogs//
251a6(sha): mtshon cha me 'bar gang yang sgrol// zhag dgu'i bar du smra gau cad bzlas// bdag nyid rdo rje 'jigs byed gnas// rang rang bla rtags drang sbyar te// lus
251a7(sha): kyi gnas re ra thun tshon dbab// thun kha re rdzogs mchod bstod bskul// kun rdzogs ling kha mtshon chas gtubs// drag po'i sbyin sreg byas thal ba//
251b1(sha): ling ga byas mnan zor du 'phang // des ni myur du gsod par nges// de skad ma he'i gdong gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud
251b2(sha): las// gnad dgu drag sngags kyi le'u brgyad brgya gya drug pa'o// / bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen la// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis/
251b3(sha): drag sngags mtshon cha 'di skad brjod// dur khrod la sogs bde gnas su// grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// drag po bzhi bskor las 'di brtsams// drag po'i
251b4(sha): ga nas chen phung sas bya// dug khrag sol chen la sogs byug/ snang mdzad la sogs sbyor ba'i gzugs// rigs dang bod sgra khrag gis gsal// mtshan mo'o
251b5(sha): rnam pa gsal bar ldan// gsum gnyis gling gi dung chen brnag/ gsod byed tsha ba la sogs byed// drag po'i gnas su gsod mgo bstan// bcu gnyis tshad de
251b6(sha): khru mtho gang // gsod byed rgyal po la sogs tshogs// rkyen gyi rnam pa sna tshogs khrag/ thig le gnyis dang tshu ba'i 'bru// drug po myu ra bral dung chen du'o//
251b7(sha): ga nam lcags drag po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs ral gri gsod byed rgyal// sna tshogs ngar glud de bzhin du// myos khrag raM k+tas stobs bskyed bya// yu bor sa ba swa
252a1(sha): la sA// de dag dgug rgyal sgrol byed kyis// bsang dang byin brlabs mthu ldan bya// nyin bzhi mtshan bzhi gnyis bsdebs pa// klad mgrin
252a2(sha): lte ba snying kha ste// rdzas bzhi rim par mtha' ma la// gcod byed gsod byed gnyis su'o// brgya stong grangs kyi de bzhi ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed khros pa yi//
252a3(sha): gnas las 'od zer rab spros pa// de bzhin gyur te rten gnas bcas// des ni las kyi gshin rje gshed// sngo nag gcer bu mi bzad 'jigs// ral
252a4(sha): gri sdigs 'dzub ma he zhon// sgra 'dzings kha gdangs mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum smar khro gnyer nA na// rang gnas langs te de nyid la// ma he gdong gis
252a5(sha): bka' bsgo bas// klad pa'i rgya bshig rtsu bcad de// mgo 'khor klad 'khrugs myos par byed// mgri na rtsa kha skyugs ngan rgyun gcad// lte ba yid 'khrugs srid
252a6(sha): rtswa bcad// snying srog rtsa gcad sha khrag tshogs// bstod cing zos te shul med bsad// de ltar mtshon chas rdul byas la// drag po'i mtha' btul las byas te/
252a7(sha): de nas gzugs brnyan rdul de la// dur khrod la sogs gnas drag tu'o// rab 'bring tha mas bskyod cing dbab// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la gnas bya'o// oM a kr-i
252b1(sha): t+yete ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha b+h+yan dza hUM phaT/ ro tsa na ma ra ta ka pra ma ni thibs rbad/ hri ta ni pa tsa ha na rak+Sha tsa ra ni shag rbad/ sir thum ril ru thums mur rdza ni hur rbad/
252b2(sha): tsit+ta tshul pa ni mA ra ya ku ru ni rbad// sngon du bsnyen pa grub rdzogs pas// gang yang myur du sgrol bar byed// gzhan yang drag po sbyor ba ni// sngags pas gcer chu
252b3(sha): skra bsil la// lus la thal chen la sogs byug/ dur khrod gnas su mnyam par bzhag/ sngon du bsnyen rdzogs las 'di spyad// dur khrod chen po drag mchog du/
252b4(sha): dbugs dang bral ba'i dung chen du// 'chi rkyen sna tshogs khrug rAk+ta// thig le dkar brab sngags rgod bzlas// drag po'o gnas su bsgrub bya ba rnag/ ma he gdong
252b5(sha): gi rnal 'byor gyis// gnas la rab tu smyos byas te// srin po mi bzad 'jigs khro rje ma// sna tshogs gzugs can mtshon cha thogs// skye zlog zer tsha
252b6(sha): 'bri/ shin tu ma rungs grangs med 'bros// thim pas de ltar gyur pa bsam/ bye dang gcan gzan sna tshogs pa// sha za srog gcod de bzhin no// de ltar
252b7(sha): mtshan ma las rung ba zlam// ling kha rgyu rten ming rngub bcas// lan tshwa skye tshe myos khrag drug/ byug cing thun du dazab par bya// sha za khrag 'thung krog gcod
253a1(sha): cing / lus rnams thal bar gtong bar dmigs// khram thong brnag dpag bsreg par bya// dur khrod la sogs mnan gtad bya//
253a2(sha): dang por byin brlabs mthar bsad pa// 'di sa ni nag po'i bdud kyang sgrol// srog chags mi la smos ci dgos// badz+ra b+hai ra ba hU/ ya dun rmugs ta rba da
253a3(sha): ya ma tsit+ta thums ri la mA ra ya hUM phaT/ rtsa ba la gdags bsnyen srog bya'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma he'i gdong // gshin rje gshed khros drag sngags ni// dang po dag
253a4(sha): thob bsnyen rdzogs bya'o// gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams la// gshin rje 'jigs pa ma ha zhon// rdzas kyi sbyor bas byug byas te// zhags pas ske bzung ral
253a5(sha): gris gdab// rgyu rten ling gA ming byang bcas// 'bru ba khung mi shigs khrag thod pa rnag/ dug sna nyungs kar khrag la sogs// gnam lcags byin ldan ral gris gdag/
253a6(sha): srog gcod las kyi gshin rje la// ma he gdong gis bka' bsgo bas// me tog mtshon gyi char phab ste// ral gris btab nas rtsa srog bcad// sha za khrag
253a7(sha): 'thung rdul du brlag/ tshe bla gshin rje'i lto bar 'chang // 'tshor mi srid de gsod par bsam// de nas bsgrub bya'i rnam pa de// las kyi gshin rje'i lto bar bzha
253b1(sha): dur khro da gnas su lhor bltas sba// 'dis ni gang lang gsod par nges// gzhan yang zhing chen ras ma la// dug khrag skye tshe nim pa dang // tsha ba gsum dang sme bas
253b2(sha): byug/ kang ka'i sgro rtsas lhor bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis gshin rjer bsgom// le tshe bcu bdun 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bzhi ldan par bri bar bya//
253b3(sha): sngags dgod mong byang spu grir ldan// sngags bzlas gshin rje lto bar gzhug/ dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas gtad// des ni gang yang sgrol bar nges// mon pa'i
253b4(sha): rabs chad thod pa ru// rgyu rten drug gi ling ga ni// ming byang dang bcas byad du gzhug/ gcan gzan dri bo'i thod pa ru// dug rgod la sogs dug sna tshogs//
253b5(sha): gri khrag la sogs khrag sna tshogs// yungs kar yungs nag skye tshe dang // gnam lcags ral gri thun brab brdeg/ rdo rje 'jigs byed rnal 'byor gyis// las
253b6(sha): kyi gshin rje sha za bskul// sna tshogs nad mtshon dbab cing bsad// dgra bo'i pha mes dur chad du// khams kyi dgra yi gza' skar la// mon thod dbus
253b7(sha): la rabs chad shar// gri thod lho sba gcan gzan nub// byang du 'bru ba khung gru gsum bru// drag po'i sbyin sreg sbyor ba bya// de ltar phyogs bzhi dbus su
254a1(sha): mnan// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang gdab// gu gul nag po mu zi dang // mi rta khyi gsum brun dud btab// 'dis ni don po ma lus
254a2(sha): par/ myur du phung gsod brlag par 'gyur// sngon du bsnyen rdzogs drag sngags bzlas// oM ya man ta ka/ badz+ra b+he ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya mA sa to me ya/
254a3(sha): ka la ru paM badz+ra b+he ra ma hA kro d+ha ya kro d+ha ya/ me to ra na yo ta ya/ hriSh+Ti bi kri tA na na badz+ra d+he ra pa ma hA kro d+ha ro sha na ya to yo ni ra ya kre ya/ karma rak+kha badz+ra b+hai ra ba ya ma hA
254a4(sha): kro d+ha u kra ma kre ya dza ni ri ma ya hU phaT/ ya ma ni mA ra ya dza/ ya ma nr-i mA ra ye thum/ ya ma ni mA ra ya phaT/ ya ma nri mA ra ya hU/ ya ma ni mA ra ya nan/ de lta/
254a5(sha): bu yi sbyor ba yis// gang la btab kyang gsod par nges// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa sbyor ba gsang ba'i rgyud las/ mthar thug drag sngags kyi le'u ste brgyad
254a6(sha): brgya gyi bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// man ngag gsang ba'i gnas rnams bshad// rgyud rgyal rdo rje'i tshig yin pas//
254a7(sha): tshig gcig sna tshogs spros par 'gyur// gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu tshang // des na gsung gcig don snang grags// sgo gcig dbye zhing lhag ma
254b1(sha): bcad// dbang bskur slob bu gcig gzhug cing // slob bu gzhan ming mi gzhug pa'o// bsnyen dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid gcig pu 'jug/ grogs po gzhan
254b2(sha): dag mi 'jug pa'o// bsnyen bsgrub sngags bzlas ma he'i zhal sgra dbyung // zhal gzhan brgyad nas sngags sgra mi 'byung ngo // 'khrul 'khor dbus kyi yang khongs ming
254b3(sha): byang bri// phyi rol re mig rnams la mi bri ba'o// gnyis pa rab tu sbyor ba nyi ma bdun zhes pa// las ma grub na spog pa'i sbyor ba bstan// las dang ye shes gshin rje/
254b4(sha): gnyis la sogs// nyi ma dang por las kyi gshin rje'i gzugs// gom pa bdun por lho ru kha bub mnan// ye shes 'jigs byed bsgom la sngags bzlas so// gnyis pa
254b5(sha): thab khung de ru ye shes 'jigs byed bskyed// las kyi gshin rje rkang pa nas gtubs sreg/ gsum pa ye shes 'jigs byed la spogs gsum// sbyor bas spogs pa
254b6(sha): rdul tshon dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag nyid byang du bsdud de lho ru kha blta'o// sngags kyi spogs pa dbu zhabs log ste bzlas// ting 'dzin spogs pa dkyil 'khor
254b7(sha): dbus nyid du// khro bo rdo rje hUM mdzad skad cig gis// mthing na ga zhal gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// phyag drug rdo rje 'khor lo be tshon g.yas/
255a1(sha): zhing dbyug lcags kyu sdigs mdzub g.yon zhags bzhi// me dpung klong na khro gtum rngam sgra sgrogs// bsreg rdzas ye shes 'jigs
255a2(sha): byed bsam la sreg/ gsum pa ji lta'i cho gas sngags btu ba// gzhi nyin nus mthu ldan pa'i yan lag sngags sprul dang // gsang sngags dag pa'i yan lag sngags
255a3(sha): btu ba// nus mthu ldan pas byed pa'i yan lag byin gyis brlab// slob bu mthu ldan byed par rjes gnong sbyin// dang po me long sman spos dri zhim byug/ srini d+hu ra
255a4(sha): 'am mtshal gyi phye mas btsug/ de la 'khor lo re mig dgu pa bri// dbus su a bri re mig brgyad po la// sgra dbyangs yi ge tshun brgyad tshan re bri// de las 'od
255a5(sha): 'phros phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// dbyangs sgra'i yi ge bkug nas thim par bsgom// sha chen la sogs pas ni mchod par bya'o// gnyis pa gzhung
255a6(sha): bzhin btus la legs par bri// me long steng du bzhag la sngar bzhin mchod// gsum pa sngags las 'od 'phros 'jig rten khams// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
255a7(sha): thugs kha na gnas pa yi// zla ba'i 'khor lo la 'od 'phros pas thim// me mar gcig la gnyis su dbye ba ltar// bkug nas sngags btus pa la thim par
255b1(sha): bsgom// snga ma bzhin du mchod pa rgyas par bya// bzhi pa mdun gyi sngags de slob dpon gyis/ ma he'i zhal nas bcug nas snying kha yi// bzlas pa'i 'khor
255b2(sha): lo'i sngags la thim par bsgom// slob dpon rdo rjes lan gsum sngags brjod pas// rjes su brjod de sngags bzlas pas// slob dpon ma he ri zhal nas
255b3(sha): sngags 'phreng byung // slob bu'i ma he'i zhal du rab zhugs te// snying kha ra thim pa sa byin brlabs ldan par bsgom// bzhi pa shin tu mnyam bzhag dpa'
255b4(sha): bi'i gnas// lho phyogs gnas ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs bzlas// mchod pa rdzogs nas lho yi phyogs nas 'jug/ lho yi lag pa'i steng nas bzlas pa bya//
255b5(sha): lnga pa bris sku bris don gsum ste// 'tshogs par byin brlab rgyun ni rtan bya dang // de la rab ga nas bya ba la sogs pa'o// drug pa rje btsun drung du zla ba
255b6(sha): drug/ bsnyen bsgrub spug ma rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis// lha 'dro gan du la bor ba'i sbyor ba brgyad// rdzas dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang // sbyor ba
255b7(sha): gnyen po b+ha dang las kyi lha// rtog pa dang po nas 'byung gnyen po lha yi rdzas// so tshas ma la yin las kyi lha yi rdzas// sngags kyi rtsa ba gsum ni gnyen po
256a1(sha): lha yi sngags// de nyid dregs pa'i ngos 'dzin las kyi lha yi sngags// gnyen po lha yi ting 'dzin bdag dang mdu na// tha ba khung gsum
256a2(sha): du rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom// las kyi lha yi ting 'dzin de gsum bya// gdan gyi 'og tu 'chi bdag gshin rje bsgom// gnyen po lha yi sbyor ba grogs dang
256a3(sha): bcas// mtshan ma'i sum tshan ma stong dang po'i sbyor ba rdul tshon nam// lnga pa'i thang kha la brten bzhi pa'i bsgom pa dang // gsum pa'i sngags tshan gsum
256a4(sha): po bzlas pa'o// mtshan mo'i gung la dang po'i lnga pa la// rten pa'i bsgrub pa bzhi bsgom pa// gsum pa'i sngags bzlas pa dang ldan par bya'o// nam gyi
256a5(sha): cha sma da su ma cha gzhan kun sngar dang 'dra// drug ba du na gnyis kyi sbyi na sreg mnan pa bya// gnyen po lha yi sreg rdza sa ma he'i zhal du dbu la// las kyi lha ya
256a6(sha): sreg rdzas 'chi bdag zhal du dbul// de dus gnyen po'i lha sngags ma he'i zhal nas bzlas// las kyi lha yi sngags ni srin po'i zhal nas bzlas// de ltar
256a7(sha): nyin mtshan thun gsum drug tu bzlas// dkyil 'khor gzugase brnyan de bzhin zla drug bya'o// bdun pa'i snying rje chen po yid brlan gces// mtshan ma
256b1(sha): gyen bsgreng rnal 'byor lam bsgom pa// lha yi sku nyid 'ja' tshon bzhin du bsgom// lte ba khong stong nab du mthing nag hUM// steng ngam 'og tu oM ni dmar po
256b2(sha): bsgom// ma he'i zhal gyi sna bug steng rlung thur la sdig/ 'og rlung bsdams nas rlung de yar log pas// yi ge gnyis la thim pas rlung de yar log pas// yi ge
256b3(sha): gnyis la thim pas rlung de gyen la leg/ sne bug gnyis nas dmar nag 'od zer 'phros// snang ba rten 'brel thams cad gsal bar byas// 'od zer sna bu ga
256b4(sha): gnyis nas tshur bsdus nas// yi ge gnyis la thim pas de gnyis gsal bar bsgom// sa bon dag la sems dge zung ba'o// de la brten nas na da sems bzung
256b5(sha): ga/ snang ba rten 'brel dmar nag som snang byas// bsdus pas snang ba thams cad rang la ba sdu// rang yang g.yas pa'i rwa zhal gsum la thim// de gsum ma he'i
256b6(sha): sna bug g.yas nas zhugs// g.yon gyi zhal gsum sna bug g.yon nas zhugs// sku de thams cad yi ge gnyis la thim// yi ge gnyis zhu thig le dmar nag gyur//
256b7(sha): de yang nad shin tu cha 'phrar gyur// sems gtad pa ni na da sems gzung ba'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las// man ngag gi gnas
257a1(sha): bdun gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya gyi brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// rdzogs rim byang chub snying
257a2(sha): po bshad// de kho na nyid sbyor ba la// dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas zhes pa// de la rnam pa gsum ste// zab dang rgya che zung 'jug pa'o// rgya che ba la
257a3(sha): sems gnas pa// dang po bdag nyid dam tshig sems dpa' yi// thugs khar ye shes sems dpa' de thugs na// sngags kyi 'khor lo gnas pa'i hUM la dmig//
257a4(sha): khrag rlung sha sa che hUM nyid dkar dmar ro// de gnyis snyoms na 'od du 'barla// de la dbugs drug bar du sems bzung ba// de yi 'od zer gshin rje gshed la
257a5(sha): / de la dmigs te de nas d+d+he che b+h+yo// de la sems brtan mtha' ma'i sngags la spro// de nas phyi mo la dang nyi mo ye shes sems dpa' dang // dam tshig
257a6(sha): sems dpa' rnams la sngar bzhin spro// hU la sems brtan par du bsgom par bya'o// de nas phyi yi gzhal yas zhing khams dang // snang ba rten cing 'brel
257a7(sha): par 'byung ba kun la spro// 'od de bsdus la ma he'i zhal du bsdu// de la sems gtad gsal ba'i bar du bsgom// gnyis pa zab pa nyid la sems gzung
257b1(sha): pa/ hUM gsal snang ba rten 'brel kun la spro// lnga pa ltar spros snang ba bdag la bsdu// de bzhin rim par bsdus la hUM de nyid// na da'i bar du bsdus la na
257b2(sha): nga'i cha phra ba// shin tu mi dmigs gsal zhing brten par bsgom// gsum pa zung du 'jug la sems gnas pa// spro dang bsdu ba thams cad sngar bzhin
257b3(sha): bya// rgya che'i dus su snang ba rang rgyud dmigs pa ni// bab pa'i dus kyi na dus gcal ba yin// de nyid snang ba rang bzhin med par bsgom pa'o//
257b4(sha): de stengs a dmar lte bar hU nAg bsgom// steng sgo gnyis rlung mnan pa'o// sa bon dang ni thig ler sems gzung bas// sems de dngos med byang chub
257b5(sha): sems su gsal// rang rig ye shes ma yengs gsal bsgom na// tshe 'dis sa bon byang chub thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// /
257b6(sha): de kho na nyid sbyor ba la// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yi// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// pho mtshan gyen sgreng zhes pa la// gdams pa
257b7(sha): gsum yin te// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med do// kun rdzob sems gnas rnam pa gnyis// hUM dang nad la gnas pa'o// dang po lha yi sku nyid
258a1(sha): ni// snang la gsal ba rang bzhin med// 'jar tshon lta bu'i rnam par bsgom// de yi lte ba'i gnas nyid du// hUM yig mthong nag gcig
258a2(sha): tu gsal// de stengs thig le dmar po bsgom// de nas ma he stu bug ni// g.yas g.yon gnyis rlung mar bsdigs la// 'og sgo bsnams pas rlung de nyid//
258a3(sha): gyen la yar log hru la thim// hU las 'od zer dmar nag 'phros// dngos po thams cad dmar nag gyur// tshur 'dus 'od zer hUMl thim// de la
258a4(sha): rnam par sems gtad gnas pa'o// na da la ni sems gtad gnas pa'o// dngos po kun 'dus rang la thim// g.yas kyi zhol gsum sna bug
258a5(sha): g.yas nas zhugs// g.yon gyi zhal gsum rtswa bug g.yon nas zhugs// de dag sgyu gsum hru la bsdus te thim// hU~M nyi na dur gyur te na da stong pa nyid//
258a6(sha): deltar gyur tI de la sems gnas pa'o// don dam drug la sems gnas pa// deltar hU dadran du kun// snang la rang bzhin med pa ste// chu zla lta dra
258a7(sha): rnam par bsgom// de yang dngos med skye ba med// stong pa nyid du sems gnas pa'o// dbyer med dang la gnas pa ni// de ltar don dam kun rdzob
258b1(sha): gnyis// ma 'gags ngos bzung med pa ste// yod pa ma yin med pa min// yod med rtag chad mtha' las grol// dngos pos ma rig 'dus ma byas//
258b2(sha): byang chub sems nyid dngos med stong // stong la ma zhen sems gnas pa'o// des ni chos skur rang grol ba'o// gzhan yang gsang sngags bzlas pa yi//
258b3(sha): sems bzung ba yi lugs gnyis te// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa byed dus su// dbugs gnyis phar 'gro sngags bzlas pas// mdun gyi ma he'i zhal
258b4(sha): du zhugs// mchod phul rgyud bskul byin brlabs bsdus// tshur 'dus byin brlabs dngos grub bdag la thim// rgyun gyi bsnyen pa byed dus su//
258b5(sha): dbugs nyid thub tshad mar bsdigs la// hAM la sngags rim gsum gyis bskor// de las 'od 'phros khams gsum gyi// sems can don byas sangs
258b6(sha): rgyurgyas mchod// tshur 'dus rnam shes dngos grub 'dus// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgoms nas// dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
258b7(sha): khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las// de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad brgya gya dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos//
259a1(sha): man ngag rig pa 'di bshad do// ye shes las kyi lha grub pa'i// rtags dang nyams kyi rim pa ni// dbang thob dam tshig mnyam bzhag sngags// /
259a2(sha): rab kyis lha yi sku nyid ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed sngon du mthong // ci 'dod gsung zhing byin gyis rlob// de la rnal 'byor bsgrub pa pos// 'jigs pa mi bya ci
259a3(sha): 'dod slang // gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// 'bring gis gzugs brnyan 'dzum dang bzhad// lung ston rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur//
259a4(sha): tha mas zhib can mon pa dang // mi nag bya nag mchod rten sngo// rlung na gu tshub ma 'brug sgra sgrogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan//
259a5(sha): yang go chas lus brgyan dang // lag na mtshon cha 'bar ba dang // seng ge la sogs gcan gzan chogs// bdag gi drung 'khor pho nyar byed// sems
259a6(sha): gsal ting sran tshugs shing // snang srid phyag rgya 'bar la sogs// sna tshogs mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// de dus dngos grub blang ba ni// grub
259a7(sha): pa'i rdzas dang bdud rtsi dang // snying po lnga dang sha chen lnga// bza' btung longs spyod sna tshogs kyis// dang pos lha la phyag mchod bya// de nas dngos
259b1(sha): grub rdzas rnams la// o A hU gis byin brlabs te// ye shes las kyi lha rnams kyis// snying po bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs// rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor
259b2(sha): par bya// bdag gi spyi mgrin snying kha ru// yig 'bru dkar dmar mthing gsum 'phros// de las 'od zer gsum 'phros pas// phyogs bcu'i sangs
259b3(sha): rgyas byang chub sems// khro bo khro mo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yi// gnas gsum sku la thim gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa/
259b4(sha): phru la/ sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// 'od zer rnam ga sum tshur 'dus te// bdag gi lus gnas gsum du thim// lus ngagra yid gsum
259b5(sha): sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub thob// spyi bor oM dkar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dkar po dri med 'od// khro bo zla ba'i gdan la
259b6(sha): bzhugs// thugs khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dkar// snying po oM dkar shel 'dra bsgom// mgrin par AHdmar 'od du zhu// sku mdog dmar
259b7(sha): po dbang dang ldan// khro bo pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs khar pad+ma 'dab brgyad dmar// snying po a dmar dbang ldan sgom// snying khar hUM mthing 'od
260a1(sha): du zhu// sku mdog mthing nag drag po'i sku// khro bo'i nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// thugs kar rdo rje mthing nag gdengs// rnal 'byor lus ngag
260a2(sha): yid dang gsum// gnyis su med 'gyur mnyam par 'gyur// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub nyid// yang dag nges par thob par 'gyur// gang brtsams las
260a3(sha): rnams thogs med 'grub// oM yA man ta ka hUM ma hA kro d+ha badz+ra b+hai ra ba kA ya badz+ra sid d+hi au// oM kA la ru pa a ma hA kro d+ha b+he ra bA ka badz+ra sid+d+hi au/ oM hrIH
260a4(sha): Sh+T+rIHwi kri ta na na ma hA kro d+ha badz+rA b+hai re ba tsit+ta badz+ra sid d+h+r-itrUM/ sa ma ya ho/ de ltar dngos grub mchog thob bya'o// gzhan yang drug po'i sbyor ba yis/
260a5(sha): lus kyi mtha' brgyab tul bya ni// sing la 'khor lo d+hini dang gces// rabs rgyud nag po'i spyod par bsgo// bdud na ga drag po'i gnas btad na
260a6(sha): 'thibs nad lkugs par gsod par 'gyur// mon pa las byung thod pa bcug/ dur khrod gnyan po'i sar man na na// blo bur glang thab sa gsod par 'gyur//
260a7(sha): mdze can dam ro chod thod par bcug/ klu nag po la gtad byas na// mdze shu phol 'bras nad kyis gsod// dri bo dmar chod thod par bcug/
260b1(sha): yul btsan kha na dmar la ga tad na// gri rgod khram gyis gsod par 'byed// yugs sa mo yi thod par bcug/ klu bdud mtsho ba dud mo la gtad// rims
260b2(sha): dal nad kyis gsod par byed// 'byung ba'i lto gshags dbang chen mnan// 'dis ni gang yang tshor mi srid// hri ti bzhi bskor sngags kyis mnan//
260b3(sha): gzhan yang thun 'phang sbyor ba ni// de bzhin thod par thun gtor sbyar// nad kyi bskal pa sha za'i tshogs// nam mkha' gang bas dgra la gtibs//
260b4(sha): don po srog gcod brlag par dmigs// gong bzhin thun gyi sngags kyis 'phang // myur du gsod par gdon mi za// de skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad//
260b5(sha): 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las// man ngag rim pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu pa'o// // de nas
260b6(sha): rdo rje 'chung chen pos// 'phags/ ma tse'i gdong can la// bstod cing las bcol 'di gsungs so// skung mdzad tshi la chen spros
260b7(sha): be ting ste// rdo rje 'jigs byed skur gnas nas// hUM/ 'phags mchog khros pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// skye med rnam dag chos
261a1(sha): kyi dbyings nyid las// 'gag med rang byung chen po'i skur bzhengs shig/ bdud 'dul dpal rkyen phyug rgya 'di ston/
261a2(sha): cig/ sku mdog mthing nag mi 'gyur drug por mdzad// dbu dgugapa pa mtshon cha gnud dgu 'bebs// dbus zhal ma he'i gdong khros khrag 'thu
261a3(sha): bya/ spyi gtsug khro 'jigs dmar po srin po'i zhal// steng zhal 'jam dpal zhal ser 'dzum khro 'jigs// rAgasas zhal gsum sngon dmar ser
261a4(sha): po khros// rA g.yon zhal gsum dkar dud kha gnag/ spyan gsum mche gtsigs sbar ug chom skyer// smin ma khro gnyer glog stong 'od du 'gyu
261a5(sha): g.yas zhal gsum nas d+hu sgra rngam bsgrags pas// stong gsum dregs pa ma lus bran du 'khol// g.yon zhal gsum nas phaT sgra rngam bsgrags pas//
261a6(sha): gdug pa'i dgra bgegs zil byer rlog par mdzad// dbus zhal gsum nas pham mo'i sgra bsgrags pas// dur khrod mtshogs thams cad dbang du
261a7(sha): bsdus// zhal dgus ha tse khro gtum bzhad pa yis// stong gsum ma lus g.yo 'gul ldeg par mdzad// phyag gnyis glang po'i lpags tshon 'dzin
261b1(sha): cing bsnams// phyag rnams dang po gri khug thod khrag bsnams// gnyis pa mtshon rtse gcig pa tshangs pa'i mgo/ gsum pa gtu na shing brdeg cing go phu ba
261b2(sha): bsnams// bzhi pa chu gri mi yi rkang pa bsnam// lnga pa rdo rje rtse gcig zhags pa bsnams// drug pa sta re ha sta bsnams// bdun pa mdung thung rgyu ma bsnams//
261b3(sha): brgyad pa mda' chen 'od gzhu ba snams// dgu pa lcags kyu thod tshal bsnams// bcu pa dbyug tho dur khrod ras// bcu gcig kha thAM gsal shing bsnams// /
261b4(sha): bcu gnyis 'khor lo ma thub pasnams// bcu gsum rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// bcu bzhi rdo rje tho ba sdigs mdzub bsgreng // bco lnga ral gri 'phan rtse gsum
261b5(sha): bcu drug cang te'u rlung bskyod pas// sna tshogs mtshon chas gdug pa kun 'dul zhing // dgra bgegs ma lus myur du sgrol bar mdzad// bcu drug zhabs
261b6(sha): ni be rkyang bskum tshul bzhugs pas// zhabs kyi dang po mi dang bya rgod mnan// gnyis pa'i zhabs kyis ma he 'ug pa mnan// gsum pa'i zhabs
261b7(sha): kyis glang po byi rog mnan// bzhi pa'i zhabs kyis bong bu ne tso ma nan// lnga pa'i zhabs kyis rnga mo bya khra mnan// drug pa'i zhabs kyis khyi dang khyung chen
262a1(sha): mnan// bdun pa'i zhabs kyis lug dang ri skeg man na// brgyad pa'i zhabs kyis wa dang bzhad ma nan pa'o// 'jig rten
262a2(sha): byad dang dud 'gro thams cad gdan du mdzad// pho mtshan gyen du sgreng bas 'jig rten gyi// bdud bzhi zil gnon mkha' 'gro dbang du sdud// gsang
262a3(sha): ba'i rdo rjes ma mo re 'dod skongs// gcer bu mi 'gyur dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// 'jig rten lha dang gnod sprin dregs pa can// mgo gcad thon rlon 'phreng
262a4(sha): bas do shal mdzad// thod pa skam po'i 'phreng bas rab brgyan mdzad// dur khrod keng rus mang po'i rgyan chos mdzes// ye shes me dpung 'bar bas
262a5(sha): srid gsum bsreg/ rdo rje'i sku mchog khro ga tum rngam pa yis// bdud dang mu stegs 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// bdud kyi ba du sde bdud
262a6(sha): rnams sgrol mdzad pa// rnga sgra nga ro 'brug stong ldir ba yis// 'jig rten dregs pa'i pho mo zil gyis gnon// bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
262a7(sha): na// shin tu mi bzad gtum rngam gar stabs bzhugs// tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// khro bo'i ga rgyangs bsgrags pas snying khrag
262b1(sha): skyug/ ma mo mkha' 'gro bdud mo srin mo'i tshogs// dgas pa'i ga da mos dbang sdud bra na du 'khol// du ra khro da sha za srin po ro langs dang // lce sbrang
262b2(sha): stag dom kang ka bya ga can tshogs// sha za ma lus pho nya sprul par 'gyed// kun bzang 'jigs pa'i nga ro ha ha sgrogs// rngam pa'i rgyal po khrag 'thung
262b3(sha): gshin rje gshed// rang byung 'gyur med thams cad 'joms mdzad pa// rdo rje 'jigs byed sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstan pa bshig pa thal ba rdul
262b4(sha): du rlogs// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i sku la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu po gcig pa'o// /
262b5(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang che na la// 'jam dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// dus ngan tha ma'i 'jig rten la// rbod gtong ngan byed nang 'khrug
262b6(sha): tshe// phyir bzlog 'khor lo bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed
262b7(sha): po yis// 'di skad gsungs pa ngas bshad bya'o// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // khro rgyab gshin rje gshed por snang // nga ni sangs
263a1(sha): rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes yin te thugs la gnas// nga ni dus gsum mngon pa'i lha// nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi thugs//
263a2(sha): nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// nga ni nyon mongs bdud 'dul dpal// nga ni dus gsum mngon du byung // rnam par gzigs la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun
263a3(sha): pas nga sngar byung // 'das dus sgron ma'i bskal pa ni// me tog 'od ldan bya ba ru// de bzhini gshegs pa 'gro ba'i mgon// klu yi rigs mchog dbyangs
263a4(sha): zhes bya// nga ni dus gsum da ltar gnas// dus gsum dus med de yi dus// da ltar 'jam dpal dbyangs zhes bya// da ni dus gsum phyis kyang 'byung //
263a5(sha): byams pa la sogs mos pa yis// bar gyi sgrol ma'i bskal ba ni// yon tan yid 'ong bya ba la// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes thugs// kun tu gzigs
263a6(sha): pa'i dbyangs zhes bya// de ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// ye shes sku nyid rang byung ba// gdul dka' drag po 'dul ba'i phyir// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed
263a7(sha): por mdzad// dus mtha'i 'jig rten snyigs ma la// byad sngags nus mthu stobs 'gran tshe// sngags pa stobs can rang gi sngags// rang la bzlog ste
263b1(sha): bsad pa yi// phyir bzlog 'khor lo drag po 'di// dbang bskur thob pas bsgom par bya'o// rnam dag spros med mtha' bral chos nyid pas// b+h+rUM yig dmar
263b2(sha): ser yongs su gyur pa las// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu 'bar ba bsgom// de dbus mthing nag yongs gyur pas// khro rgyal rdo rje 'jigs byed gsal
263b3(sha): bar bskyed// de yi thugs kyi rdo rje snying po las// phyogs bcu'i rtsibs las rang mdog hU yig spro// de nas phyogs bcu'i khro bo gsal bar bskyed//
263b4(sha): rdo rje drag po smug nag 'khor lo shar// rdo rje snying po ser nag rdo rje lho// rdo rje rgyal po dmar nag be con nub// rdo rje gtum po ljang nag ral gri byang // de bzhin/
263b5(sha): shar lho lho nub byang // byang shar rtsibs la gnas pa'i khro bo ni// rdo rje rnon po dkar ser khA T+wAM kha// rdo rje 'bar ba dmar ser me dpung 'bar// rdo rje 'bebs
263b6(sha): pa dmar smug gsal shing bsnams// rdo rje stobs chen mthang skya dgra sta bsnams// de bzhin steng gi rtsibs la khro bo mchog/ rdo rje 'chang rgyal mthing nag rdo rje
263b7(sha): gsor/ 'og gi rtsibs la rdo rje nag po ni// nag po rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa bskyed// g.yon pa kun na sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// kun kyang spyan gsum mche
264a1(sha): gtsigs khro bo'i sku// me dpung klong na mi bzad 'jigs tshul bzhugs// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched drug kyang brlab/
264a2(sha): ye shes 'khor lo dgug gzhug mchod pa dbu la// 'khor lo myur du 'khor bas bsgrub bya gcad// thog gzer me lce 'phros pas thal bar brlag/ nyon
264a3(sha): mongs dug lnga bdud pa zhigacad par bya// ma yangs rgyun du bar chad med par bzla se// des ni byad+ma sngags thams cad phyir la bzlog/ de nyid rang la
264a4(sha): nges par 'beb par 'gyur ro// oM.au ya mA na ta ka hU/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ hr-iHSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na/ ya ma me tAk+ShaM/ ra tsa sa to/
264a5(sha): ru na yo ni/ ra ra dza ni/ badz+ra u kra ya/ badz+ra gar+b+ha/ badz+ra rA dza/ badz+ra tsan to/ badz+ra khad ka/ badz+ra dz+wa ya/ badz+ra bash+tso/ badz+ra ba li/ badz+ra ka li/ badz+ra d+ha ro/
264a6(sha): sarba mAn ta pra yo ga ma la sarba big+h+na na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ staM pa ya sta pa ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha na ha na/ tsakra we ra ti tsakra we ra ti/ pra taM ki ra/
264a7(sha): pra taM ki ra/ mA ra ya/ mA ra ya/ badz+ra b+hai re ba ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ bi dAn sa ya/ bi dA ne sa ya/ bi tsuR+Sha ya/ ba tsu ra Na ya/ hU hUM phaT phaT/ zhing che na ras
264b1(sha): la dug khrag gis// mi rkang bya rog sgro rtsa yis// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu hU yig bri// mu khyud mtha' la phyir bzlog sngags// dug khrag ske tshe lan tshwas
264b2(sha): byug/ rtsibs mtshan gsang mdzod// sngags bzlas don po'i sgrub khang mnan// rang sngags phyir ldog brlag par 'gyur// gtsang ma'i ras sam gro ga la//
264b3(sha): g+hi ha da ga bur gur ku ma dang // ldong ro sa dza ti cu gang gis// gong bzhin 'khor lo legs bris la// sngags bzlas bdag nyid dpung par ga dgas// bdag

265a1(sha): byed kyis gsol ba// ril bu dud pa mig sman sogs// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// rab tu sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi

265a6(sha): gra ha mu tsa bi sha swA hA/ o ta ta sa ra sa ra/ grih+Na gr-i h+Na/ gra ha gra ha/ mun tsan mun tsa/ ha ra bi sha swA hA/ lha sgom sngags 'od sman la bstim// grangs rdzogs rab tu
265a7(sha): sbyor ba bya// sman mchog yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// de yi dud pa bdugs byas na// ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du 'grub// rims nad nyin gsum bzhi pa dang //
265b1(sha): lo dang zla ba'i rims na da dang // ma rungs drag po'i gdon rnams dang // brjed byed skem byed gnod byed rnams// ma lus gdon mi za ba ru// zhi byed byams
265b2(sha): ldan gnod mi byed// rtag tu rang gi khyim 'dug na// 'bru dang longs spyod nor 'phel 'gyur// mi shis pa kun zhi bar 'gyur// shis pa rab tu thob par

265b6(sha): sbyin sbrul ga dug zin// ko sa sna'i sbrul gdug sdig pas zin// ka sha la dug rkang mangs dang // mda' dug brgya pa dang dug 'thungs dang // khyi sogs zi na la/

266a7(sha): hri dang ha ri tra// ha ri ta la na la dang // byol song mu ti ga so tra da kar// na la lce pog 'dre 'jigs rnams// cha snyam zhi ba btags ril bur bya// grib ma
266b1(sha): la ni bskams byas nas// rgyal po'i pho brang nang song na// rgyal po dbang 'du mang po sa 'khor// mig la bskus na mtshan mo zhing // khyim nang kun na gnas pa ya//
266b2(sha): nor dang 'bru rdzas thams cad mthong // mig pa skus sa 'og gter rnams mthong // dpral bar thig le gnyis byas na// sngar ma mthong ba'i sgo dang phugs// thams
266b3(sha): cad phyed cing mthong bar 'gyur// klu yi gnas su bdag song ste// klu mo kun la ci 'dod blang // bdag la ster zhing dgos 'dod 'grub// ril bu klu yi gnas bzhag
266b4(sha): na// char chen po ni 'bebs par byed// ser ba 'beb tshe sman chen 'di// bdug pas bdugs na 'chad bzlog nges// dgra yi khyim sbas 'byed par byed// mtshan
266b5(sha): mo ril bu mer bcug ste// thig le gnod sbyin gnas phyin na// de yi nub mo gnod sbyin la// dngos grub ci slong ster bar 'gyur// dug dang sbrul gdug zin pa la//
266b6(sha): 'o ma dang sbyar blud na 'tsho// mi bzad gdon gyis zin pa la// bdugs na 'dre gdon chab pas gtag/ 'bab cing rgyu bro gtong bar nges// bdugs na gang bdugs
266b7(sha): dgra de dag/ rab tu 'joms shing brnag par byed/ bdag gi lag g.yas rtag tu bsku// dbang du bya ba'i bsam pa dang // ldan pas reg na dbang du 'du
267a1(sha): bskrad pa'i bsam pas reg na skrod// rlung chen langs na mkhar thog tu// sa rkos sbas na 'chad par 'gyur// chu bo che la'ang de bzhin no// o hi/
267a2(sha): hU ho phaT phaT/ a ka re ri sha ya tha tha/ gzhan yang gang yin sbyor ba ni// ku sma ba ti ha ri byi// pa tsA kUsh+ma sen d+ha ba// zi ya na ha ti bi bi ling // a sho ka na d+ha ma
267a3(sha): ri tsi/ kha tra ha ti ro tsa na// tsher phran rtsa ba me tog bcud// chu bsnyam ril bu bye sgo tsam// grib ma la bskams sngags kyis gdab// o na mo ka ma de ba ya/
267a4(sha): sarba A kaR+Sha ya hU/ de nas las kyi sbyor ba ni// sman des dpral bar thig le bya// grong du song yang mi rnams kyis// bkur bar 'os pa'i rgyal por mthong // ril bu 'thab
267a5(sha): pa'i g.yul bor na// pha rol dmag dpung 'joms par byed// bdag la mi rgol btse bar 'gyur// ril bu chu chen 'od sar bor// shwa rgal chu chen bzlog par nges/
267a6(sha): ril bu ser ba la bstan na// sbyin 'dang ser ba bzlog par 'gyur// bud med khye'u skyes pa'i zho la bdar// mig bskus snang srid thams cad mthong // mi dang lha 'dres
267a7(sha): bdag 'dras bdag mi mthong // ril bu zhi ba btags tsan dan sbyar// mgrin bskus tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'drar 'gyur// gang la'ang sbas te 'dis bdugs na//
267b1(sha): dgongs pa ci dris legs par ston// byis pa shes ma bye ba la// za ma mdun du re re sbyin// sems gsal gtsug lag mkhas la mdzangs// gdon rnams kyis
267b2(sha): kyang mi tshugs 'gyur// ril bu khar bcang dpral bar bsku// ma 'ongs rig pa'i ye shes thob// mi dang lha 'dre la sogs rnams// mi gnod mi rkyen 'khur
267b3(sha): zhing brtse// gang bcol ba yi las byed 'gyur// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bya'o// des ni gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni//
267b4(sha): tri dang pu ru sha yis bcud// nyi zla 'dres pa de gnyis dang // pad ma'i me tog rau tra ka/ ku sma ba ti spos kyis gang // ho ti ro tsa na rnams bsres// rig
267b5(sha): sngags gdab cing ting 'dzin bsgom// ril bu byas pa de bdar te// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// khams gsum lha yang dbang 'gyur na// dmigs pa
267b6(sha): gang yin smos ci dgos// o bi dza ye swA hA/ ba shang ku ru dza/ gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// sku sma d+ha ti ro hi ta// ha ti ro tsa na dang sbyar// ril bu
267b7(sha): sngags btab srin lag g.yon// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// khams gsum g+ha yang dbang 'gyur na// mi la sogs pa smos ci dgos// gzhan yang rab
268a1(sha): tu sbyor ba ni// de ba ta ru ni ba ru// mos na 'u su ri yi spu// de brun 'gar rta spu brag bcud// pa tsa ku sha sha ta su sa// sa rdza ra sa bya rgyal brun//
268a2(sha): ro tsha dri ldan rnam pa gsum// shing kun dang ni ha ya'i 'bo ba// ni ra cha mnyam zhib tu btag/ ha ti pu ta dri chus sbyar// rig sngags 'dis btab ril bu de// dngos
268a3(sha): grub kun gyi snying po ste// grong khyer chen po'i rlung phyogs nas// dud pa btang ste bdugs byas na// sna yi dri tshor mo rnams kun// rang dbang med par dbang du 'gyur//
268a4(sha): shes pa dbang 'dus bka' bzhin byed// de bzhin lha srin 'dre ga don rnams// gang gi sna yis dri tshor rnams// dbang du 'gyur bar smos ci dgos// mi dang lha
268a5(sha): 'dre la sogs kun// dri tshor dbang 'dus bka' bzhin byed// rab tu mthu chen gdug pa'i mchog/ sad+ya the dan/ dzad kyi man/ ki ka rang ma ha rang // gi a
268a6(sha): man// sho sha ni sarba gra ha pa ti/ sho d+ha naM/ go ba shu man tra mi yan te na/ mu shu shu the pa tsa/ yid bzhin rin chen sngags zhes bshad// gzhan yang rab tu spyo
268a7(sha): ba ni/ pa tsa ku shrA ma na ti ri// ku sma ba ti ta ka ra/ ha ra te la ha ri ra// u shi ra dang ro tra ka/ ka ru ka no hi na dang // thang shing seng gog hA rA byaM//
268b1(sha): na ga ge sar mi ta ka/ ka ti byi tang a ka ru// tsha ba gsum dang ro tsha na// cha mnyam gcig gi tshad kyi phyed// byi shi bi gcin nang du bskol// smin gyi
268b2(sha): bar du sa seb bzhag/ rak+ta'i ril bu zangs snod bzhag/ der bdag gang gi skur blug na// sbrul gyis zin dang du 'thungs dang // brjed byed 'byung pos btab
268b3(sha): pa dang / mda' ngan mo dang mo gsham dang // bu gcig las mi 'byung ba yi// des ni bu 'dzin gdon ga dug sel// bu de gzhan gyis mi thub bo//
268b4(sha): khyim du rtag tu bzhag gyur na// gang 'dod padag nyid thob par byedado// der ni byis pa mi 'chi zhing // bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// yo na ta//
268b5(sha): mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// yid bzhin rin chen lta bu'o// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u
268b6(sha): ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rma bya gong sngon nang cha phyung //
268b7(sha): a dza nang bcug phyir brubs la// shwa sha bi ma la bsregs// rma bya tshig nas a rtsi lus// yig pum mig dang bcas pa de// dngos grub 'byung ba zhes ku Ta
269a1(sha): ka la hAr+dz+dza tsa rI// sa la btsugs te rgya mtsho'i 'gram// dri chu lde gu grib la bskams// shon kra yi bal skud tsam// mig la bsku
269a2(sha): zhing skye mgul gdags// lha yi mig gis kyang mi mthong // bdag gi mig nad kun sel te// gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba
269a3(sha): ni// sa 'dzul brag gnas ro dag ni// ma rul bum pa sar par gzhug/ bzhi mdor sa rkos de nyid srung // sas g.yogs de stangs bdag 'dug la// gsang
269a4(sha): sngags mang du bzlas bya zhing // maN+Dal steng du bum pa bzhag/ shar du kha lta rdo gtsang dgab// me tog rtsi thog snying por sbyar// ril bu bdun bya gser gyis dkri//
269a5(sha): sngags bzlas khar bcug mig sman bsku// mi snang gang gis mthong mi 'gyur// mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed// sa la gnas pa'i nor dang 'bru// drug cha rnams
269a6(sha): la dbang bar 'gyur// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba ni// dung chen nang du mtshal chen dang // dri chu sbyar te brnyes pa la// sngags btab gong bzhin rten 'brel sbyar//
269a7(sha): dpral bar thig le mig bslus na// mi snang gong gis mthong mi 'gyur// bi sha rtsi yi khu ba dang // lig phra mig dang de bzhin no// srika la yi mkhris pa dang /
269b1(sha): ha ti ro tsa nu dag dang // a dza na snas kham nyams te// sngags btab dpral bar grig le bya// gang gis de ltar byas gyur na// lha mig ldan pas kyang mi mthong /
269b2(sha): de dag gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// oM A li ka li gyi ni sA hI/ mgo pi ta dang san dra ba// 'bri ha ti pa la dang gsum// zhi ba btags lus la btab gyur na// lha yang
269b3(sha): nges par dbang du 'gyur// ka ko kan da b+he'u dang // til 'bru dang ni ma ri rtsigs// ro tsa na ma nyams zhi ba btags te// bud med skyes pa gang yang rung // lus
269b4(sha): sam sha la bskus gyur na// gzhan rnams gang la yang mi lta zhing // bdag la brtse rung ba dag dbang 'gyur// b+ha 'u pa tsa arga rnams// cha bskams tsur
269b5(sha): na byas pa de// su ta'i 'o mas sbyar ba'i phye// mi dang lha dang dud 'gro dang // gang gis lus la reg pa de// rang dbang med par dbang du 'gyur// b+ha bya
269b6(sha): ku sha pa tsa dang // tsur na ni tsa'i thal ba rnams// ma he g+he ri du dus spu// tsur na gang gi lus dag la// btab na dbang du 'gyur bar nges// pa tsa kushwA b+ha hU
269b7(sha): dang // dud 'gro 'dab can ro tsa na// rtsa ri cha bsnyams rgyu skar ni// bar na yi nyi ma la// phye ma mang ngo'i brgyad dag la// rgyal po dmangs sam bud med la//
270a1(sha): kha ru blud dam sha la bskus// des ni nges par skye 'gro'i rigs// rgyal po drag po'ang dbang du 'gyur// bdag la mi khro ba rtsa ba dung dran//
270a2(sha): gzhan yang ha ta ro tsa na// ku smra ba ta ka ta na la// gsil chen spos glang ro ta ka/ dza ti li shi ka dan la// pad ma gser gyi ud pa la// cha bsnyams phye ma sbrang rtsis
270a3(sha): spu// min sman bdug pa thig le bya// de yi phan yon brjod mi lang // mi dang mi ma yin rnams dang // sbrul gdug gcan gzan dud 'gro rnams// bdag gi
270a4(sha): dbang 'gyur bran bzhin byed// gnod byed bgegs las thar par 'gyur// me chu mtshon cha dug la sogaso// 'chi byed kun las nges par thar// nad dal rims
270a5(sha): kyis thebs mi srid// ma mo mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin mo// bdag la dga' zhing gus phyag 'tshal// gnod pa'i bsam pa gtAn mi rgyu// gang gis bdag mthong
270a6(sha): dga' zhing byams// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// slob pa kun byung ye shes ldan// mig sbyar snang srid sal la mthong // des na rin chen rten
270a7(sha): 'brel 'di// rnal 'byor kun gyis nyams su blang // 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyis snying po'i rgyud las// rten 'brel yid bzhin gyi le'u ste brgyad brgya
270b1(sha): dgu bcu go bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ga shin rje rdo rje 'jigs byed de// las mi byed cing 'khu ldog na// mtshan
270b2(sha): ma ldog dang gong rkyen 'byung // nyams mi bde zhing snying mi dga'// de tshe rnal 'byor dam tshig gso// dbang bskur tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// rdo rje sems
270b3(sha): dpa'i 'gyod tshangs ni// yi ge brgya pas mang du ba shags// 'ja ma dpal mtshan ni yang dag brjod// sa tsha sbyin gtong mchod pa bya// des kyang grub par
270b4(sha): ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed la// spogs par bya ba'i rim pa dang // ye shes 'jigs byed la sogs pa'o// gang byed gnyis la mthun
270b5(sha): pa ru// dam rdzas gtor ma dkyil 'khor dang // sbyin sreg mchod pa gsar pa bsham// de nas gzhung bzhin bsgrub par bya// des kyang grub par ma gyur
270b6(sha): na// gnas bdun sa la byas pa yi// sngar gyi las kyi 'jigs byed dam// yang na gA sar pa gcig byas la// sngags pa ye shes 'jigs byed kyis//
270b7(sha): thugs las ye shes 'od spros la// 'chi bdag ga shin rje'i grong khyer nas// las kyi 'jigs byed bkug la bstim// de la don po'i sha khrag sbyin//
271a1(sha): sngags bzlas las la bskul byas te// lho phyogs gom pa bdun bor gyis// sa ru gru gsum dong brus la// nang du kha bub mgo lhur
271a2(sha): bstan// sbas te de stengs ye shes kyi// rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sa mnan bsgom// gdug pa'i shing la gtum me spa rA// mi yi rus pa'i sbyin sreg bya// des ni
271a3(sha): gshin rje las byed 'gyur// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed kyi// sngar bzhin gzugs la dgug gzhug bya// drag po'i
271a4(sha): me thab gru gsum du// dur khrod gdug pa'i shing sna la// dur khrod gtsubs me sbar ba yis// rnal 'byor bdag dang me tha ba tu// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed/
271a5(sha): bsgom// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs bya da de// rkang pa gnyis nas gtub byas la// sha tshwan tshil chen bsgrub bya yi// dri chan ming rus dang sgrags la//
271a6(sha): sbyin sreg rtsa brgyad la sogs bya// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed des// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed de// gsol te snum nas bton byas na// rang dab
271a7(sha): med par las la bskul// las kyi gshin rje 'chi ba dge bdud// ma lus ldan ti dgra zo mo// gnas su sprin ltar gtibs// dgra land mtshon char ba
271b1(sha): phab// srog gcad sha za khrag 'thung zhing // rjes shul med par byed par bsam// des ni gang yang brlag par 'gyur// las kyi gshin rje 'jigs byed la//
271b2(sha): spogs pa zhes su bshad pa yin// des kyang 'grub par ma gyur na// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed la// spogs pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gsum// 'dug thabs
271b3(sha): sngags dang sbyor ba'o// 'dug thabs byed nas lho ru blta// smra ba shig thal chen lus thugs la// sha chen mur zhing zhing chen bgo/ sngags kyi spogs pa zhes
271b4(sha): bya ba// drag po rtsa ba'i sngags gsum mo// mgo mjug bzlog la bzlas bya zhing // de la gcod pa'i spu gre gdags// sbyor ba spogs pa zhes bya ba//
271b5(sha): gnas bdun la sogs sa rnams kyi// gshin rje'i gzugs de'i snying kha ru// dur khrod ras la khrag dug gis// ya brus gzugs de bdag mdun bzhag/
271b6(sha): bdag nyid rdo rje hUM mdzad sku// zhal gsum phyag drug khro gtum bskyed// thugs ka'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas// ye shes 'jigs byed gnas nas dgug
271b7(sha): gzugs brnyan de la yang yang bstim// sngags bzlas mchod pa gtor ma sogs// brnag pa'i sha khrag dmigs la dbul// drag po'i gru gsum me thab
272a1(sha): tu// dur khrod shing dang tsher ma can// ba se dri can dang dug can shing // tsaN+Da li yi gtsubs me'am// dur khrod gdug pa'i me sbar la//
272a2(sha): de dbus rdo rje hUM mdzad sku// sngags kyis gsal bar rab tu bskyed// shin tu khro 'gying gtum par bsgom// ye shes rdo rje 'jigs byed gzugs// hUM mdza
272a3(sha): ral gris rkang nas gtubs// zhal du gsol dmigs bsreg par bya// de ltar bsreg grangs mtshan mas dbab// sha chen tshil chen khrag chen dang //
272a4(sha): dmar nag skye tshe nyungs kar dang // don po'i dri chen ming byang bsregs// rdzogs nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis// sna nas ye shes 'jigs byed bton// drag
272a5(sha): po bsad pa la sogs pa'i// las rnams kun la mngag par bya// thal bas gzugs byas ming byang ba rnag/ dur khrod gshin rje'i gnas su sra//
272a6(sha): des ni don po myur du gsod// log non drag po'i rab sbyor ro// o badz+ra kro d+ha hU/ ka ra dza phaT dza/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM/ ka ra ma hA ba la/ ha na
272a7(sha): ha na// da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tshin d+ho tshin d+ha/ rbad nan/ rbad nan/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ rtsa ba swA hA'i sngags bar du// brnag
272b1(sha): pa gang yin gzhug par bya// 'di ltar log gnon sbyor ba yis// las dang ye shes gshin rje gshed// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam pa gnyis// rang
272b2(sha): dbang med par lasu byed de// don po mngon du gsod par 'gyur// de skad rdo rje 'chang gis bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mchog gi
272b3(sha): rgyud las/ log non drag po'i le'u ste brgyad brgya dgu bcu go lnga pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo yis// che mchog
272b4(sha): dpal la yang gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag dpal// dpal chen gshin rje gshed rgyal po// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //
272b5(sha): 'phrin las 'khrul 'khor las rim dang // sbyor ba'i rnam grangs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa//
272b6(sha): 'khrul 'khor rnam lda ngas bshad kyi// legs par nyon la yid la zung // skye med chos sku'i rang bzhin lasra// skye ba'i cho 'phrul gzugs skur
272b7(sha): bstan// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ bcom ldan gshin rje gshed chen gyi// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// rdo rje las byung 'khor lo
273a1(sha): mtshon// gdug pa ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// dgug dang dbye dang bsad dang mnan// dbab dang 'phang ba'i sbyor ba 'phros// 'jam dpal
273a2(sha): thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa rang byung ngos shar zhing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' ba'o// lte ba thig le spros med las// rtsibs rnams ye shes rtsal
273a3(sha): du 'phro// 'khor zhing gcod phyir 'khor lo'o// gdug pa drag sngags dpal 'bar gyis// nyon mongs sreg phyir nyi ma'o// zhing bcu bsregs pas nyi ma ste// /
273a4(sha): lus sems gcod pas 'khor lo yin// bsgrub bya'i bya ba gang yin la// mtshan nam nyi ma bzhi bzhi 'grub// de phyir nyi ma bzhi zhes bya// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo
273a5(sha): gsang chen thabs// 'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed pa'o// dbang gi gnang ba thob rdzogs nas// dam tshig la gnas rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bya ba'i las
273a6(sha): rdzogs nas// dur khrod dgu 'dus tshal chen rtsogs// gnas der dge bcu slob mchod// sbyor ba drag po'i 'khrul 'khor brtsam// dur khrod ras la bam
273a7(sha): chen gyi/ sme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// ni rangs su yi thal ba yis// mtha' mar rgya thang skya bcad de// mchog phran rkang gis par bya la// snag cha dug chu zhun
273b1(sha): ma dang / dab ma chen don gyi khrag rnams kyis// rjes su 'thun pa'i 'khor lo bri// snying po rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dang // stobs chen mi 'bar 'khor lo dang //
273b2(sha): gcod byed mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gsum// re re la yang rdzogs par bri// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor yab yum ltor// ma 'dres rang gsal kha sbyar la// dbang
273b3(sha): bskur dang rdzogs chos drug bya// nye bar gyur pa'i yan lag yin// de ltar bca' ba'i las rdzogs nas// ting 'dzin dgongs pas nyams ldan bya// nyi ma
273b4(sha): bzhi ru bskor byas na// drag po'i las rnams gang yang 'grub// thun mong dngos grub thams cad 'byung // gzhan yang ye shes 'khor lo bskor// byang chub
273b5(sha): sems kyi rtsal snang bas// dug gsum rnam rtog dra ba gcod// byang chub mchog gi dngos grub thob// 'di dag pha rol gnyis yod phyir// dam pa ye shes
273b6(sha): 'khor lo bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa 'khrul 'khor chen po'i rgyud las// 'khor lo bcu bzhi'i le'u ste dgu brgya bcu drug go//
273b7(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// sku yi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// khro rgyal gshin rje gshed po ni// 'gyur med 'dus ma byas pa'i sku// rdo rje sku yi
274a1(sha): 'khor lo ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// dbus su thig bzhi rgyu gram gdag/ 'khrul mig lnga dang gsang mdzod bzhi//
274a2(sha): 'gyul / bcu kAN+DI sa rmA/ sa ts+tsha sa rkyen bco brgyad ldan// de sa nas shing da shid bla nA~M// dathAmA s+t+wa~M khro bdug dngas 'brug+sa/
274a3(sha): sku yi 'phreng ba dgod// rtsibs la gcod byed spu gri dgod// kha sbyar dong rtsa nga kha la 'dis// g.yon bskor sbrul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dgug pa dag gi las
274a4(sha): / g.yas bkor sbrul 'gros nyi ma bzhis// dbye ba drug gi las bya'o// g.yas bskor 'bru ded drug sngags bdun// gsad pa dag gi las bya'o//
274a5(sha): g.yon bskor 'bru ded drag sngags bdun// mnan pa dag gi las bya'o// kun dril 'khyil pa sbrul 'gros kyis// mtshan mo mda' zor 'phang pa'o//
274a6(sha): de bzhin dbab pa'i sbyor ba la// g.yas bskor chu bril rta sgrubs g.yon// 'bru ded g.yas g.yon zer dang gzir// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i 'khrul 'khor
274a7(sha): ro// bsrung gzir gdon dgug sdong la phral// gzir dang mnan pa'i las rnams kyang // g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded sbyar// gal te sngags pa
274b1(sha): nang rgyas sam// spogs na ro la ngas drag po yis// 'bru rgod gcig bor gcig blangs la// stag mchongs g.yas g.yon de bzhin bskor// spu gri la sogs
274b2(sha): de bzhin gdags// thon nas 'khor lo ling gar bcas// rang rang 'thun pa'i sa ru mnan// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang //
274b3(sha): skad cig tsam gyis 'chi bar 'gyur// sbyin dang chu 'ang 'bebs par nus// stobs kyi rgyal po nyid kyang gzir// gzhan lha kun la smos ci dgos//
274b4(sha): de dag gsang sngags sbyor ba ni// spu gr-i lnga char 'thun pa yin// rtsa ba'i snying po 'di lta ste// o a kro te ka ya mAn ta ka ha na ma tha badz+ra hUM phaT/ nri A kaR+Sha
274b5(sha): ma hU dza dza/ a mu ka A yu dz+nyA na A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ A yu ka ti ra ya ni ra ya A kan+da ya hUM dza dza/ a mu ka ru pa skan d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hU dza dzi/
274b6(sha): dang pos srog gi snying po 'gugs// gnyis pas tshe dang ye shes 'gugs// gsum pas bla dang shes pa 'gugs// bzhi pas gzugs kyi phung po 'gugs// /
274b7(sha): srog gi lha de bshag bi dai sha ya phaT/ gnyis pa pho lha gsum ma lha// bzhi pa dgra lha dag dang dbye// hrik+ti ka pa ye pra ma/ mu ra tsa rak+Sha tsa ra mA ra ya
275a1(sha): shi shra ku ru ni/ rbad ya/ thum ri li li b+h+yo/ staM pa ya na na/ de bzhin dbab pa'i drag sngags ni// phro phreM hri la hri la ya ya shar sha ra/
275a2(sha): ya ma snying yam khrag ra hu la hri la hri la/ shag shar sen ya hri l-i b+h+yo/ thibs thibs phreM phro hri la hrI la dud kar ru tra shu ti ya ma shar shar phob phob/ tsa pa ti ra hu
275a3(sha): la trig nan phob/ raka sha se tri dud kar phob/ na ga ra dza yul che ge mor pra pa sa ra pa tha ya d+ha ri sha ye phreM pho ba// chu dril rta sgrub zor dang gzir// drag po sbyin
275a4(sha): 'dang sngags bzhi yin// gzhan yang bsrung gzir drag sngags ni// dgug dbye mnan 'phangs de bzhin las// khyab par gzir zhing bsrung sngags ni// 'bu
275a5(sha): sta ba ma hri sti ba to lam hI rak+ka tsakra hU trig nan// de ni 'khor lo la dgod bya// shrI many+dzu/ ya ma rA dza e ka dza ti ya ma snying khrag sha tru mA ra ya ma ra du mA ra ya ba
275a6(sha): ril rbad/ nang brgyas ro langs drag sngags so// de ltar spu gri'i sbyor ba yang // kun la 'jug par shes par bya// 'khor lo'i bskor thabs de bzhin
275a7(sha): du/ mkhas pas rab tu shes par bya// 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ sku'i 'khor lo dang spyi'i spu gri'i le'u ste/
275b1(sha): dgu brgya bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gsung gi 'khrul 'khor 'di ba shad do// 'jam dbyangs rnga ma
275b2(sha): chen ga shin rje ga shed// 'gag med zil gnon rngam pa'i sgra// rdo rje gsung gi 'khor lo ni// dbus nas thig bskor rim pa gsum// 'khrul
275b3(sha): dmigs lnga dbus gnasra pa nI// shrI ma na dzu a kro dgod// phyi rim 'khru la dmigs bcu gnyis la// te ka ya man tA ka dang // ka la ru pa hUM phaT/
275b4(sha): dgod/ mtha' ma rtsibs chen bco brgyad la// drag sngags spu gri gong bzhin dgod// rtsibs mtshan gcad bya gang yin dgod// g.yas bskor
275b5(sha): g.yon bskor sbrul gyi 'gros// de bzhin 'bru dang stag mtsho nges rnams// dgug dbye ba sad mnan zor 'phang dang // chu dril rta sgrub zor dbab gzir//
275b6(sha): bsrung gzir ro langs rnams la sbyar// thon nas mthun pa'i gnas su gtang // gang brtsams las rnams thogs med 'grub// de dag ga sang sngags
275b7(sha): 'di lta ste// o shrI many+dza a kro tau ka ya mA na ta kra la rba pa hU phaT/ spu gri la sogs sngar bzhin te/ 'jam dbyangs gsung gi thig le ste// thun mong
276a1(sha): mchog gi dngos grub rnams// gang bsgrubs 'byung bar ngas bshad do// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i 'phrul gyi me long gi rgyud chen po
276a2(sha): las/ gsung gi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u ste dgu brgya bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje che mchog gis// thugs kyi 'khor
276a3(sha): lo 'di bshad do// khro rgyal dpal chen ga sha ni rdza gshed// mi g.yo rang gsal thugs rje 'phros// rdo rje thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// dbus nas thig
276a4(sha): bskor rim pa gsum// dbus kyi lcags mkhar lnga po la// ye shes rdzogs brtsogs 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// de bzhin
276a5(sha): thugs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// rtsibs la spu gri gang rung dgod// rtsibs mchan sgrub bya rtsa sbyar bya// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru ded dang // gcig
276a6(sha): por gcig blangs dkrugs de bzhin// dgug dbye gsad mnan chu dril rta// zor gzir bsrung gzir ro langs rnams// de bzhin thon nas mnan gtad
276a7(sha): bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM hriSh+TiHbi kr-i ta A na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ khro rgyal thugs kyi thig la
276b1(sha): 'dis// dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar nges// 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u sta dgu brgya bcu dgu'o//
276b2(sha): / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// yon tan 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// bcom ldan khro bdag gshin rje gshed// 'gag
276b3(sha): med lhun rdzogs rin po che// rdo rje yon tan 'khrul 'khor ni// dbus nas mu khyud zlum po gsum// dbus kyi 'khru la 'khor mig lnga la// 'jam dpal phyag
276b4(sha): rgya'i 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu bzhi la// yon tan snying po bcu bzhi dgod// tha ma'i rtsibs la spu gri dgod// rtsa sbyar mtshams su a
276b5(sha): mu ka/ ge yas bskor g.yon bskor 'bru de da dang // dkrug dang dgu ga da bya bsad mnan dang // chu dril rta sgrub zor gzer dbab// bsrung gzir ro langs
276b6(sha): spogs las sbyar// tho na nas mnan pa'i las rdzogs bya// gang brtsams las la thogs med 'grub// de dag gsang sngags 'di lta ste// oM sa ma ya
276b7(sha): many+dzu shrI mu tra ya mAn+ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM pa Ta/ 'jam dpal yon tan thig le 'dis// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub 'byung // de nas snying po yon tan
277a1(sha): rdzogs// nor bu rin chen lta bur bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa stong phrag brgya pa'i rgyud las/ yon tan gyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u
277a2(sha): ste dgu brgya nyi shu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos// 'phrin las drag po'i 'khrul 'khor bshad// gshed chen khro rgyal dpa'
277a3(sha): po yis// thog med rol pa'i byin rlabs las// rdo rje 'phrin las 'khor lo ni// dbus nas mu khyud rim pa gsum// dbus kyi lcags mkhar lnga po la// rtsa ba'i
277a4(sha): snying po 'bru lnga dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar lnga po la// me dpal snying po bcu gnyis dgod// tha ma'i rab la gang rung sogs// kha sbyar 'dod pa'i sgrub
277a5(sha): bya dgod// gelas g.yon 'bru dad dkrug la sogs// bsad dbab bsrung gzir ro langs sbyar// 'khor lo de dag mnan pa'i thabs// bsad pa drag po'i
277a6(sha): las byed na// klu 'am mtsho bdud btsa na la mnan// chu 'khyags dbab pa'i las byed na// yul lha klu dang dmu la mnan// bsrung gzir dag gi las byed na//
277a7(sha): bka' rten mgon po rgyun srang mnan// de ni gang 'dod las rnams 'grub// 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sa 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las//
277b1(sha): 'phrin las kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud las le'u ste dgu brgya nyi shu gcig go// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// drag po ngan sngags 'di bshad
277b2(sha): do// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// ngan sngags bsad pa'i sbyor ba bya// dben la gnyan pa'i dur khrod du// phung sa'i gru gsum sol chen thug/
277b3(sha): rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// rab chad thod pa srubs drug brnag/ dug dang tsha ba gsum gyis thug/ dkar nag thig le me 'bar 'brub// khrag chen myos
277b4(sha): pa gdug pa gsum// 'chi byed sna tshogs thod chen sbyar// dgongs pa ldan pas byin gyis brlabs// klu la rtsogs pa'i chu bzhis sbyar// byin rlabs dang
277b5(sha): bcas drag tu bzlas// me 'bar khol lud rlangs po dros// mthong nas brab cing srog rtsa gcad// nyi shu gcig nas gsod rtags 'byung // thon nas
277b6(sha): ling grwa gdug par mnan// zor thun dmigs pa'i 'khor la brdeg/ badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta ka hri te kA la ru pa ya mAn ta ka nag po srog nan rtsa rbad dbugs
277b7(sha): khyer kri myags srog la mA ra ya rbad/ mi 'gyur nges par dus bzhin gsod// de nas drag po mchog ces bya// de nas thugs mchog
278a1(sha): gshed chen gyis// rdo rje 'chang chen la zhus pas// dus ngan mtha' ma'i 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig kha ru//
278a2(sha): skye bo bden pas mi 'dul te// dam tshig gnyen po mi gnas pas// dus der nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// drag po ngan sngags mtshon cha rnams// 'khor
278a3(sha): lo rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gshed chen 'khor gyi gtso//
278a4(sha): dus ngan mthu' ma'i 'jig rten la// dam tshig nyams pa bsgral ba'i phyir// ngan sngags rdzogs pa ngas bshad do// 'di nus lho yi phyogs rol na// dpas
278a5(sha): tshad brgyad khri'i 'og rol na// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas de na// lcags mkhar thod pa'i pho brang na// gshin rje rnams kyi grong khyer yod// las kyi gshin rje'i
278a6(sha): rdzi dpon po// ro langs nag po zhes bya ste// smug nag mdog la shin tu 'jigs// ral gri sdigs mdzub rgyu zhags 'phyar// mig gsum mche gtsigs
278a7(sha): rtsi gdengs pa/ ral pa lam nag thod pas gdams// glang chen zhing gyon stag sham can// thod rlon 'bring ba'i ngo shal can// rgyu ma sbrul dang rak+tas
278b1(sha): brgyan// dur khrod me dpung glong na bzhugs// ro rnon stan la brkyang bskum tshul// las kyi gshin rje drug khri gtong // mngag pa bran dang pho nyar rtsol/
278b2(sha): dur khrod kang ka lce spyang tshogs// yang sprul ro la gtod cing za// de yi kha nas ngan sngags kyi// mtshon cha drag po'i dpal byung ste// skye 'gro
278b3(sha): thams cad sgrol zhing zos// de lta bu yi dregs pa des// dpal chen ya man ta ka yi// spyan sngar srog gi snying po phul// bstan pa bsrung bar bro yis
278b4(sha): bor// de lta bu yi ngan sngags mtshon cha de// nga yis da ltar bshad kyis nyon// babs ni ro langs rag sha snying la dbabs// ya ma rA dza snying la khug
278b5(sha): zum ril rbu dra/ ya mA rU dza snying myags tshal pa byi ma ya/ 'u ba thum ril snying mgo chod/ kha la zod/ tshal pa snying rtsa rol ba ril rbad/ ya mA rA dza/
278b6(sha): che ge mo hristi ya ma ta kri snying khrag la ba ri la rba da/ ya ma ra dza snying rtse la rtsa ri me ba ri larba da/ ya ma rA dza glo rtsa la baM ri la rbad/ mchin rtsa ru la snying la hri ting rtsa ro
278b7(sha): me ba ril rbad/ rgyu rtsa khum/ snying rtsa bra ma tha/ srog la de par \u0f7frnying la rba da/ rtsa ga sha khug snying rol baM ril rbad/ la ma rA dza snying la tod pa krA ma
279a1(sha): ba ri la rba da/ aM ku sha dza/ snying la khug/ mchin rtsa bka' pa rtsa ro ma g.yas/ ro la gsha' bkra me baM ril rba da/ khrag rtswa snying
279a2(sha): la ba shos/ ro rtsa myo gas/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ ba ri la rba da/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya/ snying la to ru me ya/ yak+She ya ta yo ni snying la to ru me ya/ ra ya k+She ya/
279a3(sha): a kra me/ a kra me/ snying la rtsa ro me bai ri la rba da/ ya ma rA dza rtsa la rod pa khug thum ril/ snying la rag sha me ba ra lirba da/ ya ma rA dza snying la rtsa rtsa nan nan/
279a4(sha): srog srog rmugs rmugs che ge mo khug thu ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa to me ya snying la ro sha ba ril rba da/ che ge mo/ rtsa ba glongs glongs/ snying la khug bka' sa pa tshal
279a5(sha): pa/ snying la ro tsa ba ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza ni dza/ shin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor rin po che'i rgyal mtshan 'phrul gyi me long khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/
279a6(sha): lo rgyus drug sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu'o// // de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis// sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di bshad do// ngan
279a7(sha): sngags de nyid sgrub 'dod pas// dbang thob dam tshig bla ma mchod// dge ba bcu yi las rnams bya// bsnyen pa drod tshad thon tshad bya// dben la gnyen
279b1(sha): pa'i dur khrod du// ra'i rgod pa la maN+Dal brtsig/ khru gang khru do rag tas byug/ phung po'i gru gsum khru gang ba// kha la thod 'phreng nang logs sprul// gdug
279b2(sha): shing rtsang ni nyi shu gcig/ zur gsum gri lcags mchog shing gis// phur pa sor brgyad pa re dgod// phyi ru dur khrod sol bas byug/ nang du dug sna khrag
279b3(sha): snas byug/ de nang rgyun rten ling ga ni// sor brgyad dbang po yan lag dod// ming rus lo khams snying khar sdug/ tsha ba gsum dang myos pas byug/ yugs
279b4(sha): sa mo'i sgra'i thag pas bcings// bkra mi shis pa'i thod chen brnag/ thig le dkar nag tsha ba'i 'bru// rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye dang // rgyal po
279b5(sha): g.yung zhing 'chi rkyen dang // ni ra la sogs ga dug khrag bzhi// bkra mi shis pa'i ka pA lar// drag po gnas pa'i mtshan ma dgrod// gud du
279b6(sha): bsrungs la zhing chen dgab// bdag nyid phyag rgyar gsal rdzogs nas// g.yon du shes rab sgrol byed ma// mdun du las kyi gshin rje ni// ro
279b7(sha): langs nag po 'khor bcas bsgoms// las kyi gshin rje sha za bzhi// khrag 'thung srog gcod drug khri stong // mtshon cha sna tshogs srog rngam/
280a1(sha): 'bru drug sngags kyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag thugs ye shes 'od zer gyis// gnas nas bkug la sngags kyis bstim// kha nas
280a2(sha): ngan sngags 'brug char 'babs// gsal ba sa sngags gsum gtor las bzlas// gtor ma khugs bcas dus gsum bskul// be du na bdun nyi shu gcig tu
280a3(sha): bzlas// me 'bar 'od 'phro me stag 'thor// rmi lam sna tshogs sgra snyan 'byung // klu bdud dmu pa tsan myos pas sbyang // de bzhin thun nang ya las bskyed//
280a4(sha): dgug pa stim gtor la bskul dang btab// 'od 'phros dug nad rgya mtshor 'khyil// stong na thun brab du ma dril bzlas// khol dang sdud dang rlangs pa dros// zhing skra
280a5(sha): mchog chen pir gyis brag/ srog rten khrag sbal me mar ni// nad mtshon dug dpal tsha tshar 'phro// zhu bcad de sbal bar gyur// brgya brgyad tshad ldan gtor
280a6(sha): bsta ba bskul// dngos sam phyugs pa shas drud 'gro shi// gsod pa'i mtshan ma byung ba dang // ling kha zhing chen zhabs mas gril// thod pa dang bcas gnas
280a7(sha): su ma nan// mtshon nag 'khyil ba'i bdud mo la// mnan nas chur grir gsod par 'gyur// ri ru la mtshan snying bdag po la// gtad khang rtibs dag tu
280b1(sha): gsod/ byang bltas nyi ma mi 'char zhing // rlung 'tshub chu mig klu nag la// gta ma blo bur mdze grir gsod// yul btsan khang dmar gnyen po la// gtad na
280b2(sha): mtshon gri ga zer tha ba gsod// lha khang 'dre can nang sbas na// smyo 'bog dran pa nyams te gsod// kho rangs pha mes dungs kyi dkyil// ma na na na kha phung nyal
280b3(sha): gyis 'chi// dus brgyad kha gso rgyun du bya// gzhan yang las kyi mchong chen ni// drag po las kyi 'brub khung de// ling kha 'bru gsum mi rta ra// sha tshil mi
280b4(sha): byang mar nag dug/ mjug ma la dz+wa la ra gsum gdags// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg byas te// thal ba la ngi kha gong bzhin mnan// thun zor dmigs pa'i rten

280b6(sha): pa kho re khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// ro langs nag po'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga gcig go// / de nas rdo rje dpal chen gyis//
280b7(sha): gshin rje gshed gsu ma dzag sngags bshad// gong bzhin rnal 'byor sngon byas pas// maN+Da la dbus su gru gsum bka'o// khrag chen rgya so la sbyar bas byug/
281a1(sha): zur re ga shin rje re re dgod// de yang ji ltar yin zhe na// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du//
281a2(sha): dpal che na ya man ta ka dang // yum che na e ka dza tI gnyis// gnyis med rol pa'i byin brlabs las// drag po ga shin rje gshed gsum 'khrungs//
281a3(sha): 'gan dang pa ti stobs mchog dang // rkang pa'i rgyal po gsum du byung // khams gsum dus gsum sgo gsum la// dbang sgyur tshe srog bdag por byung //

281a5(sha): skye 'gro thams cad sgrol byed pa// de ni nga yis 'di bshad do// badz+ra kI li badz+rA bi ga ta/ mi swa nya tu tra ba sni/ badz+ra 'grim ra nu na/ g+henA b+he na rbu du
281a6(sha): rba da shag thum ri la ri la/ sha ga ba sni mA ra ya rba da rba da/ badz+ra kI li badz+ra bi ga te/ ya ma na ta ka hU/ ku ka ta pu hi/ ki kaM rba da bruM ri li ri li
281a7(sha): dza hi b+h+yo/ ka ma li shag snying kha rag ya ti Ta dza/ bi sna mA ra ya rbad rba da ardza na ki la ya hUM phaT/ mu tib tu snying khag rag rba da/ ka mu li shag
281b1(sha): sgying rbad/ mgo shag kA ba TI mA ra ya rbad zad/ de lta bu yi drug sngags kyis// srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad do// 'khrul 'khor rin po che rgyal

281b6(sha): rgyal po dgod par bya// seng ldeng smug po'i phur pa gzugs// de bzhin 'bru ba khung bya zur du// 'dod pa'i khams la dbang sgyur zhing // 'gro ba'i ngag la
281b7(sha): mnga' mdzad pa'i// ma 'ongs gshin rje gshed chen po// dga' ba'i rgyal po dgod par bya// mchog chen phur pa dag kyang gzugs// rten drug
282a1(sha): grog mkhar bag phye la// ling kha ming rus snying khar dgod// kun rgyal 'og rkang shar nub bzhag/ chags myos thig le gnyis thod chen//

282a5(sha): gshed// sku mdog sngon po dbus dkar po// mche gtsigs spyan rtsa ser po bzlog/ phyag g.yas seng ldeng phur pa bsnams// phyag g.yon zangs kyi 'khor lo

282b1(sha): gser gyi 'khor lo bskor// nges bsgom zhal nas ngan sngags bzlas// rkang pa g.yas la skya rings gdab// nyi ma'i tshe la phur pa dbyung // thun la bsngags
282b2(sha): shing khung bur blug/ nyi phyed rgya tshil me la mug/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas mgo nas gtub// khrag gi thig pa re re dang // ming rus nas phyung li dum bsreg/
282b3(sha): thal ba rlung 'phyar chu chen 'bab// gong gi gnas su mnan par bya// 'di lta bu yi pha thabs kyis// rab 'bring tha ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// zhag bdun zla bdun
282b4(sha): lo dus na// thal ba'i ling ga gnas su ma na na// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de nas shin tu gsang ste spyad// ga shin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri
282b5(sha): drug stong pa'i rgyud las// gshin rje gsum gyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga gsum mo// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// gshin rje
282b6(sha): gshed kyi drag sngags bshad// rA dza ha la ya ga sha ni// me dpal gshed chen zungs thar byed// ya ma chos kyi rgyal po ni// ma he nag po la zhon
282b7(sha): nas/ brnag pa'i mgo 'khor rgyal sa 'dzin// bsal gshin nag po ya ba ti/ bdag bting chu glang cag po zho na// khrag skyug byed cing srid bzhi 'dzin//
283a1(sha): myos byed 'bar bas gang mgo can// dud kha rdo rje ro langs te// bran byas srid pa'i khog 'brubs byed// gshin rje gsod byed smug

283a3(sha): yis// 'khor lam rgyud lnga skos dbang byed// ded dpo na tshangs pa kun 'dris ni// nyi zla'i 'khor lo la zhon te// srid pa kun gyi skos 'debs so// gcod cing
283a4(sha): sbyor ba'i las byed do// rtal pa ya ba ta'i 'khor na// dbugs 'phrog dbang po the shag ni// rlung gi rnga mo la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi dbugs len no// dam
283a5(sha): sri nag po gnod sbyin no// lcags kyi spyang zhon glang mgo'i 'khor// dbang po 'khar byed dmigs pa ni// smyo 'bog sha ba la zhon nas// srid pa kun gyi
283a6(sha): bla rnams rku// mig dmar ral pa tsha ro dgu'i 'khor// srog gcod dbang po ma ru rtse// lkugs pa lug la zhon nas kyang // gang la bya ba'i srog gcod do//
283a7(sha): de ltar sprul pa yang sprul bcos// lha mchog ya man ta ka yi// bka' sdod pho nya mngag par 'khol// chos kyi rgyal po bka' sdod 'khor// ya ba ya ti gdan
283b1(sha): du bting // a ba glang mgo bran du 'khol// ral pa tshar dgu pho nyar 'gyed// phya sangs srid pa'i skos 'debs so// rtel pa srid pa'i dbugs len no//
283b2(sha): rlig pa srid pa'i bla rnams rku// mig dmar srid pa'i srog gcod byed// de ltar dpal chen gshed 'khor na// las kyi gshin rje mi zad pa// dregs pa can /
283b3(sha): ni bsam mi khyab// skye 'gro thams cad srog gcod cing // bla rku dbugs lan tshe 'phrog cing // skos 'debs sha za khrag 'thung byed// ngan sngags mtshon
283b4(sha): chas nad 'bebs cing // sgrol byed bstan pa gnyen po srung // gshin rjegashed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las// las byed tshul gyi le'u ste
283b5(sha): dgu brgya lnga bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje che mchog gis// drag sngags sbyor ba'i rim pa ba shad// gzhung dang mthun pa'i bde
283b6(sha): gnas su// sngon du bya ba'i las rdzogs nas// gru gsum 'bar bar ling kha brnag/ mchog phur seng ldeng gri lcags phur// 'bru dang 'chi med myos
283b7(sha): ba sbyar// dang po byin brlabs rtags la dbab// dgos pa dang bcas brdeg cing gsad// 'bru thun spyang thod myos pa phag/ 'chi byed mi shis thod chen no//
284a1(sha): phur pa dang bcas dgongs ldan pas// spyi bo snying kha lte bar dbab// rus dang ming snying khams la gcad// drod dang ldan nas bsreg par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad
284a2(sha): rdzogs rten thal ba// de bzhin ling kha gnyan sar mnan// thal ba rlung chu thun rten ma'o// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyis gsod// gzhan srog chags smos ci dgos//
284a3(sha): slob dpon la skur smad byas na// bskal par 'ab da kyang mi 'grub pa'o// de nas bla ma slob dpon bkur// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// a kro te ka ya man ta
284a4(sha): kA a pa ye/ kA la ru ma mu kha la/ hri sting a pa ye/ yA ma sa ma ya dza/ srog la gzir dgra bo mA ra yarbad// o hriSh+TiHbi kri ta A na na dgra bo mA ra ya hUM phaT/
284a5(sha): shri many+dza dza mA na ta ta ka/ ya mA ra dza/ e ka dza ti/ pe ta li/ dgra po mA ra ya sod/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rgyud las/ sku gsung
284a6(sha): thugs kyi gzer sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcung lnga pa'o// // gzhan yang gsad thabs drag sngags ni// 'brub khung ling kha thod chen
284a7(sha): brnag/ sha chen la sogs gtor ma bca'// srubs drug mi shis ka pa lar// sbyor ba btab la thun kyang bca'// thal chen bkram la byad rjes brtags// khugs nas
284b1(sha): bdeg pa'i las bya'o// gshin rje gshed chen khro rgyal gyis// las kyi gshin rje dbang med bkol// dgra la nad mtshon bskal pas gsod// sbyor ba thon nas bsreg mnan//
284b2(sha): 'phang / bla ma bkur zhing dam tshig ma nyams rdug mi srid// lo yi dus bzhin nges par sgrol// nyams na rang yang 'chi byed na// las de 'grub par smos ci dgos// de ltar drag
284b3(sha): po'i ngan sngags ni// ya ma rag sha ba hra myags/ ya ru phu/ ya ma tsa srog sprugs ta sha na/ tsit+ta rbad/ khrag la myogs// thun b+h+yo mA ra ya rbad/ gshin rje gshed khri drug stong pa'i rgyu
284b4(sha): las/ las kyi gshin rje'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcung drug pa'o// // gzhan yang drag po gsad pa'i las// 'brug khung ling kha kha thun
284b5(sha): rnams// gtor ma mchod pa de bzhin bca'// khyad par gdong dmar shon dang // gsod byed mkha' lding phag don sbyar// ting 'dzin ldan pas byin brlabs bsgrub// dbab cing gdab dang
284b6(sha): gtub byas te// bsreg mnan 'phang ba'i las bya'o// ma nyams lo dus 'gyang mi srid// nyams na rang yang phung bar 'gyur// des na dam tshig srog ltar srung // gdug pa'i drag po sngags rgod brdeg
284b7(sha): ya man ta ka hri sti sarba kA la ru ba hri myags dgra bo mA ra ya sod / ni sha ku ru ni rtsa rba da/ u nan khyer b+h+yo ya ra hU rbad/ 'jam dang la khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ las mchog 'dus pa
285a1(sha): drag sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu bdun no// // gzhan yang drag sngags sbyor ba ni// dong thun ling kha mchod yon
285a2(sha): bsham/ dug khrag snying thun phur pa 'bru// dgongs pa ldan pas tshad mas dbab// dag cing bsad las bya'o// thon nas drag po'i shing rnams la// tsaN+Da li yi me
285a3(sha): sbaspar ba sreg/ thal ba la sogs sbyor ba bya// 'dis ni grib so dbab pa bzhin// cis kyang mi bzlog nges pa yin// de dag drag sngags 'di lta ste// ya mAn ta ka//
285a4(sha): kA la ru pa hri ti/ a pa ye/ ka pa ye/ du ru le/ dgra bo srog la thun rmugs mA ra yarbadarbad/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ ar la gtad de
285a5(sha): gsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcung brgyad do// // gzhan yang rno dpal gdug pa'i mtshon// 'brub khung nang du ling kha brnag/ dug 'bru//
285a6(sha): khrag phur snying thun brdeg/ srog dbugs ma mar gsad cing rbad// shes pa dang sa snyigs phye la rta// dngas ma rab 'bring tha ma yis// chos nyid phyag rgya go char bya//
285a7(sha): snyigs ma gdug pa'i lag tu gtad// bsreg cing mnan te 'phang byas la// brag dang rdol btab kyang 'gags// srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// dam
285b1(sha): tshig dbang dang slob dpon bskur// rno dpal drag sngags sbyor ba ni// hri sti ya mAn ta ka tsit+ta sha ma shaM/ kA la ru pa/ a ni a ni u ne u ne/ du ne du ne/ ma
285b2(sha): sha ya dgra bo rtsa la rba da rba da/ mA ra yarba da/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ rang mnan drag pos bsad pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga bcu nga dgu pa'o//
285b3(sha): / 'jame dpal gzhon nus yang gsol pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'chang che na khro bo'i rgyal// khro rgyal dpal
285b4(sha): chen he ru ka'i// bsgom pa rnam par bkod pa las// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na'i// mthar thug gang lags bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsun nas
285b5(sha): kyang / rdo rje 'chang chen gyis gsungs pa// zhus don ngas bshad legasra par nyon// gdul dka' 'dul zhing 'gro ba rnams// bla med byang chub thob
285b6(sha): bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor sprul// de yi mngon rtogs rim pa la// rnam grangs mang yang rnas bzhir 'dus// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang //
285b7(sha): mthar thug de kho na nyid do// he ru ka dpal khro rgyal gyi// mtshan brtsas mtshan med bskyed rdzogs lam// gang bsgrubs bla med byang chub thob// de dag rgyas pa
286a1(sha): 'di lta ste// ri rgyal lhun po dur khrod gnas// byin chen mdangs ldan par// sngags pa dbang bgrod dam ldan pas// phyi bsgrub sbyor
286a2(sha): ba'i rim pa ni// dur khrod la sogs gnas so na// stegs bu rgya dbangs khru do gang // khrag sna bdud rtsi spros kyis byug/ ba sus thig gad pa ni rangs kyis//
286a3(sha): dbus mthing rtsibs bzhi phyogs dang bstun// rtsibs mtshan mdzes ldan phyi nang bskos// thod rlon rdo rje'i ra bar bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho dur khrod tshogs// de la
286a4(sha): gnas pa'i khro rgyal ni// dbus su bud d+ha he ru ka/ smug nag zhal gsum phyag drug rngam// g.yas dkar g.yon mthing dbug smug zhal// dang po 'khor lo ri
286a5(sha): rab bsnams// bar pa be con kha T+wAM ga/ mtha' ma dril bu sbrul zhags 'phen// bdud dang mu stegs gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas khro mo dbang phyug la//
286a6(sha): dur dmar snying thogs stob cing 'khril// shar rtsibs badz+ra he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug khros// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/
286a7(sha): rdo rje dgra sta phur pa g.yas// dbyug tho me dpung ril spyi g.yon// dri za lha yi gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje khro mo dbang phyug ma// de bzhin yum kun 'thun par
286b1(sha): 'khril// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka// ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// rin che na gri gu cang te'u g.yas//
286b2(sha): gtun shing sdigs mdzub nyi ma g.yon// grul bum gshin rje'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma'o// nub rtsibs pad ma he ru ka/ dmar nag
286b3(sha): zhal gsum phyag drug brjid// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// pad ma lcags kyu rgyu zhags g.yas// tho ba zhing dbyug mdung thung g.yon// klu dbang
286b4(sha): chu bdag gdan la bzhugs// khro mo pad+ma dbang phyug ma'o// byang rtsibs kAr ma he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug gtum// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar
286b5(sha): dbus ldang zhal// ral gri rgya gram gsal shing g.yas// 'jig rten shag ti thod 'phreng g.yon// gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdan la bzhugs// khro mo las
286b6(sha): kyi dbang phyug ma// kun kyang zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum bgrad// stod smad glang chen zhing chen stag/ thod pa skam rlon dbu rgyan dang // do shal rigs bzhi sbrul
286b7(sha): gyis brgyan// khrag zhal thal ba me 'bar dbus// dpa' sgeg bzhad pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// shar lho nub byang rtsibs mtshan bzhir// ye shes khri rgyal
287a1(sha): chen po bzhi// shar lhor gshin rje mthar byed sku// mthing nag be con 'khor lo bsnams// lho nub shes rab mthar byed sku// ser nag
287a2(sha): dbyug pa spu gri bsnams// nub byang pad ma mthar byed sku// dmar nag zhing dra byug rgyu zhags bsnams// byang shar bgegs mthar byed pa'i sku// ljang nag rdo rje kha
287a3(sha): sdengs gram// zhing chen gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// spyan gsum zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs par ldan// gru chad dur khrod
287a4(sha): rag ta'i mtshor// ke ri brgyad dang 'phra men brgyad// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// gtor ma dam rdzas mchod pa'i
287a5(sha): rdzas// phyi nang gsang ba rdzogs par bsham// dur khrod rgyan dang bu don dgram// zhing chen zhing chung bla re 'phan// ga'u rgyu zhags thod pa'i rnga// tshil chen mar me
287a6(sha): gsur chen spos// sha khrag sna tshogs gtor ma dang // rag ta bdud rtsi phyi mchod lnga// de dag rdzogs par bshams pa ni// phyi sgrub rdul tshon brten pa yin//
287a7(sha): gzhan yang dung chen mtshan ldan pas// gang lnga pa'am dmu lugs gnyis// rag ta bdud rtsi g+hi wang dang // spos sna tshogs sman sna tshogs// bla ba shing kun chu
287b1(sha): gtsang sbyar// rang rang tshon rtsi kha dog gis// tshangs pa'i sdug tu badz+ra he ru ka/ dpral bar bud d+ha he ru ka/ rdza g.yas rang na he ru ka/ lhag par pad ma he ru ka/
287b2(sha): rna g.yon kar ma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro rgyal mthar byed bzhi// mtha' mar rang rang sngags kyis bskor// gcig la de bzhin yum rnams bri// dung che na ga'u
287b3(sha): kha sbyar du// snying chen sar pa ma nyams par// rdzas des hUM 'bru bzhi dang // ha he b+h+yo phaT 'bru rnams dgod// bdud rtsi thig le btab pa yis// dkar
287b4(sha): dmar dar gyis brgyan pa la// rdzas de maN+Dal dbus su bzhag/ ga'u gzhal yas khang nang du// lha bskyed ye shes spyan drangs pastim// de ltar rdzas bshams
287b5(sha): bsgom bzlas pa// nang bsgrub thod pa la brten yin// gzhan yang gzugs brnyan ma yin te// snying kha chos kyi 'khor lo la// ye shes lha rnams rdzogs par
287b6(sha): ldan// dbus kyi thig le spros med la// khro rgyal bud d+hA he ru ka/ khro mo sangs rgyas dbang phyug ma// mdun gyi chos nyid rtsa dkar la// khro rgyal badz+ra he ru ka/
287b7(sha): khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma// g.yas kyi ye shes rtsa ser po// khro rgyal rad ma he drug/ khro mo rin chen dbang phyug ma// rgyan gyi yon tan rtsa dmar la// khro rgyal pad
288a1(sha): ma dbang phyug ma// g.yon gyi rang rgyud rtsa gnag la// khro rgyal kar ma he ru ka/ khro mo las kyi dbang phyug ma// yab yum rdzogs nas gsal bar bsgom// chos
288a2(sha): nyid g.yas su gshin rje gshed// g.yon du gzhan gyis mi thub pa// ye shes g.yas su rta mchog dpal// g.yon gyi rtsa la bdud rtsi 'khyil// sul dang bar mtshams mdud pa
