288a7(sha): bsgral zhing log rtog rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor mdzad// hU/ chos nyid rang bzhin rnam par dag/ ye shes dngos med rang snang bar// chos rnams snying
288b1(sha): po byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po nyid// dbang chen lnga yi rim par gnas// snang ba rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// ye shes dkyil 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs//

288b3(sha): rol pa rang snang ba'i// khro rgyal gzugs skur bzhengs su gsol// hU/ ye shes khro rgyal 'bar ba'i sku// thabs dang shes rab dkyil 'khor tshogs// thugs rje thabs kyis spyan/

290a1(sha): rgyu la dkyil 'khor du// gnong zhing 'gyod pas mthol lo bshags// tshangs pa bzhes la dngos grub gsol// a h+ya hi b+ha ga wa na/ ma hA
290a2(sha): shri he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+ha tsA ya/ ma hA ka ru ni/ kra twe sha ho/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ o Ta lu ru lu hU/ dza hUM baM ho/ s+yA ma ya mu tra prA b+han tsakra b+hU phaT
290a3(sha): ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri/ badz+ra Da ki ni hri sta ya/ sarba badz+ra kro d+ha ta/ a kan+thA ya/ a kaD+D+h+ya ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ b+han d+ha ya/ tau sha ya/ tau sha ya hU b+h+yo/ pra be sha ya pra be

290a6(sha): ri dz+nyA na d+ha ki ni prad nya da du badz+ra da ra/ oM ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo tA/ bA ga k+She ya/ bi tong sA yA/ bi tong sA yA/ bud+d+ha k+She tra sta be/ a ka taM pa ka/ sarba ma hA badz+ra
290a7(sha): kro d+haM/ ka ya badz+ra kri ta ya/ bAg badz+ra a kra ya/ tsit+ta badz+ra tsan da ya/ dza hUM ba ho/ na maHsarba ta thA ga d+he b+h+yoHbi sha mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khang ud ga te/
290b1(sha): mA ra na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ o shri badz+ra ra ga/ d+hA pa du/ puSh+paM pung/ A lo ke hri/ ga na de gan/ nai bi d+ye A/ pu tsa me g+ha sa mu dra s+tha ra Na sa ma
290b2(sha): ye swA hA/ mu tra pu tsa ho/ sarba ta thA ga tam hA pany+tsa a mri ti/ shrI rba na kha raM kha hri ka sa badz+ra si ti au/ bA ga badz+ra si ti a/ tsit+ta badz+ra si te hU/ o na ma sarba ta
290b3(sha): thA ga taM ma hA pu tsa me ka ya ra na/ badz+ri swa b+ha wa A da ma kro tra ha/ sa ma ye swA hA/ dza hUM ba ho/ ma hA pu tsa ho/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ ma hA ma sa/ ma hA ra ga ta/
290b4(sha): ma hA ba su ta me hA tsit+ta/ ma hA me thA/ ma hA pa na tsa a mri ta/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ a li mu li/ ha la ta pa ti/ bi ba to/ sa ma ya kha ho ho/ i da ma hA ba
290b5(sha): li tang / gr-i h+Na gr-ih+NA/ khA hi khA hi/ b+hun dza ho/ pra ti dza ho/ sa ma ya hU b+h+yo hU/ sha ra la ga tsa me/ 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyud las/
290b6(sha): 'phrin las rim pa'i le'u ste dgu brgya gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnal 'byor bsam gtan rim pa bshad// rang bzhin rnam
290b7(sha): dag chos nyid las// lal chen khro rgyal he ru ka/ ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur zhing / sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// khro chung khrab chags bzhin du brtan nas
291a1(sha): thugs khar 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dang // rdo rje rtse dgu kha gdengs dang // rin chen zur brgyad 'od 'bar ba// pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbang gi cho
291a2(sha): ga/ rdo rje rgya gram ljang khu ga nas// ye shes sems dpa' rigs kyi mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bo'i sku// mthu mar rang sngags 'phreng ba dang // bsgom
291a3(sha): dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer gyis// chos kyi dbyings nyid rab 'byams su// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la thim// mchod phul rgyud
291a4(sha): bskul dngos grub bsdus// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro don bskul// sems can sgo gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// tshur 'dus rnal 'byor thugs sogs thim// lus ngag yi
291a5(sha): gsum sgrib pa sbyangs// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub rdzogs// mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bsgom// mchod dang bstod pa sum yar bya// tshogs kyi 'khor lo ci
291a6(sha): nus bskor// de ltar gsang sngags bzlas tshul ni// rang rang sngags dang bsgom dbyangs brgyad// tshom bu thig le stong brgya bcu// gtso 'khor dag kyang de bzhin no//
291a7(sha): dril ba'i snying po kun la bsdeb// 'di ltar ma yengs bsgom bzlas na// de nas ring po mi thogs par// ngo mtshar drod rtags nges par 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi
291b1(sha): dngos grub blang // yi ge 'khor lo'i sa mchog nyid// tshe 'dis myur du thob par 'gyur// oM d+harma kA ya shu dz+nyA ta dz+nyA/ na mo ta na/ bud d+ha ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/
291b2(sha): oM badz+ra ka ya a ta ri sha dz+nyA na mo ta/ badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka/ ma hA tsa na d+ha hA phaT/ oM sa bo ka ya sa ma na ta dz+nyA na mau ta na/ rat+na ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma hA u kra ya hUM phaT/
291b3(sha): o bo d+hi ka ya pra ta ba sha dz+nyA na mo ta na/ pad+ma ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA kri te hU phaT/ oM ni ra ma ka ya krin da dz+nyA na mo te na/ karma ma hA shri he ru ka/ ma hA rakra hUM phaT/ oM bu da
291b4(sha): d+ha tha da ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ni hUM phaT/ badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma da ra pradz+nyA da du ma hA kro d+hi shA ri hU phaT/ hU ya man ta krid pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ hU pad mA ta kr-id hu lu hu lu phaT/
291b5(sha): hUM bi g+h+nAn ta krid tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hU phaT/ o d+harma d+ha du dz+nyA na kA ya ma hA bi ra shri he ru ka badz+ra ma ha kro d+ha rA dza ya/ prad dz+nyA ma hA kro d+hi sho ri/ badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA pa la ti/ hU he
291b6(sha): he phaT b+h+yo/ ma hA yo gi ni/ ma hA d+ha ka na/ oM ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo ts+tsha/ khro rgyal yab yum la sogs te// thams cad 'dus pa'i snying po sngags// ye shes dkyil
291b7(sha): 'khor mngon du 'gyur// byin brlabs dpag med sangs rgyas so// ye shes bla ma non par 'gyur// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa don gyi snying po'i rgyud las
292a1(sha): bsam gtan gsang sngags kyi le'u ste dgu brgya gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// mthar thug de kho na nyid
292a2(sha): bshad// o ye shes lhun grub nyid// a zhes chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par snang mdzad de ni rigs// khro rgyal bud d+ha he ru ka/ zla tshes mnyam nyid ye shes te//
292a3(sha): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin rigs// khro rgyal rat+na he ru ka/ rna ru kun rtog ye shes te// sdung ba mtha' yas pad ma'i rigs// khro rgyal pad+ma he ru ka/ thig le ma
292a4(sha): long ye shes te// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i rigs// khro rgyal badz+ra he ru ka/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes te// don yod grub pa las kyi rigs// khro rgyal karma he ru ka
292a5(sha): rang 'byung ye shes rang shar ba'o// sa ru sa sangs rgyas spyan nyid de// bud d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri'o// khrag chu mA ma ki nyid ni// rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri'o// me dang drod ni gos
292a6(sha): dkar mo// pa da ma kro d+hi shA ri 'o// rlung 'byung da ma tshig sgrol ma ste// karma kro d+hi shwa ri 'o// rnam rig nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma// badz+ra kro d+hi shA ri 'o//
292a7(sha): 'byung ba chen po ye sangs rgyas// de ni phung po skye mched khams// gdod nas sangs rgyas ye shes lha// rang gnas dkyil 'khor rtogs par bya// rtogs tshogs ma
292b1(sha): spangs gnas su dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// snying po'i thig le'i gsang sngags kyis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// 'di yis lhun gyis
292b2(sha): grub par 'gyur// dpal chen khro rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ mtshan don lhun grub chos rnams rdzogs// he zhes dngos med byang chub sems// chos nyid ma bcos rnam
292b3(sha): dag dbyings// sgrib med ye shes rab gsal bas// thams cad der rdzogs dgyes pa che// ru zhes thugs rje kun la khyab// rang bzhin thugs kyi mnyam nyid las// /
292b4(sha): dmigs pa med cing phyogs rigs bral// chags med chags mchog rgyal po'o// ka zhes rol pa cir yang snang // sna tshogs rang snang ngos bzung med// thabs mkhas 'phrin
292b5(sha): las rnam mang bas// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi thugs// dngos po rnam dag ma bcos pa// dngos med mu mtha' med pa nyid//
292b6(sha): rang bzhin stong chen mtha' las 'das// 'dus ma byas pa'i chos dbyings de// chos dbyings kro d+hi shwa ri ste// gnyis med bde chen byang chub sems// dbyings nyid ye shes
292b7(sha): dbyer med pas// dpal chen ye shes mtshan rdzogs pa'o// oM ni 'khor 'das chos thams cad// gnyis med byang chub sems su gsal// snying po byang chub sems
293a1(sha): nyid de// rgyu ma chad cing phyogs ma lhung // rang byung ye shes rang gsal bas// skye med 'gag med thog mtha' med// rang byung kun khyab 'dus
293a2(sha): ma byas// 'khor 'das ma lus snying po gnas// de nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ lhun grub rang rig ye shes gnyis// ma 'gags rang snang gnyis med pa'o// 'khor 'das chos
293a3(sha): kun dngos gzhir shar// rig pa brdal khyab ma bcos pa// phyogs med rang snang snying po ste// 'khor 'das kun gyis sa gzhir gnas// ru lu 'khor ba'i rnam shes
293a4(sha): brgyad// gnas kyi ma mo ki ri brgyad// ma spangs gnas dag rang bzhin te// chos nyid byang chub sems nyid gsal// ru lu yul brgyad snang srid chos// ye nas
293a5(sha): gnas dag 'phra me na brgyad// skye med rnam dag chos nyid de// mtha' la 'das pa'i chos nyid do// hU ni yul sems rang snang kun// byang chub sems nyid rang snang bas//
293a6(sha): he ru ka dpal ngo bo nyid// gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig/ b+h+yo/ sna tshogs rig pa'i rang bzhin te// rig pa stong gsal ma bgags shar// de nyid dbang phyug
293a7(sha): nyi shu brgyad// sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro snang ba'o// hUM sna tshogs cir snang de bzhin nyid// ma bcos la ji bzhin nyid// phyag rgya bzhi ldan ye shes te// rang
293b1(sha): rig kyu a ma 'gags pa'o// de nyid rang byung ye shes te// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po'o// de nyid rang gi sems nyid de// rang sems ma bcos mnyam par bzhag/ rig
293b2(sha): pa brdal khyab ngos bzung med// cir snang ye shes ngo bor shar// ma yengs ji bzhin ngang gnas na// mdzad spyod ma chags blang dor med// ma bsgrubs chos sku lhun gyis
293b3(sha): grub// rdzogs sku sprul sku shugs las 'char// 'gro ba las dag thams cad la// mngon par snang de don mdzad do// de dag tshe 'dis 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam
293b4(sha): dpal khri drug stong pa snying po gsang ba'i rgyud las// mthar thug de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste dgu brgya bzhi'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis//
293b5(sha): drag po las kyi rim pa bshad// phung sa gsum gyi 'bru ba khung ni// gru gsum rgya dbangs khru mtho gang // kha khyer dang po thod rlon 'phreng // bar pa mtsher rtsa srin mo
293b6(sha): 'gros// mtha' ma gdug pa'i sbrul rigs bzhi// phyi nang dug khrag sna tshogs drug/ dgra la rgyu rten drug ling ga/ bgegs la gang gnod rdzas kyi gzugs// mtho
293b7(sha): gang dbang po dod par bya// kro ga ming bya khong par brlag/ tsha pha gsum dang dug sgra tshogs// nad khrag sna tshogs byug par bya// khram thod bcug la bong du brnam
294a1(sha): dug rgod spyang du ga ra dug pa// 'ol mo re lcug pa sbu ba// mon pa kha byung thod par ba sham// mi yi nang khrag sna tshogs dang // gcan gzan//
294a2(sha): sna tshogs ra khyi rta// khrag sna snying snu gri thod sbyar// yungs kar yungs nag ska tshe dang // ji tse shang rtse rdo lcags zangs// phye gsum rabs nAd thod par sbyar//
294a3(sha): gri thod lcags phur seng ldeng mchog/ phur pa dug khrag ngar blud pa sham// bdag nyid dpal chen he ru ka/ las byed pho nya sprul pa'i tshogs// shin tu rnga ma khros mi
294a4(sha): bzod pas// srog gcod sha za khrag 'thung ba sam// des ni brnag pa gang yin pa// rang dbang med bkug rten la bsgrim// ling ga dgra bgegs
294a5(sha): dngos su bsam// dug thun bud med 'jigs tshul rngam// khrag thun sha za srin po'i tshogs// 'bru phye mon dang mon mo'i tshogs// shin tu 'jigs khros
294a6(sha): mtshon cha thogs// nad kyi bskal pa 'bebs byed cing // dgra bge gas srog gcod pasha za ba sam// phur pa khro bo'i 'jigs tshul rnga ma// smad dpal lcags
294a7(sha): sa thog ltar bas ma// drag sngags brgya thun stong thun dbab// srog lus rdul phran brlags par bsam// de nas phur pa sa gdab par bya// srog lus go cha phyag
294b1(sha): rgyar bskyed// 'di ltar drag sngags sbyor ba yis// tshangs pa'i tshe dang ldan pa yang // skad cig gcig la 'chi 'gyur na// dgra bgegs rnams la smos ci dgos//
294b2(sha): ma ma tra ga rag sha kha ldang nag mo// rag mo shan pa dgra bo la mA ra ya dza dza/ rag sha rbad ling dgra bo snying khrag tsho la pa rba da/ ru tra ma tra mA ra ya ha li ha li dgra bo la
294b3(sha): dun b+h+yo ma ra ya rba da/ badz+ra kI li ya tig sna ha na ha na nI ma ra ya rba da/ bsad pa dregs pa can la gtad// gzir ba bka' gnyan mgron po la'o// thun
294b4(sha): 'phangs sprul pas nad mtshon dbab// nad byo sngags mthar skabs kyis brde ba// drod tshad ldan byas myur du 'grub// bskal pa nyi shu'i tha ma la// sangs
294b5(sha): rgyas mu stegs bdag gzhan sdes// lha srin dregs sngags pho mo rnams// mthu rtsal stobs ldan dmod pa 'bor// sprul pa sha zan skar ltar 'khrug/ dmod
294b6(sha): pa'i mtshon cha char ltar 'bab// byin brlabs mthu stobs me ltar 'bar// sngags pa rdo rje dme 'thab byed// de tsho rang gi byed sdebs sngags// phyi na la bzlog cing /
294b7(sha): de nyid bsad// 'khor lo drag po 'di ba shad do// rang bzhin rnam dag chos nyid las// brub yig dmar nag yongs gyur las// dbang drag 'khor lo rtsibs bcug
295a1(sha): rno la rgya chen me 'bar ba// lte ba hU yig yongs gyur las// dpal chen bud d+ha he ru ka/ yab yum sangs rgyas dbang phyug ma// gsal
295a2(sha): rdzogs bsgom pa'i thugs kha nas// rtsibs bcu'i gdan la hUM bcu 'phros// de dag yongs su gyur pa las// shar rtsibs badz+ra he ru ka/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug
295a3(sha): bsgom// lho rtsibs rat+na he ru ka/ khro mo rin chen dbang phyug bsgom/ nub rtsibs pad+ma he ru ka/ khro mo dbang phyug pad+ma bsgom// byang rtsibs karma he ru ka/ khro
295a4(sha): mo las kyi dbang phyug bsgom// shar lho gshin rje mthar byed gnas// lho nub shes rab mthar byed gnas// nub byang pad+ma mthar byed gnas// steng rtsibs
295a5(sha): gtsug gtor 'khor lo sgyur// ser nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// spyan gsum mche gtsigs rin chen brgyan// 'khor lo ral gri phyag na bsnams//
295a6(sha): lha chen gdan la brkyang po sku ma bzhugs// 'og rtsibs rdo rje hUM mdzad de// mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pas// rdo rje dgra sta phyag na bsnams// ma bdud
295a7(sha): gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs bstim// dbang bskur byin brlabs skye mched brlab// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dbul//
295b1(sha): bdud rtsi myang zhing bstod pa bya// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'bar ba de// drag tu 'khor zhing gang dmigs pa'i// lha srung reg sngags bcad bzlog gsad// de bzhin
295b2(sha): dur khrod ras la bri// rtsibs bzhi lte bar hUM bcu gcig/ mu khyud nang mar rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi mar spu gri'i drag sngags dgos// rig sngags drag po smra bcad
295b3(sha): bzlas/ bdud bzhi nyon mongs dug lnga gcad// rang byung 'khor lo 'bar ba 'dis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bsad pa dang // byang chub bsgrub pa'i las rnams
295b4(sha): 'grub// rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// snying khar mtshon cha'i 'khor lo gzhug/ sgrub khang rgyun srang rten la mnan// de dag gsang sngags 'odadi ste ste// nam
295b5(sha): sa man ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra he ru ka ni/ oM A hU badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/ shrI he hau ru ru ka ka/ ma hA tsan d+ha u kra ye hUM/ badz+ra kro d+ha pa lA ti ma hA kro d+ha rA dza ya/
295b6(sha): ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyA/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA yo gi ni tsan+ma DA ki ni/ hUM hahi phaT b+h+yo/ tsakra tiSh+T+wA wa rak+ti/ tsakra tiSh+Ta wa rastaM/ dzA la dzA la/ pra ta kir/ pra te ki
295b7(sha): da ha daha/ btso pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mtha ma tha/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ hi na han/ mA ra ya/ mA da ya/ pUng+gu hU d+h+waM/ phaT phaH/ 'khor lo
296a1(sha): bskor zhing sngags bzlas pas// 'byung ba'i rgyun kyang phyir bzlog na// sngags byang spod gtong smos ci dgos// rang 'khor bsrung zhing nyon
296a2(sha): mongs gcod// bla med byang chub yang dag thob// don kun 'grub byed 'khor lor bshad// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa rdo rje snying po'i rgyud las/ drag po'i 'khor lo'i
296a3(sha): gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu brgya lnga pa'o// // de nas ya ma ra dza yis// rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pas// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i
296a4(sha): phyir// don po lha srin dregs pa la// gtad pa'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pas bka' stsal pa// zhus don ngas bshad khyod nyon cig/ brnag pa
296a5(sha): lha srin dregs pa la// gtad pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis// pho la gtad dang mo la gtad// pho la gtad pa brgyad yin te// las kyi gshin rje la gtad dang //
296a6(sha): lha la ga tad dang bdud la gtad// rgyal po la gtad btsan la ga tad// gnod s+thi na la ga ta da klu la gtad// mgon po nag po la// gshin rje la ga tad sbyor
296a7(sha): ba ni// zhing lpags rten 'brel rdzas kyis byug/ dug khrag sgo rtsas 'khor lo bri// dbus su brnag pa'i ming byang gzugs// rtsibs bcur drag sngags
296b1(sha): grangs phyed dgos// ga shin rje nag por lto bar bri// rgyu rten ling ga spyi rus cas// 'khor lo tshil chen gu gul byug/ mi rta la sogs snying sna tshogs// dam rdzas
296b2(sha): sha khrag gtor ma ba sha ma// gsur chen btang zhing drag sngags bzlaso// nag po 'jigs tshul be con thogs// ling ga dgra bo'i dngos su bsams// srog
296b3(sha): gcod sha za khrag 'thung gsod// gshin rje'i bskul ba gang rung btang // dur khrod lhor bltas dmyal chu khol// tsha sgo khu rlangs nga ma grog dmar// der ni 'khor
296b4(sha): lo ling ga mang // de la las bcol gnyer gtad bya// des ni yun rings mi thogs pa// gang gtad glang thabs nad kyis gsod// oM a kro te ka ya man ta hri/
296b5(sha): tika lA ru pa hUM phaT/ ni ya ma ra tsa ni/ khug drol/ shrI kro d+ha ha ha b+he dza ya khams thums/ nri 'gal byed gsod/ 'gal byed gtso bo kaM kar thums// ya ma
296b6(sha): baM ri li ya ma baM ri li/ ya ma sa to me/ ya ma phu tau me/ ya ma khrag to me/ ya ma mug to ma/ dgra bo mA ra ya/ myag dum pu rbad/ au shrI many+dzA ya mU
296b7(sha): rA dza sa to me yang yaM yaM thu thu/ dgra bori snying la dun b+h+yo/ mA ra ya dza/ lha la gtod pa'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod ngas la rdzas kyis byug/ 'khor lo rtsibs bcu'i
297a1(sha): sngags rnams ming // ling ka ming byung bya rgod 'thong // lug dkar ra sha'i sha khrag snying // 'bru gtsang nas 'bras glo nyungs kar// dkar
297a2(sha): gsum mngar gsum gtor ma gtang // dkar po 'jigs tshul 'khor lo can// sngags bzlas gsur gtang lha chen bskul// ling ga dgra slog srog gcod
297a3(sha): gsod// sha za khrag 'thung rlag par bsam// gangs ri brag dkar yang rtse ni// rtse mthon rgod lding gtsang yul du// thod chen dmar chod mi shis par//
297a4(sha): 'khor lo ling ga bcug la gtad// hur thums nad kyis myur du gsod// oM ma hA de ba pra me rag sha ya/ a sa pa ya tri/ i dra rag sha A la pa
297a5(sha): ya/ de ba rA dzA ma hA ni Sha/ badz+ra ti badz+ra lu/ tsa tur mu kha rag sha pra ma na/ ma hA de ba kA la tsan d+ha ya ha rI hA ri/ dgra bo mA ra ya thum sarbad nan tsi t+yA tshal
297a6(sha): pa za da bdud la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni// dom nag pags pardzas byug ste// bya rog sgro rtswas 'khor lo bri// rten 'bral sngags dang ming byang
297a7(sha): dgod kang ka smyung ka mkha' lding gnag/ lug na gar rog g.yas rog po// dom nag mon dang rabs chad nag/ rtan ga khyin ge sha khrag snying //
297b1(sha): mo ma 'bru nag rgyan ldan pa sha ma// nag po 'jigs tshul khra ma thogs bsgom// sngags bzlas gsur gtang bdud pho bskul// dgra bo bdud gcod sha khrag
297b2(sha): za ri na ga brag na ga mas 'jigs// mdun na mtsho mtsha nag po 'khyil// byang bltas ri mgo mdud pa 'dra// der ni rabs chad mon thod du// lang ga 'khor
297b3(sha): lo bcu ga la ga tad// 'thibs nag myos pas myur du sod// kA la ru tra mA rA ya/ kA la ru tra pra ma ya/ kA la ru tra ra ga sha dang / dgra bo'i snying mgo chod/
297b4(sha): du ru du ru/ Thar ti hU rat+ti/ dgra bo'i rting la dza/ kU la ti pa tsa'i/ dgra bo'i snying la baM r-il rbad/ ha na mA ho 'byi li ma wan+ya buM ru/ ruru tra tra du ru dun+sa n+yA
297b5(sha): ru tra ka la sha pa tI baM ra la rbad/ ka la he ra haM ba ri la/ dgra bo mA ra yarba da dze/ rgyal po la gtad sbyar ba ni/ smyo 'bog shi ba'i shun pA la// rdzus kyi 'khor
297b6(sha): lo rtsibs brgyad bri// sngags dgod ming byang bri// rgyu rten ling ga ming byang bcas// rang lugs bya khyi rang shi dang // smyo 'bog sha be'i sha khrag snying // dam
297b7(sha): rdzas gtor ma rgyan ldan pa sham// dkar po 'jigs tshul ral gri thogs// sngags bzlas gsung gtang rgyal po bskul// ling gdon po gsod cing za// de ltar
298a1(sha): brlag byed shul med bsam// lha khang rnyings pa lha 'dre can// rgyal po yod nges sa der ru// smyo 'bog thod par 'khor lo dang // ling ga brnag
298a2(sha): / ste gtad byas na// smyo 'bog nad kyis myur du gsod// ma hA rA dza thun b+h+yo/ ma hA ragrA rag ta tsa ru mu na tra ma hA shi ri ti rtso ka tsa/ la bing bing dgra bo mA ra ya ha ba ha ba/
298a3(sha): mA ra na pra ma ra tsa tsit+ta ba ling ma ya aM ku sha dza dza/ snying shag tshal pa dug myong mA ra ya rba da/ ba tsa na la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni// dri bo'i pags pa rdzas kyis byu ka/ 'khor
298a4(sha): po rtsibs brgyad sngags rnams dgod// ling ga ming bya ra dmar rta// bya dmar yug dmar gro bo ni// rang shi sha khrag snying la sogs// dam rdzas gtor ma ngon por
298a5(sha): dmigs// dmar po rngam pa mdung dmar thogs// sngags bzlas gsur gtang btsan rnams rbad// ling ga dgra bo dngos su bsam// btsan gyi srog gcod sha khrag
298a6(sha): za// ri brag dmar po gong gsum 'joms// la btsas spyi ba tsas gnas pa yi// gri thod 'khor lo ling ga dag/ myur du brnag pa gang yin de// gri rgod gzer
298a7(sha): thabs nad kyis gsod// tsa ra de ba a pI shu sa ma ya tsa ra ba ni a bi shu a na na tri tri sha rba da/ badz+ra ra shan ting sa na d+ha ra shu na tsi na 'bis ma ku ru dza/ tsa ra sho le ba ril
298b1(sha): pa ya trang ye rtsa dur ya chu ra tring tsa ya/ tsa ra tsa ra ki ta ya/ kar ti pha ra yaM/ zod ya shaM dgra bo khyer ya/ mA ra ya sod/ gnod sbyin la gtang sbyor ba ni// zhing lpags
298b2(sha): rdzas byug 'khor lo bri// rtsibs brgyad sngags dang ming byang dgod// ling ga rgyu rten ming dbye bcas// mi rta spyang khu 'phar gsa' wa// stag dang dom ga can la sogs
298b3(sha): kyi/ sha khrag snying sbyar gtor ma bca'// ljang nag 'jigs tshul ral gri thogs// gsur gtang sngags bzlas gnod sbyin rbad// don po srog gcod sha khrag pa/
298b4(sha): lcags ri nag po rkang gcig shing // brag dang chu 'thab nyams mi dga'// chu srin kha stangs 'du ba ru// 'khor lo mu za'i thod par gtad// blo bur nad du gyis la myur
298b5(sha): du gsod// ma hA yag sha rA dza ki ta ya/ tri sha ru tra badz+ra yag sha sa ma ya/ ru tra shag tshal pa b+h+yo/ rag sha rag sha tshal ba b+h+yoHrag sha snying ku ru badz+ra yag sha tshal
298b6(sha): pab kro ta ya/ snying kha la rag she hu ra la b+h+yo/ badz+ra yag sha sa ma ya/ nri dza dgra bo rnying thum ril mA ra ya dza/ klu la gtad pa'i sbyor ba ni// mdze can shun rdzas 'khor lo
298b7(sha): bri/ rtsibs bcu sngags bri ming byang dgod// ling ga ming byang rten 'brel bcas// zhing lpags lhag pa'i shun pa la// rdzas byugs 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri//
299a1(sha): ling ga ming byung drag sngags dgod// sbal sbrul mi sha khrag snying gi/ gtor ma mdze khrag ling gA byug/ nag po mgo dgu sbrul zhags nad rgyal thogs/
299a2(sha): ling ga dgra dngos nad 'bebs shing // sha za khrag 'thung mdangs 'phrog bsam// gsur gtang klu rgyal nag po bskul// chu mig byang bltas nag por nyid// myur du
299a3(sha): mdze nad// a a gzha' la ka la cha la pa mA ra ya/ kra ta nA ga dza la dza la dgra bo tsha la pa mA ra ya hU phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA ga nA ga/ dza la dza la/ dgra bo mA ra ya phaT/
299a4(sha): pe rag sha dza la hU/ dgra bo tsit+ta dza la khrag skyug/ pa tsa pa tse mA ra ya rbad/ mgon po la gtad sbyor ba ni// zhing lpags rdzas kyis 'khor lo bri// rtsibs bcu sngags dang
299a5(sha): ming byang dgod// rgyu rkyen ling ga ming rus brnag/ ra rog g.yag rog lug nag po// mi rta khyi nag sha khrag snying // gtor ma dam rdzas drag po drug/ nag po khro bo be con thog//
299a6(sha): dgra bo srog gcod sha khrag za// sngags bzlas mgon po drag tu bskul// lha khang gnyen po byin chen gyi// mgon po nyid kyi zhabs 'og gtad// myur du gsod par
299a7(sha): the tshom med// badz+ra yak+ka de ba ma khar ha ka wa ga na gu ti sa ma la/ ma ho ko la kro ta ya/ ma hA kA la ra tri ra tri ya ma ta ka la drung ka ra tsa ya/ a ka la ma ti ma la dza/
299b1(sha): hA kA ya/ dgra bo'i snying khrag la bruM ril/ mA ra yarba da/ mo la gtad thabs bzhi yin te// mtsho bdud mo dang klu bdud mo// dur khrod ma mo mtsho sman ni// de dag gang la
299b2(sha): gtod byed kyang // nal bu'i shun la rten 'brel gyis// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu rtsibs sngags dgod// dbus su don pa'i ming byang gzugs// rgyu rten ling ga mi
299b3(sha): byanag lug nag nal dre'u mdze// rang sha'i sha khrag snying gis rdzas// gtor ma rgyan dang ldan par bcas// dug sna nang khrag gzugs la byug/ bdag nyid lhar sgom ma
299b4(sha): mo bdun// ling ga dgra dngos sros gcod gsod// sha za khrag 'thung shul med pas// trag ragra kha mun tA b+h+yo/ ru lu ru he mo a lon tsin dan ma la b+h+yo/ shur mu he ma pa
299b5(sha): b+h+yo ru lu na ga tan he ma b+h+yo ru lu/ lag kro d+ha b+h+yo/ ru lu snying kha rag srog thun b+h+yo ru lu/ sa b+h+yo sri b+h+yo thun b+h+yo/ rdo rje lham cig pad ma gsal// nag po dbu dgu thod
299b6(sha): zor 'phen// nad kyi rgyal bas nad 'bebs ma// mtsho bdud snying bdud ma la gtad// badz+ra snying mgo chod kha la zom mun za don tirbad/ yU na dan ting rbad// dar rnga rbaH/
299b7(sha): thib rnga rbad/ sha khrag tig sna rbad/ gnyen gyi yum cig klu 'bum bsil// mtsho sman ljang mo tri shul thogs// rgyu zhags thogs pas mi zad ma// mtsho sman rgyal
300a1(sha): mo'i lag tu gtad// tshal ba du khrag tirbad/ tig sna rbad/ shag tirbad/ sha ga ti rbad/ rban rba na rta tha rbad/ dum bu dum bu tshal pa rbad//
300a2(sha): rag sha ragra ru tArba da/ snying nag snying nag srog rtsa rba da/ tshal pa tshal pa nye ni rba da/ ba ral dam pa dum bu tig sna tsag rbad/ nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro dbyings ru ma
300a3(sha): gsil/ srid pa'i bu mo sngo ba sangs ma// 'jigs tshul tri shul ba na da da ma ra// klu ba dud phu bdag mo la gtad// shri tsa tsa ru thun ling khug thu ma ling // gu
300a4(sha): thu rbad/ sharba dgug tshar ling mug rba da/ myog tshar ling mA ra ya rbad/ ma ma ra gra ru trarbad/ rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' 'gro ba sil// dur khrod bdag mo tsa mun tI//
300a5(sha): nag mo 'jigs tshul ral gri thogs// rgyu zhags 'phen zhing dgra srog gcod// yugs mo'i thod pa mon thod dang // rabs chad thod pa gri thod du// gu gul ling ga
300a6(sha): 'khor lo dug/ sna tshogs bcug ste gza' skar ngan pa la// bsgrub bya dngos su gsal byas te// gang yin dregs pa pho mo yi// lag tu gtad de zas su bsngo//
300a7(sha): dregs pas dgra bo gang yin de// rjes shul med par zos par bsam// des ni zla bdun tshun chad kyis// gri rgod rims nad smyo 'bog dang // mdze shu gzer
300b1(sha): nad lkugs pa yis// dgra bo gsod par the tshom med// 'jam dpal khri drug stong pa gsang ba yang snying gi rgyud las/ pho mo gtad khram gyi le'u ste dgu brgya bcu'o// /
300b2(sha): / nya stong brgyad la gtor thun zor// dgra rtags byung bar kha gso bya// brag kyang 'gas la rgya mtsho'ang 'chol// srog chags
300b3(sha): srog gcod smos ci dgos// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ drag sngags rnam lnga'i le'u ste dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa brgyad do// /
300b4(sha): de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// rno dpal bzhi pa drag sngags bshad// dur khrod mon khros brag nag tu// skyugs bu gru gsum ling ga bcag/ skam
300b5(sha): thun gsher thun de bzhin bca'// ting 'dzin rim pa gsal bsgom ste// rno dpal sngags kyi dmod pa dbab// rtags mthong phur pa btab la btab// gru gsum
300b6(sha): gdug shing gtum mes sreg/ thal ba ling kha mnan zor bya// de spyi'i sbyor ba yin// khyad par gshin rje'i sbyor ba ni// dur khrod phungs byin che nas//
300b7(sha): zas kyi gshin rje gnas sa la// khrag r+dz+dza la sbrus la gzugs byas te// mgo dgu nag po khro tshul 'jigs// mi ro'i gdan la brkyang bskum 'dug/ thod 'phreng
301a1(sha): sbrul brgyan zhing chen gyon// ral gri rgyu zhags phyag nas sus// de ltar gzugs bya bsgom par bya// mi t+tA la sogs sha khrag tshogs/
301a2(sha): 'bru sna'i gtor ma bdud rtsi dmar// sum yar nyin mtshan mchod btab bzlas// 'dis ni nag po'i bdud kyang sod// ling kha dmangs rigs klu la gtad// kha gso
301a3(sha): stong brgyad la bya// rno dpal drag sngags dmod mo ni// hri sti hu ra yaM klad pa la ha ra ha ra/ dmu phud ya shig/ sing nga ye/ bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsa sha mu la/ dgra bo
301a4(sha): srog la shag shag rbad/ mA ra sab+h+yo/ gzhan yang las kyi gshin rje ni// lto dkrug sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// ling gA thun sogs de bzhin bca'// me gsad pa dang go
301a5(sha): gsum pa// la btsas mchod rten bzhi mdo la// dug sna khrag snas sbyar byas te// nag po mche gtsigs drang srong gzugs// zhing chen g.yang gzhi thod 'phreng sbrul//
301a6(sha): ral pa kham nag mi ro'i gdan// g.yas pa be tshon 'khor lo g.yon// gzugs bya de bzhin bsgom par bya// gong bzhin gtor ma mchod yon btabs// rtags byung
301a7(sha): ling kha ga nyan chen gtad// khyog grir 'chi bud med skyo// bu tsha rnams ni phyags mas 'debs// de dag gdug pa'i dmod mo ni// ya ma tsa sha me to ru na k+She ta nir
301b1(sha): yo ni to sa ra/ dgra bo u nan phrog grol rtsa rbad mA ra ya rbad nan/ gzhan yang ma mo spyi yi lto// dkrug pa'i drag sngags sbyor ba ni// 'brub khung la sogs de
301b2(sha): bzhin bca'// mtsho chen dur khrod ri nag la// dam gsum khrag gis gzugs brnyan bya// nag mo ral can 'jigs tshul can// re lde'i gos la zhing phran brgyan//
301b3(sha): thod 'phreng dre'u phyin phyogs zho na// khram bam thod khrug lag na thogs// nang rgyal 'phongs la bkal bar bya// dam gsum bag chags 'bru gtor bsham//
301b4(sha): mchod pa stabs bzlas shing thun brdeg gsad// ling ga mtsho bdud klu bdud gtad// stobs chen nyid kyang 'jigs par 'gyur// rims nad rlung ltar 'tshubs
301b5(sha): te gsod// de dag drag sngags rno dpal shing // rag mo ru thum gzer thu ru lu ru lu ma ma kha sha baM ril dgra bo rtsa srog khyer b+h+yo mA ra yarba da/ gzhan yang gnod sbyin
301b6(sha): lto krug gi/ rno pa la drag sngags sbyor ba ni// dong rtsang ling kha thun la sogs// de bzhin bshams la sbyor ba bya// gong gsum bzhi mdo la btsas mchod//
301b7(sha): dur khrod re rmu la sa rnams la// skya 'og dkar dam ra khrag glu// dmar po 'jigs tshul seng ge zhon// ral gri snying sbram lag na thogs// gcer bu snying gi hri
302a1(sha): bas brgyan// gzugs brnyan bskyed la drag sngags bzlas// thun brdeg gis gtub phur pas gdab// thon nas dur kha gri btsan gtad/
302a2(sha): kha gso la sogs sbyor ba bya// gtor ma bshos bu mkhar thabs bzhag/ dmar po zur gsum dkar po ni// gru bzhi ldan pa de ltar gsum// ra lug sna tshogs sha
302a3(sha): khrag brgyan// su ma yar bstab bya dmigs pa'o// rno dpal dmod pa'i drag sngags ni// da mun ha s+yA du sti ra ga sha ya tsa thu mthu ra tri ru shag kri kar shu la ma ma pa
302a4(sha): hi mang du ru/ dgra bo tsit+ta ro myags rbad mA ra yarbad b+h+yo/ dregs pa can gyis sbyor ba ni// me lce btsan dug khol ma 'dra// dam nyams rang srog nyams par 'gyur//
302a5(sha): dam nyams dus las 'gyang mi srid// 'jam dpal khros pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud las/ dregs pa bzhi skrag gi le'u ste dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// /
302a6(sha): / de nas rdo rje dpal chen pos// mtha' rgya bsdus pa 'di bshad do// drag po bsad pa'i mthe' rgya ru// mnan gtad las kyi sbyor bas btul//
302a7(sha): de yang ji ltar bya zhe na// khrims ldan btsun pa dgrar langs na// bud med yugs mo'i thod par bcug/ dam khrag bskus la zhabasams gril// lha khang rgyal thel
302b1(sha): mnan na// smyo 'bog 'chi bar the tshom med// sngags pa nag po dgrar langs na// mdze can dmar chod thod par bcug/ dug dang rme ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ dmangs ris
302b2(sha): nag po'i klu la gtad// bsrung khog mdze shus 'chi bar nges// mi yi rgyal po dgrar langs na// ma smin mi yi thod par gzhug/ dug sna byugs la zhing lpags gril//
302b3(sha): mtsho bdud klu bdud la gtad na// lkugs dang skyo 'bog rims kyis 'chi// bon po dgrar langs rme ba'i rdzas// sna tshogs tshil chen byug byas te// rabs chad nag po'i
302b4(sha): thod par gzhug/ brag bdud dur bdud la gtad na// 'thib nad drag pos 'chi bar nges// skye bo phal pa dgrar langs na// dri bo dmar chod thod par gzhug/ grirba
302b5(sha): dug sna tshil chen byug/ gong gsum yul ba tsa na la ga tad na// gri rgod dag gis 'chi bar nges// bud med dri mo'i thod par gzhug/ dug sku khrag sna mngal khrag
302b6(sha): byug/ lha btsan bdud btsan la gtad na// lcibs sam khyo bos gsod par nges// gshin rje gshed kyi rtogs pa'i rgyal po khri drug stong pa'i rgyud chen po las
302b7(sha): mtha' rgya bsdus pa'i le'u ste stong tham pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ya ma gris+tha tsakra ke tu A sha tan tra rA dza/
303a1(sha): bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje nag po 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal khro bo 'jigs
303a2(sha): pa can la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsum ldan bde ba gcig/ zungs thub mtshan ma kun spangs pa// yon tan ma lus ldan pa yi// rdo rje 'chang
303a3(sha): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dri skad bdag gis bshad pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'og min gyi gnas// dur khrod chen po lcang lo can gyi pho brang
303a4(sha): na/ yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i b+ha ga la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bcud bsdus nas/ byin gyis brlabs
303a5(sha): te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo gsang ba'i yum chen mo dang gnyis su med par gyur te/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang la snyoms par zhugs
303a6(sha): so// de nas nyid las ma g.yos pa'i 'khor sprul pa'i sku yis mi g.yo ba las bslang ba'i phyir gsol ba btab bo// ye nas ma skyes chos sku dag pa
303a7(sha): las// mi skye rnam dag dang las ma g.yos kyang // rdzogs pa'i tshul du longs spyod skur bzhengs la// mnyam pa'i ngang las 'gro ba'i don mdzod cig
303b1(sha): ces bskul bas/ gsang ba'i rtsa g.yos te/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i 'od dang mnyam pa chen po'i sgra byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos
303b2(sha): 'khor thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal lo// de nas gshin rje'i rgyal po sprul pa'i sku yis// 'khor rnams brgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das
303b3(sha): la gsol ba btab bo// cho 'phrul 'jigs par bstan pa ngo mtshar che// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam yas dpag tu med// 'jig rten khams rnams 'un/
303b4(sha): bur chem chem g.yos// 'khor rnams 'khams nas lus kyang sa la rdabs// dbugs dang ma 'bral dran pa'i dbang po nyams// 'khor rnams srog dang
303b5(sha): ldan par mdzod// ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams brgyal ba las bslang ba'i phyir/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge
303b6(sha): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// skad cig ma de nyid la 'khor thams cad brgyal ba las langs te/ lha ma srin phyogs bcu nas lhags pa de dag thams cad
303b7(sha): kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang la rang rang gi srog gi mdongs gsol du phul lo// kye ho bcom ldan khro bo rgyal// khros pas sems can dran pa nyams/
304a1(sha): rdzu 'phrul rmad byung ngo mtshar che// rang dam srog gi snying po rnams// bstan pa bsrung phyir mdongs gsol phul// srog gi snying po mdong
304a2(sha): ba zhes la// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul pa bgyid// ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das dgos pa chen por gyur te/ zhi khro dang / gshin rje dang / ma mo dang /
304a3(sha): bdud pho mo dang / srin po pho mo dang // rgyal po dang / gying pho mo dang / btsan po mo dang / srog bdag dang / sa bdag pho mo dang / klu dang / gnyan dang / lha ma srin sde
304a4(sha): brgyad kyi srog gi snying po rang dam tshig gcig tu dril nas bsdus so// de yang ji ltar bsdus zhe na/ la las ni bsnyen sgrub bzhir phye nas phul/ la las ni yan lag rnam
304a5(sha): gsum du phye nas phul/ la las ni rgyun gyi drag sngags su phul/ la las ni sgrub pa'i drag sngags su phul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog dang las
304a6(sha): thams cad gcig tu dril te dbang du bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin ba zhugs so// he/ 'khor na lhags pa'i srog chags kun// nus pa bsdus te srog dbang sdud// dregs
304a7(sha): pa'i tshul du las ngo long // dbang po bkrag mdangs pa dbang sgyur// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du lhags te/ srog gi snying po
304b1(sha): thams cad nus pa dpag tu med pa'i mthur byin gyis brlabs te bsdus so// las thams cad sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi mthu dang bcas par byin gyis brlabs te dbang du bsdu
304b2(sha): so// de yang ji ltar bsdus zhe na/ yi ge gnyis kyi mtha' ru dril na sa srid pa'i khyams khang dag tu bsdus so// de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo ya mA ra dza sa/ bcom
304b3(sha): ldan 'das la 'khor 'di dag thams cad gdan dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa bshad du gsol zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin
304b4(sha): 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dur khrod chen po dben pa yi// gdug pa can dang ldan pa ru// las la grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // chos
304b5(sha): kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du// rang bzhin gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ phyi nang snod bcud dag pa ru// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtag/ de yi yon
304b6(sha): tan bsam mi khyab// yum gyi b+ha ga yangs pa ru// gsang ba drod kyi dkyil 'khor ba rtag/ lhun grub dkyil 'khor 'di lta ste// gru bzhi rin chen rgyu dang ldan//
304b7(sha): thod pa keng zus rtsig par ldan// sgo bzhi gru chad khyams dang 'gram// rta babs bzhi dang tA ra Na// lhun po bzhi dang ldan pa'i gnas// nor bu rin chen rkang
305a1(sha): rus kyis// ka ba brgyad dang de bzhin gdung // tshangs pa'i dral phyam zhing rus bcas// thod pa rgyu ma zhing chung gis// bla 'og
305a2(sha): thams cad spras pa'o// stag gzig seng ge ma he glang // chu srin ga nam lcags sgo la mdzes// 'dod yon lha mo dur khri da rgyan// yid 'ong mchod
305a3(sha): pas gang bar skas// rin chen pha gu thod pa zhing // dra ba dra phyed dril bu dang // zhing chung rgyan gyis mdzes pa'o// rdo rje me 'od khrag mtsho gling // dbus na gru
305a4(sha): gsum rtsibs bzhi pa// phyi rim rtsibs bcu sgo rtsibs bzhi// gshin rje ma he nyi zla'i gdan// phyi nang khor yug dpag pas ma yas// de la gnas pa'i
305a5(sha): rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab yum rnams// gru gsum dbus na drag po'i tshul// rtsibs bzhir gshed po yab yum bcas// rtsibs
305a6(sha): bcur phyogs skyong rtsibs mtsha na bdud// gru chad ro langs lce spyang ga nas// khyams la sha za pho mo'i tshogs// sgo bzhir sgo ma de bzhin gnas//
305a7(sha): phyi khyams khor yug sde brgyad dregs// 'bu ma phrag g.yog dang yang g.yog bcas// drug khri drug stong 'khod pa'o// rang sngags srog gis 'brel
305b1(sha): pa yi// dkyil 'khor bdag por gnas pa ni// 'khor du sngags pa kun 'dus pa'o// 'khor gyi ya mA rA dza la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur te/
305b2(sha): bcom ldan 'das la ngag mthun par bstod do// mnyam pa'i ngang las dregs pa'i skur ba zhes nas// gdug pa can rnams ma lus dbang du sdud// bstan/
305b3(sha): pa ga nas phyir 'khor du sprul nas 'gyed// 'khor la brtse phyir dbugs phyung ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yum chen mo gsang ba'i b+ha ga las
305b4(sha): bzhengs nas/ dbugs dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'khor rnams la gzigs nas dbugs phyir phyung ngo // 'khor thams cad rengs pa dang
305b5(sha): brgyal ba las langs nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la ngag mthun par gsol ba btab bo// rkye ho/ rdo rje 'dzin pa khro bo rgyal// rnam dag chos sku
305b6(sha): gnyis med mkha'// cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i skus// thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzod rtsig/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di bstan to//
305b7(sha): skye 'gro ma yus chos sku bde ba'i ngang // ye shes thams cad bde ba'i ngang las rdzogs// 'khor ba'i skyon bral bsam yas dpag med sku// 'dul
305'a1(sha): ba'i dbang gis sna tshogs las gzugs bstan// zhes gsungs so// 'khor thams cad mgu bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la ngo
305'a2(sha): mtshar brjod do// 'gro ba las kyis rmongs pa las// gdung ba'i sku yis la sa rim pastan// ba stan pa gnyis me mnyam sbyar bas// gdug pa bsgral
305'a3(sha): thabs ngo mtshar che// de nas nyid kyi sprul sku ga shin rje'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho/ chos sku byang chub sems kyi
305'a4(sha): rang bzhin las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'gro ba'i don du khro bo gshin rje gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las mchog bsdus
305'a5(sha): pas// mi dge mtshams med nyams pa kun sgrol ba'i// las kyi rgyal po sbyor ba smin pa'i mchog/ mchong chen gdug pa gnad tshul dregs pa yi// yan
305'a6(sha): lag bcu gnyis bzhi dang yang bzhi dang // gzer thun nag po'i smod pa rgyas par mdzod// ces zhus pa gsan nas/ snying po byang chub sems bsdus nas//
305'a7(sha): byin brlabs ldan pas gsang bcud bstan// 'jig rten khams na 'dul ba yi// 'gro ba ma lus dregs pas myos// bstan pa rin chen brgya lam gcig/
305'b1(sha): snying po 'phrul gyi sbyor ba gcig/ sus kyi las sbyor brgya phrag brgyad// yan la gnyis brgya stong bcu drug/ rtsa ba'i le grangs bdun cu bzhi// bsgrub pa'i dngas
305'b2(sha): gzhi bzhi dang gcig/ bgrod pa'i rim pa drug phyed ldan// yan lag sngon dang bcas pa bzhi// rten gyi sbyor ba las bcu gnyis// 'dren pa gsang lam
305'b3(sha): bcu gnyis ldan// sgo dgu gsang bcu e ka'i theg/ drag po'i sbyor ba bzhi dang brgya// dbang gi rim pa lnga dang bcas// phyi nang gsang ba gsang chen dril//
305'b4(sha): rang bzhin sbrul dang sgrub byed las// ye shes ya ma pany+tsa tri// las mchog thabs mchog gnyis dang rtsag/ de kar nag las gsang nyis brgya bcu//
305'b5(sha): gshin rje me mo mkha' 'gro gying // bdud dang srin po sha za klu// skyo byed rgyal po dkor srun gza'// sa pa dag sde brgyad srog pa dag gnyan// rlag
305'b6(sha): byed chu srin mu stegs sri// log 'dren 'byung po dur khrod bdag/ khyung khra bya rgod du ra bya 'ug/ kha rgod lce spyang stag dom wa// khyi sbrul bung ba sdig
305'b7(sha): ngo ma spang // 'jig rten dregs pa srog bang 'phrog/ thams cad bsregs shing las la myos// 'khor rang yang 'khor bcas pa yi// gshin rje
306a1(sha): gshed kyi dge 'dun kun// rgyud 'dir bstan pa kun 'byung bas// sbyor ba du ma'i bca' gzhir bshad// rgyu la mtshan me long
306a2(sha): gi rgyud las// khro bo gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba yongs su brtag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
306a3(sha): zhugs nas/ 'brel ba'i don 'di ba shad do// pa de dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yi// snod dang ngang tshul yul du brtag/ bde lam gsang sgo dregs pa yi// gter
306a4(sha): sgo yang thog sha za'i srog/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// brtan dang grol ba sems dpag med// dri med sems kyi rgyan ldan mchog/ 'joms byed ya ma
306a5(sha): sha za'i lu sa// mo sa pa dug gi spu gri can// dbang po brta na dang rdo rje me// ya ma parta na ma lus srin mo// rdo rje snying po stob sa dpa ga med// me chu 'byung ba zhi
306a6(sha): brtan dang 'pho// las kyis 'dren pa'i srog lus rgyan// dregs pa dbang phyug bde ba'i gnas// 'pho ba gsum gyi bdag nyid can// gsang lam yang dag
306a7(sha): don mi 'gyur// bde byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'joms byed ya ma'i ka li srog/ 'dren pa stobs kyi lam du 'dzud// rkyen gsum lus gcig pa
306b1(sha): yis gyur// shaswa pA k+Sha sgyus bcwalnga gcig sa rkyen// dbye ba yi ni bAn+ya gnyis brgyad// rgyas mtshan rgyud kyi 'phrul dang bcas// 'phen pa'i sbyor bto/
306b2(sha): dang sdud// rdo che srin po'i sbyor ba gcig/ 'khor lo rin chen sgyu ma'i gter// dbang chen pra na dang las dbang g.yog/ mu na khang mtsho gling ya ma'i gnas//
306b3(sha): nam mkha' rgyal po khams dang chu// lo yi dgra dang rang dbang 'joms// gsang mchog rlung khams yan lag lus// gcod pas mtshon cha gshad mas
306b4(sha): thogs// me yis 'jigs pa yang dag pa skyed// las kyi spod pa'i snying po sa// don dang ldan pa'i las sbyangs la// las chen thig le nam mkha'i khams//
306b5(sha): rig pa'i phyag rgya chen po stobs// snying po gsum la yang dag sdud// khams lnga dbyings su bde ba'i bcud// sangs rgyas kun bdag lnga yi ngang // lnga nyid
306b6(sha): stobs bdag rang gnas mchog/ gsang ba'i rig can rin chen mdzod// mchog gi las dang sbyor ba'i gnas// 'khor lo rgyal po bde ba'i gnas//
306b7(sha): 'phrul gyi rgyal po gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba dbang gi rang rgyas gdab// mi mthun lus la gnod byed gdon// dus dang len pa'i khams su sbyar//
307a1(sha): yul dang dbang po skye mched yul// dbab pa'i sbyor ba gcig dang bcas// ga shi na rje nag po bdud dang ga shad// rang lus phyag rgya'i
307a2(sha): stobs dang ldan// che ba'i phyag rgya dregs pa khol// zil gnon phyag rgyas kun dbang sdud// las kyi phyag rgyas dbang rig brtsegs// khams gsum 'khor ba'i
307a3(sha): sems can kun// dug lnga'i nad kyis gdungs shing 'khyams// de la sngags kyi dmed pa dbab// lus la brnag pa'i sdig pa bzhugs// gsum bsdus
307a4(sha): dril la yul dbang dbrog/ las kyi khol ba'i las la mngag/ lam sbyangs yul bgrod gnas dang sbyar// phyag rgya'i lus la gsum gyis rlag/ sku gsung
307a5(sha): thugs kyi bde gnas su// chos sku'i 'od zer 'bar bcas 'khyil// 'phro 'du dang bcas rang dbang skyu ra// dri ma gsum dang drug las smin// nus pa'i
307a6(sha): stobs kyis dbang po sdud// gcig gi khams dang thams cad sbyar// 'du ba nad kyi lus ya smin// b+ha ga bde ba'i pho brang du// byang chub 'khor ba'i lam
307a7(sha): sbyangs nas// bde ba chen po'i gnas phab la// sems dang dri ma gnyis bsdus la// sa bon dag pa dbyings su 'phangs// bde ba dang bcas gnas su
307b1(sha): 'khyil// sngags dang mchog la gzi byin 'bar// zhing khams kun spros sbyang bgrod bsdu// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba de ga nas spro// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo 'od
307b2(sha): 'bar gang // ye shes 'khor lo thig ler 'khyil// 'khor lo khro chung stong dpag med// dkrugs pas phyag rgya gzhan dbang sgyur// lus bcud dngas ma sems
307b3(sha): dang bral// pho brang sgo ru brte na gzhi dpral// dbus kyi pho brang e la bsdu// rdo rje snying po brda yi dkrug/ ba de lam pa de gnas dgu thog dang // gsang lam rdo rje
307b4(sha): bgrod la 'phang // tshul gsum sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// stobs bzhi yan lag bzhi dang bcas// pa ba ga ta yi khu ba dang // rdo yi mtsho gling kang 'phangs dang //
307b5(sha): bde ba gsang mchog rgya na lam bskyed// ya ma ka la'i zhing khams nas// ya ma rag+ha 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang po snyigs ma yul la rol// dngas ma'i srog
307b6(sha): mdangs pa de gnas gas la// snyigs ma thod par bde gnas gas la// khams gsum pa de ba'i yul dang spad// don gsum thabs kyis grol bar bshad// rgyal
307b7(sha): pa tshan me long gi rgyud las/ brda gsum thabs kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i 'khor lo
308a1(sha): bgrod pa'i thabs 'di bshad do// rig pa'i 'khor lo 'di lta ste// bde ba'i 'khor lo ye shes can// 'khrul byed tsit+ta'i 'khor lor
308a2(sha): bcas// myos pa brten dang dpral ba nyid// srog gi dbang po kun bsdus la// tshe gnas rdo rje'i lam du sbyang // dbang po rdo rje yul la bstim// srog gi rdo rje/
308a3(sha): dbang bsdus la// rdo rje srin po'i stobs la ba stim// nyi ma'i rdo rje las dbang dkrug/ tshe gnas srog rten rdo rje 'joms// gnyis ldan rdo rje brda yis dbye// don
308a4(sha): gyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i sku// dbang po mchog gi rdo rjer 'gyur// don ldan rig pa'i chos sku'i klong // rdo rje rgyal po bcud la dbab// rang gnas tshe yi lam la gzung /
308a5(sha): 'jog po bde lam gyon bzlog 'phang // yul gyi dmigs pa rang la bzung // tha thA thA thA wa na kla'u tha tho the tha b+h+raHb+hu d+ha g+ha n+yA kA ra mi b+hi/ b+h+yAM s+yAM rU d+hu k+Sha krA k+ShA dra/
308a6(sha): b+ha g+hA shA 'dzu na n+yA la dra/ g+ha N+ya yA mA d+ha g+ha sh+yA he 'bru/ thA the tha lnga bA prA pA b+h+raM pu raHm+b+ho s+thA b+ha b+hUsh+tsa dri/ tU g+ha nA b+h+ya s+thi rU twe/ stak+Sh+ya babrA b+h+r-i drA b+hAl+lIh+yA/ s+t+rI
308a7(sha): oMtrA~MSh+T+r-idz+dza dzAwa~M ga maud gisasum // rkye kyi ba tshul dzus gyi'i tshum tshog
308b1(sha): 'khor gnyis dang gcig/ rnal 'byor can la gnas bya'i phyir// 'khrul mig drag po'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// rgyu dang tshad dang gzer dang gnad// bsnyen dang
308b2(sha): bsgrub dang las dang gzer// dus dang gnas dang rdzas dang thabs// phyogs dang blang dang rgod dang 'pho// lkog dang 'khyam 'bral gcod dang ldog/ rdzas dang
308b3(sha): ga nas dang rgyu dang thun// rnal bzlog dkrug spogs gzir mnan blang // las dang dngos grub thun mong mchog/ lus dang yan thubs dang ga nad// bde ba
308b4(sha): smin byed dbang bsdu 'phyang // sangs rgyas kun mnyam mthu stobs bdag/ rin chen rdo rje som ta// ut+pal ljon shing myu gu 'bru// me tog mdog ldan
308b5(sha): bcu bung ba// rtsi thog ma sbyar len dang 'khyam// rtsa ba dbang gis bgrod pa'i mchog/ mdangs bcas grol ba thabs ldan blang // bcu drug bskyang ba bzhi//
308b6(sha): ldan gcig/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bde dbang sgyur// 'bigs dang gcod la sogs pa'i las// bsrung dang skyob pa kun byed pa// 'phrul mig drag po'i
308b7(sha): gnyis dbang gcig/ 'khor lo mi 'gyur brten pa yi// phyag rgya rdo rje sngags kyi gzar// mtshon cha'i lo ma spu gri'i gnad// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo gsang
309a1(sha): chen thabs// gnyis med mthun pa'i las nyid las// 'khor lo chos sku phyag rgyar gsal// zla shar 'khor lo gdan dang brjid// nyi ma'i
309a2(sha): 'khor lo 'od stong 'bar// sbyor ba'i 'khor lo du ma 'phro// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsa lam gcod// sngags kyi 'khor lo srog cing sdud// ting 'dzin 'khor lo
309a3(sha): bskul gyin 'byed// rdo rje 'khor lo bde mchog gsal// gsang ba'i 'khor los gsang bcud len// sems dpa'i 'khor los rang dbang 'bebs// shugs
309a4(sha): kyi 'khor los rtsa dang ldan// bag chags 'khor los rten la bsdus// brnag pa 'khor lo lto bar gzhug/ 'byung ba'i 'khor lo stobs kyis mnan// gnyis
309a5(sha): ldan 'khor lo gcig gi ngang // bskul ba'i 'khor lo g.yo zhing 'phar// dmigs pa'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // bcud kyi 'khor lo sdud cing 'phel// bde ba'i
309a6(sha): 'khor lo rtsa lam rgyud// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bde bas gang // sa bon 'khor lo las kyis 'bab// 'khor lo sgra dang bcas nas 'khyil// 'od zer 'khor lo//
309a7(sha): phyag rgyar 'bar// thugs kyi sbyor ba bsam yas mchog/ chos sku phyag rgya 'od ldan gsal// 'khor lo gnas su 'khor lo bca'// gsang ba tshe yi 'khor
309b1(sha): lor 'bar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ldan pa// las kyi 'khor lo sar pa// gshin rje nag po 'joms pa yi// bde ldan 'khor lo brtsegs pa yi//
309b2(sha): pho brang gnas dang sbyar ba'i lus// zhi ba'i gnas su las su sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsang ba
309b3(sha): 'khor lo lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rang rgyud thig le'i mchod pa 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor ba
309b4(sha): bgrod pa'i mchog/ bde ba brgyan gyi mchod pa dang // yid 'phrog klu yi dbang phyug rtsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// las chen sbyor ba'i
309b5(sha): yul dbang sbyor// ting 'dzin shugs 'gro rgyun dang sgyur// byin brlabs mchog ldan mchod pa'i mchog/ rig pa rang dbang rgyun mi 'chad// g.yas nas//
309b6(sha): bde la ma sku la dbab// tshangs po'i gnas su mchod rgyun 'khyil// bde chen mtshed rgyun lhun mnyam gsal// sngags kyi stobs kyis rlung bskul la//
309b7(sha): drod kyi dbang po rtsa lam bzhu// rkyen dang ldan pas mchod rgyun 'bebs// g.yas nas bskul nas g.yon nas 'bebs/ Shak+ta chags pa'i mchod pa yin//
310a1(sha): g.yon nas bskul nas g.yas nas 'bebs// 'gu bin tri yi mchod pa yin// g.yas g.yon gnyis nas bskul nas su// dbu ma
310a2(sha): thig le rgyun shar bas// byang chub sems kyi mchod pa yin// rtsa gsum bskul nas gang zhing 'bar// sna tshogs pa li mchod pa yin// rtsa rnams bde bas
310a3(sha): mdzes gang ba// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa yin// ye shes rang gnas 'od gsal ba// snang gsal 'od 'bar mchod pa yin// thams cad gnyis med
310a4(sha): ro mnyam gcig/ kun tu bzang mo'i mchod pa yin// ye shes thig le gcig tu 'khyil// sbyor ba dbang gi mchod pa yin// shes pa gnyis zin rtog
310a5(sha): bral ba// stobs chen shugs sgrol mchod pa yin// rdo rje 'od ldan phyag rgya yi// ye shes chen po rang nyams gra sa la// rang gnas thig le'i mchod pa/
310a6(sha): yin// lnga rdzogs bde ba gcig tu 'khyil// lhun gyis grub pa'i mchod pa yi ni// bdag dbang rdo rje ba stan pa'i sku// rang 'byu nga lnga dang mdzes pa'i
310a7(sha): ro// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i mchod pa yin// mtshan ma mi gnas dbyings su thim// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yin// mchod rgyun don ldan pagrod
310b1(sha): pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid bdag la rol zhing mchod// tshangs pa gser gyi sgo gnyis nas// ye shes nyi ma'i thig le dgug/ phyag rgya'i lus la ba snyim zhing
310b2(sha): ma nan// gang yin dbang po legs sgor gzhug/ sgo gnyis rtsa la sbyangs thig ler bstim// ya dang ma las dang sa ma bsdu// ya tshogs brgyad dang lnga drug
310b3(sha): gnyis// stobs gsum rdo rje'i lam bgrod nas// yang dag bde ba'i gnas su spro// bde ba sa gang na shes rab pa skyod// gnyis med phyag rgya'i rang
310b4(sha): dbang gas la// rgyun dang bde ba'i mchod pa rol// rdo rje rgyal por bskyod pa yi// shri pany+tsa de ba yi// de baM gu h+ya'i ra dza la// bstan pa'i
310b5(sha): thig le'i bzlas pa bya// bde ba chen po'i sku la gsal// nyon mongs bde ba rang gnas 'bar// slol ba ye shes rang 'bar bcas// sbyor ba/
310b6(sha): sgra yi thig le ra dbapa// gshin rje'i sku yi dbyings su thim// ngam gling dgu 'dus rdo rje'i rtse// b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i pho brang du// 'bru yi dngas
310b7(sha): ma dril bsdus la// phyag rgya chen po bstan par gzung // byin rabab rdo rje ngang gis rdzogs// sbyor ba du ma skabs kyis brtsam// gang 'dod la/
311a1(sha): la thog med 'jug/ thun mong mchog gi dgongs par ldan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bgrod par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi
311a2(sha): rgyud las/ gsang ba thig le lta ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo bsnyen pa'i gleng gzhi 'di bshad do//
311a3(sha): ye shes bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba la// bgrod pa'i rim pas sngon 'gro brtsam// zhi ba'i ting 'dzin sbyor ba las// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// myos
311a4(sha): par byed pa'i lus la gdon// 'khor lo brgya phrag sbyor ba gcig/ rim pa du ma las kyi gnad// yan lag rgyan gyi 'khor lo gsum// rdo rje srin po
311a5(sha): las mon gshed// khro bo rgyal po yang dag gzung // dbang gi gnas su phyag rgya 'bar// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// zur brgyad
311a6(sha): mu khyud chun 'khor can// 'bar ba'i gzugs brnyan rdzogs par bya// dur khrod rten bcas pho brang mchog/ dbus mthing zla kham bzhi 'khor lo//
311a7(sha): gru chad mtsho gling ngam gling khrag/ sgo khyud sgo bzhi 'khor lor bcas// rdo rje thod 'phreng me ri 'bar// gnas kyi 'khor lo bcu bzhi ste// dkyil 'khor gru
311b1(sha): bzhi bzhi ldan bya// bam chen ma he nyi zla'i gdan// bla re zhing rgyan thod sbrul bcas// 'phreng ba g.yer kha dra phyed brgyan// 'dod yon lha mo don khrag bam//
311b2(sha): mu khyud 'khor lo 'gram bzhir ldan// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bzhi dang ldan// bar khyams dur khrod bam chen sprul// phyi rim yi dgas gzugs brnyan dgod//
311b3(sha): zhing dang zhing chung keng rus brgyan// dbus la sogs pa sogs rim bzhin// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gshed bdag gtso bo yab yum dang //
311b4(sha): ga shad bdag pho mo bzhi ldan bcas// mu khyad dang por dgod par bya// gnyis pa 'khor lo 'i rem pa ni// phyogs skyong yang yum bcas pa dgo da//
311b5(sha): bar du gshed kyi bdud rnams kyang // go nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bya// mu khyud sgo yi 'khor lo lA// ya ma brtan ma la sogs dgod// bar khyams
311b6(sha): gru chad snum bu la// las kyi ya ma drug stong ga nas// rten bzhi ga nas kyi dang po la// rte na ma lha yi 'khor lo brta na// ye shes byin pa rlabs stobs ldan bya//
311b7(sha): rjes su mthun pa'i cho gar ldan// rten rdzas gnyis dang mchod rdzas dgram// rgyan rdza sa rol rdzas gtor ma khrag/ bdag nyid gtso bo phyag rgya'i sku//
312a1(sha): thugs khar nyi zla'i snying po sngags// rang nyams 'od 'bar snying po gsal// skad cig sngags dang 'od la gsal// mi g.yo brtan pa'i
312a2(sha): shugs kyis drangs// 'phro 'du sbyor bas gzi mdangs bsdu// bde ba'i dum bu sems las blangs// sems kyi rdo rje bstan thob nas// ye shes phyag rgya/
312a3(sha): drod la dbab// snying po shugs dang ngang gis drangs// nyi ma rdo rje chu rlung dang // pad+ma rin chen so ma ta// nam mkha' 'khor lo gsal dang bcasau//
312a4(sha): dur khrod rten dang gzhal yas bcu da// snying po gsum gyi brda dang sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod gzung la// grong ma'i tshad mas brtags la dbab//
312a5(sha): phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rnyed nas// las kyi ya ma'i bsnyen pa bya// lus kyi 'khor lo brten byas la// khro bo dka' thub ldan pa yis// dur khrod ga1
312a6(sha): ra ya tshogs bzlas// sna tshogs me rlung 'khor lo can// 'bum phrag bkug la las sngags bzlas// zhag gsum ya ma dbang du bsdu// ya ma kA
312a7(sha): li'i bsnyen par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ bsnyen pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
312b1(sha): gshin rje gshed kyis bsad pa'i 'khor lo rgyas par bshad do// dngos grub gnyis dang bde ldan na// drag po las kyi sbyor ba brtsams// dur khrod ga nyan sa
312b2(sha): gdug pa ru// brnag pa thun dang 'khor lo rdzas// mthing nag dong bcas gru gsum rtsang // ling ga rgyu rkyen drug las ming // dong gzhug mtsho na cha'i
312b3(sha): 'khor lo bca'// dur khrod gnas na dpa' bo yis// ka la ka ba ma ning tog/ gos su bcas pa'i rgyu blangs la// dur khrod ras la bam chen gyi// rme ba
312b4(sha): lnga yi thang ma bya// ni ra su yi thal ba yis// mthal ma rgya dang skya bcad bya// mchog phran rkang gis par byas la// bam chen don gyi khrag rnams kyis//
312b5(sha): gcod pa'i 'khor los rjes mthun bri// gcod pa'i 'khor lo ngar dang bcas// rdo rje 'chang chen dregs pas myos// khro rgyal kun gyi stobs dang sbyar//
312b6(sha): mthu stobs bdag po dbang phyug che// ras la rdzas kyis legs byugs la// rgyal la kun gyi thig ler bya// thugs kyi snying po stong dang sbyar// dbus
312b7(sha): mtshams gru bzhi mnyam brtogs la// tshangs pa'i thig brgyad rgya rgam ga da // mu khyud rim pa bzhi ldan paskor// gnyis pa zung thig bzhi ldan gar ba/
313a1(sha): mtha' gnyis bcu drug bzhi bzhis lpags// yang logs 'phrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gru gsum
313a2(sha): rtsibs bzhi la// 'khrul sngags drag po lnga dang ldan// phyi rim bcu gnyis 'khor lo la// me dpal gshed kyi 'bru bcu gnyis// de dag rjes su dgod par bya//
313a3(sha): phyi rim bcu drug 'khor lo la// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ste// dgod pa gnas mthun lho sbyar dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen nyi shu la// gcod cing /
313a4(sha): rnon po'i spu gri dgod// bcu drug nyi shu gzer dang mtshon// drag po mthu stobs ya la bsdu// 'khor lo rtsibs chen bzhi bcu brgyad// sngags ni me dpal
313a5(sha): 'khor los mtshon// 'khor lo me dpal mtshon chen gyis// zhing bcu ma lus gtan nas sreg/ de yi yon tan dpag med pas// byin brlabs mthu
313a6(sha): stobs ste na dpag med// ye shes 'khor los brtan pa sbyin// myos pa'i rdzas kyis dbang bskur bya// dag pa'i gzhi las sna tshogs las// brgyad
313a7(sha): la sogs pa bsam dpag yas// rtsa ba bzhi las yan lag stong // 'byung bzhi gnas pa'i mtshon cha la// byin brlabs du ma skabs dang sbyar// me
313b1(sha): dpal sngags dang 'khor lo mtshon// gcod cing sreg pa drag po'i las// 'joms byed ya ma'i zhing khams nas// 'joms byed drag po zhe sdang mchog
313b2(sha): 'bar ba dug gi dum bu sdud// me 'bar nag po'i 'bru nyid la// sbyor ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing sdud// dbang sdud 'khor lo'abar ba'i mchog/ khrag 'thung
313b3(sha): 'bar ba'i lus la gzud// drag po'i stobs dang mthu dbang 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgya'i bstan pa sbyin// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lto bar gzhug
313b4(sha): dbus dang mtshams kyi 'bub gnas su// 'dud pa'i dri ma kun bsdus la// ma lus kun gyi sdig pa bsgo// nye bar gyur pa'i yan lag yin// zhing
313b5(sha): bcu ma lus rten la bstim// thugs rjes rgyun gyi mthu stobs ldan// bsgrub bya gang dmigs gcig la bsdu// srog sdud snying po rten bcas yin//
313b6(sha): srog rten tshe ga nas thig ler gzhug/ mi 'gyur brtan pa'i phyag rgya yin// sna tshogs dug gi khu ba yis// 'khor lo rgyal po ngar blud bya// rten 'bral
313b7(sha): stobs kyi nus pa yin// myos par byed pa'i rdzas kyis bdug/ 'khor ba'i nus pa tshad ldan yin// brnag pa kun gyi snying po mchog/ gcod pa'i 'a
314a1(sha): lo me dpal yin// sreg cing gcod pa'i las rnams byed// dngas ma tshe gnas thig ler gzhug/ 'byung ba bzhi yi mdangs bsdus la/
314a2(sha): snying po bde ba'i ngad dang sbyar// dag pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa sbyin// lhag ma snying po rjes shul la// sha za srin po stobs dpag med// de don snying po
314a3(sha): dag pa'i bdag/ 'jam dpa la thugs kyi snying po 'di// stong pa'i ye shes dbus nyid byos// gsal ba'i ye shes bzhi ldan te// las dang 'bras bu
314a4(sha): smin pa'i mchog/ bde ba'i mtshon chu 'khor lo can// yul du snang ba gzugs ban+d+han yin// sgyu ma'i bsti gnas dbang po yul// de la stobs kyil
314a5(sha): dang 'jug/ khams gsum sreg pa'i nyi ma yin// dug gsum gcod pa'i 'khor lo'o// 'dzom dpal thugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa rang byung
314a6(sha): ngos shar zhing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' rgyud pa'i// snying po'i thigs pa'i 'phrul mig 'di// bka' yi bdud sgo dngos grub ster// mtshon cha
314a7(sha): 'khor lo gter gyi mchog/ thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan las// bya ba kun grub brlag par 'gyur// gang zhig dug gi yan lag lus// smin cing //
314b1(sha): rkyen dang ldan pa las// zos pas 'chi 'gyur gdon mi za// 'phrul mig bcu drug snying po 'di// rngam pa gzer gyi 'bru btus te// brtsam pa spu gri
314b2(sha): 'khor lo bcas// gsang ba sngags kyi 'phreng ba sa bskor// 'khrug byed bdud kyi 'khor lor brtag/ ha la nag po'i bdud srin gshed// gsang sgo
314b3(sha): gnyis kyi lam nas bton// 'byung ba khams kyi gnas su bstim// ya ma nri la snying po brten// srog rten dang sa ma gnas su bsdus// ya la pha ba la thig
314b4(sha): ler gzhug/ thig le mi 'gyur ga pu ra gnas// lhag ma khrag dang rje na shu na la// dregs pa pho mos myos shing rnga mas// rdo rje gzegs ma gcod pa'i las//
314b5(sha): srog ldan khams gsum ma lus pa'i// gshin rje rgyal po srog gi ga shed// srog lus 'brel pa shar nyer bas// gshed shes bya ba'i las ga nye ra yin//
314b6(sha): 'byung sa bzhi dang rten sa bzhi// bla gnas bzhi 'joms nyi ma'i las// zhing bcu sreg pa'i nyi ma ste// ye shes 'od ldan paskul ba'i rkyen// nyon mongs
314b7(sha): lam grol las kyi mchog/ phra mo'i rgyun gcod mtshon cha'i yas// de bsgrub bya gang yin pa// mtshan nam nyi ma pa'i bzhir bsgrub// de phyir nyi ma
315a1(sha): bzhi zhes bya// nyi ma las kyi rim pa bzhi// gnas pa bsgrub bya'i srog rten ya// gnas pa'i snying po khams chen bzhi// 'byung
315a2(sha): ba 'degs dang spor ba la// sa dang me yi snying po gnas// g.yang dang rlan pa'i rtsa sgo ru// rlung dang chu yi snying po brtag/ rten gsum sbubs kyi srog
315a3(sha): shing la// rten dang sdud pa'i snying po bzung // rtsa phra na brgyad dang 'dus bzhi la// bcu gnyis gzer gyi snying po gnas// mu khyud par gyi mdud pa la//
315a4(sha): snying gzer bzhi yi dngas ma gnas// rtsa sgo srubs dang bcas pa ru// 'khrug byed nag mo srin po'i lus// mkha' 'gro bdud mo brta na ma yi// snying
315a5(sha): po thig le gnas su 'pho// 'khor skyong dregs pa pho mo yi// snying po thig le gnas su 'pho// de yi sbyor ba bstan pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten 'das
315a6(sha): dang dregs pa yi// dbu ru yon ta no rdzogs pa gzhag/ de 'og dbyangs kyi dang po ste// de rjes sgra yi dang po la// su mu ni yi gsum pa yis//
315a7(sha): de yi 'og nas nye bar sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi steng nas brgyan// de 'og bzhi pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig gis steng brgyan//
315b1(sha): de 'og sgra yi dang po bzhag/ de rjes drug pa'i dang po ste// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ der rjes bzhi pa'i dang po ste// de 'og sgra yi dang po bzhag/
315b2(sha): de rjes u sha'i mtha' ma ste// de 'og bzhi pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ der rjes gsum pa'i gnyis pa bzung // de 'og lnga
315b3(sha): pa'i gsum pa lU// u shwa'i mthu' ma 'og nas brgyan// de la gsum pa'i mtha' ma man nA// de 'og bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ste// de rjes sdud pa'i snying po
315b4(sha): gsum// de 'og skrod pa'i nag po gsum// ka yi 'phreng ba sku yi bcud// sngon 'gro lha yi gzi mdangs sdud// nyi ma shar ba'i tshul dang ldan// bsnyen
315b5(sha): pa'i sku yi 'phreng bar bshad// gsal ba gsung gi bcud bsdus pa// 'bru dgu sku yi thig le bzhin// de rjes sgra yi dang po ste// drug pa'i mtha' ma nya
315b6(sha): pa ra bste na// dar rjes drug pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pa 'og nas brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i dang po ste// de rjes gsum pa'i mtha' ma la//
315b7(sha): dbyangs kyi bdun pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gnyis pa bzhag/ de rjes sgra yi ga sum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pa sa 'og nas brgya na// de 'og
316a1(sha): drug pa'i gsum pa la// der kyang dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sdud dang skrod pa'i yi ge drug/ gsung gi 'phreng ba sdud pa'i mchog
316a2(sha): gsal ba'i 'phreng ba gsung du bshad// thugs kyi thig le bde ba'i mchog/ bdud 'joms bden pa dbu ru bzhag/ de 'og u sha'i mtha' ma la// drug pa'i/
316a3(sha): gsum pa 'og tu dbug/ dbyangs yig gsum pas steng nas brgyan// der rjes lnga pa'i gsum pa la// 'og nas u sha'i mtha' mas phug/ de bzhin steng
316a4(sha): nas dbyangs kyi lnga// de yi sgra yi dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas mdzes// dbyangs kyi lnga pas steng nas brgyan// der rjes gsum pa'i dang
316a5(sha): po la// de 'og dbyangs kyi dang po ste// de rjes gsum pa'i mtha' ma gnyis// de 'og sdud pa'i yi ge gsum// skrod pa'i 'bru gsum mtha' ru brnag
316a6(sha): thig le thugs kyi snying pa ste// brgya brgya spyir rgyu rkyen gyi mchog/ ba de ba thugs kyi snying por bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi kha gnon rdo rje stobs dpag
316a7(sha): med// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba'i mchog/ sngon 'gro ba snyen pa'i 'phreng bar bshar// rtsa ba me dpal gshid kyi 'bru// dbu ru yon te ni rdzogs par
316b1(sha): bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po ste na// der rjes lnga pa'i mtha' ma ste// 'og tu lnga pa'i mtha' ma la// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pas steng brgyan// de rjes
316b2(sha): gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og u sha'i gnyis pa la// sgra yi dang pos 'bral bar bstan// steng nas bcu gcig dbyangs kyis brgyan// de/ yi drug pa'i
316b3(sha): gsum pa bzhag/ de rjes gnyis pa'i dang po bzhag/ rjes su u sha'i gsum pa ste// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// bcu gsum dbyangs kyi stang nas brgyan//
316b4(sha): de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pa 'og nas brgyan// de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i drang po la// dbyangs yig
316b5(sha): bcu gsum steng nas brgyan// de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng nas brgyan// der rjes drug pa'i sa bon bzhag/ de 'og
316b6(sha): drug pa'i dang po ste// der rjes gnyis pa'i dang po'o// de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// dbyangs yig bzhi pas steng nas brgyan// de 'og u sha'i mtha'
316b7(sha): ma la// dbyangs yig drug pa'i 'og nas urba// steng du drug pa'i gsum pas mdzes// de steng lnga pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// de 'og gnyis pa'i mtha' ma gnyis
317a1(sha): rtsa ba'i 'khor lo dril ba'i bcud// las kyi rim pa sna tshogs las// sbyar ba nyes brgya stong bcu drug/ kha gnon sbyor ba stobs dpag
317a2(sha): med// dru gri sbyor bas gcod pa'i sngags// dang po u sha'i mtha' ma la// steng 'og drug pa'i dang por 'brel// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pas brgyan//
317a3(sha): de 'og u sha'i dang po la// 'og nas u sha'i mtha' mas brgyan// steng du dbyangs kyi gsum pas mdzes// de 'og lnga pa'i dang po la// 'og tu drug pa la
317a4(sha): dang pos brgyan// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ de 'og re la dbyangs lngas 'og/ drug pa'i gsum pas de la 'brel// de 'og gnyis pa'i dang po bzhag
317a5(sha): de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa dang // sgra yi dang po gsum par 'brel// de rjes gsum pa'i dang po ste// rdzas su gnyis pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i
317a6(sha): gsum pa btags// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma'o// rjes su drug pa'i gsum pa ste// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og bzhi pa'i mtha' ma la//
317a7(sha): dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng du brgyan// der rjes u sha'i gnyis pa ste// sgra yi dang po'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi drug pas 'og tu brgyan// de 'og
317b1(sha): drug pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og tu ug/ de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng du brgyan// de rjes lnga yi gsum pa
317b2(sha): la// drug pa'i gsum pas steng du 'brel// de la bzhi pa'i gsum pas mnan// de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ spu gri 'phreng ba gcod pas mtshon// sreg
317b3(sha): cing gnon pa'i b+h+ya ya ra// thim zhing sdud pa sa g+ha ra b+haSh+yA// drag po sa gcod g+ha pa la// 'joms pa gsum gyis 'phen cing sdud// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba brgyad dang gcig/
317b4(sha): drug gnyis yan lag sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal bzlog de krug mcho ngas 'gros stabs brgyad// dug rgyu 'byung ba chad mas sbyar// drug gnyis 'pho ba las dmigs
317b5(sha): brtag/ dril bas 'khor lo mtshon chen tshul// brgyab pas la thog sa bdud kyi stobs// rin chen stobs kyis ngar blud la// 'khor lo dug shing me la bdug
317b6(sha): rten la ye shes rab gnas bya// 'phan pa stobs kyi sbyor ba yis// brgyab na 'joms shing mi 'tsher byed// drag po za byed myos pa'i sngags// ho pa na srog 'dzin
317b7(sha): sbyor ba brgyad// dug 'joms srog 'joms tshe nas bstim// spogs pa rang gzir khugs dang gso// sgo yig rten gzugs sgo gsum mnan// nyi ma rten bzhi
318a1(sha): 'khor lo'i gnas// der 'joms bcu drug las kyi chad// gsang ba ngag sbyangs grang med lam// gsum nas bgrod pas rten dgu 'pho//
318a2(sha): snying po srog bdud bcud la dbub// sbyor ba gnyis kyis mnan par bya// 'gro zhing 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas// gzhan yang gdug pa nad gzhom na// gsang
318a3(sha): pa rdo rje kun po'i sngags// seng ge mtsho sbyar skyug mo tha ba// ye shes dam tshig 'khor lo gnyis// gnyen po yan lag gzer dgu 'joms// des 'joms
318a4(sha): mtha' ru gnas par bya// drag po stobs kyi sbyor ba ste// gas bas mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ yab kyi
318a5(sha): 'khor lo gsang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor
318a6(sha): bapa 'di lta ste// ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba yi// spogs pa las kyi sbyor ba ni// ro langs nag mo'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// yum gyi las rnams 'grub
318a7(sha): pa la/ bdud mo dgug dang las la rbad// bsad dang gzir gsum gnad la bor// ro khugs shis dam tshig bstan// byin brlabs gsos la
318b1(sha): 'khor lo dkrug/ rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i snying po dang // ro langs nag mo'i lto dkrug pa// bdud sde ma lus 'dus pa'i mchog/ las kyi rtsa bar snying po sdud//
318b2(sha): dbyings sdud yum gyi 'khor lo la// dngos dang sbyar ba'i las dang tshad// 'khrul 'khor rim pa 'di lta ste// zhing ras lpags shun khru gang la// sbyor ba sna tshogs
318b3(sha): thang ba bya// gsum gnyis phan tshun cha mnyam thig/ rgya gram mtshams sbyar thig gnyis te// ru thig gnyis te thig mdud brgyad// thig mdud rgya gra ma re mig
318b4(sha): skyong // sngags kyi sbyor ba brgya dang ldan// re mig 'khor lo cha mnyam bya// 'khor lo rim pa 'phreng ba rten// cha mnyam mu khyud rim pa lnga// dbus su drag
318b5(sha): po'i 'khor lo brgyad// lte ba drag po'i 'bru gcig ste// 'phen pa kun gyi sbyor ba rten// phyi rim mu khyud re mig brgyad// 'khor lo sbyor chen 'phen pa'i sngags
318b6(sha): rtsa ba'i sa bon gnyis dang ldan// 'khor lo 'phen pa 'bru drug brgyad// yang logs bcu drug rim pa la// 'khrug byed nag mo'i 'phreng ba dgod// mu khyud
318b7(sha): bzhi pa'i 'khor lo la// mi 'gyur thugs kyi 'phreng ba dgod// phyi rim mu khyud lnga pa la// sbyor ba gsung gi 'phreng ba dgod// rtsa ba'i yi ge lngar bzhin las
319a1(sha): yab yum rjes su mthun par bkod// me dpal 'khor lo rjes mthun las// bzlog la 'bru rnams dgod par bya// mtshams bzhi'i rims
319a2(sha): de bzhin du// yab yum bdud kyi sbyor ba'i ming // de bzhin rim par dgod par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gral las bzung // yab kyi 'phreng ba sngar bzhin las// /
319a3(sha): dang por stobs ldan b+h+yA ma ya// 'u tri pri ta 'degs pa'i ma// su tri chags par ldan pa'i rag/ m+b+hi dra 'degs dang ldan pa'i mo// g+ha b+ha pra tra 'byung ba'i ma//
319a4(sha): de mthun ldan pa sdud pa'i ma// mu la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo la// 'phen pa'i ming gi yi ge drug/ mi 'gyur rtsa ba'i 'khor lor shar// rten pa sku yi 'phreng ba ni//
319a5(sha): kA sra su nir kyi dang dum// gnyis pa kar ma s+thi ti sha// gsum pa kro ma yA tI dun// bzhi pa ga pu li ti mAn// lnga pa ya krun tsan d+ha rag/ drug pa dU rba
319a6(sha): tsi tI rag/ bdun pa b+hA krA ya shAM// brgyad pa g+ha dzu ni pra be// dgu pa tsa hi dzI ti ta// bcu pa shr-i ka ti ka li// bcu gcig pa rA badz+ra rag/ bcu gnyis
319a7(sha): g+ho g+ho na yam mo// bcu gsum dr-i tu ta ki e// bcu bzhi sar b+hi tsi ta ka/ bco lnga a g+hu shrI g+hin dzA// mtha' ma phra ya kle ma ti// sku yi snying po sbyar
319b1(sha): pa'i mchog/ thams cad 'joms pa'i dril 'phreng 'di// 'dren pa kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// 'khrug byed tsit+tA'i 'khor lo ni// dang por ba lan ta na'i
319b2(sha): snying // gnyis par d+ha dang g+ha g+hon no// gsum pa ra d+ha pa ra nan sh+yaM// bzhi par na ya g+ho sin ci// lnga par pa ta te pin+ta// drug par pha gram gyi li rag/
319b3(sha): ba du na pa ra b+ha ba b+ha ha ta// brgyad pa ra b+ha myA g+hu la rngu bas// dgu pa ra ma ra yag rag ro// bcu pa ra ya pa ti ga na tsa// bcu ga cig wa ya so me na r+m+ma//
319b4(sha): bcu gnyis ra ga dur la rgyu// bcu gsum rdo la sha d+hi b+hi tsi// bcu bzhi sa ra mu ri ro// bco lnga sha ma be to shan// bcu drug pa ra bi ti sgyu/ thugs kyi
319b5(sha): snying po sbyor ba'i mchog/ gsal ba'i ye shes kun grub ldan// thugs kyi mi 'gyur 'phreng bar bshad// mtha' ma gsung gi 'phreng ba yang // dang por
319b6(sha): a dang khyab ro raM// gnyis par e mA b+hu kri thum// gsum par i mA g+he oM gze rA// bzhi pa ra I tA nu pin badz+ra// lnga par u tha ma nyag snying //
319b7(sha): drug par u drum mug tsaka/ bdun par ri mog ti ka ra ga/ brgyad par dzA tsamag smya hri// dgu par ri lo lA mu shI// bcu par lI sbub no spu// @
320a1(sha): gcig e g+ho nya kro rag/ bcu gnyis e b+h+yo ba ra shA// bcu gsum o d+he d+he nud+d+he// bcu bzhi aM b+ha m+b+hi hUM// bats+tshe stAr ng+gA
320a2(sha): o g+ho smA// bcu drug a ud s+yA sh+tsa Ud// de dag thugs kyi sbyor ba ste// tsam sa ri du ba yin// g+hu h+ya rA dza'i tsAg kra ste// de ba ki li tsakra'i
320a3(sha): mchog/ kun 'byung rtsa ba'i 'phreng bar bshad// gcod pa spu gro'i 'phreng ba yang // dang por k+ShAM kri da ma ti ya// gnyis par 'dom b+hA'i ta na ma//
320a4(sha): gsum par rag shi tsa mun te// bzhi par khrag du ma ra ya ma// lnga par rak+ki prA mA ru// drug par kr-i krin tsa ma lU// bdun pa ra d+hI rI b+hi ts+tshirbad// brgyad pa
320a5(sha): rab sha na ya// 'bru brgyad drag po kun gyi mtshon// gcod pas spu gris mtshon lo ma// 'di dag bsad pa'i 'khor lo'o// snying po mtha' ma dgod
320a6(sha): cing bzung // rgyu rkyen sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba yis// g.yas g.yon rlung gnad dkrug dang bcas// dang po dbus nas thog drangs la// rdo rje phyogs nas
320a7(sha): srog bzung ste// phyi sangs yum gyi mtshams su bskyal// rin chen phyogs nas nyer bzung la// pad+ma ral gri'i phyogs mtshams bzhin// dril
320b1(sha): gtor phye dang sbyor ba phra la// 'di yi sbyor ba gong bzhin las// khyad par drug dang brgyud bcu gnyis// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgya// sbyor ba phral
320b2(sha): na du ma 'byung // mnanA pa drag po ho gyi bya// gang sgrub las kyi mtha' sdud yin// spogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba mchog/ de bzhin las kyi mchod chen
320b3(sha): ga dgas// ye shes rig pa'i pho brang bca'// bde bo stobs kyi byin brlabs bstan// tshe gnas rdo rje'i lam du gzung // dag pa'i mkha' la shugs/
320b4(sha): kyis 'phang // rin po che yi rgyal sa bgrod// mtshon chas bcad la srog gzungs dpral// dbus mtshams rten la shes pa bsdu// thod pa snying po bcud
320b5(sha): bsdus bya// 'byung b.ri rab rdo rjes mnan// mi 'gyur spobs pa'i las su bshad// rgyu la mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ro langs kyi le'u ste bdun
320b6(sha): pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nAg mo'i las dril ba'i 'khor lo 'di bshad do// gshed bdag ga tso mo'i
320b7(sha): sbyor ba las// ro langs nag mo'i nying mthus kyis// bsad pa'i sbyor ba gcig tu dril// gzer 'debs 'khor lo sbyor ba bshad// ma lus 'joms
321a1(sha): pa'i ngang tshul can// bdud mo gshin rje'i sbyor ba ste// khro mo rnams kyi srog bsdus la// nag mo'i sbyor ba dpag med las/
321a2(sha): gsang bar dril ba'i 'khor lo ni// dur khrod ras la dpa' bo yi// don khrag rme bas thang pa bya// theg le phan tshun rgya gram gdab// ru thig gnyis
321a3(sha): te le tshe brgyad// mu khyud gsum bskor rim gnyis ma nyam// dbus su rtsa ba'i sa bo na ya// khang pa brgyad du spu gri mtshon// drag po 'bru brgyad bkod
321a4(sha): pas gcod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis su// rtsa ba'i dril ba'i sngags rnams dgod// ya sogs bcu gnyis 'khor lo la// bskul zhing
321a5(sha): gnon pa'i snying po dgod// 'phrul gyi snying po gsang ba'i gter// drag po sngags kyi 'phreng ba ni// dbu ru dbyangs kyi dbang po la// dbyangs yig
321a6(sha): bcu bzhi steng nas brgyan// de steng mdzes pa'i thig ler ldan// de la lnga pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// de 'og g+hi stin da na gug/ 'og tu ma hA na ya na
321a7(sha): rag/ rjes su mu su tI b+ha sha// de 'og ya ma tsa b+hi rnying // der yang 'bis smi ta na tsa// de rjes ro kha tsa dri raM// de 'og ya raM srog g+hin thum//
321b1(sha): de rjes 'dren dang ldan pa'i ro// de 'og khrag dang 'brel ba'i shaM// de 'og khrag la du sha nar+b+ha// mtha' ma ra rtsi ra kha sni rbad// gsad pa'i mchog gi sbyor
321b2(sha): ba bshad// rbad cing gsad pa'i 'phreng ba ni// dang por su tri ring por drag/ gnyis par mo gram da pa shig/ gsum par kro ma ya ti gzer// bzhi par
321b3(sha): phul ti ka thum// lnga pa ra yag kru tsa da raM// drug par du kha tsi tir+m+ma// bdun par pa gra ya gra ma// brgyad par kra rum nir pa ma// dgu pa ra tsa ba'i 'dzin ti
321b4(sha): thun// bcu ba ra ka kri ti kra b+h+yo// bcu gcig badz+ra ra ga nan// bcu gnyis ya ma ti pra nan// 'phan pa'i 'bru brgyad sngar bzhin sbyar// sbyor ba gcig gis
321b5(sha): las kun byed// drag por bcas pa gnad kyi las// rgyab pas ya thog bdud kyi stobs// rgyu ba med pas gzer gyi mchog/ rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma//
321b6(sha): myos pa'i khrag dang dug ngar blud// mtshan mo bskul zheng rten la bstim// gsod byed nag mo'i sbyor ba mchog/ las kyi rtsa bar bsdus par bshad// rgyal
321b7(sha): mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nyid mthus bca' gzhi'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin thang
322a1(sha): 'phrul gyi sbyor ba 'di skad bshad do// thog ser ba dag mo bskul ba'i phyir// dregs pa pho mos bkol ba'i las// dbang chen bran
322a2(sha): du bkol ba dang // lo thog gzhom zhing ser thog dpab// las kyi rim pa'i sbyor ba ma nan// zhing chen lpags shun khru gang la// gdong cig ser skya khrag
322a3(sha): gis byug/ ni ra bag phye'i 'o ma yis// mtha' ma brgya dang rgya bcad la// sur bu'i bir gyis 'khor lo bri// snag tsha zhun ma dug chu sbyar// bcu gnyis rtsi bra
322a4(sha): mtshan 'khor lo la// dbus su las kyi rdo rje bri// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su ming gi dang po dgod// rgya gram ma me ta kr-I bzhi// rtsibs la bzhu
322a5(sha): zhing sdud pa yi// mtshan la gcod dang phan pa yi// bcu gnyis spu gri'i yig 'bru dgod// gsum gsum gtor dang gcig tu dril// nyin mtshan sbyor
322a6(sha): ba'i skabs kyis dbye// sa yi 'khor lo bcu gnyis la// dbus su me long dur bzhag la// gser dang bya rgod snying pos mtshal// spungs la gcig tu
322a7(sha): dril la bzlas// mtsho gling bzhi la mchog phran bzhi// phur bu rdzas kyi 'khor los brdeg/ 'phel lam 'gyur na gtor la bzlas// tsa lo ka yi thod
322b1(sha): pa ru// 'khor lo dril la hUM gis bcad// dmigs pa'i rten la rta ma gzhug/ zhu zhing chad dang zor du 'phang // sbyor ba sngags kyi 'phreng ba bkod//
322b2(sha): rtsa ba'i yi ge yang bzhi las// sgra yi dang po gsum pa la// gsum pa'i mtha' ma yang dag ldan// de 'og gsum pa'i gsum pa bzhag/ der rjes lnga pa'i dang
322b3(sha): po bzhag/ de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas steng du brgyan// sgra yi gnyis pas bzhi pa la// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng nas brgyan//
322b4(sha): de 'og drug pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ rjes su gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// drug pa'i mtha' ma yang dag sbyar// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu/
322b5(sha): bzhis steng du brgyan// de 'og dbyangs yige dang po bzhag/ der rjes lnga pa'i dang po bzhag/ rjes su u shwa'i gsum pa gzung // 'og tu drug pa'i gsum
322b6(sha): pa bzhag/ de 'og gnyis pa'i bzhi pa bzhag/ sgrub pa'i sbyor ba dril bar bshad// 'phen pa drag po'i sbyor ba ni// sgra yi lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// 'og nas
322b7(sha): byA ma hA yis brgyan// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis steng nas brgyan// u sha'i gnyis pa gnyis bzhag la// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis kyis mnan// de 'og/
323a1(sha): u sha'i gsum pa la// sgra yi dang po lnga pas mnan// steng nas dbyangs kyi gsum pas mnan// de 'og sgra yi dang po la// drug pa'i
323a2(sha): gsum pa sa 'og nas 'brel// dbyangs yig bcu gsum steng du brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gnyis pa bzhag/ der rjes drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ de 'og
323a3(sha): lnga pa'i gnyis pa gnyis// drug po'i gsum pa gnyis kyis 'brel// steng du dbyangs kyi bcu gsum pas// gnyis la brgyan la thig ler mdzes//
323a4(sha): de stengs lnga pa'i mtha' mas 'brel// daM 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// de 'og u sha'i gnyis pa la// drug pa'i gsum
323a5(sha): pas man na la bzhag/ de 'og lnga pa'i gnyis pa la// steng du dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgya na// de la lnga pa'i gsum pas mnan// drag po'i phan pas sbyor
323a6(sha): ba'i mchog/ sbyin thang las kyi 'khor lo mtshon// 'phrul gyi man ngag gsang chen gter// 'bras bu skye shing rtsi sman 'joms// sbyin thang thog gi
323a7(sha): sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ sbyin thang 'phrul gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
323b1(sha): kyis lo thog gzhom pa 'di bshad do// mtshang chen dregs pa pho mo yis// 'bras bu lo thog rtsi sman kun// 'phrul gyi 'khor los gcod pa'i las//
323b2(sha): snying po 'khor lo gsang ba'i bcud// bcu thob brgyad spungs bdud kyi gzer// ki kaM las kyi brnag pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bde dang smin pa'i las// las
323b3(sha): kun dregs pa khong dregs can// ma lus 'joms pa'i stobs dang bcas// mkha' 'gro 'phrul gyi 'khor lo ni// bkra mi shis pa'i zhabs ma la// yul
