323b4(sha): g+hu klu btsun rgyun srad la// rdzus la zang pa legs byugs la// bzhi brgyad bcu gnyis bcu drug rtsibs// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su khyab
323b5(sha): 'jug srog gi gzer// rtsibs brgyad bsnyen pha lho yi sngags// bcu gnyis phan pa stobs kyi 'bru// yang logs bcu gnyis khrag la bstim//
323b6(sha): nyin dril mtshan mo khrag la bstim// dbus nas thog drangs rkyang pa'i las// de yi snying po thig le ni// dbu ru rnam par snang mdzad bzhag/ de rjes drug
323b7(sha): pa'i dang po ste// 'og tu gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs kyi lnga pa sa 'og tu brgyan// u sha'i mtha' dang lnga pa'i mtha'// de 'og gnyis pa'i
324a1(sha): bzhi pas sdud// bsnyen pa lha yi sngags su bshad// rnam par snang mdzad ldan pa la// chags pa'i snying po rgyud dang 'brel// drug
324a2(sha): pa'i gsum la dang po'i gsum pas mnan// lnga pa'i mtha' la bcu gsum dbyangs yig skye// gnyis pa'i dang po lnga pa'i gsum pas mnan// lnga pa'i
324a3(sha): mtha' ma de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum skye// d+hIs su rdzu pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ drug pa'i gsum la dang po'i gsum par rdzun// gsum pa'i dang podz+ra/
324a4(sha): pa'i gsum pas 'brel// de la sgra yi drang po'i gsum pas ma nun// u sha'i gnyis pas gral la rjud// bdud dang 'brel ba'i snying por 'brel/
324a5(sha): lha dang bral ba dgug par bshad// bustim pa'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba ni// dbu na rnam par snang mdzad de// drug pa'i gsum la dang po'i gsum bas
324a6(sha): man+nan+ma// lnga pa'i mthu' ma oM yis mdzes// de yi 'og tu srin po'i mi// u sha'i gsum pa kany+tsis pa'i mtha' mas 'brel// de yi steng du yI
324a7(sha): mdzes// de la dang po'i lnga pa mnan// gnyis pa'i dang po de 'og lnga dang gi/ 'og tu drug pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ lnga pa'i gnyis badrug sa
324b1(sha): gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// de la os brgyan lnga pa'i mtha' ma ste// u sha'i gnyis pa drug pa'i gsum pas brgyan pa gnyis// u sha'i

324b5(sha): ler mdzes// de stong lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ chags pa'i snying po grong bzhin las// dril ba'i 'og dang yang 'og gsum// gsum pa'i
324b6(sha): grwa sum gnyis 'og tu u// dus kyi phan pa pha na par bshad// lus kyi rim pas 'joms par byed// dbus nas zlog drangs rdo rje phyogs// ral gri'i

325a1(sha): gzugs ming sngags dang rdzas// las dang thun 'dzab 'dren pa'i mi// sngags dang nus pa rdzas la bstim// srid pa gsum

329b7(sha): po yis// gnan pa'i rim gyi dbye ba bya// sngags dang sbyor ba rdzas kyi dri la// snying po thig le yi ger bcas// rdo rje rnon po'i rgya mdud gzhug
330a1(sha): sngags kyi 'phreng bas gcod pa ni// dbyangs kyi dang po o dang ldan// drug pa'i gsum pa thig ler mdzes// steng du lnga pa'i mtha'/
330a2(sha): ma sa brgyan// dbyangs kyi dang po e steng brgyan// las kyi sgra yi dang po ste// u she'i tha ma aM steng brgyan// las kyi 'dren pa'i dgra dang po// sgra yi
330a3(sha): ga sum pa'i gsum pa la// 'og nas drug pa'i gsum pas sbyar// stong du ri dang yang dag ldan// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma brtan// u sha'i mtha' ma
330a4(sha): e dang ldan// sgra yi dang po lnga pas mnan// sgra yi gsum pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum 'og li steng brgyan// rjes su drug pa'i dang po ste//
330a5(sha): u sha'i mtha' ma e steng brgyan// sla yi dang po mtha' mas ma nan// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i dang por 'brel// gsum pa'i dang po 'og nas u/
330a6(sha): drug pa'i gsum pas gnan la gzhag/ gsum pa'i gnyis pas de dang 'brel// sgra yi dang por lnga par 'brel// lnga pa'i gsum pa li yis 'brel//
330a7(sha): de la u sha'i gsum pas mnan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma yang dag brgyan// u sha'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i gsum dang 'brel// drug pa'i gsum pa lnga
330b1(sha): pa'i gsum pa 'og/ sgra yi dang po'i mtha' mas ga nA na// sgra yi dang po u yi ug/ de la u sha'i gsum pas 'brel// rjes su lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ gnyis
330b2(sha): pa'i gsum pa o yis steng du brgyan// gsum pa'i mtha' ma i yis brgyan// gnyis pa'i bzhi pa dang po'i mtha' mas brgyan// u sha'i gsum pa bzhi pa'i
330b3(sha): gsum pas ga nan// sgra yi dang por nye bar bzung // drug pa gsum pa yang dag bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i dang po bzhag/ lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhi pa'i dang
330b4(sha): po sa gnan// rtsa ba drug po kun 'byung ba'i// mi 'gyur drug cu rtsa gcig pa// rgyul ba kun gyi thig le mchog/ ga sad dang ga na na pa dbab tu bzlog/
330b5(sha): spyi dang sgo gshig kha bcings dang // phyag rgya dgug dang ma mo 'pho// gzir dang drag po gnod sel bcas// kun gyi mtha' ru rdo rje lcags// sbyor ba'i
330b6(sha): sngon du sa ya bstan// thun mong yan lag khyad par gdags// rnam grangs sbyor ba lnga gnyis gcig/ rig pa gling las 'dren pa'i mchog/ b+hi b+hu lha/
330b7(sha): ling ga li dang // ri mog shaM ka de ba tsa// phyag rgya bstan pa'i rim pa 'di// de dang smin pa'i las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/
331a1(sha): drag sngags dbang sdud kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gab pa'i don
331a2(sha): 'di mngon du phyung ste bshad do// yang dag gab pa'i 'khor lo ni// rtsa ba kun 'byung srid pa'i gnas// rgyun sngags gzer zhing spu gri thems// ming
331a3(sha): bcas 'byung bas rtsa bar bshad// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// tshe srog bdag po bdud gshin rje// bdud mo dregs pa kha lding bam// thugs khar badz+ra
331a4(sha): 'dzin gshedra ba dag/ badz+ra tsit+ta rus sbal gnas// rtsa bzhi 'byung ba'i dngas ma la// srog gi kri kra lta bzhi bsnol// thig le mu khyud gsum gnyis
331a5(sha): dbus// phyi yi si ra lnga gnyis drug/ rgya log si ra bcu gnyis ldan// phyogs skyong nA ga lto rtsibasa? phye// si ra na ga ma hA brgyad// srog gi si ra dri
331a6(sha): dngas ma// dkAr dmar snum drang rang sgra'i nyams// phyi dang yang logs si ri'i grangs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mda' yi gang // de dag srid pa'i 'khor/
331a7(sha): lor bshad// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus nas ma skyes 'dren pa la// bya rgod steng la bskyed pas mdzes// thugs kha dag las 'byung bar
331b1(sha): bshad// rus sbal mgo las skye med pa'i// chos rnams 'byung ba'i nam mkha' bstan// lta ba g.yas na las kyi mchog/ lte ba rlung gi sa bon rten// /
331b2(sha): lto ba g.yon dang sdud dang bskyed// kha nas dgos pa'i dngas ma bskyed// lag pa g.yas pa srog bdud brten// de bzhin rtsibs lkog chags pa'i brda// rkang pa
331b3(sha): g.yas pa srin po'i srog/ gsang ba rkang g.yon bdud snying po// rtsibs g.yon 'dzin pa btsan gyi gzer// phyag g.yon gshin rje'i snying po rlung // rus sbal

331b5(sha): gnas// si ra'i mdud pa g.yas gcod pa// g.yas na srog gi 'brel ba la// de yi mdud par gzhan srog sdud// rgyab na sreg pa'i snying po me// si/

332a1(sha): dbab pa mnan dang gshig/ gnas pa'i sngags rnams 'di lta ste// gnas pa sa yi dngas ma la// rgya gram dbus kyi lte ba la//

332b1(sha): gsum pas gnan// g.yas dang mtshams la u sha yi// gnyis pa gnyis la drug pa yi// drug pa'i gnyis kyis gnan pa'o// rgyab na bzhi pa'i gsum pa

332b3(sha): lnga pa'i gnyis pa sa gnyis la yang // 'og tu drug pa'i gsum pas 'brel// steng du dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma gnyis ldan gnan//

338a7(sha): sdud nyi shar tshul// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// phyi nang gsang dang gsang chen thabs// rtsa ba gsum las yan lag stong // sbyor ba sa nyid
338b1(sha): brgya nyid dang // rnam grangs bcu drug brgyad brgya lnga// las kyi rtsa ba gcig tu dril// gzigs pa bzhi yis don chen bsgrub// rtsa ba gcig las thams
338b2(sha): cad 'byung // drag pos thams cad 'joms pa'i las// de ltar sngags kyi 'phreng ba nyid// rgyu rkyen re dogs rtsol sgrub ldan// bzlas pas the tsom med pa'i rgyu//
338b3(sha): thabs dang shes rab yi ger bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas
338b4(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo bca' ba'i rten 'di bshad do// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo yi// yul gyi dbang po srog bsdus la// dngas snyigs dbye
338b5(sha): ba'i rten bstan pa// yang dag rdzogs kyis 'di ltar brjod// bsgrub dang bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo ni// dbang byed las dang mthun pa ste// mthun pa'i chos dbying
338b6(sha): gcod dang 'bigs// skyo 'bog la sogs mthar dbyung na// dbang drag stobs kyis gzugs dang sbyar// yang na dud 'gro'i lus la ste// mchog tu 'byung
338b7(sha): ba'i stobs las sbyar// rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa yi// bkod pa'i 'khor lo nyid du ste// gsod pa gshin rje nyid la yin/ dbang ni btsun mo'i lho ru'o//
339a1(sha): rgyas pa nor bu'i gzugs su bya// zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// dbye ba rta dang ma he gnyis// bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab tu'o//
339a2(sha): lkugs pa lug gi rgyab tu bya// 'bog pa sha ba'i rgyab tu bya// smyo ba spre'u yi rgyab tu yin// myos pa srog dang bral ba'i lus// rengs pargyan pa'i shing la bya//
339a3(sha): gogazir pa stobs kyi bdag pos bya// thun mong gdug pa'i thod pas ma na na// drag po'i sbyor pa ru sbal lto// bdud nag sbyor ba rgyu yi lhor// mnan pa las kyi/
339a4(sha): rgyal pos bya// gshig pa sbur nag stobs dang sbyar// bskyab pa rang gi rten gyis sbyar// dbang po gzhom pa chu srin te// gang yin dbang po'i sgo dang
339a5(sha): sbyar// yi dgas lus kyi longs spyod ga zhom// lo thog gzhom pa lto kha phye'i gzugs// lus gzhom pa la sbrul gyi gzugs// 'bras bu 'joms la sa
339a6(sha): ga'i gzugs// khams gsum ga zhom pa ma yi gzugs// kun kyang gcod pas 'khor lor bya// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha'i dbyings
339a7(sha): kyi khongs su gzhug/ ci rigs las kyi bya ba yin// bsrung ba rang lus phyag rgyar bstan// khyad par bsam gtan 'khor los bya// 'khor lo
339b1(sha): rgyal po rten du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom
339b2(sha): ldan 'das kyis rang rgyu gnas pa'i 'khor lo 'di po shad do// nga yis bshad pa'i rgyud 'di na// don dam dril ba'i ma hU yi// g+hu b+hi dri'i tsa gra na// b+ha
339b3(sha): b+h+yAM d+hA yU b+hu rA/ krA m+b+ha twA r+thA R+sha b+ha tA/ de yi 'ag+ha tsa bstan pa ni// dur khrod la sogs dgu 'dus sar// rdul da la bris la mtshan ma yi// rgyal ba kun
339b4(sha): gyi ye shes can// thob na kuna'i dus mthun pa men// khro rgyal gshin rje yum mchog ldan// bdud bzhi brta na ma dur khrod mtsho// mu khyud rdo rje 'phreng ba
339b5(sha): can// rgyan rnams yang dag gzung ba men// yang na bsnyen sgrub 'khor lo ni// gzugs brnyan 'khor lo ma yin te// gang yin lus kyi 'khor lo la//
339b6(sha): snying gi rtsa ba zhi gshed bdud bzhi// 'dus pa gsum la yab yum ste// phyi rim rtsa brgyad 'brel chen bzhi// bdud sgo bzhi dang ldan pa la// so so'i sgo
339b7(sha): ru yi ge btags// dur khrod brgyad dang mtsho gling bzhi// dmigs pa'i brnag pa rnyed ldan pas// bdag don don du mchog 'gyur la// 'khor lo
340a1(sha): dam par 'di bzung bya// bsgrub dang bsnyen pa'i skyabs rnams su// rang sngags 'dren pa'i snying po dang // drag po las kyi sngags
340a2(sha): rnams bzung // rtsa sgo srubs dang bcas pa la// me dang chu yi snying po brtag/ sa dang rlung gi srog gzung dpral// nam mkha'i dngas ma thim zhing
340a3(sha): 'pho// 'di ni mchog gi 'khor lo yin// rtag ta ma bral ga deng ldan na// mchog gi las la nye ba yin// bzlog cing dkrug dang rnal mar drang /
340a4(sha): ga sad pa mchog las 'di sbyar ro// yang thog stobs dpag med pa'i las// gsang ba gab spus thig le mchog/ ma ga gnas mtha' las chen rgyal//
340a5(sha): rgyal ba kun gyi thig ler bshad// rgyul mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ 'khor lo rang gnas kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// /
340a6(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun mong gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// stong gsum ya ma'i zhing khams su// mtshon chen me dpal dug mda'i mchog
340a7(sha): 'khrul gyi 'khor lo gter gyi bcud// nyi ma las byung sreg dang ldan// ye shes me dpal 'phrul gyi rgyu// rigs chen sems dpa' chen po la// 'khor lo
340b1(sha): rgyal po yun du gnas// bde ba'i las can 'khor lo bcud// brnag pa'i snyings ma gsang lam sbyang // bde ba'i gnas la bla med 'phang // rgyu rkyen sbyor ba sa gnyis
340b2(sha): don can// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'phrul gyi gter// mchongs chen 'phrul gyi sbyor ba mchog/ 'phrin las thams cad sgrub pa'i las// sbyor ba du ma'i las gsungs pa// ma hA
340b3(sha): nag po dug 'dzin 'dra// bdag dang ldan pas 'di sbyar na// sgrub pa'i las su yang dag gsungs// rig pas mngon du btags gnas la// rdzas dang sbyor ba
340b4(sha): kun ldan na// bsnyen pa gsum la sbyor ba dkrug/ gdengs nyams phyag rgya'i rtags tshad mas// mchog tu ma ra ya ra tsa// thun mong gnas pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rin chen
340b5(sha): ga'u yi thod pa ru// ma shi dbugs chad don khrag ldan// rten drug me rlung sa chu'i bcud// ni ma sa rdo rje'i khrag/ sgo rten bcu drug sor brkos la// rdzas rnams sbas pa
340b6(sha): sbyor dang po// ga tad khra ma las kyis sbyor bar bshad// pad+ma rus pa'i ga 'u ru// drug la bcug nyis sor gzugs gcig/ dmar na ga ha la cha gsum chus// bskus
340b7(sha): la rten gsum ral gris bshag/ bam gud gdam sa la gi zur gzhug/ gsum gnyis gcig mthar ga bur dril// bcud kyi dkyil spa thal chen dgag/ de yi sbyor ba
341a1(sha): bcu dgu gcig/ rdzogs nas gsad pa'i sbyor ba bshad// nya phyis ru sbal ga 'u ru// khyi dom phag sbrul rta lug khrag/ mdzo to la dre'u rten drug pa sre// nyungs
341a2(sha): kar zangs lcags dug thun brab// khyi stong brgya yi las sbyor grangs// snying po dang bcas ga'ur gzhug/ g.yas 'gram 'dom do tshad khru gang // sras la stag zil rdo bas mnan
341a3(sha): sbyor ba bco lnga bzhi gnyis ldan// de yis mchog tu gsod par bshad// mtshan med phyal ba'i ga'u ru// drug pa bcu drug dang ldan gzugs// skyer lcags mchog phran gsum
341a4(sha): sor bzhi// spyi snying gsang gsum phur gsum gzer// phung sa gsum du ga'u sba// pha mes bla rus stang du bzhag/ sbyor ba khri gcig stong du bshad// dud pa med pa'i me khang
341a5(sha): nas// ur mo btsag dang rkyen blangs la// rna med khrag dang lto 'gros sha// klu gnas bre 'o lkog ma'i khrag/ rkang mangs 'degs pa'i lus dang sbyar// dmigs pa'i lus sam
341a6(sha): gos la bsku// lo dang zla ba'i dus na 'joms// 'bum gcig stong gi sbyor ba rdzogs// sbyor ba pa na tsa dri ru bshad// mu zi nag po'i bla rkang du// ba se bya stag mo mon gyi sprul/
341a7(sha): ga ser bya klad pa a tsus khrag/ rma ba gsum dang snum chen drug/ rdzas la sbyar ba gsum gyis dril// lam sbas bgoms pas sbyor ba 'du// rdzas la thabs kyis sbyar
341b1(sha): bar bshad// rkyang sha nya sha mu zi skum// tsha dang chang bran zhag dgu sra// bton la kun btags drod dang bsre// nye bar za na dus na 'joms// de la sbyor ba bcu drug lnga//
341b2(sha): sngags kyi nus pa brgya stong gcig/ drag po sngags kyi sbyor bar bshad// ra khrag rkyang rngog zer mo klad// sran chu bag phye chang gis spu// gong bzhin gnon la zos na 'jom//
341b3(sha): thun mong yan lag sbyar bar bshad// chu khu dud pa nya sbyin sbyar// dgu drug gsum du drod la tsa// sbyang sha dang bsres chang la ga dag/ zla ba dus kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgas
341b4(sha): pa'i khrag dang nya bya'i sha// nyung ba mar khu zer mo klad// rkang mangs 'degs pa'i lus dang sbyar// rten drug pho ba'i sbyor bar bshad// skyer chu 'om bu thar nur chang // yum
341b5(sha): shing dud pa thar nu chang // phye mar btags la sbas la mnan// rul nas sran chan slum dang ba sre// sngags bzlas zos na nye bar bshad// me tog bcu da blangs bung ba'i sha//
341b6(sha): ma thon 'bu dang sbrang ma'i chang // spyang dug rtsa ba kyi lci ba// bsres ya ra yi khrag gis spu// drod bcud dang sbyar spra na 'joms// sbyor ba bcu bdun gcig mthar ldan// mo rigs
341b7(sha): 'pho ba'i sbyor bar bshad// chu rlangs rdo dreg nya ru la sha// ra dang phag khrag sngo sna tshogs// rdo rje'i chu dang mar khu chang // ba yi drod dang kyi tsha sram// bag phye mas khru drod dang bsre//
342a1(sha): yul dang sprad nu 'joms par bshad// yam shing rud pa bong ljad chang // thun mar snying po mar khra tshwa// sha sras khra ba mar khra dra rbarba/
342a2(sha): phye// drod dang sbyar na sbyor ba'i mchog/ rgyal blon stobs chen 'joms par bshad// g+hu b+hI d+ha lpA nA b+hU'i tsI/ shU kA b+ha zhun tsa rA'i don// ti tsa sbyar bas thams ca
342a3(sha): 'joms// drag po brda yis 'joms par bshad// rdo khrag shing khrag sa yi dbugs/ srin chad 'brug rgyugs glog gi rjes// khram thod bcug la 'gram
342a4(sha): 'og sba/ mkhar de 'pho dang 'jigs par bshad// bdud rtsi mngar dang 'o ma chang // khyi sha dang bsres drod la gtad// bsgrub pa'i yan la gnyis brgya gcig
342a5(sha): sbyor ba du ma las kyi gnad// de yi sbyor ba dpag med las// thugs kyi 'phreng ba'i thig le bcud// dbu ru dbyangs kyi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu bzhis steng
342a6(sha): du brgyan// der rjes mdzes pa'i thig le can// der yang lnga pa'i mtha' mas gnan// de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// der rjes sgra yi dang po'o// drug pa'i
342a7(sha): gsum pas 'og tu sbyar// steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// de 'og gsum pa'i gsum pa la// dbyangs yig lnga pas 'og nas brgyan// de 'og
342b1(sha): drug pa'i gsum pa la// steng du lnga pa'i tha mas brgyan// der rdzas gnyis pa'i dang pos mdzes// de 'og u sha'i dang po la// lnga pa'i mtha' mas steng du
342b2(sha): brgyan// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po bzhag/ rjes su gsum pa'i mtha' ma'o// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma bzhag/ de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa btags//
342b3(sha): de 'og drug pa'i dang po'o// de 'og gsum pa'i dang po la// dbyangs yig gsum pas steng du brgyan// de 'og sgra yi dang po la// dbyangs yig bcu bzhis
342b4(sha): steng du brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og tu 'brel// de 'og drug pa'i dang po la// lnga pa'i mtha' mas steng du gnan// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la//
342b5(sha): 'og tu lnga pa'i gsum pas 'brel// gsum pa'i gsum pas yang dag ldan// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba 'dis// sbyor ba nyis brgya stong nyid 'grub// las
342b6(sha): 'di brtsams na the tshom med// thabs mchog ldan pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan mo long gi rgyud las// sbyor ba'i thun mong gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// /
342b7(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis me sgyogs chu skyogs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// thugs kyi 'phreng ba dang sbyar la// me shel drod
343a1(sha): la 'ug me bdug/ stag bya'i sha dang pu shud snying // dur khrod sol chen rgya shug spre// sha snying bsres la sgo ngar rdzus// bdun stong sbyor ba
343a2(sha): stan la bstim// shra ba'i rdzas la 'gul tog bya// nyi ma'i drod bsdu sbyor ba bstim// nya gsum gung la sgo nga 'phang // sngags kyi sbyor ba brgyad dang bdun//
343a3(sha): grong khyer chen po me yis 'jig/ bcu nas nyi shu gsum gyi bar// rabs chad thod par chu shel bcug/ gzhan yang gnyan rar dmigs gu'i chu// nya sbrul sha
343a4(sha): dang bya so khrag/ thod par blugs shing sbyor ba dril// de yi sbyor ba rgyas bstan pa// rgyu rkyen 'dren pa dbyangs dang sgra// dang por dbyangs yig de nyid la//
343a5(sha): o yis steng brgyan lnga pas mtha' mdzes u sha'i 'og/ sbyor bas snying po yon tan rdzogs// drug pa'i gsum pas lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// gnyis/
343a6(sha): su bos la drug dang po// lnga pa'i mtha' ma sgra dang po// drug pa'i gnyis pa drug pa'i gsum par sbyar// de la u ba ta gis mtshams su sbyar// snying po
343a7(sha): sdud pa gsum dang sbyar// nyin mtshan khri khri rdzas la dbab// nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// gsum spangs lnga pa'i gsum pa la// b+h+ra ma hA yis
343b1(sha): 'og nas brgyan// steng nas oM brgyan khri tsho bzhi// thon na ston zla ra ba'i stong // tho rangs sbyor ba gsum gyis 'phang // gang dmigs rten la sbyin thang
343b2(sha): 'bebs// drag po'i yan lag ma lus rdzogs// de mo'i lus la zhing lpags bsgrubs// srin bya'i sgo ngar sha dang khrag/ brdzangs la de mo'i skye ru gdags
343b3(sha): khrag gi klong du bya bzhag la// 'phang ba bor la sbyor ba zlog/ bdun 'bum me chu snying po blang // rtags dang sbyar la rten la dbab// rtsa ba'i las la
343b4(sha): spobs pa bya// bam gyi 'gul tog de mo 'phang // me rlung sbyin thang las kyi 'khrug/ byi la'i gsob shun phungs chu// rgya sri shing la mi mthun gzugs
343b5(sha): sen gang mos pa'i khrag gis bris// bdud dang lnga ru sbyor ba dril// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa'i 'bru// drug pa'i lnga pa'i mtha' ma gnyis//
343b6(sha): drug pa'i gsum pa/ sgra yi dang po ga sum pas u ga/ lnga pa'i mtha' ma o stong brgyan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma bsna na la bod// sgra yi dang po u
343b7(sha): sha'i gnyis pas 'og/ rgyan la steng la e yis mdzes// drug pa'i gsum pa gsum pa'i dang por sbyar// gsum pa'i bzhi pa'i lag tu u/
344a1(sha): drug pa'i gnyis pa ri yis brgyan// u sha'i mtha' ma u shi'i gsum pas gnan// lnga pa'i dang po o steng brgyan// de la lnga pa'i
344a2(sha): gsum pas gnan// gong mas bsdus la 'og mas dbab// tha chung bzhi yi nye la sbyar// stobs chen dregs pa srin mo yi// brgya bcu gnyis dang rten
344a3(sha): la sbyar// dus tshod sbyor ba'i gnad la dbab// 'gram rtsa the ma 'og mal lam bras// sbas la sbyor ba gsum gyis dbab// chags pa'i snying po gsum
344a4(sha): dang ldan// las kyi mtha' ru dgu skor gnan// mchog gi las dang gcig tu sbyar// gri thod khrag gsum nA ga yul// bcug thun gsum snying po
344a5(sha): bstim// stong gcig khri bzhi brgya phrag gsum// zla ba dgun dang dpyid skyon sbyar// khrag thod gsur gsum mthu' ru sreg/ bsdu dril dbab pa 'bras
344a6(sha): bu 'joms// gzir ba gsum dang ming dang sbyar// mgo spangs drug pa'i dang po rlung // sgra yi dang po u sha'i gnyis pas ug/ steng du aMs pa rgya ni
344a7(sha): rlung steng o// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po oM dang ldan// sdud pa gcig dang ming du gzir la gzir// gsum spangs lnga pa'i dang po gnyis// drug pa'i
344b1(sha): gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// stang du oM gnyis lnga pa'i mtha' mas mdzes// steng du es brgyan rlung stang oM// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po oM dang ldan//
344b2(sha): sdud pa gcig la ming du sbyar la gzir// gsum spangs lnga pa'i dang po gnyis// mtshams su gnyis sbyar dril gnad mchog/ kun ldan mtha' ru u sha'i dang /
344b3(sha): po gnyis// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis ga na na la// gsum pa'i mtha' ma dang po'i gsum pa nye// u shra'i gsum pa dang po'i mtha' mas ug/ las
344b4(sha): rgyan sgra yi dang po'i mtha' mas gnan// gzir ba gsum pa'i mtha' gnyis gnan// lnga pa'i dang po os steng brgyan// de la lnga pa'i gsum pas gnan//
344b5(sha): ga nyanar gdug par gnan sreg gzir// dbab pa sbyor ba 'joms par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ sbyor ba gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
344b6(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi gleng gzhi 'di bshad do// rdo rje srin po'i sbyor ba la// 'khor lo rten gyi byin rlabs mchos
344b7(sha): rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo legs bsgoms na// ye shes 'khor lo byin gyis brlabs// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// las kyi 'khor los phrag
345a1(sha): brgyad bskor// brgyad gnyis bcu drug 'khor lor sbyor// byin parlabs 'khor los padag dbang bskur// dbang gi gnas su bstan
345a2(sha): pa'i phyir// 'khor lo dbang phyug mi 'gyur brtan// rin chen thod pa'i bum pa ru// ye shes chu dang bcu phyed snum// rigs dang khyad par las bskyed la//
345a3(sha): rtsa ba las dang sid+d+hi bzlas// bzlas pa'i mtshan ma rnyed pa dang // bdag dang slob ma dbang bskur la// dngos grub bcud kyi bum pa blang // nus pa skyed
345a4(sha): phyir pan ci'i dbang // nyi shu rdzas kyi rnam pa gcig/ rgyan dang drag po'i dur khrod kyi// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan la// rigs dang ldan pa'i
345a5(sha): dbang phyug gis// rgyal ba'i gdung tsho ba rnams la sbyin// las la thog med phan pa'i dbang // dregs pa pho mo sa las kyi dbang // bskur zhing ba de
345a6(sha): ba'i lam la gzud// gsang ba gzungs ma'i phyag rgya blang // rigs drad dngos grub kun sbyar la// yab yum mnyes pa'i byin rlabs las// rten gyi
345a7(sha): 'khor lo drug bsgyur la// thabs dang bcas pas rgyan skyengs la// bde chen 'khyil pa'i byang chub bcud// gnyis med bde ba'i sgra dang 'byin// thogs
345b1(sha): med grub pa'i dbang du bshad// yum gyi pad+mor ba de phab la// shes rab gnas mchog dam pa yi// ye shes bskyed pa'i dbang bskur bya// b+ha ga gsang
345b2(sha): paba'i gzhal yas su// rig pa'i bde ba'i sems bskul la// si ri'i lam sbyangs pad+mar 'khyil// rig pa rgyan gyi byin rlabs blang // rig pa'i 'khor
345b3(sha): lo rang dbang bskur// ye shes 'khor lo thob par bshad// thams cad ma 'dres mnyam rdzogs pa'i// mnyam nyid bde ba chen po yis// sku
345b4(sha): gsum 'bras bu lhun rdzogs dbang // sgyu ma rnang stong ye shes sku// ma bskur ba skur med rgyu 'bras 'das// thams cad bde ba chen por rdzogs//
345b5(sha): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// rig pa rang dbang byin rlabs me chog/ tshe so nyid rdzogs pa'i dbang du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
345b6(sha): gi rgyud las/ dbang yongs rdzogs rtsa ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun mong dang khyad par
345b7(sha): gyi dbang 'di ba shad do// chos sku byang chub sems kyi ngang nyid las// 'jam dpal mi gnas zung du med pa'i sku// mi gnas khro bo ya man ta ka dang //
346a1(sha): gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya rab bstan pa// bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig 'di lta ste// sngags pa kun gyi dam tshig srog/ byang chub
346a2(sha): bde ba'i gzugs yin pas// srog ldan dam pas 'di srungs bya// sbyor ba sngags kyi 'khor lo la// ma yengs pasam gtan ting 'dzin bstan// gsang
346a3(sha): ba'i lam min gzhan mi 'gro// rig pa'i brda min phyag mi ba tsa la// sbyor ba las kyi rgyun zhugs na// gtam mi bya zhing sha chen bza'// ga yang gzhi stag lpags
346a4(sha): ro ras bgo/ dur khrod rgyan dang 'phreng ba bgrang // dung rnga gling bu rdza rnga dang // rag ta bdud rtsi smyug glu blang // smug chen smug chung don dang gsur// sngags
346a5(sha): kyi 'khor lo rtag tu bskor// me rlung las kyi 'khor lo ba lta// mtshon cha sku mdog sna tshogs gnag/ 'dzab rdzogs dgongs pa gsang bar drang // bsrung
346a6(sha): pa sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// bsam gtan sems kyi 'khor lo blta// shes rab gsang ba'i 'khor lor 'jug/ thabs kyi 'khor lo bde ba spro/
346a7(sha): byang chub 'khor lo sa bon drang // bde ba'i 'khor lo b+ha gar bskyil// shugs kyi 'khor lo dbugs las dbyung // 'phro 'du'i 'khor los kun sbyang bsgrug/
346b1(sha): brgyud pa'i 'khor los bsreg sbyang ba grod// sangs rgyas 'khor los stong phrag 'byung // 'khor lo'i dam tshig srog ltar bzung // de las yon tan byin rlabs 'byung //
346b2(sha): chu chen 'brug na sngon mi bzlog/ yul gsad ro la blo yis blang // yugs sa rabs chad nag po dang // mu za'i bam chen rtag tu blang // don dang ka ba sbas la bcang //
346b3(sha): mon gyi tsit+ta ban+d+ha sems// rdzan shun dbang po sngon du blang // ro la rtag tu byams shing rten// dpa' bo don khrag mtshon ldan 'tshal// khyi dom rta snying dur khrod shing //
346b4(sha): rtsub mo rdo sol lus la brten// sangs rgyas mchod rgyun bla ma bzung // sngon du 'gro bas bag bcas bsdam// byang chub lcam dral rgyun mi gcad// ya man ta ka rtag tu
346b5(sha): bsgom/ ya tshogs chu bo rgyun mi gcad// lam du zhugs rnams mngon par sbyar// snying rje phan sems brtson pas sbyin// dkon mchog bla ma'i rgyal srid bca'//
346b6(sha): bstan pa rin chen gter la bsdu// snying po ngad dang shugs kyis drang // mtshan ldan gzungs ma byin rlabs gzung // bkra shis phyag rgya'i gzungs ma spyad// sems
346b7(sha): kyi me tog bde ba blang // byang chub sa bo na gzhan mi spro// gsang ba'i don du bla mi bya// dam ma 'dres sogs gsang mi bsgrags// mkha' 'gro gzhan chogs
347a1(sha): byams shing gdung // dbang po rno la ting 'dzin bstan// phyag rgya gsal la nyams rtogs ldan// dam tshig sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzung // thun mong
347a2(sha): dam tshig bsrung bar bshad// khyad par dam tshig bsrung ba ni// spyi dang lhag pa'i dam tshig gnyis// spyi yi dam tshig bcu gnyis gcig/ gcan gzan rgyal po gsad
347a3(sha): pa min// za ma tog gi kha mi dbye// gangs kyi zhun chu btung mi bya// snod ngan bdud rtsi bcud mi blug/ nor bu rin chen rgyan mi dbog/ rin po che'i lha bran mi bsrel//
347a4(sha): rdo rje gtams pa'i rdzong mi gshig/ byang chub sa bon ba sreg mi bya// rdo rje ra ba'i dbang mi gshig/ phyag rgya chen po'i rgyan mi dgrol// mun pa gsal ba'i sgro na mi
347a5(sha): gsad// rdo rje chu bo'i bka' mi bcag/ 'byung ba lnga yi dngas mi bsdu// gzhan la rang gi sngags med thug pa mi gdon// sngags kyi dug mda' khong na sa mi gdon//
347a6(sha): rin po che'i rgya sa mi gshig/ sgyu ma'i phung po'i ro mi be snyil/ bya rgod dkar po'i gshog pa mi bcag/ bya khyung sder mos rgya mtsho'i gting mi dkrug/ rang gi
347a7(sha): zhe sdang lam mi dgag/ sgyu ma snang ba'i sgron mi gsad// gsang dam phyag rgya'i brda mi dgrol// rin po che yi sgron mi gsad// phyi yi dam tshig bsrung bar
347b1(sha): bshad// lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam pa lnga// dang du blangs shing gdams par bshad// 'dun pa gsum gyi bstan pa brtag/ yin pa bzhi yis lhag par brtag/
347b2(sha): lta ba bzhi yi sa nyams stobs ldan// dbang bskur gnyis kyis gtan mi dgrol// gsal ba gsum gyi rang dbang bsdu// lhag pa'i dam tshig lnga ru bshad//
347b3(sha): rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dam tshig gzungs kyi le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnad dgu gzer
347b4(sha): gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sbyor ba sngags kyi 'khor lo mtshon// ga nad dgu thabs ldan gcod dang 'bigs// gsang gsum las kyi mtha' ru bca'// srog
347b5(sha): rten gzer bzhi'i thebs la blangs// bdag nyid kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// ma lus 'dus pa'i khro gnyer can// 'dus pa bzhi yi sbyor ba can//
347b6(sha): gsang ba'i sgron ma brda yis brdeg/ dbang can dregs pa dmod pa'i ba dag/ myos byed pho mo'i lus la gzud// 'dus pa'i thig le yid kyi sa bzung // lus
347b7(sha): kyi ri bo khro gnyer la// lhun po ri rab brtan lhar brjid// khros pa'i yid kyis kun bzlog nas// rang gnas phyag rgya chen po yi// lus la ye shes 'khor lo
348a1(sha): bcas// khro bo 'khor lo nyi ma brtan// gtum chen rnga ma brjid rdo rje 'bar// ya ma kun 'dus rin chen yum// kun 'dus rin chen/
348a2(sha): sgo yi sgo// longs spyod mgrin pa bde lam gnas// bde chen rin chen rgya mdud o// skyed rtsa dgu 'am gsang gnas su// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bde ba lnga/
348a3(sha): khrag 'thung yab yum gzi brjid 'bar// spyi bo gser gyi sgo gnyis dang // dgu mdud 'dus pa'i khung bu dang // thugs ka lag pa g.yas g.yon dang //
348a4(sha): gsang sgo rkang pa g.yas g.yo na gnyis// smin mtshams lhag pa rdo rje'i brda// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bar bcas pa'i// khro rgyal kun gyi thig ler bya//
348a5(sha): dbu la khrag 'thung dbu rgyan lnga// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang ldan// nyi ma'i dkyi la 'khor bcu dang gcig/ khro rgyal kun padag khrag 'thung rje// ga shin
348a6(sha): rje mkha' 'gro yi dgas bdag/ sha za srin po gying srog pa dag/ 'das dang ma 'das kun gyi yab// zhing bcu sdig can kun sgrol mtshon// khro chung sprul
348a7(sha): pa gzer ltar 'khrug/ tshangs pa kun khyab nyi ma can// nyi ma gsang lam 'od stong 'bar// stong gsum gang ba'i 'khor lo 'bar// dgu 'dus
348b1(sha): sdig pa gnas nas 'pho// rten drug gnas sbyangs ya tshogs sdad// rtsa la ma srog dang rlung gis 'byed// byin rlabs bstan pa'i mtshon chas srun// phyag rgya chen
348b2(sha): po'i sems dang ldan// thun mong sems dpa' khyad par can// rtsa bzhi 'byung lnga gnad dgu dbab// drag pos 'phangs la sngags dgu gzer// rgyu rkyen 'joms
348b3(sha): pa'i nyi shu bdu na// las gsum sbyor ba dgu nyid dgu// spyi gcod mtshon cha spu gri me// bdag la 'joms pa gyen la gzud// gzhan gyi sbyor ba rim bzlog bya//
348b4(sha): spyo bldan mam so// rjes kyi zo// phyag rgya mtshon cha'i rgyal po bzlog/ sku cha lugs rgyas pa bzlog/ thugs kyi snying po thig le bzlog/ 'khor lo rgya
348b5(sha): po rim pa bzlog/ rin chen sngags kyi gnad dgu bsdebs// bla gnas rten gyi yul dgu la// sbyor ba gzer gyi sngags dgu dbab// sgo dgu dbye dang tshul dgu'i
348b6(sha): brtag/ gzer dgu gdab pa'i rim dgu bzlog/ sbyor ba gsum yin bzlog pa'i gnad// 'khor lo 'bar na sngags kyi gnad// 'pho zhing g.yo ba med pa'i
348b7(sha): gnad// sbyor ba'i rim pa las kyi gnang // skabs 'dzin chu srin rdo rje'i gnad// rim bsdus gcod pa dang ldan gnad// sbyor ba gsum gyi gnad dgu sdig
349a1(sha): nyungs kar rgyal po snying gzer gnad// nyungs nag stobs ldan klong gzer gnad// ske tshe nyen slong lus sbrid gnad// mi khrag myos pa
349a2(sha): lhad pa'i gnad// rta khrag 'byed pa sems g.yang gnad// khyi khrag gdug pas dbugs sdud gnad// spyan dug mtsho chen rtsad gcod gnad// rag drug me
349a3(sha): 'bar sreg pa'i gnad// dug rgod khrag skyed tshad pa'i gnad// gnad dgu 'dus pas rten 'joms gnad// bla gnas rten dgu'i brda gzugs dgu//
349a4(sha): rkyen dgus bskul la rta dgu 'phang // sgo dgu phye la rten dgu dbab// rdo rje sngags bsdus tsit+ta'i gnad// sku yi sngags bsdus klad pa'i gnad// thugs
349a5(sha): ka'i gzer sngags zhe sdang ga nad// yon tan rdzogs pa longs spyod gnad// gsung gi dri med 'dod chags gnad// las rdzogs gsang ba rgyud gcod
349a6(sha): gnod/ les kyis smrig pa dgu 'dus gnad// gshin rje'i bdud nyid gti mug gcod pa'i gnad// skye med rdo rje rtsa dbugs gcod pa'i gnad/
349a7(sha): rim pa'i dum sbyor ba'i mchog/ gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi dpal dang 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par sreg byed de//
349b1(sha): gong mas 'phen cing 'og mas gcod// de bzhin rim pa kun ldan nas// drag po'i spogs pa'i skabs dang sbyar// las dang 'dren pa'i skabs dang gnyis
349b2(sha): gzhan yang 'khor la spogs pa dang // dgu skor drag po spogs pa'i las// skabs kyis las kyi 'byed par sbyar// stag mo mche sbyar rdo rje rme// seng ge/
349b3(sha): kha thab gnam lcags sdebs// stobs chen drag po'i sbyor tshul can// rdo rje srin po me yi sngags// spogs pa'i skabs su drag po sbyar// drag po sngags
349b4(sha): kyi 'khor lo nyid// rtsa bar bcas pa'i lo ma can// snying po gcig las yan lag rdzogs// sbyor ba bye ba phrag yas pa// bsdus pas stong gnyis
349b5(sha): bcu drug gcig/ gsum dang bzhi lnga drug bdun brgyad// dgu dang bcu dang bcu gcig gnyis// rtse ba gcig la bdun cu gnyis// 'phen pa'i drag sngags
349b6(sha): du mar 'gyur// sbyor ba byed na dpag tu med// bdun brgya nyi shu las kyi skabs// las kyi rgyal po 'khrul 'khor yin// ya bag sha yi sbyor ba ste//
349b7(sha): las ni du ma rtsa ba gcig/ 'das pas mtshon kha me lce yi// dril ba'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba gcig/ brjod pas nges par mi 'jog gcod// 'phreng
350a1(sha): ba sngags kyi sbyor ba nyid// 'phen pa'i snying po dang sa ma rlung // 'phangs pas sman dri 'du ba'i thog/ drag po ma hA'i 'bru nyid
350a2(sha): kyis/ dril ba'i bde ba'i klong nas 'byed// 'gugs pa'i sngags kyi skyob yis// rten gsum sbyor bas dmigs pa 'gugs// lus srog dbang po shes
350a3(sha): rgyud 'brel// bla dang sprul pa yang sbrul 'gugs// yul dbang beste na gsum sgo ru dbye// dbus dang mtshams kyi 'bu ba gnas su// dri ma'i lus la srog
350a4(sha): brdzus la// mu tra dang bcas gzir la gsad// mchog gi las dang gnyis su bya// spro ba gsum dang thim pa gnyis// 'jug pa gnyis kyis rten dgu 'jom
350a5(sha): rgyu bzhi las kyi rnam grangs gsum// tshul gsum dmigs pa 'byed cing 'joms// phyag rgya chen po brtan pa sbyin// bgrod pa gsum gyi lam dang spyad// gnang
350a6(sha): thabs kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsang ba gnad kyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
350a7(sha): kyis rten dang ling ga'i yul 'di bshad do// sbyor ba'i rten la las dbab pa// las chen mchog gi dbye ba ste// sbyor ba kun gyi yul du brtag/ de yis dngos dang
350b1(sha): sbyor ba ni// thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyis// bsgrub byed dmigs dang bcas pa'i yul// bdag gi 'khor lo mthu bcug la// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas//
350b2(sha): byin rlabs 'khor los mthu brtan la// ye shes 'khor los byin gyis rlob// yul la 'jug pa'i sems brtags la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du brtag/ phyi rgyud
350b3(sha): yul la dmigs pa ni// thugs kyi 'phreng ba sbyor ba khri// ming dang bcas la phyag rgyas dgug/ bkra mi shis pa'i thod pa ru// mtshon cha'am rus pa'i thur ma yis//
350b4(sha): rgyu rkyen drug blangs dbang po gzir// re ba zhabs ma 'khor nag dril// dbang po bsdams la zil gyis gnan// zhag gsum gzir la ling ka bca'// snying
350b5(sha): kha dpral bar byang khram gdags// bcu gnyis sor gzugs dbang po thod// lag pa snying kha rid la gnag/ dug chu tsha ba khrag gis bsku// sngags kyis gzi re zhing
350b6(sha): be chen bca'// 'khor lo dbus dang mtshams dag tu// 'dod pa'i gzugs dgu dang ling ka bzhag/ ming gi dang pos bskul la bskyed// las kyi pho nya yang yang rbad/
350b7(sha): bskul tshig dang bcas shes pa dgug/ kun ma dud pas lha dang dbye// bdag gi dbang bsdu gzhan dbang dbrog/ lang ka'i gnas su dbang po bsdu// sngags dang mtshon//
351a1(sha): cha'i thams la blang // sngags kyi sbyor ba dkrug cing gsad// ling ga dang bcas 'khor lo dril// byang du bcug la dbang po gzir// thod
351a2(sha): par bcug la mtshon cha bskyed// spyi brtag stobs kyis gnan pa bya// bla sems mtshon dang chags pa'i brten// phyi yi ling ka mtshon par bshad// de bzhin nang/
351a3(sha): gi ling ka ni// dud 'gro'i lus la dbang po la// gnas lngar byang khram mtshon skud gdags// rkyen lnga sngags bcas dbang por brtag/ tsit+ta'i dkyil du srog bsdus
351a4(sha): la// 'pho ba gsum gyi rten dang bcas// sngags kyi 'od dang zer 'phros pas// drag po'i gnas su gan rgyal gzhag/ sngags dang pho nyas bla bkug la// lha dang /
351a5(sha): phye la drag sngags dkrug/ gzugs la mtshon brdeg dbang po 'pho// yan lag bcas la bstab par bya// tsit+ta phyung la gnan pa bya// rgyu rkyen dgongs pa snga ma
351a6(sha): bzhin// rten 'brel 'pho ba ming dang bcas// nang gi ling ka rten par bshad// de bzhin gsang ba'i ling ka ni// bdag nyid chen po dbang sgyur ni// rgyu ni
351a7(sha): bcud kyi dngas ma bdun// rkyen ni 'du 'phrod g.yo dang bskyod// 'bras bu las dang grub pa'i gzugs// dbang po srog gzungs rang gis 'brel// gdug pa rang
351b1(sha): bcas gsad pa'i rten// de la yul gyi dmigs pa bca'// rtsa sgo sbubs dang bcas pa ru// 'byung ba dngas ma'i snying po gnas// rtsa sbubs bzhi la drag po'i sngags//
351b2(sha): mdud pa gcod pa'i spu gris brgyan// drag sngags 'od zer nang nas 'phro// 'phen pa dbugs kyi sngags kyis 'phang // shes rgyud rtsa sgo srog rgyun gcod// 'byung
351b3(sha): ba bslang dang de bzhin dkrug/ rtsa gcad shes pa gcig tu bsdu// dngas snyigs phye la rten dang dpral// thod pa snying po ming bcas bri// sngags kyi 'od zer bskal
351b4(sha): zhing spro// 'byung bzhi bcu drug bcu gnyis brgyud// bzhi gnyis dbus kyi pho brang nas// yul dang shes pa spro ba yi// rang dang shes pa bskul zhing dgug
351b5(sha): ba dud dang gshin rje'i ki ka tshogs// rang dam snying pos rang la bsdus// mchod pa stabs la rag+ha brlab// spyug glu blangs la dung khrag sbreng // nyes legs dbang
351b6(sha): gzugs gdung ba blang // dun ting ka yi sngags brjod la// dmigs pa'i yul la gshin rje rbad// sbyor ba'i sngags dang gshin rje yis// gsang la ma sgo dgu
351b7(sha): gnas phye la// dbang po dgu yi rten phyung la// zhing bcu sdig can dmigs pa'i yul// dbang po rnam shes bkrag mdangs bsdu// sngags pa rgyal blo na
352a1(sha): stobs can gyi// lus la gdug pa'i srog bsdus la// bdud sgo gsang ba'i lam nas zhugs// gdug pa sgra yi 'khor lo brtag/ rtsa gsum
352a2(sha): dbus kyi srog shing la// g.yas na chags pa las kyi 'bru// g.yon na sdud pa srog gi rten// dbus na ming gi dbang po gnas// rtsa bzhi dngas ma'i sbubs bzhi
352a3(sha): na// rang gshed krI krA lta bzhi 'bar// mdud pa bzhi la gcod pa yi// spu gri mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// si ra brgyad dbus srin mo'o// gcod dang gnon pa'i mtshon
352a4(sha): cha'o// rtswa bran sbubs dang nang khrol lnga// yab yub bdud srin stobs dpag med// 'degs drang sman gyi rtsa sgo ru// sa dang chu yi snying po bstan// 'degs
352a5(sha): bskyod drod kyi rtsa sge ru// me dang rlung gi snying po brtag/ srog sgo tsit+ta'i rtse mo la// tsha grang las kyis 'joms pa'o// de dag gsang ba'i ling gar bshad/
352a6(sha): gsang ba lte ba snying mgrin dang // sha khrag rus khrag dbugs rus pa// klad pa ga ser gyi sgo dgu na// ra tsa khrag sbal lcags sdig pa// nri dang ra ga ya ma ha/
352a7(sha): snying po bskyod dang drod ya ra la// chags dang rte na las khrag tu gzhu// bkug la srog bsdu snying khar gzhug/ khrag sbal ba zhu la rgyu bzhi pastim// me mar gsad la
352b1(sha): mgrin par bsdu// sbyor ba bzhi bzhi bcu drug dkrug/ dngas ma thig le ya la bsdu// tshangs pa gser gyi sgo nas dbyung // thun mong sems dpa'i phyag rgyar bskyed//
352b2(sha): yid la dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// phyag rgya chen po'i brten pa sbyin// thig le byang chub bde lam bgrod// dman pa'i lus la gnad gzer dbab// kun 'dus
352b3(sha): sdigs pa'i khams dang sbyar// shes pa bral na stod cing khyer// ga nad dgu mi gnad 'joms sdad yin// gnas rab 'byongs pa'i thabs dang sbyar// bdu /
352b4(sha): srin sha za ki kaM ba kye// pho brang thod khar bcug la gdab// brnag pa kun gyi snying po bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi lto bar gzhug/ mi g.yo chos nyid phyag rgyas
352b5(sha): gzir// brda gzugs mtshan ma'i rten la bstim// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // ma mo bdud mo srin mor bcas// sha za gnod sbyin ki kaM gi/ 'khor
352b6(sha): lo rdo rje srin po'i bdag/ ma lus rten gyi rgyu la gnas// khyams khang dur khrod mtsho gling du// spu gri bAr dang mtshan mo la// pho mos las kyi sbyor ba rten//
352b7(sha): rten la rang gnas rgyud la tshang // g+hu ma ra tsA pa ma'i klong // b+h+ya D+hag+ha g+ha ha baM dza/ b+h+rUMk+Sha p+lug+d+ha sh+tsa/ sI rA r+ya log g+hA drAg+d+ha/ yul gyi dmigs brten la N+yar/
353a1(sha): bde ba'i gnas dang sprad pa yi// yul dang rten la rgyus brla bshad// rgyu la mtshan mu long gi rgyud las yul la brtag pa'i le'u
353a2(sha): zhi / denas bcom ldan 'dus sa chos nyid mi 'gyur ba'i don 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal gas sems
353a3(sha): yi// ngang nyid chos sku byang chub sems// ma g.yos bde che na thig le'u sku// sku gtsog mi g.yo cir yang snang // khyab gsal bde chen 'gyur med dang // /
353a4(sha): sna tshogs ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// lhun grub phyag rgya cir yang gsal// thabs kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro don mdzad// zug rngu mi mnga' cir yang dgongs//
353a5(sha): mtshan dang dpe byad tshad las 'das// rig pa'i rgyal po longs spyod sku// sna tshogs sgyu ma sprul pa'i sku// phyi rgyud dag pa'i sku ru bshad// rtse
353a6(sha): 'dus thag le chos kyi sku// si ra gang gsal longs spyod rdzogaso// 'phro 'du sbyor len sprul pa'i sku// nang rgyud dag pa'i sku ru bshad// byang chub
353a7(sha): bde ba chos kyi sku// pad+mar bde spros longs spyod sku// snang srid 'khor lo rim drug spros// thabs rigs don byas sprul pa'i sku// slar 'dus thig le bde/
353b1(sha): sgra// gnyis su med pa byang chub sgra// romanyam mi ga shig rdo rje'i sgra// thabs dang shes rab phyug cu'i m+b+ha// thams cad yongs rdzogs khyab gsapa
353b2(sha): skye// gsang ba thabs kyi sku ru bshad// dus gsum 'gyur ba med pa nas// bde ba'i rgyal po sngon shar kyang // dge bcu ma yengs rgyun mi gau ts+tshad//
353b3(sha): thabs kyi rgyal po 'di bshad do// dus gsum mnyam nyid brdal ba yi// rig pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems// snang srid chos rnams kun gyi gzhi//
353b4(sha): sna tshogs ngos gzung med par bshad// rgyu med 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// chags sdang la sogs lam gyi brgyan// sems las ma byung sangs
353b5(sha): rgyas gtso// ye shes myu gu dbus mtha' rdzogs// lung med man ngag yang gsang mchog/ khyab gsal dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs yin// thams
353b6(sha): cad sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor rdzogs// g.yo ba med pa'i rgyus thebs na// sangs rgyas kun pas bgres pa'o// zla ba mnyam rdzogs
353b7(sha): 'gyur med pa shad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ chos nyid gtan la zabab pa'i le'u b+he nyi shu lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom
354a1(sha): ldan 'das kyis khyad par gyi thun gyis gsad pa 'di bshad do// khro bo rgyal po dregs pa yi// sku las sprul te sbyor ba ston// dur khrod
354a2(sha): sa la khru gang ba'i// dkyil 'khor nag po thod 'phreng dang // dur khrod rgyan drang me ri bya// dbus su ya las bskyed pa yi// gshin rje nag po bdud
354a3(sha): kyi gzugs// zhal gsum phyag drug ma he ro// yum dang bdud mo 'khyud pa'i tshul// mon pa'i thod par don khrag dang // lug nag ra ro don khrag blugs/
354a4(sha): brnag pa'i gzugs dang ming yang gzhug/ srog bskul thun dab pa las gzhan dbapa// snying po'i sbyor ba ngang gis drang // yon tan rdzogs pa dbu ru bzhag
354a5(sha): dbyangs kyi dang po nye ba ru// sgra yi dang po las can la// 'og nas drug pa'i gsum pas 'brel// steng nas o yis brgyan pa'o// drag pa'i dang po lnga pa'i
354a6(sha): mtha' ma nye// gsum pa'i gsum pa os steng brgyan// lnga pa'i mtha' ma e dang ldan// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ u sha'i gsum pa drug pa'i
354a7(sha): gsum pa yang dag 'brel// de la os brgyan dang po'i gsum pa nye// lnga pa'i mtha' ma drug pa'i gsum pa dang // drug pa'i dang po drug pa'i gsum pa la//
354b1(sha): rdzu ba'o gsam pas 'og nas can/ bzhi ba'i gsum pas yang dag 'brel/ gnyis sa thos la gsum pa'o// gnyis pas 'oganas su sis brgyan/
354b2(sha): de la gsum pa'i mas 'brel// 'og tu lnga pa'i gsum pa la// 'bya ma ha yis brgyan pa'o// bskul tshig dang bcas brten la dbab// rnga ma tshig lus
354b3(sha): bskyod drag tu brab// ri rgyal rbab chen dril ba bzhin// smod pa'i rgyal po 'di bshad do// gsung gi sprul pa dregs pa'i las// thun gyi dbang po lus 'joms pa//
354b4(sha): dur khrod gdug pa'i dben gnas su// grog mkhar sa dmar ba yi lci// ro sregs la khru do rtsig/ khrag dang dug gi chag chag gdab// thal chen re ga dbus
354b5(sha): mthing nag/ thod pa dgu 'phreng sgo 'khor lo// dkyil 'khor dmar nag khrag mtsho can// gtor ma sha chen gsur dang khrag/ mi rtar khrag dug nyungs kar/
354b6(sha): thod tshal blugs la thun du dpag/ gri thod nang du ling ga gzhug/ gug rgyal chus bkru rab gnas bya// thun dbab lus bskyod gsur chen btang // dbus
354b7(sha): su khro bo'i sku bskyed la// la las zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog dmar po khrag gis brgyan// g.yon na sngo nag 'jig tshul 'khyud// rngam tshig
355a1(sha): ldan pa'i thug ka nas// 'od zer 'phro 'du nyi ma'i tshul// de yi 'phreng ba 'di lta ste// yon tan rdzogs pa dbu ru bzhag/ drug pa'i
355a2(sha): dngos po lnga pa'i mtha' mas sbyar// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// sgra yi dang po gsum pas ga nan// u sha'i gnyis pa lnga pa'i mtha'// o steng gsum
355a3(sha): pa'i mtha' mas gnan// rjes su gsum pa'i dang po'o// lnga pa'i gsum pa lnga pa'i mtha' steng mdzes// drug pa'i gsum pa li steng drug pa'i mtha' ma
355a4(sha): gnan// gsum pa'i dang po drug pa'i gsum pas ug/ sgra yi dang po gsum pas 'brel// de 'og lnga pa'i mtha' ma la// gsum pa'i mtha' mas
355a5(sha): 'og nas brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pas ming dang 'brel// de 'og drug pa'i gnyis pas brtan// rjes su gsum pa'i gnyis pa la// us brgyan gsum
355a6(sha): pa'i mtha' mas brgya ni// de 'og drug pa'i gsum pa la// lnga pa'i gsum pas 'og tu 'brel// gsum pa'i gsum pas yang mnan pa'o// de 'og gsum
355a7(sha): pa'i dang po la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// sgra yi dang po gsum pas gnan// drug pa'i gsum pa sgra yi dang po'i gsum pas gnan// 'og tu
355b1(sha): u sha'i dang po'o// de 'og gong bzhin bod pa'o// lnga pa'i mtha' ma o yis brgyan// sgra yi po gnyis pa dang // drug pa'i gnyis pas brkyang pa'o// de 'og
355b2(sha): gsum pa'i gnyis pa la// u sa mdzes gsum pa'i mtha' mas mnan// drug pa'i gsum pa lnga pa'i gsum pas 'brel// de la gsum pa'i gsum pas mnan//
355b3(sha): de 'og lnga pa'i gsum bas gnyis// steng du o o 'og tu b+h+ya ma hA yis mdzes// gsum gi 'phreng ba bcud dril nas// drag po'i thun dbab lam du gzhug/ bskul
355b4(sha): tshig dang bcas mtha' ru sbyar// tho na nas bdag bsrun gzhan dbang 'phrog/ mngag pa gsung gi las su bshad// gab pa thugs kyi drag po'i thun// g.yul ba
355b5(sha): sa la maN+Da la bya// dbus su dpal gyi gtor ma bzhag/ ba ling bcud kyi gzhal yas su// ya las gshin rje nag po'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yum dang
355b6(sha): bcas// g.yas pa dung chen thod khrag g.yon// glang chen stag dang dur khrod sprul// thugs khar nyi zla'i snying po sngags// bsnyen pa sa ya 'phro 'du thim//
355b7(sha): ga shin rje ma mo dbang bsdus la// gtor ma nang du 'gying bag rnga ma// me 'bar du ba 'gyur ldeg khol// rtags dang sbyar la ba ling bsngo// bsdu ba gsum gyi brtan
356a1(sha): pa bya// de nas brnag pa'i rten dang rdzas// gri khrag khyi khrag rta nag khrag/ sna tshogs dug dang nyungs kar gyis// nad dang mtshon cha'i char du
356a2(sha): 'bebs// sna tshogs sha za mi mthun zugs// gtor mar thun dbab brnag pa'i khams// rgyud la nad dang dal du 'bebs// mi mthun myos dang dbang po 'chal//
356a3(sha): smyo 'bog mdze shu rims su 'bebs// drag tu bskul zhing yul la rbad// dmigs pa'i rtsa dang srog rgyun gcod// bla dang bag chags bkug cing 'tshang // shes rgyun dran
356a4(sha): pi myos shing skyems// thon nas rlangs 'phro gtor ma 'phang // dur khrod mchod khang lha rten gnas// skra bcings chas 'god gsur dud btang // gling bu bus la skyug pa
356a5(sha): bod// de yi sbyor ba thugs kyi bcud// dbu ru yon tan rtogs pa gzhag/ de 'og u sha'i mtha' ma la// 'og tu drug pa'i gsum pa 'brel// dbyangs kyi bzhi pas steng
356a6(sha): ru brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i dang po 'og tu 'brel// dbyangs kyi gsum pas steng du brgyan// drug pa'i dang po lnga pa'i mtha' mas te//
356a7(sha): rjes su drug pa'i gsum pa la// gnyis pa'i mtha' mas 'og tu 'brel// steng du is brgyan nga yis gnan// de 'og gsum pa'i mtha' ma la// 'og tu u sa brgyan mtha'
356b1(sha): mas gnan// 'og tu gnyis pa'i bzhi pa gnyis// mtshams su 'dod pa'i ming dang sbyar// spu gri gong dang mthun par sbyar// srog la rbad rbad thun b+h+yo zhes// dbab dang /
356b2(sha): 'phang ba'i sbyor ba ni// chu bo rlung chen 'bab pa dang // ri rgyal rbab chen 'dril ba dang // gser gyi gu thog brgyab pa ltar// dmigs pa'i yul dang dbang po 'joms// /
356b3(sha): lus la shes pa'i dngas snyigs 'byed// mgo dang tsit+ta phung po 'gas// snying khrag klad khrag drangs shing za// myos pa srog dang 'bral bas na// thabs kyi rgyal po
356b4(sha): mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan ma long gi rgyud las/ sbyor ba thun gyi le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drod rtags
356b5(sha): 'di bshad do// bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa'i skabs rnams su// drod rtags phyi nang gsang ba gsum// de bzhin bsnyen bsgrub yan lag gsum// kun 'grub rtsa ba
356b6(sha): gcig dang bcas// rtags kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// dang por ltas kyi so ba ni// bdag nyid phyag rgya 'bar ba dang // chos sku'i 'od zer gsal ba drang // rang
356b7(sha): sems mi g.yo nyams dang ldan// 'od 'bar sku yi thon pa dang // nyams stobs ldan zhing dbang po gsal// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams// snga na med pa'i
357a1(sha): rnam pa myong // nyon mongs shes pa yul la 'bar// rang dbang med par 'tshig cing rdeg/ 'dod pa'i yul la shin tu 'tshig/ sngags rnams gsal
357a2(sha): zhing 'bar zhing 'dril// blo ni mi g.yo don bzhin 'joms// lce lkog tshal g.ya' ba dang // dpral ba'i dkyil nas kha yi rtsa// 'brum bu phra mos khengs pa dang // lus
357a3(sha): la 'du ba'i nad med cing // kha zas ro dang bde ba myong // rdul dang thims thibs shes pa rags// khong khro dregs shing dbang po rno// lus la drod dang g.yo ba'i rlung //
357a4(sha): skad cig sngags dang 'od la 'bar// bde ba'i dum bu snying las lta// bsnyen pa drod kyi rtags su bshar// 'od dang du ba rlung sgra 'brug/ thog dang ser ba bu yug 'tshub
357a5(sha): 'khor lo 'gyur dang thod pa 'char// ro dom 'chol dang me 'bar ltag/ rgod dang klung dang spyugs pa 'bod// sgrub khang g.yo zhing 'tsheg la 'gyur// yams dang dal rgya
357a6(sha): bu yug rlob// bya dang gcan gzan 'thab cing 'khor// sku dang phyag rgya mngon du gsal// rten pa'i rdzas la si d+hi 'bebs// sgrub pa drod kyi rtags su bshad// khams
357a7(sha): gsum bdag po ma lus pa// phyag 'tshal bskor zhing mchod pa dang // bdag gis 'jig rten dbang sdud dang // khams gsum byo bzlog byed pa dang // gcan gzan
357b1(sha): bdag sgo srun pa dang // nyi zla 'gag tu 'char ba dang // mi 'bying chu la 'gro ba dang // mtshon cha zas su za ba dang // me yi 'khor lo bskyed pa dang // rgya mtsho chen
357b2(sha): po bskyil ba dang // rgyal blo na pha ma slob dpon dang // khyi dang gcan gzan mang po kun// byis pa'i sems can rigs mi mthun// de dag mngag pa'am pho nyar
357b3(sha): 'khol// dngos mi mthun pa'i srog chags rnams// rang rang cha byad 'dzin pa yis// ji bzhin de bzhin gzugs ston pa// dngos dang sprul pa'i pho nya ste//
357b4(sha): gzhan yang go chas lus brgyan dang // dmag dpon byed dang dgra 'gug dang // mtshon cha lag na 'bar ba dang // gru dang glang po zhon pa dang // gdugs dang rgyal
357b5(sha): mtshan sgra sgrogs dang // rin chen 'dogs dang rdo rje gsor// rjes su mthun par bskul ba dang // nyams dang rtag par ston pa rnams// drod rtags las la sbyor
357b6(sha): par bshad// g.yag dang sha pa ri dag sa kun// ma lus dngos dang mi mthun gzugs// spa byid 'dogs dang gsod pa dang // sha la longs spyod 'dod la rol//
357b7(sha): gsul 'gyed mtshon rdeg grong khyer bshig/ dngos su za zhing rol pa rnams// gsad pa mchog gi drod rtags bshad// bya spre khyi phag glang lug sprul// 'dod
358a1(sha): chags zhe sdang gti mug rgya la// rA dza ya ma skabs dang sbyar// bsnyen dang nye bar bsgrub pa dang // sbyor dang rtags kyi dmigs rtag sa la/
358a2(sha): phyi nang gsang dang gnad bor bas// srog dbrog gzir dang shis yi// bla dang spu la dang yang sprul la// skabs dang sbyar nas 'jug pa ni// drod rtags gtan la dbang/
358a3(sha): par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rtags kyi le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje
358a4(sha): gshed kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la bstod pa'i yon tan 'di bshad do// e ma ho/ chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// ma g.yos thugs rje chen
358a5(sha): po bsam mi khyab// ma skyes skye med chos dbyings dag pa la// skye ba'i cho 'phrul sras mchog gshin rje gshed// 'gag med bde klong thugs rje'i thabs
358a6(sha): kyis rol// mi g.yo mnyam rdzogs sba la sku bsam mi khyab// che ba'i yon tan mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// yon tan lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i sku la 'dud// e ma
358a7(sha): ho/ che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa dang // ngang gis khro bar bstan pa 'di lta bu// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral nas smin pa'i mchog/ rin chen pad+ma rgya mtshe lhun ltar
358b1(sha): brjid// gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog ga shin rje gshed// skye dang bcas pa'i gzugs bsgral mtshon dpag dka'// thugs kyi sprul pa khams gsum
358b2(sha): nyi ma'i 'od// bde ba chen po mnyam pa'i sku la 'dud// e ma ho/ dang po nyid nas gsang ba kun shes nas// rig pa gsum ldan ga pa dgu yi ga nas// sbyor ba
358b3(sha): gsum gyis yang dag pa sdus nas 'phen// bla med mchog la don gnyis bsdus nas len// nam mkha' rin chen 'bar byed cing // dus gsum 'jig rten
358b4(sha): mnyam pa'i sku// ma lus bstan pa'i snying po don// stong phrag bdun dang brgya phrag lnga// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po mchog la 'dud// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu
358b5(sha): kun nas 'dus pa yi// ye shes rgyal po thig le 'di// gsang chen rmad du byung ba 'di// rgyu 'bras la sa la zhen pa la// 'phrul gyi snying po rno pa la mtshon//
358b6(sha): kam pa'i spu gri so le ma// rdo rje bo tshon sdigs mdzub chu// bzhi dang yang bzhi rdzogs la 'dud// e ma ho/ 'gro ba las kyi myos pa yis// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i
358b7(sha): sems can rnams// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa yi// ma skyes gdod nas rnam par dag/ ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma lus chos kyi dbyings//
359a1(sha): don dam spros pa kun las 'das// ye shes rgyal po rdzogs la 'dud// e ma ho/ phyogs bcu dus gsum snang srid kun gyi gzhi// skye med
359a2(sha): g.yo 'gul ba de dang sdug/ bcu dang bzhi sogs sdig pa can// las dang shugs kyis 'khyams pa'i 'byung dang rten dbang bzhi// lnga dang drug brgyad gnyis bsdus
359a3(sha): nas// sdud pa ma la gcod pa yi// gsung bcud len pa'i mchog la 'dud// e ma ho/ dug gsum ai yi pho brang du// khams gsum mchog gi las bsdus
359a4(sha): nas// srid gsum ga nad kyi sa gdung ba yi// 'gro ba las kyis mi khom pa// phung po rdo rje rtsa dang sa ma// snyigs ma'i 'dod lha mnyes mchog skong // ma yengs
359a5(sha): goms pa'i las dang sprad// las kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dud// e ma ho/ 'gug pa 'gug dang bkug nas 'gugs// sgrol zhing sgrol la sgrol mchog bsgral//
359a6(sha): sbyong zhing skyong la gnas sbyang sbyong// grol nas sbyangs pas gnam thob rdzogs// o gyi ye shes las byung bas// sku dang rigs dang ye shes rdzogs// ya yi ye shes
359a7(sha): las byung ba// don dang rang gi mtshan nyid rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// sgrol sbyor sdud dang phyag rgya rdzogs// ma yi ye shes las byung ba// bde ba sdud
359b1(sha): pa'i yon tan rdzogs// ta yi ye shes las byung ba// thugs rjes sgrol ba'i chags pa rdzogs// k+She yi ye shes las byung ba// snang dang bskyod pa'i 'phrin las
359b2(sha): rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// sreg dang smin pa'i drod dbang rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes la se byung ba// khams gsum gsal ba'i nyi ma rdzogs//
359b3(sha): sa yaM ye shes las byung ba// dri la thogs med dbang po rdzogs// lto yi ye shes las byung ba// dngas ma sdud pa'i yon tan rdzogs// ru yi ye shes las byung ba//
359b4(sha): ro rnams rgyas dang gsal ba rdzogs// na yi ye shes las byung ba// stobs chen drag pos 'joms pa rdzogs// yo yi ye shes las byung ba// sku dang cha byad
359b5(sha): dregs pa rdzogs// na yi ye shes las byung ba// dus gsum mi g.yo mnyam pa rdzogs// ra yi ye shes las byung ba// tshor ba dri yis 'joms pa rdzogs//
359b6(sha): ya yi ye shes las byung ba// ro mchog 'dod ldan bde ba rdzogs// tsa yi ye shes las byung ba// spyan dang ldan pa'i gsal ba rdzogs// na yi ye shes las
359b7(sha): byung ba// bla dang ldan pa'i dbang po rdzogs// hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba// sdud pa dbyings su thim pa rdzogs// dza yi ye shes las byung ba// 'gugs shing
360a1(sha): rang dbang 'dren pa rdzogs// phaT kyi ye shes byung ba// mngag pa las kyi pho nya rdzogs// sngags kyi yon tan bsam dpag dka'/
360a2(sha): 'dren pa las kyi sbyor 'phreng gcig/ nus pa phye na du mar 'dren// yon tan du ma e ka thogs// rgyal po 'bru thus gser gyi 'bru// yon tan rdzogs pas seng ge
360a3(sha): 'dren// sbyor ba khra sbyang kyo pa ta// 'phreng sngags rin chen ming bcas yul// dbang sdud phyag rgya stobs dbang 'phrogs// rten pa'i snying po tshong chen brda//
360a4(sha): ma chung mtha' gcod spu gri sba// mda' thogs 'khor lo ral gri zer// stobs chen sa gzhi ri rab brtag/ 'byung ba'i rdo rje las sna tshogs// sha za srin
360a5(sha): po las dbang sdud// sngags kyi 'phreng ba brjod ming bca'// 'byed pa'i tshul gsum las mtha' rdzogs// sbyor ba'i skyobs chen dpag tu med//
360a6(sha): phyi rgyud gzugs brnyan 'khor lo la// rgyu rkyen thabs kyi yon tan rdzogs// rtswa rgyud nang gi 'khor lo la// dengs la 'dus pa'i yon tan rdzogs// gsang ba
360a7(sha): dbyings kyi 'khor lo la// lam dang thabs kyi yon tan rdzogs// lhun gyis grub pa'i 'khor lo la// snod bcud 'jig rten 'byung ba rdzogs// rten 'brel
360b1(sha): srid pa'i 'khor lo la// khams dang skya ma chad dbang po rdzogs// dkar dmar brda yi 'khor lo la// dab dang byin rlabs skyong bgrod rdzogs// sman pa yul gyi
360b2(sha): 'khor lo la// rno sbal sngags dang mtshon cha rdzogs// ru sbal gdug pa'i 'khor lo la// ma lus gso 'joms yon tan rdzogs// mnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo la//
360b3(sha): snying po bsdus don rab tu rdzogs// rkyen dang thabs kyi 'khor lo la// 'brel pa gsum gyi yon tan rdzogs// yon tan rin chen rgya mtshor bshad// rgyal mtshan ma
360b4(sha): khong gi rgyud las/ 'khor lo chen po la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi shan pas
360b5(sha): ka sad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang por mos pa'i sa phyogs su// dur khrod rgyan dang zhing bshams la// dpe' bo don snying khrag dang sha// shu
360b6(sha): chen gtor ma du chen gsur// gshin rje sku dang thod pa'i go zugs// stegs bu gru bzhi dbus drag po// 'brub lung rtsang dang rgyu rkyen drug/ bcas la sku yi
360b7(sha): bsnyen pa 'bum// thon nas las kyi bsnyen pa bya// sa ya'i grangs la ra gug pa 'bum// zhing lpags gdan la khro bo'i sku// rgyan dang byin rlabs dbang bskur
361a1(sha): bstan// mchod bstod la sogs gsang sngags dang // las kyi ya ma 'bum sde yang // gshed po lto 'phyang sku la bsdu// gtso dang gsheshad po
361a2(sha): 'du ba yang // tsit+ta'i gsang ba'i zla dkyil nas// ya ma glu las khro bar bya// rin po che yi steng sgo nas// gsang lam pa thag rtsa ba rgyud pas// bcu bdun snying po
361a3(sha): 'od du 'phro// dus gsum gshin rje thugs khar thim// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// slar 'dus sgo gsum bag chags sbyangs// bde gshegs sku dang gnyis med
361a4(sha): brtan// sku dang ye shes gong bur bstan// grangs kyi tshad mthon pa dang // ya dang ma las rno dang myur// lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// srog gcod gshin rje lto
361a5(sha): 'phyang dang // ma mo gtum mo thal mdog ma// 'bum sde 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// nus pa lus dang bcas pa yi// tsit+ta'i snying po dngas ma bkrug/ khro bo
361a6(sha): dbang du bka' nyan 'dus// thod pa'i gzugs brnyan rten la bstim// lus kyi dbang po gzhag la rtsub// lto 'phyang mgrin pa yangs la rnga ma// yan lag rags la gdug
361a7(sha): pas brgyan// zhal gcig mche ba gtsigs shing bzhad// kham na ga ral pa thod sbul brgyan// mchi ma kha chu rak+ta dug/ g.yas g.yon me rlung 'khrug pa yi// rtsibs
361b1(sha): stong ldan pa'i 'khor lo rnams// thugs kha ra gdug pa'i rims nad bskyed// sku la g.yang gzhi thod sbrul stag/ gtum mo smug nag dug hrul gyon// zod sbrul gyen du skra
361b2(sha): brdzes ma// phyag na 'khor lo ba dan pa snams// dug gi rlangs pa nad kyi sprin// mtsho 'khrug pho mo'i dbus na 'gying // ya ba yu ma phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang
361b3(sha): drod dang ldan pas na// sbyor ba drag po'i las la 'jug/ gang rung thod pa kha sbyor la// steng 'og thod pa 'khor lo bri// dang por gtsang mas thod pa bkru// skams
361b4(sha): la sme ba lnga yis byug/ rten drug rdzas kyi thang pa bya// tsha ba gsum dang dug chus gnan// de'ang gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// gnag tsha gdug pa'i khrag dang dug/ g.yas
361b5(sha): pa'i mchog chen thu ra ma sa bri// yang na gas pa'i smyu ga ma sa bri// rang gi dbang po sa sbyor ba bsda ma// dang po mu khyud gsum du bskor// lte bar gru gsum o dang
361b6(sha): ya/ mu khyud dang po 'khru la mig brgyad// phyogs bzhi'i dang por 'jug pa ma// ga nas gsum rnal ma ra ra tsa ba dun// mtshams su gru gsum nri dang ming // phyi rim
361b7(sha): 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// g.yas phyogs rnal ma'i bkor phyogs su// ting rmugs kha rag shrI de ma du ma ra ma ya rbad/ yab yum snying po sbyor ba ni// bsad ci
362a1(sha): mnan pa mtha' yis bod// gyi rim bcu drug yang logs la// 'khor lo rgyu gram ral gri bsnol// mtshon chen dbus na gsad pa dang // gnan
362a2(sha): par sbyor ba'i sngags rnams gnas// 'bum tsho bzhi ru gsad la sbyar// thod mkhar rten sbyor khri tsho gcig/ rko bstong ste gnon pa brgya// 'khor lo bar du sten pa'i ming //
362a3(sha): gro ga dag la khrag gis bri// gsod pa par sbyar bcar// 'og ma g.yon bskor sngags rnams bzlog/ ming nus thod pa dar gyis gril// dbye dgug gsad pa'i sbyor ba
362a4(sha): bya// sngags kyi sbyor ba'i lus gcig la// yan lag 'dod pa bzhin du brdeg// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs ye shes rnam pa las rdzogs 'a
362a5(sha): bton to// oM yo ma rA dza d+hAn ti rmugs kha rag shrI da ma du ma ra ma ya hUM dz+nyA dz+nyA/ oM ya ma rA dza dun ti rmugs kha rag shrI dai ma dzu ma ra ya rbad/ u mu ka nI A kaR+sha ya hUM dz+dza
362a6(sha): a mu ka srog mA ra ya rbad/ oM a mu ka srog snyam pa ya nanA/ dang po'i sbyor ba'i gzhan du gra nas// 'khrul 'khor sbyor bas gsad pa ste// yab yum 'dus pa'i pho brang
362a7(sha): na// bskul ba'i gshed kyi snying po dbyung // mtshon cha'i rgyal po gcod pa'i mnga'// bcu 'dun sngags kyi lus po la// 'bru lnga gcod pa me dang 'dra// mtshams
362b1(sha): su a mu ka la bsdu// ting 'dzin stobs kyis gzhu ba dungs la// sbyor ba gsum gyi ga nad kyis 'phen// 'bru lnga 'dod pa'i stobs kyis ga nan// ga nan pa'i sa ni ga nyan
362b2(sha): po 'am/ bka' rten rab ga nas ro khang du// khru do khro bo stobs kyis gnan// dur khrod g.yam pa gru bzhi la// rgya gram 'khor lo ri rab bri// nam mkha'i phyogs nas
362b3(sha): 'khor lo gnas// pho brang ri rab 'byung ba'i stobs// las kyi rdo rje dang bcas bskyed// bar du brgya stong khri yis g.yo// gsad pa mchog la sbyar bar bshad//
362b4(sha): rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ las kyi gshin rje nag po yab yum gyis gzer te gtad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom
362b5(sha): ldan 'das kyis gshin rje de'i yang 'khor bdud gso dbyed nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod dben pa'i sa phyogs su// man+tal dug dang khrag gis byu ga
362b6(sha): lug gam mon pa yang na rta// gri ru gsad pa'i snying sbram la// rgya shog sngags kyi sbyor bas dril// phyi rim bzlas pa'i snying po sa bri// sngon po'am mthing nag
362b7(sha): dur khro da ra// snying gi sbyor pa ches bya sa la// mtshon sna lnga yi dra ba ra gzhug/ g.ya ga ru dang bcas dbus su gzhag/ g.yas su gshin rje'i gtor ma ste/
363a1(sha): bdud kyi gtor ma gru gsum la// nag po'i snying snas brgyan pa g.yon// rgya shug dang bsres gsur chen gtang // rang lus gshin
363a2(sha): rje'i skur bsgoms la// sngon du 'gro ba 'bum du bzlas// tho na nas bdud sgrub byed dus su// man+dal nub tu drag po'i nas// khru gang brkos la skyer tsher bstan//
363a3(sha): du ra khrod sol bas nag por byug/ 'og tu dung chen gling bzhi la// rdzas kyi sbyor ba gong bzhin byug/ sted du khram gyi thod pa la// rdzas kyi sbyor ba de bzhin las//
363a4(sha): nag po tshogs pa'i khrag gis byug/ dbus su rdo rje rgya gram ya// lte ba drag po a yi gnas// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// steng la ri rab mtha'
363a5(sha): mar ldan// 'og gi mtha' mar drag pa'i ga nas// gru gsum lnga la ming rus bri// 'og ma'i phyi ru me rlung 'bru// steng ma'i phyi ru na na zhes bskor// dri ma
363a6(sha): dradrug gi ling ka la// ra khra ga ming yang ldan pa ra gzhug/ 'khor lo thod pa'i ba ra du gzhug/ kha sbyar nang nas thun rdzas bra ba// steng du bdud kyi gzugs brnyan
363a7(sha): gzhag/ de la sku bskyed nag la khros// snu ma la rab tu 'tsher bag che// spyi ba tsongs 'od nag thod du bcings// g.yas su spu gri khram shing g.yon// 'od
363b1(sha): ga nag gos dang 'ja' tshon brgyan// rlung nag tshub ma'i steng na gnas// yum dang srin mo'i bu mo ni// dmar nag mchi ma khrag tu 'dzag/ g.yas pa gri gug
363b2(sha): g.yon pa snying // kha spud lto ba sbyar ba ra ga nas// tsitA gnyis la snying po gnas// bzlas pas bskul pas bka' bzhin nyan// lci 'thib sa ru la la khro na rtags//
363b3(sha): tha na nas sgra sgrub sbyor ba bya// dug dang nyungs kar ske tshe yis// thu na bra ba 'khor lo'i mtshon cha bskyon// gong bzhin khri tsho bzhi bzlas la// mtha' ru dmig
363b4(sha): pa'i mkha' rim ni// su ma bcud kyi dkyil du gnan// sku sgrub rgyun gyi dmigs pa ni// bdag lus 'od kyi gong bu las// bzlas pas gzas pa'i skye bo na/
363b5(sha): gnam lcags zhun ma'i gzer btab nas// myos shing khrag tu skyug par byed// bskul bas bdud kyi sngags spros nas// gzas pa'i tsit+ta gnam sgo phye//
363b6(sha): mtshon cha'i thog dang lce phab nas// srog dang snying gi rtsa sgrog po rtsa da// dra na pa mi ga sa la shes pa 'pho// shes pa yi ge gnyis la thi ma// ang ku sha
363b7(sha): zhes gnas su dgug/ pra ba sha yis lha dang da bye// A kang+ga yi sa rte na la pa sti ma// ra ga ga hU gis khrag tu ba zhu// srog la rbad kyi sbyor bas pa sa da// hAM
364a1(sha): ston pa gshin rje bdag la bstim// bkrag dang gzi mdangs 'phrog la gso// nri dang ling ka 'khor los gcod// gsad pa'i
364a2(sha): sbyor bas smra gcad la// rtsa ba bzhi la yan lag brgyad// sbyor ba skabs dang ldan par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa'i sngags 'di bton to//
364a3(sha): hU ru thu dun paM rag shwa ma la pa ri la dza/ srog ni du na rba da/ 'khor lo mtshon cha bcu gnyis lus// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ rgya gram gnon pa'i spu gri
364a4(sha): bzhi// hU ni srog nan dbang po snyam pa la grol khug e nan// lus dang mtshams su 'dod pa sbyar// rten gyi snying khar phur pa gdab// rten dang byang khram
364a5(sha): bcings la gzhug/ thod pa dar dang re bas gril// dur khro da gling du sa sros gtad// bdu do dang gshin rje'i pho brang gdab// gsang ba'i las kyi mtshon chas
364a6(sha): ba cod// gsod byed pho mo'i sbyor bar bsha // rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// pa dud nag po srog gcod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// /
364a7(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa kha stong nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ngam gling brag dang sa phug tu// stegs bu gru bzhi pho brang gdapa// steng du gru gsum
364b1(sha): chag gang brtsigs// gzhi ma ser po de steng dmar// gru gsum nag po'i thod pas bskor// zur gsum rtsang gi rtse mo snying // zhing gi bla re zhing chung 'phan//
364b2(sha): sbrul dang thod tshal keng rus brgyan// sha chen dang bcas gtor ma ba sha ma// lho yi phyogs su gshi na rje la// dug dang rma khrag sna tshogs 'bru// sbyar ba'i gto/
364b3(sha): ma ma mo la// gru bzhir rag+ha'i ban d+ha bzhi// steng gi sa gzhi zlum po la// tshe khrag yug mo bsad pa'i khrag/ nyungs kar ske tshe tsha ba'i rdzas// thal chen dug/
364b4(sha): dang lcags phye rnams// thod tshal gsum du blug la bskor// bal tshon sna lngas thun kha bcad// gru gsum dbus su thod pa ya// mon nam mtshon ngan gling
364b5(sha): mangs su// dmigs pa'i ling ka byang khra ma bcas// sngon dmar bsdams la thod par gzhug/ khrag gis bkang la tshon sna lngas// kha nas rgya gra ma drag tu
364b6(sha): bcings// steng tu mdzes pa'i lhung lo ru// snying dang ba dud rtsi na chung khrag/ dar gyis kha bcad ma mo bstan// ma mo bos la mchod pa btab// khri tshe/
364b7(sha): lha ba ste na dgongs pa bya// lhung lo mdzes pa'i pho bra du// ro yaM gdan la sa bon ma// bskyed pa zi gsang sngags 'di brjod la// ru traM baM ma ma kha ra
365a1(sha): dun ting b+h+yo/ bskul ba'i rkyen gyis sku ba skyed la// smug nag 'gying ma mi lpags gon// srul dang thod pas dkris shing brgyan//
365a2(sha): ral pa nag po za ru khrag/ spya na mig gru gsum mchi ma dug/ zhal dang mche ba s+phu gri so// snyan cha sbrul la shangs nas rlung // ba spu chu la smin ma me// kha dang
365a3(sha): sting kha lte ga sang nas// nad do cog gi R+Yang sa pa la pho// tre ma pa'i sgra ni b+h+r-i dang rba da// sha tshin khrag la ro la cing za// thugs ka ra zla ba rdo rdza ma//
365a4(sha): bzlas par bya ba'i 'bru yis bskor// khro ba'i sngag sra dang 'phro 'du bya// mu nu nAg mtsho yi dkyil nas dgug/ bsnyen pa'i grangs ni sa ya bya//
365a5(sha): de na sa ba com ldan 'ardas kyi sa ska ga sung thug sa la sa rtsu ba 'a be swe na pa 'di ba ton to// oM ma ma snying khra ga rtswa la mu ga mug dun dun b+ho dza dza/ rdza sa la bo sa/
365a6(sha): la gzugs la bstim// las kyi ma mo srin mo'i tshogs// sha za mo dang gnod sbyin mo// klu mo dri za mo yis bskor// gtso la phyag byed snying po
365a7(sha): dbul// bsnyen pa'i rtags de rab tu bshad// rbad pa 'bum du sbyor ba bya// dam rdzas gtor mkha che la// khrag brlab 'o dod ma mo bod// brnag
365b1(sha): paba'i rus dang rus la rbad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rbad pa'i sngags 'di bton to// ma ma rtswa srog snying la breng breng / sham sham
365b2(sha): dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ nag mo 'khor dang bcas pa yis// dmigs pa'i lus phung gshig nas kyang // tsitA phyung zhing lo ma stobs// de tshe gsad
365b3(sha): pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// yang na dmag gi ru mtshon 'phyar// las la chud pa'i rtags su bshad// dam rdzas pa na d+ha shar phyogs su// gzhag la thod par thun
365b4(sha): rdzas brag/ dmigs pa dag dang ma mo'i tshogs// mtshon chas gtubs shing khrag gis bran// rdzas rnams mtshon cha'i char du dbab// ma mo brnag pa byud du
365b5(sha): tshud/ mthu' ru srog ga cad tsit+ta 'byin// ma la brnag pa'i byang khra ma btab// thun gyi rdzas rnams bsres la brag/ khrag la rlangs 'phros gzugs la thim//
365b6(sha): dmigs pa'i snying du bu ga gnas// nang gi rtsa bcad khrag tu 'dzag/ gsang sngags khri tsho bdun du bzlas// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung
365b7(sha): thugs las gsad pa'i sngags 'di gton to// ma ma snying la dun rmugs/ dgra bo'i srog myogs rba / rang dang ma mo'i sbyor ba las/ ma mo zla mtshan rgyu dus
366a1(sha): su// bsnyen pa'i dgongs pa ldan par bya// khri tsho bdun gyis las la sbyar// brdeg cing 'phang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas// gsad pa'i
366a2(sha): mgo dang mjug gi zor// thun mtsham drag tu khrag la bstim// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las thun sngags gsang ba 'di bton to// ma ma snying
366a3(sha): rtsa dun mugs/ srog la breng breng shag thun b+h+yo/ tho na nas ling ka gtor mar btab// thun khrag thod par zor du 'phang // nam phyed gung chung sa sros la// dbang
366a4(sha): gzugs thun lam lus bskyod 'phang // lus la khro ba'i sngags kyis bsrung // ma mo'i klad dkyil lte gsang snying // khrag mda' thun gyi lhag chen brdeg
366a5(sha): thun sngags sbyor ba sa ga sad par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ kha tong nag po thun gyi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// /
366a6(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nag mo'i zhal gyi bsgrub pa 'di bshad do// gsang ba'i gsang bcu sbyor ba'i mchog/ gsang bcud dngos grub rin po che// 'ji
366a7(sha): rten thun mong phan pa'i bcud// mtshon cha'i rgyal po khrag gzer dpal// nag mo len byed srin mo sa gsod// sbyor bas gsad pa'i mchog tu bshad// de yi
366b1(sha): sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ga nya na ra gdug pa'i dben gnas su// dur khrod sa la stags bu khrag gis byug// bskud bsangs la sngags kyis thig gdab brtsam//
366b2(sha): gru gsum zla kham thod pa'i 'phreng ba zlu ma// rgya gram dbus kyi snying po drag po gnas bzhi ldan// thod skam 'phreng bas mdzes pa'i gru chad sgo// rdo rje ma ri tshon sku
366b3(sha): gsum dang ldan// zhing gi bla re 'phan phran rus pa khrag/ dar nag g.yang gzhi yol dang mthing nag gur// sna tshogs g.yang gzhi klubs pa gru bzhi rgyan du dgram//
366b4(sha): mtshon ldan lhung lor snying gsum lnga dang gzugs// zhing ras dbang bsgyur ldan pa'i pho brang dbus// dpa' bo'i don dang snying khrag ban d+ha shar// ku ku na chung don
366b5(sha): khrag pa ne d+hu lho// tsa ra shel nag don khrag can dang nub// khyi nag snying dang nag khrag can dang byang // gzugs la rab gnas ldan pa rten du dgram// ma dang
366b6(sha): rag mo bzhi las sku ru bskyed// gtor ma dang bcas mchod pa'i yo byad pa sog/ khyad par dbang po lnga dang ne la su tra'i sha// 'bru sna shing thog bag zan dang
366b7(sha): bcas la// drag po'i gtor ma snying gis brgyan pa lnga// rag+na gsung dang byang shar gru chad ldan// thod pa khrag sna byang khram brnag pa'i gzugs// bskul
367a1(sha): ba'i snying pos brab pa'i sbyor ba drug/ gdab pa'i rdzas lnga sbyor ba'i mtshams su 'pho// dbang po lnga la gzer gdab drag tu bskul// gru bzhi
367a2(sha): ba na d+ha rgya gra ma phur pa khrag/ mtha' mthun rdzas thod pa'i ling ka dbus// bskul ba'i snying po 'dod pa'i mtshams su sbyar// lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // bdag gi
367a3(sha): rang bzhin ya ma'i sku// zla bar 'bru gnyis sngags kyis brgyan// rten la 'bru gcig zla bar bcas// 'phen len sbyor ba 'phro zhing thim// gnyis kyi sku la rang dbang/
367a4(sha): bsdu// gtso bo mchod la khrag la bod// ma mo mchod bstod dam tshig dbog/ ba su thugs kha'i rtsa ma la spro// drod dang rtags la phab la bsdu// thon nas dgra
367a5(sha): sgrub khrag la thim// dam rdzas snying sna dbus su sogs// dbus kyi ba na d+ha steng du gzhag/ 'og tu drag po'i thod pa gzhug/ gzugs brnyan 'phos la phyar pa
367a6(sha): dgod// rgya gram ban d+ha khrag dang ldan// gru chad bzhi la gzhag la brag/ mtshan mo dang por rbad la dgug/ dbus kyi drag po rten la bstim// gung dang nyin mo thun
367a7(sha): du dbab// drag tu bskul zhing dbang du bsdu// khrag khro la rlangs pa 'phro na 'phang // de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi
367b1(sha): mchog 'di rnams bton to// oM tad+ya thA rag mo trag ragrA ma hi srog la dza dzA/ trag rag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo/ re ma ti dgra bo'i snying la thum ri mi li b+h+yo/ trag rag sha ma
367b2(sha): ti dun mugs dgra bo thum ri li li dza srog mA ra ya rbad rbad/ trag rag sha snying khrag rtsa rbad baM ril thun po b+h+yobadag dngos ya ma ka la ya'i// phyag rgya chen po rab
367b3(sha): gsal bya// snying po bskul la lha mo dgug/ dregs pa chen po'i nga rgyal ba skyed// ma mo dbang bsdu brnag pa dbab// mA ra ya yis myos shing dbral// srin mo
367b4(sha): tshogs bcas gtod cing za// dgra bo'i lus srog bsdus shing 'brel// rnam smin sbyang phyir bskyung gso bya// mdos dang mkha' lding shel nag rgyus// ma mo
367b5(sha): rang dam gtang rag gso// sri'u la sogs gso ba kun// mdos dang mkha' lding bdud rtsis mchod// tshogs dang gtor ma dus drug bsngo// sbyor ba rnal ma'i
367b6(sha): mchog tu bshad// ma mo'i dbang du bdag song na// rkyen dang cho 'phrul slar log na// man+da la gru gsum sbag ma bshan// mthing nag dmar po mtha' ma sa ra//
367b7(sha): rtsa dang snying sna ldan pa la// bag zan ma mo chag gang gzugs// ral pa che ba nag mo la// b+hing khar gru gsum mtheb gang bru// ma dang srog gi snying po gzhug
368a1(sha): stang du ban d+hu snying rtswa gzhag/ mdos dang rag+na man+t+ral brgyan// rak+ta brlab cing ma mo bod// gzugs la phab la ma mo gzir// dam dpog
368a2(sha): mna' chu bdud rtsis ga so// srog dbrog gzi mdangs bskyed la rbad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drug po'i gsang sngags 'di bton
368a3(sha): to// ya ma rag mo trag raH/ ma ma hr-i hr-i dza dza/ shrI ya ma a pa yai dun hril// ma ma tI ga nan srog ga zir// ya ma rag mo ma ma sa ma ya tsit+ta ho/ ma ma trag
368a4(sha): 8\u0f7f/ nag mo srog dun dun phreng brang khams rmugs ma mA hU~M dzi dza/ thA ga rag+na mu tra snying phyur ba ril/ srog tig breng shag rtsa srog dbugs khyer kha tha~M ma zad/ khyen
368a5(sha): par gsad pa'i sbyor bya yis// ma mo rang dam gzir zhing zad// snying kha'i thugs gdan ming byung gzhug/ mthu' ru gzugs te byang shar dgram// dam rdzas
368a6(sha): b+hag+has la rtag tu sargyod// gzugs pa zlab la dgra la zad// brgyug pa'i gzugs phung mo ru 'bar// srin mo ga myod cing sbyor bar bshad/ rgyal brgyan ma yo/
368a7(sha): gi skyed las/ nag mo sal gyi mun chub kyi le'u sa sus cu gnyis pa'o// de nas bcu gnyis kyis bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba 'di bshad do//
368b1(sha): gsang ba'i gsang bcud 'di lta ste// las kyi rgyal po 'khrul 'khor 'di// gsang ba'i lam chen bcu gnyis bsdus// gsang sngags brda yi phyag rgyas
368b2(sha): dgrol// 'brug byed tsit+ta'i sbyor ba dang // 'joms pa'i 'khor lo mtshon cha can// snying po gsum gyi sa bdud pa'i mchog/ bcu gnyis tshul gyis rim pas
368b3(sha): dbye// brgya dang drug gnyis rte na pa cas pa li// sbyor ba 'phan pa sa ya la spro// snying po bsdus pas ma yi thog/ bde bas spod pa'i ga nas su bsti ma// ra gra ya
368b4(sha): ma'i ba klong nas// gsang ba'i bdag po sa 'dod pa'i ming // bskyod pa las kyi rgyal po las// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rgyas par mdzad// thabs kyi rgyal
368b5(sha): stong nyid drug/ bcu dang ldan pa'i las gsungs pa// gsal bas rig pa'i sgrol ma'o// de yi rim pa las kyi mchod chen kyang // bstan pa 'jig pa'i dgra de
368b6(sha): la/ drag po las kyi mthar bya na// dus ni rang byung rtsol ba la// bskul ba bzhi dang sbyor ba gsum// yul la dmigs pa'i bsnye na sgrub mthar// dngos grub
368b7(sha): sid d+hi gsum mthar sbyar// bdag dbang bsti ma dang sbyor ba brtsam// tsakra su r+ya sa ya ma'i dkar// ma hA gu h+ya man tra'i bstan// phyi nang 'khor lo gsang ba'i 'dus
369a1(sha): rgyu dang rkyen dang sgra dang las// bca' ba'i thabs de lnga rub shad// yul la phyi nang gsang ba gsum// dbang po dod pa'i ngo bo dang // rgyu dang bca
369a2(sha): dang sgra dang las// don lngas mtshon pa brnag pa'i las// de bzhin gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rgyu// ngo bo sgra dang drang dang dkrug/ las dang gdags pa mtha' ru sbyar//
369a3(sha): phyi nang gsang ba gsum du gsungs// de bzhin sur+ya gsum dang lnga// sgra dang ngo bo gnas dang las// rgyu yi tshul te nyi ma bshad// gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba gsum//
369a4(sha): ya ma gsum 'dus thugs kyi bdag/ rang gi ngo bo rgyu dang sgra// las dang gnas dang gsod pa'i tshul// de yis gshin rje'i grong khyer du// 'gro ba bkug cing khrid
369a5(sha): nas 'chang // srid gsum 'jug sa ya ma'i gnas// byin brlabs 'byung phyir ting 'dzin gtso// ya ma ra yi d+ha sgras 'joms// pho mo'i mtshan nyid g.yas dang
369a6(sha): g.yon// 'gro ba'i mchod sbyin sbyor bas gcod// sngon 'gro 'od dang gsal me chog/ gsang rgyud brda yis bshad pa'i lung // bsnyen bsgrub las mthar spogs
369a7(sha): dang sbyar// lus ni nyon mongs spyod pa las// dngos grub mchog dang 'jig rten nye// dus ni lo 'am zla ba'am// de skabs lo phyed dag tu bya// bka'
369b1(sha): thub gsum dang ldan gyur na// dus kyi bsnyen pa rnam grangs te// sngon du 'gro dang las la sbyor// ya ma dgug dang mtshan ma gsum// dus tshod nges par 'grub
369b2(sha): par bshad// de bzhin grangs kyi bsnyen pa dang // bye ba 'bum khri stong brgya'i grangs// 'di dag tu ni grangs kyi dbye// bsnyen pa las sbyar gsad pa dang // thod pa
369b3(sha): bca' dang gnan pa'i skabs// na ya grangs kyi tshad mar bshad// 'od sgra du ba bzhad pa rnams// de yi rnam pa bshad pa lta// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang //
369b4(sha): bsgrub dang bsgrub pa chen po rnams// bsgrub pa dngos kyi skabs dang sbyar// dgongs pa'i don chen gang la yang // bsnyen na dngos grub rnam gsum thob// de ma yin na/
369b5(sha): dngos mi 'grub// drag po las kyi mtha' bya na// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo rab// dngos grub thob baM bsnyen pa rdzogs// 'khor lo me dang gnan la sbyor// de ma yin na
369b6(sha): rang la ldog/ ma la ya dang dgu 'dus rtse// dur khrod chu gling gnyen ra'i shing // ba de gnas mchog tu ya ma'i klong // nag po dug gi snying po dang // yi ge 'bru
369b7(sha): shag grong khyer na// mun nag 'dra ba'i gshed po yi// nga yi lto ba dag na gnas// srid pa gsum yang de na gnas// de phyir sred gsum 'jug par bshad//
370a1(sha): 'khor ba thog ma tha ma med// 'jam dpal dpal gyi sbyor ba yis// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing // srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po//
370a2(sha): bcu pa'i sbyor ba'ang rgyu yi tshul// ting 'dzin sbyor ba rkyen du bstan// thabs ldan spyi rgyug bar bar sbyar// shing rta'am chu yi 'khor lo bzhin// rgyu dang rkyen gyi skyor
370a3(sha): bas 'khor// g.yon bskor 'og nas gcod pa ni// chu yi 'khor lo dag dang 'dra// g.yas bskor steng nas gcod pa ni// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo dag dang 'dra//
