370a4(sha): de yi rkyen gyis lte ba 'khor// lte ba'i stobs kyis rtsibs dag 'khor// gcod pas mtshon cha'i rgyal po'o// bgrod pa gsum gyi gdeng ldan pa'i// lha yi rnal
370a5(sha): 'byor thob pa yis// drag po gsad pa nyid la sbyar// de man bskal pa med pa yis// lha ni ga nad la dbab pa dang // ro langs srid pa'i lto dekrugs dang // rim
370a6(sha): bzlog sngags kyi gnad dgu bsde pa// mtha' ru spyi brdeg gam 'greng ho la// ye shes rdo rje 'khyud pa yi// ljags sogs las kyi mtha' ru sbyar// thod par rab sa
370a7(sha): chad nag po 'am// ngag rig klan klen bkra mi shis// mu za mdze can lugs mo phag/ mdze rto la ra tsa dred thod pa// sngo dmar mkhar nag sum bsgril sga/
370b1(sha): chu dar zhabs ma re thums gzhug/ lha khang mchod rten ro khang mu// dur khrod gnyan sa go mal them// lam srang khang srul cher snod sar// snying po ri rab dang bcas
370b2(sha): pa'i// ya ma sku gsung thugs kyi ltor// dmigs pa gang yin legs par gzhug/ phyag rgya stobs dang zil gyis mnan// sbyor ba sngags kyi rim pa ni// yi ge slong dang
370b3(sha): gzer ba zhi gdab// lha bskyed mnga' dbul 'khor lo gso// mtshon cha ngar blud byin gyis brlab// bsrung dang dbye ba'i las la sogs// ting 'dzin rgyal po rkyen
370b4(sha): gyis 'grub// the tshom le lo g.yeng ba yis// sbyor ba brtsams na don mi 'grub// 'khor lo ldog pa'i rgyu bshad pa// lhag chad rnal 'byor nor dang 'bres//
370b5(sha): reg thig 'byor dri ma gos// rgyu rkyen 'byor men ldog par bshad// de bzhin khyam pa'i rkyen bstan pa// gsong sngags nan chungs 'dzab ma rdzogs// bsnyen pa'i
370b6(sha): ba ka' bsgo las gnyer chung // las tshogs yan lag gtad spogs nyams// las mi byed de 'khor lo khyams// bsnyen bsgrub dkyil 'khor la brten nas//
370b7(sha): gsad pa'i 'khor los gsad byas na// gnan pa'i sbyor bas nan tan bskyed// des kyang dmigs pa gcod par byed// des kyang gcad bya ma chod na// las
371a1(sha): dang sbyor ba'i spogs pa bya// gsang sngags mtha' rdzogs ga nyan por ga na na// sbyor ba des kyang mchod na// ro langs nag po'i sbyor bas
371a2(sha): dkrug/ rang las skyes pa'i sems bton la// dmar nag yul la 'khor lo bca'// thabs dang shes rab lto bar gzhug/ 'gros stabs brgyad kyis dkrug
371a3(sha): cing sbyar// mtha' ru drag po'i hom gyis ma na na// rtags rnams byung yang ma bton na// dmigs pa zad kyang rtag tu 'khor// mi mnyam mgo log re mig nor//
371a4(sha): lta bo'i sbyor ba bzhi ma bzlog/ gnad dgu ma yengs gnyen po g.yengs// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo sbyor ba bzhi// rdo rje rgyal po sbyor dang bcas// yang dag gab pa'i
371a5(sha): 'khor lo min// sbyor ba rgyu yi brda gzugs can// bde ba gcig gi lam dang ldan// thabs mchog gsum la 'di sbyar yin// 'di man sbyor ba nyams par
371a6(sha): 'gyur// thabs ldan sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// rgyul mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rtsub pa'i ga'i bstan pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//
371a7(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// ya ma ka la'i las dmigs la// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yis// dbang dang 'bren
371b1(sha): ba'i rim pa la// sngon 'gro rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// sbyor ba kun la 'di bshad do// gshin rje nag po sgrub 'dod pas// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// shin
371b2(sha): tu dben pa'i dur khrod dam// brag dang sa phug dag tu ni// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// phyi rim zla kham dmar po bzhi// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu ldan pa bri//
371b3(sha): skam rlon thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang // sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dang ni me ri 'bar// dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la// 'jigs pa'i rgyal po gshin rje
371b4(sha): gshed// sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod par byed// g.yas su sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yon du za byed pe ta li// yab yum sku mthun 'khril pa bskyed// mdun
371b5(sha): du ya ma rA dzA yang // sku mdog sngon po 'jigs tshul can// thugs ka dag na gnas pa bskyed// spyi bo lkog mar phyag rgya'i gzugs// dmar nag yul dang bcas
371b6(sha): pa'o// zla kham dmar po mdzes pa la// kri t+ya ta bzhi yab yum bcas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du bskyed// bla 'gugs pho nya bcu po yang // 'khor lo
371b7(sha): bcu yi rtsibs dag la// rdzogs pa'i tshul du gzugs brnyan dgod// rtsibs chen bdud po de bzhin gnas// sgo bzhir bas mo de bzhin dgod// des ni gzugs
372a1(sha): brnyan dgod pa yin// yang na snying po yig 'bru la// khrag 'thung 'khor bcas skur bskyed do// de ltar dkyil 'khor ba shams nas ni// gtor
372a2(sha): ma gsum dang a dkar bcas// rgyan dang ldan par dgram par bya// yo byad thams cad yongs rdzogs dang // sngags pa chas gos nag po gon// lho yi phyogs su
372a3(sha): kha bltas pa'i// skur bskyed rgyan dang ldan pa yi// khro bo sngags kyis mtshams bcad de// ting 'dzin rnam gsum rims kyis bsgoms// khrag 'thung dkyil
372a4(sha): 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// rgyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa dang // bshags pa dag ni gzhung bzhin bya// bsnyen pa'i drod dang lung thob nas// gtor ma btang la
372a5(sha): dkyil 'khor bsdu// ru ra khro dpa' dang bcas pa yi// shun chen gos dang thod pa la// tshogs par sbyar ba'i snag tsha yis// kang ka'i sgo 'am bya rog sgros//
372a6(sha): dgra yi rkang rjes chu phud dang // bong bu'i bdud rtsi mchil snabs dang // ba yi lci ba sa dmar dang // mkhar dgongs rnams la 'bag tu bya// phyi rol ra yi khrag
372a7(sha): gis byug/ ri ga dang ni kro ga la// de yi rus dang ming bris la// ge shin rje yab khyim 'og tu gzhug/ tshon gyi skud pas bcings nas su// mtshan ngan ban d+ha kha sbyor
372b1(sha): du/ bcug la bud med lugs sa mo'i// sgra yi thag pas bcings la gzhag/ gtor ma la sogs gzhung bzhin bsham// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi 'chad// de nas
372b2(sha): ting 'dzin rnam gsum gyis// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed// snying po sngags kyi yum dang bcas// rtsa ba khrag 'thung rdzogs par bskyed// rang bzhin gnas
372b3(sha): nas spyan drangs la// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// bstod cing mchod pa phul nas ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'phrin las bcol// mar zhag bgrangs pa'i tshes
372b4(sha): brgyad de// nyi shu gsum nas drug tu ste// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ste// ya ma ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// dgongs dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang // nyi shu bdun nam gan ma
372b5(sha): stong du// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// gsad pa las kyi sbyor ba bsde ba// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bsgoms te// sprul pa gzhan tshogs las la dgye// lho phyogs/
372b6(sha): kha bltas mdun du ni// hom khung gru gsum rtse mo lho// cha ga gang thur du brkos pa la// ri mo bsregs pa'i sol ba yis// kha dog nag po dag tu bya// de yi
372b7(sha): nang du ban d+ha gzhug/ de yi steng nas thod pa dkag/ bar du gcod pa'i 'khor lo maca'// dmigs pa'i bsgrub bya gnas su gzhag/ gshin rjed pang du bsdu
373a1(sha): ba'i phyir// khro bo zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// rdo rje'i phur pa rtse gcig par// bsgoms te gshin rje'i snying khar gnan// dgug cing dbang
373a2(sha): du bsdu ba yi// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// gshin rje nag po 'khor dang bcas// rang dbang med par dbang du
373a3(sha): 'gyur// ji ltar bcol pa'i las kyang byed// snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// khro bo'i bstod pa gtang bar bya// ragA ta bstabs te mchod pa dbul// gshin/
373a4(sha): rje'i las la btsud nas ni// dgra bo myur du gsad pa'i phyir// ban d+ha'i dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag/ bcol ba'i las kyi sngags bzhi ni// nyin mtshan phye la nyin mo
373a5(sha): bzlas// sngags kyi bzlas brjod par bar du// rdza rnga brdungs te gshin rje bod// rag+na sbrengs te mchod pa bstab// 'khur ba bus te spyugs glu blangs// dun ting ka
373a6(sha): yi sngags brjod la// dgra bo de la ga shin rje rbad// phur pa btab la ral gris gtug/ dug lnga gcod dang bstabs pa bya// gtor ma btang la lha rnams
373a7(sha): bsdu// chos gcig tu ni brtsis pa yi// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi mtshams su ni// gnan pa las kyi sbyor ba bya// steng la snying po 'og tu ming // kha sbyar
373b1(sha): gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i bar// 'jigs bye da ya ma rA dza yi// mchog gi phur pa sor gsum la// ga nan cing gzir ba'i sngags bzlas la// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig
373b2(sha): par// bsgoms te ling ka'i snying khar gdab// gshin rje yab yum lho ru gzhug/ mtshan ngan ban d+har bcug nas su// snga ma bzhin du thag pas bcings/
373b3(sha): gnan pa'i ba na d+ha de nyid la// ri rab bang rim gsum pa na// snying po lam dang bcas pa bri// gnyan ra la sogs gdug par gnan// las kyi gnas smin
373b4(sha): sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso cho ga rgya cher bya// thod pa drag po kun gyis bskyod// ma grub spogs pa bzlog pa bskor// 'khor lo ho ma 'brel drag pos
373b5(sha): gcad// ye shes 'khor lor phyag rgya bsrung // dkyil 'khor kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i
373b6(sha): le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las drag po'i sbyin sreg 'di bshad do// mchog gi sbyor ba las
373b7(sha): gsungs pa// sa gzhi nag po dug chus bran// khru gang gru bzhi'i stegs bu la// khrag dang dug gi byi dor bya// hom khung gru gsum kha khyer gsum//
374a1(sha): nyi shu rtsa drug bcu gnyis tshad// rtsang dang thod pa rdo rjes bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi dur khrod brgyan// phyi rim rdo rje me ri ldan// gru gsum
374a2(sha): dbus su rgya gram la// phyag mtshan tri shul rtse gsum dgod// sna tshogs sme ba'i rdzas kyis byug/ mchod pa'i rdzas rnams nag por dgra ma// dug shing ba se
374a3(sha): shing tsher ma can// rtse mo zur gsum nyi shu gcig/ sba mas la khrag bsku ming byang gdags// 'kha ra nag bcings la dbus su gzugs// bag phye dug
374a4(sha): phye ri lu brgya// ming byang re dang ldan pa bya// sha che na mar khu ti la mar khu// tshil sna ling kha bsreg rdzas ldan// nyungs kar nyungs na ga ti la shang tshe//
374a5(sha): rdo phye lcags phye zangs phye thal// khrag sna dug sna thun gyi rdzas// zhun chen nim pa bong bu'i chu// bya tshil phag sha dri chen skra// dri chu rus pa bla sha mar//
374a6(sha): bsres la ri lu lha yi grangs// gzugs dang maung yang gong ma bzhin// rtswa bskyed rtsu ba'i khrag 'thung bsgom// me lha gsos la spyan drangs mchod// bsreg rdzas
374a7(sha): phul la bstod pa bya// pho nyas bkug la ling ka gtug/ bstab pa'i tshul gyis ri lu dbul// khrag dang mar khu dug chus bran// sngags bzlas gsang
374b1(sha): pa'i 'phreng ba gdon// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa gzhag/ de 'og ung sha'i mtha' ma la// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// dbyangs kyi gsum
374b2(sha): pas steng du brgyan// de 'og u sha'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i dang po sa 'og tu 'brel// dbyangs yig bzhi pas steng du brgyan// lnga pa'i gsum pas
374b3(sha): bdun pa'i mtha' mar 'brel// dbyangs kyi brgyad pas steng du brgyan// sgra yi dang po drug pa'i gsum par 'brel// steng du dbyangs yig bdun pas brgyan//
374b4(sha): gsum pa'i dang po gsum pa'i mtha' gnyis te// sdud pa'i snying po gnyis dang ldan// skrod pa'i nag po yi ge gsum// thugs kyi 'phreng ba bsreg pa'i lus//
374b5(sha): kun gyi dbu ru lus te khri// drag po'i dus su sbyor ba'i gnad// de yi 'phreng ba 'di lta ste// dang po u sha'i gsum pas bstan// drug pa'i dang po lnga pa'i
374b6(sha): gsum par 'brel// gsum pa'i mtha' ma u sha'i gnyis dang nye// der yang drug pa'i dang po bsnan// u sha'i gsum pa gsum pa'i dang por 'brel// thig
374b7(sha): khe'i steng du lnga pa'i mtha' mas brgyan// rdza pa'i gnyis pa rlung gi snying por te// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gros gcod pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'bru
375a1(sha): dgus gcod pa'i gong ma bzhin// bsreg pa'i 'bru bcu rkyen dang ldan// drag por dur khrod gtsug mer sba ra// thal pa la sogs gnan la
375a2(sha): zor// 'phang ba 'bru gsum gnad pa drug/ de yi las kyi mtha' ru rdzogs// drag po bsregs pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das
375a3(sha): kyis tshe bsgrub pa 'di bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rigs dang bcas pa'i ga 'u ya// steng du sku yi bcu bdun la// tshe yi 'bru drug 'dor//
375a4(sha): pa'i gsum// nyi shu rtsa dgu'i yig 'bru gang // dmar ya dngas pa'i snag tsha sa bris// 'og mar tshe yi rten lnga bcud// rang 'byung 'chi med snum dang 'bru//
375a5(sha): kha sbyar 'bru lngas rgyas gdab dril// gzhal yas gdan dang lha rnams bskyed// spyan drangs la sogs pU dzas mchod// tshe yi bsnyen pa khri tsho brgyad// nyin
375a6(sha): mtshan thun gsum mchod bstod bzlas// tshe yi snying po gnas nas drang // 'od 'bar dri dang dud rlangs sku// thob nas tshe yig bur bstim// dngos
375a7(sha): grub bdud rtsi dbang bskur la// snying pos bskul zhing sbyor bas bstim// phyag rgya chen po brtan par sbyin// bkra shis tshe yis glu dbyangs brjod// 'jam
375b1(sha): dpal tshe yi bsgrub par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kha 'chings kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// yang dag
375b2(sha): don por log lte spyod// bka' yi bstan pa bsrung ba dang // lha yi nus pa ya ma byin// srin po sde brgyad ma mo'i lams// mu stegs sngags byed mdze rigs
375b3(sha): thogs/ sbrul gdug ser ba gcan gzan klu// dus min 'chad pa g.yul 'gyed dgra// lto bzlog yang snying bka' ba zlog 'ching // dus min 'byung ba nang
375b4(sha): 'khrugs dang // lha log phyag rgya'i stobs zhan na// 'khor lo chags lugs phyag mtshan thun// phyag rgya rgyun cha 'dug stangs bzlog/ gnod byed zar bskyal
375b5(sha): dug mda' dbyung // mkha' 'gro gzan dbab rang gshed bskor// de yi sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba ni// dbu ru yon tan rdzogs pa bzhag/ sgra yi dang po gnyis pa'i
375b6(sha): dang por nye// dbyangs kyi dang po e dang ldan// gsum pa'i dang po lnga pa'i gnyis par nye// drug pa'i mtha' mar u sha'i gsum par nye// gsum pa'i dang po
375b7(sha): drug pa'i gsum par 'brel// lnga pa'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i gsum par nye// drug pa'i gsum pas 'og nas 'brel// lnga pa'i mtha' sa drug pa'i gsum
376a1(sha): dang po// lnga pa'i gnyis pa e stengs rgya na// gsum pa'i dang po lnga pa'i mtha' ma gnyis// 'og ma us brgya na u sha'i mtha' ma
376a2(sha): bsnan// sgra yi dang po'i gnyis pa'i steng bdud brgyan// drug pa'i gsum pa gnyis pa'i dang por 'brel// lnga drug bar gyi khyung 'phyang bstan// gsum pa'i dang /
376a3(sha): po drug pa'i gsum par 'brel// gnyis pa'i gsum pa drug pa'i mtha' mar nye// skrod pa'i nag po bsnan pas yang dag brtan// gdug pa'i kha 'am gcan
376a4(sha): gzan kha// bzlas pas nus pa'i stobs rnams 'ching // rang gi phyag rgya bstan pa yang yang bskyed// sngags pa'i 'og gam ya ma'i lto bar gnan// gdug pa'i
376a5(sha): kha 'chi ngas lto log sbyar bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po kha 'chings kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// khyad
376a6(sha): par rdo rje gsang ba yi// snying po 'khrul gyi sbyor bas bcings// rdo rje srin po gshin rje bdud// ma mo dregs pa gnod byed kun// lo dgra rims gshed 'byung ba
376a7(sha): 'khrugs// gcan gzan gdug pa srog chags 'ching // dang por skye med rdzogs par bstan// de 'og nam mkha' chos 'byung las// rlung sdud dgas byed kar ma'i
376b1(sha): 'bru// las kyi mthu sdung chu yi rgyun// gshin rje ma mo srog mdangs ma// thams cad snying gzer rang dbang sdud// kha 'ching stobs gnon snying po gnan// drag po
376b2(sha): sngags kyis kha 'chings shing // rdzas kyi sbyor ba tshogs pa dang // mtshan ma rtags kyis phebs pa yi// lus la gsal ba'i rgyas thebs na// dus gsum rgyun du
376b3(sha): kha 'chings yin// 'di ni drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pho mo dbang po 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ni rang chen po/
376b4(sha): sogs pa la// khro bdag chen po'i sku bris la// shes rab phyag rgyas mchod dbang bskur// khri gcig sbyor ba gnyis su bya// sa gsum pho mo dod pa'i gzugs//
376b5(sha): sor brgyad bcu gnyis pho mos dod// dbang po dang bcas 'dod pa'i ming // sku yi lhor gzhug gdug pas bcings// dkar dmar sngo ba'i chas kyis dril// ga 'u
376b6(sha): bcug la drag sngags bzlas// bdun khri thon nas khri yis sba// go ma la them srang bla gnas sar// srod dang tho rangs nyin mtshan phyed// pho mos 'dod pa'i yul dang
376b7(sha): smad/ nyi zla gang 'dod bsdebs la sbyar// sems phyi dri ma dkar nag bca'// 'dod pa sngags kyi 'phreng ba ni// he ka du na ra ma dzA ya sarba ni du na tri pa ha nan phaT/
377a1(sha): ya du ka he ru na dza ma ra wa sha t+yA nI dza bung na na/ nyi ma pa sangs mig dmar phur// rgyal smad smal po smin drug khrums// tshes gsum bdun dgu
377a2(sha): bco brgyad stong // pho mos 'dod pa'i sbyor ba nye// me yi g.yas g.yon sngas dang 'phongs// gcog pu spyi gtsug gnam par bstan// lus can dbang po 'pho ba ni//
377a3(sha): phyag rgya gsang ba'i bdag dbang bsdu// tshe dbang 'dod pa'i ming nas bod// gzugs khams ma yi lus la gzud// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan las//
377a4(sha): bya ba kun 'grub thabs kyis mchog/ pho mo 'dod 'pho bar 'gyur// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ mchog gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// /
377a5(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang ba dud rang la bskor ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po stobs dang dbang dbrog pa'i//
377a6(sha): sbyor ba'i rgyal po rang dbang 'joms// ga nad dgus thabs mchog ldan par byed// gsang ba'i gsang ba sngags kyi gnad// rdo rje srin po sbyor ba'i gnad//
377a7(sha): lho zlo ga srid pa rang 'joms gnad// rang bdud mtshon cha bzlog pa'i gnad// dregs pa dbang chen dgug pa'i gnad// stobs kyi bdag pos gzir
377b1(sha): ba'i gnad// gzhan sngags rkyen gyis bskul ba'i gnad// phyag rgya rang dbang dbrog pa'i gnad// mkha' 'gro gzan la dbab pa'i gnad// gnad dgus
377b2(sha): mi nad 'joms sdud yin// sbyor ba'i sngon 'gro rten gsum dang // sa gsum tsha ba dri chu khrag/ sbyar la 'phul gyi 'khor lo bca'// yugs sa pho mo'i
377b3(sha): zhabs ma la// rme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bca'// snying po bcu bdun skabs kyi pho// dam rdzas bcu bdun rten dang
377b4(sha): sngags// 'pho dang sbyor ba skabs kyi 'gyur// mtshon cha byin brlabs ngar blud gso// gshin rje nang gi bdud bskor na// kha gnon gshed kyi sbyor ba
377b5(sha): sdebs// dbang sdud spu gri bzhi lhor sbyar// dbus su gzir la ya la bsdu// rang gnad bzlog la dbus nyid gsad// ya nas drangs la a mu ka/ spu gri
377b6(sha): mtha' ru ya la bskyal// rnal mar sbyor ba nyi ma bzhis// gshin rje'i rgyal pos sngags pa 'joms// yang dag 'pho ba nam mkha'i khongs// mtha' ru
377b7(sha): ka ma 'greng dgu bskor gnan// gshin rje'i rang gshed bskor bar bshad// ma mo thams cad ma la bskor// ya yi gnas su ma bzhag la// de bzhin
378a1(sha): ma yi gnas su yang // rgya tshil bung bu gtor ma rdzas// bcu bdun 'khyil ba sbrul gyi 'gros// ma nas grangs la sgo bzhir 'jug/
378a2(sha): nyi ma bzhi la 'pho ba bzhi// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri dang bcas ma la bstim// ma dang shes pa nam mkha'i khongs// mtha' ru drag po hol gyis
378a3(sha): ga nan// thun gyi 'khor lo bskul zhing ga so// rims dal yams kyi char du 'bebs// ma mo rang gshed bskor bar bshad// bdud kyi sbyor ba slar bskor
378a4(sha): na// ya yi gnas su da 'phos la// da de ya la dbang po 'pho// da nas gtor la nyi ma bzhir// las srog dbang po 'joms shing 'pho// mtshan mo dril la
378a5(sha): rbad cing dgug/ dbye ba dang bcas gzugs la bstim// gnan pa rdo rje'i lcags dang sbyar// da dang shes pa mi g.yo brtan// bdud kyi rang gshed bskor bar
378a6(sha): bshad// srin po sbyor bas rang 'joms na// ya dang ra de go rjes 'pho// ra nas mgo drangs par la bskyal// bcu bdun dril la sgo bzhir 'jug/ mtshan
378a7(sha): mo rbad dang dgug pa dang // dbye ba spu gri skabs su gdags// sbyor ba bzhi brgya mtshan gsum sde bas// nyi ma bzhi yis gsad dang 'pho// a mu ka dang
378b1(sha): spu gri sbyar// ra dang shes pa 'byung ba bsdu// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbyings su 'phang // gnan pa stobs kyi bdag pos bya// srin po'i rang gshed bskor bar
378b2(sha): bsha// btsan gyi sbyor ba rang 'joms ni// tsa dang ya ru go brjes la// tsa nas sbyor ba bzhi ru drangs// mtshan mo dril ba nyin mo gtor// sgo bzhi la
378b3(sha): sogs gong ma bzhin// gnan pa po tshul de bzhin bya// btsan gyi rang gshed bskor bar bshad// de bzhin sbyor ba kun la sde ba// the rang k+Sha ya nam mkha'i
378b4(sha): khongs// zhi khro o dang ya la sbyar// phur pa mkhan la ta dang ya// bcu bdun pa gnyis lto sdebs la// rgyal ba kun gyi thig ler gzhug/ phu bdag ru dang
378b5(sha): de bzhin ya// rigs 'dzin yo da ya la sbyar// srog dang mdangs 'phrog gnas la sbyar// rgyal blon srungs can ni dang ya// srungs rta khams kyi ka ba bcag/
378b6(sha): gzir gsum drug gnyis gsad pa'i las// bsdeb pa bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyal// bdud mo me dang de bzhin la// mu stegs do dang ya la sbyar//
378b7(sha): sa bdag sa dang de bzhin ya// gnyan dang klu la nA ga sbyar// gri thong ba tsan la rma gri sbyor// nal zod lha rten rnol thog sbyar// phag thod dmar mchog
379a1(sha): gdug pa'i sar// mdze dang lhog pa pol la sbyar// khram thod gnyan la smyo 'bog sbyar// kha sbyor bka' rten rims dal sbyar//
379a2(sha): rgyung khu thod chen zhabs ma blang // the rang sum mdo rgya gram sar// pho log gzer thabs lkugs dang g.yeng // sbyor ba gcig gi rkyen bzhi slong // bcu gnyis tshul
379a3(sha): gyi rkyen drug 'joms// de dag rdo rje gsang ba yi// sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu sngags// las kyi rgyal po rdo rje yi// ma hA gnad mda'i sbyor tshul bstan// rten drug
379a4(sha): pho mo lte sbyor lus// pho tshul gsum gyis las mthar sbyar// rang nyid phyag rgya bdag po'i lus// stobs chen dregs pa'i sku gsal bya// ye shes khro bo 'khor lor
379a5(sha): bcas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od stong 'bar// brjid pa'i sku la bstan pa bskyed// khro bo sngags kyis bka' thub bsrung // thun mong sgrub pa'i bca' bzhi
379a6(sha): brtsam// khyad par sku dang sngags kyis gzir// ye shes nyi ma'i 'khor lo bairlab// gzer bzhi gdab pa'i sngags bzhir bsgyur// sku gsung thugs
379a7(sha): kyi lto bar gzhug/ khyad par drag po'i gnad dgu yin// rang gshed bskor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// rang bsdud rang
379b1(sha): la bskor ba'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// / de nus la ma ro langs kyis// rdo rje 'chang la gus btud nAs// spyi bo zhabs la phyag 'tshal
379b2(sha): te// bka' yi bstan pa rgyas pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i sbyor ba bshad du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin
379b3(sha): las bzhengs nas 'khor la gzigs te// gshin rje gshed rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// 'khor lo rgyal po mtshon chen 'di// dkon mchog rgyal po'i sku
379b4(sha): dgra la// rim pa lnga dang ldan pa yi// gshad bdag chen po'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// sbyor ba'i rgyal po 'bru bsdebs la// kam pa ral gri spu glir bcas//
379b5(sha): me chu stobs dang rlung gis 'pho// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// bsgrub pa las kyi bsnyen pa ni// e du nu yi srin gnas bzhin// shri man dza 'brel bsdebs la//
379b6(sha): mgo gcig nag po dbus nas gzung // rlung me chus nam mkha' gdab// mu khyud gnyis po'i sgo nas bzung // me dang lto 'phye sna dang chu// lce dang rna
379b7(sha): ba lus dang dus// me dang rlung dang lta byed dus// rnal mar rjes su bskor bas ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sngags sbyor yin// dbus nas mtha' ma bdun
380a1(sha): pa'i ba ra// rims nas rims kyi mgo drangs te// yon tan rdzogs pa rgyal ba'i 'bru// kun gyi dbu ru ldan par bzhag/ rlung dang
380a2(sha): me dang me lta byed// sU dang chu dang de bzhi na sgra// nyi ma dang po khi dra ga sngags bdun// de bzhin me gnyis lta byed sna// chu dang sgra dang de bzhin r+Yang // gsum
380a3(sha): pa me dang lta byed sna// chu dang sgra dang rlung dang me// bzhi pa lta byed sna dang chu// me dang skra dang me dang chung // lnga pa sna dang chu dang sgra// rlung dang me gnyis lta/
380a4(sha): byed partag/ drug pa chu sgra rlung dang mi// me dang lta byed de bzhin sgra// bdun pa sgra dang rlung med gnyis// de bzhin lta byed sna dang chu// nyi ma dang po drag sngags
380a5(sha): bdun// gnyis pa nye ba'i sbyor ba dang // gsum pa gnad kyi sbyor ba dang // bzhi pa rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsad pa drag po'i sngags su bshad// de bzhin
380a6(sha): dbus kyi klong bu mig/ 'brur 'gro 'gro mangs 'gro stabs kyis// drag po gshed kyi mchod chas gcod// rin chen yi ge gser gyi 'bru// dril bas ngar
380a7(sha): blud ur mo'i thog/ bsdebs pas rgyal po las rtog 'grub// de yi sbyor ba rgyas bshad pa// rlung dang me sgra reg bya gnan// gnyis pa rlung sgra de bzhin reg
380b1(sha): de bzhin nam mkha' me la sbyar// gsum pa rlung dang nam mkha' ma// de bzhin sgra dang reg byar sbyar// bzhi pa rlung dang reg bya ga nam// de bzhin mo dang sgra ru
380b2(sha): bsdeb// nyi ma bzhi yis 'joms pa'i las// mtshan mo nam mkha' reg bya sla// me rlung dril bas nub dang po// gnyis pa reg bya nam mkha' sgra// me dang
380b3(sha): rlung gi de bzhin thog/ gsum pa sgra dang nam mkha' reg/ me rlung sbyar ba gong ma bzhin// bzhi pa me dang nam mkha' reg/ sgra dang rlung gi las rnams rdzogs//
380b4(sha): dbus kyi stag chen 'jug rum gyis// gshed bzhi gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// sbyor ba'i yan lag drag po ni// dus kyi sbyor ba bzhi pa ste// sgrub pa gnad/
380b5(sha): la phebs pa la// rin chen rgyal po gser gyi 'bru// sbyor ba drag po thabs kyis sdebs// dril bas 'khor lo mtshon chen tshul// brgyab pas ya thog bdud kyi
380b6(sha): las// rin chen stobs kyis ngar blud pas// bde ba'i stobs kyis 'phangs gyur na// su zhig gang yang 'joms par byed// drag po ngar blud stobs kyi 'bru//
380b7(sha): stag mo mchong ba'i stabs tshul gyis// bsdebs pa'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// seng ge kha thab mche sbyar ba'i// drag po'i 'bru btus 'khor lo'i sngags// chu srin
381a1(sha): rgyal mtshan brdabs pa bzhin// gzung zhing brgyab pas mi 'chor byed// drag po'i rdo rje mo yi sngags// bskor ba'i 'khor lo de bzhin te//
381a2(sha): phyogs nas phyogs te phyogs bzhir dril// mtshams nas mtshams te theg gzugs su// rims kyis de bzhin bskor ba ste// thog mar dbus nas thog drangs
381a3(sha): te/ rlung dang me ru nye bar sbyar// de nas thad kar phyogs gcig te// 'joms byed rdo rje lcags su sbyar// de nas rim pas g.yon phyogs te// rin po che yi
381a4(sha): yi ge bzung // de nas de bzhin phyogs su ste// sbyor ba mi 'i gsal byed blang // de nas thad ka'i phyi rom phyogs// las kyis spyod pa'i rlung du sbyar// de nas
381a5(sha): thad ka'i phyogs mchongs te// las kyis sdud pa'i yi ge blang // de bzhin rim pas g.yon phyogs kyi// 'degs pa'i snying po yi ge sbyar// de nas de bzhin
381a6(sha): phyogs su ste// ya ma las kyi snying po blang // de bzhin tha da ka'i mtshams su ste// sdud pa nag po'i snying por sbyar// de nas de bzhin thad logs la//
381a7(sha): ba na srog yin las gnyis bzung // de 'og de bzhin rim pa las// the lo las kyi snying po bzung // rim pa de bzhin phyogs 'gro las// rtsa ba sdud pa'i
381b1(sha): yig 'bru sbyar// de 'og de bzhin thad logs la// ga na tsi ti ngan yig 'bru sbyar// de nas nag po'i yig 'bru nyid// rgyal mtshan 'dzugs pa'i yi ge bzung //
381b2(sha): de 'og kun gyi bskul pa yi// 'dzin pa spros pa'i yi ge blang // der rjes de bzhin tshul can las// ho ban drag po'i snying por sbyar// de yi dang po'i sbyor bar byed//
381b3(sha): gnyis pa nye bar sbyor ba dang // gsum pa gnad kyi sbyor ba dang // bzhi pa rdzogs chen sbyor ba yis// 'phen sdud 'khor phyogs de bzhin te// de ni rnal ma'i sbyor ba ste//
381b4(sha): stag mchongs drag po'i 'khor lor bshad// de bzhin g.yas su bgrod pa ni// dbus su ta la 'gro stabs kyis// mgo gcig rims kyis 'phen par sbyar//
381b5(sha): rdo rje gsang ba kun po'i sngags// drag po sbyor ba'i rim pa yin// stag gi mchongs pa'i sbyor stabs nyid// rim pa gzhan yang mchog nyid de// gsang ba rdo rje/
381b6(sha): sngags kyi tshig/ gsang ba rgyud kyi bcud lan la// thar pa'i thar pa ma lus 'joms// bka' yi gsang ba 'khor lo 'bru// nag po 'bru thus bdud kyi tshig/
381b7(sha): drag po bsdus pa sbyor ba'i mchog/ yan lag ldan pas ma lus bskyed// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dregs can// 'di yi sbyor ba'ang sngar bzhin te//
382a1(sha): dbus nas thog drangs phyogs dang phyogs// mtshams la sogs pa thang tshul rims// rdza ma de bzhin rjes 'jug ste// thud logs skyug
382a2(sha): gi mchod pa rlig/ de nyid rim pa bzhin du ni// phyir la de bzhin bskor bya ste// 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba'ang g.yas su dril// sbyor ba'i rgyal po stag mchongs
382a3(sha): 'di// de nyid rim pa 'di lta ste// b+h+ya ran b+ha b+hi th+ya ya ka/ pra ba R+Shi dang ni ak+Sha dang // n+da ni dang ni d+ha na ha// sgra nI dang ni rna dang gla ne sbyar// de bzhin rgyu
382a4(sha): rA dang ru dang // ts+tsha khA dang ni g+han+ta ni// rims kyis dzi ta hu ru ba ste// de bzhin zad dkar dmar n+ta sgrar sbyar// de nas tsit+ta ma bu ste// de dag de bzhin rim sbyar/
382a5(sha): te// rdo rje srin po'i sbyor ba yin// de bzhin lhag ma'i sbyor ba yang // rin chen gser gyi yig 'bru la// rdo rje srin po'i yig 'brus bskor// drag po rgod kyi yig
382a6(sha): 'brus btu// mthun pa'i stobs sbyar tshig gi lam// drag po'i sbyor ba sa ga nad dgu byed// rim pa snga ma de bzhin te// g.yas legs rta yam nag po 'gro sa//
382a7(sha): nag po 'bru gcig theg 'gro te// dbus kyi 'bru bzhi rim pa yis// 'bru 'gro mgo mangs stobs kyis brdog/ phyag na rdo rje'i 'khrul 'khor 'di// gnod gyi
382b1(sha): srin po'i 'khor lo yin// drag sngags gsum gnyis gsum dang ldan// spu gri 'khor lo rim sbyar te// skabs kyi sbyor ba bstan par bya// btab pa'i thig gis
382b2(sha): 'joms byed pa// rten drug gnas nas gdon pa'i phyir// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis dor byas te// 'bru drug sbyor ba bzhi ru bya// gnad lngas sgo lnga gzhom pa'i
382b3(sha): phyir// 'bru lnga 'bru bzhi'i sbyor ba zhi bya// rtsa gsum ga nad dang rten bzhi gsum// 'joms byed drag po'i yig 'bru gsum// bde byed tshangs pa'i gnas
382b4(sha): nas 'debs// sbyor ba gsum gyi rtsa bar bshad// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa las// yon tan rdzogs pa rgyal ba'i 'bru// kun gyi thog mar sbyar la drad// med/
382b5(sha): lta byed sna dang chu// sgra dang de bzhin rlung du sbyar// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// gnyis pa chu lce rna ba lus// reg bya rlung
382b6(sha): la 'dod pa sbyar// gsum pa lus dang dus dri ro// nam mkha' rlung la 'dod pa'i ming // bzhi pa ro yod gzugs dang dri// de bzhin me dang rlung du sbyar//
382b7(sha): 'dod pa'i mtha' chu dgu bskor kanan// tshogs drug dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// rten lnga 'bru lngas 'joms pa ni// dang po lta/ byed rna dang chu// de bzhin
383a1(sha): sgra dang ro la sbyar// gnyis pa lce dang rna ba lus// de bzhin re ga bru rlung la sbyar// gsum pa gzugs dang dri dang ro// de bzhin nam mkha'i
383a2(sha): rlung la sbyar// bzhi pa yid gzugs dri dang me// rlung dang a mu ka ru sbyar// phung po lnga yi rten bcom nas// bde ba'i gnas dang sbyar bar bya// dug gsum
383a3(sha): sbyor ba gau zhom pa'i las// dang po dri dang me dang ro// gnyis pa chu dang sgra dang rlung // gsum pa lus dang reg bya ro// bzhi pa ro dang nam mkha' rlung //
383a4(sha): 'dod pa'i ming dang spu gri sbyar// dug gsum gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// rgyu bzhi rtags kyi sbyor ba ni// dri dang mi dang rlung dang dri// yid dang me dang rlung dang
383a5(sha): gzugs// rlung dang me dang dri dang ro// me dang rlung dang dri dang me// sbyor ba bzhi yi las rdzogs pas// bya phag khyi sbrul bla rtags 'joms/ drag po stobs
383a6(sha): kyi 'khor lor bshad// dang po'i las la shis pas te// phyogs bzhi mtha' nas dbus la sbyar// drag po dgu yi gnan pa bya// 'phen pa med pa'i rdo rjer
383a7(sha): gsungs// rgyu ba med pa'i 'khor lo yin// 'dzin byed ma lus 'ching ba po// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba ste// rim pa rnal ma'i 'bru bsdebs pas//
383b1(sha): drag po mchog gi las 'grub yin// ma ra ya ni gas pa'i mchog/ 'phrul mig lnga 'am bcu bdun la// dang por rgyu bzhi'i 'khor lor bsde ba// ba slang dang
383b2(sha): dkrugs dang bsdu ba'i las// rten las shes pa 'pho ba ste// dang po rlung me sgra reg bya// nam mkha'i rgyal po 'dod par sbyar// gnyis pa rlung sgra reg bya
383b3(sha): gnam// me la gang 'dod a mu ka/ gsum pa rlung dang reg bya gnam// me dang sgra la 'dod pa sbyar// bzhi pa rlung dang nam mkha' me// de bzhin sgra dang reg bya
383b4(sha): sgyusbyar// 'byung ba khams kyi nad bzhi yis// khrag rlung bad kun mkhris pa slong // rgyu bzhi rtse ba'i 'khor lor bshad// gnyis pa rgyu bzhi dkrug pa ni//
383b5(sha): me dang nam mkha' reg bya sgra// sgra dang nam mkha' reg bya me// reg bya nam mkha' me dang sgra// nam mkha' me dang reg bya sgra// drag po spu gri bzhi sbyar na//
383b6(sha): rgyu bzhi dkrugs la khams bzhi dab pa// rgyu bzhi dkrugs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// brtan pa bzhi yi dngas ma bstim pa ni// sna dang rna ba me dang dri//
383b7(sha): 'dod pa zla kri tshul bsgyel// gnyis pa chu reg bya smra// kye dang 'dod pa me la bstim// gsum pa me dang nam mkha' yid// sti byed spu gri rlung la bstim/
384a1(sha): bzhi pa rlung dang dri dang lus// dus dang spu gri nam mkhar bstim// dngas ma bsdus la nam mkha'i khongs// skye med bde ba'i lam dang sprad//
384a2(sha): mchog gi sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// sbyor ba las kyi stobs zhan na// kha gnon stobs kyis 'khor lo bskor// ye shes ya ma'i phyag rgya bstan// dam
384a3(sha): tshig 'khor lo bstan par bzung // lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// ye shes 'khor los byin gyis brlab// de yi rim pa rgyas bshad pa// phyi rim kha
384a4(sha): gnon gsum pa ni// 'bru bsdebs 'phreng ba'i sbyor ba ste// rim pa du ma nus pa yin// phyi nang bar dang ldan pa yi// de dag so so dang po'i sgra// 'phreng ba
384a5(sha): sku yi sbyor ba ste// de nyid 'phreng ba rim pa bzhin// bskod pa ji bzhin sbyar ba ni// rgyal blon sha za gang yang rung // dkar po'i phyogs la sdang ba rnams//
384a6(sha): myur la bskrad cing med par 'gyur// rangs pa la sogs kun kyang byed// a kro ta ka ha na ma tha ya man ta ka b+ha na dza hUM phaT/ rkyen dang ldan na sbyor ba'i mchog
384a7(sha): de dag kun gyi kha gnon yin// de bzhin dang po'i phyogs nyid nas// mtha' ma de nyid thug gi bar// ri re bor zhing gsum par bsdebs// bcu bdun rdzogs
384b1(sha): pas mchog gi las// a ha kro na te ma ka ta la ba na ma na dza ta ka hUM dza dzaH/ nyi ma shar ba'i stobs bzhin du// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog
384b2(sha): de bzhin gnyis bor gsum pa nas// re re bor zhing gsum par bsdebs// bcu bdun rdzogs pas mchog gi las// te man ha ta hUM kro ya ka ma dza ya ka ta na
384b3(sha): ban phaT dza/ srog bdud gshin rje stobs chen rnams// ma lus bsnyen pa'i mchog yin te// rgya mtsho rlabs bzhin shugs kyis drang // dang po'i mtha' ma
384b4(sha): gnyis gnyis dor// de bzhin rdzogs par bsdebs bya la// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub rnams// ma lus 'gugs par byed pa ste// dbang du bya ba mchog
384b5(sha): tu bsngags// te ban da dza ta man ya kro ma ka ta na tan phaT/ hUM o/ de yi rim pa tshul rnams kyis// skabs dang sbyar bas ma lus 'gugs// pho nya mgyogs
384b6(sha): byed bsngags shing 'brel// khyad par sbyor ba dgug pa'i mchog/ khyad par sku yi 'phreng ba yis// ku pa ta yi rim bzhin du// gsad pa'i sbyor ba nyi ma
384b7(sha): bzhis/ sku yi rtsa ba mchog brdzus yin// lus cig sbyor ba bzhi ru bsdeg/ ma te ta na/ ya ka ban ni/ man dza ng+ku phaT/ kro d+ha kA ya/ rno dpal thu mi
385a1(sha): bzhi dang ldan// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ sbyor ba'i bdag po kun bdag nyid// khro bo bcu dang srog bdud bzhi// mchog
385a2(sha): gi mchog nyid yab yum bcas// ma lus 'khor bcas 'dzin pa ste// bsdus pa gcig gi sbyor ba yin// sbyor ba'i stobs dang rkyen brel na// drag po'i
385a3(sha): 'khor lo rim bzlog bya// mchog ta las byed 'jug byed de// gzhom pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin// spogs pa'i skabs su sbyor ba ste// rnal ma'i sbyor
385a4(sha): ba'ang stobs kyis 'grub// de dag 'phen pa'i sbyor bas 'grub pa'i las// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// gnyis gnyis bor zhing bzhir par bsdebs//
385a5(sha): kro ma ka ru ni/ ma lus dbang du bsdu ba'i mchog/ gsum gsum bor nus bzhi par bsdeb// ma te tal pa/ rten gcig rgyud las dbye ba'i mchog/ de bzhin
385a6(sha): bzhi por lnga bar bsdeb// a ka bag ni/ thams cad myos par byed pa'i mchog/ bzhi pa dor nas drug par bsdeb// sha ni ru pa hU phaT/ bkug par
385a7(sha): byed pa mchog gi las// 'gro dang dbus dang mtha' bcas la// ma lus rdzogs par bsdeb pa ni// las drag 'dzin pa'i dmigs yin te// yan lag mchog
385b1(sha): gi sbyor ba las// rim pa bzhin du byed pa'o// gzhan yang thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// gnyis par gsum dang bcu pa bsdeb// b+hin hUM phaT
385b2(sha): bskrad pa'i sbyor ba kun la shis// dang por bor la gnyis pa dang // bzhi pa drug pa brgyad pa bsdeb// sti kri a na?/ dbye zhing skyo ba'i las la shis// dang po lnga pa
385b3(sha): bdun par bsdeb// skrod pa'i yi ge dag dang ldan// hri ta na phaT/ 'bog cing dbang po 'chal la shis// de bzhin gcig bor gnyis blangs la// bcu phyed sbyor bas
385b4(sha): gsad la sbyar// sti kri a na phaT/ gsad pa mchog la shes pa'o// yan lag brgyad dang rtsa ba gsum// bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen pa gnyis// mchog gi sbyor ba bcu gsum
385b5(sha): ni// ma lus nye bar sgrub pa yin// 'di dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// nam mkha'i dngos ltar kun khyab cing // rgya mtsho'i 'jing ltar bsam dpag dka'// nyi ma'i 'od ltar yongs
385b6(sha): gsal te// chen po bzhi ltar kun smin byed// rin po che bzhin gang 'dod 'byung // thog mar rgyu rkyen ldan pa yi// 'bru btus sbyor ba'i 'phreng ba nyid// yon tan
385b7(sha): ma lus rdzogs pa ste// gzhan ni phyogs dang phyogs la rten// sbyor ba kun gyi sngon 'gro'i mchog/ ma lus 'grub pa'i mchog tu bshad// bzhi pa spu gri'i 'khor
386a1(sha): lo ni/ gcod cing sdug pa kaM pa las// thim zhing gnon pas sa gzhi bzhin// sdud cing 'joms pas kur pa sha/ 'byed cing 'gugs pas kyi
386a2(sha): ba ta// 'di ni chu srin mche ba ltar// 'dzin pa'i stong par mi byed pas// drag po me yi sbyor ba yin// de yi rim pa rgyas par bshad// phyi rim sbyor ba'i 'khor lo nyid//
386a3(sha): brgyad gnyis bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bru// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// rnal ma'i tshul du rjes su bskor// phyogs kyi dang po nas gzung ste// de nyid thug pa'i rim pa ni//
386a4(sha): ma lus dril ba'i 'phreng ba gcig/ a mu ka yi ming bcas pa'i// 'bras bu 'joms dang longs spyod dang // gzhom pa'i yan lag kun// hI sti pra ma mur tsa rag+ha tsa ra//
386a5(sha): mA ra ma ra ya a mu ka/ ni sha ra ru ni rbad ya hUM phaT/ de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// rim pa kun la thog drangs te// a g+ha yu dang 'dra ba yin// de 'og gsum
386a6(sha): la sogs pa yi// re mig bcu yi 'bru bcu ni// 'khor lo dam pa'i so dang dkyugs// btsun dang brgyan dang sngags dang 'dra// skabs kyis 'gyur zhing 'phel ba yin// /
386a7(sha): hri sti pra ma mur tsa rag+ta rbad/ 'gugs pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang rim pa 'di lta ste// thog mar phyogs kyi 'bru gnyis la// gsum pa lnga pa bdun pa
386b1(sha): rnams// rim par sbyar zhing de bzhin bsdeb// pra mA ra rag tsa ma ma tsA ta ra ra ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad// bcu yi bar du rdzogs par sbyar// dbang po lnga ni 'joms
386b2(sha): byed de// mchog tu skyes pa bu mo yi// dbang po gnyis pa 'joms byed de// lkugs shing si'u ta ru bshad// de bzhin rim pas gnyis gnyis dor// bzhi pa rim pas/
386b3(sha): sbyar bya ste// 'bru bcu ma lus dril ba ni// cha byad sbyor ba ma lus pa'i// pra tsa ra mur tsam ma ra ga ra ma ni sha ga ru ni rbad ya/ dbye dang dkrugs pa'i las su bshad//
386b4(sha): de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// bzung ste gnyis dor 'bru bcu'i rims// pra ma mur tsa rag+hA tsa ra mA ra ya a mu karbad/ dbang po chal dang 'bog par bshad// de bzhin
386b5(sha): rim pa de nyid las// gsum gsum bor nas rim par po sdeb// ma ra tsa rak+ta ya ra ma a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ bskrad pa'i sbyor ba kun la shis// de bzhin bzhi bzhi
386b6(sha): dor bya ste// de ltar rdzogs par bsdeb pa yin// ma ta tsa ma tsa rag+na mur ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ smyo ba'i las la shis par bshad// drag po rtsa ba'i sbyor ba
386b7(sha): las// gsad pa nyid la shis pa ni// ha la nag po tsam ri// rko ba'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// bag dang ldan pas sbyar bar bya'o// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba yi
387a1(sha): gdags pa'i rim pa 'di lta ste// phyogs kyi dang po'i 'bru gnyis dang // de bzhin gsum pa bzhi pa rnams// rim bsdebs de blangs de dor
387a2(sha): bya'o// mtha' ma'i 'bru brgyad rim pa ru// rjes su thim par sbyar ba ste// hri sti pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni rba da ya/ de dag dang po'i rim par bshad// de bzhin thog ma'i 'bru
387a3(sha): gnyis dang // gnyis dor lnga pa drug pa gnyis// der rje sa mtha' ma'i 'bru dgu gdags// hri sti mur tsa ya ni sha ku ru ni rba da ya/ de ni sbyor ba gnyis par bshad// de
387a4(sha): ltar thog ma'i 'bru gnyis dang // bdun brgyad dgu dad bcu pa'i rims// mtha' ma'i 'bru brgyad de bzhin bsde ba// hri sti rag+hA tsa ra ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad yA/ de dag
387a5(sha): sbyor ba gsum par bshad// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis de rjes su// tha ma'i bcu gcig 'bru sbyar ba// hri sbyi mar ya ni sha ku ru ni rba dA ya/ sbyor ba'i rim pa bzhi pa ste/
387a6(sha): gsad pa nyid la brjod pa yin// dus mtshams sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// rno ba spu kri'i so bzhin te// gcod pa mtshon chen 'khor lo ltar// gang yin de nyid de bral 'gyur
387a7(sha): gang dag ldan pa de thogs med// 'di dag gsad la sngags par bshad// gzhan yang rim par byed pa ste// thog ma'i 'bru gnyis bzhi pa dang // drug bdun brgyad dgu
387b1(sha): bcu pa dang / bcu gcig de bzhin bcu gnyis te// de bzhin bcu gsum par bsgrubs pa// hri sti mu rak+tA tsa ra ma ra ya a mu ka ni sha ku ru ni dza dza/ mtha' rten skabs
387b2(sha): dang ldan pa sbyar// dgug pa'i las la shis par bshad// de dag spu gri'i 'khor lo ste// 'bigs dang gcod par byed pa yi// rdo rje 'khor lo spu gri yin// de dag
387b3(sha): rtsa ba'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
387b4(sha): 'das kyis yan lag gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yan lag mchog dang sbyor ba las// bcu drug gnyis dang dril 'phreng gcig/ sbyor ba skabs dang ldan pa yin//
387b5(sha): sbyor ba'i yan lag ldan pa ni// 'phrul mig ag sha mu la rnams// 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rim pa gnyis// phyogs kyi dang po nas gzung ste// rim par rnam sa
387b6(sha): rjes su bskor// dbus kyi 'bru gcig thog mar sbyar// rjes su phyi rim gsum gsum blang // der rjes nang gi 'bru rer bsdebs// de bzhin rim par sbyar ba ni//
387b7(sha): lo thog gzhom la shes pa ste// skyed shing rtsi thog 'bras bu 'joms// bag dang ldan pas shes par bya// de nyid sbyor ba rgyas bstan pa// rlung me gzugs dang
388a1(sha): yid du sbyar// de rje nam mkha' ro dri dus// reg bya lus dang sna ba ste// sgra dang chu sna mig tu sbyar// las kyi bye brag sbyor ba yis// las
388a2(sha): rnams de bzhin byed pa yin// phreM bro shar shar hril phro drug/ sru gri skabs kyis bzhi 'bum sbyar// chu dril sngon 'gro'i sbyor bar bshad// 'phang zhing dbab
388a3(sha): pa'i sbyor ba ni// 'byung ba'i stobs kyis dkrug pa ste// mchod chen rin chen gser gyi 'bru// nye bar gzung ba 'di lta ste// rlung dang sa dang sgra reg bya// nam
388a4(sha): mkha' yid gzugs dang po'i rlung // mtha' ma gnyis la sbyar bya ste// de dag de bzhin rims sbyar ba// de ni bdag dbang bsdu ba ste// thu gri'i sbyor ba skabs
388a5(sha): kyis gdags// b+h+yo phreM shar hri la srog gzir hu ra thums/ ha la yam phog/ rim pa'i cho ga yul dang sbyar// dbab pa dreg po'i sbyor bar bshad// gzhan
388a6(sha): yang rims kyis shes bya ste// yan lag sbyor ba sngon 'gro bas// rdo rje me yi 'khor los bya// shes pa'i 'bru rnams skabs kyis bsdeg/ rlung sgra reg bya nam
388a7(sha): mkha' sa// lce dang me dang lta byed rlung // 'bru bsdebs sbyar la 'dod pa'i ming // spu gri skabs kyis shes par bya// rim pas rjes su gzung ba ni// rgyal po
388b1(sha): ma blon po gdug pa can// nag po gdug pa'i sems 'chang kun// tho dal 'bar ma'i yul dag tu// bskrad pa mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// de bzhin
388b2(sha): rim pa gzhan yang sbyar// drag po'i stobs kyi 'bru bsdebs pa// rlung dang reg bya nam mkha' sa// sgra dang lce dang de bzhin rtswa// rim pas de bzhin sbyar ba
388b3(sha): ni// de yis myos shing 'bog par bshad// gzhan yang thabs kyi 'bru bsdeb pa// b+hi ka ya 'phreng 'byed pa ni// stobs kyi 'phreng ba 'di dag yin// rlung dang
388b4(sha): nAm mkha' sa dang sgra// reg bya dus dang dri rnams te// thog ma'i rlung ni mthar gyis te// rim pa de bzhin sbyar byas la// sdang byed gnod byed ma lus pa/
388b5(sha): mi mthun phyogs dang thams cad kun// las kyi dbye ba ma lus kun// rang la rang yang 'joms par byed// sha za mgo bzhi gdong lce gnyis// sbrul chen gdug
388b6(sha): pa'i 'khor lo yis// stobs kyi bdag po thams cad dang // rigs can rgyud gcig gnyis su 'byed// dbye ba mchog gi las su bshar// gzhan yang stobs
388b7(sha): kyi 'bru bsdeb pa// rlung dang nam mkha' ro yid gzugs// me dang lta byed rtswa dang chu// sgra dang de bzhin thog ma'i rlung // rim pa ji bzhin nyid sbyar ba// dregs
389a1(sha): pa'i lha dang gdug pa'i gdon// ma mthun stobs can gzir bar bshad// de bzhin las kyi rim pa ni// stobs dpag med pa'i 'bru brdeb
389a2(sha): pa// rlung dang sgra dang chu dang me// rna ba lus dang dus dang dri// ro dang nam mkha' de bzhin rlung // rim pa bzhin du stobs sbyar ba// gsal po'ang lkugs pa'i/
389a3(sha): mchog tu bshad// khyab ho ha yi rim pa ra bsde ba// ha mu gnon pa'i b+he ga ta// shri ra man dzu b+he la ba// de yi b+ha tsa sbyor ba ma// rlung dang sa me lta byed sna/
389a4(sha): chu sgra de bzhin thog ma'i rlung // smyo zhing dbang po 'chal bar bshad// de bzhin gyen pa'i shing ltar te// b+he ga ta yi so ma gling // b+h+yA myaM ha'i smyo b+hU ta// de rim
389a5(sha): sbyar ba 'di lta ste// rlung dang reg byi lus dang dus// dI dang ro dang yid dang gzugs// me dang sa dang thog ma'i rlung // 'don pa'i ming dang spu gri bsdeb// g.yo ba med
389a6(sha): cing rengs par bshad// rim pa de bzhin las kun gyis// mchog tu sbyor ba 'di bsdugs pa'o// dbus nas 'bru bcu dang po'i sa// me dang lta byed nam
389a7(sha): mkha' dri// ro dang rna ba lce dang sna// thog mtha' rlung gis 'phul gyi na sdud// spu gri sbyor ba skabs dang sbyar// 'dod pa'i rten la mtshon cha bca'// rim pa de/
389b1(sha): yi las bsdegs pas// bya ba so sor bsgrub par byed// rkyen dang sbyor ba gzhan la'ang 'jug/ sbyor ba'i mchog dang dam pa yin// de dag bzlog pa'i dam pa yin// /
389b2(sha): mi rgyu g.yo ba med pa dang // 'jug med bzlog pa med pa'i las// mchog tu gsang ba'i gzhi yin te// rnal 'byor bde la gnas pa yin// s+pha da na ga la ta de
389b3(sha): med 'ching // sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'grub par 'gyur// stobs med las kyis gnyis ka 'ching // 'ching med grol ba'i stobs kyis bya'o// 'di dag yan
389b4(sha): lag sbyor ba ste// drug gnyis las kyi skabs su bshad// rgyul mtshan me long gi rgyud yas/ yan lag gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// /
389b5(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po spogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gal te sbyor dang rkyen bral nas// ma khugs sbyor ba'i stobs
389b6(sha): med pas// ye shes bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sbyor ba stobs kyis dgug bya ste// rten la ye shes rab gnas bya// bdag gi rang bzhin stobs bskyed nas//
389b7(sha): sbyor dang sngags bzlas drag por bya// de dag sbyar pa mo grub na// spyi bsdus par gyi rtsa ba yin// kha gnon 'khor lo sgyur byas te// bzlog sngags drag pa
390a1(sha): gnad la bor// spyis bsdus par gcig snying po yin// kha gnon las la 'jug byed de// rjes su thun pa de bzhin bya// lhag ma'i
390a2(sha): sbyor ba sngar bzhin te// rnal ma'i rjes su mthun par bya// 'di yang drag po'i sbyor ba ste// gnan pa'i rdo rje lcags kyis te// de dag stobs kyi kan nu pa yin//
390a3(sha): kha gnon stobs kyis spogs pa yin// rdo rje rnon pos bsdams par bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje brgya phrag gcig/ lnga brgya las kyi sbyor ba yin// 'brel pa rdo rje 'phreng
390a4(sha): bas 'dzin// rten 'brel stobs kyi rig pas sbyor// bya ba'i don chen kun 'grub pa// rin chen rgyal mtshan ltar byed pa// rin chen 'khor lo mtsho chen 'di//
390a5(sha): 'khor lo dbang phyug mi 'gyur na// thog mar dam tshig dbang bskur nas// dam tshig 'khor los thog tu dbab// kha gnon rin chen 'phreng ba nyid// rdo rje rnon po'i
390a6(sha): spogs pa yin// rig pa'i rgyal po 'phreng bas gnan// gzhan yang zigs ma'i las byed na// rdo rje snying po rin chen 'bru// lnga bdun snying po bcu dang gnyis// bcu
390a7(sha): bdun snying po 'khor lo'am// gcig dang nyi shu sum cu gnyis// dril nas drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gang byed kyang // ye shes dam tshig gsal
390b1(sha): byas la// lha yi 'khor lo legs thob nas// snying po thig le kun bsdus la// 'khor lo yig 'bru'ang thig ler bya// ye shes snying po'ang nyid du gzhug/ drag po'i
390b2(sha): sbyor ba bzlog nas ni// las gsum sbyor ba shes par bya// rig pa klong gi lam nas 'phang // yang na 'khor lo mgo dgu nyid// rdo rje rnon po rgya mdud bya// gnan
390b3(sha): ba rdo rje lcags dang bsdebs// spyi brdeg stobs kyis gnan par bya// rim pa ji bzhin bzlog pa ste// gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi gnan dang
390b4(sha): 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par sreg byed de// gong ma'i 'phel zhing 'og mas gcod// 'khor lo 'bar na sngags kyi gnad// gang yin ji bzhin rim pa las//
390b5(sha): gcig dor gnyis dang gsum de bzhin// rim pa gzhan la 'jug byed pa// 'pho zhing g.yo ba med pa'i gnad// sbyor bzhi sbyor ba brkyang pa dang // rnal mas khugs
390b6(sha): par ma gyur cing // sbyor ba'i rim pa las kyi gnad// mthar dang thog mar ma yin cing // stobs ldan brda dang ldan pa la// rI mo g+ha khya b+ha g+ho two mU ta/ ba ma kA lA
390b7(sha): bde klong ba ya/ b+hu rA bA pI nA d+h+ya b+hi/ rA mA dzA re g+hu rnam khrag/ sbyor ba dam pa'i ngas 'di ni/ skabs 'dzin chu srin rdo rje'i gnad// 'dus pa'i ye shes thig ler
391a1(sha): sngan// thig le bde bas gang zhing 'bar// las kyi thig le dpag med las// stobs ldan rgyu ba med par gsal/

392a7(sha): gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang drug/ skabs dang bcas pa drag po'i spogs// dang po rlung dang nam mkha' rlung // gnyis pa rlung dang reg bya lus// gsum pa rlung
392b1(sha): sgra de bzhin chu// bzhi pa rlung me de bzhin dri// yan lag skabs dang ldan pa ni// dug gsum spogs pa drag por bshad// de bzhin rtags las spogs

392b3(sha): bsde pa/ rtags bzhi chags dang skabs su bsde pa// drag po drod la spogs par bshad// phung po lnga yi rten 'brel la// sngags bzlog drag po spogs pa ni//

392b7(sha): mkha' ro// dri dang lul dang lus su bsdepa// gabum pa chung rnyeg kyi lus// rna ba lce dang chu ru bsdeb// bzhi pa rlung sgra chu dang sgra// lta byed dri dang yan lag bsdig/
393a1(sha): dbang po drug gi sgo dgag nas// 'bru drug sbyor ba 'joms par bshad// de bzhin sbyor ba bzhin dang spogs// bdun dang dgu dang bcu dang

393a3(sha): zegs ma kha gnon dpag tu med// gnan pa rdo rje lcags kyis te// 'khor lo gzhung dang ldan pa la// drag po 'bru gcig 'phen pa'i tshul// 'bu ra bzhi khung

393a5(sha): drag po rdo rje lcags// 'od 'phro 'bar bas khyab pa yi// spyi brdeg stobs dang ldan pa ni// thabs ldan bag chags sbyor ba yis// ta lA kri sna tsA mA rI/ g+hu pi rA
393a6(sha): ts+tsham+ba hA yA/ krU krU ra s+yA ti b+h+yA krA/ bka' yi smran dang grub pa'i bcud// rten dang bcas pa'i drag po'i las// nyams stobs ldan na las gsum sbyar// rat+na
393a7(sha): tsit+ta'i bde klong dri// las kyi rgyal pos byin brlab dbab// rig pa klong gi lam nas 'phang // mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gnas la 'phangs// rdo rje gsang ba'i
393b1(sha): gnas nas 'don// yang na 'khor lo mgo dgu nyid// 'jug pa'i sbyor ba 'phrul gsad min// sgo rten 'bru gzugs sngags kyis 'joms// 'bru gnyis
393b2(sha): rtostobs dang bag chags smin// dngas ma bzhi bsdus nam mkha'i klong // snying pos srog dang bcas pas bsdus// thod khar bcud la thig le ba stim// skabs kyi
393b3(sha): drug por spogs la bzlog/ bdag nyid kun bdag de bzhin gshegs// ma lus 'dus pa'i khro gnyer can// 'dus pa bzhi yi sbyor ba can// 'dus pa'i
393b4(sha): thig le yid kyis bzung // thig le bde ba'i gnas nas bskul// de nyid skyed rtsa rgyud gsum gcod// bde ba'i thig le rang gnas gsal// lus kyi lhun po
393b5(sha): ltar brtan brjid// thig le nyi ma'i 'od stong 'bar// 'phro 'du'i stobs ni khyab gsal bcas// khros pa'i yid kyis kun bzlog nas// lus la ye shes
393b6(sha): 'khor lo bca' // gA tu ma rngom 'bar ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur// sbyor ba kun gyi go bzlog nas// gnad dgu nyi ma'i bstan bzhir bsdu// bdag skyo ba srun dang
393b7(sha): gzhan skyob sreg/ a yi rten pa'i snying por sdud// ngar 'dzin zhe sdang dregs pa 'joms// lus kyi ri bo rten dang 'brel// chu yi snying po dbang gsum sdud//
394a1(sha): ljon pa'i bag chags rtsa ba bskyed// che zhing rgyal rmugs pa 'joms// lus kyi rten 'brel dbang po gshig/ me yi nyams stobs smin cing rgyas//
394a2(sha): yul la myos pa'i 'dod chags 'joms// drod kyi rtsa bcad ljon shing skyems// rlung gis srid pa'i rten 'brel bskyed// phrag dog gzhan dbang rkam chags bcom// yul
394a3(sha): khas g.yo ba'i tshogs drug bkag/ dngas ma khyab gsal gzung 'dzin 'brel// me mar gsad la rlung la bsdu// skye med chos 'byung thig ler gzhug/ thig le mi 'gyur
394a4(sha): gsal bar brtag/ gnas kyi thig le bde bas dgang // bde ba'i lus la 'pho ba gzhug/ phyag rgya gsal ba'i ye shes bskyed// drag po gnad dgu pazlog la brdeg/
394a5(sha): mi 'gyur g.yo med rang gsal bgrod// drag po mi 'gyur mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang de bzhin zegs ma'i las// 'phros pa'i yid kyis sbyor ba bstan// rgyal ba
394a6(sha): kun gyi bdag nyid can// khro rgyal yum mchog 'bar bcas 'khyil// gshin rdza mkha' 'gro bdud srin po// ma mo bdud mo yi dgas bdag/ 'das dang ma 'das kun
394a7(sha): gyi yab// khro chu nyi ma stong dpag dka'// las rnams g.yo ba med par 'grub// spyi gcod me dpal 'khor lo dang // mu la rtsa ba'i 'khor lo gnyis// de bzhin rnal
394b1(sha): ma'i sbyor ba rnams// ma lus rim par bzlog par bya// 'khor lo spyi la bskor nas ni// sbyor ba sngags kyi rim bzlog cing // 'phreng ba sngags kyi rim bzlog nas// thugs
394b2(sha): kyi snying po 'khor lo rnams// rim pa ji bzhin bzlog pa ste// gnad gsum bzlog pa'i sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi dpal dang 'bar ba'i 'od// phyogs dang mthun par sreg
394b3(sha): byed de// gong mas 'phen zhing 'og mas gcod// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo sreg pa'i las// sbyor ba bzhi yi yan lag can// rnal ma'i stobs zhan drag po sa spogs// sbyor
394b4(sha): ba kun bzlog las kyi mchog/ mtshams su bya ba'i don chen yin// stobs chen phyag rgya 'od 'bar gsal// dam tshig gsum gyis srog bzung bya// rdo rje rgyal po'i bzlas
394b5(sha): pA ste/ chu srin gre bar tshud pa ltar// zin pa mi gtong thams cad 'joms// mi 'gyur rdo rje srin po'i las// bsdu ba bzhi yi sbyor ba can// rgyu rkyen rtsa ba thig
394b6(sha): ler 'joms// ye shes bde ba'i khams dang spud// rgyu drug gnas gsum las kha grol// chos sku bde ba'i stobs dang ldan// bag chags mi rgyu rkyen bral gsal//
394b7(sha): snying po ma lus ngang la rdzogs// yon tan dpag med rin po che// srog ldan kun 'dus snying po 'dus// rno dpal mtshon cha'i rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
395a1(sha): gi rgyud las/ sbyor ba rdzogs pa ni lan te so dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs ma'i sbyor ba 'ang/
395a2(sha): bshad do// g.yo med grol bas chags pa yi// pho mo gnyis su gsungs pa ste// 'khrul 'khor rim pa lto dkrug pa// brgyad gnyis de bzhin gcig yin te//
395a3(sha): sbyor ba'i bye brag las kyis 'byed// phan tshun ga nad kyi lto dkrugs pa// yab yum gnyis su 'du ba ste// las kyi mchog tu phan pa yin// 'di de mi zad hol gyi
395a4(sha): las// bdud nag 'bur gyi 'khor lo 'am// ha la nag po'i sbrul 'dzin bzhin// stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po yis// seng ge'i 'du shes nyer bzhag ste// bag dang ldan
395a5(sha): pa'i sbyor ba bya// bdud 'gyur rig pa'i pho brang las// bka' yi 'khor lo stobs chen gyis// pho mos bdud kyi gnad dkrug pa// ma lus las chen 'grub
395a6(sha): byed de// sbyor ba kun gyi rgyal por bshad// ro langs nag mo'i lto dkrug pa// bdud mo mkha' 'gro 'dus pa'i mchog/ las rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// gsang
395a7(sha): chen bde ba'i lam sbyangs pa// thams cad bde ba'i thig ler bsdu// rig pa klong gi gnas nas sprad// yul btags sbyor ba'i ming blangs la// tshangs pa'i gnas
395b1(sha): su rten la bstim// sna tshogs las kyi rim sbyar ba// 'bar brten gyi mtshon cha la// dbang bskur byin rlabs 'od zer dbab// 'bru rnams gsos la rang bzhin
395b2(sha): bskyed// sbyor ba'i rgyal po ming dang sbyar// bdag pos dbang chen bstan par bskyed// rdo rje bkra shis dbang bskur nas// mtshon ma'i rgyal po rang blud bya// myos
395b3(sha): ba'i khrag dang dug chu bran// dug shing rus chen me la bdug/ drag bzlog gyen gyi las la gzung // dkrug cing phral la rten la dpag/ bsdu ba'i 'bru la sbyor ba dbab//
395b4(sha): yul dang rten gyi dmigs pa dpral// ye shes rigs pa'i nyi ma la// srog dbugs 'brel ba'i 'khor lo bca'// rlung dang me la dgos pa bsdu// 'bru drug kun gyi 'bru
395b5(sha): na gyur// rin rgyun 'argyurnams sbyor ba'i lag// 'dod pa'i arba kA dang blud// 'bru gnyis kyu mi nal ma bzhin// 'bru brgyad gcod pa kun gyi mthor//
395b6(sha): yum 'dus pasna mi 'jigs gcod// 'jogs pa bde lam rgyan bskyed pa'o// rten 'brel lte ba'i 'khor lo la// rgyu rkyen thabs kyi sbyor bar bsdeb// lam chen
395b7(sha): rgyun gyi nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas de 'bral rtsa srog gcod// khrag dang bag chags rtsam skye mas// longs spyod bde ba'i 'khor lo la// dbugs lam dgag pa'i
396a1(sha): sbyor ba bsdeb// la mtshan rgyun gyi nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas srid pa'i rgyun lam gcod// bag chags khrag dang bcas pa sreg/ bde chen klad pa'i
396a2(sha): 'khor lo la// myos par byed pa'i sbyor bas bsdeb// tshangs pa kun khyab nyi ma bzhi// bskor bas tshungs pa'i sgo gnyis 'byed// rtsa dang srog dbugs
396a3(sha): bcad nas bskyed// gsang ba drod kyi 'khor lo la// 'du 'phro sbyor ba las bsdebs la// dbang po gnyis 'dzin nyi ma bzhi// skye ba'i rgyun gcod bag chags
396a4(sha): skye mas// de dag yan lag 'khor lo yin// 'dod pa kun gyi don chen 'grub// 'bras bu smin par byed pa yin// thabs kyis grol ba'i 'khor lor bshad//
396a5(sha): yon tanA las dang sku 'khor gyi// rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba 'dri lta ste// thog ma'i sbyor ba dang po ste// rtsa ba'i sa bon yi ge gnyis// me dpal ming gi 'khor lo la//
396a6(sha): rig pa ming gi yi ge bzhi// 'dus pas sbyor ba bdud kyi ming // rnal mas bskor ba'i phyogs kyis sbyar// mchog gi yi ge 'bru lngar ldan// kun gyi thog mar sbyar
396a7(sha): bya ste// phyir la dbus nas bskor byas nas// me dpal yab kyi 'khor lo bzhin// rnal ma bzlog pa'i rim pa yis// ming gi 'jug la gdags bya ste//
396b1(sha): rjes su mthun par bzhi sbyar na// bya ba kun gyi sngon 'gro ste// sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa ba yin// mtha' rten las kyi skabs kyis 'jug/ oM ya ma rag mo ma ma ma me
396b2(sha): ta kle duM skying re thun ro ga sham gzer badz+ra dzi man a mu ka pra ma ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lurba da ya/ nyi ma dang po sbyor ba yin// ra ni tsa ya drag ta snying kha rag sh+li ta ra gad+d+hi rag
396b3(sha): rdurngubs se a mu ka mu ra tsa ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rba da ya/ o ya ma rag mo ma ma ra ni yon+ta ro shI sA tsal+lI ra ga mugs mo a mu ka rag ta tsa ra ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lurbi da ya/
396b4(sha): oM ya mar mo ma ma n+ya to// sa tsa e tsi d+hid+g+ha ro ka dza sh+ma ya b+hU U b+hU ti a mu ka ma ra yA ye ma de b+h+yo ru rbad yA/ de dag rtsa ba'i sbyor ba ste// sngon du 'gro ba'i las su
396b5(sha): bstan// mtshan mo rnal mar dril la brjeni// sbyor ba kun gyi rtse bar bshad// de bzhin klam kro shi ban tsa'i// 'gros kyis 'bru ded bdun pa'i sngags// rjes
396b6(sha): su mthun pa'i de bzhin bsgrub// ya kle ta me ma ra ni dun man tAg rag sh+lA be ta li rag mo e ka dza ti/ kre ta me ma ra ni tsa sha rU na mAn trag rag shrA pe ta li reg mo e
396b7(sha): ka dza ti nr-i/ ta me mar nai tsa ya dran mAn trag rag shrA pe ta yi rag mo dzi e ka dza ti d+hi sh+tsa/ me makIr ni yon man trag rig g+h+nAM pi ta li ki mo e ka dza tits+tsha
397a1(sha): d+hu na man/ ma kr-i ta ru to sa tsa tragA rag smai pe ta lI rag mo e ka dza ti du sha d+hu na mun pa tsa rA ni tsa ya kre ya rag sh+yA pe ta li rag me a ka
397a2(sha): dza ti du sha dun man rag/ ra ni tsa ya ke ya mashr-I ba ta li rag mo e ki dza ti shaM du na man trag rag/ de dag nyi ma dang po'i las// sku yi snying po ji bzhin du// mu
397a3(sha): khyud lnga pa'i nyi ma gnyis// nyi ma gsum la mu khyud drug/ bzhi'ang nang ma'i lto nas bsdeb// yab kyi drag sngags snga ma bzhin// bdun pa bdun bskor sgo
397a4(sha): bzhis 'jug/ 'khyil ba sbrul dang ru sbal dang // chu srin kI la'i 'gros// 'brur 'gro mgo mangs stag mo'i 'gros// 'bru bdun nyi ma bzhi la sog//
397a5(sha): kun gyi sbyor ba mgo dang mtha'o// 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// yab kyi spu gri rnal ma bzhin// 'dod pa'i a mu ka dang bsdeb// drag po lto dkrug
397a6(sha): bdun par bshad// rnal ma'i sbyor ba 'dri lta ste// thog mar de bzhin drug pa'i ming // drangs par de bzhin kun la bya// mtha' rten 'jug pa'i sngags
397a7(sha): nyid ni// drag po ma hA ya nyid la// spu gri 'khor lo 'dam pa bzhi// dgod pa'i 'phreng ba ji bzhin sbyar// lus dang yan lag kun bsdebs la// 'phen pa'i
397b1(sha): 'bru brgyad mtha' na gyur// mi ge sngur bzhin bzlog bskor na// sbyo bas gsod pa ma lus pa// 'jug pa nye bar btags pa yin// dbus kyi sbyor ba
397b2(sha): rkyang par bsde pa// oM ya ma rag mo ma ma yA kre ma me ta ra ni tsa ya ra ni yon ru to sa tsa a mu ka/ pra ma ya ya ma do ma b+h+yo ru lurba da ya/ 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga
397b3(sha): ma bzhin// d+hAM shU d+h+ya na man trag rag shAM pe ta li rag mo e ka dza tI a mu ka mur tsa ya yA ma de ma b+h+yo ru lurba da ya/ snying ro sha na tsi ta rag ta rngubs ro tsa rmugs rmugs ci
397b4(sha): ro shaM b+h+yAM a mu ki reg te tsa ra ya ya ma de mi b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya/ raM thun gzer badz+ra snying kha ra ga d+hI shrI d+hu rag shru d+d+he drAsmA d+h+yA ud a mra ka ma ra ya ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad ya
397b5(sha): drug po gnad kyi phan pa ste// rnal ma'i 'byor pa rkyang pa bzhi// gsad pa'i las kun so sor bsgrub// brnag pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// phyi nang dbus mtha'i
397b6(sha): rim pa ni// drag por dril zhing las bsdebs pa// bdud mo gshin rje'i sbyor ba ste// khro mo rnams kyi snying po yin// de yi sbyor ba dpag med las// mkha' 'gro
397b7(sha): drag mo'i sbyor ba ste// gnad ba zlog drag po'i rim pa yis// rengs dang 'gugs pa ma lus byed// los gsang gnyis dang kun rdzogs yin// de yi rim pa 'di
398a1(sha): lta ste/ ta b+hi ta yi 'gros kyis bsdeb// 'khor lo 'phreng ba dril ba'i las// de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// re mig drug gnyis de bzhin
398a2(sha): gcig/ rim pas 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba gcig/ mu khyud lta bur dril la brdeg/ thog ma'i sbyor ba sngar bzhin bsde ba// yab kyi 'bru bzhin mthun par bsde ba// mkha'
398a3(sha): 'gro'i 'bru la gshin rje gdags// dang por mu khyud drug pa nas// 'bru bzhi ro la r-i dang bsdeb// r-i thun gzer badz+ra snying kha rag hI shr-i b+hu rag d+hA ra ni tsa ya/ du sha~M du na man
398a4(sha): trag rag sh+le pe ta li rag mo ra ni yo na/ snying ro shan tsi ta rag ta rngubs ro sa rmugs mugs ru to sa tsa/ d+hedrAsmA ud tsau ro sh+tsAg+ma e ka dza ti ma kre ta me/ de bzhin yum gyis
398a5(sha): dkrug pa ste// pho mo las kyi lto dkrug yin// mkha' 'gros gsad pa'i mchog tu bshad// bkan bzlog sbyor ba'i 'khor lo nyid// thog mar dbus
398a6(sha): nas bdud kyi las// 'bru drug dang por de bzhin drang // yab kyi 'bru gsum rdo rje'i phyogs// mkha' 'gro phyogs kyi 'bru drug bsdeb// ral gri mtshams su
398a7(sha): 'bru drug blang // rtsa la bsdus pa'i thig ler gzhug/ spu gri'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// dang po ma ra ni dush+tsa rau snying ra/ snying ra thun gzer dzA/ tsi shan du na man tsa//
398b1(sha): gnyis pa kle nas 'bru drug bya// de bzhin pad+ma'i mtshams nas bsdeg/ ni las bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ kle ya ra rak+ta rag snying kha rag hrI/ rngubs ta pe sh+ma ni
398b2(sha): de bzhin ta nas pad+ma'i phyogs// de bzhin rin chen mtshams nas dril// ru la bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ ta la yo ni tsa ro shI skyu rag krarmugs mugs rag mo ru/
398b3(sha): bzhi pa ma nas rin chen phyogs// de bzhin rdo rje mtshams su dril// tsa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ me sa to e ka tsi ro d+hAd+b+hag+ma udash+tsi y+Ya dza ti tsa/ mgo bzhis
398b4(sha): 'bur 'gros gdong lce bzhi// de bzhin sbal 'gros phyogs mtshams dril// yang gsang mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rim pa ni/ mkha' 'gro
398b5(sha): 'bar ma dbyings sdus ma// snying po dam dang drag po'i srog/ yon tan las kyi rims dang gsum// gcig gis phyogs nas dril pa ste// sbyor ba 'phral nas sbyor
398b6(sha): bsdebs na// ma lus las ni byed pa yin// de dag sbyor brkyang ba yi// re re bcu drug phral bsdebs na// thog ma'i 'bru drug mtha' yig brgyad// gcig las phye
398b7(sha): ba'i sbyor ba ste// rkyang ba'i sbyor ba 'bru gsum bsdebs// 'dod pa'i yas re 'brub pa yin// yan lag 'khor lo'i mtha' dang 'di// phyi nang par gyi 'phreng ba nyid//
399a1(sha): sbyor ba phyen du mar 'gyur// drug bcu'i 'bru nyid re re la// de las gzhan yang byin brlabs te// gsum gsum dor nas gcig blangs te//

399a3(sha): mug dzaH/ tsi ka/ ro AM/ sha na mo/ de ba da ra la/ ya dun snying sham/ ro dun shan+ti/ ma ga su/ a sha ha ma/ su pa ra/ de dag sbyor ba phra ba ste// thog mar
399a4(sha): mtha' sa snga ma bzhin// dpal gyi ma mo bde byed ma// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi 'joms par byed// gang brtsams las kun 'grub par bshad// de bzhin gsum de
399a5(sha): gcig blangs bsdeb// gnas skabs nyid du rgyas par brjod// de bzhin stobs dang ldan pa'i 'bru// sbyor ba dam pa 'di lta ste// phyogs bzhir so sor dril sbyar
399a6(sha): la// sdom dang rkyang pa'i bye brag gis// gnyis gnyis dag tu dbye ba ste// me dpal 'khor lo'i sbyor ba bzhi// brnal ma bzlog pa'i rim pa ste// 'bru brgyad
399a7(sha): dbus kyi sa dang dgu// 'phen cing rjud pa'i 'khor lo yin// 'bru drug 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// rdo rje phyogs nas dang po bsdebs// 'dod pa'i ming dang thu gror
399b1(sha): bsdig/ sbyor ba dang po 'di lta ste// myur du snying ri thun ro/ shA ni ya/ gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs su ste// de bzhin 'phen sdud 'khor lo'i tshul// kle ya trag tu
399b2(sha): snying kha ra ga ra ya/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs su bsde pa// ta yo ta ro shI s+yA tsa li/ na ya bzhi pa rin chen phyogs su bsdeb// me to e tsi d+hed+b+ha ro ka sa ya/
399b3(sha): phyogs kyi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhis// mchog gi sbyor ba ma lus 'grub// mtshams bzhi sbyor bas snga ma bzhin// rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsde pa// tsa dun shA na
399b4(sha): gzer badz+ra tsi man ya/ gnyis pa ral gri pad+ma yi// mtshams su 'phrin sdud sbyor ba bsdeb// ni b+h+yAM ta ra ga d+hI la rngubs pa ya/ gsum pa bad+ma rin chen gyi/
399b5(sha): mtshams su sbyor ba 'phen sdud bsdeb// ru reg rmugs rag shwa mug ma mo ya bzhi pa rin chen rdo rje'i mtshams// ho pa na srog yin rdzogs
399b6(sha): bar bsdeb// tsa dzA sh+na s+thu ud sma ti ya/ mtshon cha'i 'khor lo nub mo bzhir// sbyor ba btud la bsgrub gyur na// khyad par drag po'i las su bshad// gzhan yang
399b7(sha): sbyor ba'i rgyal po ni// thog ma 'bru drug mi sbyin te// der rjes ma dpal 'khor lo yang // phab kyi rnal ma'i sbyor ba bzhi// mtha' ma bzlog la de la bsdeb
400a1(sha): 'dod pa spu gri snga ma bzhin// de bzhin gzhan yang sbyar ba ste// dang po'i yab dang phyi rol phyogs// re mig bdun bdun bsdebs par bya// phyi
400a2(sha): rol mtha' nas bskor phyogs su// rim pas re mig bzhi bzhi bzung // de bzhin 'og dang yang 'og gsum// snga ma bzhin te phyogs mthun bsde ba// rin chen/
400a3(sha): / phyogs nas mgo drangs te// rdo rje mtshams su bskyal bar bya// ya ma me kle tA d+hA s+thA/ gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs nas bzung // ra tsa sa to snying kha ra ga/ gsum pa rdo rje/
400a4(sha): phyogs nas bzung // ru na yo ni raM thun gzer/ bzhi pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas bzung // ra ya ra tsa ni shi su rag/ de yi sngags pa rgyal blon 'joms// ma ma ta
400a5(sha): ro sha na/ ra tsa sa to ta rag ta/ ru na yo ni snying ro sha na/ ra ya tsa ni ro rmugs/ ma me ta kre a ka dzA/ ra tsa sa to trag rag p+sA/ ru na yo ni d+hub+h+yAM d+h+yaM/ ra ya tsa ni ta li
400a6(sha): rag/ sbyor ba'i yan lag de dag gis// nyan thos mu stegs 'joms par byed// sbyor ba mchog gi mchog tu bshad// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i rim pa ni// zad tshugs
400a7(sha): phyogs kyi sbyor ba bzhi// re mig dgu dgu mtshams su yang // de ltar re mig bcul rnams// drag po'i phyogs kyis 'joms par byed// mgo drangs phyogs nas phyogs
400b1(sha): dril/ thog mthu'i sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// de rims tshul bzhin rjes thun sbyar// de bzhin phyi rims mtha' phyogs su// de ltar go rims bzhin du bsdeb// ral gri'i
400b2(sha): phyogs nas mgo brtsoms te// rin chen phyogs su bskyal bar bya// snying ta ra ga ya kre ya sa ka ro d+b+ha/ gnyis pa de de ji bzhin du// pad+ma'i phyogs nas mgo
400b3(sha): drungs la// rdo rje'i phyogs su bskyal bar bya// re mig grangs kyang snga ma bzhin// shI ro ta ya yo ta ya ni sha ro thun/ gsum pa rin chen phyogs nyid nas// ral gris
400b4(sha): phyogs su de bzhin bskyal// d+he tsi e to me ya rA rag rag kha/ bzhi pa rdo rje'i phyogs nas drangs// pad+ma'i phyogs su bskyal la bsdeb// raM snying hUM ra ma ya na li tsastu//
400b5(sha): phyogs kyi sbyor ba rgya ba ste// zang tshugs nyi ma bzhi bsdeb pas// rjes dang yul spungs 'joms par byed// de bzhin mtshams bzhi'i thad tshugs ni// re mig ya dang /
400b6(sha): brgyad bsdeb la// thog mtha' 'bru drug 'bru brgyad bsdeb// ral gri'i mtshams nas mgo drangs te// rdo rje'i mtshams su dril la bsdeb// rag tash+tsA ni ya ti s+yA yud/
400b7(sha): gnyis pa gzer nas kA la bskyal// gzan shan du na tsa ya ma mo mugs shA/ gsum pa rin chen pad+ma'i mtshams// b+hU shr-I dza tsam be rngubs d+hi/ bzhi pa pod+ma'i mtsham
401a1(sha): nas drang // ral gri'i mtshams su bskyal la bsde pa// rag rmugs rag ru ya man tsi badz+ra/ mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba thad tshugs kyis// dmangs
401a2(sha): dang rigs ngan 'joms par bshad// gzhan yang gdul bya ma lus pa// dbang po bcu dang bdun bzlog pa// drag po'i yan lag bcu drug 'joms// rdo rje'i phyogs nas ma/
401a3(sha): drangs te// mtha' nas dbus su dril la bsdig/ dang po phyogs nas nye bar bzung // rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsdeb// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni// dang po'i sbyor ba drag
401a4(sha): po yis// dbugs kyi sbyor ba 'joms par byed// ya la bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ ra snying du ma ra ma ya/ gnyis pas de bzhin ngag snyan dang // rna ba'i rnam shes 'phrog
401a5(sha): cing 'joms// ya la bsdus la thig ler gzhug/ ra snying du ma ra ma ya/ gnyis pa de bzhin ngag snyan dang // rna ba'i rnam shes 'phrog cing 'joms// na la bsdu zhing thig
401a6(sha): ler gzhug/ sU tsA li na/ gsum pa dran rtog chags pa yi// yid kyi 'du shes ma lus gcod// ma la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ d+he tsi e to myo/ bzhi pas mdangs kyi/
401a7(sha): dbang po dang // shes pa gnyis 'dzin go 'byed gcod// kle la brdzu zhing thig ler gzhug/ snying ta tra ga ya kr-i/ rten pa'i sa yi snying po 'joms// srog shing gsum gyi
401b1(sha): ba gcod// ta la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ shI ro ta yo ta/ lus srog gzungs bcud phral nas// lus kyi rnam shes 'joms par byed// ni la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/
401b2(sha): thun ri sha ni/ de dag sna tshogs 'gyur byed cing // don gyi dbang po nyams par byed// sa la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ d+hA ro ka sa/ mig gi rnam shes bkrag mdangs 'joms//
401b3(sha): gzer ts+tshin dun tsa/ tsal bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ lce yi rnam shes bkrag mdangs 'joms// ya la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ badz+ra tsi ma na ya/ rtsa yi rnam shes zhen chag
401b4(sha): 'joms// ni la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ rag+na shAM ni/ rten pa lus kyi dbang po dang // phung po lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// ta la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ hri rngubs pa ma ta/ lce
401b5(sha): dang dang po gsal btsem nas// mi 'dod ro ni sna tshogs bsgyur// ru la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ rag rmugs rag ru/ chags sdang lnga yi rtsa ba dang // sgra rnams mi gsal
401b6(sha): ljib cing 'joms// me la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ shwa rmugs mo mo me/ de bzhin mig gi rnam shes dang // yul la 'dzin pa'i dbang po 'joms// rtsa la bsdu zhing thig
401b7(sha): ler gzhug/ s+yA shwA dzA tsa/ de bzhin drod kyi dbang po dang // dngas ma skyed pa'i 'bon 'joms// ma la bsdu zhing thig ler gzhug/ Ung sma tima'adi dag drag pom man
402a1(sha): ste// gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba min// thabs kyi sbyor ba dam par bshad// gzhan yang drag po'i yan lag nyid// brgyad gnyis de bzhin shes bya ste// bzhi
402a2(sha): ba lnga yi rim pa bsdeb// phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yi// rin chen mtshams nas mgo drangs te// dang po phyogs nas mgo drangs la// rin chen mtshams nas go bzlog la// mgo dang
402a3(sha): mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// shaM du ti dzA shi sgyu snying ro// rin chen phyogs nas pad+ma'i mtshams// de bzhin nyi ma bzhi ru bsdeb// ka ye mo rag rmugs mug tsi ro/ ti la pe sha ta
402a4(sha): rngubs ro tsa/ rag tra ga ma na dun shan tsi ta rag/ de dag sbyor ba rnal ma yin// gsad pa'i las la spogs par bshad// ma lus dngos po 'joms byed de// drag po mchog
402a5(sha): gi sbyor ba yin// sngags kyi sbyor ba du ma rnams// so so'i rim pa phral byas la// bya ba'i 'dod pa so so bsgrub// khyad par lnga bdun sbyor ba cig/ rim pa sna tshogs
402a6(sha): las kyis gnad// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi srog dbang sgyur// bdud mo dregs pa'i las dbang 'phrog/ srin mo ma mo ya ma mo// sha za kye ka ma mi mthun lus// rdo rje
402a7(sha): tsho tsha / thangs kyi / hU~M hU~M hrI hrIH/ ma semasas /
402b1(sha): bshad// rgyal mtshan me long rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo stong bskor rtsa ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag gi
402b2(sha): sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang drag po'i yan lag ni// ri mig rim par bskor min par// thad kar bcal te za dad dbyung // 'di la sbyor ba'i rim pa brgyad// phyogs bzhi
402b3(sha): sbyor ba yig 'bru bcu// mtshams kyi sbyor ba 'bru bdun dgu// dbus kyi drag po 'bru gcig nyid// kun gyi mtha' ru nges sbyar te// 'bru gcig sbyor ba brgyad du 'gyur// ya bag
402b4(sha): sha yi sbyor ba yis// phyogs mtshams 'dra ba nyid du bshad// de yi sbyor ba brgyad yin te// 'grub par nges te the tsom med// de dag rim pa 'di lta ste// phyogs kyi dang po
402b5(sha): mtha' de nas// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi ngos kyi mtha'// drag po'i las kyi 'du ba ste// dbang du sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i mchog/ raM snying hUM ra ma na li tsa 'as+yA ya snying kha dza ra ang ku sha
402b6(sha): dzathog mar 'bru drug sngar bzhin te// mtha' ma dbang gi snying po sbyin// las la sbyar ba'i mtha' can gdags// lhun po rgyu bzhi dbang 'gyur na// shes ldan rnams la smos
402b7(sha): ci dgos// dbang du bya ba sbyor ba'i mchog/ de nas rang bzhin phyogs bskor te// pad+ma'i phyogs nas rdo rjer bskyal// shri ro ta sto ni shrI ra thu na ya a mu ka pra tsa pra ni ha sta hUM phaT/
403a1(sha): zad par rim par brlabs pa yis// gsal po'ang zhugs par byed pa yin// bad+mar dbang phyu/ bde ba yang // skyugs par byed pa'i mchog 'gyur na/
403a2(sha): srog chags rnams la smos ci dgos// gsum pa de bzhin sbyar ba ni// ral gri'i phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen phyogs su 'bru bcu bsdeb// kha rag rag ra me tog a tsi d+ha
403a3(sha): ya/ hu lu rma ya hA pra bi sha phaT// dbye ba'i rim pa mchog yin te// 'bru drug thog mar de bzhin sbyin// mtha' yas dbye ba'i spu grir gdags// sbyor ba rkyen dang ldan gyur
403a4(sha): na/ rgyud gcig shes pa'ang gnyis su 'byed// rgyud gnyis dbye ba'i mchog tu bshad// rin chen mchog gi dang po nas// ral gri'i phyogs su bzhi pa bsngo ba// d+hA ro ka/
403a5(sha): sa kle ya tra ga ta snying ya a mu ka dza li ya ma pra bi na ya hU phaT/ gyen pa'i shing lhar srog ldan kun// rengs par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad// mtshams bzhi sbyor ba'i rim pa
403a6(sha): ni/ rdo rje ral gri'i dang po'i mtshams// mgo drangs rin chen mtshams su bsde ba// gzer sha na du tsa mo mo mugs shrA ma a mu ka thibs mo ma myogs ya ra ma hUM phaT/ 'bogs
403a7(sha): par byed pa'i las su bshad// gnyis pa rin chen pad+ma'i mtshams// mgo drangs ral gri'i mtshams su bskyal// rag rmugs rag ru man dzi badz+ra ya mun kra du myogs hUM
403b1(sha): phaT/ rmugs par byed pa'i las su bshad// gsum pa'i ral gri'i mtshams nas bzung // rdo rje'i mtshams su nye bar bsde pa// rag+ta b+h+yAM ni tasma ud ya a mu ka go ma gi g+hi
403b2(sha): ha hor hUM phaT/ myos shing brlabs pa'i las su bshad// bzhi pa rin chen mtshams nas bzung // pad+ma'i mtshams su brtsi bar bya// s+thA shrI dza tsa ba rngubs tri ya a mu ka
403b3(sha): dzu na yi b+ha hu ba ta hU phaT/ 'ching bar byed pa'i dam par bshad// phyogs mtshams brgyad kyi sbyor ba yis// go rims bzhin du las re bsgrub// gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di ma bsha
403b4(sha): yan lag brgyad kyi las dmigs te// che ba'i mchog tu gcig tu'o// gzhan yang drag po'i sbyor ba nyid// brgyad du de bzhin shes bya ste// bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim bsdebs la/
403b5(sha): phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yi// dang po'i phyogs kyi 'bru brgyad nyid// dbus kyi ya la sbyor ba dril// sbal 'gros mthun par rim pa bzhin// phyi rim mtha' nas dbus su dril//
403b6(sha): re mig dgu dgu ya dang bcu// ru sbal 'gros kyi drag por bsdeb// dang por sbyor ba rdo rje'i phyogs// mgo drangs dbus su thug par bsde ba// thog mar 'bru drug snga ma bzhin//
403b7(sha): las dang mthun pa ra mtha' mar ldan// thaM thun snying po dzu ma shwa ra ni ya/ a mu ka Na ho ta ra b+h+yAM byA hri hUM bad/ smyo bar byed pa'i las su bshad// gnyis pa ral gri'i phyogs nas brtsi/
404a1(sha): rnal mar ma yin sbal 'gros tshul// rdzing kha ta rag/ tra ga rag sha ra ya a mu ka/ dzA la nag hu s+thA nan/ tsi dzi dz+wa la 'bar ba'i nad// sbrul nag pho mo'i lho ru
404a2(sha): gzhug/ nyam nga'i nad ni gtang ba'i mchog/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas bsde pa// shri skyu ro tsa ta li yo na ya a mu ka srog na na hu ra thums/ gzir ba'i las kyi thams cad do//
404a3(sha): bzhi pa rin chen phyogs nas bsdeb// dwe d+hA tsi ro e ka sa to ya a mu ka khrag rngubs dza ya hUM phaT/ yul khams dbang po bkru ba'i mchog/ rdo rje ral gri'i mtshams su bsdeg/
404a4(sha): gzer badz+ra shin+ni dun man tsa ya a mu ka mu thum ro myags/ yams dal rims kyi sbyor bar bshad// gnyis pa ral gri pad+ma'i mtshams// rag d+hI ta rngub sa sh+ma paM ni ya a mu ka
404a5(sha): sta ba ya hu nan/ thams cad gnan pa'i mchog tu bshad// gsum pa pad+ma rin chen mtshams// ra ga sh+ma rmugs mugs ra ga mo ru ya sarba du nan a pa ra hUM phaT/ bdag dang 'khor
404a6(sha): yug bsrung ba'i mchog/ bzhi pa rin chen rdo rje'i mtshams// smA mUd shwA y+Ya dza ti tsa ya ma mu ka du ri ya ti hU phaT/ gso ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// de bzhin drag po'i sbyor ba
404a7(sha): nyid// brgyad gnyis de bzhin shes par bya// bzhi pa lnga pa'i rim bsdebs la// phyogs kyi dang po rdo rje yis// rin chen mtshams nas mgo drangs te// dang po phyogs kyi
404b1(sha): 'bru brgyad nyid// lnga pa'i dang po bzhi yi mtha' mas sbyar// snying smya shr-I ro tsi mugs rmugs rtsa dum/ dus kyi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhir// gong a ji bzhin drug gnyis sbyar// thog mar
404b2(sha): 'bru drug mtha' mar 'bru brgyad de// a mu ka zhes 'dod pa'i mtshams su sbyar// zhing dang skyed shing sman dang rtsi sman sogs// ma lus 'joms pa'i mchog tu bshad/
404b3(sha): de bzhin rigs kyi ma lus kun la sbyar// lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhi pa'i gsum par sbyar// ya ti gnas dang rten yul 'joms par bshad// de bzhin rjes su 'jug pa ste//
404b4(sha): lnga pa'i gsum pa bzhi pa'i gnyis par sbyar// shAM d+h+waM/ srog dang ldan min longs spyod kun// 'dod pa'i snying po ma lus 'joms par bshad// sngar bzhin sbyor ba bzhi pa
404b5(sha): nga// rdza ba'i mdu'am bzhi pa'i dang por b+h+ya/ b+hUn+tu/ dang glang po bzhin pa 'joms// de 'i myur ba nas spyan la// legs pa' 'bru drug 'byu \u0f7f /
404b6(sha): mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ sbyor ba bzhi bzhi bcu gnyis te// rngubs ta rak+ta ci shan ro snying dum/ nyi zla dus kyi sbyor ba 'joms par byed// de bzhin gnyis
404b7(sha): ba'i rim pa ni// lnga pa'i gnyis pa bzhi ba'i gsum pa ma sbyar// ta rak+ta ta tsi sha na 'o b+hing y+YA ti/ kyi dang longs spyod srog chags 'joms par bshad// de bzhin
405a1(sha): gsum pa'i sbyor ba ni// rak+ta tsi shan ro snying yU b+h+yAM sh+tsA/ gzhan gyi stobs dpung 'joms par bshad// bzhi pa'i mtha' ma'i myo ba ni// rmya
405a2(sha): shAM ro tsi mugs rmugs tsa ro du ma/ rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams 'joms/ de bzhin rin chen phyogs nas drangs// thog mar 'bru drug 'bru brgyad sbyar/
405a3(sha): ci mugs rmugs tsa ro rngubs ta rag mo/ bsod nams rgyun dang skye rgyun 'joms par bshad// de bzhin gnyis pa'i sbyor ba ni// mugs rmugs tsa ro rngubs ta rag mo
405a4(sha): gzhan gyi gnod byed 'joms par bshad// de bzhin gsum pa'i sbyor ba ni// smA hAM ro tsi mugs rmugs rtso ro ru ma/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha rnams bcings par bshad//
405a5(sha): bzhin bzhi pa'i sbyor ba ni// rag+na ci shan ro snying smA shAM dum/ yul khams 'khrug cing 'joms par bshad// ma lus 'joms par byed pa ni// sbyor ba de rims de dag gis//
405a6(sha): go rims ji bzhin sbyor ba ni// rim pa'i sngags dang sbyor ba'i rkyen// 'khor lo rten dang 'bral ba'i mthu// rgyu dang rkyen du stobs bsdebs pa// yan lag drag po'i sbyor ba
405a7(sha): ste// rten 'brel bcu gnyis stobs kyis 'joms// ma ra ya ni mchog men pa'o// rim pa gnyis kyis 'grub par bshad// gzhan yang mchog gi sbyor ba ni// phyi rim
405b1(sha): mtha' nas nang logs su// de dag rtsa ba'i las bshad pa// bya ba kun gyi gtso bor gyur// 'brel ba'i rten stobs sbyor ldan pas// de dag rim pas 'di ltar sbyar//
405b2(sha): re mig rim pas bskor min par// yab dang bzhi pa'i mu khyung ba sde bas// phyogs mtshams bsdebs pas 'bru dgu 'joms// re mig dgu dgu ya nas drangs// ye shes nyi ma'i
405b3(sha): dkyil du bca'// thog mar 'bru drug de bzhin sbyin// mtha' ma las kyi mtha' can gdags// rdo rje phyogs de de mtshams dri la// ya ma ra duts+tsha ma du na man tsa ni ya/ sarba dri
405b4(sha): hu ra nan rbad/ bgegs rnams gzir zhing gzhom pa'i mchog/ gnyis pa ya nas ra la gri'i phyogs// mtshams dang bsdebs la gsang sngags bsdebs// ya kre ya tra ga
405b5(sha): rag b+h+yAM be ni ya sa na ga hu ra thu mas rbu ra na na thu ma rba da/ ga dug pa gzir zhing gzhom pa'i mchog/ gsum pa dbus nas pad+ma'i phyogs// mtshams dang bsdebs la spu gri
405b6(sha): ga dgas// ya ta yo ta li ta ga mo ru ya phra sha ra dud phreM ni pa dang shar shar pho ba/ lo ka 'pho zhing lo tho ga 'joms// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsang ba yin// bzhi pa dbus nas
405b7(sha): rin chen gyi// phyogs mtshams bsdebs ya bsrung ba bya// ya me to e ka dza ti ya sarba sha trUM ltam pa ya hU phaT/ pho thog 'bras bus bsrung ba'i mchog/ yan lag kun
