406a1(sha): gyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo yan lag gi sbyor ba'i dbye ba'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// /
406a2(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ltas ngan gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// 'gyur ba stobs kyi sbyor ba ni// rdzas dang gnas khang la sogs bsgyur// sbyor ba bsgyur bas ma lus
406a3(sha): 'joms// thod pa dur ma kha phye la// spre dang byi la'i spu dang nya// mi snyan skad 'byin bya sha spu// thod par brdzangs la sbyor ba bsde bas// yab yum rtsa ba'i sbyor ba bsngabs//
406a4(sha): zhag grangs lnga 'am bdun na gnan// mkhar gyi g.yas 'gram sru sa gang sba// thod pa 'phar dang mkhar de 'jig/ sog po gdong nag cha lugs bsgyur// khang thog 'tsheg dang
406a5(sha): 'od sgra 'bying // du ba 'khyil dang thod pa smra// sems can mi mthun mngon du ston// gzhan yang sbyor ba'i las bshad pa// rgya po mig bzhi'i thod pa ru// sna tshogs bya yi sha
406a6(sha): dang spu// brdzangs la rgya 'gram khru gang gzhug/ steng du stag tshil rdo bas gnan// srin bya 'ug pa skra 'byin 'thag/ kha skeg pastod cing mchu 'jing za// khra dang ro skeg bshar
406a7(sha): 'gros ldang // gong sreg ma kha ra la skad 'byin 'chags// dur bya de mo sder mo 'dzing // mkhar la chags shing 'phrin lon byed// sram thod nya s+thal sram sdig pa/
406b1(sha): gnyen chu dgu sbyang dang dug/ bag phyes gzugs byas mdze thod gzhug/ mal bres shul du thod pa sba// klu yi cho 'phrul lnga gnyis byung // gnas khang mi mthun klu yis gang //
406b2(sha): zhag dang zla bas gzugs rnams 'gyur// tsha ba lnga dang drod sbyar la// gsang sngags bzhi bcu'i bcu pa gsum// sbyor ba gsum gsum dbyungs sbyar na// mi la sogs pa'i
406b3(sha): mi rigs la// drod pa phye bo kha med rngubs// rgyas pa dbang po mdor phyed// dbang po lhag ma'i dmus long shor// 'gyur ba bcu dang yang dag ldan// zas la sngags bzlas
406b4(sha): zos gyur na// sems la mya ngan g.yeng dang 'phyongs// sgra dang dbang po 'chal dang nyams// mi thub skul zhing zhus srid rde bas// bcu yis lus sems sgyur bar byed//
406b5(sha): sngags rengs 'gyur ba'i las re 'grub// spre dang sram gyi thod pa ru// mi mthun rdzas kyis rnam par dgang // sngags kyi sbyor ba khri dang stong // bzlas la gang 'dod yul la
406b6(sha): dbag/ sbrul sram wa spre nya sbal bya// ri dgas gzugs bzhi tshub ma me// rim pas mkhar la 'dzeg dang bskor// 'bru brgyad sbyor ba bcu yis dbab// mi mthun gzugs
406b7(sha): bcu sgyur bar byed// tsha ba gsum dang bcud kyi 'bru// sbyar la sngags gdab bcud la sbal// thod chen dang ni rme thod sbyar// gang 'dor brgyad ba sde ba la sbyar byas na// shing dang
407a1(sha): srog chags rdo dang rus// sgo nga klad du ma sha dang khrag/ mi mthun sngon 'am thar pa shul// bcud la bsgyur ba'i las bcu dbab// khams tshanaH/
407a2(sha): yi glang thod la// tshon sna lnga yis gzugs bris la// gsang sngags 'bru brgyad bsdebs la sbyar// thog mar 'bru drug de bzhin sbyar// mtshams su gang 'dod a mu ka/
407a3(sha): mtha' ma spu gri 'bru bzhi bsde ba// smra dang ldeg dang 'phar zhing 'bod// 'od dang gzugs ston bla thod 'thab// rus pa'i lus la mgo skam mthong // bsgyur na ru dgod bcu
407a4(sha): gnyis 'gyur// thog mtha' bzhi la sbyar byas la// grangs phyen re mig brgyad du bsdebs// sgo bzhir sbyor ba gnyis gnyis pasdeb// g.yas g.yon mtshams kyis bsde bas la
407a5(sha): brtsi// de dor rim gyis rdzogs bsdebs nas// gcig las 'dren pa'i bye brag rnams// sbyor ba kun la brtsi ba yin// hor rta chu srin d+he'u las// sbyor ba stobs kyis
407a6(sha): bsgyur te 'jug/ rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen mtshams kyi dbus su bsdebs// yab kyi 'bru gsum thog mthar te// drag po'i 'bru las drang ba min// ma ra du
407a7(sha): snying ri u da smA ti tu ling ha sa phob/ de bzhin phyogs kyi dang po nas// ral gri'i mtshams su bsdebs la dril// nI shwa ro thu na gzer shan dun tsa a mu ka du ling phas
407b1(sha): phob/ ral gri'i phyogs bskor snga ma bzhin// krA ya tra ga ta snying badz+ra tsi man/ ra rag rag rag kha rag tash+lA ni/ de bzhin pad+ma'i phyogs su bsde ba// ta yo ta ro shI d+hi
407b2(sha): rubs pa/ ni la tsa sU rag rmugs rag tu/ mtha' ma rin chen phyogs su bsdeb// me to e tsi d+heklA mugs mo// saM ka ro d+hA smA sh+tsA dzA tsa/ rdzas dang gnas khang la sogs bsgyur/
407b3(sha): lhas ngan brgya rtsa gnyis kyi las// thog mtha' rang rkyen snying por ldan// sbyor ba bsgyur nas ma lus 'grub// dang por 'bru drug mtha' mar bzhi// mtshams su gang 'dod a mu ka
407b4(sha): sngags kyi dpal dang sbyor ba'i rkyen// sbyor ba bsdebs na las gang 'grub// 'gyur ba las kyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ltas ngan brgya bcu rtsa
407b5(sha): gnyis dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba 'di nyid spogs pa 'di bshad do// ma khugs
407b6(sha): sbyor ba'i rkyen med la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i drag po yi// tsit+ta sbal pa'i 'khor lo bskor// drag pa'i 'khor lo dbang sgyur la// dug shing rma ba'i dud
407b7(sha): bas bdug/ myos pa'i khrag dang dug chus bran// dam rdzas rten rdzas rgyan rdzas dgram// mchod rdzas rol rdzas rak+ta bstab// gsur chen dud pa rus pas bsreg
408a1(sha): 'khor lo ling ka byang khram bca'// thod pa khrag sna thun rdzas brab// lha yi stobs gzhug pa dag dbang bstim// lus la ye shes
408a2(sha): 'khor lo bca'// phyag rgya chen po'i rten pa bskyed// dam tshig 'khor lo gsal la byas// ye shes 'khor los kyi gyis brlabs// lha yi 'khor los rang
408a3(sha): dbang bsdu// dam tshig 'khor los thog tu dbab// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// spyan drangs yab kyi 'od zer mdangs// ye shes rig pa'i dkyil 'khor
408a4(sha): dgugaphyag rgya brda yis dbang du bya// mkha' 'gro las can dam la bsdu// las kyi srin mos mthu 'ang gzhug/ rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga bcu gnyis
408a5(sha): b+hUr+ya// oM ya ma me t+tAH/ ra tse sa two ru nA yo/ ni rA ya tsa ni/ yang logs thugs sku gsung mthar gyur// mgo dang mtha' rten yang dag ldan// rjo
408a6(sha): 'gro sbyor ba'i gsad la mini// mkhrugs sbyor ba'i stobs medun// spyan drangs mtshan ma gsum gyis dgug/ ye shes phab la dam tshig bstim// bcu
408a7(sha): bdun mtha' ru mtshan ma gsum// brtags la sbyor ba lngab kyis dgug/ yang dag dgug pa'i stobs gnan// mu la thugs dang mtshan ma gsum/
408b1(sha): skyusbyar la ya ma ang ku sha// stong brjod phyag rgya'i mthu dang ldan// ma khugs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// ma nas drangs la ud la bskyal// sha dza du na
408b2(sha): gyis ya la bstim// khugs kyang las la ma tshud na// drug brgyad yang sa la g.yas bskor du// thugs sku gsum la bcu bdun g.yas// 'khor
408b3(sha): lo rgya log dbus su dril// khugs che na ga nad kyi sbyor ba sa dgug/ khugs dang las byed bdag 'khu na// bzhi bzhi lnga lnga'i yig 'bru la//
408b4(sha): mtha' nas dbus su gnyis gnyis dril// mgo spangs mtha' rten gzir gsum bsdig/ bdag gi dbang du ma mo bsdu// gang yang las la 'bral med
408b5(sha): sbyor ba drag po'i btsan thabs kyis// ma mo gzir la shi sa bstan// khyad par las la ma tshud na// srog dbrog ma mo'i dam tshig brten// bdag dbang stobs bsdu sbyor
408b6(sha): pab brgyad// gsad pa ma yin sbyor ba mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i sems bstan la// bdag gi mi mthun phyogs dbang bsdu// mi 'jigs seng ge lta bus bya// mtha' ru drag
408b7(sha): bo las la sbyar// las kyi sbyor ba'i stobs zhen na// sku yi 'khor lo rgya log pa sgyur// spu gr-i 'bru brgyad snga ma bzhin// gsung thugs 'khor la bkan
409a1(sha): bzlog bsdig/ rtsa ba'i sa bon rlung dang por// sbyor ba'i mtshams su a mu ka/ de bzhin gzhan yang rims kyis te// bdun pa bdun bskor
409a2(sha): bzlog la spogs// sgo bzhir sbyor ba bdun bdun bsdeb// dbus nas go bzlog dum nas ti// mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba mtshan mo ste// bzlog sngags drag pos gnad la
409a3(sha): dbab// drag po bdun gyi spogs pa yin// phyag rgya brgyan dang 'dug stangs bzlog/ 'khyil pa sbrul dang 'gros stabs kyis// re mig bcu gnyis nyi ma bzhi// yab kyi
409a4(sha): 'bru bzhi mtha' ru bsdebs// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// dang po ral gri'i phyogs nas bsdeb// gnyis pa rdo rje'i mtshams su bsdeb// rin chen pad+ma go
409a5(sha): rims bzhin// thams cad mi mthun mthun rnams brde ba// de yi rim pa mi mthun gzugs// bcu bdun mtha' nas bzlog la bsdeb// ta lang 'gros bzhis bsnol/
409a6(sha): mar bsde ba// re mig gcig por gcig blangs pas// yig 'bru bcu drug bcu drug bsdeb// dbus nas mgo drangs thob thang brtsi// 'dod pa'i mtshams su a
409a7(sha): mu ka/ sha za mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba ni// dbang sdud srin mo'i las yin te// kye ka ma las kyi 'khor lo bca'// mkha' 'gro 'bar ma'i bcud la dril// mtha'
409b1(sha): nas dbus su ya la bsdu// dang po rin chen mtshams nas drang // 'bru gsum mtha' yab kyis bsdeb// rin chen pad+ma phyogs mtshams te// ral gri'i phyogs mtshams
409b2(sha): rdo rje'i mtha'// sems kyi rtsa ba bcud bsdus nas// sa yi khams bsdus tshu la thim// chu khams bsdus la grod la bstim// me yi khams bsdus rlung la thim//
409b3(sha): rlung dbugs rgyun chad nam mkhar bsdu// bsdus nas thig le 'bru gnyis la// steng 'og me chugasad cing 'pho// de bzhi thad tshugs sbyor ba brgyad// snga ma de
409b4(sha): bzhin rim bzlog bsdeb// re mig grangs dang snga ma bzhin// mtha' nas dbus su spogs pa ste// dmar nag gnyis kyis sbyor ba bsde ba// sbal 'gros lta bur dbus
409b5(sha): su dril// rgyu yi dngas ma dbyings su bsdu// bde ba'i lam nas 'dod pa'i mkha'// tshangs pa'i gnas su 'od zer spro// tshe gnas bzlog 'khor ya la bsdu//
409b6(sha): dbus kyi ya la shes pa bstim// de bzhin sbyor ba kun shes na// drag po gnad kyi spogs pa yin// gzhan du 'ching 'gyur don med 'gyur// srog dang bral ba nyid
409b7(sha): yin te// drag po 'phrul gyi 'khor lo las// drag po'i 'khor lo bzlog pa yin// sbyor ba mchog gi las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ drag po
410a1(sha): spogs pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thog bdag bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
410a2(sha): sbyin thang 'phrul gyi sbyor ba las// maN+Da la sa yi dkyil 'khor la// don gnyis sgrub pa 'di lta ste// gnas ni ri gsum rtse mo 'am// brag nag chu mdo dur khrod sa//
410a3(sha): dbyen gnas chen por tshogs bsags la// tsha gsum chu dang thod pa gsum// phyi mtshams gcad la bar mtshams gnan// lha yi bsnyen pa bye ba yis// ma mo dbang
410a4(sha): du bsdus la bsnyen// maN+Dal gru bzhi mdzes pa la// khrag sna gsum gyis chag chag gdag/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par gdab// dbus na thig skor gsum du bskor
410a5(sha): dbus su gru gsum nag por bya// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram ldan// yang logs 'khor lo rtsibs drug bya// skam rlon zod 'phreng thams cad ldan// gru chad bzhi dang khyams
410a6(sha): kyis bskor// sgo bzhi rta babs mdzes pas brgyan// 'dod yon nor bu chun 'phyang dang// zhing bcu rgyu mthod pas spras// zhing gi bla de bzhin 'phen// rdo rje dang
410a7(sha): ni me rir ldan// chos kyi pho brang drag po la// me long nang du gser dngul nas// bya rgod snying dang nal bu'i snying // gnas lcags khro chu thog gi me// sbrul dang snying
410b1(sha): rna 'o ma zhug/ bla lam gsum la khrag d+hA dang // zhungs kar lcags phyi thal chen dug/ drang bu khrag dang thod tshal bzhag/ gru chad bzhi la dkod pa ni// dpal gyi gto
410b2(sha): ma ma mo'i rdzas// rak+ta bdud rtsi ldan byas la// dbus su lcags phur ya ma'i skur// yab yum rgyan dang bcas pa ru// hU dang ma la rdzogs par sgom// rgya gram mdze
410b3(sha): pa'i gzhi la yang // lcags phur bzhi las skur bskyed pa// ma las gnam sman thog bdag bzhi// smug nag ser nag dmar nag ljang // sku stod 'brug gi blag pa la//
410b4(sha): ga yu yi dril bu sbrul gyis brgyan// sku smad stag dang dor nag la// srin mo'i thod pa e ra kas brgyan// g.yas pa thod 'phreng ban d+ha g.yon// zhing rkyang gdan la rdzogs
410b5(sha): par bskyed// rdo rje rgya gram mtshams bzhi la// e ma la haM 'bru bzhi la// seng ldeng phur pa dbang chen bskur// zhing lpags stag sham thong sbrul brgyan// g.yas na zhing
410b6(sha): chung ba na d+ha g.yon// de bzhin zhing rkyang gdan la bskyed// phyi yi 'khor lo rtsibs drag la// phyogs bzhir skyar phur bzhi bkod la// ma ra tsa sha 'bra bzhi las// mgo
410b7(sha): brnyan gdong mo bzhi yi sku// ber nag g.yang gzhi thod sbrul brgyan// g.yas pa zor ba ban d+ha g.yon// mtshams gnyis 'khor lo'i rtse mo la// ya dang hUM las sku
411a1(sha): bskyed pa// khyab 'jug dbang phyug dregs pa bskyed// lha rnams sde brgyad phyogs mtshams gnas// gong nas 'dus pa'i tshul du sgom//
411a2(sha): bskyed pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// nag mo bdun b+h+yo brgya rtsa gcig/ de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// spyan drangs bstim la mchod par dbul// khro
411a3(sha): bo gshin rje'i bstod ra btang // khro bo'i thugs kar hU gsal bya// rgyal chen gdan las gsang sngags spro// dkyil 'khor ba la nyi dkyil na// ma dang bcas pa'i
411a4(sha): sngags gsal btab// 'jab bzlas phyogs bcur 'di spro dgug/ ma mo 'khor gyi tshogs bcas dgug/ rang dam rang gi snying pos dgug/ phyag 'tshal dkyil
411a5(sha): 'khor lha la bstim// gtso la srog snying dngos grub dbul// rak+ta rlabs la mchod pa dbul// snying po spel la 'dza ba la 'jug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid
411a6(sha): kyi skA gsung thugs las sro gi snying po 'di ba ton no// oM ga na d+ha pa sti ga na pu ti sarba big+h+ra na na pa ma hAM dza dza/ khri tsho re yin mchod pastod brlabs// dngos grub ra ba
411a7(sha): 'bring tha ma gsum// dkyil 'khor dbus su me 'bar dang // rdzas rnams zhu zhing 'chad na rab// ma mo mdangs dang sku ston dang // phyag 'tshal bkur sti byed
411b1(sha): na 'bring // sgrub khang g.yo 'gul khrag khol na// ma mo dbang du bsdus la rbad// gtor ma btang la dam rdzas mchod// drag po gsad ba'i sbyor ba brtsam//
411b2(sha): rab 'bring rtags dang drod thob na// dbus kyi gru gsum sbag mar brtsig/ mthing nag rtsang dang snying snas brgyan// thod pa'i ling gas ming rus brnag/ zhag bdun
411b3(sha): rbad cing drag pos bskul// rak+ta brlabs la gling bus 'bud// khri khri 'bad la bla dang dbral// bdag dang ma mo dmag 'dren na// gsang sngags brgya brgya thun la
411b4(sha): dbab// pho nya bskul la gzir sngags bzlas// bla dang 'brel na phur pa gdab// skya rings rta la zor skyon 'phang // thod pa dur khrod gling du gnan// de nas/
411b5(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di dag bton to// a pa phye sha ru lu ru lu nag mo srog la dun du na ma ma hUM dza// ma ma dmun
411b6(sha): b+h+yo/ yig mo lag mo sod/ thor ma ma rmugs rgyob/ dmun snying la rgyob/ lagra nag mo sgying la rgyob/ rag mo b+h+yo/ badz+ra ka ru na zad/ rnying khrag tshal ba
411b7(sha): rbad/ rngubs rtsi ta la rbad phyogs mugs rbad/ snying khrag kha la thad/ tshal bu saM na sin du rbad/ srog la hu raro thums ya pa rbad/ b+ha ru ragra srog la nan
412a1(sha): gsad pa'i las ni lnga dang ldan// gsad pa thun gyi las su bshad// gzhan yang thog ser dbab pa'i las// dong bu khrag sna thod
412a2(sha): pa mda'// 'bum bzhi khri yis byin brlabs 'phang // nya stong dgu gsum bcu gcig brgyad// bzhi gnyis las mthar rta zor ba skyon// gsang sngags
412a3(sha): sbyor ba'ang gnyis su bsdeb// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton no// oM ma hA tsan+da pa ta ta na ta ka/ dz+wa la dzA la/
412a4(sha): ra/ rag sha ragra baM/ he dan ra ya phroM phreM/ pa sa ra na hri la hri la/ a pa sha ya dun dun/ dza ti khu raM b+h+yoHb+h+yo phreM shar sing krol ma ragra raM shar b+h+yo phro/ 'di dge
412a5(sha): sbyor ba dam ste// las kyi rgyal po kun bsdus yin// ya ba ga sha yi sbyor bsdus nas// de ba ra tsa'i mkha' dang sbyar// nA ga 'gu lin da la sra// rten gsum
412a6(sha): yul gyi lus la brdeg/ sbyor ba'i dam pa mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ sbyin thang thun gyi le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// /
412a7(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gdug pa can gyi srog dril ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre'i rgyun srang ngam lha khang du// dkyil 'khor phung shul sa la bya//
412b1(sha): dug chu khrag gis chag chag gdab// chos kyi pho brang zlum por bya// rtsibs bzhi mu khyud thod pa sprul// gru chad bzhi dang ldan pa la// dam rdzas snying sna bzhi la rta na//
412b2(sha): ka li sho na tsa ra s+phu rA'i don// ka li ka pha thom nag tu// rgyal chen sa yi ga dan la dgram// rtsibs la mdu' bzhi dang dang dkor// stag gzig gser dngul ldan pa
412b3(sha): ste// gru chad b+hA li khru re dbus// da ka ra dmar nag gsum dkor chas brgyan// zla kham mthing nag rtse mo khrag/ thun rdzas thod pa lcags phur bzhi// byang shar
412b4(sha): gru gsum mararA ni// steng na khwa rgod g.yag rnga shun// dpal gyi gtor ma rak+ta phyi// rgyun dang mchod pa rdzogs bshams la// dkyil 'khor pa yi g+ha ru bsgom/
412b5(sha): rgyalnga chen sa yi dkyil 'khor du// bdag nyid yi dam gsal bsgom la// shar du li byin dkar po rta// za 'og stag gzig zangs gri mda'// khra dang sbyang khu
412b6(sha): 'gri ma zhing 'khrol// lho ru dge bsnyen gying chen ljang // za 'og rin chen seng ge zho na// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gtsan gzan 'grol// nub tu yab ba dud sga la
412b7(sha): gnag/ kun khrag thod pa rta na gzhon// blon po bdun dang pho nya 'grol// byang du btsan dmar dar dkar ta// bse khrab pas mdung mda' dmar sdog/ byang dang byang
413a1(sha): sman ba tsan 'phrin 'grol// da tsa dza ra a tri las// bskyed la bka' nod rtsibs la gzhag/ 'bru sna shing thog chang dang mngar// rgya chos dkar
413a2(sha): cha 'bras kyis mchod// lha 'dzab khri la srog snying po da// rang dbang med par dbang du bsdu// grub pa'i rtags ni rnam pa gsum// bya dang gcan gzan gtod cing
413a3(sha): za// 'gro phyir 'grol zhing bdag sgo srun// phyi yi rtags de nang du bsdu// rgyal blo na ban d+ha skya shar kun// bkur sti phyag dang las byed na// me 'bar drod skye nyams
413a4(sha): stobs che// gsad rtags mthong na sbyor ba brtsams// steng bzhi bskul zhing rbad sngags bzlas// bla dang sprul pa khugs par bsam// 'bru ba khung gzugs la
413a5(sha): thun gyis bra ba// khugs pa'i rtags ni dud 'gro 'am// bya dang ri dwags gsod cing sha// dmag dpon byed dang sgra 'gugs na// gsang sngags dril la gzugs
413a6(sha): la brdeg/ shes pa 'phel ba'i drod rtags ni// nyams dang 'tshal dang thibs dang lkugs// mtshan brdeg g.yul 'gyed mkhar 'bebs na// ru tho ma nang du
413a7(sha): rten gzugs bsdu// ru tho ma kha gcad dar gyis gril// rgya gram mun pa'i bcud la gnan// yi dam lha yi stobs dang sbyor// sngags kyi sbyor ba bzhin du bsdig
413b1(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las dmod sngags drag po 'di bton to// oM dang khrag tu mun/ tsa shu la ha ti dzA/ hri dzA gri ba ra ba hUM/
413b2(sha): badz+ra sA du ra baM hUM dza dza/ du kri ra tsa gr-i ba bi ta ya sarba du sta ni pa ri b+h+yo/ myogasarba da/ rmugs thib sa// ha ra hu ra thun rba da/ srog breng shag thun rba da/ ku ma ra
413b3(sha): tsa srog la shag rba da/ dgra bo thum ri la/ zhung khyer srog la shag rba da/ srog khyer ha ba dang du nan/ ra tsa phye shag khra nan tsa shu la na na/ hur thums srog gzir nan
413b4(sha): bya ba kun gyi sngon 'gro ba// bdag dngos snying po nyi shar 'od// phyogs bcu zhing khams bde bas gang // slar 'dus bzhi snying gcig tu dril// bka' nod ci bcol
413b5(sha): las rnams byed// mtshon cha thogs nas dmigs pa gsod// sgrol ging bzhi yis khyer zhing bstod// dbang po 'chal nas yan lag gcod// khong gshegs
413b6(sha): nang khrel bton nas za// don khrag 'thung zhing bla tshe 'chang // srid pa gsum phung spu gri rno// gsod byed drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud
413b7(sha): las// srog pa zhi dril nas bsad pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// / de rnas bcom ldan 'das kyis srog bzhi dril nas lo thog gzhom pa 'di
414a1(sha): bshad do// sa phug lha khang yul btsan sar// maN+Dal khrag sna gsum gyis byug/ khyi sbyang mi yi thod pa la// gar 'bebs yul gyi ming
414a2(sha): bris la/ sha khrag skam po'i gtor mas dgang // maN+Dal gru chad bzhi la dgod// dong bu thod can 'brong chen rA// gla dang bcas pa bzhi bshams la//
414a3(sha): khrag snas bkang la dbab sngags gzhug/ maN+Dal logs bzhi brten bshams la// g.yas ngur bdud bskyed thod chen gying // sbyang thod rgyal po glang ru btsan/
414a4(sha): bsnyen pa dang bcas chu dril bstim// grub pa'i rtags ni srin la gzung // shing 'dra bar nub nas bsring // byang nas khams nog skyo skya lho// kham nag du da kha
414a5(sha): shar nas 'phung // bka' 'dren lug dang bya yi tshogs// grub pa'i rtags de dbab pa brtsam// b+ha rten klu gnyan brag btsan la// thod pa gsum gyi
414a6(sha): ma zhug/ yul mthong rtse nas zer gyis dbab// 'khyag pa'i ri rgod drag po 'bab// gsang ba'i sbyor ba snad snang min// sbyor ba btud na mngon du 'byung //
414a7(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la dril zhing dbab pa'i gsang sngags 'di bton no// oM du phrag tu mun pro dza/ tsa shu la ha sti pr-i dza/ hri
414b1(sha): 'gri pa ra ba hUM pro dzA/ badz+ra sa du ra ba hUM pro dzA dzA/ a mu ka phroM phreM shar sha rA yaM yaM 'ur kham thog zog hri la hI la kha ha ra shar shar b+h+yo/ mdzes pa'i rgyan dang bsdebs
414b2(sha): gyur na// bdud bcan gying nga rgyal srog dril bas// chu rgod ri ltar btabs pa yin// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las//
414b3(sha): srog bzhi dril la dbab pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khrag thun gyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// gnyen ra
414b4(sha): gdug pa'i bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi la// dbus su mthing nag zla kham gsum// rtsibs bzhi zod parkam rlon 'phreng // sgo bzhi gru chad 'dod yon khyam/
414b5(sha): dur khrod sbrul dang chu srin brgyan// gtor ma gsur dang snying gsum rdzas// mchod pa la sogs bsnyen pa 'bum// mthing nag dbus su mon thod gzugs// ming rus dri
414b6(sha): ma brnag pa'i khams// nag gsum khrag dang yugs sa bsnol// khrol bu dug gi chu yis bkru// sa ma rag sha khams rbad las// sha za ki kaM mon gyi gzugs/
414b7(sha): khams gsum gang bas khyab par bsam// brgyad nas dbu gzugs bcu drug gdon// nyi shu gnyis nas stong gi bar// zhag dgu thun sgrub srog la rbad// bcu bcu
415a1(sha): grangs gzung khrag la bstim// sha za pho mo rngam pa kun// zhal nas sngags zlos rlangs pa 'phro// gdug pa'i mtshon chas brnag pa 'joms//
415a2(sha): phyag brnyan drod 'phros ar+ya bskul// sa chu ma chung 'byung ba bzhi// rgyu yi tshul gyi pho nya rbad// me mar gsad phyir khrag thun dbab// drod dbang gzhom phyir chu khams dkrug/
415a3(sha): dug gsum gzhom phyir gnad gsum bsdig/ rgyu gnyis gsad pa'i shes pa dpral// phung po khams dang dbang po yul// 'joms byed gdug pa'i drag sngags brdag/
415a4(sha): 'ja' tshon me tog lha yi rtags// khol la ma lud na 'phang ba'i dro da// rnyog gam 'phro na khugs pa'i rtags// rngam tshig nyon mongs yul la 'bar// gsad pa drag po'i
415a5(sha): drod yin pas// bskul zhing bstim la lam du gzhug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya ma rag shaM baM ri li li khrag la
415a6(sha): mu sha tsit+ta hur thum rAg sha tsit+ta ba srog la thun b+h+yo/ sngags pa chas bzlos thig le gdab/ dbang gzugs lam dbye skyi bcings 'phang / khrag thun drag po'i sbyor bar ba shad
415a7(sha): rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ khrag thun gyi le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyungs kar thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
415b1(sha): maN+Dal dbus su gtor ma rdzas// ya ma'i skur bsgoms bsnyen pa 'bum// gru gsum rtsang bcas thod par gzugs// lho ru bris sku g.yang gzhi 'phan// byang chub gri
415b2(sha): thod nyungs ka ra thun// khrag dang dug bskus sha za'i gzugs// spyang mo rdum pa pho nya bla// khyi dom rgyug pa sprul pa drod// khyung khra dur bya klad khrag srog/ bdud dang mon pa
415b3(sha): shan pa len// sbrul nag gdug 'gro blo snying rtsa// sha za'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rol// khri tsho dgu ru bla la rten// dril zhing nyungs kar spog la 'phar// de byung gzugs
415b4(sha): ya brdeb cing brab// bdud dang mon gyi pho nya mngag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// shrI ya ma rag sha du na mugs rtsa la ya yaM srog
415b5(sha): la 'dun b+h+yo/ stag bya'i rgod ngar nyungs kar blug/ rgyud med gzhu yis dgra la 'phang // drag po 'joms pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// nyungs kar
415b6(sha): thun sgrub pa'i le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dug thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sbyang du ga ra dug nim pa dug/ bong dang
415b7(sha): thar nu'i lkug pa// 'om yo byad pa skye khrag drug/ gri bo'i thod pa sbyar la brnag/ ling ka ming yang thod par gzhug/ 'thom nag gsum gyi kha la brdeg/ mthing na ga yol ba
416a1(sha): zhing lpags gur// gshin rje'i sku bsgoms bsnyen pa 'bum// bdud dang sha za mon pa bskul// thun sngags brgya rgya thod par brdeg/ shan pa'i tshogs
416a2(sha): nams thun khrag rlob// thun brdeg dgra la dug zor 'phen// thun sngags brgya yis shan pa bskul// thun la rlangs pa 'phro na 'phang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi
416a3(sha): sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton no// ya ma kha la da rod tsa la pa ril tsa ma ri ha la snying khrag hur baM srog la thun b+h+yo/ gsang sngags 'chad la dril la brdeg/ 'od byung ma
416a4(sha): 'bar khol nas 'phang // mda' yis lam dbye thod pa 'phang // 'thom tshan gsum gyis ra zor 'phang // gsur chen gtang la sha za bskul// sbyor ba drug gi mchog tu
416a5(sha): ba shad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ dug thun gyi le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mda' thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
416a6(sha): ri sogs dben pa'i dur khrod du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rgyan dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum zla kham bzhi// phyi rim rtsibs bcu sgo bzhi me// dur khrod rgyan dang gton
416a7(sha): ma rdzas/ dbus su zhing bsnol ma he'i gdan// gshin rje nag po rab 'jigs sku// sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug pa// dur khrod chos sku me ri glong // 'khor lo
416b1(sha): kha T+wAM be tshon g.yas// zhing chung dgra sta thod pa g.yon// sngo nag gtum mo g.yon nas 'khyud// zla kham gsang ba'i drod 'dzin bzhi// thod pa thon khrag rlob cing
416b2(sha): 'phen// zhing chung sbrul nag sku la gsol// rtsibs la bdud po mi zan bcu// sgo bzhi ba sre yi skyes bu bzhi// bse khrab bse rmog thod sbrul brgyan// g.yon pa bse
416b3(sha): gzhu dug mda' g.yas// ba se yi rnga ma khri 'brug la zhon// dug mda' ltas ngan sgo bzhis pa sgron// dkyil 'khor dbus su rgya gram bzhag/ 'og tu ling ka ming
416b4(sha): byang brnag/ lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod mthar dbul// mda' bzhi 'gul 'gul thun brdeg bskul// khrag gis bran la dug ngar blud// nya gsum drag po'i tshe sa la
416b5(sha): 'phang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung yumra la thun sngags 'di bton to// ya man ta ka dun mugs/ ya ma rA tsa tsit+ta rbad// kha la yag mo yag sha ma ra
416b6(sha): du na ni dzo rbad/ du na sni baM/ hur hur ling ling thu thu hri shag thun b+h+yo/ gsang sngags sbyor ba'i rgyal po yis// rtsa rgyud dbugs lam gcod cing 'joms// rab tu
416b7(sha): brnag pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ mda' thun gyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phur
417a1(sha): thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yid mthun dben pa'i dur khrod du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi la// gru gsum rtsib sa bzhi rtsibs bcur
417a2(sha): ldan// dbus su yab yum gri lcags 'gying // rtsibs bzhir gshed bdag mchog chen bzhi// yang logs gdug pa'i mngag phur bcu// khyams la las kyi gdang
417a3(sha): phur khri// mu ran kha khyer ke sing rtsang // sgo bzhir sgo ma'i mgyogs phur dgod// zhing rkyang re 'am gru gsum la// rdzas kyi phur pa lha ru bskyed// spun drangs
417a4(sha): mchod pa byin gyis brlab// sngags kyis dbang bskur phyag rgya bstan// gtso la khri khri 'khor la stong // rdzas la me 'bar drod thob na// byang nub 'bru ba gnas
417a5(sha): gtsang bcas bca'// thod pa ling ka byang khram brnag/ pho nya bsngag la dbang po dgug/ rten gyi gzugs la sbyor ba dbab// gnas lnga yan la ga dro la
417a6(sha): brdeg/ lhag ma byin brlabs mchod pa bsngo// dug lnga'i mchod mthar ba stab pa bya// ba krag dang gzi mdangs shes pa bsdu// ye shes lha yi gnas la dgod
417a7(sha): dbang bskur byin brlabs brtan pa bskyed// lhag ma rjen shun ro khang gnan// drag po thun gyi sbyor ba yis// btab pa'i kun rlag gdon mi za// de nas bcom
417b1(sha): ldan 'das kyis thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya man ta ka srog la hur thum rbad/ ya ma me ta kle srog la gzer thum rbad/ ratsa sa to ka pa ling
417b2(sha): myogs rbad/ ru na yon tsit+ta khaMrbad/ ra ya tsa ni tsa la breng shag rbad/ ma ma snying thun rag mo r-i thun ru lu ru lu ki la ya srog la thun rbad/ brnag pa'i rgyal po sngags kyi
417b3(sha): thun// don gnyis kun 'joms thog chen gzer// drag po'i phur thun gsang bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ phur thun gyi le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//
417b4(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang thun gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod rme ba'i rdzas sogs la// phungs gsum gyi stegs bu
417b5(sha): la// dbus su gru gsum 'thom nag gzhug/ nang du rog po'i tsit+ta la// byang bu dmar nag gnyis bres la// dgra bo pho rgyud mo rgyud gzhug/ dud khrod ras la sngags
417b6(sha): bris la/ rog po'i tsi t+ta'i phyi nas dril// ra dang bcas pa dar gyis dag pa// gtor ma brnag pa'i steng du bca'// khrag dang dam rdzas gsur gyis bskor// khrig
417b7(sha): gsumathun brdeg 'bru gsum brab// phye gsum dug gsum de bzhin bstim// thun brdeg snying gshog rtsa yang gcod// gsad pa'i drod dang dngas ma 'brel//
418a1(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las thun sngags 'di bton to// ya ma kha la rag sha da rod ya yaM thu na/ ya ma rmugs ni
418a2(sha): rmugs sni tsit+ta shag/ ya ma kha la ma ting sha shAM rtsa la rbad/ ba la thun snying thun myags srog la thun b+h+yo/ rnam shes brgyad dang dngas ma bzhi// dbang po bkrag mdangs
418a3(sha): tshangs pa'i rtse// gcod cing 'joms par byed pa'i sngags// gsang ba thun gyi rgyal po 'di// rang dbang 'dus nas rang zor 'phang // brnag pa'i yul mkhar
418a4(sha): gzugs la brdeg/ dbang gzugs 'o dod bden pa brjod// gsang thun sngags kyi rgyal por bshad// rgyal mtshan ma long gi rgyud las/ gsang thun gyi le'u//
418a5(sha): ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdong drug pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa gzhi ba rnag la rtsub pa yi// lho
418a6(sha): phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// brag dang sa phug gnyan sa ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi thod rmon bskor// phyi rim
418a7(sha): rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// zod skam 'phreng ba rak+ta 'dzag/ gru chad sgo bzhi zhing brgyad 'dags// tshangs pa'i gdung la king chung ldan// nyi zla la sogs
418b1(sha): rin chen mdzes// dbus nu tra bro mo bsnol// ma he nyi zla'i gdan lar+tha// yan lag sbyor bas ya sa'i klu// nag po rngas khro brjid pa la// zhal drug g.yas
418b2(sha): dkar g.yon dmar te// 'og me'i g.yas ser g.yon pa sngo// dbus mthing 'og ma'i dud kha rnga ma// spyan gsum mche gtsigs ag tshom ser// thod pa he ru
418b3(sha): sbrul gyi sa brgyan// phyag mtshan bcu gnyis sbo ma la rags// 'khor lo ral gri kha T+wAM mda'// dgra sta dra byAg tho g.yas pa ra bsnams// ban d+ha tI shul lcags
418b4(sha): kyu gzhu// zhags pa zhing chung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs brgyad brkyang ba skum dor thibs tshul// rigs bzhi brgyan pa lbu tshig ga nyan// glang chen stag lpags
418b5(sha): ga yang gzhi blugs// bdud srin mgo gcad do shal spras// g.yon na sgeg mo sngo nag gtum// tri shul ba na d+ha 'khyud nas stob// thugs ka ra ya ma rA tsa yang //
418b6(sha): sku mdog sngon po sbrul gyi sa brgyan// zhal gsum phyag drug sha khrag za// g.yas pa 'khor lo be co ni zheng // g.yon pa zhags pa dgra sta snying // sprul pa'i thugs
418b7(sha): khar nyi ma hU// yab yum thabs dang shes rab las// srog gi tri kra ta bzhi gnas// rtsibs bzhi zhing bsnol ma he'i gdan// phyi rim 'khor lo bcu gnyis la// zhing
419a1(sha): brkyang ma he'i gdan steng na// kong tshe gsod byed lha mchog dmar// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir gnas// tel ba bya sangs dmigs pa
419a2(sha): grang // shar lho la sogs mtshams bzhi gnas// nag po nag 'joms steng 'og gnas// khram thogs rtses 'debs rtsibs gnyis la// thams cad sum rnams g.yon
419a3(sha): nas 'khyud// sgo bzhir be con lcags kyu dang // tho ba ral gri thogs pa bzhi// khro mo gtum khro rgyal chen bcas// lhun po bzhi dang bcas pa dgod// dam tshig dkyis
419a4(sha): 'khor brtan byas la// ye shes dkyil 'khor phab la bstim// bya ba'i rim pa kun rdzogs nus// lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// thon nas gang 'dod las la sbyar//
419a5(sha): 'khor lo sbyin sreg thun gyi mthar// thod pa 'khor lo brnag pa ga na na// tshe dang 'dod pa'i sid+hi blang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi
419a6(sha): sbyor ba 'di bton// oM shrI many+dzu a kro te ka ya man ta ka be li rigra man hU dza dza/ ya ma rag+ma du ra tsit+ta thun mA ra ya zad/ srog la nan/ 'khor lo sbyor ba brgya phrag gcig/
419a7(sha): bsdus pas rtsa ba bcud dang gcig/ sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ zhal drug pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o// /
419b1(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gsum pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dug gsum sbyor ba gzhom pa'i phyir// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas pa'i// shin tu
419b2(sha): dben pa'i dur khrod dam// phug dang sa phug dben pa ru// dkyil 'khor mthing nag gru gsum la// zla kham bzhi dang ldan pa bri// thod 'phreng me ri phyi ru 'bar// lho yi/
419b3(sha): phyogs kyi zla kham la// 'jigs pa'i rgyal po gshi na rje gshed// skra yi gzugs ba rnya na bzhugs su gsol// g.yas su sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yon du za byed pa
419b4(sha): ta li// g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi zla kham la/ sku yi gzugs brnyan dgod par bya// yang na snying po yig 'bru las// sku yi gzugs brnyan bzhugs su gsol// yang
419b5(sha): na snying po yig 'bru las// skur pa skyed de ni bsgom par bya// byang gi phyogs kyi zla kham ste/ snying po yi ge bris pa las// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yis// skur
419b6(sha): bsgoms mchog phur sor gsum gzugs// gshin rje yab yum lto ba ru/ 'tshogs par sbyar ba'i ya thags kyis// kang ka'i sgo 'am bya rog smros// yi btags kyi ni
419b7(sha): gos la bri// 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba sngar bzhin las// dgra yi rkang rjes la sogs la// ling ga sor brgyad cog pur bzhag/ ri sho dang ni gro ga la// de yi rus dang ming
420a1(sha): bris la/ b+hing la dug tu zan te bzhag/ ka shin dza lab yum bar du gzhug/ tshon ci skud pas bcings nas sa// mtshan ngan pan d+ha 'gyur du/
420a2(sha): bcug la bud med yugs sa mo'i// sgra yi zag pas bcings par bya// mthing nag gru gsum steng du gzhag/ gtor ma gsum dang arga bcas// byas te dkyil 'khor
420a3(sha): 'gram du bzhag/ gsur tshan dud pa gtang bar bya// de lta dkyil 'khor bcas nas ni// sngags pa chas gos nag po gon// lho yi phyogs su kha bltas la// khro bo
420a4(sha): sngags kyis mtshams bcad la// ting 'dzin rnamag sum rim bzhin bsgom// khrag 'thung yab yum bskyed nas ni// spyan drangs mchod dang bstod pa bya// bshags
420a5(sha): pa dag ni gzhung bzhin bya// ma shar bgrangs pa'i tshes brgyad de// nyi shu gsum nas drug tu ni// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ni// ya man ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// dgongs
420a6(sha): dang tho rangs gtor ma gtang // nyi shu bdun nas gnam stong du// zhag ni bzhi yi bar du ste// gsad pa yi ni las bya ste// bdag nyid khro bo'i skur bsgoms la// lhoru
420a7(sha): kha bltas mdun du ni// ho khung gru gsum rtse mo lhor// chag gang thur du brkos pa la// ming rus bsregs pa'i sol ba yis// kha dog nag po dag tu bya// de ni
420b1(sha): nang du ban d+ha gzhug/ gshin rje dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// khro bo zhabs ni g.yon pa ni// rdo rje phur pa rtse gcig par// bsgoms te gshin rje'i snying khar gnan/
420b2(sha): dgug cing dbang du bsdu ba yi// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo bzlas// gshin rje nag po 'khor dang bcas// rang dbang med par
420b3(sha): dbang du 'du// dza ltar bcol ba'i las kyang byed// snying po sngags kyi bar bar du// khro bo'i bstod ra gtang par bya// rag ta ba stabs te mchod pa dbu la// gshin
420b4(sha): rje las la btsud nas ni// dgra bo myur du gsad pa'i phyir// ban d+ha dkyil 'khor thog tu bzhag/ bcol ba'i las kyi sngags bzhi ni// nyin mtshan phye la mtshan mo
420b5(sha): bzlas// sngags kyi bzlas brjod par bar du// rdza rnga brdungs te gshin rje bo da// rak+ta bsgreng ste mchod pa ba ta ba// 'khur ba bus te spyugs pa blang // dung ting ka yi sngags
420b6(sha): brjod la// dgra bo de la gshin rje rbad// tshes gcig tu ni brtsis pra yi// nyin mtshan gnyis kyi mtshams su ni// gnan pa yi ni cho ga bya// lha klu gdug pa'i 'dug sa
420b7(sha): dang / ro ma khong du song nas ni// gnan pa'i ban d+ha de nyid pa// ri rab pa rim gsum pa dang // snying po lam dang bcas pa bri// snying po rdzogs dnga'i rab pa skyed/
421a1(sha): ri rab kyi ni 'og tu gzhug/ steng du lha yi pho zang gdag// 'jigs byed ya ma rA dza yi// mchog gi phur ba sor gsum pa// gnan pa'i
421a2(sha): sngags ni stong bzlas la// rdo rje phur brtse gcig tu// bsgoms te ling ka'i snying khar btab// gshin rje yab yum lto bar gzhug/ mtshan ngan ban d+har bcug nas/
421a3(sha): ni// snga ma bzhin du thag pas bcings// ro yi lung bur sbas te bzhag/ gshin rje nag po'i lag tu gtad// ya man ta ka'i sngags kyis gzir// gdon mi za
421a4(sha): par gsod par byed// las kyi gnas smin sbyang ba'i phyir// bskang gso'i cho ga rgya cher bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang
421a5(sha): sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag ba ton no// o shr-i many+dza a kro te ka ya na ma ta ka dwe bI kro d+hi shrI yag+ma dza dza/ ma ma e ka dza ti sa ma ya stom ru lu ru lu hA b+h+yo hA dza dza/ o a
421a6(sha): kro te ka ya man ta ka ha na ma tha ban dza ng+ku/ ya me snying sha sha dzA dzA dun gan snying ru pa sha ya ma A kaR+sha ya hU dza dza/ o hriSh+Ti bi kri tA na a mu ka sha tU nA sha ya hU phaT/
421a7(sha): ya ma me ta kre a ka pra ma yarba da ya rA dza sa to a mu ka rag+ta ra tsa yarba da ya/ ru na yo ni a mu ke mur dza yArba da ya/ ra ya tsa ni a mu ka mA ra yarbad yaM/ oM shrA man+tha
421b1(sha): che ge mo ka la rU pa snyam pa ni hUM phaT/ hU ya man ta kri ta badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hU/ snyam pa ya nan nan/ gsad pa mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
421b2(sha): gi rgyud las/ zhal gsum pa'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gcig pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan
421b3(sha): yang zhal gcig sgrub pa ni// dur khrod chen po'am gnyan ra ru// gtor ma bdud rtsi sha chen snying // mchod pa rag ta dur khrod rgyan// bshams la zhing bsnol ma he'i/
421b4(sha): gad na// hU las khro bo gshin rje'i sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ spyan gsum dbu skra sbrul gyis bcings// stod nas me 'bar glang chen gyon//
421b5(sha): smad nas khrag 'dzag stug lpags sbrul// bdud dang ma mo mgo bos brgyan// mu stegs snying 'phreng do shal byas// snyan cha mgur chu gdub sor kun// rigs
421b6(sha): bzhi sbrul gyi brgyan pa'o// g.yon na mi zad gtum khro ma// mthing nag zhing gi gos zu tsan// thod pa rin chen sbrul gyis brgyan// g.yas pa kha TA tri shul
421b7(sha): 'khyud// g.yon pa be con thod khrag yab la bstob// thugs ka'i sa bon d+hu dang ma// sngags dang ldan pa mdun du bskyed// sngags pa ya nan ta ka ra bsgom//
422a1(sha): sngags kyis spyan drangs mchod la bstod// rag+na sbrengs la mchod pa dbul// mdzo rtol spre bu'i thod pa ru// brnag pa'i ling ka ming rus gzhug/
422a2(sha): mkhar nag skud pas thod par bsdam// rme ma 'am bsnol ma'i zhabs mas gril// mthing nag gru gsum nang du gzhug/ snol khrag gri khrag yugs sa'i khrag/ rdo phye
422a3(sha): lcags phye zangs phye gsum// nyungs kar skye tshe bra bo'i thun// phur pa ral gri brnag pa'i mtshon// thun bzhi'i sbyor bas brab cing gsad// nya gsum mtha' ru
422a4(sha): klu la gtad// drag po thun gyis bzlas brjod dang // nyin mo gtor ma nub mo dril// gshin rje nag po'i lag tu gtad// dregs pa mtsho 'khrugs stobs
422a5(sha): kyis gnan// drag po sngags kyis gzir la bca'// lha yi pho brang brtan par brtab// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang
422a6(sha): sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bton to// o a kro te ka ya ma na ta ka pe ta li hU dza dza/ ya man ta ka ma ma hri sti srog la ling thun/ ling thunarba da/ ma ma kro d+ha tsit+ta breng
422a7(sha): sha garba da/ ka li rag mo tsit+ta phrig phrig shaM nirba da/ ya ma mo sa ma ya srog la thum thu ma nyal nyal rbad/ ya man ta ka ma ma hri ti che ge mo'i srog la gzir nan/
422b1(sha): mchog tu sngags pa'i rgyal blo na 'joms// thun bzhi las kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ zhal gcig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o// /
422b2(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gsad bcud rtsa ba'i man ngag mchog/ de yi sbyor ba 'di
422b3(sha): wA ste/ ri nag 'ja' tshon chu gling ru// dkyil 'khor dug gi chag chag gdab// dbus su gru gsum rtsibs bzhi ldan// thod 'phreng gru chad rgyan rnams
422b4(sha): mdzes// blo bzhi mtsho gling dur khrod 'dud/ gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'jigs pa'o// dbus nu yi btags ma he'i gdan// snying sna don khrag thod
422b5(sha): par bcas// ya man ta ka rdzogs par bskyed// rang 'dod yan lag 'khyud pa'i yum// gtso dang gnyis med 'khyud pa las// rtsibs bzhi gdan
422b6(sha): la kri kA bzhi// gcer bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// thod skam dbu rgyan gdengs ka sprul// zod rlon dro shal rigs bzhi'i brgyan// phyag g.yas zhing
422b7(sha): chung 'khor lo g.yon// smug nag ser nag dmar nag ljang // yum yang yab la 'khyud nas stobs// tsit+taM ban d+ha g.yas dang g.yon// rdzogs pa'i tshul du
423a1(sha): gdan la dgod// spyan drangs mchod dang rag ta btab// bsnyen pa'i drod rtags gcer bu 'bum// gdug pa'i sngags bzlos mtshon
423a2(sha): cha brdeg/ gsad pa'i rol za yin rol// 'od sgra mthong nas 'khor lo bskor// gshed kyi sbyor ba bcu gnyis gcig/ 'og nas bshad pa'i sbyor ba bsde pa// las
423a3(sha): kyi mtha' btul gnyen la gtad// sngags kyi sbyor ba gsum du brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di
423a4(sha): bton no// oM ya ma me ta kyA hU dza dza/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// gshed bzhi'i bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o// // de nas bcom
423a5(sha): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal zhi ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa gzhi snum la 'jam pa'i phyogs// skyespyad mos tshal dang bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi spos
423a6(sha): dang ldan// chos kyi pho brang zlum por bya// nor bu'i 'phreng ba zlum por bskor// phyi rim pad+ma 'dra ba brgyad mdzes// dra ba dra phyed 'dod yon spras// rin chen chun 'phyang
423a7(sha): dril bus brgyan// rdo rje me 'od bum pas mdzes// rin chen me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// phyi khyams sems dpa'i gdan dang ldan// sgo bzhi rgyan dang ka bas
423b1(sha): 'degs// ba dan dril bu yid 'ong bskyod// gtor ma mchod rdzas lcang lo rten// bkra shis rdzas dang bdud rtsis dgang // dkar dmar dar dang hU rgyas gdab// gtso/
423b2(sha): bo'i mdun du gzhag par bya// lha yi gzhal yas mdzes par bshad// chos kyi khrong seng ge'i gdan// pad+ma'i gdan la hU las bskyed// sku mdog dkar ser gzhon
423b3(sha): nu'i tshul// rin chen dbu rgyan snyan cha brgyan// mgur chu tshangs skud do shal can// sems dpa'i skyil krung dbus nas 'gying // zhal bzhad tshems bzang smin
423b4(sha): mtshams 'brel// dbu sma lcang lo mthon mthing kha// phyag gi 'khor lo rab tu mdzes// 'gying bag 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// g.yas pa ral gri po ti g.yon//
423b5(sha): thugs kha'i sa bon dang ldan pa'o// 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i gdan stengs na// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// sems dpa'i rin chen chos dang las// rigs lnga'i
423b6(sha): dbu rgyan dor shal mdzes// phyag mtshan ming gis mtshon pa'o// mtshams bzhir lA s+ya mA le dang // gla gar lha mo bzhi dang ldan// grA bzhir dbyangs can mchod ldan ma/
423b7(sha): tsa ra tsi ka dang phag mo bzhi// dkar 'jam rgyan ldan bum pa thogs// gtso la phyogs shing gzhom tshul ldan// khyams la sems dpa' bcu drug ldan// sgo bzhir rdo rje
424a1(sha): be tshon dang // ral gri gtun shing thogs pa yis// gtum mo ro langs yag sha hri// rdo rje gsod byed byang du dgod// spyan drangs mchod mthar
424a2(sha): dbang bskur brlab// sngags pas thun bzhir bzlas pa bya// sngags kyi bar bar mchod dang bstod// gang 'dod dngos grub 'phrin las bcol// skye med gnas nas snying po
424a3(sha): bskul// sngags bzlas spros la khams gsum sbyang // mtha' ru zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// sngags pas bkrus la dngos grub blang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid
424a4(sha): kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// oM shri many+dzu ma hA shAn+tiM ku ru hUM dza dza/ thab khung pho brang dkar la zlum// bsregs shing bsreg rdzas de bzhin sbyar// gsang
424a5(sha): chen sngags bcus mchod pa dbul// dngos grub gang 'dod thob par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// 'jam dpal zhi ba'i le'u steng bdun pa'o// /
424a6(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thar byed 'byung ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang po'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba las// thar bya/
424a7(sha): 'byung ba'i 'phrin las 'di// myos dang mgo 'khor brlams pa dang // yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed// sgrub pa'i mthar byed drug tu bshad// ya ma thar byed sbyor
424b1(sha): ba ni// yi btags gos la thang pa bya// thig bzhi ba ta ba la sa su ma brtsags bskor// 'khrul mig brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang // mtha' ma bcu drug ldan par bya//
424b2(sha): bcu bdun sngags kyis mdzes byas la// bcu drug dbyangs kyis legs par bskor// hri sti sngags dang lho sbyor la// ya ma rA dza 'i tshogs bkug la// byin brla ba sa
424b3(sha): bstan pa ri ngar dang ldan// gsang mdzod bzhi dang 'bu ba gnas su// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu bkug la bzhag/ bdag nyid gshin rje thar byed sku// yum dang bcas
424b4(sha): pa bsgom byas la// phyogs bcu'i yam thams cad kun// ma lus rnga ma mam dregs pa'i tshul// bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar// sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs
424b5(sha): te/ rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas// g.yeng dang bcas pa'i sems spangs la// nyin mtshan rgyun du dka' thub brtan// bar bar bskur zhing las gnyer
424b6(sha): gtad// bcol ba'i las kyis sngags bzhi yang // nyin mo bzlas shing pho nya rbad// hri sti mtshan mo rbad cing dgug/ rigs kyi rgyal pos brgyan byas la// dbang
424b7(sha): sdud drag po'i las dang sbyar// mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags rgyas gzir// sgrol dang thar phyin gnas la dgod// khro bos rigs kyi ting 'dzin 'argyun// sgyu ma'i
425a1(sha): dbang bskur ting 'dzin rten// go 'phang bla med sbyor bas bgrod// rjes su brten cing cho 'phrul ldan// thugs rjes zhe sdang gnas su
425a2(sha): sgrol// shes rab sbyor bas 'dod chags sgrol// ye shes sgrol mas gti mug sgrol// yon tan bde bas nga rgyal sgrol// gtang snyoms lhag pas brag dog spol//
425a3(sha): mi dang 'od dang sbrang bu'i tshul// me lce drod kyis sbrang rtsi ltar// bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po dang // log pa'i sems 'chad dgra dang bgegs// shes rab thabs kyis/
425a4(sha): gzir nas sgrol// tha dad sbyor ba'i 'brel ba yis// yid 'khrug khrag skyug sgrol ba mchog/ ral gri thog mtha' spu gri'i sngags// gnas dang gnas pa ma yin te//
425a5(sha): nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal srog/ rgyu dang rgyu min bag chags bla// bsgral nas thar pa'i gnas su sgrol// de la drag po'i stobs dang ldan// las dang bya/
425a6(sha): ba'i rtsol pa rnams// nyams kyi drod ldan par sbyar// mi 'am phag gi mgo bo la// gi hA rgyu skyegs khrag gis bris// rgya gram ri rab gru gsum la// 'og nas
425a7(sha): 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang // gaing yang dmigs pa spel byas la// rag+ha dug gi chu yis bran// dgra dang mu stegs gnod byed kun// bdud dang srin po ma
425b1(sha): lu sa rnams// gzir zhing mnan pa drag tu bya// mi mthun phyogs su 'dul byad 'du// skar bsgoms thams cad pa sgra la zhing ba rnag/ kha sbyor thod pa sngar
425b2(sha): bzhin bca'// zhe sdang gtum khro'i phyogs su gnan// de naso bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di dag bton to// hri Sh+Ti bi
425b3(sha): kri tA na na hUM che ge mo sha tru na nA sha ya mA ra ya rba da/ ya sog sa bcu bdun snga ma bzhin// hri Sh+To tA nan b+hi a tI na na hUM che ge mo sha truM nA sha ya sta b+ha ya nan// bya ba
425b4(sha): kun rdzogs ya ma'i las// mthar byed 'byung ba dang por bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyu de las/ gshin rje mthar byed kyi le'u steng brgyad pa'o// /
425b5(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis log 'dren thar byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang bzhin grub pa'i gnas btsal la// bdud dang srin po rngam pa'i cho gas/
425b6(sha): mu stegs dgra dang dmigs pa'i gdon// gdul phyir log 'dren thar byed bsgrub// 'phrin las rgyal po 'khrul 'khor bca'// 'khor lo snga ma bzhin bris la//
425b7(sha): 'khor lo dbus kyi lte ba la// bdud rnams bsngags pa'i snying pos bskor// shar du dri za'i snying po bri// lho ru grul bum de bzhin bri// nub tu glu yi snying po bri/
426a1(sha): byang du gnod sbyin rgyud grol gnas// du na big+h+nAn/ rak+kha kra hUM/ tir rgya kra ta tsa/ nA ga hri ta na na/ da pa ra hUM ya/ gsang mdzod bzhi
426a2(sha): yi mun khang du// srog dgug dbye dang go sad gzir bzhi// snying po mda'i dang bcas pa dgod// ni dza A kaR+sha ya/ ni ba spu phaT/ nri mA ra ya rba da/ nri srog la
426a3(sha): big+h+na na/ thod pa rlon pa bris byas la// mu khyud thod pa'i 'phreng bas gtams// phyi rol sbrul gyis yongs su bskor// rnam par tshe ba'i gzugs byas la/
426a4(sha): khyi spyang dar ma'i thod par ldan// yang na kham pa'i ga bur bca'// dar ram skud pa dmar pos bcings// gru gsum dbus su bzhag par bya// rtse gcig
426a5(sha): phyag rgya'i skur bsgoms la// gtum mo mi zad mi ro za// g.yas pa ral gri lcags kyu g.yon// gnod sbyin lpags pa'i thod pas rgyan// rlung ngam yid/
426a6(sha): kyirta la zhon// gzhon nu nor bus brgyan pa'i yum// bcas la zhag gsum drag por bzlas// bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'du// gzhan yang de
426a7(sha): bzhin khro zhing rngam// dkar dmar ser dang smug ldang nag/ so so'i cha lugs rngam pa'i gzugs// mgon po gshin rje nag po yis// bgegs dang yog
426b1(sha): gzir zhing rbod// rngam pa'i zhal du za yin rol// nyin zhag gsum gyis bzlas pa rdzogs// yang nas yang du gzir zhing ga nan// lan grangs stong rtsa
426b2(sha): gcig tu brdeg/ gtad pa gong gsum rgya gram sar// ma yengs brtson 'grus brgya stong mthar// bde ba med pa'i gzugs rnams gnan// de nas yang
426b3(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// dun b+hi na nan/ rak+saM kra hUM/ tIr rgya ka ta dza/ nA ga hri da nan/ da pa ra hUM yaM ni
426b4(sha): mA ra ya rbad/ sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par gdags// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ log 'dren mngar byed kyi le'u ste nga dgu pa'o//
426b5(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mapar byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// zhing ras rgyu la 'khor lo bca'// mu khyud gsum bskor thig bzhi
426b6(sha): ga dab/ 'khrul dmigs brgya dang bcu gnyis gdab// mtha' ma bcu drug gcod pa'i gnas// ya ste tsa ba ma las skyed// me la srog ste ta la sdud//
426b7(sha): g.yo byed kle la khyab par gsal// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo glong bu mig/ rasti srog byed tsa la sdud// sa te skyed pa to te smin// ru yis 'phul zhing na la 'badra//
427a1(sha): yo la g.yo med ni la srog/ ra ste spor byed ya yis bskyod// tsa de dbang byed ni la thim// gshed bdag 'khor los gcod
427a2(sha): cing 'bigs// mtha' ma drag po spu gri ra ldan// kha sbyar ming ru sa thod par ldan// mthing nag dbus su brnag pa gzhug/ rang nyid gnod sbyin
427a3(sha): ma thar byed sku// ya ba yum yan lag rdzogs par bsgo ma// gnyis me da byang chu ba sems spros pas// yum gyi pad+ma ra ma byi la zhing 'dri la// 'phros
427a4(sha): pas sangs rgyas byang chub mchod// bdag dang bcas pa'i gzugs bsgral nas// slar 'dus yum dang bcas pa myos// gdug pa 'dul phyir
427a5(sha): 'od zer spros// khro bo chen po'i dgra ston pa// las kyi mthar byed 'phrin las bskul// sdang byed gnod sbyin mthar byed ltar// bar chad me
427a6(sha): par spro zhing dgug/ de dag zil gyis gnon cing 'joms// de yis dngos dang sku yi mdangs// nag po chen po gnod sbyin 'khol// dbu sgra kham
427a7(sha): nag gyen du 'khyil// thod pa sbrul mgo'i dbu rgyan can// phyag g.yas zhing chung ban d+ha g.yon// spyan gsum mche gtsigs brkyang bskum bzhugs//
427b1(sha): mi mthun bgags dang sdang ba'i da gra// ma lus 'phrin las mchog gis pajoms// dregs pa khyo shug gdan la 'dug/ zhing chen ga yang gzhis brgyun
427b2(sha): byas nas// glang chen stag dang thod sbul brgya na// 'dren pa'i stobs kyis 'gugs shing 'ching // las kyi rgyal po sa sgrol gyin stobs// 'gro ba'i shes pa
427b3(sha): rig pa dbyings la dgod// zhe sdang thugs 'chang khro bo'i rgyal po sa gnan// gdug par gyur pa'i sa ru thod ma khar gdab// nga rgyal la sogs dug gsum lto bar
427b4(sha): 'chang // ye shes dang las thams cad rdzogs par byed// rtag tu gsod cing gnan pa'i snying po bzlas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
427b5(sha): las gsang sngags 'di bton to// oM hriSh+Ti bi kri tA na na tsa ya ra ma ta hUM phaT/ ba yu ya kha mo dra hristi a mu ka mA ra ya rbad/ 'khor lo bskor zhing gsang sngags
427b6(sha): bzlas// gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par// bzlas na yig 'khrug myos shing gsod// rab tu brgyal nas thal bar 'jig/ gnan pa gdug pa'i sa ru bshad//
427b7(sha): rgyal mtshan ma long gi rgyud las/ gnod sbyin mthar byed kyi le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi btags mdzar
428a1(sha): byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// mthar byed 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi dbus su pho brang brtsam// ma thab e yi phyogs can la/
428a2(sha): bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer can// ngos la mi yi 'phreng ba gdags// kha khyer rdo rjer ba la// mu ra na thod pa'i 'phreng ba ste// bsregs shing ming rus shing dang sba ma//
428a3(sha): me la kha dog shin tu gnag/ rid pa zhugs gling bgrang 'phreng ba snams// mthar byed be con thod pa thogs// tshul bzhin spyan drangs mchod dang bstod// gang ltar 'dod//
428a4(sha): pa'i 'phrin las bcol// sbyin sreg mchod rdzas parnag pa'i gzugs// dug dang lan tshwa thar nu khrag/ kye tshe sbrang rtsi nyungs nag tshil// gu gul nag po lcags phye rus/
428a5(sha): bdag nyid lnga yi skur bsgoms la// mchod pa gsang sngags brgya yis dbul// phyag rgya zil gnan mtshon chas gtub// dkyil 'khor bskor gin gsang sngags bzlas//
428a6(sha): mar khu chen po gsum gyis dbul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di bton to// oM hri sti pa ra kha na raM raM yaM khaM a mu ka raM mA ya
428a7(sha): hUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ yi btags mthar byed kyi le'u ste re gcig pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu mthar
428b1(sha): byed kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// srin po klu dbang kun bsdus nas// mthar byed 'byung ba'i 'phrin las brtsams// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pho brang zlum// zla kham bzhi dang
428b2(sha): ldan pa la// dkar nag sbrul dang thod pas brgyan// dbus su ya ste shar du ta// yau ni lho la ru ni nub/ byang du ra dgod zla kham steng // bdag nyid 'ching byed byad kyi sku//
428b3(sha): dbu gsum phyag drug da ka ra dmar gnag/ ba spu gsal zhing lcags kyu g.yas// chu gri ka ta rgya gram g.yon// glang chen stag sham zhing chung brgyan// dur khrod klu dbang
428b4(sha): rgyan mchog ldan// ma lus sku la sogs pa la// gdug pa 'dul ba'i glu 'di blang // mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba gshin rje yi// 'phrin las
428b5(sha): rgyal po grub pa'i las// mtshan ma gsum gyis byin rlabs la// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i 'od zer gyis// nam mkha' dang ni 'od kyi lus// phaT ces brjod las bsku
428b6(sha): zhing 'pho// 'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis 'gengs// ye shes ma yis sreg cing spyong// sbyong zhing gang zhing 'od 'phros nas// shes zab ye shes me po che//
428b7(sha): kun gyi bag chags skyong bar byed// nam mkha' nyid las 'od zer 'byung // sngags kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du// sems las byung ba'i nam mkha' sreg/ 'phrin las
429a1(sha): gdon mi za bar 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di ston to// o ma hA nA ga ya ni smig ta bur
429a2(sha): be ya ra ne dza che ge mo'i srog la mA ra yarbad/ gsang sngags sbal na 'phrin las mchog/ mthar byed 'byung ba'i gnan par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ klu
429a3(sha): mthar byed kyi le'u ste re gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dang po shin tu dben pa yi//
429a4(sha): brag dang dur khro da sa phug tu// sa gzhi gnag la rtsub pa la// khru gang mda' gang legs par bsham// dbus su gru gsum nag po la// rtsibs bzhi sbrul gyi chu na pos
429a5(sha): rgyan// sgo bzhi thod pa dril bu bzhi// gtor ma sha chen dug sna 'bru// me tog khrag sna dug rgya chang // bshams la lcang lo lnga dang ldan// dbus su bdud rtsi pad+ma'i khrag
429a6(sha): gsur dang mchod pa dur khrod brgyan// bshams la mthing nag gur gyi gdab// rtsibs bzhir ban d+ha bya rgod snying // gsar dang sbrul gyi phye ma dang // ser ba phyi nang chu yis
429a7(sha): gang // thog thag bzhi yi rdzas su bsham// dbus su ro langs nag mo'i sku// 'gying bag rngam tshig nu ma 'bur// yan lag rags la tshogs mig zlum// spyan gsum
429b1(sha): khrag gisachis 'dzag/ 'gu gdangs su che gtsigs druklu rlangs 'gro// g.yas partse gasnum pan d+ha g.yon// sbru la zhing lpags sbrul gyis mdzes// skrod pa rdo rje
429b2(sha): gram gtams// zhabs gnyis ma stang nyi ma'i steng // rtsibs la dregs pa'i thog bdag bzhi// ma la sku bskyed rab pa can// sdug nag 'jigs pa'i zhing lkugs
429b3(sha): gsol// dbu la gsar dang mu tig brgyan// g.yas pa ral gri ban d+hA g.yon// sbrul dang thod rlon kun la mdzes// dri za klu 'bum klu dbang dang // gnod sbyin gdan
429b4(sha): la rim bzhin dgod// sgo bzhir khro bo khrag gis dgang // bsnyen pa'i drod dang rtags phe ba la// pa su'i sru su ma la gdags// gri lcags gzar bus rme khragro brlag//
429b5(sha): gsur dang rgya shug dud pas bdug/ phyag 'tshal bskor ba byed na bsdu// rgyang lam skyo ba byed na dbye// khro tshig me rlung phyag rgyas gzir// cha lugs mi sdug
429b6(sha): gnag na brab// mi shis lhas log shis gzir// dkar mo mdzes na bzhad na blang // 'o byed sbyor ba byed na rab// sbyor ba mdangs kyi mchod pa dbul//
429b7(sha): pho brang dbus su ram rdzas bsdu// g.yog mo bzhi la phyag rgya bstan// bran mo'i tshul du ya sa la ba sngags// rgyal ba'i bka' nod yun du srun// gsang ba
430a1(sha): bcud kyis drod blangs la// ma mo srin mo sha za mo// pho nya mo dang las byed ma// kun gyi snying po gsang sngags brdeg/ ling ka thod pa
430a2(sha): ming rus la// nyungs kar thal bas dong du bra ba// thun sngags sbyor bas rims nad 'bebs// gsang sngags sbyor ba gsum du sbyar// de nas bcom ldan 'das
430a3(sha): kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// o dag mo te kum snying kha rag ma breng breng / tsa dun hA dza/ rag mo tsa la baM ril srog la
430a4(sha): hur thums/ tsit+ta he he ma dgra la b+h+yo/ ma ma snying kha rag ma dgra la thun rbad/ rag mo rag sha tsit+ta la rbad/ khug thang tsarbad/ ru lu kha myags srog la rbad/ bo da pa
430a5(sha): me 'bar drod la brtag/ rbad pa bla dang bkrag mdangs dbye// gsad pa mngon byung mtshon brdeg ltar// b+h+yo yis btab la drag tu 'phang // lus dang yul
430a6(sha): dbang 'phrog cing gsod// g.yo med spogs pa med par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyu las/ ro langs nag mo sgrub pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o//
430a7(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs dmar po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brag dang chu gling mchog gi ser// sa sna gsum la stegs bu bya//
430b1(sha): khrag sna gsum gyi chag chag gdag/ dbus su zla kham kha spyod bri// thod pa dgu yi 'phreng bas bskor// phyi rol rgya gram rtse mo bzhi// rigs dang mthun
430b2(sha): pa'i kha dog la// mu ra na thod pa gong ma bzhin// gru chad sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// dbus su zhing bsnol nyi ma'i gdan// sha las ro langs dmar po'i sku//
430b3(sha): gtum khro mi bzad khrag gi klong // sku stong zhing lpags ga yang gzhi la// thod pa rdo rje rgya gram rgyan/ sgyu smad dre da shAm dril bus brgyan// snying gi 'phreng ba do shal
430b4(sha): tshul// rin chen dbu rgyan spras mgos gdengs// g.yas pa 'khor lo ban d+ha g.yon// rgya gram zhing rkyang zla ba'i gdan// mkha' 'gro mgo brnyan bzhi yi sku/
430b5(sha): smug nag ser nag dmar nag ldang // g.yang gzhi thod sbrul sprul pa'i mgo/ g.yas pa gri khug g.yon pa na d+ha// brgya yis po sa la khri yis pa sdu// gsapa
430b6(sha): sngags sbyor ba snga ma bzhin// thod pa'i phyi rol gsang sngags ldan// nang du ming rus khrag dang dug/ gsang sngags bzlas shing rag tas mchod// grub
430b7(sha): nas rbad la thun gyis brag/ srod gcod shan pas las gnyer gtad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'di dag bto/
431a1(sha): to// oM rag mo ma hi badz+ra snying kha rag ma srog la rngubs rngubs dza/ rag mo snying rtsa sho na baM ri la li b+h+yo/ tsit+ta gshogs rak+ka khaM rbad srog la
431a2(sha): thun yaM sho na thun mugs nri rba da/ phyi nang gsang ba'i dro la brtag/ snga ma bzhin du las kun brdeg/ thod mda' khrag gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me
431a3(sha): long gi rgyud las/ ro langs dmar mo'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo nag mo'i gsang sngags kyi skyon
431a4(sha): ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang lha mo nag mo yi// gsang ba sngags kyi sgrub pa yang // ri gsum rtse dang chu gling mdor// nag po gsang ba'i dmod pa yang //
431a5(sha): maN+Dal khru gang chag chag ga dab// gru bzhi mdzes pa ro dang bcas// dbus su gru gsum thod pas bskor// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gra ma la// thod pa'i 'phreng ba
431a6(sha): dag dang ldan// gru chad mtsho gling bzhi dang bcas// sgo bzhi dur khrod zhing gis sgras// mchod pa'i rgyan dang dra bas mdzes// gnas kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan//
431a7(sha): gtor ma reg ta mchod pa'i rdzas// bdud rtsi gling bu gsur chen spos// bse khab dung sgo g.yu pad brgyan// dar dang ba dan zhing chung 'chang // de mo bzhi
431b1(sha): dang snying 'phreng bskor// steng du lho mo dre nag zho na// nad dang mtshon sprin thod pa sbrul// dur khrod chas dang nor bus brgyan// mdung dang ba na d+ha thogs nas
431b2(sha): rnga ma// sbrul nug rul pa rgya gram sprul// nyi ma g.yang gzhi do shal can// re lde khro chu rin po che// pa se mkhar dbus kyi steng nas 'gying // shar la sogs
431b3(sha): pa'i phyogs bzhir ni// srin mo gsod par byed pa bzhi// seng ge stag che na glang chen 'brug/ zhon nas g.yang gzhi thod sbrul brgyan// g.yon pa thun gyi thod
431b4(sha): ba thogs// g.yas pa kun gyi tsi tu 'dod// ban d+ha re dang bcas pa'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod par bya// mdun du ban d+ha lcang lo ru// snying gsum
431b5(sha): 'bras bu dbang po lnga// bdud rtsi dang bcas rten pa'i rdzas// rgya gram bzhi la ban d+ha re// snying khrag dang bcas dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor sgo yi nang
431b6(sha): 'khor du// mi nag bcu gsum dang dang ldan// 'brang rgyas shal nag zla kham bya// bshos bu nag po bzhi yis bskor// tha ma yol rang steng nas ga ra// zhing
431b7(sha): chung bzhi dang bla res brgyan// lha dang rdzas rnams rdzogs par dgod// dkyil 'khor lho nub 'brub khung du// mtshan ngan ban d+ha lang ka ming // bcug ya
432a1(sha): thun gyi rdzas kyis bskor// phur pa khrag sna nyungs kar dug/ tsha ba'i rgyal po bskus la dgram// brnag pa rten gyi sbyor ba'o// sngags
432a2(sha): pa gshin rje nag po ra bsgom// thugs kar snying po sngags dang bcas// gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba la// pazlas pa'i sngags rnams 'od du 'phro// pa s+phu gser
432a3(sha): gyi sbu gu nas// 'od 'phros ma bskul phyogs mtshams gang // mchog gsum bsdus nas spyan drangs mchod// rag+na sbrengs la gdung bas bod// rdzas la brten
432a4(sha): te dngos grub dab pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su nag mo'i sku// khro gnyer 'jigs ma bzhad cing 'ong // me yi phung po spor zhing thor// khrag dang rgya mtsho bskyil/
432a5(sha): zhing rlob// rgyal ba'i bka' nod rab tu blta// 'o byed rgyun byed sbyor ba ston// glu gar dmag 'dren 'bring du bstan// lci thibs 'od sgra sgrub khang 'tsheg/
432a6(sha): rgyal ba'i grub rtags mtha' mar bshad// 'dod pa mthong na drag po brtsam// ba na d+ha dbus sam gru chad 'phro// rgya gram bzhi la lcags phur dgod// gru
432a7(sha): gsum dbus su lha mo'i gzugs// phab la snying khar ming rus gzhug/ zhag bdun rbad sngags gtor chung re// drag tu bskul zhing lha dang dpral// srin mo bzhi
432b1(sha): la las gnyer gtad// zhag gsum ga sang sngags thun gyis brab// phur pa btab la mtshon chas gtub// lha mo nag mo'i tshogs la btab// dgra la ba na
432b2(sha): d+ha zor du 'phang // ling ka ming rus thod par gzhug/ thod pa dur khrod gtan la gnan// mdos dang gtor ma byang shar gtang // dkyil 'khor phyags la zor
432b3(sha): du brdeg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang ba'i sngags 'di bton no// o tad+ya thA/ rag mo traka rag sha ma hi srog la dza dza/
432b4(sha): ma ma rag mo ka ling srog dun dun dza/ tra ga ra ga sha ma hi srog la breng brang thum ri li li b+h+yo/ trag rag sha ma hi dun b+h+yo re ma ti/ dgra bo'i srog la hu ra hu ra thum
432b5(sha): thu ma mA ra ya rba da/ gsang sngags sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang // ri lu'i nang du ming ru sa gzhug/ ri lu'i zhing ras sngags kyis dril// phag mo'i lto bar bcug/
432b6(sha): la ga nan// gzugs de 'gul khug 'og tu ga na na// brgya phrag bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba'i brda de rdzogs par rabatu la// ra ba bzhi la mdos kyis
432b7(sha): bskang / tha chung bzhi la zor gyis bskul// nag mo dug mda' gsang ba 'di// spu gri dug gi nags tshal la// mdzes pas kun gcod mi 'tshon byed//
433a1(sha): dug sbrul nag po'i sbyor ba bzhin// 'dzin pa mi gtong khong dug skems// sbyor ba'i ro bzhin bdun brgyud du// dbang po lnga dang
433a2(sha): bcas pa skye mas// dug mda' lha mo gsang ba'i dug/ mtshon cha dug me spu gri dug/ dug gi dug 'joms sbyor ba mchog/ bsdus pas mchog gi snying por
433a3(sha): bshad/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ lha mo gsang ba dug mda'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud
433a4(sha): kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gsod byed bdud kyi las 'di yang // dur khrod ma 'i 'bar ba yi// skyel ba'i shing dang brag nag srungs// dgon pa chen po gnas
433a5(sha): dag tu// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan par bya// dbus su gru gsum zhing bsnol ga dan// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu la// zhing rkyang gtum pas bcus
433a6(sha): pa'i ga dan// sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan pa la// rdo rje dang ni me ri re ldan// gtor ma gnyis dang rag ta gsur// mchod pa'i rdzas dang dam rdzos dgram// khyi dom
433a7(sha): ka li ta dang lug/ dom snying bshams la g.ya ga ru ra gzhug/ dbus su gshin rje nag po sku// yum dang bcas pa rdzogs par bsgo ma// rtsi bas la lcags
433b1(sha): phur bcu las bskyed// dang la bdud kyi rgyal po bcu// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog gnag/ sku la zhing chen thod pa sprul// dbu skra spyi bcings sprul
433b2(sha): gyis bsdams// ral gri zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon// rang rang yum dang 'gu ba'i mdangs// g.yas pa tsit+ta ban d+ha g.yon// sgo bzhir bdud kyi pho nya bzhi//
433b3(sha): ga cer bu mi tho da do shal can// tshe 'phrog srog len bla la rga// bkrag ma dngas phral nas gtso la stob// lcags kyus drangs shing tsit+ta g.yon// bdud kyi sprul pa
433b4(sha): gcer bu 'bum// zhags pas gzung nas khra ma la 'debs// bkug cing bstim la rag ta bstab// dur khrod mi yi sog pa la// ming rus bris la g.yag rur//
433b5(sha): gzhug/ mtshon gyi skud pas kha bcad cing // zhing lpags dril las 'og tu gzhug/ dug gi thun brdeg gzugs la brdeg/ bsgo bzhi bskul la shes pa dpral//
433b6(sha): nam gyi 'jing la ra thor 'phang // glu yag ru dur khrod ro khang du// bdud kyi khram la btabu la gnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las
433b7(sha): kasang sngags 'di bton to// oM la ma dun su kha la yal yal/ das ngas rba ba ta kri kU dza dza/ pi ye dug zing pra tsa le Ta rba b+h+yo tsa la nyil za/
434a1(sha): dgu sngags kyi 'od kyis dgang // lcags kyi sdig pa rtsa la 'jug/ rtsa gcad khrag skems blo snying 'dral// bdud pa sgrub sbyor ba'i
434a2(sha): las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// bdud nag po'i le'u ste re drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmu
434a3(sha): bdud kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rA dza ka la'i sbyor ba ni// nyams dga' dben pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal mda' gang khrag gis byug/ dbus su dam rdzas
434a4(sha): bsnyen pa'i snying // dung chen bkra shis zhal bu ru// snying gsum mthing nag hU gis rgyu// dpal gyi gtor ma rag ta phyi// nag po zur gsum bshos bu la//
434a5(sha): thod pa ling ka ming byung mthun// phur ba khrag sna mtshams su bzhag/ rdzo sna khrag sna thod pa rten// rgyu zhags sbu gu snying po rta// rta 'brug don gnyis gang bsgrub
434a6(sha): bcibs// rgyu mdog nag po zhal gcig pa// dbu skra sprin nag gsab na klong // g.yas pa gri gug ban d+ha g.yon// sku la g.yang gzhi sbrul gyis brgyan/
434a7(sha): chu yi snying po 'dril zhing phan// yum ni sngonag spyan gsum khrag/ tsit+ta stob cing ban d+has mchod// bsnyen pas bos la khrag gis bsad// dregs pa 'khor bcas
434b1(sha): dbang du bsdu// bdag gi snying po spros la bsdu// baspugaser gyi sbu gur drang // rang dbang med par bkug cing bstim// dri las byung ba'i gzugs la dbab//
434b2(sha): dam rdzas brten pa'i mchod pa bsta ba// drod dang ldan na drag po brtsam// pho nya bskul la shes pa da bral// sbyor ba ba sdus la lha dang dbye// gzugs la phab la phyag
434b3(sha): rgyas gzir// thun gyis brab la phur pas ga dang// thod pa dang bcas dgra la 'phang // rta gzer sbyor ba las kyis dbye// gdug par 'os pa'i lag tu ga ta da?//
434b4(sha): spyir ba bris lathod pa bcwa'// chu dril drod rtags por dang ka b+hir// khrag dang rngo na thabs kyis rdzas// chu mig kA nyan la bsgral zhing dbug/ dris dang nye ba'i
434b5(sha): mtshams su sbyar// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bsdub// spogs pa gsum gyi las dang sbyar// 'bras bu gnyis kyi rtsa ba gcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das
434b6(sha): kyis nyid kyi sgo gsung thugs las gu sang sngags 'di ston to// oM mun mAn+ta mun thibs thibs thibs/ thAm ril thum ril b+hu dza/ denan thum ril rtse thang dun
434b7(sha): rmugs srog ma gyur la b+h+yo/ mu nyi srog le phyogs cad/ nun tshun du ni gzir nan/ thu ba nA nad gzir rdzob/ drin srin gyi la rtse phreM/ hUM sha shar
435a1(sha): / hril b+h+yo// ya ma ye U nan sa ma ya srog la dun mugs// khaM yaM yaM raM raM hu gzir shar shar 'pho ba/ mun mun mun thibs thibs thibs
435a2(sha): thu ri la srog breng breng dun dun mun thibs thum ri la dza dza/ don gnyis mtha' ru srog phrog sa la// las kyi rgyal po sa las kun byed// sbyor bas don gnyis
435a3(sha): 'grub par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rA dza ka'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi
435a4(sha): sbyor ba 'di bshad do// srog gcod shan pa'i bdud rnams la// las gnyer gtad pa'i 'khor lo ni// dur khrod la sogs dben pa'i sar// gtor ma snying sna
435a5(sha): rog ta bshams// 'brub khung ling ka ming rus khams// thod par bcug la re bas gril// gsad pa las kyi mtshon cha ni// chu dar zhing ras rgya sho ga la//
435a6(sha): dur khrod rdzas kyi thang pa bya// dug chu tsha ba khrag gis byug/ ni ra chen pos sgyu ga cad la// khro ba thugs kyi grwa sang sngags bzlas// 'thoms pa bdud kyi srog
435a7(sha): snying drang // nya gsum mtha' ru 'khor lo bris// mu khyod pazhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su drag po'i spu gri'i mkhar// gnyis par 'khrul mig lnga gnyis ldan//
435b1(sha): mtha' ma rdo rje rgya gram bcu// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus su ming gi dang po ni// bod pa'i brda yi 'bru gnyis gnas// rtsib sa bcu drag po bdud kyi
435b2(sha): sngags// rtsa rgyud gcod pa'i chu rnams dgod// rdo rje rgyu glum rA bcu l+ya// gcod cing gnon pa'i rdzu mi dgod// mtshams dang 'khor lo'i mu ran la// maud
435b3(sha): rus khams dang ldan par bri// gsod byed pho mos lto sbyor la// sngo dmar sbrul gyis bsdams la brgyan// thod pa'i steng du rtsang gis brdeg/ dug shing me la
435b4(sha): bsdugs la bran// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa dang // 'thoms pa bdud kyi drag sngags bzlas// lha dang mtshon char byin gyis brlabs// brgyad dam bcu ru sbyor
435b5(sha): ba dkrug/ sngags pa gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// snying po bskul zhing 'od spros pas// bdud kyi pho nyas dmigs pa dgug/ bkrag mdangs dang po nri dang bla//
435b6(sha): rang dpang med par dbang du sdud// dud pa gsum dang pa bi sha/ lha dang phye la gzugs la dpapa// 'khor lo gdugs la sbyor ba gzhom// srog bcor bdud
435b7(sha): kyi 'khor lo bskor// mtshon cha'i rgyal pos dmigs pa gcod// de yi sbyor ba 'di lha ste// ya yi 'phangs la ma yis bsdu/ ru dang drag tu bod pa'i zun//
436a1(sha): ling gis srog len phyogs kyis dgug/ dun gnyis bar du ling gis gsod// rmugs kyis myogs nas ti lis gnan// srog ces
436a2(sha): dmigs pa'i yul la gcod// rtswa zhes rang dbang dbugs dang 'brel// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ yan lag sbyor ba bzhi ru brdeg/ dza yis srog
436a3(sha): dang rang dbang dgug/ pra be sha yis lha dang dbye// mA ra ya rbad gcod cing skye mas// snyam pa ya nan mtha' ru sbyar// mau yengs brtan pas bzlas na bcud//
436a4(sha): 'bru gnyis dngas snyigs tshul du dbye// brnag pa thon nas klu la gtad// sbyor ba drag po'i lam du gzhug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsu
436a5(sha): thugs las drag sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yu ma ru thums srog ling myogs// dun dun chugs te srog ling // ling srog ti rmugs dun dun
436a6(sha): byugs ying thus nu ma y+Ya/ yathum phyogs lang dun ti ro li gragasadum srog myu ra bAr+b+ba / tho dag dang / snyam bla sa na na/ tshan
436a7(sha): drag sngags rnal ma yis// lus dang yan lag gcod par byed// bzlog sngags drag pa nang khrol dang // gsang ba lte ba grad mgrin 'joms// khyad
436b1(sha): drag sngags lto dkrugs pas// rang dbang med par shan pa'i tshogs// 'byung ba bzhi dang rgyu bzhi gcod// dngas ma bsdus nas mkha' la phen// bag chag
436b2(sha): nas kyis rtsa ba bskyed// spobs pa med par khrag bskams nas// mtshon cha sngags kyi sa dbad du sdud// bdud dang srog gcod shan par bsko// 'gyur ba
436b3(sha): med pa'i las su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ bdud nag po'i drag sngags kyi le'u ste re brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom
436b4(sha): ldan 'das kyis khyab 'jug zla ba nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ri sogs dben pa'i dur khrod du// khyab 'jug bsgrub pa'i gnas btsal la// gtor ma sha
436b5(sha): chen pa yang snying // 'brug dang seng ge don khrag shwa// dug dang chu rgod gnam lcags thun// khyud dang rma bya bug pa'i sha// gri thod mon pa tsa lo'i mgo
436b6(sha): brnag par bya ba'i gzugs dang bcas// zhing chen drag po 'khor lo'i rgyu// sngags pa gshin rje nag po'i rgyu// bsgom la spyan drang mchod pa dbul// 'bum
436b7(sha): tsho lnga ru lha bsnyen bya// khri yis gshin rje dbang du bsdu// rang dbang med par dbang du 'gyur// dregs pa bsnyen pa sa yang 'bum// thon nas gsad pa'i
437a1(sha): sbyor ba brtsam// dug gi khu bas 'khrul 'khor bri// dus dang gza' skar stod la bsnyen// mar gyi ngo la 'khor lo bskor// dbus//
437a2(sha): nas thig pazhi rgya gra ma gdapa// mu khyud rim pa gsum du ba skor// mu khyud gnyis pa thig bzhis gnan// gsum par de bzhin thig brgyad gdab// brgyad dang
437a3(sha): bcu gnyis bcu drug la// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyis gang bar gnas// mtha' ma rlung gi rgyu gram ldan// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// rim pa ji bzhin
437a4(sha): bsnyen dang sgrub// las kyi rim pa bkod pa bzhin// dug dang khrag gi gnag tshas bris// oM dang ya ni pho brang dbus// lte ba 'phen sdud gtso bor bzhag/
437a5(sha): mu khyud dngango po'i 'khor lo la// drag po stobs kyi snying po bzhi// ru bruM baM dang ra zhes dgod// ma yis bskyed la ling zhes dbang // tsan tra hring zhes rang dbang
437a6(sha): dgug/ ma ma yum gyi dbang po 'phrog/ ka dang li yis brnag pa rdzogs// srog ces drangs la ling zhes 'o phul// dza yis rang dbang med par dgug/ srog
437a7(sha): ni gzas pa'i tsit+ta 'dren// la yis bkar la thun gyis brdeg/ las kyi rgyal po b+h+yo yi mngag/ dmigs pa'i yul la rbad pa ste/ lus dang phung po bla 'gugs
437b1(sha): pa'o// srog ni dngas ma bdun po dang // rtsa sgo 'dzin pa'i dbugs rgyun la// ma lus bsdus nas sreg cing thim// ma dang ra yi don gnyis 'grub//
437b2(sha): ya yis phul nas dngas snyigs 'byed// rbad pa'i stobs kyis srog rgyun gcod// rim pa ji bzhin gsad pa'i mchog/ srog ces rgyu bzhi 'dzin cing 'chang //
437b3(sha): gtam gyis 'gyur ba med par sdems// ba yis khrag dang mun pa bskyed// ya las rdo rje rgya gram gyis// rlung gis deng na sa stobs kyis gnon// nan zhes
437b4(sha): las kyis brnag pa gzhug/ las kyi rgyal pos gnan par bshad// a mu kA dang yA las bskyal// bcu drug pa yis spu gri yis// drug gsum rtsa ba
437b5(sha): gcod cing 'joms// drag po sngags kyi gnad gsum gyis// drag po'i stobs kyis dbang du sdud// oM dun kri 'bru sbya ra na// pho mos dregs pa
437b6(sha): 'khor dang bcas// lag chu dang bcas dbang du 'gyur// nye ba'i rkyen dang rten drug sdud// 'khrul 'khor pho mo'i bar du gzhug/ snying po dang bcas
437b7(sha): thod pa bca'// drag po stobs kyis 'pham cing ldud// nod pa la drag po'i mtshon cha yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
438a1(sha): las sngags 'di ston to// o du na tri ru thai baM ra ma li tsan+ta s+thi ma ma ka li srog l-i dza/ srog la thun b+h+yo mA ra yarba da/ stam
438a2(sha): ba ya nan/ gcig la du ma'i las rdzogs pas// khyab 'jug 'khor lo lto sbyar la// sngon dmar rgya gram thod pa bca'o// gdug pa'i gnyan
438a3(sha): la sto bas la ga tad// nyi zla dus kyi sbyor bas 'joms// rten gcig sbyor ba gnyis su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ zla ba nag po'i
438a4(sha): 'khor lo lho sbyor gyi le'u ste re dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po li byin gyi gsang ba spu gri'i sbyor ba 'di bshad
438a5(sha): do// lha yi khang pa gnyen dang dben// bde gnas gsum du maN+Da la bsham// gtor me sha khrag mchod pa dbu la// ya ma ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// rdo rje
438a6(sha): thod pa mtshan ldan du// sha chan rag ta dpa' bo snying // dkar gsum sha khrag tsit+ta'i shun// pad+ma rag ta bdud rtsi mngar// shi thog klu sman sna tshogs
438a7(sha): blugs// zhing ras kha bcad dbus su bzhag/ de la rten cing bsnyen pa bya// sngags pa gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// gtsang ma'i ras la rgyal po'i sku// zhal
438b1(sha): gcig phyag gnyis yum dang bcas// sku la zhing chan rgya gram 'brug/ thod pa rin po che yis brgyan// sku smad dril bu sbrul dang rnga ma// g.yas pa 'gying mkhar don snying
438b2(sha): g.yon// ngang pa gser mdongs phyibs dang ldan// snying khar snying po nyi ma'i sngags// bsgoms la bka' nyan mdun du gnas// tri tshe la sogs bzhi dang bcas// shel
438b3(sha): mkhar da ra gur nang du bsgom// dam rdzas bsnyen pa sha khrag mchod// rak+ta sa bstabs la gtor ma gtang // a mu ka yi ling ka la// ming rus dang bcas 'khor lo'i
438b4(sha): bar// yang na ling ka 'bru gsum dbab// sngags kyi 'khor lo dam rdzas te// pho nyas bkug la thun gyis brag/ brun gsum rdo gsum bcu par brdeg/ mtshon
438b5(sha): cha'i 'khor lo brgyangs la bskor// ka li sho na tsit+ta la// dmigs pa kun rdzogs sngags dang rten// bris la tsit+ta'i phyi dang nang // dril zhing bcug la lcags thun brdeg/
438b6(sha): drag sngags ling ka'i gnas su brdeg/ snying dang bcas te zor du 'phang // thod pa rgya gram 'khor lo gnan// rgya che ru ring mdangs kyis bskang // gsang mdos sku mkhar
438b7(sha): lnga dang gcig/ kha dog so so dang dang gzugs// gying gi mchod pa gsang bshos dgu// nyi zla kyi sbyar skyes pa mo// khya nga rgyu gnyis rta dang nya// bcu gsum lnga gnyis
439a1(sha): gcig gi bskor// pho nya ra yi snying kha ru// gru gsum re la ming rus re// bcas la gsad pa'i mtshon gyis brdeg/ mkhar de brnag pa'i
439a2(sha): / phyogs su gdab// nam mkha' 'od kyi lto ru gzhug/ rten 'brel srid pa'i rtsibs la bskyon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang ba spu gri'i
439a3(sha): sngags 'di ba to na to// au dri tsi pa la a shug me swA hA// dri sha ma ma ga rtsa sha ma bri sho ma tsa hA sA hA/ o khri sA ra ma tri rag mo ru lu dri sha b+h+yo/ bri sha ma hU rA tsa trig sho
439a4(sha): tItrig sho tsu ru bruM bruM ling gug/ tsa ra ling tsit+ta shag rba da/ rag mo rag mo khrag 'dzag ma b+hing kha la thums srog la b+h+yo ni dzA 'dri ma rba da/ dri tsa ma le dri tsa ma le srog la thum rbad/
439a5(sha): tsi shu ling ling thum rbad/ tsin yang tsin yang thu lang rba da/ shu na tri yaM sgying la thun rba dA/ ba tsa le h+ya ra hu ra tsit+tarbad/ dri tsa la me dri tsa la me thu ma rbad/ thu rbad/ tsin
439a6(sha): yang tsin yang bruM snying rbad bu nan dgra bo mA ra yarba da/ ra tsa ma hA rba da ri la tra ga shig ling rba da/ tsit+ta ling snying tshal ba ling dri chu ling rag mo rbad/ dgra bo dun ling kI la ya
439a7(sha): rbad/ srog la thu thu ril ril rbad/ dreg sngags brgyad kyi bkar la brdeg/ drod dang srog gi mdangs gcad nas// nyi ma'i gung la gsod par byed// dril las rbad
439b1(sha): cing mun la brdeg/ gdab pa'i sngags kyis phur pa brdeg/ bskul zhing sgra skad drag tu yul la rbad// rgyal ba'i sku yang 'jig par nges// srog chags kun la gang
439b2(sha): brtsams 'grub// sbyor ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ li byin gsang ba'i spu gri'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// /
439b3(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gying gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre rgyu ba'i dben gnas su// maN+Dal dbus su gtor ma khrag/ shar du dmigs pa'i gzugs bres
439b4(sha): la// sku mdog sngon po sbrul ris can// g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu thogs// g.yon pas don snying sbar gyis 'debs// seng ge dkar po chibs su chibs// na bza' za 'og
439b5(sha): sngo khra la// le brgan dmar po'i cha ga can// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// snying po sbrul gnyis thugs khar bsten// tsa ra'i dbang po shun la brten// 'bru lnga'i bcud//
439b6(sha): dang sha khrag la// khru gang dar dang me long 'bru// rgyal mtshan gsum dang tsa ra'i snying // bla rdo snying po 'ug sgong bca'// ling kA ming rus sbyang thod brnag/ ri lu nyungs
439b7(sha): kar dug chu thun// sha sna bdud rtsi rgya shug pa sreg/ thod chen dang bcas 'khor lo bca'// 'khor lo mtshon cha ming rngus bri// mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor//
440a1(sha): dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig brgyad// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug bca'// phyi rim rtsibs chen nyi shu ldan// de la dgod pa'i rim
