440a2(sha): pa ni// dbus su 'khrul mig brgyad po la// gsad pa rtsa ba'i 'bru dgu dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gzir ba'i sngags dgod gzugs la brdeg/
440a3(sha): tha ma'i rtsibs chen nyi shu la// rbad pa'i 'bru dang a mu ka/ gsad pa'i spu gri 'bru lnga dang // de bzhin gnan pa'i 'bru gsum dgod// kha sbyar bar snang btag la/
440a4(sha): brtsam// khrag sna gsum gyis gzugs la brab// sngags kyi snying dbrog thugs khar bsdu// rbad pa'i sngags kyis shes pa dgug/ gzugs la phab la lha
440a5(sha): dang dbye// phyag rgyas gzir la phur pas gdab// drag tu bskul ba'i sgra skad brjod// zor thun mtha' ru thod pa bca'// lha khang mgon po'i 'og tu gan na//
440a6(sha): bsnyen pa sa y+ra rbad pa 'bum// dril ba bdun khri 'phang ba stong // gzir ba khri gsum rbad pa gcig/ gnan dang spogs pa khri gcig mtha'// gtsun pa brgya
440a7(sha): las bcu yis gso// stong gis gzir la drag tu rbad// shis rang gnad 'khor lo dgug/ bzlog pa brgya yis gnas su 'phangs// sngags kyi rgyal pos
440b1(sha): bsrung ba bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bstan to// oM badz+ra sa ma ya ra ya baM srog la dza dza/ badz+ra sA du ra baM ni srog la
440b2(sha): b+h+yobadz+ra sA du dri myags tsit+ta thu ril dgra bo'i srog mA ra yarba da/ badz+ra sA du tri yaM kha rag sha snying phyung tsa la thun srog gzir dgra bo snyam pa ya nan/ badz+ra sA du sa
440b3(sha): ma ya na rag tsit+ta nan/ sngags rnams me rlung sbyin thang dug/ las kyis shan pa mngag cing zad// dug tu bskul la mna' dam gzir// shan pa srog gi sbyor ba
440b4(sha): bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lo thog gzhom pa'i sbyor bya 'di bshad do// g+ha srin gdug pa'i dben gnas su// gtum chen drug
440b5(sha): po'i bsnyen pa 'bum// thod pa rgyan dang shul rgyal mtshan// khrag dang dug dang brun lnga bsngo// ri lu bdun gsum brnag pa bsham// gtor ma gsang bshos
440b6(sha): dkor cha 'chang // rgya shug tshil dang spos bsregs la// brnag pa'i yul dang ming sogs bri// sbyor ba gzhom pa thog par gzhug/ gshin rje thugs kha'i sa
440b7(sha): bon spro// A ka ra ma hA he ru ka/ ldang nag rgya gram lcags kyu bsnams// badz+ra karma Ta ki dza// bskul kha gying chan bkug la gnan// sku mdog sngon po dur
441a1(sha): smig gon// gzha' dang glog gis dbu la brgyan// rdo rje thod pa 'khrug cing 'thor// snying khar sa bon 'bru gnyis ldan// sa ya drug 'bru/
441a2(sha): bsnyen pa 'dra// nam mkha' sprin dang du ba 'ja'// 'brug sgra tshub ma khug sna 'thibs// g.yul 'gyed dmag 'dren rtsi thog nyag/ mtshan rtags ldan nas thugs
441a3(sha): dam bskang // chu 'dril 'bu ma phrag brgya yi bar// nyungs ka ra brgya par khrag la bstim// rta gsum tha chu ngas yul du bskyal// khri bcu gcun zhing drag tu
441a4(sha): dab pa// ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs gzhan na// lha klu gdug pa gzir zhing gcu na// ya ma sngags zlos 'bum khri sde ba// gnad gsum bar du chu 'dril
441a5(sha): pabarde ba// khrag dang dug chu phur pas gdab// stobs chen drag po'i nga rgyal bstan// khang pa gsum gyis yis bra ba// nye ba'i sbyor ba drag tu dbab// de nas
441a6(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las lo thog gzhom pa'i sngags 'di ston to// oM badz+ra sA du ma ya hri la hri la ra ba hAM dza dzA/ badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya
441a7(sha): hri la hri la phreM pr-i ya tri phreM/ badz+ra gar ba phro/ badz+ra rag pa pr-i/ badz+ra sing kri phreM/ badz+ra satwa sa ma pa hri la shar phreM b+h+yoHtri du ya yai nan hri la shar/ nA ga tri li
441b1(sha): nan/ tri ya nA ga gzir phreM/ sha la sha ltar pr-i shar ya nan phrob/ gdug pa'i gzugs la gzir zhing dbab// shun brda ba thod pas sgrol gying bsdigs// shan pa
441b2(sha): gying gi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsad pa gying gi le'u ste don gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom
441b3(sha): ldan 'das kyis gzir thabs btsan gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brag dmar srin phug tsha go can// gong gsum rgyun srang dben pa ru// ya ma sku yi bsnyen pa 'bum/
441b4(sha): las kyi bsnyen pa sa ya brtsam// maN+Dal gri khrag dug gis byug/ chos kyi pho brang drag po'i gnas// zla kha tha~Md 'phreng de bzhin zlum// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi rdo rje/
441b5(sha): bskor// gru chad khrag mtsho sgo bzhi brgyan// gtor mthun rdzas mchod pa dgram// dbus su dregs pa ya ma'i sku// yum dang bcas pa hU las bskyed//
441b6(sha): zla kha ma gsum la nam gru ma// khrag thogs thun 'babs ma las bskyed// rtsibs bzhi shan pa gsod byed btsan// gcer pu spyi bcings ral gri zhogs//
441b7(sha): dmar skya mgyogs byed dza las bskyed// / bzhir ltas ngan sgo bzhi mda'// khrag sna dug chus bskus la gzugs// bshos bu chang dang shing thog mngar//
442a1(sha): thugs dam pa skang ba'i rten du bsham// ling ka ming rus spyang thod dar// 'bru ba khung gnas su ma ra brnag/ tshes dang zla ba nag po
442a2(sha): brdam// zhag grangs dus tshe ngan pa gzung // drod rtags phyi nang gsang bar gzung // dar sbyangs g.yul 'gye dmag dpon byed// 'brug sgra 'od dang skar
442a3(sha): mda' 'byung // mtshon brdeg shing gcod nang gi rtags// khro tshig lus bskyod jam zhing gtum// yul la 'bar na gsang bar gzung // sha na pa bskul la
442a4(sha): dmigs pa dgug/ brnag pa'i rten la ba sti ma la brab// phye gsum zu na gsumo 'bru gsum brdeg/ mda' yi lam dbye zor du 'phang // brnag pa'i gzugs la
442a5(sha): gzir zhing bra ba// rten la mda' dang phur thun brdeg/ mtha' ru thod pa ling ka dri la// gong gsum btsan gyi rgyu na sar ga nan// gtor ma dang bcas ri rtser gtang //
442a6(sha): bdun nam lnga ru bskyed la bsgrub// rme gri gzer thabs rims su 'bebs// brnag pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku
442a7(sha): gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// oM 'gri ba dzi tri shu li pi tring gying ka ra ya dza dza/ gying ka ra ya 'gri ba da ri bruM ril sne ma na sne men kha long ka hring b+h+yo
442b1(sha): 'gri ni hA sha mA ra ya dzaH/ tsa shu be le tsit+ta thi ril rbad/ shi ta pi ri dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ nIstista srog la gzir nan/ bsnyen pa drod thob shan parbad// p+la khugs
442b2(sha): nyams lo na brab cing gsad// zor 'phang mtha' ru gnan pa bya// bskang so'i cho ga rgya cher bya// gzir thabs btsan gyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
442b3(sha): gi rgyud las/ shan pa btsan gyi le'u ste don gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis klu la gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad
442b4(sha): do// 'khor lo'i sngags kyi mtha' sdud du// gdug pa'i lus dang khams la gtad// rigs ni nges dang ma nges gnyis// nges pa rigs bzhi dman pa lnga//
442b5(sha): kha 'khor drug dang gdol pa gcig/ rgyal rigs ser bkra shar bltas su// rje rigs lhor lta dkar khra me// bram ze dmar khra nub lta chu// dmangs rigs
442b6(sha): ljang sngo byang ltas rlung // 'jug pa'i nad dang gdug pa'i dug/ rgyal rigs mgo nad rims nad bskyed// rje rigs lag g.yas tsha ba bskyed// bram ze rkang
442b7(sha): g.yon khrag chu bskyed// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas zha drum g.yon// gdol pa rkang g.yon snag pa'i nad// ba su rigs drug rtsa nas 'jug/ tsha ba dmu cu
443a1(sha): phrol 'bras gso// sman dung phye bo rlung skor 'jug/ mdze rlung khrag bskyed tshwa grang 'khrug/ rkang gcig pu ga rtsa gnyis 'jug/ gzhogs
443a2(sha): skems subs pa nas kyis rgyu// gal ba sa dang sreg la 'jug/ lci thibs skom nad glang po gtong // 'thoms pa tshig mgo zha drum skye mas// mgo ma
443a3(sha): kha zas ro la 'jug/ lce yi dbang po rol 'brel// gdug pa chen po snying la 'jug/ smyo 'bog 'chal mdze sdug bsngal myong // sa yoms rje shul rdzi la
443a4(sha): 'jug/ nang khrol lnga la mdze nad skyed// lto 'phya rtsa bzhi srubs las 'jug/ bad kan khrag rlung mkhris nad mdze// skyo dub sems g.yang 'chal dang 'thig//
443a5(sha): sha ru sa g.yang ba'i rtags lnga 'byung ngo // klu bdud chu srin lgangs dang 'thib// glang thabs grum dang pho srin nad// ma mos rims nad snyoms dal sdong // rgyal pos
443a6(sha): smyo 'bog 'tshal dang sdod // btsan gyi gzir nad dri dang sdong // tha brang blo bur hur thums sdong // nad bdag 'jug dang ltas su bshad// de nas
443a7(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nad de dag gdon pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sngags dang 'khor lo bsregs pa'i las// 'jug pa'i rjes gcod sngags kyis gdon//
443b1(sha): mgo la sogs pa'i gdug pa la// dril btor 'khor lo lto sbyor bsdeb// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum gyis gdon// mgo la shi phrad nyin dang mtshan// lto bsde bas
443b2(sha): gtor ba'i sbyor bas gdon// lag g.yas zhugs la snying gzir dgu// de bzhin g.yon pa nyi shu gcig/ rkang pa g.yas la bdun pa ste// g.yon pa gdug pa lho
443b3(sha): dkrugs gdon// bu ga dgu la bcu gcig pa/ rtsa brgyad zhugs nas 'bru brgyad shis// dbugs dang rdzi la bcu gcig gtor// rdzun shul zhugs na gnyis gnyis
443b4(sha): bsdeb// drod la zhugs na lnga tsho brdab// rlung rta zhugs na gnyis por tri// rtsa lam bcu gcig bor la 'phang // sa me rtsa la sum sdebs dkrug/ rtsa bzhi gdug
443b5(sha): pas 'byung ba'i nad// dkrugs na phyag rgya chen pos gdon// tshigs mgo bdun la dgug bdun bsdeb// kha zas zhugs la shing phrad bsdeb// tsit+ta zhugs la phyag/
443b6(sha): rgyu dkrug/ klu bdud klu srin bdun pa dkrug/ du ma 'bru dgu'i sbyor ba brdzeb// ma mo la sogs rims dal gcod// rtswa dri 'bru dgu'i sbyor ba yis// smyo 'bog la
443b7(sha): sogs 'joms pa'i mchog/ dza yi 'bru bcu dkrugs bsdebs pas// gzer dang gri yi sbyor ba gdon// ro nr-i bcu yi 'bru bsdebs pas// blo bur nad dang
444a1(sha): mdze yams gdon// mchog dang snying po'i man tra las// dmar lan sngags kyi snying las gzung // kun 'joms rtags rnams brten men
444a2(sha): pa'o// 'khor lo thod pa rdzas kyis bdug/ phag thod sbyor ba steng dang 'og/ bcu gcig yang gsang mchog tu bstan// dmar lan thun min sngags kyi snying // gdug
444a3(sha): pa nad kyi dbye bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rig dang nad dbye ba'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
444a4(sha): kyis sdig pa chen po'i lus kyi tshad brtag pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// stobs chen ya ma myos byed mo// sgrol gying drag po nus pa rdzas// drag po mtha' ru klu la gtad//
444a5(sha): mi mthun klu la rigs bzhi drug/ rgyal rigs lhor lha rje rigs shar// bram ze nub lta dmangs rigs byang // dkar la chu 'khyag sngo la dal// rtsa dmar 'phung dmar
444a6(sha): ldang dmar mgyogs// thung mong rigs kyi dbye bar bshad// gzhan yang rigs min brtag pa'i rigs// 'khyil dang lkugs dang mgo mangs gcig/ chu mig shar 'bab
444a7(sha): klu mgo nug/ de bzhin nub 'bab gan rkyal shar// byang du 'bab na klu mgo lho// lhor 'bab byang du mgo zug pa'o// lus ni 'breng la dud 'gro'i mgo/ gnas pa'i
444b1(sha): rgyu khyon las kyi tshad// bcu gnyis khru tshad ldabs kyis sbags// bo nas mar mgo khru do// kye la sor brgyad rti k+ta'i bar// khru gang snying la sor bcu gnyis//
444b2(sha): snying kha dag nas lte ba'i bar// khru do sor brgyad de dag gi chad// lte ba'i sor bzhi lte gsang bar// khru do pas te chu yi tshad// gsang ba khru gang bla de bzhin// sor brgyad
444b3(sha): bcu gnyis dag gis 'phags// rje ngar khru do sor brgyad tshad// rkang pa'i dpangs su rtse sor brgyad// spyi gtsug rkang mthil bcu gnyis rdzogs// las kyi dmigs
444b4(sha): dang gtad pa'i sa// rigs dang shi sa'i rgyud du brtsal// mgo khyim khru gang rgya// bcu gnyis sor gyi tshod du gnan// sngags pa stobs kyis sbyor ba bsgrub//
444b5(sha): sa bdag btsan po gtad par shis// las kyi rlung gi mtha' ru skyel// ra sgong khru gang rtse khru do// rje dang yul srungs dag la shis// gsad dang 'phro ba'i las su
444b6(sha): sbyar/ ra khrag khru gang sor bzhi ldan// lha bon rigs man dgra la shis// mig gnyis khru'i mdzub gang gnan// rigs rgyud 'phel ba'i srungs la shis// sku la
444b7(sha): 'khor yug khru gang du// kag khams gnan na sno 'bog shis// rna ba khru gang sor bzhi la// 'u khams gnan na gang brtsams shis// kha la khru gang so
445a1(sha): brgyad du// ji khams gdengs dang che bar gnan// dri dang g.yeng ba'i nad kyis 'joms// skye la sor brgyad bshang khams gnan//

445a5(sha): sbyor ba kun pa zlog thams cad 'joms// rabs chad pho mos kha m+bar gnan// sto dang rkang par rigs dran dang // shan pa smad 'tshong btso blag mthun//

445b1(sha): 'grub// lcags dang rdo yi 'khor lo la// khrag dang dug gi 'khor lo bri// stang gi phyogs su sbyor bas gnan// sa ya ma gru gsum nag por brtag/ gang rung

446a1(sha): mig la sogs pa'i rgyu thal/ khams chen ldad myur ba'i kunan// mig la bu khams dur mA za// 'thom nag grams pa'i rtsa mon gnan/

446a6(sha): yis rim pas gcad// rdo rje rgyu zlum brtsegs mes mnan// don yod grub pa'i pho brang gdag/ ri rab 'khor lo brtsegs mas gnan// gdug pa'i
446a7(sha): brtag par bya// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ khrol bu las kyi dmigs pa brtag pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// de nas yang bcom

446b2(sha): chen dregs pa rgyu dang gshed// rlung rta srog lus tshe gnas khrus// shis pas srog gcod rus sbal lus// gshed bdag chen po'i sbyor bas gnan// ya nga nad kyi

446b7(sha): rkang g.yas glang gtad gsang g.yas phag/ gseng g.yon byi ba rkang g.yon gyi// lto g.yon bya b+ha mtshan khung sbrel// lag g.yon yug gtad ra g.yon rta/
447a1(sha): gshed bdag lag tu gtad pa ni// byi phag ya ma rU dza la// bya spre myos byed 'bar ba'o// rta sbrul ar+ya dmar po la// glang lug khyi
447a2(sha): 'bru tshar dgu'i lag/ 'du ba'i nad gzhi bskyed cing gcod// lo gshed gcod pa'i sbyor bar bshad// ru sbal gsang mdzod phyogs bzhi la// khams chen lnga
447a3(sha): yi srog lus sbyar// 'og phyogs byi kha tsha ba gtad// mjug mar 'u ste chu yi khams// g.yas su kag ni shing gi khams// g.yon du bshang lte lcags kyi khams//
447a4(sha): yan lag kung ste gtad pa'i khams// 'byung ba lnga la sbyor ba brtsam// bdag po bzhi la gshed mar bsko// ru sbal srog srungs gsang mdzod 'tshang // khams
447a5(sha): chen phyogs kyi sbyor ba bshad// mig la rgyal po rna ba rje// kha r+ya sngags pa ra la dmyangs// lha rnal bon po sgroms su lha// yul srungs snying kha blon po ste//
447a6(sha): 'gran zla stobs kyis gcod pa'i las// rnam shes dbang po'i sbyor bar bshad// snying la gsad pa glo la smyo// mchin pas 'bog 'thibs rgyu bas rims// ma
447a7(sha): mas lha dang dbye ba'i las// thod pa drag po nam mkha'i stobs// gang 'grub las la thogs pa med// nang khrol sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// 'chi ba'i bar du gas
447b1(sha): par bya// skye ba rengs dang lkugs dang sbyar// sogs pa gnyis la gri dang thog/ byang kho ga dbang du bsdu ba'i las// rdzing la ba rnol dang de bzhin rme// rgyu zhabs
447b2(sha): rims da la snyom bu'i las// gsad par skye rgyud gcod dang 'phro// chu shul ga na na na las kun 'grub// mdze can thod par sbyor ba bsdu// rus mgo bdun la gtad
447b3(sha): ba'i las// mdze can dmar gcod thod pa ru// drag po'i sbyor ba kun bsdus la// gnan na ya ma'i las la shis// gtad pa kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rgyal
447b4(sha): mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ru sbal khro ba'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu 'phye bo la gtad pa'i
447b5(sha): sbyor ba'idi gsungs so// lkugs pa 'phye bo gnas pa'i sa// kha dog sngo nag 'thibs la skyug/ de la gnas pa 'di lta ste// mi lus glang mgo bgrod pa'i mjug
447b6(sha): lag pa me rlung 'byung ba 'khrug/ rA dang sder mo mtshon chas gcod// sogs dang baspu rno dpal me// rna ba'i grong khyer klu brgyas gtams// lta zhing rdzi la
447b7(sha): bsdams pa 'dzin// de la gtad pa'i rim pa ni/ kha dang rna ba sna dang mig/ rA dang lag pa byang khog mgo/ snying dang lte ba rgyu pa'i mdzod// lnga gnyis gcig
448a1(sha): la gtad pa ste// rim pa ji bzhin stobs kyis sbyar// sngags pa gtsang po blon po rje// bon po mu stegs yul bsrungs dmangs//
448a2(sha): rigs ngan nyan thos bsrungs pa'i lha// ji bzhin de bzhin sbyar ba ni// mdze can dmar gcon thod pa ru// gang sgrub mtha' ru las 'di brtsam// 'khor lo
448a3(sha): dang bcas tshas dang ldan// sa ya gru gsum khru gang rko// thod mkhar la sogs pho brang gdab// mdze yams dbab pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan
448a4(sha): me long gi rgyud las/ klu 'phye bo la gtad pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i las thor bu 'di
448a5(sha): bshad do// gang rung las kyi mtha' sdud la// sbyor ba kun smin gtad pa ba tsam// mchog tu ma ra ya nga'i las// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// mdze can dmar
448a6(sha): gcod tho dra pa ru// las kyi 'khor lo thod pa bca'// zhing ras rgyu la rim bzhin bskor// dbus su drag po sbrul gyis bskor// dbus dang mtshams kyi 'bub gnas
448a7(sha): su// ming rus dug dang khrag gis bri// bcu drug ya tshogs bcu bdun dgod// bdud dang rlung dang lto sbyor dgod// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug mdzes// yang logs
448b1(sha): rtsibs chen nyi shur bya// sdud pa'i snying po mchog sdud dgod// gdug pa'i gseb tu spu gri dgod// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su bya// rlung dang ya ma'i lho ru bri//
448b2(sha): sngags dang dril gtor nyin mtshan bsdeb// brgya pa rgya mtshon chas bsnol mar bcad// klu dang gshin rjes bkug cing gcod// tshe srog dbang po bstod cing 'chang //
448b3(sha): nyi ma bzhi dang mtshan mo bzhis// las kyi rgyal pos lho sbyar brtsam// sngags kyi mtshon cha drag tu bzlas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi mtshon cha 'di
448b4(sha): bton to// ya ma mai takra/ rA dza sAt+ta/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa nI/ pra ma mur rak+ta tsa ra ma ra ya ni/ sha ku ru nirbad ya/ nA ga pu ta ya/ san hri da yA/ hug rmug
448b5(sha): ti dzA/ myags thu u ta na na/ srog la ni ye shag la rbad// las 'di mtha' ru rdzogs pa na// sha khrag dro da dang dpral ba'i phyir// klu dang gshin rje dkrug cing rbad/
448b6(sha): phyogs mtshams brgyad la brgya brgya dkrug/ las kyi mtha' ru kha bskang yin// 'khor lo thod pa mun pas dril// gdug pa rang gis byad du gzhug/ gang rung gdug
448b7(sha): pa'i sa ru gnan// klu dang ya ma nyid la ka tad// 'o brang ri rab 'byung bar bskyed// banag pa'i rgyal po'i las 'di la// shu ta ya ma'i bde klong du// dbang po kun
449a1(sha): 'dus kha la 'phang // b+ha sa ka la'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ 'khor lo lho sbyor gdug pa kha 'thams kyi le'u ste
449a2(sha): don brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu sbrul nag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gnan pa'i sbyor ba ni sngags kyi ma
449a3(sha): ma thob pa dang // dur khrod dar dang mnyel ma'i gos// phur pas brgyangs la rmo ba byug/ tsha ba gsum dang dug chus bsku// pad+ma rag tas 'khor lo bri// thig bzhi
449a4(sha): btab pas le'u tshe brgyad// phyi rim 'khor lo bcu gnyis rtsibs// yang logs bcu drug rtsibs dang ldan// dbus su sbrul gyi ra bas bskor// gshed bzhi gnas
449a5(sha): su thod bsgul// gsang mdzod ru thal lto bur ming // bcu gnyis rgya glam sbrul dang / bcu drug mtshon cha rgya gram sbrul// sbyor ba na garbi rmu rarA nan// 'khor lo
449a6(sha): gdug pa'i lus kyi gseg// bsgrub bya'i sring ru sa ni rbad dgod// gshed bzhi sngags kyi sbyor ba dang // gdug pa klu yi sngags su bsdeg/ nyin mtshan gsang
449a7(sha): sngags dril gtor brdeg/ gcod pa'i spu gri rnal mas gcod// gdug pa bsdigs bcing las la mang ka/ ya ma nA ga ma ra nri/ ha mu dzi la'i sbyor tshul yin/
449b1(sha): mdze can nag po'i thod pa ru// mu zi nag po'i blang rkang gzhug/ pho mo gang yin steng 'og dbye// yang na thod pa nyams dang sbyar// steng du nan tu drag pa'i sngags//
449b2(sha): 'og mar dmigs pa'i rus dang ming // khrag gis bris la dug mas bdug/ thod pa mdze can khrag gis bsku// sbrul nag pho mo'i lpags shun du// 'khor lo dril la/
449b3(sha): dmigs pa gzhug/ dug chu tsha ba khrag nad kyis// sbrul nag pho mo'i lus la bsku// 'khar nag rdzo dmar mtshon gyis gril// sbrul nAg thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar
449b4(sha): gyis g.yogs la rgya yis dril// mdze can pho mos zhabs mas dril// las kyi mtha' ru thod 'khar gdab// gang 'dod dmigs pa'i sing dang sbyar// gnyanar
449b5(sha): gdug pa'i dkyil du gnan// ra mor sngags gang rung stong gis sba// stong phyir gzir la brgya yis bcag/ klu chen ya ma'i pho brang gdab// steng du ri rab 'khor lo
449b6(sha): bskyed/ rdo rje rgya gram stobs kyis gnan// steng du lha yi pho brang gdab// phyogs bzhir phyi 'gros bdun bdun bya// phyogs phur sor bzhi pa 'i gdab// dbugs
449b7(sha): ma shor bar rkyang 'gros bskor// mtshams bzhi rdo nag rtags sur gtad// lam du zhugs la rgya gram gcod// chu shul dag gam ri rtser 'gro// zhag bdun
450a1(sha): bar du slar mi 'gro// mkha' lding dang bcas drag sngags gzir// klu la phyag rgya bstan zhing bsdigs// phyag rgya lus dbang sngags
450a2(sha): 'khor srung // ma lus sbyor ba'i mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ klu sbrul nag po stobs kyi gnan pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o// /
450a3(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lto sbyor 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtad pa'i rim pa ni// gnyan ra gdug pa'i gzugs
450a4(sha): thA stsa la// thugs kyi rgyal pos byin gyis berlab// nusna chen zur mas bral ba ba sh+ya// shA khrag tugs kyi byin brgyud la// byAk+Sha r+b+ha san+ta ka'i dbang po
450a5(sha): gso ba shun sngags kyis bus la brgyangs// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bsgom// thod pa dag dag bkra mi shis// gnyis pa ga nyan pa'i 'khor lo bri// steng du
450a6(sha): ri rab rgya gram o// 'og mar gru gsum mar sbrul// me rlung las kyi snying po gzugs// bris la dug dang dri mas ba dug/ dur khrod ras la ming rung bris//
450a7(sha): rta nag bsnol khrag phyi nang byug/ meng byang bris la gnas su bzhag/ drag po sngags kyi sbyor ba bsngag/ mchog tu na dang ya la bstim// snga ma ji bzhin dril
450b1(sha): gtor dkrug/ sbyor ba thon nas thod mkhar bca'// sbal pa'i sha khrag skams la ba sreg/ thal ba ming ru sa ri lu bya// ri lu sbal pa'i gsob tu gzhug
450b2(sha): sngags kyi sbyor ba sa thod pas bca'// dug chu bskul la dar gyis gril// lcags kyi phag pa'i lto bar gzhug/ sna tshogs khrag gis thig le bya// phag pa the/
450b3(sha): ba'i ga bur bca'// thod pa mun pa sbrul gyis bsdam// zhag gsum thun bzhir thod pa gso// sa sros bar du gnyan la gtad// ga nyan ra gdug pa'i pho//
450b4(sha): brang du// brgya yis bsgos la bcu yis gzhug/ brgya yis bskyed la de nyid bcag/ bsrung ba sngar bzhin sbyor ba bca'// dbang gzugs gdug pa'i
450b5(sha): lag tu gtad// klu yi lto sbyor sngags kyis dkrug/ mdze rim sa drag po yams su 'bebs// nA ga ga dug pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
450b6(sha): gi rgyud las/ klu nag lto sbyor gyi le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze rims drag po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
450b7(sha): gzhan yang gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di// stobs chen drag po gzir ba'i lus// rang nyid phyag rgya bstan bsgoms la// mchog phur ya ma ra dzar bskyed//
451a1(sha): byin gyis brlab cing sbyor ba dkrug/ mdzodze tol phag pa'i thod pa la// mdzadze can khrag gis ga dug pa bri// mdze can dmar gcod thod pa
451a2(sha): la// gug rgyal ma yi chu yis bsang // don yod grub pa'i stobs kyis bkru// re thum bcug la drag pos bre ba// de nas rgya shog mdzub gang la// rme ba lnga
451a3(sha): dang dug gis byug/ sbrul dang sbal pa'i khrag gis byu ga/ rus chen sa da kar tsong zis bsku// brnag pa kun gyi ming rus bri// mdze mo gnyis kyi thabs su
451a4(sha): gzhug/ de nyid minyen chos kyis gril// gri lcags sbubs su dmigs pa gzhug/ thod pa'i nang du sbyor ba bca'// mchog phur ya ma rA dza ru// bsgoms la
451a5(sha): stong bzlas gzer du gdab// kha bcad thod pa'i bcud la bsdu// sngags kyi sbyor ba thon nas pa rtsom// gang bsgrub 'khor lo kha sbyar la// phyi rim dar dang
451a6(sha): r-i brums gzhug/ sbyor ba'i khrag dang 'bru gsum brab// gshin rje yab yum lto bar gzhug/ klu yi kha 'am mig la gtad// ya ma rA dza'i lag tu gtad//
451a7(sha): gshin rdza rgyal po stobs kyi gnan// drag po gdug pa'i dmod pa bor// ral gri dbyug tho 'khrigs pas bsdigs// klu rnams dkrugs la phyag rgya bsdam//
451b1(sha): gsang sngags smod pa'i mtshon chas gdab// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs bsdus la// lha yi pho brang bstan par bya// zhing bcu bsdigs pa'i stobs bsdus la//
451b2(sha): thod pa snying po bcug la bstim// khro bo tshogs kyis sngags bsdus la// gang dmigs bsgrub bya'i khams dang dra bral// bdag gi dbang po zhing ras dril//
451b3(sha): khyung gi dmod sngags drag pos gzir// stong gsum nyi ma'i bcud bsdus la// dbang po gnas bzhir gzir zhing 'joms// sha za srin po'i sbyor ba 'di
451b4(sha): ge drug pa glu yi stobs dang sbyar// gtad pa'i las su shis par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ya ma rA dza mdze can gyi le'u ste gyi gcig/
451b5(sha): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad khram las kyi mtha' sdud 'di bshad do// gzhan yang gtad pa'i sbyor ba 'di//
451b6(sha): gnod byed pho ma'i sbyor ba kun// thod can nAng du gzugs dang ming // khrag gis bris la zhab se mas gril// bka' rten dkyil 'khor sngags pa brog/ gang /
451b7(sha): rung phyag rgyas zil gyis gnan// srung ba'i lha yis srog skyob na// lta bdun lnga bzhi gang dmigs kyi// gzugs dang ming rnams khrag gis bri// gdug
452a1(sha): pa'i sngags kyis mtha' ma bskor// du ba brgyad kyis bdug cing brag// khyu mchog rme yi zhabasams gril// dur khrod ro khang 'og
452a2(sha): tu ga nan// lo khengs sgeg dang spungs dar nas// gcad bya mngon du ma khugs na// lo la gshed bsko khams la gcad// skye chen bdud kyi rlung rtag shig/
452a3(sha): de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rang lo gcad bya dbus su bri// lo yi gshed bzhi mtha' mar bri// ya ma da rod kham shag rbad// gshed bzhi'i kha nas 'byung bar
452a4(sha): bri// sngags kyi thun dab ba zhabasams gril// khyi phag dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ dmigs pa gang yin mu la gnas// khams chen nang gi gcod pa ni//
452a5(sha): dmigs pa gang yin ming dang rus// khams de bris la bla rus gzhug/ gcod pa'i gshed du khams nyid bsko// chu gshed sa de shing gshed me//
452a6(sha): me gshud chu ste shing gshed lcags// lcags gshed me ste sa gshed rlung // ya tshogs brgyad de phrag ru sa gnan// gang yin dgra lnga'i thod par gzhug
452a7(sha): gang dmigs dur mchad nang du gan na// keg dgra lo zla zhag za ma// gang ba ba dus su thod zor ba sreg/ 'khor lo gnan pa dag dang bsde ba// gang
452b1(sha): dmigs rlung rtas srog bskyabs nas// ming rus lo khams sbyor ba kun// khyi phag dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ ya ma srog la khams shig dang // ma drag
452b2(sha): srungs la yam shod bri// dur ma chad rten gyi 'gram la gnan// bdag nyid kun bdag ya ma'i sku// sgo dgu rten gsum srog srungs bshigs// gta/
452b3(sha): pa kun gyi dgongs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gtad khram mtha' sdud kyi le'u s+yAM gya gnyis pa'o// // de nas
452b4(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po bsrung ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gzhan yang bsrung ba'i sbyor ba 'di// rim pa lnga dang ldan pa ste// sngon du lhog
452b5(sha): na phyag rgyasra ba srung // chos sku bde ba chen po las// cho 'phrul zil gnon lhun gyis grub// yan lag rdzogs pa'i thugs ka nas// sprul pa'i 'o
452b6(sha): zer nyi ma'i byer// rtsol med shar bas gdug pas gzir// sbyor ba'i rdzas ni ldog phran// phyag rgya rang bzhin lhun grub bstan// khri tsho sngags kyi 'khor
452b7(sha): lo dang / thor pa'i ming rus dbang bskur brlab// dug chu myos pa'i khrag gis byug// tshil gsumathun gsum dud pas bdug/ de yis gdug pa zhe
453a1(sha): gcod gzir// thugs phrad rtsol bas ldog pa na// phyag rgya brtan pa gsal byas la// gdug pa'i nus pa stong gis gzir// dbang
453a2(sha): po lnga la phur pa gdab// thod pa stobs kyis 'og tu gzir// de yis gdug bzhag bdun brgyal// sangs nas rjes med rten la gcod// sbyor ba'i rgyal po de med
453a3(sha): na// gal te rjes nas ldog pa na// lha yi skur bsgoms byin rlabs bstan// stobs kyi lha bsnyen dbang du bsdu// lus la mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bca'// tshogs
453a4(sha): mchod gtor ma rgyun mi bcad// bsnyen pa chu rgyun mtha' ru gso// gzir ba gsum dang rten la brab// rta gsur btang la rdo nag sba// khro bo bsrung ba'i mtshon cha bskyed//
453a5(sha): glu rgyal phyag rgyas zil gyis gnan// khro bo'i sngags kyis las rnams ga ta da// tshe srog dbang po bsdus las bra ba// rten dang dbye ba yang yang bya// thod 'khor thog tu zor/
453a6(sha): thun dbab// rag ta brlab cing gdung ba brnag/ 'khur ba bus la sgyugs glu blang // gshin rje bo sa la dgra la rbad// dun ting sngags dang gzir gsum bra ba//
453a7(sha): gzhan gyi go bzlog dbang po bsdam// lus dang yan lag bag chags dril// dud pa gsum dang sngags kyis dbyug/ 'byung ba lnga yis dngas ma gzung // pho brang
453b1(sha): dbus su rten la mchod// 'khor la sngags bsrung sbyor bas bsrung // longs spyod bde lam sngags kyis brgyan// tsham ngam drag po'i sbyor ba bzlog/ srid gsum
453b2(sha): tshe dbang lus la ba sdu// de yis lus dang 'khor rnams brtan// phyis bzlog sbyor ba bzlog pa ni// phag thod nang du ming rus khams// dmigs pa yor med kun bcug
453b3(sha): la// thod pa dug chu khrag gis byug/ rme khrag dri khrag ba rnol khrag brdeg/ khyi phag sbyang khu'i brun tshil bdug/ drag po'i stobs dang gang sgrub sngags// brgya par
453b4(sha): dkrugs la khri bar brdeg/ thod mkhar rten du yang gnan brtsam// gtad pa'i klu la phyag rgya bsdigs// phyis 'byung sbyor ba bsrung bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long
453b5(sha): gi rgyu dra las/ phyag rgya chen po srung ba'i le'u ste gya gsum pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ dbang phyug chen pos mtshan ma sgyu
453b6(sha): rtsal gyi sbyor ba rgyas par mdzod ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba'i don 'di rgyas par bshad do// dang po ba rnal ma'i las la
453b7(sha): 'jug/ bsnyen pa'i tshad ma thob pa dang // nye ba'i snying po dngos grub blang // thon nas ba sgrub pa dngos la 'jug/ lam ma grub na bsnyen pa yi// 'khor lo rgya
454a1(sha): log bsgyur ba bca'// gsad pa'i sbyor ba stag mo'i tshul// nad kyi sbyor ba zlog la bskor// mtha' ru gal 'greng hol gyis gnan//
454a2(sha): las kyi sbyor ba ma grub na// ro langs nag mo'i sbyor ba brtsam// bsnyen pargya log mtha' nas bsgyur// 'khor lo rdzas la byin rlabs bskyed// sngags kyi rang bzhin
454a3(sha): bstan pa sbyin// ngo bo mi 'gyur sgyu ma'i sku// phyag rgya bstan pa'i dngos brtags la// 'bru rnams gsol la dbang bskur brlab// ye shes dam tshig gnyis med
454a4(sha): bsro// myos pa'i rdzas la du da pas bdug/ mtha' nas dbus su sbyor ba dkrug/ phru gri ming bcas dbus su dril// mtshams su yan lag sbyor ba brtsam//
454a5(sha): rnal 'byor skal ba mi ldan pas// las brtsam 'bras bu mi 'byung na// bsgrub pa zod mkhar rten la bca'// gzer gsum mtha' ru sbyor ba spobs// de ma
454a6(sha): grub na 'khor lo 'pho// de brtsams don med thod mkhar 'pho// gshed bdag las kyi 'khor lo bca'// mthu zil gsad pa'i 'khor lo bca'// mtha' ru
454a7(sha): mchog sdud gnan pa bya// 'bras bu mngon du ngar rnams dbyung // srod dang tho rangs yul la spyad// las ma grub na mtha' ru brtsam// gsang ba'i sbyor ba
454b1(sha): dbye bar bya// lnga brgya'i mtha' ru bskang gso'i las// gang yang brtsams la dngos med na// rdzas kyi nus pa sngags kyis bskyed// yang gsang sbyor ba rang la brag/
454b2(sha): thun mong spyad na bstan pa 'jig/ 'di la bag ldan thabs gsang na// las kyi gcod chen drag po yis// sbyor ba me rlung sbyin thang mtsho// gsang ba'i gnas su gang
454b3(sha): gsang spyad// de yi rim pa gsang ba ni// ston zla gsum la dbugs bral ba'i// mgyogs byed rkyang gi mtshon pa la// sbyor ba rten gyi gnas bcas la//
454b4(sha): bskur bu'i snying la khu le bya// 'tsho byed rgyal po'i sum cha la// tsha ba gsum dang bsres la btags// drod kyi rgyal po dmar nag la// sum gnyis tshad du skar la
454b5(sha): bsreg/ drod kyi rkyen bzhi gcig dang sbyar// dbyar dpyid tha chung brgyad gsum la// dmigs pa'i rten dang 'phrad pa na// nyi shu bco lngas rkyen blangs nas//
454b6(sha): zla ba gsum na sbyor ba smin// 'bras bu bzhi yi ngo la smin// rang yang bag med spyad pa min// gzhan yang dpyid zla tha chungs kyi// sra ba gzhung nag nang cha bru//
454b7(sha): bdun nam lnga ru drod la bca'// 'tsho byed ga bur sum chal// ha la nag po sum gonyis tha sres// nya drod btags la skabs la brtag/ zla ba'i stod la snu
455a1(sha): la rten// zhag grangs lnga 'am bdun na ljang // lo gsar tshes pa'i dbyar zla la// 'bras bu nus pa phyi ru 'byin// rang yang gdug pa'i
455a2(sha): lus su bsam// gzhan yang gsod byed bya yi khrag/ mkhar sgong srin can srad chung rtsa// tsha chus bran la mal gyi 'og/ bdun nam dgu btsas sngo yi drod//
455a3(sha): dgun zla gang rung stod la sprad// ston zla gang rung dul 'byin// zhag grangs bcu bdun dag na sdang // las 'di snang snang bya ba min// gzhan yang 'khyag pa
455a4(sha): dAr dus kyi// tha ra nu srang chung re lhag pa'i// rtsa ba ma gA nad gsum blangs la// 'khyags pa mi nyen nyi mas skam// dpyid zla tha chungs tsha dang brtag/
455a5(sha): zho gnyis srang gi khu les bskar// tshang ngam yang na nad gyi khrag/ bsres la yul dang nya la spyad// bcu'am yang na nyi shu na// mkhris pa dar ba'i
455a6(sha): tshul du ldang // lo phyed yang na lo dus na// rtsa sbubs mkhris pas rgyas nas 'byin// bka' bor spyad na nyams mi 'grub// gzhan yang chud khu'i
455a7(sha): rdo reg dang // mu gize gnas pa'i me reg dang // sbrul gyi sha ru sa so sa kha bas// zhag bdun gyi ni drod la sba// bton nas phabs dang khu les bskar//
455b1(sha): sbyor ba bzhi gsum bzhi la phab// lo dus bar du dud khang ngam// yang na bu ma'i mal du bca'// dus kyi zla ba stod la spararu// chang ngam yang nu sha rul
455b2(sha): chu// sbyar bas zla phyed yang na gcig/ bad klan sgyu skangs ldang ba'i tshul// zla ba bdun nam ya na bcu// dus las mi 'da' mngon du 'byin//
455b3(sha): sngon du bka' la den med na// lus 'dri bya yis gzhan du nyams// gzhan yang me tog rgyas pa yi// ra khrag zhun tshil mar khu ba sre// mchin pa dang /
455b4(sha): sbyar chang yor tsa// dgu na bton la nyi mas gdungs// lo phyed chang dang sbyor la gnan// dgun min gang min stod la spra da// lo yi dus su tsha ba
455b5(sha): skyed// lo gcig zla ba gnyis na 'byin// dbang po rnol brtson par bya// gzhan yang bra bo sngo zhar sbrang // sran ma tsha dang mar du bsrul// dgra ca
455b6(sha): pa bas kyis man nul bslang // sbyor ba gsum skabs brtags la brtsa// skum gyi sbubs su zhag grangs lnga// de nas ga bur bzhi cha bsre// gang
455b7(sha): rung snang snang gcig la brten// ston zla gsum gyi stod la sprad// ye dus zla ba'i stod nyid la/ tsha grang 'dar bu lus sbrid nad// bdun nam zhag/
456a1(sha): grangs bcu bzhin// rkyen dang drag tu ldan pas 'byin// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ mtshan ma sgyu rtsal gyi sbyor ba lo dus na
456a2(sha): 'pho ba'i le'u ste kya bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dus tshod zla ba'i dus su 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so//
456a3(sha): gzhan yang mtshan ma'i sbyor ba ni// da mar nA ga ha la chen po dang // ga pur la sogs bsol ba'i dug/ phyed ma'i thog tu nyungs 'bru'i tshad// nag
456a4(sha): po nyid dang lga ba sras btog/ dus med gang ca cig la sprad// zhag grangs gsum na nang khrol dang // mgrin pa'i rtsa la sbyor ba 'du// zla ba phyer nas
456a5(sha): rkyen langs nas// 'og ma'i zla ba'i dus na 'pho// dri ma che ba'i shing du sbyar// drag po nyid kyi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang lto ba'i phung ba 'pho//
456a6(sha): dbyar zla ra ba'i me tog bcud// nag po dag la blangs pa'i sha// tsha ba gsum dang bag zan gyis// phyi dang yang log tshas byas la// bdun nam
456a7(sha): lde ru drod la bca'// nyi ma ma yin drod la bkam// btags la thon pa'i sha la rten// 'khyag pa med pa'i drod la sprad// zhag grangs bdun na
456b1(sha): khong du spo// kha nas lU skyug yi ga 'ching // zla ba gsum mam ngo bzhin// mi gsal 'thibs shing rten las 'pho// dam par ma zung bka'
456b2(sha): las 'da'// bung ba khong 'joms sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang drag po'i rim pa ni// sos ka'i bupung ba drod blangs la// zer mo khrag dang klad
456b3(sha): pas bca'// chang ngam sha btsos rlangs pas gan na// ston zla 'bring po'i bung ba la// 'bras bu gsum dang hong len btag/ ra yi 'o ma ka ras
456b4(sha): gnan// zla ba phyed na ston la bskam// 'bras bu gsum gyi bcud la sbyar// nam mam nyi ma drosA la sprad// zla ba'i dus na lce rtsa skam// ro la
456b5(sha): bcud med lus po sbrid// dkar sgyur kha zas 'dod pa bskyed// zla bo gnyis sam gsum du 'dzin// bzhi yi ngo la brten la 'pho// 'chol bar
456b6(sha): spyad na dam tshig nyams// dogs po med pa'i sbyor bar bshad// gzhan yang lu ma'i mi 'bab chu// rdo dreg rtswa rtse me tog skyugs// tshu ba gsum
456b7(sha): dong shing rul bsre// rtsi thog rgyas pa'i khrag 'dzin parbe// zhag dgu pa tsas la zla phyed skam// nyi ma ma yin dus pa la// zla ba'i stod la
457a1(sha): blangs pa'i dz+nyAn// brtags pa dmig swA bya'i rten dang spyad// nyi shu gcig gar+dz+dza gnyis na slong // dus kyi zlab gsum na

457a3(sha): bsre// chu dgu spos pa'i tshwa dang sbyar// bong ldang rtsa ba bsres la brtag/ shing shun gla rtsi snum dang sbyar// kha zas 'dod pa gang la 'ang // 'dod pa yod
457a4(sha): pas nye bar smran// zla ba'i dus na sgang zhing sngo// rlung nad lta bur zla dus gnas// dus tshod zla ba gnyis gnas 'pho// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bor ba rtag
457a5(sha): dus kyi sbyor ba nye bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// mtshan ma rgyu rtsal gyi sbyor ba las zla ba'i dus na 'pho ba'i le'u ste gya lnga pa'o// /
457a6(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dus tshad nye bar 'pho ba'i sbyor ba 'di gsungs so// gzhan yang skyo ba'i rim pa ni// drag po til gyi 'bru/
457a7(sha): tsam dang // nya dang sbyang mkhris bskams la ba sre// drag po drod kyi rkyen dang sbyar// nyi mas spros la sga yis bdug/ rten dang sprad na gsum na ldang //
457b1(sha): nyi shu gsum mam lnga la 'pho// 'gyur ba med pa'i sems nyid brtag/ gzhan yang glang po'i mchin pa'am// gcan gza na gdug pa'i mchin khrag la/
457b2(sha): yu ba ldum shing rwa tsha ba sreg/ tshwa ba grang rung brten dang sbyar// zhag drangs nyi shu gsum na 'pho// ya ma ka li mun tra sto ma// gzhan yang rtsi thog rgyas pa
457b3(sha): yi// khrag dang spyang tshe ra me tog gi/ snying po rkyang gi rkang sungs gsum// bsres la nang ro dra ba grangs la sprad// zhagi grangs bco lnga dag na 'pho// brtson
457b4(sha): 'grus pa sam gtan rig pa bskyed// gzhan yang me tog sna tshogs la// bong ldad rtsa ba bsres la sgyum// chang gis bran cing ston kha btsa'// zhag grangs
457b5(sha): bdun na ba ton la btag/ drod ga su ba sha dang sbyar la spud// bcu 'am zhag grangs dgu na 'pho// chos sku bde ba'i nyams dang sbyar// gzhan yang ba spu smin

458b1(sha): gsal ba'i mdangs// dang sa snyigs phye la skar chu sbyar// thun dgu yul dang nye bar sbyar// sbyor ba sna tshogs las kun 'joms// drag po sngags kyi brda dang

458b3(sha): yang mngar zhing kha ba dang // 'bras bu nag po smin pa dang // shu bu bsregs la ga sil dang rtag/ stong pa gra sum gyis dus su sma // ha la drag po nye bar

463b4(sha): mau hIHkhI bi kri tA nA na ba shaM ku ru hUM dza dze khA hI/ hr-i ti ag ne ti bya dz+wA la ro pa shaM ku ru dza ho kha hi// gang dmigs lus drang yan lag kun// rang dbang
463b5(sha): 'dus nas gang 'i dod sgrub// zangs dang bse yi ga bu ru// thal ba ming yang bcug la gnan// gang 'dod 'gugs pa'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan
463b6(sha): me long gi rgyud las/ thams cad dbang du bya ba'i le'u ste go bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sbyor ba
463b7(sha): 'di bshad do// dur khror gdug pa'i dpon gnas su// phung shul gsum gyis blangs la// stegs bu dug chu khrag gis bran// dbus su me thab drag
464a1(sha): po la/ kha khyer gsum dang ldan par brtsig/ rgya sol dag gis nag por byug/ kha khyer thod pa ma ri'i rtsa nga // dbus su brnag
464a2(sha): ba'i ling ka la// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi bcu gnyis bri// sgo dang gru chad thod pas brgyan// rdo rje ra ba me ris bskor// gzugs la hom shing tsher ma can//
464a3(sha): zur gsum nag po dug can gzugs// steng du ya mA na ta ka sgom// rtsibs la gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu// gtso bo'i bka' bstod me lha bdud// sgom
464a4(sha): 'khor skyong rdzogs par bsgom// phyi nang mchod sogs gtor ma phud// sha tshan sha sgra khrag sna dug/ mar khu til 'bras so bshang// skye tshe nyungs na
464a5(sha): dug shing dbul// spyan drangs la sogs spyi dang sbyar// gsad pa'i sbyor ba stong du bya// gsod pa'i 'khor lo stong du bca'// zhing ras rgyu la rmo bas byug/ thig
464a6(sha): bzhi btab pas rim bzhin bskor// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug dang // mtha' ma nyi shu 'khrul mig bya// / dbus dang phyogs kyi rtsibs bzhi la//
464a7(sha): 'khrul sngags drag po lnga dang ldan// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// drag sngags bcu gnyis med pal gshed// yang logs khang pa bcu drug tu//
464b1(sha): bsreg pa me yi snying po dgod// mtha' ma rtsibs chen nyi shu la// gcod cing gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// 'khor lo dug shing me la bdug/ myos pa'i khrag
464b2(sha): dang dug chus bran// rabs chad thod pa kha sbyor du// gsad pa'i 'khor lo kha sbyor gzhug/ bar snang sreg pa'i rten du bca'// nyin mo mtshon cha'i
464b3(sha): 'khor lo bskor// mtshan mo dgug cing thun gsum bsreg/ 'khor lo me dang sdebs pa yis// drag po mchog gi sbyor ba 'grub// thon nas thod
464b4(sha): pa gnyan la gtad// 'khor lo me thab pa skyer cing pa rtsam// brnag pa stobs chen lus srog dpra la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsu/
464b5(sha): thugs la gsang sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me tak+She/ ra tsa sa to/ ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ hriSh+NI a ku sha dzA la ra thun dza la raM ag+ni hI dza/
464b6(sha): hrihr-iSh+Te pra ma mu ra tsa rak+ta tsa ra mA ra yarbad/ staM b+ha ya na/ dang po dbus nas thog drangs la// rnal ma nyi mi bezhi ru bskor// spogs pa bcu bdun bzlog pa
464b7(sha): bzhi// gnad la bor nas dkrugs pa gsad// las rnams kun gyi sbyor ba'i mchog/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ drag po lto sdebs kyi
465a1(sha): le'u ste go brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo mthun sdebs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
465a2(sha): dur khrod gnyan ra gdug pa ru// sbyor ba drag po'i las la 'jug/ dur khrod gnas nas rgyu blangs la// sbyor ba rdzas kyi zung la bya// 'khor lo mu khyud bzhin
465a3(sha): bskor// thig bzhi dbus nas rgya gram gdab// thig bzhi btab pas le tshe brgyad// dbus kyi 'khrul mig glong bu yin// phyi ri ma thig bzhi gnan la
465a4(sha): gdab/ bcu gnyis gshed kyi khang pa yin// yang logs bcu drug thig brgyad bsnan// gcod pa'i mtshon cha'i khang pa yin// mtha' mu
465a5(sha): 'khrul mig nyi shu bzhi// bskyod pa thun gyi kha pa yin// drag po 'khrul mig lnga bcu bdun// bka' bzlog drag po'i mtshon cha yin// de la gnas pa'i rim
465a6(sha): pa ni// dbus kyi 'khrul mig lnga po lnga// 'phen pa rtsa ba'i 'bru lnga dgrod// phyi rlom 'khrul myig bcu gnyis la// rA tsa la sogs bcu gnyis dgod// yang log
465a7(sha): bcu drug khang pa ru// gcod pa spu kri'i sngags rnams dgod// tha ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// bskyod pa thun gyi sngags rnams dgod// 'khor lo mtshon cham dpal
465b1(sha): sngags// dal rims 'byung ba dkrug cing gsod// dkrugs la sngags rnams me rlung dgod// bkod pa ji bzhin nyin mo gtor// mtshan mo thun sngags dril la
465b2(sha): dpag/ rims nad tsa sbubs me gyur mched// 'khor lo rgyal po srog rdza gcod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di ston to//
465b3(sha): ya ta me kre ma/ ras to tsa/ ru ni yo na/ ra ni yon/ ra ni tsa ya/ hriSh+Ti a mu ka pra ma ni sha ku ru ni thum shag rba da/ ma ma kha la rag mo thun b+h+yo/ badz+ra snying kha rag
465b4(sha): ma tsit+ta thun rbad/ mugs ti rag rngubs sgrog la thun shag rbad/ mtha' ru 'khor lo thod pa bca'// dred mo ral pa gnyigs pa yis// khrag gis bslus la
465b5(sha): zhabs mas gril// gting bdud mun pa'i gling du gnas// 'khor lo thun sde pas sbyor bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo byad snyam
465b6(sha): kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dur khrod rgyu la thang ba bya// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus su gsang mdzod khang pa brgyad// yang logs rgya gram rlung ri'i rdzag/
465b7(sha): rimi phyogs kyi khang pa bzhi// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang phyogs bzhir rtsa ba'i 'bru// gsang mdzod mtshams bzhir ming dang rus// rgya gram
466a1(sha): spu gri'i lo khams par// khang pa bzhi la skyo dang 'bog/ rangs dang lkugs pa'i sngags rnams dgod// 'khor lo yab yum lto bar
466a2(sha): bri// dug chu rma khrag smyo 'bog khrag/ bskus la spyang khu'i thod par gzhug/ gsang sngags nyin mtshan brgyad du sde ba// rtsa ba'i sngags la bzhi ru dkrug/
466a3(sha): mtshan mo byad kyi spu gri gdags// nyin mo dbang po 'chal ba'i sngags// mtha' ru gong gsum g.yeng sar gnan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku
466a4(sha): gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me ta kre/ ya me ta kre ma/ ya ta kle ma me/ ya kle ma me ta/ ma me ta k+She ya/ me ta k+She ma ya/ ta k+Sha me ma ma ya/
466a5(sha): k+She ma me ta ya/ yak+She ta me ma/ ya ta ma ma/ ya ta ma me k+She/ ya me k+She ta ma/ ya mak+She ma/ ya ta ma/ ya mak+She ya me ta/ hri sta ha na/ hri ta na phaT/ sha ni ru ba
466a6(sha): hUM phaT/ ya bag ni/ ma ta tsa ma tsa rag mur tsa ya a mu ka ni sha ka ru ni rbad ya pra ma mur tsa rag ta tsa ra ya a mu karbad/ pra ma mur tsa rag+ha tsa ra ya a mu ka
466a7(sha): blo ril rbad/ tsam pra ya mur a mu ka krid ya hUM phaT/ de dag sbyor ba dam pa ste// thabs kyi rgyal po 'phrul gyi bcud// 'khor lo byad snyoms gsang bar
466b1(sha): bshad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo shod sdebs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// zhing ras sam ni rgya shog la// rdzas dang sbyor bas
466b2(sha): legs byug la// 'khor lo rim pa gsum du bskor// dbus nas phyogs bzhir thog bzhi gdag/ 'khrul mig brgyad dang bcu drug brtag/ phyi rom nyi shu
466b3(sha): gnyis su bya// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// khang pa lnga ru dgod pa ni// ya me ta k+She ma rnams dgod// de yi phyi rim bcu drug la// sngags kyi rgyal po hri Sh+Ti dag/
466b4(sha): dgra bo mA ra ya rba da dgod// phyi yi nyi shu rtsa gnyis la// dkar na gshod kyi snying po dgod// kha sbyor bcas la du bas bdug/ rma thod khram thod nang du gzhug
466b5(sha): thod pa ling ka ming rus kun// re thums 'khar nag dong du gzhug/ dong khar sle nag zhing lpags gding // rde'u dkar nag rgya mtsho gnyis// dug lngar blud la lpags
466b6(sha): khung srung // bar du brnag pa'i ming ru sa gzhug/ gshin rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas// zhing lpags gon la sha chen mur// spyugs glu glang gi na shod rde bgrang //
466b7(sha): 'khor lo brgya par shod sngags bcu// sbyor ba gsum du lto srabs la/ dkar po sa g+ha dgug nag pos ga sad// yang ma nyin mtshan ba rno ya mar brdeg/ ya tshogs
467a1(sha): hri sti brgya brgya yis// dmigs pa'i brnag pa rnom mar bcad// 'khor lo thod pa bdug cing bran// mtshan mo shod rje dkar nag 'grem
467a2(sha): bcu yis dkar po bgrang cing bkug/ nag po brgya pa gzugs la brab// dbang gzugs 'o dod cho nges gdab// thod pa shod nag gnyan la gtad// dkar po
467a3(sha): lus bsrung stobs dang sbyar// sngags kyi sbyor pa tshad mas gzung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya ma ta
467a4(sha): k+She ma dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ preSh+NI bi kri tA no na hUM phaT/ dgra bo mA ra ya rbad ya/ ye ma kha la da ros hri la phyogs thum ril tsit+ta hu ra yaM dza dza/ dgra bo m+ba ra sa rbad/
467a5(sha): skabs dang sbyar na mchog tu bshad// rgyal mtshan 'khor lo'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo sbyor sdebs gsang ba'i le'u ste go dgu pa'o//
467a6(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs nag mo las mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po'i las la stobs med na// yang dag
467a7(sha): bde ba'i gnas mchog tu// rdo rje zegs ma'i las mchog brtsam// phyag rgya chen po'i brten thob nas// nye ba'i bsnyen pa tshad mas bzung // las kyi 'khon
467b1(sha): stong phrag bskor// ro langs nag mo'i sbyor ba brde ba// ro ras rme bas legs byugs la// phan tshun thig drug legs bta ba la// ru thig gnyis te re
467b2(sha): mig skyong // mu khyud rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus su drag po'i 'khor lo brgyad// gcod pa yum gyi spu gris mdzes// phyi rim rdo rje rgyu gram la//
467b3(sha): ya kyi drag sngags 'bru lngas gang // mtshams bzhir gsad pa'i spu gris mdzes// sku gsung thugs kyi bcu drug la// mkha' 'gro gsod byed snying po
467b4(sha): dgod// yang logs sku yi bcu drug la// mkha' 'gro gtum ma'i snying po dgod// mtha' ma 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gsod byed nag mo'i snying po dgod//
467b5(sha): 'khor lo sbyor ba'i sngags kyis gang // 'bar zhing 'o 'bar khro zhing sdud// gcod pa'i skam chags sreg tsong gnon// chags pa bde byed grol ba'i lam//
467b6(sha): sngags rnams rin chen 'od 'bar gsal// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las 'khor lo dgod pa'i sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me
467b7(sha): TI k+She/ tham sa zad/ mur tsa la zad/ raha ca ma zad/ sAr sa rbad/ stong ri bla sa du krot+ta ta rag rngubs tshe rmugs sngags la ga hU~M/ mardzun pa
468a1(sha): badz+ra snying kha la rag sha hI k+Sh+mI su drag rag sha ba/ drag rag sha snying kha rag ma rag mo hi dun rmugs tsit+ta sha/ ya ma des b+h+yo ru lurba da s+ya/
468a2(sha): de dgra sngags kyi sbyor ba ste// bcu gnyis brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dang po 'phen pa'i rlung nas drang // gshed kyi 'bru bzhi dkrugs la bskor// rdo rje phyogs
468a3(sha): nas rin chen mtshams// yab yum 'bru dgus lto dkrug yin// nyi ma dang po las kun byed// ya ma ta k+Sha maM snying ro shan du/ gnyis pa rin chen phyogs nas brtsan/
468a4(sha): pad+ma'i mtshams su 'bru dgus sbyor// ya tak+ShA ma mi tsau t+tA rag ta/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs 'gro ste// las kyi mtshams su de bzhin bskyal// yak+She ma me tA/
468a5(sha): rngubs ro tsa rmugs/ bzhi pa las phyogs rdo rje'i mtshams// 'bru dgu rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yin// mkha' 'gro 'bar bas dbyings sdud yin// rtsa ba'i sbyor/
468a6(sha): pa mchog tu bshad// de bzhin mtshams bzhi'i sbyor ba yang // 'khrul mig brgyad brgyad bsnol mar bsdu ba// rdo rje phyogs nas sngar bzhin rtsi// raM drag
468a7(sha): rag thun gzer sha snying badz+ra/ snying kha rag la me rag rag/ sha mo ma hri shrI hi dun su drag mugs tsit+ta rag+ga ta shag pa/ mtshan mo brdeg pa brnag
468b1(sha): pa'i mchog/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba dang por bshad// gzhan yang thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// phyogs kyi dang po gnyis par dril// dang por yab kyi 'bru gnyis
468b2(sha): blang // mtshams su 'dod pa'i A mu ka/ spu gri spags pa rim bzhin sbyar// phyogs bzhi sbyor ba nyi ma bzhi// mtshan mo mtshams kyi de bzhin bsdebs//
468b3(sha): ya ma snying ra drag rag thun ro/ ya ta tsit+ta snying khe ra ga ta/ ya kre rngubs shaM mo ma hI rau/ ya me mugs tsi ra ga kha/ 'dod pa'i spu gri snga ma bzhin// mtshams
468b4(sha): bzhi'i sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'phen pa'i ya nas 'khrul mig drug/ rdo rje rin chen mtshams nas brde ba// ya shan gzer ma snying badz+ra dum/ ya rag la ma rag rag
468b5(sha): ta/ ya tsau shrI thI dun su rmugs/ ya rag sha ta sha ga baM hri la/ mtshan mo 'phen zhing dbang po 'joms// rig pa stobs kyi sbyor bar bshad// gzhan
468b6(sha): yang zang tshugs drug po'i las// phyogs ngan phyogs de phyogs bzhir dril// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// ral gri'i phyogs su rdzogs par brdeg/ drag
468b7(sha): re gling ma pa k+She ro hi ma/ mo sha rngubs k+She ma ma ro thun rag/ kha snying tsit+ta ya me kha go ci/ rmugs drag rmugs me ya ta kha rag/ nyin bzhir spu gri snga ma
469a1(sha): bzhin// mtshams bzhi'i thad tshugs mtshan mo bzhir// rdo rje mtshams nas rdzogs par bsde ba// sha gzer sha na ya rmugs
469a2(sha): su dun/ d+hi shrI rtsa ya dum badz+ra snying / ma la ra ga ya hri la ba sha ga/ ta sha ga rag ya rag rag/ mtshams kyi 'bru bdun sbyor ba bzhis// mtshan mo dril zhing
469a3(sha): bkug nas 'joms// mkha' 'gro drag mo brtsegs pa yi// las mchog sbyor ba rgyal por bshad// dbus nas mgo gcig gdong lce lnga// sngags
469a4(sha): 'phros sbrul 'gro sa lta bu yi// phyogs dang mtshams su nye bar brtsi// rdo rje phyogs nas rin chen gyis// phyogs la nyi ma bzhi yi las// 'bru bdun sbyor
469a5(sha): bas 'joms pa yin// ya ma snying ro thun ra drag rag/ ya ma sha na dum badz+ra gzer sha snying / ya ta tsit+ta kha snying kha ra ga/ ya ta rag ta rag la ma rag/ 'dod
469a6(sha): pa'i spu gri sngar bzhin sgyur// rten bzhi dbang po nyi mas 'joms// de bzhin mtshan mo 'joms pa'i las// sprusbrul 'gros bskor phyogs rim par bsdeb
469a7(sha): ya k+She rngubs ro hri sha mo ma/ yak+She rtsa rmugs su shwe ha dun/ ya me rmugs kha rag tshugs ci/ ya ma ra ga hril ba sha ta shag/ phyogs mtshams sbyor
469b1(sha): pa bsdebs pa yi// drag po'i gan dA dgu 'joms par bshad// drag po 'bru gcig 'phen pa'i stobs// gshed bzhi dril la yum la 'phro// yab kyi
469b2(sha): 'bru lnga bcu gnyis brde ba// 'khyil ba sbrul gyi 'gro sa stabs kyis// nyi ma bzhi bsdebs rgyal blo na 'joms// ya ma mo k+She ta/ snying ro shan du ma tsit+ta
469b3(sha): rngubs ro rtsa rmugs/ ya mek+She ta ma rmugs/ kha rag hri la raM thun gzer badz+ra snying kha la rag/ ya k+She ta ma me/ sha hri sh+le sU ra ga rag shom pa drag
469b4(sha): rag sha snying / ya ta mA mo k+She kha rag ma rag mo ma hi dun rmugs tsit+ta shag/ thabs rnams dril ba'i sbyor ba yis// rgyal po blon po stobs can 'joms//
469b5(sha): sbyor ba kun ldan mchog gi mchog/ thabs gsang bag bcas sbyor bas bya// gzhan du gnyis ka 'tshong bar 'gyur// srid gsum las kyi lto dkrugs
469b6(sha): yin/ rgyal mtshan mAM long gi rgyud las/ mkha' 'gro po rtsegs pa'i le'u ste brgyu zam pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
469b7(sha): kyis ro langs nag mo tsit+ta gsang ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag go/ gzhan yang zegs mo'i sbyor ba ni// mnyam pa'i rgyal pos spogs pa'i las// phyogs
470a1(sha): mtshams kun nas srog bsdus la// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor bca'// zhing lpags rgya shog rag ta zhun// mi dbang spur
470a2(sha): sU tra don// sho na'i tsit+tas legs byu gas la// rim pa lnga dang ldan pas bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram ga dang// gcod pa spu gri'i 'khor lo yin//
470a3(sha): gnyis pa rdo rje'i rgya gram la// phyogs bzhi'i rA la thig lngar drang // 'khrul mig bzhi bzhi ba cu drug ldan// gshed pa dag las kyi 'khor lo yin//
470a4(sha): gsum pa 'khrul mig bcu gnyis pa// kun khyab sku yi 'khor lo yin// bzhi pa de bzhin bcu gnyis ni// 'od 'bar thugs kyi 'khor lo yin//
470a5(sha): mtha' ma lnga hriM mu khyud ni// gsal ba gsum gyi 'khor lo yin// de dag gsod byed nag mo yi// tsit+ta gsang ba'i 'khor lo yin// de la gnas
470a6(sha): pa'i rim pa ni// dbus na rtsa ba'i sa bon ya// 'phen pa drag po'i 'bru gcig yin// phyogs mtshams drag po'i 'khrul mig la// gcod pa
470a7(sha): spu gri 'bru brgyad dgod// phyi rim rlung ri rgya gram la// me dpal yig 'bru bcu drug dgod// rlung ri mtshams kyi khang pa bzhir// yab kyi spu gri
470b1(sha): sde bzhi dgod// gsum pa bcu gnyis khang pa ru// sku yi snying po rdzogs par dgod// bzhi pa lnga par thugs dang gsung //

470b3(sha): mchog tu gsang ba'i sbyor ba ni// yab yumA gnyis su 'du ba ste// rang ga nad phra ma dang lkugs pas 'joms// dkrug pa'i sbyor ba gsum dang ldan//
470b4(sha): po yi sbyor ba me dang 'dra// mo yi sbyor ba chu yi khams// pho mo gnyis 'dus rlung gi tshul// srid gsum lto ba dkrugs pa yin// de yi sbyor ba rgyas pa ni//
470b5(sha): dril dang gtor bsde bas gnas gsum 'joms// khams gsum las kyi srog 'joms yin// thang tshugs stag gi mchongs par dri lo// gsang ba rdo rje/
470b6(sha): kun po yin// bsad pa'i sbyor ba dral ba'i las// nag mo lto krug mchog tu mngag/ dang por sbrul gyi sngags bzhin spro// yab kyi 'bru lnga yum gyi
470b7(sha): brgyad spu gri lto sde pas thabs kyis gcod// nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// gnyis pa gnad kyi sbyor ba dang // gsum pa thabs kyi sbyor ba ste// bzhi
471a1(sha): pa rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams// yab kyi 'bru bzhi sngar bzhin sbyor// ya ma me ta k+She/ snying kha rag rag mo dun ti tsi A mu ka pra ma ya
471a2(sha): srog la tshugs thum/ kham yangs shag zad/ sa to ta hur thums dza drag rag sha khaM/ run yo ni mu tre rag mo kha la hring shag/ ra sa tsa nI rag mo snying
471a3(sha): thang zang kha mu le rtsa la thums/ thun mong stobs kyi sbyor ba ste// dmangs dang rigs ngan kun 'joms yin// yum gyi 'bru dgu mtha' nas dril// yab kyi
471a4(sha): 'bru bkri yal badz+ra// 'dod pa'i b+hU mi sngar bzhin sbyar// rdo rje phyogs nas gsung gi sngags// nyi ma bzhi dang ldan pa yin// rag mo snying rtsa thang zang
471a5(sha): mu la ni ma ma ya/ rtswa la rnams drag rag shaR+Sha kai r-i tsas/ rag mo kha la phreng shag snying kha ra ga to ru na mo/ rig modun ting ts+tshit+ta hur zla mdza ni rA
471a6(sha): dza/ yum gyi thabs kyi spyod grags pas// rje dang yul srungs 'dzums pa sbyin// gzhan yang yum gyi 'bru dgu la// 'dod pa spug thun pasdub
471a7(sha): pa/ las kyi rgyal po rab 'joms yin// snying kha rag rag mo dun ting tsit+ta/ hur zums dza drag rag sha kha mu tra/ rag mo kha lo hring shag reg
471b1(sha): mo snying / tsa thang thang kha mu la rtswa la thu/ ro langs nag mo gzir thabs kyis// btsad po nyan thos khajoms pa/ yin// de bzhin dbus nas phyogs bzhi
471b2(sha): ru// stag gis mchongs pa dril 'gugs pa// gsang pa kun po nyi ma bzhi// rig pa stobs kyis phen par sbyar// ya ma ru ra tsa rtsa snying ti gur rag drag
471b3(sha): kha la rag kha rtswa rtsu/ ya ra ya me na dza dun thu rag kha rag thum thang / ya ru me tsa ra dun dza rag ta sha la rtswa shag snying rtsu/ ya ya tsa rA kha la mo le khA la/
471b4(sha): de dag stobs kyi 'khor lo ste// sngags pa stobs can 'joms pa yi// gzhan yang bzlog sngags drag po yi// las kyi rgyal po spogs pa ni// 'bru
471b5(sha): drug 'bru bzhi ya yis 'phen// 'dod pa'i spu gri'i mtshams su sbyar// ya ta me snying drag rag thums ra ga sha dza ni ma/ ya dza ya thums hri la rtsa ya hun
471b6(sha): ra ni/ ya na yo t+ya kha le mu rtsi ro to// ya sa tsa dun ta thang thang mu mo to ru/ las ma grub na spogs pa dang // 'khor lo lto dkrugs gnad la dbab/
471b7(sha): sbyor ldan bde ba'i lam la 'phangs// tshangs pa 'jog po'i gnas su brdeg/ gsang chen thabs kyi sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud lwa//
472a1(sha): ro langs nagra mo tsit+ta gsang ba'i le'u ste brgya gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro langs
472a2(sha): nag mo gsang ba thus ka'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sbyor ba drag po'i thus ka ru// nag mo'i 'khor lo thun bsde pas bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste/
472a3(sha): dur khrod rgyu la thung pas byug/ rim pa gsum dang ldan par bskor// dbus su thig bzhi rgya gram la// dbus kyi pho brang phan pa'i ya// 'phrul mig
472a4(sha): brgyad pa spu gri'i mtsho na// gnyis par phan tshun thig gsum gsum// rgya gram nyid du legs pa ta pa la// ru thig gnyis btab bcu drug mig/ nag mo
472a5(sha): gsod byed mkha' 'gro 'tshogs// ga srang ba'i yig 'bru bcu drug dgod// tha ma 'phrul mig drug tu gdab// skyed pa thun sngags drag po dgod// dra ga
472a6(sha): po 'khor lo thun bsgrubs pas// rngam tshig gsang ba kun 'joms yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las gsang
472a7(sha): sngags 'di bton to// ya dun sha du na man tsit+ta rag ta raM thun zer tsa ro myags ut+ma ma tsit+te kha la rag sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma dum bu duM bu tshal pa tshal ba
472b1(sha): ha na ha na thun b+h+yo/ ma ma ha ra yaM ling zad thun rgyo/ ma ma a bran brag ni mi sha ling thun b+h+yo/ ma mthu thu rub nub tsit+tA sa shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma kha la rag mo tsa la
472b2(sha): brang shag thun b+h+yo/ sbyor ba brgya brgya thun sngags bcu// nyin mo gtor la mtshan mo dril// rdo rje phyogs kyi dang po nas// rin chen mtshams su 'bru bzhi
472b3(sha): brde ba/ mgo la 'bru gcig drag pos 'phen// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ mtha' ru spu gri 'bru brgyad gcod// nyi ma dang po'i sbyor ba yin// sU/
472b4(sha): gri 'dod pa kun la brdeb// gnyis pa rin chen phyogs nas drung // pad+ma'i mtshams su nye bar bskyal// mgo dang mtha' rten snga ma bzhin// yA
472b5(sha): tsit+ta rag ta/ gsum pa pad+ma'i phyogs nas drang // ral gri'i phyogs su rdzogs par brde ba// ya r-i thun zer snying / rdzogs pa ral gri'i phyogs nyid
472b6(sha): nas// rdo rje'i phyogs su rdzogs par bsdeb// ya tsa ro myags u da / nyi ma re la khri tsho res// drag po gsang ba'i 'khor lo bskor// mtsham
472b7(sha): su thun sngags bcu bcu gtor// mtshan mo thun dang 'khor lo'i las// brgya brgya dril la bsnol mar bcang // las ma grub na 'khor lo spogs
473a1(sha): thun drug dri la la gzugs la bra ba// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// mtha' nas bzlog la 'bru bzhi bsde ba// mgo dang mtha' rte na snga ma bzhin//
473a2(sha): / 'dod pa'i 'bru gsum mtshams su sbyar// ya ud mug ro tsa/ nyi ma dang po sa rten 'brel 'joms// sa yi snying po chu la thi mi// yang snying gzer thum ram/ gnyis
473a3(sha): pa sa sman gyi gzugs la gcod// chu yi snying po me la ba sti ma// ya ta rag+ta tsi/ ga sum pas drod kyi rtsa gzugs gcod// me yi snying po rlung la ba sti ma// ya
473a4(sha): man du na shan du/ bzhi pa bskyod pa'i rtswa gzugs gcod// rlung gi snying po thig ler gzhug/ thig le skye med bde ba'i klong // yang dag khyab pa'i dbyings su
473a5(sha): rdzogs// phyag rgya chen po'i bstan pa yin// bag chags snyings ma mtshon chas gtims// thod pa dang bcas klu la gtad// ro langs nag mo'i thugs khar
473a6(sha): bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ ro langs nag mo gsang ba thus kha'i le'u ste brgya gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang bcom
473a7(sha): ldan 'das kyis ro langs kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// las kyi gshin rje ma khugs sam// las mi byed cing ldog pa na// ro langs drag po'i sbyor ba bcas// dngos
473b1(sha): grub gang 'dod tsam pa na// pa chen rten la 'dod pa blang // sdom rnal 'byor bde ba yis// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs pa na// dpa' brtul ldan pa'i grogs
473b2(sha): dag dang // snying po gsang ba'i gzungs ma yis// lha yi sbyor ba gsum rten la// dur khrod gnas nas bam chen blang // khro 'gying stabs kyis gar bzlog
473b3(sha): la// bsrung ba kun dang bgegs rnams bskrad// sngags kyi chu yis khrus byas la// maN+Dal bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// yi btags phal chen dkyil 'khor
473b4(sha): bri/ rgyan dang dam rdzas gtor ma dgram// mchod pa'i yo byad ldan par bsham// pho brang dbus su bam bzhag la// bum pas bkrus la sngags kyis sbyang //
473b5(sha): de nas lha yi bsnyen pa bya// pa gyi phung po 'byung ba khams// khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// de bzhin tsat+ta'i pho brang du// yab yum 'khor bcas
473b6(sha): rdzogs par bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdzogs// sku yi bsnyen pa'i dngos grub blang // tshogs dang mchod pa khrus dang ldan// drod rtags thon na 'dod pa
473b7(sha): blang // lus bskyod pa ni rgyal sa thob// yan lag 'gul na las la sbyar// sgo rnams g.yon gsang sngags 'grub// smra 'byin skad dang tshogs de bzhin// lha dang 'pha
474a1(sha): na las rnams 'grub// dug rlangs 'pho na ma mo 'grub// dri bsrung 'od 'byung shan pa 'grub// dri bsung ldan na 'og min bgrod// phyag
474a2(sha): 'tshal thal sbyor ya ma'i 'khor// thugs khar 'od spos sangs rgyas sar// khas bub ngu 'bod mi shis ltas// bsnyen pa ldab kyi sa drag pos gzir// de byung
474a3(sha): dkyil 'khor lho phyogs su// gru gsum rtsegs ma'i me thab bca'// drag po'i yam shing gtsub mas spor// tsit+ta bton la shugs pra brtag/ thod pa mdzes
474a4(sha): ldan bum+b+ha pas sbyang // dbang po lnga dang bcas pa bca'// bkra shis 'dod pa'i dam rdzas gnag/ shun chen mkha' lding gling bu rkang // dkyil 'khor
474a5(sha): rdzas kyi rkyen dam yin// sha khrag dngas ma gtor ma dbul// lkug ma rkang dang rjen shul la// drag po'i mchod pa rgyun du bya// lan grangs brgya 'a ma nye shu
474a6(sha): gcig/ tha na lan gsum sbyin sreg bya// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi lha la mchod// me lha dang bcas bdag la bsdu// las kyi gshin rje gzir zhing bsdigs
474a7(sha): dbang du brdzus la pho nyar mngag/ las kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo bca'// bam gyi gos sam lpags shun la// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo bca'// mu khyud
474b1(sha): pho brang bzhi ru bskor// dbus su rtsibs bzhi rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim rlung gi rgya gram la// me dpal ming gi snying por ldan// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la//
474b2(sha): g+ho dkrug sngags kyi spu gri ga nas// 'phen pa ya la gcod pa gshed// sdud pa ma la sha na pa gying // srid pa las kyi lto dkrugs nas// brnag pa kun gyi dngas
474b3(sha): snyigs 'byed// mtshon cha'i brdeg tha pa sa rnam pa ga su ma// rna la ma pa zlo ga dang lho dkrugs kyis// mtshon tshwa'i rgyal po yul da pang gcod// de dag zad ma tha/
474b4(sha): yang dag sbyor// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me ta kra/ ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ hriSh+Ti ya
474b5(sha): shag/ nri du srog chod ro lid gzir nan/ kham shag rbad/ dang po 'bru ded rnal ma yi// nyi ma bzhi yis thams cad gcod// ya ma me ta k+She a mu ke hri
474b6(sha): b+histi ya shag sbyar/ spu gri 'dod pa mthun par sbyar// lus dbang myos shing mgo la bskor// nyi ma dang po'i las su mngag/ ra cas to/ de bzhin spu gr-i rdzogs
474b7(sha): sgyur ba// gsang ba ma 'grim pa'i rtsa la bskor // nyi ma gnyis pa las su mngag/ ru na yo ni tsit+ta lan// srog gi rtsa la 'khor lo bskor// dang sa snyigs
475a1(sha): brkam chags rten 'brel gcod// nyi ma gsum pa'i las su mngags// ra ya tsa ni/ 'dod pa'i spu gri snga ma bzhin// mthun pa'i kun
475a2(sha): la bsdebs pa yis// srid pa chags byed lte bar bskor// nyi ma bzhi pa'i las su mngags// mtshan mo rnal mar dril bsdebs lnga// spu gri gong bzhin sbyar
475a3(sha): ba yis// skyed rgyud gcod byed gsang bar bskor// rnal mas gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// ma grub spogs na bzlog la bskor// ya kle ta ma ma/ spu gri rnal mos
475a4(sha): sngar bzhin sbyar// brtan pa sa yi dngas ma sdud// si ra ga cad nas rag ta skye mas// ni tsa ya ra/ zhen pa sa yi rtsa gcad nas// 'degs dang bskyod pa'i dngas ma
475a5(sha): sdud/ ni yon ru/ zhen chags me yi rtsa gcad nas// smin byed drod kyi dngas ma sdud// tos tsa ra/ zhen pa rlung gi rtsa gcad nas// g.yengs dang bskyod pa'i dngas ma
475a6(sha): sdud// sa dang me dang chu dang rlung // nam mkha' dbyis kyi khongs su 'jug/ rten 'brel skye med dbyings su drug/ bzlog sngags drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// las
475a7(sha): mi byed dang rtags log na// las kyi gshin rje'i grong khyer dkrug/ gshed po yab yum lto ba dkrug/ de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// ya ma ra yo ni/ khams dang dbang
475b1(sha): po dkrugs nas bskul// ya ma tos tsa/ skye med 'byung ba dkrugs shing bskul// ya ta yo tsa ru/ phung po rnam shes dkrugs shing bskul// yak+ke ni ra ya/ srog
475b2(sha): dbugs bkrag mdangs dkrugs shing bskul// mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ spu gri'i sbyor bas sngar bzhin bsdebs// srog zungs gcad nas dngas snyigs 'bral
475b3(sha): las kyi rgyal po'i brnag par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// ro langs nag po'i le'u ste brgya gsum pa'o// // de nus
475b4(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// ni rang chen po'i sngags shun la// shul nag cang shes ka ling dang // ku ku ka li'i ra
475b5(sha): byug/ dbus nas mu khyud gsum du bskor// dbus nas thig bzhi rgya gram gdab// dbus kyi kha rgyud le tshe dgu// phyi dang yang logs thig brgyad gnan//
475b6(sha): 'khrul mig bcu drug bcu drug ldan// 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus nas 'phel ba'i sa bon ya// drag po gnas brgyad spu gri dgod// gnyis

476a1(sha): sngags kyis bskul zhing 'khor lo sa gcad// snang srid srog dang la sa la dbang // pho mo lto sbyor las nyid dkrug/ de yis ma lus 'joms

476a3(sha): mun ma drag rag sha ka li reg mo srog thig tsit+ta po ril srog la ya shag thu ril rtsa rba da/ pho bo nyin mtshan bsnol mar brdeg/ mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/

476a5(sha): bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis na kyi mun smu 'di bshad do// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// gzhan yang rig sum gdug

476b1(sha): mthing nag la// rtsang dang snying nas brgyan pa ru// ling ga ming byang g.yag ru gzhag/ mtha' mthun gyi rdzas kyis bskor// las rim sbyor ba rtags kyis
476b2(sha): gzung // ya man ta ka'i bsnyen pa bya// las kyi rgyal po bdud sgrub btsal// gshin rje'i thugs kha'i sa bon bskul// bdud po yab yum 'khor dang bcas//
476b3(sha): sngags kyis bkug la dbang du bsdu// thon nas thun sngags bzlas shing brab// mtha' ru zor gyis bdud rnams sngags// brnag pa'i khams la bdud du dpa pa//
476b4(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di bton to// ru thum kha yal dun ting srog la shag rba dA/ ma ma tsit+ta breng shag hu ra thu srog la thu
476b5(sha): rbad/ rag shA rbad tsit+ta thums/ ba ti kha long yaM/ hr-i da khas da nan thun b+h+yo/ he dam hed hed b+h+yo/ du mu rbad/ kha tig hu ra nAnA/ hab tang srog tig nan/
476b6(sha): du ya tsa rag mo srog la thun rbad b+h+yo/ yab yum khri khri 'khor la brgya// bcu bcu rten la rdzas kyis brab// 'thom nag khri yi lam du gzhug/ rA bo
476b7(sha): brnag pa'i sbyor ba 'di// mi bo bdud kyi gnad dkrug yin// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ bdud kyi thun pasgrub pa'i le'u ste brgya lnga pa'o//
477a1(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud kyi rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// sa phyogs gnyen la rtsub pa'i sar// bdud bcad sa dang /

479a1(sha): bsnyen pa lha yi dkyil 'khor bshad// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zla kham bdun// snying po sngags la khrag 'thung ba skyed// me rlung 'khor los

479a4(sha): 'dra// sha rus khrag la gtod cing za// 'phrin las gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad// gtor ma gsum dang rag+na gsur// zhing rgyan mchod pa snying sna dgram//
479a5(sha): bdud bcad sa dang rdo phye khrag/ sbyin thang shA shul tsha ba dug/ mo na dang rus sbal thod pa bca'// ming ru sa khams bcas ma ra ni// byang nub 'brub khung nang
479a6(sha): du ba rnag/ khrag gsum phye gsum 'bru gsum thun// lho nub la sogs de bzhin bskor// khrag thun dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom// thugs kha'i sa bon
479a7(sha): bskul zhing bzlas// drod gsum bar du bzlas pa yis// tshad mar brten pa byas la bsten// thon nas drag po'i sbyor ba brtsam// gcod pa sngags
479b1(sha): kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// ro ras zhing lkugs khru re la// rdzas kyi thang pa legs byugs la// nyi shu drug la ldan pas bri// don khrag gsum dang dug chu yis//
479b2(sha): mu khyud rim pa bzhi ru bskor// thig bzhi btab pa'i le'u tshe dgu// dbus su rtsa ba'i 'khrul mig lnga// phyi rim mtshon cha'i rtsibs chen bdun// yang
479b3(sha): legs 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// mtha' ma chu yi khang khyud zlum// kha sbyor bcas la yi ge dgod// 'bru bzhi dbus kyi khang pa ru// rtsa ba'i yi ge 'bru
