479b5(sha): gnyis la// mi dpal sngags 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// mtha' ma'i mu khyud zlum po la// gdug pa'i thun sngags rdzogs par bskor// pho skor
479b6(sha): g.yas la mo skor g.yon// ngar bcas dbus su bar snang 'degs// zhag bdun nyon mtshan pho mos brdeg/ nyi ma bzhi yis las gnyer gtad// sgo bzhi'i
479b7(sha): sngags kyis 'ashes par brog/ gdug pa'i drag sngags lam du gzhug/ phyi nang gsang ma pa sum du bzlas// las kyi mtha' chus nan pa bya// drag po mtshon
480a1(sha): cha'i 'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las phyi nang gsang ba'i sngags 'di ston to// oM shrI ma
480a2(sha): kro d+ha ya mA na ta ka ya ma rA dza ma ma e ka dza Ti dza dza/ ya mAn ta ka mon tanag po rag sha dgra bo ni rbad ya/ ya m+bA na ta ka mon ta snying la lto ru dgra bo ni baM ril
480a3(sha): rbargad ya/ ya mU na ta ka mon ta Ar+ya rag sha dgra bo ni pa ri la rba da ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta drag shig dgra po ni baM ri la rba da ya/ ya mAn ta ka rag sha mon ta/
480a4(sha): nag po dgra bo ni thu rmugs bla rtsa li rba dA ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta ka nag po dgra bo ni srog rtsa rmugs ti rbad ya/ mon ta rag mo snying la to ru ma mthun rbad/ mon
480a5(sha): ta khrag la rmugs ti rag sha thu narba da/ mon ta ru thums/ ma ra ya tsa srog ni ma ma thun rba da/ mon ta dun mug tsit+ta la thun rba da/ mo na ta raM thun ma ma rag sha
480a6(sha): bruM rba da/ mon ta thum bla rtsa la rba da/ mo na ta yag mo baM ri la kha long thun rba da/ ya mA na ta ka rag sha snying la pa ri larba da ya/ ya mAn ta ka aR+ya rag shig rban
480a7(sha): ya/ ya mAn ta ka rag sha thun rmugs rbad ya/ ya mA na ta ka srog la dun rmugs rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka snying la ling thum rag sha ni rbad ya/ ya mAn+ta ka mon+ta
480b1(sha): ru thums rbad ya/ ya mAn ta ka mon ta khaM thums ni dza rbad ya/ ma ma mugs ti srog la rbad/ ma ma bla rtsa khug srog larbad/ ma mthu ril srog larbad/ ma ma
480b2(sha): rngubs tsit+ta srog la rba da/ ma ma dun mugs srog larba da/ ma ma khrag la thu ma ril srog larba da/ ma ma rag sha ni dza srog larba da/ mon ta snying la dun pa ri ya
480b3(sha): rbad/ mon ta srog rtsa ling yi rba da/ mon ta rmugs ti rtsa thang rbad/ mon ta shig shig tsit+tarba da/ mon ta ra grA pa ril sogs la yarba da/ mon ta kham shag du
480b4(sha): mun tsa larba da/ mun ta hur long ro myags rbad/ ma ma rag sha mugs ti srog larbad/ ma mthum rmugs shaM du na srog larba da/ ma ma tsit+ta gzer thum srog
480b5(sha): la rbad ma ma drag shig ro thum srog la rba da/ ma ma du na rmugs khyer b+h+yo srog la rba da/ ma ma kha ra ga dun ting ya ya srog la rba da ma ma tsi t+yA breng shag tsha ya pa
480b6(sha): srog la rbad/ grasang sngags phyi yi smod pa yis// bskul zhing drag tu bzlas gyur na// 'od zer nag po sa stong khams khyab// sha za ba dud dang mon/
480b7(sha): gyi tshogs// be tshon ral gri tho ba thogs// rbad na bernag pa'i rten yul las// bla dang sprul pa bkug tsang 'chang // lus dang yan lag gcod cing
481a1(sha): za// gsang mdzod drag po'i gnas su 'chang // gtum pa sku yi lto ru gzhug/ ri nag gyen po'i shing la gtad// gsod pa phyi yi
481a2(sha): sngags su bshad// de bzhin drag po nang gi sngags// pho mo nyin mtshan bsnol ma yis// pazlas pas 'od zer dmar nag 'phro// las kyi ya ma mon dang
481a3(sha): bdud// shan pa'i tshogs dang pho nye'i tshogs// sna tshogs lus dang mtshon cha yis// gzas pa'i phung po rnam shes 'gugs// tshe srog 'chang zhing dngas
481a4(sha): snyigs 'byed// sha za khrag 'thung rus la gtod cing rol// dmigs pa'i gnas su 'chang zhing gsod// 'bar ba gsung gi lto ru gzhug/ dur khrod
481a5(sha): mon pa'i gling du gnan// smod pa nang gi sngags su bshad// gsang ba thabs dang shes rab las// gnyis med rol pa'i byin pa rlabs las// 'od zer
481a6(sha): gdug rtsub 'phros pa las// bdud dang mon pa mon mo'i tshogs// sprul pa yang sbrul mon pa bzhi// ya ma rag mo rag sha'i tshogs// sku mdog nag po
481a7(sha): 'tsher bag can// gdug pas drag sngags 'brug ltar thos// thog dang spu gro ral gri srab// thog thog 'ur bur che mchi ma brdeg/ dengs ma bzhi dang
481b1(sha): rtsa gsum gcod// bkrag dang gzi mdangs phral zhing 'chang // glo snying za zhing don khrag 'thung // ye shes 'odra dang las kyi mes// lus dang bag chags
481b2(sha): khong khrag sreg/ lha dang bsrung ba bdud du 'bebs// mtshon cha'abar ba'i rtsibs la bskyon// mi g.yo thugs kyi lho ru 'chang // gdug pa klu dang gnyan la
481b3(sha): gtad// khyams khang gnas la sa mi 'chor te// gdug pa'i sngags rnams gsang bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thu
481b4(sha): las drag po thun gyi sngags 'di bton to// ma ma rtsa la mu sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma sha sha ling ling srog la thun b+h+yo/ ma ma dug sti ba ri ya srog la thun b+h+yo/ ma ma tsit+ta
481b5(sha): du ru ma ru lu srog la thun b+h+yo/ ma ma kha lon+di dza srog la thun b+h+yoHma ma khrag la khub ling nri dza srog la thun b+h+yo/ ma ma rag sha mug khyer nri dza srog la thun b+h+yo
481b6(sha): ma ma ha la ha la yi maM ts+yait+ta bred shug thun b+h+yo/ ma me sha sha shu shu rdza thang rtsa thang breng shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma tang tang kring kring khrag la breng shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma
481b7(sha): mugs mugs sha sha srog ni phreng shig thun b+h+yo/ ma mdza dza snying khyer phyung phyung breng shag thun b+h+yo/ ma ma tra ga trag thung thung breng shag thun b+h+yo/ ma mo gzir nan
482a1(sha): ni srog breng shag thun b+h+yo/ yang sbrul mon mo bcu bzhi yang // lag na dug thun khrag zor brdeg/ smos pa'i thun sngags nad dal
482a2(sha): 'bebs// myos shing dran pa brlams nas gsod// dong du brdeg cing srog len byed// dus gsum kun tu 'joms pa'i sngags// dug mda' thun gyi sbyor/
482a3(sha): par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud la sa mon pa thugs kyi brnag pa'i le'u ste brgya bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom
482a4(sha): ldan 'das kyis las kyi rjes gcod sbyin srog gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha khang dur khrod skyed mos tshal// yid mthun bde ba'i gnas dag tu// stegs bu
482a5(sha): gru bzhi 'thas pa la// spos chu bdud rtsi 'o ma dug/ chag chag btab la dkyil 'khor bri// dbus su 'phrin las gang bsgrub bca'// thab khung grub
482a6(sha): zlakhan zlum// shing dbyibs dang gong ma bzhin// bsreg shing mar dang su ram zhag/ dbye ba gsum dang sI rdzus// grub shing kun 'om byung /
482a7(sha): 'bras chen shing thog me tog thos// mchod rdzas rgyan dang ldan par dgras// kha khyer rdo rje ma raM h+yaM/ tshom shing gi tso bo mab sum 'khor//
482b1(sha): bka' nod me lha se ra// bsnyen pa sa ya las rims rdzogs// dmar ser dkar ba'i skur bsgoms la// drag sngags phyi nang gsang ba gsum// smod sngag
482b2(sha): bdun pa gang bsgrub la// rbad spongs shan+tiM puSh+Ti ba shang sbyar// sngags mtshan bcu bcus rdzas re dbul// gang bsgrub gnas su thal 'jim sba//
482b3(sha): zhi rgyas dbang gi sbyor bar bshad// don gnyis dreg po'i sbyor ba la// gru gsum khru gang chag gang la// kha khyer so bzhi dmar dang ser// dbus su rdo rje
482b4(sha): rgya gram bri// kha khyer rdung dang thod pas bskor// zla kham gsum la gzugs dang ming // phyir mthod pa'i 'phreng bas zlum// yang logs 'khor lo rtsibs
482b5(sha): ba du na nag/ khor yug thod pa rdzas dang me// rgyu rten drug dang dri ma la// don gnyis gang 'dod ling ka ming // rgya gram steng du gan rkyal gzhag/ hom shing zur
482b6(sha): gsum sor bcu gnyis// dug chu bskus la snying khar gzugs// 'khor lo drag po sngags kyis dgang // de yi phyi rim 'khor yug la// thod pa
482b7(sha): bcu ru sreg rdzas dgram// dug sna bgo phye'i rol bu ming // lha yi grangs tshad bcu bya ba dgram// sha chen rta sbrul nya byung sha// gribarno ba yugs nag
483a1(sha): gsum khrug/ nim pa thur nur dug rgod chu// 'o ma smyung dug pa spu'i chu// til nag nyungs kAr sran pa tshe// rdo phye lcags phye zangs kyi phye/
483a2(sha): chad dang mar nag gru mo brgyan// khyi phag sbyang khu bya tshil zhu// thod pa tshal ra khor yug bzhag/ rang nyid gshin rje nag po'i sku// ye shes 'khor lo bcas pa bsgom/
483a3(sha): bsreg shing ya las gshin rje'i sku// yab yum yan lag rdzogs par bskyed// g.yas su bdud nag yab yum bskyed// g.yon du me lha dmar ser bskyed// rtsibs la
483a4(sha): sprul pa yang sprul phyi ra// bskyed la spyan drangs mchod pastod bya// drag po sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bu ma// bsnyen pa khri dang ldan par bya// mtha' ru zhag gsum sreg pa'i l+la//
483a5(sha): len dgu'i sbyor ba 'di ltar bya// pho nyas bkug la gzugs la bstim// phur pa btab la mtshon chas gtu ba// shan pa bskul la drag tu bzlas// bcu bcu'i mtha'
483a6(sha): ru bsreg rdzas dbul// bskul las gzugs rnams bstab pa bya// 'og tu thod pa'i ling ka ga zhug/ bar du hom shing rten gzugs bca'// steng du gcod pa'i
483a7(sha): 'khor lo bca'// khrag dang dug chus ngar blud bran// mtha' ru thod pa 'khor lo bca'// zhe sdang gdug pa'i klu la gtad// thal ba sreg rdzas stang du dag ga// skyon
483b1(sha): ba las kyi mtha' sdud 'di// drag po'i don gnyis rdzogs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ 'khor lo ho ma spel gyi le'u ste brgya brgyad pa'o// /
483b2(sha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mo na pho mo dgra ya gshed bskor ba 'di bshad do// hU/ thugs mchog ya ma rA dza khye'u chung sngo// thugs ni nam mkha'i
483b3(sha): dkyil na bzhugs// gos su nam mkha'i khams kun gon// zas su de ni klu za zhing // skom du dam nyams khrag la 'thung // thugs la gser gyi 'khor lo bskor//
483b4(sha): ma 'phangs par yang 'jig rten bkrag/ phyag g.yas gser gyi be tshon gyis// dam nyams dgra bo rdul du rlog/ phyag g.yon du gi sdong po thogs// dam nyams dgra/
483b5(sha): bo'i snying yang 'byin// chibs su 'brug mo ral chen chibs// kha nas glog dmar khyugs se khyugs// g.yu yi mchod rten khri 'phang dgu// khye'u chung sngon po de na gna?//
483b6(sha): khyod kyi dam tshig dus la ba pa// khye'u chung thugs kyi sprul pa las// bka' nyan mon pa nag po bdun// mon pa nag po byi la zhon// mgyogs pa rlung gis bskyod dru
483b7(sha): med// byi la zhon nas dur khrod rgyu// zhal nas me 'bar dgra snying sreg/ spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// phyag g.yas dug ki be tshon thogs// gang la dmig
484a1(sha): pa rdul du rlog/ dri ni mon dug tshi li li// skad ni mi go lngapa ma ldib// brda ni mi 'phrad lho ba la mon// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol zhing spyon//
484a2(sha): mon pa nag po stag la zhon// ral gri rdebs shing nag sa la rgyug/ dam nyams dug ge sum gtan nas 'phen// zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ spya na nas khrag 'dzag
484a3(sha): zu lu lu// dri ni mon dug tshi li li// skad ni mi go ldab ma ldib// brda ni mi 'phrod lho bal mon// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol zhing skyon// mon pa nag po 'brug la
484a4(sha): zhon// glog dmar thogs nas dgra la 'phen// phyag g.yas ye shes ral gri yis// dam nyams srog rtsa gtan nas len// zhal nas me 'ab ra dug gsum sreg/
484a5(sha): spyan nas khro chu'i mchi ma 'dzag/ dam tshig nyams pa sgrol la spyon// mon pa nag po sbrul la zhon// dug sdong thogs nas sman la ga do// phyag g.yas be con nag po
484a6(sha): thogs/ dam nyams dgra bo thal bar rlog/ zhal nas khrag 'jog dgra snying rngubs// mig ni ba se 'od lams se lams// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol las shog
484a7(sha): mon pa nag po chu la zhon// phyag g.yas dug gi be tshon thogs// phyag g.yon chu srin zhags pa 'phen// dgra bo dug gsum gtan nas len// dam tshig nyams pasgro
484b1(sha): las shog/ mon pa nag po rlung la zhon// phyag g.yas be tshon nag po thogs// phyag g.yon lcags mda' dgra la 'phen// dam nyams dgra bo srog rtsa gcod/
484b2(sha): zhal nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag/ spyan ni nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher// dam tshig nyams pa sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po khyud la zhon// phyag g.yas ye shes ral gri yis//
484b3(sha): dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo lus gshog/ g.yon pa zhags pa dgral 'phen// zhal nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zu lu lu// dus kyi snyigs
484b4(sha): ma byung ba la// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol// mo na nag mo shel mig ma// gser gyi rna cha khra la la// mthing gi ral pa sha ra ra// khrag gi zar bu phru lu lu//
484b5(sha): dug gi kha rlangs phyu ru ru// phyag na dug gi phur bu 'dril// zhal nas khrag gi skyugs pa 'thor// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo snying
484b6(sha): 'byin ma// gnas ni srid pa gsum na gnas// dgongs pa par snang khams na mdzad// pho nya rgya mtsho'i gting nas 'gyed// sku la zhing lpags thod pas brgya na// dbu/
484b7(sha): la thod sbrul gyi gdengs ka gsol// g.yas na rdo rje khro bo rnams// g.yon pa nad kyi rgyal ba thogs// bstan pa srung bar zhal 'tshes ma// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du
485a1(sha): sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo gser mig ma// sbrul nag ral pa shigs sa shigs// phyag na gser gyi phur bu 'dril// sngags pa'i sku dgu myur du
485a2(sha): sgrol las shog/ mo na mo nag mo g.yu mig ma// gser gyi lan phran sha ra ra// ga sa yi rna cha khra la dag/ g.yon na ba sa yi phur pa 'dril// zhal nas khrag gi skyugs pa 'thor//
485a3(sha): sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo mchong mig ma// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// byi ru'i rna cha khral la// phyag na byi ru'i phur pa 'dril// sngags pa'i sku dgra
485a4(sha): myur du sgrol las shog/ mon mo nag mo zangs mig ma// khrag gi ral pa sha ra ra// zangs kyi rna cha khral la// phyag na zangs kyi phur pa 'dril// zhal nas nad kyi rlangs pa 'phro//

485a6(sha): dgral 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las sho ga/ khye'u chung thugs kyi sprul pa ni// bla rkun khyi mo nag mo bdun// khyi mo nag mo gser mig ma// bar snang rgyu zhing dgra snying
485a7(sha): 'byin// dgra bo bla dang khrol la sa shog/ khyi mo nag mo g.yu mig ma// bar snang rgyu zhing lha rnams bskul// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog khyi mo nag mo mchong mig ma// sa gzhi rgyu
485b1(sha): zhing klu rnams bskul// dgra bo bla dang grol las sheg/ khyi mo nag mo zangs mig ma// dur khrod rgyu zhing dgra srog gcod// dgra bo zla dang grol las shog khyi mo nag mo mkhar mig ma/ chug hrung
485b2(sha): zhon nasra chu srin bskul// dgra bo bla dang phrol las shog/ khyi mo nag mo du ngamig ma// dam tshig srung zhing rdzu 'phrul 'gyed// rgyal ba'i bka' dam bla ma rku// dgra bo bla dang phrol la shog/ khyim
485b3(sha): nag mo lcags mig ma// bang ni bar snang glog bas mgyogs// yid ni chu bo'i gzhung ba sa ring // 'dzam bu'i gling la mnga' mdzad ma// dgra bo bla dang phrol la sho ga/ khye'u chung thugs kyi ya

485b5(sha): zhag gi thig le can// zhe sdang sbrul gyis dbu zhabs brgyan// spyan gsum bzlog pas me stag 'phro// mche ba gtsigs pas dri za 'dag// phyag na ral gri lcags kyu

486a1(sha): gcod sprul pa 'gyed// sku ni sar nag 'bar ba la// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// tho da rlon sbrul gyis dbu la brgyan// zhal chen

486b1(sha): sbrul gtams pa'i dbu rgyan can// sku la g.yang gzhi 'bum gyis klubs// phyag na ral gri lcags kyu ba snams// snying nas drongs la srog rtsa chod// gnod byed

486b7(sha): da mu chu gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang pa'i dgra bo dam nya ma sa la// khra ma da' dug thun snying zor rgyob// dmu chu thong zhig da gra la g+ho// nub kyi mon mo glang slag/
487a1(sha): can// mtshal chen rgya skyegs pa glang khrag/ ba glang thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// mkhris nad gtong ba'i mthu

487a3(sha): mkhris pa spyang dug khrag/ spyang mo'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru pud// rlung na da gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang po'i dgra po dam nyams la//

487a6(sha): DUr tshig/ rgya gzer zong la zla tsha khrug/ nub min mo skye skrag can// thal nur dug chu spre 'u'i khrag/ spre'u'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du ba na/
487a7(sha): cing kha ru bud// bal nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che/ sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' rug thun snying zor chog/ bal nad thong la bla tshe khrag/ nuH
487b1(sha): byang son mo g.yag spag can// 'ol mo skyer bu 'brong bu'i khrag/ 'brong bu'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// 'phol 'bras gtong ba'i
487b2(sha): sa~M ma che// snang po'i dam po rnamany+dza sa stso la// zag mda' drug rgyun nying por rgyog// mi bol 'bras thong la che sgrog pazlas// byung shar min mo rgyud skrag ce/
487b3(sha): go ro thal chen khyi khrag drug/ spre 'u'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// skrangs nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam
487b4(sha): nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyobo// skrangs nad thong la tshe sreg phrol// steng gri mon mo 'brug skrag can// ser rgya thal chen seng ge'i khrag
487b5(sha): seng ge'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// gnam lkugs 'bebs shing chad pa gcod// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda'
487b6(sha): dug thun snying zor rgyob// thog zer thog la tshe srog phrol// gangs kyi mon mo se slag can// dug rgod mon khrag pa glang mchin// mon pa'i thod par sbyar
487b7(sha): byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha'u bud// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyog/ dgra bo'i rlung rta rmang du pho ba// chu yi
488a1(sha): mon mo srin slag can// rgya rus nyamakhris dug khrag chu// chu srin thod par gyur byas nas// dong du bcug cing kha ru bud// 'brun//
488a2(sha): nag gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdung ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// 'brum nag zong la tshe srog phrol// dur khrod mon mo zho/
488a3(sha): slag tsan// rA dug dug rgod mi yi khrag/ nyams pa'i thod par sbyar byas nas// deng du brdog cing kha ru bu da// sgro 'bog gtong ba'i mthu mo che// snang ba'i dgra po//
488a4(sha): dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// smyo 'bog thong la rnam shes phrol// brag gi mon mo 'ug sla gau can// do ba dbyig dug 'ug pa'i khrag/ dri bo'i
488a5(sha): thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bu da// pho lhog gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dgra bo dam nyams la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob//
488a6(sha): pho lhog thong la tshe srog phrol// gsang ba'i mon mo sbrul slag can// dug sna ba la nyungs sbrul nag khrag/ rnal mo'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing
488a7(sha): kha ru bud// mdze nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che// sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// mdze nad thong la tshe srog phrol// gab pa'i mon
488b1(sha): mo phag slag can// nyungs nag bya ba phag khrag dug/ phag pa'i thod par sbyar byas nas// dong du brdeg cing kha ru bud// mkhris nad gtong ba'i mthu mo che//
488b2(sha): sdang ba'i dam nyams dgra bo la// khrag mda' dug thun snying zor rgyob// mkhris na da thong la rnam shes phrol// la la khrag gi bu yug rlob// la la rkang mgyogs bla dang
488b3(sha): 'brol// la la skya ring rlung la zhon// la la thabs kyis slu 'brid gsod// la la gling 'debs khyi mo 'gyed// la la bla kun khyung chen 'gyed// lA la srog gtse/
488b4(sha): sbrul nag 'gyed// la la che sdud rus sbal 'gyed// la la srog gcod bdud dang sdong // la la gong gsum btsan dang 'grom// la la khong nas tsit+ta 'byin//
488b5(sha): la la srog gcod shan pa 'gyed// kun kyang srog rtsa dmar len ma// bla dang tshe srog phral nas 'chang // sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ rgyal mtshan
488b6(sha): me long gi rgyud las/ sprul pa'i tshogs la gshed bsko ba'i le'u ste brgya dgu pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags
488b7(sha): bdun pa'i rtsa ba'i srog dmar len gyi ngan rdzogs 'di bshad do// de yi rim pa 'di lha ste// rtags 'gor las rnams mi byed na// srog gcod rgyal po gas
489a1(sha): ba yi// gsang ba sngags kyi rno dpal mtshon// dmar len srog gi spu gri 'di// lnga bcu gcig gis las mchog bsdus// shan pa gtso byas
489a2(sha): snying po 'dril// gsad pa'i sngags su yang dag sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po dmar len partsam// dur khrod gnyen ra'i dben gnas su// phung sa gsum la maN+Das
489a3(sha): bya// dbus su brnag pa'i 'brub gnas brnag/ gru gsum rtsang bcas phur pa khrag/ thod pa bla byad khrag sna dug/ mthing nag dar dag pa dam rdzas snying //
489a4(sha): tha khrag gtor ma sha chen gsur// shon ka li brnag pa'i rten// snying kha lte ba gsang ba mgo// s+ye dang kha nr-i byang nag dmar// khyim gro ga ri shoras// bris
489a5(sha): la tshon skud dang bcas gdags// 'brub khung rtsa ru 'gying phur gdags// 'jigs byed ya ma'i skur bsgoms la// smod pa sngags kyi gsang thun dbab/
489a6(sha): zhag bdun dug dang nyungs kar brdeg/ de nas shon brnag par brtag/ rgyu de 'gyel las yan lag bzhi// tshon skud btags la phung bzhi brgyang // dgongs
489a7(sha): 'dzab drod dgug rgyu la bstim// nyin zhag mtshan phrugs rngam tshig bzlas// rtsang phur grod dang rtsal brdeg/ rang nyid bdud kyi shan par sgom// mtshon cha rgya
489b1(sha): yis ngar brud na// phyogs bzhir btab la drag tu bskul// sbram zor brnag pa'i phyogs su 'phang // lan gsum sgrims la shug pra brtag/ pra ngan drag mos
489b2(sha): sngags kyis bzlog/ tsit+ta bton la phyogs bzhir bstabs// thod par bcug la gsang thun dbab// rgyu yi sha khrag dngas mas bskad // tshogs dang gtor mas
489b3(sha): gzhan tshogs mchod// dmar chen sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las dpar len sngags kyi rgyal
489b4(sha): po 'di bton to// ga pA nA ling srog la hur thum zad/ tsit+ta ro myags srog la lang ni shag rbad/ ro ling kham tsa ni bo shag rba da/ tsa pa ku ling ni shag rba da
489b5(sha): ru tsa thum dza ni srog la shag rba da/ ru thu yaM shig ni sha ga rbad/ kha khaM hu ra sha baM ni shag rbad/ bdun gsum bzlas la bdun gcig brdeg/ zhag gsum rol
489b6(sha): la gcig gis 'phang // mgo dang bcas pa mnan pa bya// byang khram dang bcas gzir zhing bra ba// rgyu yi rdzing dang mdzod phugs lam// gang rung tsit+ta bcug
489b7(sha): la bca'// mgo dang bcas pa shun gyis ril// rgyang lam dbus yul brten la gnan// dmar len brgya gsum gcig dang sbyar// khri yi thun dbab
490a1(sha): brgya yis 'phang // mgo dang lho sbyor rgyun du gtong // sbyor ba'i rgyal po gab par bshad// de nas bcom ldan
490a2(sha): 'das kyis bdud kyi srog dbrog pa dang gzir ba 'di bshad do// srog gcod pho mos gang sgrub kyang // ma lus lta log ldog dang 'khru// nyam chung
490a3(sha): brlams shing rmugs thibs 'chal// ro med 'dod bral drod dang lci// rtags med cho 'phrul mang na brtsa ma// dur khrod dben pa'i bde gnas su// gru
490a4(sha): gsum sbag me kha khyer gsum// phyi nang chag grang dbus mtho gang // dmar ser dkar pA rtswang phur me// mthing nag dbus su mon dang bdud// gru
490a5(sha): chad gtor ma dam rdzas khrag/ drag po'am ya ma'i bzlas pa 'bum// drug sngags gang sgrub khri yis dgug/ 'khor bcas bos la stong gis gzir//
490a6(sha): stobs kyi sngags dang phur pas bsdigs// btsan thabs drag po'i gzir bar bshad// yang na gang sgrub gzugs byas la// snying khar gru gsum snying
490a7(sha): po sngags// bris la dong du gan rkyal bsnyal// lha sgrub byas la rang srog dbrog/ gru gsum gzugs la phab la bstim// rngam pa'i nga ros dbang du bsdu//
490b1(sha): sngags rgod khri bzlas phur ba gdag/ rang gzir khri bzlas gzi mdangs dpral// bdud la sogs pa dar zhing 'a phyag/ kha ru ra ga tA mna' chu blud// gzugs
490b2(sha): de sngags pa'i zhabs 'og gzhug/ kun gyi tshe srog ba dag po bskul// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig par// phyag 'tshal las byed dngos grub ster// drod thob
490b3(sha): gsos la bdud rtsi bskyed// snying kha'i sngags gdon gnan pa gzhug/ gang sgrub drag sngags bzlas shing bskul// ling ga rgyu la phur pas brdeg/ thun
490b4(sha): zor mtha' ru gzugs de gnan// dgu 'am bcu gcig gnan pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las srog 'phrog pa dang gzir
490b5(sha): bab phru gri'i mtha' sgyur gyi sngags rnams bton to// ya ma ro ga mu shu rtsa myags mon tA phur tir// tsi tu rmugs gzer// thum srog breng breng / tsit+ta dun
490b6(sha): dun hri shag hur thums shag shag dza dza/ ro sha ya mu ka ma phu tir du tsit+ta sha la gzir srog la hur thums ro myags gzir na na/ shag rbad ri shag hur
490b7(sha): rbad/ shag thun b+h+yo/ shag nan shag raM shAn ti ku ru swA hA/ shag ra puSh+TiM ku ru phaT/ sha ga ra ba shang ku ru hri dza/ shag hri wang gzir rbad nan/
491a1(sha): gsad srog thun zer gnan pa drag/ zhi rgyas dbang ste mi yi sngags// thun zer las gzir bzhi gnyis rdzogs// drag sngags bdun
491a2(sha): pa'i mtha' brgyad bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dmar len sngags kyi le'u ste brgya bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom
491a3(sha): ldan 'das kyis gdug pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// gdug pa gnas pa'i dben gnas su// klu chen brgyad la gtor ma bsngo// las gnyer gtad la mtshams
491a4(sha): dang sbyar// ro ras dpag chen khru gang la// gdug pa'i khrag dang dug chus bsku// mu khyud zlum po ldu ru bskor// dbus su drag po'i gsang mdzod bzhi//
491a5(sha): sbrul nag pho mo ra bas bskor// gnyis pa 'khrul mig drag po brgyad// gsum par bcu drug drag po gnas// bzhi par mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis//
491a6(sha): mtha' ma sna tshogs gdugs pa'i gzugs// kha sbyar tshad mnyam legs bcas las// sngags rnams dgod pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum bzhi la ming
491a7(sha): yang gzugs// 'khrul 'khor brgyad la drag po'i sngags// nang sa pa ra nA ga pu ta dgod/ drag po'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// nA ga dri ta ya
491b1(sha): hrIdrA ya pu ti myags phyogs kha thun ra lci dgod/ mtshon chu'i rtswa mo bcu gnyis la// dgra bo'i srog la blun myags/ rtsa gcod ts+yait+ta sha ga yas
491b2(sha): shig rba da/ nA ga sa srur rtsa nAn/ sbyor ba gnyis kyi spu gri dgod// sbrul dang rus sbal phrag dang stag/ bya dang khyi spyang mgo brnyan la// lto 'phye rus kyi
491b3(sha): ba ra bya// kha sbyor dug dang nya yi mkhris// gdug pa sna tshogs khrag gis byug/ kha sbyor dril la rus sbal ltor// go nan pa'i sbyor ba thod chen bca'// sngags
491b4(sha): dang nyin mtshan gyi la brdeg/ brgyad dang bcu drug skabs kyis blang // 'dod pa'i rtsa srog spu gris gcod// phyag rgya chen po'i brten pa bskyed// 'bru brgyad
491b5(sha): dril la bcu drug gtor// nyin mtshan ya ma'i las bzhir sbyar// sgrol gying 'khrul 'khor steng du bca'// nA ga'i 'khrul 'khor 'og tu bca'// sprul
491b6(sha): pa kha sbyor rno dpal mtshon// rang rang phral dang gnyis dril btso'o// me tog dril las smyo mdze phral// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sna nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
491b7(sha): las ga sang sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di bton to// nang ma pa ra na nA ga su ta dgra bo srog la thum myags/ rtsa chod tsit+ta shig yaM shag shig rba da/ nA ga kr-i ta ya
492a1(sha): hri da ya pu ti myags myogs kham thun ra li/ brgyad dam bcu gnyis 'khor lo bskor// rdzogs nas sngags dril gnan pa gdags//
492a2(sha): mtshams su 'dod pa'i a mu ka/ thodu pa 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba dril// sa sros gdug pa nyid la gtad// klu chen brgyad gyi pho brang gdag/ klu pa las
492a3(sha): bcol rgya yis gnan// gdug pa klu yi sbyor bar bshad/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol gying srog gcod rgyal po'i drag sngags kyi 'khrul
492a4(sha): 'khor 'di bshad de// shin tu dben pa'i bde gnas smra// sngags pa khrag dang dug gis byug/ b+hing sna drug dang bshos bu rdzus// ba ling ta dweng pU dza ba sham
492a5(sha): shog bu rme ba dang bcas pa// mu khyud gsum bskor thig bzhi ga dag/ dbus su gru gsum brnag pa bro// phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug drag po'i sngags/
492a6(sha): mtha' mi'i 'phrul mig nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// drag po'i sgyu gri rdzogs par gunas// drag sngags 'khor lo lugs dang lugs min gnyis// bcus la drug
492a7(sha): chu rten du byug/ rgyal po bdud mo'i lto bar bca'// khe sbyor gri thod sbyang thod gzhug/ byang shar gru gsum dong du gzhug/ de bzhin brnag pa'i ling ka
492b1(sha): gzhug/ sngags pa ya ma'i skur bsgoms la// gying rnams rbad cing drag sngags brdeg/ bcu bcu thun dbab 'bru ba khung bra ba// drag sngags rnal ma
492b2(sha): bzlog dang dkrug/ sprul pa rba da la shes pa dgug/ 'khrul 'khor sngags bzlas sgrol gying bskul// phyag rgyas dbang sdud mtshon chas brdeg/ dngos dang
492b3(sha): bsrung ba gnyen byung rab// 'dab chags dur 'gro bsad na 'bring // rmi lam spyod yul 'gyur na mtha'// mngon khugs shes pa 'bar dang tshig/ ma chu
492b4(sha): 'khrug ldud 'gyur ldeg 'phar// skye shing nags tshal bcad na mchog/ drod thob gnan pa'i sbyor ba bya// srog bdag sgrol gying shan pa bsgo// drag sngags
492b5(sha): spyod pa gsum du brdeg/ rnal ma phyi yi gzugs phung yul la brdeg/ myong shing rlabs nas lus srog yan lag 'jig/ yab yum 'khor bcas sha khrag
492b6(sha): drod las rol// 'khor lo'i thod pa rgya gram gong gsum gnan// drag sngags rtsa ba go bzlog spu gri rnal// nang dang thun gyis lus bral mgo dang tsit+ta gshog
492b7(sha): bu ga dgu nas khrag 'dzag thung gin myos// bsgral nas sha rus gzugs phung dur khrod 'chad par gnan// gsang bar thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// srog
493a1(sha): bdag rang gzir gsad pa mchog gi las// drag sngags dkrugs la rkang pa gnyis su brdeg/ sgrol gying rnams kyis rtsa gcad tsit+ta 'don/
493a2(sha): srog dang dbang po dngas ma skyon nas kyang // shes pa bsdus la gdug pa'i gnyan la ga tad// srog bdag shan pa drag po'i sbyor bar bshad// /
493a3(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drag sngags 'di bton to// A shu rtsa pa grin pa la dri ling dun du na khri shag ru dri/ dgra bo'i srog la li
493a4(sha): dza khaM myogs ru shag rtsa rbad thum ling khyer b+h+yo/ nri khug srog hu ra long rbad kha ma mugs yengs tsit+ta shag rba da/ dri ru shag khram dun du na ling dri la pa na gri na pa tsa
493a5(sha): shu a/ a shu grin dri li dun du na dgra bo'i srog ni dza le li thun mugs khyer b+h+yo/ khram shag pa tsa pa la du tri dgra bo'i srog kha myogs tsit+ta sha ga ni/ khug ru khaM rtsu
493a6(sha): rbad srog hur longs yangs rba da// klu dang rgyal po lto sbyar na// mdze rigs rme lkugs yams su 'bebs// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ drag sngags lho skye
493a7(sha): gyi le'u ste brgya bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba 'di phye ste rgyas pa
493b1(sha): bshad do// phaT raM he ra dz+wa la raM kha ra ga sha rAM/ e ya ra rA la su keng b+hu/ o AHhU/ ya ma hU/ o a kro te ka ya mA na ta ka hUM phaT/ o aHhU/ o
493b2(sha): paM ta li rag sha yag sha hU/ drig drig se ra ser khu lu mu lu hU phaT/ oM AHhUM/ kA ya wA ka badz+ra tsit+ta hU/ bu da d+ha ku la na/ badz+ra ku la na/ rad+b+ha/
493b3(sha): ku lan/ pad+ma ku lan/ karma ku lan/ hU ha ha he he ho/ hU ba sa ma ya hau/ sa ma ya ste/ r-i ha ho ha/ ra ga ya mi/ ya ma ra mA ya/ ya me to ya/ ra ya rtsan/
493b4(sha): ya kre tsa ya/ hri gu ru dzA la ni hU phaT/ ya ma rag sha ya hU phaT/ e hristi ya hUM phaT/ de pa hri sha ya hU phaT/ da ra ya ma hA pheT/ Ar+ya rag sha ya hU phaT/
493b5(sha): hri ka ta ya hUM phaT/ a mi pany+tsa ya hUM phaT/ hri sti sta ma ya hA phaT/ hI pa ma ma hA ya hU phaT/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku
493b6(sha): gsung thugs las spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen pa'i gsang sngags rnams phye ste ston to// hri s+t+rI sa ma ya hU dza dza/ oM shri many+dzu a kro te
493b7(sha): ya mAn+ta ka ya mar tsa ma ma e ka dza Ti de bI kro d+hi shwa ra yag sha dza dza/ sa ma ya s+thA/ ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo b+h+r-i dza dzo/ a ti br-i ho/ pra ti buM ho/ sa ma yas+thA.e ka dzaH
494a1(sha): ya man ta ka b+hi sa ra b+hi sa ra swA hA/ e ka dza Ti ya man+ta ka ra grA sa ma ya sU hA/ e ka dza Ti d+hU ba prid ya ya swA hA/ ti bya sreg ma la da re ye puSh+ka/
494a2(sha): sUd+da/ ti bya sha ta shad dadra dAM pe swA hA/ rag tsi ti sha da de gra ha gan+d+he sA hA/ sarba a mi bya ba da ri yaM swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta pra ti dza khA hi/ mu dra dz+nyA na pu dza sa ma
494a3(sha): yo sne hA/ ma sa ra ga ta tsit+ta san tsa pe ri yaM swA hA/ g+hu ha ra ga ta/ gu h+ya bo d+hi tsit+ta pU dza sU hA/ ma hA ba l-i ta khA hi/ shrI many+dzu ya mAn+ta ka hristi kA la ru paM kA ya a la la/
494a4(sha): ho/ sha ra la ga tsa me/ e sa hU/ pa sa hUM/ shrI sarba rU pa kA ya hU/ shrI sarba pi ta a ra li hU/ shrI sarba du pa duh+nu/ shrI sarba b+ha ling te hU/ shrI sarba pi tAM/
494a5(sha): yan hU/ o a kro tAM ka ya man takrA ha na ma tha b+han dza pU dza dza/ o a kro taM ka ya mAn ta ka krU la rU pa ni/ sha ku ru ni ni sha ku ru ni/ hU dza dza/ o hr-iSh+Ti bi kri
494a6(sha): ta na na hUM dza dza pe ta li rag sha// oM ya ma me takle ra tsA sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni hUM dza dza/ oM ya ma me ta kre ta hU dza dza/ oM ya ma rag mo ma ma rag mo snying kha
494a7(sha): rag duM sha snying ro thu ra ya ma b+h+yo hU dza dza/ oM ma ma e ka dza Ti tra ga rag sha la rig sha man+ta dza dza/ rag mo te ku ma ma dun du sha de ma b+h+yo dza/ kha ra ga hring shri
494b1(sha): de ma b+h+yo dza dza/ oM ya du dri mun san du na he tsa hUM dza dza/ kA ya badz+ra wA ka tsit+ta sa mA ya hU dza dza/ ya ma snying sha sha dza dza dun b+h+yo/ yA ma snying ru ba sha/
494b2(sha): ya ma A kaR+ShA ya hU dza dza// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sa nyid kyi sku ga sung thugs las sngags du ma phye ste bo ton to// ya ma rA dza sa tom
494b3(sha): ma ra tsa se to mai ya ya ma/ ra tsa sa to me tsa sa to me ya ma ra/ sa to maM ya ma rA tsa/ to me ya ma rA tsa sa/ me ya ma rA tsa sa to/ ya me to ru na yo ta/ me to ru na na
494b4(sha): yo ta ya to ru na yo ta ya me/ ru na yo ta ya ma me to/ na yo ta ya me to ru/ sa nA ga snying gzir rtsa larba da/ sa nU ga snying gzer u nanarba da/ sa nA ga snying
494b5(sha): gzer e na narba da/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la dun du na shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta ru thumasarbad/ rigs bzhi rgyud la zhen pa dang // ba so kha
494b6(sha): 'khor gdug pa kun// bskam chags dbang gis dug zhus pa// drag po sngags kyi dug 'byin 'joms// gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa yis// yang
494b7(sha): gsang 'khrul gyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir snying gzer dgu'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do//
495a1(sha): snying po 'phrul gyi man ngag bcud// gsang chen rtsa ba dril ba'i las// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i mchog/ snying gzer gdug pas thams
495a2(sha): cad 'joms// shi phrad sngags kyi 'khor lo yis// bdag skyob gzhan bsrungs gdug pa 'joms// ma mo bdud mo rgyal po btsan// klu gnyan sa bdag the rang tI//
495a3(sha): ma lus 'joms byed dgod kyi sngags// b+hi la'i khong 'dul khong dregs ce na// 'bar ba nag po e ma'i klong // yang gsang mchog gi sbyor bar bshad// de yi sbyor
495a4(sha): ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing ras ro ras la// mu khyud dang ldan rus sbal ltor// dug khrag snag tshar sbyar la bri// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim 'khrul
495a5(sha): mig thod par bzhi// de 'og lcags mkhar bang rim brgyad// yang logs gnas pa'i rtsa sbubs dgu// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug 'obs// srid pa rus sbal
495a6(sha): lto ba ru// drag po sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// de la dgod pa'i gnas pa ni// dbus na gdug pa'i snying po ming // zla kham ma mo rgyal po btsan// the brang
495a7(sha): gshin ngog snying po ming // 'khrul mig bzhi la gnas pa ni// 'dren pa stobs kyis 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim lcags mkhar brgyad po la// dregs pa
495b1(sha): stobs kyi 'bru brgyad dgod// yang logs rtsa srubs dgu po la// snying po gsum mthar spu gri dgu// 'bru rnams rdzogs pa'i tshul du dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha
495b2(sha): bcu drug la// shi phrar kun 'jo mas snying po dgod// gnyis bcas dug khrag cha ba bsku// kha sbyar sngo da ma ra mthing nag gril// 'khrul mig mtshon cha me
495b3(sha): dpal sngags// zlos shing 'byin pas shugs kyi mchog/ gcod cing 'bigs pas spu gri'i mtshon// sreg cing g.yang bas me chu rlung // sdud cing 'chang bas skyo
495b4(sha): ba'i mkhar// gzir zhing gnon pas thog ser sa// rtsa bar bcas pa'i mtshon lo ma// bdag skyob gzhan bsrungs go cha'i mchog/ las dang sbyor ba gcod pa'i mtshon//
495b5(sha): 'bar ba nag po zhe sdang mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal po dug ngar bcas// 'bar ba dug gi dum bur sdud// bdud nag rag sha ya ma'i klong // de yi pho brang thod pa'i
495b6(sha): gnas// ngur ma'i phyi ru ru sa sra gzugs// mchod rten rin chen mtshon cha'i sku// tshangs pa'i bu ga rgya gram e// 'khrul 'khor dang bcas re bas gril// hom khung
495b7(sha): dang bcas stong stong bzlas// gsal ba khyad par stobs kyi lha// rdzas dang lta ba sbyor ba sdeb// bdun pa mchog dang yin pa brtag/ nya stong sbyor ba drag po brtsam//
496a1(sha): thun mong bsrung ba'i sbyor ba brgyad// mngon zhugs sbyor ba drag po nyid// drag po zag chen snying gzer mchog/ gser gyi dgu dog gnas sgyus
496a2(sha): / ni rgyal grub chen zla gri'i me// yang gsang mchog ni sbyor ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis hrI kyi rgyu gsung thugs las nyid gzer dgu'i rdu
496a3(sha): bton to// sa nA ga ma trag snyid gzer rbad/ sa nA gA dun snying gzer zad/ sa nA ga tsa tri snying gzer rbad/ sa nA ga kra tI rting gzer rbad/ sa nA ga dug byung snying gzir
496a4(sha): rbad/ sa nA ga kham shag snying ga zer rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog tig zad/ sa nA ga m+bIng gzer thu ril zad/ s+yA nA ga snying gzer zur nan rba du/ sarba u nan kham shAg
496a5(sha): gzer thu ma tsit+ta breng sha ga rbad/ snying gzar skur nan rbad/ drag po me dpal gcod pa'i mtshon// gdug pa'i tsit+te yo ta ya me to ru na ta ya me to ru na yo/ ya ta yo ni ra
496a6(sha): ya kle/ ta yo ni ra ya kre ya/ yo ni rA ya kre ya ta/ ni ra ya kle ya ta yo/ ra ya kre ya ta yo ni/ ya krA ya ta yo ni ra/ kle ya ta yo ni ra ya/ ya kle ya tsa ni/ ra ma ya/
496a7(sha): ya tsa ni ra ma ya kre/ tsa ni ra ma yak+ka ya/ ni ra ma ya kle ya tsa/ ra ma ya kle ya tsa ni/ ma ya ke ya tsa ni ra/ ya ma me ta kra rA tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ ya ma ma ta/
496b1(sha): kr-iya me ta kr-i ma/ ya ta kre ma me/ ya ke ma mai ta/ ya mo me tA kle ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni/ ya me ta kle ma to ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra tsa sa/ ya ta khye ma ma yo ni/
496b2(sha): ra ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to ru na/ ya kle ma me ta ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ra/ ya ma tak+ka me/ to ya yo ta ni tsa sa ru na ni ra tsa/ ya me kre ma ta/ ra yo ya to/ tsa ru ni sa
496b3(sha): tsa na ni ma/ ya ta ma me kre to ya ra yo ni sa ra ru/ tsan ni ya/ ya kre me ta ma yo ra to ya sa ra tsa na ru na tsa ya/ ra tsa sa to me ya/ to ru na yo ta ya/ yo ni ra ya kre ya/
496b4(sha): ya tsa ni ma ya/ tsa sa to me ya/ ru na yo ta ya/ ni ra ya kre ya/ tsa ni ra ma ya/ ra ma ya/ to me ya/ yo ta ya/ ya kre ya/ ya ma ya ra/ tsa ma ya tsa/ yam
496b5(sha): ra ya/ ma ya ra ma/ ya ra ni dzakre ya ra ni tsa yo na ru me two sa tsa ya/ ru tra pro dung br-i shud ti pro dkar pro ya ma pro ya/ ma hu ra shar shar phob/ ya ma me ta kle tsa ni ya/
496b6(sha): ya tse ti hi hU ka/ ya ma me ta kr-i/ ma ra tsa ya/ ya takr-i ma me ru na ya/ ya kre ma me ta ni ra ya/ yakr-ik+ka ya tsa ni ra tsa sa to me ya/ ya me tor na yo na ra ya kr-i ya
496b7(sha): ya ma ra tsa sa to ru na yo ni ya/ ya ta yo ni ra ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sngags 'di bton to// ya ma me/
497a1(sha): kle srog la ya dun b+h+yo/ ya ma ma ta kr-i/ ya ma ta krakr-i ma/ ya ta krA ma maM/ ya kra ma me ta/ ya ma kr-i ta maM/ ya kle ta me ma/ ya ta krA ma ma/
497a2(sha): ya me ma kle ta/ ma me ta kr-i ma/ me ta kle ma ya/ ta kle ma mai ya/ kre ma me ta ya/ kr-i ta me ma ya/ ta me ma kle ya/ me ta kle ma ya/ ma kre ta me ya/ ya ma maM
497a3(sha): yata ya me ta ya/ ya tA kle ya/ ya krA ma ya/ ya ma ta/ me ya kre/ ta ya ma/ kle ma me/ ya ta kr-i me ma/ ya ta ma maM kre/ ya me kre ma tA/ ya kre me ma ta/
497a4(sha): ya kre ma me ta/ ya ta me ma kr-i/ ya me ma kr-i tA/ ya ma kr-i ta me/ ya ma me yA/ ma ya ta ya/ tA ya k+sha ya/ kle ya ma sa/ ma me ta krA yaM/ me ta k+ke mA ya/ ta krA ma
497a5(sha): me ya/ krA ma me ta ya/ ya ma ta ya/ me ya kle ya/ ta ya ma ya/ krA ya me ya/ ya ma me ya ma/ ya me ta krA ya ma/ ya ta kr-i ya ta/ ya kre ma ya kre/
497a6(sha): ya kre me ma ta/ ya ma sa ma ya/ hU gzir nan/ ya ma phaT/ ya ma phaT/ ya ta phaT/ ya kle phaT/ kle ya hUM dza/ ma ya hU dza/ ta ya hU dza/ me ya hUM dza/
497a7(sha): ya tsa ya rbad ya ma yarbad/ ya ra ya rba da/ ya na yarbad/ ya ni ya a mu ka ya rbad ya/ ya ma sa na ga tsarba da/ sUr nan/ a du na ya ma nA ga snying gzer
497b1(sha): na gdun ti phro/ shar shar drag tu phob// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po'i sngags kyi rtsa ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs las 'thon to//
497b2(sha): e ka ya ma he ka gre ma he kaM tsa du ra he thar ka snying bi sma pu ta dzA raM dza kha g+ha d+ha rang ra ga saM pra ma khrag sa ma b+he ta kus sma ha la ya ma hri ta sang thi ba dun/ rag sha thum/
497b3(sha): shag ru tsa kring ha ba tang rmugs dri li nA ga rbad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi spu gri 'di bton to//
497b4(sha): hri ti pra ma ya/ hI ti mur tsa ya/ hri ti ra ga ta tsa ra ya/ hri sti ma ra ya/ a mu kaM/ ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ ka pa ye stam b+ha ya nan/ ya ma de ma b+h+yo ru lu rbad
497b5(sha): yahri sti ya du ni/ badz+ra te dza srog la thu narbad/ hristi kri ta b+hu ta srog la thun rba da/ hristi ka la badz+ra da na gzer thun rbad/ hrid sti ra da na gar+b+ha srog la 'di
497b6(sha): thun rbad/ hristi pad ma ta kri ta tri myags thumarba da/ hI s+t+ri karma rag sha srog la thunarba da/ hristi ra ga badz+ra du na ri tsit+tArbad/ hri sti ya ma srog lide thu rtsa breng
497b7(sha): thun zad/ hri ste gri na badz+ra tsakra ra srog yaM thun rbad/ hri sti te tsa badz+ra u nan tri mA ra ya thums zad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa
498a1(sha): thams cad las la rbad pa'i sngags 'di bton to/ shri many+dzu ya mAn ta ka ka lau b+h+yo/ be ta li rag mo snying la dun ti b+h+yo/ ma ma e ka dza ti rag
498a2(sha): sha srog la du na ti b+h+yo/ e ka he dun du na ya ma tsa srog snying la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ra tsa hri kri ta sog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ar+ya rag sha mon ta ru thums tsit+ta dun ti b+h+yo
498a3(sha): ya ma hri sti kri ta mo na ta yag sha rag mo srog la dun tiM b+h+yo/ ya ma b+hi na ya mon ta snying kha ra ga ma rtsa la du na tau b+h+yoHya ma ra ga sha hI phri baM mo na ta ra ga mo snying rtsa ya ma
498a4(sha): dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma kri ta ya ba mon ta khrag la mu shwa ma dun to b+h+yo/ ya ru thum tsit+ta mun yag mo rag mo srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya matri krin ta 'gag mati khrag la mu sha dun d+ha
498a5(sha): ya ma ra li kro d+ha mun ma ma hed hed dgra bo'i srog la dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma ra dun dza ba ka li mun rag mo kha lo rtsa la dun to b+h+yo/ ya ma karma sha thu rtsa thun mun
498a6(sha): ma ma rtsa la thang thang du na tai b+h+yo/ ya ma kha la hri myags mun rag mo ru ta rtsa la du na tI b+h+yo/ ya ma ru pa thang thang mun ma ma ha pa shaM srog ya dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma sha baM hI
498a7(sha): sti mun rag mo snying rtsa dun tau b+h+yo/ ya ma b+hi sa ma rtsa myogs mun rag mo tsit+ta breng brang dun ti b+h+yo/ ya ma khrag la rmugs tsit+ta mun rag mo rag mo a pa da ra srog
498b1(sha): ya du na ti b+h+yo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las mchog gi thun sngags 'di bton to// ya mAn ta ka hri ti ka la rU pa
498b2(sha): ya ma ra tsa hri hring thu ri ya rtsa rba da/ srog ling thun b+h+yo/ badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta kr-id hri sti kA ya rU pa ya shaM srog ne na khyer b+h+yo/ rtsa tshod myags myogs srog la du na rbad
498b3(sha): ya ma ra tsa mo na ta na ga mo a pa ye/ ka ba ye du ru ye bya tsa yo mu ka ye srog la du na mugs rtsa la myogs rba da/ hristi ya man ta ka tsit+ta breng sha ma kA ya la rA
498b4(sha): pa a ne a ne u ne u ne/ du ne du ne ya ne ma sha srog la bruM ril rbad/ hri hu ra sti yaM b+hi kr-i ya nan glad pa la ha re ha re mu phuT yam shig bya tsa ye du ru yem+ba
498b5(sha): sha srog shag shag thun rba da/ ya ma ra tsa shaM to na ri na baM ru tau yo me kha sa kle pa tsa khwas srog la ling thu tsa la thu rbad/ rag mo ru bruM kha rag shrI de ma b+h+yo/ ya yaM
498b6(sha): thu bruM tsit+ta bruM myags rtsa rba da/ rag mo rtsa rtsa raM thun snying ro shaM duM myags tsit+ta phrig phrig srog la thun rba da/ dun sha snying kha rag ma ru lu ru lu rAg mo taM tsa khrag
498b7(sha): la mu shaM ma srog thun rba da badz+ra snying kha la yid yid pra ma khrag ting ting hur hur long ba mthun myogs rtsa na narba da/ dmun ha spya dut+ti rag sha pa tsa thu
499a1(sha): thu ra dre ru shag gying kar shu la man baM ti mang du ru dgra bo ro myags thun b+h+yo/ 'ur ba tsiSh+Na baM tsi lo ki nan dri ling dri ling gu dri ku drir
499a2(sha): dri tsa mun tri srog thug thug ya rbad/ snying khrag rtsa na na ra ya ma ni thu bruM b+h+yo// de ltar gsang sngags sbyor ba yang // don gnyis sbyor ba brnag
499a3(sha): pa'i las// 'khor lo thun sngags bsregs pa'i sngags// rtsa ba bsnyen bsgrub sngon 'gro'i mchog/ gzir pa la sogs bdag gzhan srun/ thun mongs sngags
499a4(sha): ni du mar bshad// bcu drug rtsa ba gcig gis bsdus// drag po kun 'byur mchog gi sngags// bde ba bgrod cing smin par byed// don gnyis mngon du 'grub
499a5(sha): pa'i sngags// drug cu gnyis las kun 'byung yin// 'di na bgrod cing smin pa'i sngags// thun mong gsang sngags drug tu bsde ba// mtshon cha'i rgyal po
499a6(sha): 'khor lo dang // gshin rje gshed dang g.yas su bsdeb// bdud kyi khram de de bzhin bsde ba// ma mo khrag skyug thun dang bsdeb// rims nad sbyor ba brgyad
499a7(sha): dang bsdeb// dal dang smyo 'bog ho ma dang bsde ba// lo tog 'joms pa zor du bsde ba// bsnol thog bu yug ya mar bsde ba// rmi gri ya ma bdud dang
499b1(sha): bsde ba// chu klung hu ra thums g.yeng ba'i las// sngags rgod ya ma lto sbyor bsdeb// skyo 'bog gzer thabs ra tsar bsde ba// mdze yams phol 'bras gang
499b2(sha): 'dod la// nA ga gdug pa drag po yi// 'khor dang yab yum gsum du bsdeb// khyad par gsum du sngags pas bsde ba// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gsum du bsdeb
499b3(sha): brnal ma bzlog dang lto dkrugs yin// 'phen sdud dbye gcod mnan pa lnga// drag po'i las te sbyor ba'i mchog/ kun 'byung sngags kyi rgyal por bshad//
499b4(sha): rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gsang sngags 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgya bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang sa'i lha mo brtan mas//
499b5(sha): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab bo// kye ho bcom ldan 'gro ba'i mgon// khro bo 'byung ba'i gleng gzhi dang // drag po sngags kyi dug mda' la//
499b6(sha): smod pas bas gso dbab pa dang // drag sngags las kyi rnam grangs dang // smod pa sbyin pa 'bras bu dang // thabs kyi rim pas rgyas pa dang //
499b7(sha): shugs kyi 'gro ba'i thabs dang rim// gshin rje gshed kyis las grangs tshad// mtshon cha'i rgyal po'i dbye ba dang // sngags dang nyi ma bshad du
500a1(sha): gsol// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu ma lta bu'i yon tan mngon du bshad do//
500a2(sha): 'phrul gying snying po'i gsang rgyud 'dir// gshin rje grangs dang las dbang tshad// ngo bo yon tan gnas dang rgyan// 'khor lo la sogs 'dir bshad do//
500a3(sha): gshin rje'i don lnga de bzhin lnga// rang bzhin ye shes sgrub byed sprul// lhun grub las kyi ya mar bshad// rang bzhin gshin rje'i ngo bor sems// lhun grub
500a4(sha): gshin rje 'byung ba lnga// sprul pa'i gshin rdza ting 'dzin sngags// sgrub byed gshin rdza lho phyogs gnas// rig pa'i rgyal po gshin rje yi// de don rgyas pa
500a5(sha): 'di lta ste/ rang bzhin chos sku spos dang bral// snang srid chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhi// ma byung ma skyes skye med las// nam mkha'i dpe ltar sna tshogs snang //
500a6(sha): byang chub sems te ngo bo'i gshis// mi 'gyur rang bzhin spros med las// cho 'phrul gzugs brnyan lta bu'i sku// nyon mongs snang byed ye shes sku// brka ma
500a7(sha): chags lnga yi 'dzin pa 'joms// rang snang len spong med pa'i rje// sdug bsngal 'byung byed rig pa'i ngang // rnam rtog zhen chags gnyis med sgral//
500b1(sha): dug lnga'i nad dang brtsol ba'i sman// thugs rje byang chub dbyings su bsgral// las can ldan pa'i gshed du bshad// dag dang ma dag thams cad kyi// gzhi rten rtsa
500b2(sha): ba byang chub sems// rang bzhin chos sku'i gshin rjer bshad// 'byung ba lnga dang sna tshogs chos// chen po lnga yi ngang las rdzogs// lhun mnyam gshin dang ldan
500b3(sha): par ba sha da// chen po lnga las grub pa ni// yul las skur gsal mnyam par gnas// kha dog dbyibs las gsal ba'i skra// gzung 'dzin las 'joms dag
500b4(sha): pa'i rje// khro bo stobs kyi ngo bo yis// ngar 'dzin 'khor ba'i zhen par gcod// dngas ma 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// gshin rje'i rgyal po rA dza yas// 'dzin pa
500b5(sha): sa yi zhen pa 'joms// dang sa ma 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// drod kyi dngas ma myos byed kyis// sreg byed tsha ba'i zhen pa 'joms// sdud par byed pa'i phyag rgya
500b6(sha): las// 'phags pa'i rgyal po chags pa'i sku// dang sa ma chu yi zhen pa 'joms// bskyod pa'i ga yang ba'i dang sa ma las// ra la char dgu yi phyag rgyu yin//
500b7(sha): bskyod pa rlung gi zhan pa 'joms// 'bras bu dang sa ma lnga rtogs bas// zhen pa 'joms pas gshed du bshad// dngas ma lnga yi lus nyid las// phyi nang gzung/
501a1(sha): 'dzin chos dang sems// spong len med pa'i rdzogs pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i gshin rjer bshad// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na//
501a2(sha): stobs chen 'dzin pa 'gyur ba'i sku// zhi bas 'gro 'dul thabs bsam yas// mi shig thugs kyi pho brang nas// las dang 'bras bu 'byung ba bzhi// ngo bo
501a3(sha): 'gyur pa med par ba shad// shugs kyi phyag rgya gar bsgyur pa sa// dbu gsum rngam pa'i zhal ga dang sa nas// khams gsum bag chags zil gyis gnon//
501a4(sha): pha rol phyin drug las drug las// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba yis// rgyu drug 'khor ba zil gyis gnon// rgyan cha 'dug stangs rngam pa yis// dbang can
501a5(sha): kun 'dul las kyi 'khor// snying po dngas ma gtso la 'bul// dregs pa kun gyi rdza ru bshad// dbang bcas rngam pa'i pho mo yis// 'khor ba gdungs
501a6(sha): pa'i zhen pa 'joms// ye nas skye med chos nyid las// rig pa gsum gyi don rtogs pa// mi 'gyur bas na gshin rjer bshad// sprul pa'i gshin rje rnam
501a7(sha): pa gsum// ngo bo nyid kyi sprul pa dang // khro bo dgongs rgyud sprul pa dang // dgongs pa drod kyi sprul pa'o// ngo bo chos sku'i byin rlabs las// skye kha'i cho 'phrul
501b1(sha): 'jam pa'i dbyangs// zhi ba'i sku la rngam pa'i thugs// rgyas pa'i phyag g.yon g.yas pas 'joms// lam dang thabs kyis bya ba rdzogs// sems dpa'i
501b2(sha): sprul pa 'khor ba'i rje// ral gri glegs bam 'khor ba yi// las dang nyon mongs bag chags 'joms// thugs rje 'joms byed zhi ba'i gshed// dgongs rgyud
501b3(sha): sprul pa'i rdo rje 'chang // gsang ba sprul pa'i 'khrul 'khor du// snying po nges pa'i byin rlabs sdud// las dang sbyor ba du ma'i gzhi// rigs dang rigs min 'khor
501b4(sha): rnams la// drag pos 'joms pa'i sbyor ba bstan// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med rje// sha za ki kaM srin po klu// dkor srungs byed gtams kying rang gza'//
501b5(sha): gshin rje 'am ma mo pho nya yis// srog dbugs 'brel cing dbang po 'pho// snyigs ma gsum sdud dbang po 'joms// gshed bdag chen po'i las su bshad//
501b6(sha): / rnam lnga drod kyi byin paskyed la// 'bru gnyis btags la brdas bskul bstim// rtog pa gnas 'gyur bskyed pa'i gzhi// snying po gnyis bskul thugs
501b7(sha): mtshan bskyed// gang dmigs phyag rgya chen por gsal// rang lus phung po skye mched kyi// gnas snga byin ldan 'khor gyi rdza rtsa ba'i bdud bzhi gnas
502a1(sha): su 'joms// log par brtags pa go bzlog bshed// sprul pa gsum gyi gshin rjer bshad// sgrub byed gshin rje khams gsum
502a2(sha): ba dag/ srid pa gsum gyis gzhi rten 'chung // nyon mongs bag chags sog cing smin// ya ma ya yi zhing khams na// lte 'phye mgrin pa yangs la gnag
502a3(sha): lus dang yan lag tshigs mig zlum// lto na skye shi na dang 'pho// kun gyi srog la dbang sgyur rje// dang sa mas paskyed la snying pos dgug/ bsnyen pa sgrub mtha'
502a4(sha): ru srog bskul na// gang dmigs yul dang dbang po 'joms// las dbang sgrub byed gshin rjer bshad// don grub gshin rje bzhi ru bshad// thun 'bebs
502a5(sha): stobs chen gshin rje dang // 'khor los gcod byed gshin rje dang // mtha' sdud sbyor ba'i gshin rje dang // dregs pa stobs kyi gshin rje'o// thun drug
502a6(sha): sbyor ba'i las byed pa// sha za las kyi gshin rje rnams// khyad par lnga yi thun 'bebs pa// sprul pa 'joms pa'i gshin rjer bshad// thugs kyi 'khor
502a7(sha): los gcod pa ni// rang rgyud gnas pa'i gshin rjer bshad// lus kyi 'khor los gcod pa ni// rang las zad pa'i dbang btsan nas// lhan cig skyes
502b1(sha): pa'i gshin rjer bshad// phyag mtshan 'khor los gcod pa ni// sngon byas rang gi gnas smin la// rgyu rkyen stobs kyi bdag po ste// dman pa 'khrul pa'i
502b2(sha): gshin rjer bshad// rdzas kyi 'khor los gcod pa ni// yi dgas rgyal po'i stobs can la// srog stong pos la rdzas la brten// gtor ma dam rdzas rag
502b3(sha): tas bskul// srog sdud las kyi gshin rjer bshad// mtshan ma sbyor bas gcod pa ni// dmigs pa'i rgyu la sngags kyi rkyen// rgyu rkyen 'brel ba grub pa ni// /
502b4(sha): mtha' sdud gsang ba'i rdo rjer bshad// dbang sdud sngags kyi gcod pa ni// 'byung ba bzhi yi rnga ma 'og na// sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyor ba yis// stobs kyi
502b5(sha): bdag po sa bsnyen bsgrub la// kha bcings bka' bzlog gshig gzir la// mtha' ru dbye ba drug cu man na// de yis las kyi mtha' sdud pa// tshe srog/
502b6(sha): sdud pa'i gshin rjer bshad// bcu gsum rgyan gyi yig 'bru la// mtha' ru zhi rgyas pa srog ldan pa// bdag gzhan ltas logs go cha brgyan// rang nyams
502b7(sha): stobs kyi gshin rjer bshad// sngags rgod gab pas gcod pa ni// snang srid srog dbugs dbang po 'chang // las la sbyor ba myur brtsams na// lus
503a1(sha): can dmigs pa gang byas nus// bdag srun gzhan ga shig las dbang gcod// mtha' ru gdug pa ga nyan pa sreg ga nan// kun gyi
503a2(sha): sa da mang dwa byu b+h+ya/ 'byung bA m+b+ha mi dug / rgyun gyis smra pa ga shin rjer bshad// ba rmugs kyi gcod pani/ na
503a3(sha): pho mo kun// srog snying dril nas mtshon char bsdeg// btsan thabs gzir zhing don gnyis 'grub// mgo dgur stobs kyis lus srog 'brel// 'chi bdag
503a4(sha): rgyal po gling khams 'khor// srog gcod las kyi gshin rjer bshad// smod pa drag pos gcod pa ni// gdug pa'i sngags la rno dpal mtshon// ku
503a5(sha): gyi snying po tshe srog bdag/ khyams khang gsang mdzod lto ba ru// kun gyi bkrag mdangs sdud cing 'chang // khyad par sbyor ba gshig cing gcod// gdug pa
503a6(sha): gzir zhing dug gsum smrig/ thun mong khyad par gnyis kyis gsod// mtha' ru phag mo khog yan gnan// phyag rgya chen po zil gnon gyis//
503a7(sha): rang byung stobs chen gshin rjer po shad// don gyi gshin rje gsum du bshad// skye 'gag med pa'i gshin rje dang // mtshan pa ldan pa'i gshin
503b1(sha): rje dang // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i gshin rje'o// ma bcos mnyam nyid dag pa la// 'phra ba'i bag chags 'byung ba yang // thig le bde ba'i ngang du rdzog
503b2(sha): sna tshogs snang la ngos gzung med// chos kyi sku yi gshin rjer bshad// 'jam dpal khro bo gzhal med dpag las 'das// nang gi rtsa lam dag pas 'gro
503b3(sha): don mtha' ru spyod// mtshan dang dpe byad yon tan dpag tu med// phyi yi rgyan rnams dur khrod gdug pa'i chas// phyag mtshan la sogs nus pas 'gro ba'i
503b4(sha): rmongs pa selo// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gshin rjer bshad// sprul pa gsum du gshed bzhi phyogs skyong bcu// 'gro ba 'dul phyir khro bo sha za'i lus//
503b5(sha): cho 'phrul mngon phyung 'jigs pa'i cha lugs ston// sprul pa sku yi gshin rje gshed du bshad// gshin rje gshed kyi rtsa ba gnyis su bshad//
503b6(sha): 'khor ba sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rje dang // ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rje'o// dmigs pa'i lus la bstan pa'i byin bskyed pa// nyi ma'i snying po dag las /
503b7(sha): 'od 'byung ltar// bstan pa'i phyag rgya gsal ba'i thugs kha nas// dmigs pa'i lus la ye shes rgyun gyi dbang bskur nas// dmigs pa med pa'i sku ru
504a1(sha): gsal/ nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho ltar// dag pa'i ngang las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni// sprin dang khu rlangs rlabs dang 'khyags pa bzhin//
504a2(sha): ye shes snang med brjod las 'das pa la// sna tshogs 'khor ba'i chos rnams 'byung 'dra yang // rgyu rkyen 'das na gnyen pos bcos mi dgos// 'dzin pa ma grol
504a3(sha): gzung ba'i yul la zhe na// yul sems gnyis 'dzin bag chags stug pa'i gzhi// las kyi 'bras bu 'khor ba'i gshin rjer bshad// lung gi rgyal po 'khrul gyi bshad
504a4(sha): ba 'dir// 'khor ba sgyu ma rtags na snang med dbu mar gsal// gzung dang 'dzin pa ye shes gnyug mar grol// chags sdang lam dang spyad pas bgrod pa med par phyin//
504a5(sha): rang lus brtan pa rnyed pas ye shes yin pa skyes// gnyis med ye shes rol par gsal// ye shes sgyu ma lta bu'i gshin rjer bshad// don dam gshin rje rtsa ba gcig tu bshad// /
504a6(sha): mi 'gyur rig pa byang chub snying po'i bka'// rang sems rtsal dang ldan pas ya nas gshin// ting 'dzin drod ldan lus sems kun gyi rje// gzung 'dzin chos skur bsgral
504a7(sha): bas ngang gis 'joms pa'i gshed// kun 'byung rig pa'i ye shes bsam yas kyang // thig le chen po gcig gi ngang du rdzogs// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi gshin rje/
504b1(sha): bshad// 'joms byed rtsa ba bgrod pa'i rgyud las gnas// snying kha lu brten 'bru gnyis sdud dang sog/ rang gi shes pa 'pho ba don gyis gshin// rkyen gyi sngags kyis 'byung
504b2(sha): ba'i khams dkrugs nas// shes pa'i sgrib byed las dbang drag po'i rje// dngas ma bzhi yi rtsa ba nam mkha'i khongs su bsdus// bag chags rten pa'i rtsa bcad 'bru gcig
504b3(sha): snyigs ma bsregs// lus sems 'brel ba rang rgyud 'pho ba'i gshed// brnag pa rang la gnas pa'i gshin rjer bshad// ya ma lag na rdo rje yis// gshin rje'i rnam gras
504b4(sha): dbye bar bshad// gshin rje phyi nang gsang ba gsum// 'byung ba bzhi yi rnga ma 'og nas// las kyi gshin rje tshe srog sdud// thod mkhar gnas kyi gshed po bzhis// 'du ba
504b5(sha): bzhi yi las dbang sdud// bcu gnyis 'obs srun phyogs skyong gis// yul gyi dmigs pa dbang du sdud// lcags mkhar bcu drug sha za'i 'khor// phung po rten dang bcas nas/
504b6(sha): 'gugs// sngags kyi dbang du ming la 'bebs// phyi yi ge shin rje'i las su bshad// gling bar mun khang khyams nus nas ni// yi dgas rgyal po 'chi bdag gnas//
504b7(sha): srog bskul rbad na dbang po 'phrog/ za byed bdud po khram thogs bcas// dmigs pa'i gzas pa khra ma la 'debs// bdud mo bcus ni myos par byed// 'khor gyi
505a1(sha): bdud dang sha za rnams// rang rang lag chas gsod par byed// za byed gshin rje'i las su bshad// dur khrod dbus kyi pho brang nas// zod rus
505a2(sha): gtams pa'i gzhal yas khang // mthing nag me 'od gdan stengs na// gsod bya da ya ma'i lto 'changs kyis// rten 'brel sridade pa'i bla tsha 'chang // myos byed srin
505a3(sha): po dregs pa bcus// phung po lnga nang 'byung ba yi// rten gyi bla dang sprul pas 'gugs// srin mo rlung gi shugs can bcus// yan lag lnga yis chags par 'brel//
505a4(sha): 'khor gyi ki kang pho mo yis// bdun rgyud rtsa ba gcod cing 'joms// gsod byed gshin rje'i las su bshad// gru gsum e yi po zang nas// skye rgyun gcod pa'i
505a5(sha): gshin rje yis// skye ba dbang gi rtsa sgo gcod// dud 'gro mtsho yi dregs pa dgus// dbang po dgu yi sgo yang 'gegs// mtshon 'khrugs rgyal po brgyad po yis//
505a6(sha): shes pa brgyad kyi rtswa sgo 'gegs// 'khrugs par byed pa'i ma mo bzhis// lha bzhi 'byed cing rten la sdud// thar byed mon dang gshin rje'i 'khor// myos byed 'pho
505a7(sha): ba'i las su bshad// ma la ya yi 'jig rten la// dbang byed khro bo gshin rje yis// srid gsum shes rgyud lto bar 'tshong // ya ma'i 'khor dang ma mo yis// mngagu
505b1(sha): na thogs pa med par 'gugs// gshin rje drug khri drug stong dang // ma mo khri phrag drug cu yis// klu dang gnod sbyin pho me 'khol// dam rdzas srog dbugs rgyu la brten// tshul
505b2(sha): gsum ya ma lus la rbad// rje bran grogs ltar shes par bya// lta spyod nyams ldan grogs kyi tshul// dam rdzas rgyu dang drod la brten// rten gsum pa yi yul la dmig
505b3(sha): gang 'dod rang lus rje ltar zhugs// mi yangs stobs ldan brtul zhugs drag/ byin rlabs dbang ldan rnal 'byor pa// gdeng gsum mchog gi sbyor bas 'joms// bran
505b4(sha): g.yog 'khor skyong las kun byed// de min brtsams nas gzhan dbang sdud// phyi yi gshin rje'i las su bshad// nang gi gshin rje si ra'i mtshan// 'khor lo chos sku'i
505b5(sha): dbus nyid na// sbyor ba gsum gyi rgyal po gnas// rnam pa yi ge'i gzugs brnyan la// byin brlab rang bzhin phyag rgya'i gzugs// dbus na gshin rje nyid kyi sku//
505b6(sha): ya yi sa bon 'phen pa'i 'bru// spro bsdu yan lag lnga dang ldan// snying po thig le'i lto ba ru// dri ma la brtan dbang po 'chang // thod mkhar gling bzhi 'bru bzhi yis//
505b7(sha): yan lag sbyor ba bcu gnyis kyis// rgyu bzhi dkrugs nas nad bzhi slong // ling ga dag la shes pa 'pho// bla chen bzhi dang bcas pa gzugs// gshed po bzhi
506a1(sha): yi lto bar 'chang // byi yi bcu gnyis spu gri mkhar// rten pa'i rA dza la sogs pa// phyogs bcu'i bdag po mgon po bcu// 'gugs byed
506a2(sha): nya gsod pa'i gying // bla yi sprul pa bcu gnyis 'gugs// mi g.yo gsung gi lto bar 'chang // bcu drug lcags mkhar ye shes kyi// gsung thugs sku yi snying
506a3(sha): pa yis// las kyi ya ma mig so brtan// nyi shu spu gri'i mtshon cha yis// bla ga nas ling ga'i rten gshig nas// bla rtags sprul pa yang spul 'joms// dmar nag/
506a4(sha): gdug pa'i 'bru rnams las// mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// mi 'gyur spogs pa'i las rnams byed// dregs pa'i 'bru rnams de bzhin gnas//
506a5(sha): byin brlabs dbang bskur gdugs bran na// 'khor lo'i sbyor ba brgyad brgya byed// nang gi gshin rje'i las su bshad// gsang ba gnas pa'i gshin rje ni// zhing
506a6(sha): bcu kun sgrol shes rgyud la// tsit+ta dbus kyi rtsa sbubs na// gdug pa'i yi ge dmar nag ya// g.yas g.yon rtsa la ra dang ma// 'dab ma bzhi la snying po bzhi// rtsa bran
506a7(sha): 'bru brgyad mdud pa bzhi// rtsa go spor byed khrag dang rlung // 'brel chen bzhi la rdzogs pa ru// gcod pa'i 'bru dgu bzhi ru bsnol// ra tsa sa to 'bru brgyad kyis//
506b1(sha): shes pa brgyad kyi rtsa gcad nas// 'bru bzhis rtsa yi sgo yang gcod// ma la brgyad dam drug bsdus nas// mde chags pa'i ya la thim// khrag dang ni yi rnam pa yis//
506b2(sha): lus dang rtsa sbubs khams gsum gang // dbus dang g.yon gyi 'bru gnyis las// me rlung 'khrugs pas rgyu bzhi bslad// 'bru dgus rtsad bcad gcig gis bsregs//
506b3(sha): dngas ma rlung gi sa bo na las// bsdus nas gshin rje'i sku ru bskyed// phyag rgya chen po bstan pa sbyin// snyigs ma phung po'i rjen shul rnams// mchod par byin brlabs
506b4(sha): nges par bsngo// las dbang rang gis lus sems 'brel// las kyi rgyal pos gsad pa'i mchog/ gsad pa gshin rje'i las su bshad// phyi nang gshin rje'i gtso 'khor
506b5(sha): gyis// yan lag sbyor ba du ma byed// gsang ba'i gshin rje skyo 'bog dang // rengs dang lkugs pas rmongs par byed// las ni rtsa ba yan lag 'byin// sbyor ba kun gyi bdag
506b6(sha): po yin// gsang bar sbyar na las kun nye// gshin rje'i dam par 'di gzung bya// bde ba rang nyams phyag rgyar bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi las su bshad//
506b7(sha): rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gshin rje gshed kyi las dang rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang
507a1(sha): sa'i lha mos bcom ldan 'das la/ las kyi gshin rje bkol ba dang // rgyal po ma mo bkol ba dang // srog bdag pho mo bkol ba dang /
507a2(sha): de dag gzir zhing shis dang // srog dbrog ru khugs ji ltar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das
507a3(sha): kyis dregs pa pho mo thams cad bkol ba'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// las kyi yams gsad pa yi// 'phrul gyi 'khor lo 'di lta ste// gsang bar bya
507a4(sha): ba'i gshed skor ni// bri dang dgod pa'i thabs ba sha da pa// 'jam dpal thugs kyi snying khu las// gru gsum dbyibs las thig rkang lnga// lta ba phyogs med gas//
507a5(sha): mdzod gsum// dbus su ya bzhag rdo rje bzhi// sku gsung thugs dang 'phrin las rdzogs// rtse mor gcod pa'i mtshon cha bzhi// mtshon cha de yi rtse mo la//
507a6(sha): ya me ta kre yig 'bru bzhi// der bzhag gshed bzhi'i gnas su 'dod// gsang mdzod gsum la bsgrub bya yi// snying po ming dang rus khams gnas// gsang mdzod
507a7(sha): mun khang gnam lcags 'bar// der bzhag bla sems chags pa'i gnas// ya ma ra tsa tshar dgu gnyis// gtad pa'i las su gcig pas na// des na gsang
507b1(sha): mdzod gcig tu 'dod// khang khyud gsum la bsrung ba 'obs// gnam lcags thod mkhar bcu pa ru// thugs kyi snying po spyi rgyug dgod// rtag tu bzlas shing bskul mi
507b2(sha): bgos// khang khyud bzhi pa mtshon cha'i mkhar// rdo rje rgya gram bcu gnyis la// lte bar gcod cing gnon pa yi// ma ra ya sogs spu gri'i gnas// mtshon cha'i gas/
507b3(sha): tu ming dang rus// gnam lcags 'obs chen bcu gnyis yin// me rlung spu gri ral gri'i mkhar// de yis gcod cing gnon par byed// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gnyis
507b4(sha): bcas la// dug khrag myos pa rdzas kyi ngar// byin dbapa lha bskyed ting 'dzin ngar// las sngags mthu dril sngags kyi sngar// blud cing dug shing me la bdug/
507b5(sha): 'khor lo 'od 'bar sngags kyi gnas// bsgrub bya bkug la lte bar gzhag/ yang na gnas pa sems kyi lta// bsrung ba'i lha phral rang la 'a'o// lha de dag gi
507b6(sha): go char gyur// bdag zlos go cha'i lha yang zlos// gsang ba gshed kyi yi go bskul// rgyu bzhi gnad kyis 'byung bzhi bslang // rgyu bzhi dkrugs pas rtsa bzhi
507b7(sha): gcod// sa bcu me rlung mkha' la bsdu// hU dang bcas pas mkha' la 'phang // mri dang snyigs ma'i 'khor lor bcas// las kyis ma lto bar 'pho// thod par
508a1(sha): bsdus la gnan pa bya// bla rtags mtshan mar gzugs byung na// dug gsum la sogs skabs kyis brdeg/ phyi nang gsang ba dgu ru
508a2(sha): sbyar// steng du rdo rje rgya gram dang // gshed kyi yi ge bcu ru bri// gnyis gnyis bar du bsgrub bya gzhug/ 'khor lo la sogs thod par dril// klu ga nas sdig pa'i
508a3(sha): lus la gtad// dril gtor nyin mtshan skabs kyis sbyar// nyi shar bya rgod khra spu gri// dgu thog ri rgyal sa gzhi sbyar// drug 'bum sum 'bum gcig 'bum
508a4(sha): dang // stong tshe gcig dang brgya ru sbyar// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di phye ste ston to// oM ya ma me ta
508a5(sha): kle hUM dza dza/ oM kA ya badz+ra wA ka tsit+ta dza dza/ ya ma me ta kr-i dgra bo'i snying la ya b+h+yo/ nri A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza dza/ ye ma me ta kle ka ba ye che ge pra ma yarbad ya/ ma me ta
508a6(sha): kre ya ka pa yaM/ che ge mo mur tsa ya rbad ya/ ya ta krA ma me ka pa ya che ge mo rag ta tsi tA ya rba da ya/ ya kr-i ma me ta ka pa ye che ge mo mA ra ya rba da/ hri sti pra ma mur dza
508a7(sha): rag tsa ra ma ra ya ni sha ku ru ni rbad ya/ sa ma ya hUM gzir na na/ stam b+ha ya nan/ de ltar sngags kyi sbyor ba yang // bcu gnyis gcig tu sbyor ba dbye// gsad pa gshed kyi
508b1(sha): 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshad kyi sbyor bas lo tog gzhom pa 'di bshad do// dur khrod dben pa'i gnya na ra ru// maN+Dal
508b2(sha): mda' gang khrag gis byug/ tshon sna gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bri// dbus su gru gsum zla kham dmar// thod 'phreng mthing nag pho brang brtag/ phyi rim rtsibs bzhi sprul
508b3(sha): gyis bskor// gru chad sgo bzhi gling dang mthun// rgyan rnams mdzes byas phur pa dgod// smug chen smug chung ngu nga chen dbus// zhing chen zhing chung rgyu zhags te// sha chen
508b4(sha): keng rus gsu ra dang khrag/ gtor mA la sogs dam rdzas dgram// bdag nyid gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// gzhal yas gdan dang lha rnams brtag/ spyan drangs la sogs
508b5(sha): mchod bstod mthar// thugs kyi snying pos phyogs bcur spro// snying dang b+hu la nus pa bsdu// zhing khams khro chung thog ser gyis// gang bar bsams la sa la gdon//
508b6(sha): ye shes lha bsnyen las dbang bsdu// dregs pa btsun cing chu dril ba stim// 'phro ba du nyi ma'i zer lta bus// phyi nang gsang ba'i drod rtags 'byung // dur khrod gnas
508b7(sha): nas dpa' bo yis// gos su bcas pa'i rgyu blangs la// sme ba lnga dang ni rang sus// thang ba byas la kha dog byug/ mchog phran skra dang ldan pa'i pir// khrag dang rgya
509a1(sha): skyegs dug chu yis// 'khrul 'khor rim pa lnga ru bskor// dbus su zla kham rgya gram bzhi// rlung ri rgya gram sdud cing 'phul// phyi rim lcags
509a2(sha): mkhar bcu gnyis ldan// sbyin dang las kyi sdud cing dril// mu khyud gsum pa'i lcags mkhar ni// ba mig bcu drug drag po'i stobs// dbang drag stobs kyis
509a3(sha): 'bras bu 'joms// yang log mu khyud khor yug la// gdug pa'i gzugs brnyan gzir ba brten// thogs pa med par 'joms pa'i mchog/ de la dgod pa'i rim pa
509a4(sha): ni// dbus su yang bzhag sdud cing 'phen// rgya gram bzhi yi rtse mo la// ma me takle snying po mchog/ kun gyi rtsa ba yon tan 'phel// rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo las// shar
509a5(sha): gyi lugs mkhar mig gsum du// ma las snying po gsum 'phros pas// ya dang ma dang phro ma dang gsum// shar du me tog 'bras bu 'joms// rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo
509a6(sha): la// chu ri lho yi khang pa ru// me las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// ru dang ta dang phrom dang gsum// bang mig gsum pa'i 'od zer gyis// lho ru me tog 'bras bu 'jom/
509a7(sha): rlung ri rgya gram rtse mo la// chu ri nub kyi khang pa ru// ta las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// dud dang dkar dang phro ma dang gsum// lcags mkhar gsum gyi 'od 'phros pas//
509b1(sha): nub kyi me tog 'bras bu 'joms// rlung gi rgya gram byang phyogs nas// chu ri byang gi khang pa ru// kle las yi ge gsum 'phros pas// shu dang ti dang phro ma dang gsum// lcag/
509b2(sha): mkhar gsum pa'i 'od 'phros pas// byang gi lo tog 'bras bu 'joms// gshed bzhi'i mthu dril dbang du sdud// sgo bzhi'i mjug la 'bru gsum btags// dril gtor
509b3(sha): khri tsho drug tu bzlas// rnal mas 'byor pas khrag la bstim// phyi rim khang rgyud gsum pa yi// shar gyi khang mig bzhi pa ru// dbab sngags 'bru bzhis drag 'phros pas//
509b4(sha): ya dang ma dang phrom dang shar// de bzhin lho ru bzhi 'phros pas// rag dang dud dang shar dang phrom// de bzhin nub tu bzhi 'phros pas// khrag dang la dang mu dang sha// de bzhin byang
509b5(sha): du bzhi 'phros pas// ma dang hril dang dza dang b+h+yo// 'phen pa'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba yis// chu rgod gang dmigs gnas su 'bebs// k+She nas go bzlog ya la dril// mtsham
509b6(sha): su gang dmigs yul gyi ming // mtha' ru bcu drug gab pa'i 'bru// rtag tu dril ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// mi 'gyur brtan pa'i las su bshad// yang logs mu
509b7(sha): khyud bzhi pa la// gzir ba drag po'i yig 'bru gnas// gzir ba kun gyi mtha' ru sbyar// mtshon cha 'khrul 'khor kha sbyar la// thod pa sbyor ba kun gzhoms bri//
510a1(sha): 'khor lo thod pa dbus su bzhag/ thun rdzas sngags bcas khrag la bstim// rdzas kyi 'khrul 'khor bar snang ba rdeg/ las kyi mtha' ru dbab
510a2(sha): pa brtsam// dus tshod nges par gtan gzung dab pa// ma phebs sbyor ba'i stobs zhan na// lcags phu ra ya man ta ka ra bsgom// sngags rnams bkod la rten la gzir//
510a3(sha): sbyor ba'i rgyal po gzir ba'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags kyi rgyal po 'di phye ste bton to// oM ya ma me ta kre sa
510a4(sha): ma ya dza hri ta ya ma phreM hri la dza dza/ ya ma me tA k+Sha ya ma phro/ ru tra pro/ duda? dkar khr-i/ shu ti khro/ ma me tak+Sha ya/ ya ma phreM/ me ta k+Sha ma yA/ ru tra pro/ ta k+Sha ma
510a5(sha): me ya/ dud dkar phreM/ k+She ta ma me ya/ shu ti phro/ k+She ta ma ma ya/ ya ma phreM shar/ rag dud shar phro khrag la mu sha ma hri la shar b+h+yo
510a6(sha): ya k+Sha ta me ma nA ga tsit+ta thu/ gzir sha ro shar hri la nAM ga du sta hri la phob/ sngags kyi sbyor ba lo tog 'joms// 'bras bu 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad/
510a7(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po li byin har gyi sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// ri sogs dben pa'i gnas
510b1(sha): mchog tu// maN+Dal khrag gi byi dor bya// mdos dang gtor ma lug la brtan// mda' dang za 'og rin chen 'bru// gsang bshos lug snying shing thog 'chang //
510b2(sha): ling ga thod pa ming rus thun// drar dang rin chen lug la gdags// bo da rbad gsad pa skabs dang sbyar// maN+Dal dbus su gtor ma bshos// mtha' ma bshos
510b3(sha): bu brgyad kyis bskor// ya ma'i skur bsgoms sngags spros dgug/ sgrol gying brgyad dang bcas par dmigs// bka' bsgo dam 'bogs las gnyer gtad//
510b4(sha): 'od 'dril gzugs ston phyag byed blta// gtor ma dang bcas bshos bu btang // gtor chung lug dang tsa ras brgyan// srod dang tho rangs rgyun du btang // ling
510b5(sha): ga thod pa dor du gzhug/ rbad sngags brgya brgya gsad sngags khri// thun brdeg bkug la thod par brab// rdzas kyi ga 'ur gsad thar bca'o// yul lca rbad cing
510b6(sha): bla kun mngag/ mtha' ru zor da la 'phangs pas 'joms// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags rnams phye ste ston to// oM rA
510b7(sha): srog la hing rag mo snying rtsa rba da/ srog la dza ti du na dun badz+ra sa tri shu la gri pa tsa pa la a shu me hU dza dza/ srog la me tri shu la pa ta rA tsa che tsa me rda ga sha dgra la b+h+yo//
511a1(sha): ra tsa srog la myogs/ rag mo snying rtsa ni la rba da/ a shu rtsa ri snying khrag rngubs// ru mun ro la yi yi rba dA/ tri li rba da tsit+tarba da/ yag sha
511a2(sha): gri thu ril rbad ro myags rtsa la thu ma ling tri ta ma rA ya rba da/ dril gtor sngags kyi sbyor bar gnyis// rno dpal kha sbyor srog gi spu gri lta bu'i sbyor ba 'dri// li bi na
511a3(sha): las la mngag par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bdud mo dam ma la sgrol gying bzhi dang srin mor bcas pa'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas par
511a4(sha): bshad do// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod la sogs dben gnas su// maN+Dal gru bzhi khrag gis byug/ chos kyi pho brang zlum po la// 'khor lo rtsibs
511a5(sha): bzhis rab tu mdzes// phyi nang skam rlon tho dra pas bskor// sgo bzhi gru chad rgyan dang ldan// rgyal chen sa yi pho brang du// mthun pa'i rdzas ni rab tu grags//
511a6(sha): s+phu ra ma ti rag ta snying // li li s+phu tra ma sa snying // ku ku rag ta su pan dag/ lcang lo mthing nag ldan par dgram// gling bu keng rus mtha' mar dgram// pho brag
511a7(sha): zhing bcu rgyal mtshan bzhi// de dag bkram la bsnyen pa bya// dbus su lha mo'i rten bzhag la// dug mtsho'i nang nas 'gying bag can// be drod zhon nas gtso
511b1(sha): la lta// rtsibs bzhi bur ba srin mo bzhis// sgo bzhir phyi yi sgrol gying bzhi// mda' bzhi dar gyis brgyan la gzug/ gshin rje'i rgyal po'i skur bsgoms la/
511b2(sha): snying pos bskul bas dbus nyid du// lha mo'i thugs kar sUr+ya la// ma dang bcas pa'i srog snying bsam// bar ma chad par srog nas drangs// srin mo bzhi dang /
511b3(sha): sgrol gying bzhi// pho brang 'khor du 'bum sde lhags// dngos grub rnam gsum 'bebs shing ston// des ni mtshan ma rnam gsum 'byung // rab dang 'bring dang
511b4(sha): mtha' mar 'byung // nag mo khro gnyer ral gcig ma// bzhin mi sdug pa spa thabs byed// dkyil 'khor dbus su me 'bar dang // rlung tshub mthong dang ser ba
511b5(sha): 'byung // des ni ci 'dod las rnams 'grub// mtshan ma de dag mthong nas kyang // dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi mchod pa bya// 'dod pa dag ni 'byung gyur na// drag
511b6(sha): po las kyi sbyor ba brtsam// dbus su gru gsum skrag mar rtsig/ gru chad bzhi dang ldan par bya// rtsa dang rgya sol de bzhin ldan// gru gsum sbag ma'i nang logs su/
511b7(sha): ma ra ni yi ling ga brnag/ 'ba' hu nyungs kar thod tshal shar// lhum shing thal pa nyungs nag lho// dug dang rje khrag lan tshwa byang // tsha tshag nam lding gung la bde
512a1(sha): de nas bdag nyid lus bsgyur te// ha la nag po mi bsrun ma// mig gsum gdong dang khrag gis bsku// tri shUl ban dmar phyag na bsnams//
512a2(sha): mche ba gtsigs shing srog snying 'dren// rdzas la bsngags la gzugs la bsdig/ srin mo bzhi dang sgrol ging bzhi// dmigs pa'i rtsa dang srog bcad nas// sha la ste//
512a3(sha): cing khrag la 'thung // drag tu bskul gyi na dgra la rba de// spogs na 'khor lo'i gnan pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gsang sngags 'a/
512a4(sha): bton to// badz+ra karma ra ga sha du tri hri hri dza dza/ dgra bo'i srog la ling ling thum thum b+h+yo/ ha la ha la ya ma yam khams su ma mugs/ snying pa/ kha ha ra ba/ ru tra/ tra ga
512a5(sha): thums/ ra tri kha/ dgra bo'i srog mA ra yarba da/ dgra bo'i srog la thun mugasarba da b+h+yo/ stam b+ha ya nan/ tra ga shi ga ha la yam/ dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rba da/ rag mo
512a6(sha): kha lo ba ri la dgra bo tsit+ta ga zar thun rbe da/ rag mo rag sha breng shag dgra po tsit+ta gzer thun rba da/ rag mo tra ga sha thums dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rba da/ rag mo rtsa thang
512a7(sha): srog la breng / dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rba da/ thibs kha ma sha ga dun dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ hri pa tsa shu la ya dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thu na rba da/ du tri badz+ra pa ril dgra
512b1(sha): bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ ra tri kha tsit+ta shag/ dgra bo tsit+ta gzer thun rbad/ rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo sngags dang ldan// steng la gzer sngags 'og la dril// kha sbyar bar du
512b2(sha): banA pa kas/ thod padung bcas gnan pa b+hU// lasuM rnams na gyis chog tu bshad/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrom kyang dmar po
512b3(sha): la bsngags pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// lha 'dre che la dben pa'i sar// khyi dmar ra dmar bya dmar snying // ska che nyangs kar nyungs na ga dang // zangs lcags rdo yi/
512b4(sha): phye ma thu na// dri ma drug gi ling ga dang // phyar pa bshos bu mda' dmar dar// bshams la sngags spro sgrol gying dgug/ dmar po ba sra khrag bsre rmog gon//
512b5(sha): tsit+ta zangs kyi lag na thogs// bka' gnod phyag byed dgra la rbad// 'brub khung bkug las thun gyis brab// bsad la thod pa ling ga gnan// de nas bcom ldan
512b6(sha): 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di phye ste bton to// o ging kA ra ag sha gr-i ba gying mo snying kha rag/ tro tra tro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ shu la shu la/ 'da' sha
512b7(sha): gri ba ma rA ya hUM dza/ tri ti tri ti/ dor dor sha sha rtsa la ya/ sang sang tri dun b+h+yo ya/ tri tri ling zad/ ra tri rbad/ tr-i du rbad/ yu tri yu trirbad/ dun tri shag tri dgra bo'i
513a1(sha): srog la yAM rbad/ zla gcig bdun dang dgu ru sbyar// srog bdag spu gri'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
513a2(sha): ma mo thams cad gzir zhing srog dbrog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dngos grub 'dod pa las brtsams dang // 'bras bu med dang cho 'phrul mang // snying mi dga' zhing
513a3(sha): 'khor du skyon byung na// las kyi mtha' 'am bar bar sbyor ba brtsam// de yang gsum de ma mo nyams pa na// rang bzhin pa can thabs drag po gzir dang gsum// dang po
513a4(sha): phyag rgya chen po ya ma'i sku// nag po 'jigs tshul dur khrod chas dang ldan// lcags kyu phur pa thogs pa'i sprul pa yis// ma mo bkug la snying kha mgrin pa ru/
513a5(sha): gzung zhing gzir la bsnyen pa stong dang bcas// gnyis pa ma mo gzugs byas la// snying khar snying po mtha' ma sngags kyis bskor// stong bzlas gshin rje'i phur pra
513a6(sha): gzir zhing bsdigs// ma mo'i mdangs phrogs bka' nyan 'dar zhing phyag/ bsgo ba las kyi gnyer gtad bcol// drag po las kyi mtha' ru gzir ba ni// dur khrod
513a7(sha): shin tu dben pa'i bde gnas su// dkyil 'khor gru gsum sum brtsegs me ri can// bar khyams zlum po gru chad bcas// ne le'i rgyan dang dam rdzas gtor ma bsham//
513b1(sha): mthing gur le brgan dmar po'i yol// gru gsum dbus su lcags phu ra ya mar bskyed// sku yi sngags bri rtse mor dza phaT nan// byang shar rtse mor ma mo dur khrod bri// snying
513b2(sha): kha ra ma dang rang gi bsnyen pas bskor// de yi mtha' mar sku yi bcu bdun pas// rtse mo gnyis la brnag pa'i gzugs dang thu na// sngon du bkug la gzugs dang
513b3(sha): ma la bstim// gnyis pas gzir zhing lcags phur ya mas bsdigs// gsum pas bkrag mdangs 'phro ba'i dbang du bsdu// bzhi pa sa gsol la dam tshig yan 'chu
513b4(sha): blud// gtor ma rag ta bdud rtsi btab cing mchod// srog dbrog dbyig bskyed thun brdeg ling ga gtub// zor dal mtha' ru sbyin sreg mnan pa bya// de nas bcom
513b5(sha): ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di bton to// ya ma e kram ka pa yaM du ru ye ra ga sha rag mo ma ma srog la dza dza/ gzir na na thu ma ri la/ ya ma rag sha du ru yaM bya tsha
513b6(sha): yi a pa ye ka pa ye bri da ye ma ma srog la dun du na dza gzir nan/ shi a kr-i ya ma ya ma ma srog la breng breng/ dza ma mo srog la ti ga na narba da/ ya ma sa ma ya trag rag
513b7(sha): sha kha raM dun na pu tsa kha'i/ ma ma rag mo srog la rmugs te kha raM sha ru thums tsit+ta breng breng shag shag dza/ ma mo las kyi mthar sdud 'di// sbyor ba mchog gi rgyal po ni//
514a1(sha): sbyor ba gzhan tshogs rgyas pa kun// rang rang bsgrub pa'i las gzhung btsan// las kyi mchod chen drag po 'di// nag po stobs kyi sbyor ba yin/
514a2(sha): ma mo mi ldog gsang ba yi// sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan par bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje'i 'khor gnod sbyin dregs pa can thams
514a3(sha): cad gzir zhing srog rang dbang med par dbrog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan pa yis// rtsub 'gyur bde ba'i rgyud gnas su// maN+Dal mda'
514a4(sha): gang khrag gis byug/ dbus su gru gsum sum brtsegs la// kha khyer dang po rtsang gis bskor// bar ma 'gying phur gsum dang ldan// tha ma zor thun rdzas kyis bskor/
514a5(sha): dpal gtor lho ru thun rdzas bya// sa mar mkhar sgongs phung shul sa// sa sbyin pa sres la gang byed gzugs// mdzub gang dbang po dod pa yi// snying khar gru gsum
514a6(sha): sor gcig 'bru// gro ga 'am ni shog bu la// gang bsgrub snying po 'bru re bri// mtha' ma bsnyen pa'i sngags kyis bskor// dril la snying kha'i dong du gzhug/
514a7(sha): steng du bshos bu mtho gang bzhag/ dam rdzas la sogs dkar chas bskor// gsung dang rag ta mchod pa bsham// bdag nyid gshin rje'i skur bsgoms la// lha yi
514b1(sha): bsnyen pa khri 'bum bya// gang bsgrub srog drang snying khar bstim// dbang du bsdus la phyag rgyas gnan// gzugs la phab la drag tu gzir// 'gying 'phur khro bo'i skur
514b2(sha): bsgoms la// dril zhing bsdigs la snying khar brdeg/ mngangs dang phral la 'dar bar bsam// sngags pa'i 'og nas bka' nod cing // ci bgyi las kyi dmigs ston smra//
514b3(sha): rang dbang med par srog phrogs la// khro bo'i thugs kar bkrag mdangs bsdu// de nas snying kha'i sngags bton la// bdud rtsi btigs la bsnyen pa gso// snying khar gnag
514b4(sha): pa'i ming yang gzhug/ gzugs de bslang la dgra la bstan// nyin mtshan rbad dang gsad pa'i las// zhag grangs dgu yis rdzogs par bya// de nas yang bcom ldan//
514b5(sha): 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las sngags 'di phye ste bton to// ya ma sa ma ya ru tsad na di thums tri sha pi ra srog la dun du na hUM dza dza/ ya ma ka li a pa ya a ne u na
