514b6(sha): thum ling a mu ka srog gzir trig na na ru thu/ o a kro d+hi ti sa ma ya ya ma ye a mu ka du gram sarba tsit+ta breng shag srog la dun du na thum ri la dza dza/ gang sgrub las kyi
514b7(sha): dmigs dang sbyar// dregs pa gzir ba'i sbyor bar bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ rno dpal kha sbyor gsang ba don gyi le'u ste brgya bcu bzhi pa'o// /
515a1(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mos zhus pa/ ye shes lha dang las byed kun// snying po srog bsdus dmod pa la// drag po'i sbyor bas gsad pa dang //
515a2(sha): gso ba'i las dang snying gzer gyis// klu gnyanas bdag ji ltar gzir// drag po mngon byung rgyas par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po dmod pa rgyas par
515a3(sha): bshad do// nyams dga' dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dpa' brtul sngags kyi dmod pa bor// shog bu gru bzhi mtho gang la// thig skor bzhi dang ldan par
515a4(sha): bskor// gru gsum bla sems ming dang rus// phyi rim 'khor lo rtsi ngas bcu gnyis// rtsa ba'i snying po mi rlung sbyin dang gu nas// de yi phyi rim mu khyud zlum
515a5(sha): po la// sgrub pa gzhan gyis rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// yang logs 'khrul mig phyugs 'khor bcu gnyis la// ral gri rdo rje rgya gram bsnol ma ru gnas/
515a6(sha): ral gri ge sod pa'i spu gri rgya gram gnon pas mdzes// de nyid ru sbal khra bo'i lto bar bri// kha sbyor bcas la dug dang khrag gis byug/ mtshon cha'i mtshams dang
515a7(sha): zla kham gru gsum la// brnag pa'i ming rus mA ra yarbad bri// sngon dmar dang bcas thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ pho thod nang du ma ra ya rbad bri// thod pa'i 'og
515b1(sha): mar brnag pa'i ming rus bri// rtsa nga bcas gru gsum kha khyer sum pa rtsegs gzhug/ tshe bdag bsgoms la ye shes 'khor lo bca'// zhag ga sum drag sngags
515b2(sha): dmod pa rngam tshig ldan par bzlas// bar bar drag tu bskul zhing parnag pa'i rgyud la rba da// de nas nyin gcig thod pa gzir zhing bca'// 'khor lo ru sbal phag mo'i
515b3(sha): thod par bca'// dar dang re bskud pas thod pa bsdam// klu gzir gdug pa'i gnyen la thod khar gdab// dmar thag chod nas nam phyed tshun chad du// tshes
515b4(sha): gcig bdag dang bcu ru dus su gnan// sa chu 'byung ba bzhi yi lto gshegs la// khru do brkos la thod par de bzhin gnan// steng du 'byung ba bzhi dang ri rab pho brang
515b5(sha): bskyed// sngags bzlas dpang gzugs phyag rgya'i brjid kyis mnan// zla brgyad lon nas ru tra brlag pa bzhin// nya stong dag na dmod pas drag tu gas//
515b6(sha): dradrug sngags demod pa rtsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di// zhi khro gshin rje phur ba ma mo dang // bdud dang mu stegs rgyal po the rang btsan// gnod sbyin srin po lha mi dud 'gro
515b7(sha): sri// klu gnyan sa bdag dkor spungs grul bum gyi// las rang srog gi snying po btsud du bsdus nas dril// shes rab rtsal dang brtul zhugs ldan pas spyad/
516a1(sha): blo chung rtog pas rang 'ching mnar med myong // lha srin kun gyis mthu dril drag por bshad// de nas yang bco ldan 'das kyis
516a2(sha): lo tog gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas par bshad do// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// dbus su ru sbal khong stong dbyibs dang zlum por bri// yan lag lnga dang
516a3(sha): mjug ma lto ba nas// gcod pa drag po'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis// byung bar bris la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la//
516a4(sha): srog bzhi gnad kyi 'bru dang chu dril dbab par dgod// sbal ba'i lto ba'i dbus su yul gyi ming dang ser pa phob ces bri// byang khog stod du gza' yi gzir sngags bri//
516a5(sha): mjug mar yul lha de bzhin gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yas su ma mo'i gzir sngags bri// lto ba g.yon du sa bdag klu gnyen gyi// rang gnad gzir la dbab
516a6(sha): pa'i drag sngags bri// mtshon cha dug dang khrag gi ngar blud la// sbal pa pho mo'i sbyor ba thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dgun zla gsum gyi nya stong nyin zhag phrugs re bzlas//
516a7(sha): dpyid zla gsum la zhag gsum chu dril bzlas// dbyar zla gsum la rten bzhi legs bcas la// thod pa dung phur khrag dang dug chu blugs// nya dang stong la nyin
516b1(sha): zhag lnga ru bzlas// tha chungs stong la rta ma rta na la gzhug/ rtse skad dbus dang kha 'dren tshul// zor thab du ba drag pos gzir// tshig gsum bru na gsum skyor
516b2(sha): ba'i rdzas// drag sngags lus la srog bzhis gzir// gza' dang ma mo lha ba tsan dang // sa ba dag klu gnyan gzir la dpapa// drag po thog ser 'khor lor bshad//
516b3(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba drag pos gsad pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// yang dag gsang ba'i sbyor ba ni// sems nyid
516b4(sha): dben pa'i bde gnas sam// dur khrod gnyan ra gdug pa ru// dur khrod dar ram zhing ras la// mu khyud pa dun dang ldan pas bskor// dbus su gru gsum drag
516b5(sha): po la// gzas pa pho mo'i ming rus bri// zla kham gsum la srung ba'i lha// mtshon cha 'khor lo rtsi ba sa bzhi la// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// phyi rim
516b6(sha): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// khro bo'i stobs kyi 'bra gcig dang // tshe srog sngad pa'i snying po gcig/ khong khrag 'bre la ba'i 'bra lA la// rlung gi snying po ldan par
516b7(sha): dgod// phyi rim mu khyud bzhi pa la// rigs bzhi sbrul gyis chun 'khor bya// gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// lnga pa thod pa'i 'phreng ba la// 'phen pa thun
517a1(sha): gyi spu gri dgod// drug pa sreg pa'i me ri la// gsod cing gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// de dag tshe srog 'chang ba yi// ru sbal lton gnas pa'o//
517a2(sha): srid gsum lto bar 'chang cing gsod// che srogs bdag po'i lto ba na// mi 'gyur gnas pa sngon du bca'// thod pa rgya gram me ri'i 'og/ sbyor ba gzhan tshogs snga ma
517a3(sha): bzhin// dregs pa stobs kyi sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas pa'i 'khor lo 'di rgyas par bshad do// bsam gtan
517a4(sha): sems kyi 'khor lo 'di// tshe bdag thugs kar gsod byed gnas// de thugs rdo rje 'chang chen po// dregs pa de thugs srid pa'i mdzod// ru sbal me zan rtsa bzhi
517a5(sha): la// sbubs na khong khrag 'brel pa'i 'bru// nang gi mdud pa 'dren pa'i stobs// phyi yi mdud pa thu gri mtshon// rtsa bran brgyad la bsrung ba'i mchog/ steng skor
517a6(sha): snying la 'og sgor du na// chos nyid khrag ces yon tan ra// ye shes ma ste rang rgyud rtsa// chos nyid rtsa mdun e gnas yin// de bzhin yon tan bka' 'bru//
517a7(sha): ye shes ya las rang rgyud ma// bzhi brgya rtsa mdud bzhi po la// gsad pa mchog gi spu gri gnas// phyi yi rtsa bran brgyad po la// gzir gshig byad grol zhen
517b1(sha): pa bzlog/ dug dbyung gsang lam drag por gzir// snying gzer dag dang spu gri brgyad// nang gi mtshams bzhi srog bzhi gzir// lo thog 'joms pa'i spu gri gnas// /
517b2(sha): gsang mdzod dbus na kun gyis srog/ snying po 'bru re bkrag mdangs 'chang // srog shing dmar nag ya yi stobs// me chu rlung gis 'gugs shing 'byed// 'du ba'i
517b3(sha): nad smin sreg cing gcod// rnal mas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni// tha chung bzhi yi mar ngo la// nyams dga' dur khrod dben gnas su// dur khrod rdzas sam shog
517b4(sha): bu la// sme ba dang ldan 'khrul 'khor bre// mu khyud bzhi bskor gru gsum dbus// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi srog las bsdus// rngam pa'i 'bru dang bdud kyi 'bru//
517b5(sha): 'bru bzhi bkod pa mtshon cha'i mkhar// de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad la// ming gi snying po 'bru gnyis dang // khong khrag 'brel ba'i 'bru drug dgod// phyi rim
517b6(sha): 'khrul mig bcu bzhi la// ming bcas spu gris gsod cing gnon// gzhan gzir gsang ba'i 'bru bcu bzhi// dgod pa gnas mthun lto sbyor dgod// phyi rim
517b7(sha): rigs bzhi sbrul gyis bskor// de bzhin ru sbal ljo ru bri// rgyu rten rdzas dang byur la bsku// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs snga ma bzhin// rnal mas gsang ba'i sbyor
518a1(sha): bar bshad// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lto dkrugs spogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// dpa' bo snrel gri'i
518a2(sha): gos dag la// rim pa bzhi dang ldan par bskor// dbus su gru gsum brnag pa'i gzugs// 'khrul mig bzhi la e dang du na// he dang ka taM 'bru bzhi dgod//
518a3(sha): yang logs 'khrul mig brgyad po la// khrag snying rtsa ma ya da ra// mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu gnyis la// gcod cing gnon pa de bzhin dgod// sbrul bzhi de bzhin
518a4(sha): ru sba la ltor// nyin mo g.yas nas drag sngags pazlog/ nub mo de bzhin g.yon nas pazlog/ par khyams gling bar ming rus gzugs// brnag pa kun 'joms
518a5(sha): drag po'i yas// lto dkrugs spobs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khrul 'khor de dag gi thod pa bca' ba 'di bshad do// /
518a6(sha): thabs dang shes rab thod pa la// steng du rdo rje rgya gram dang // ri ra ba ru sbal me ri bri// snying po 'bru bdun nan gyis bskor// thabs kyi thod pa stobs dpag med//
518a7(sha): 'og ma gru gsum bzhi dang sbrul// rigs bzhi'i tshul du ske brnol bsdam// kha khyer gdug pa chen pos bcings// ling ka ming rus khams dang ris// pha mems
518b1(sha): la sogs lo srungs bri// snying po ra yal gyis bskor// dug chu tsha ba myos pa'i khrag/ bskus la 'khrul 'khor bar du gzhug/ tshas chas sbyor ba snga ma bzhin//
518b2(sha): drag po las kyi gsad pa yis// sbyor ba kun la sbyor bar 'os// gnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba
518b3(sha): drag po'i sngags 'di bton to// e ka he du na ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa ya/ dgra bo'i srog la myogs mA rA rbad/ dgra bo'i srog snyam pa ya nan/ dgra bo'i
518b4(sha): srog la dun b+h+yo/ ma hA de ba sa nA ga phro phro shar shar hril drag tu phob/ ma mkha la rag sha rag mo shar gzir nan phob ya/ ra hu la pi bi shar shar nan gzir
518b5(sha): pho ba ya/ sa nA ga ra hur thums gzir shar shar pho ba ya/ de ba yun na gzir shar shar pho ba ya/ e dun he ka ma ya khrag snying tsa mA ra yA ra ya/ 'di dag bas
518b6(sha): pa drag po ste// nye bar gyur pa'i sbyor ba yin// drag po las stobs dgod kyi sngags// sbyor ba kun gyi rtsa bar bshad// de nas yang bcom
518b7(sha): ldan 'das kyis gso zhing bsrung ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad// gab pa sngon byung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// khyad par byas pa gshig cing sbyor ba gzhom pa dang // las
519a1(sha): dang nus pa'i stobs rnams gzir ba ni// drag po mtshon cha'i 'khrul 'khor bcas pas 'grub// mu khyud gsum pa ru sbal lto bar
519a2(sha): bca'// gru gsum dbus su gang dmigs ming rnams bri// phyi rim drag po 'khrul mig bcu pa la// e nas grangs ya ya yi bar du dgod// de yi phyi rim
519a3(sha): mtshon cha'i rtse mo bcu// gshig pa drag po spu gri'i 'bru bcu dgod// dug dang tsha ba khrag gis 'khrul 'khor bsku// ming dang snying po bris la thod par gzhug/
519a4(sha): mdun nas lnga ru sngags bzlas mtha' ru gnan// drag po byas pa gshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad// zug pa dbyung ba'i 'khrul 'khor ni// rgyu dang sbyor ba gci
519a5(sha): tu bya// mu khyud gsum skor dbus gru gsum// lcags mkhar drug gnyis gcig mtha'// rtsa ba'i drag sngags thams cad ldan// spu gri sbyor ba so sor
519a6(sha): bsde pa// phyi rim bcu gsum spu gri dgod// ngar bcas sbyor ba thod par bca'// thun brde ga kun 'byin thun dang bsdub// zug pa 'byin pa'i 'khor lor
519a7(sha): bshad// zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lo yang // mu khyud gsum pa pho brang drag po'i gnas// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig drug gnyis pa// rtsa ba'i sngags
519b1(sha): te yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsibs bcu dmod pa spu gri b+h+yo zhes bzlog/ ngar bcas sbyor la thod pa 'thun 'phang bzlog/ dregs pa stobs kyi 'khrul
519b2(sha): 'khor gyis// zhe na chags sbyor ba mngon zhugs gcod// rno nyur spu gri 'bru bcu yis// rgyud gcig shes pa gnyis su 'byed// khyu mchog dang bcas gzer
519b3(sha): thebs na// stobs can kun kyang myos shing gzir// zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lor bshad// dug mda' g.yung ba'i 'khor lo ni// thod pa'i rgyu la steng 'og
519b4(sha): dbye// mu khyud bzhi skor gsang mdzod gzugs// sbrul dang me ri dang ldan 'gro/ khrag dang dmigs pa'i ming gis dgang // gling bzhi steng mar de bzhin bzhi/
519b5(sha): pho brang zlum la 'bru drug ldan// bzhi dang brgyad la rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs bcu spu gri gnyis sbyar la// rdo lcags zangs phur thod khung dbab// khrag ba ton tho da
519b6(sha): pa zor phang gnan// dug mda' gsang ba'i 'khor lor bshad// gru gsum sum skrag 'dom tshad ldan// rtsang dang me ri gzugs bcas maM ra ming //
519b7(sha): rtsibs bcu zla kham thod par me rir bcas// kha sbyor 'khor lor mu khyud gsum gyi dbus// las kyi rdo rje bcu gnyis 'khrul mig phyi// mtshon cha bcu
520a1(sha): gnyis spu gri drag pos bskor// me rlung rgya gram bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// sngags sam gdon gyis bud du bcug pa la// drag po rnal
520a2(sha): ma btsan thabs gsum gyis dgrol// 'brub khung sa yi 'khor los drag po sreg cing myos// bar snang sngags kyi sa 'khor los gdug pa'i zhe na chags dgrol
520a3(sha): gsang ba thugs kyi 'khor los ma lus las rnams 'grub// drag po byad 'grol gsang ba'i 'khor lo bshad// mu khyud bzhi ldan 'khrul 'khor pho brang
520a4(sha): zlu ma// phyi rim rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsu ba'i sngags// bcu gnyis spu gri mtha' ma gsang lam 'gegs// rtsibs mtshan ming bri stobs can gsum
520a5(sha): dang sbyar// lam srang the ma 'og gsum du sbyor bas gnan// drag po gsang lam dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// drag po srung ba'i mtha' sdud du// thams
520a6(sha): cad gzir zhing sdud pa yi// drag po 'khrul gyi 'khor lo bca'// dur khrod rgyu dang 'khor lo'i rkyen// mar gyi ngo la bri dgod bya// rang yang drag po'i skyu ru gsal
520a7(sha): gzhan tshogs dbang bsdu de bzhin gsal// 'khrul 'khor bang mig nyi shu brgyad// gsang mdzod mun khang dbus dang lnga// mu khyur khor yug bzhi dang bcas//
520b1(sha): dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// phyi rim phyugs mkhar 'bar ba'i gzhi// yang logs ga nam lcugs khang khyud brgyad// mtha' ma lcug mkhar bcu drug bca'//
520b2(sha): srid gsum 'chang ba'i lto na ga nas// lcags mkhar rlung dri chun 'khor bcas// gsang mdzod mun khang me dang rlung // mtshon chas spu gri thog gzer can// sbyin dang
520b3(sha): las kyi myos shing sdud// de la gnas pa'i 'bru rnams ni// bzhi ni dbus kyi lcags mkhar la// 'dren pa stobs kyis 'bru bzhi gnas// phyi rim mtshon gling lcags
520b4(sha): mkhar brgyad// rgyas dang bsdus dang snying khrag 'byin// yig 'bru brgyad de bzhi dang sbyar// rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyi mgo/ lcags mkhar bcu drug dregs pa'i
520b5(sha): gnas// mtshon cha'i rgyal po spu gri dgod// thams cad sreg cing stobs kyis gnon// drag tu gzir dang gdug rtsub 'byin// srog dbugs sdud cing drag por gnon// /
520b6(sha): rang dam sro ga nas gang dmigs 'dren// nus pa 'brel zhing sbyor ba gcod// der bzhag stobs chen spu gri'i gnas// mtshon cha nus pa stobs da pa ga med//
520b7(sha): gsang mdzod lnga pa dmigs pa'i ming // bsdus la kha sbyar bzhi yis gdeg/ dben gnas gsum du gzir zhing bskur// 'khor lo stegs bzhi dril zhing sba//
521a1(sha): sbyor ba rnam na bcas la gzir// drag po thams cad gzir la bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las rtsa ba dang sku
521a2(sha): gri'i sngags 'di phye ste bton to// e ka ya ma ka dun dza ri rag sha ru thum/ sarba sha tru stam pa ya nan rtid rbad/ man tra gu h+ya sarba du ma na nA/ drid phyung ya ma ta ra tsa sa nA
521a3(sha): gA tri sarba du ya b+h+yo phyung / sarba sha trun aM na na ya trid b+h+yo b+h+yo/ man tra du ma ma hA ra ga du ra thu li rba da/ sarba du raM tri ya drid phyung srog la gzir// nan phyung / sarba du ra
521a4(sha): u na na gzer phyung sbur na na srog la myogs rbad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gnyan sa bdag gsum gzir zhing gzhom pa'i sbyor ba 'di rgyas
521a5(sha): par bshad do// lhod krugs gzir ba 'di lta ste// shog bu gru bzhi cha gnyis la// mu khyud gsum ldan gru gsum dbus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags//
521a6(sha): phyi rim bcu bdun lto dkrugs gzir// ru sbal lto sbyar dug myos khrag/ zhag bdun sngags bzlas rten la bstim// lha sgom rtsang bcas thod pa gsal// lto dkrugs
521a7(sha): gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa yis// mdze rim drag po'i yams da ra na// snying gzer bdun gyi 'khor lo bca'// sbyor ba sna
521b1(sha): tshogs rdzas kyis byug/ srid pa ru sbal lto bar bre// drag po'i gnas su snying po brdzu// mthing nag dar dang thod par bca'// bsgom bskul dong gzhug rtsang bcas
521b2(sha): sngags// ra mod pa thun dpa ba hom shing bsreg/ zor thu na mtha' ru ga nA na gzir bya// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'khrul 'khor mu khyud rim pa gsum// dbus su
521b3(sha): gru gsum snying po meng // 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim rtsa srubs drag po bdun// snying gzer bdun pa mtshan re gnas// ru sbal lto ru kha sbyor
521b4(sha): bca'// rang gi phyag rgya bris sku dgram// rang yang phyag rgya gsal bar sgom// gnas pa'i 'khor lo rtsa sbubs na// dngas ma bcu gnyis snying gzer bdun//
521b5(sha): phyi nang rtsa yi sbubs na gnas// snying gzer dbus na snying po gsum// de yis klu gnyan sa bdag 'joms// snying gzer bdun pa'i 'khor lo bshad// sbyor ba/
521b6(sha): bdug pa bsreg pa'i las// spogs pa med par 'joms pa 'di lta ste// dben gnas chen po'i ga nyan ra ru// gar gnod sa la maN+Dal bya// dbus su gru
521b7(sha): gsum mthing mag la// kha khyer gsum dang ldan pa brtsig ma// phyi nang chag gang dbu pa mdzub gang // rtsibs la kha khyer sor ba zhi bya// mu khyud nang du zla kham gsum
522a1(sha): phyi rim 'khor lo rtsib sa bcu gnyis// yang logs rtsibs chen nyi shu gnyis// bzhi pa mu khyud zlum po la// ba na d+ha skam po bcu gcig dgod//
522a2(sha): lnga pa me ri'i 'phreng bas bskor// de la dgod pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su gru gsum mthing nag la// sa chur sbyar ba'i sbal pa bzhag/ snying khar ho ma shing khru gang
522a3(sha): gzugs// kha khyer gsum dang zla kham la// klu gnyan sa bdag gzugs brnyan gzhag/ rtsibs la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dgod// phyi rim mtshon cha'i rtse mo la//
522a4(sha): sreg cing gcod pa'i spu gri dgod// mu khyud bzhi pa'i ban d+ha ru// sbal pa sbrul dang nya sogs sha// gnyis pa sha chen tsha ba gsum// bzhi pa dug gi re lu brgya//
522a5(sha): lnga pa bya phag tshil bu brun// drug par mi rta khyi yi tshol// ba dun pa ra mar khu dug chu brgyad// dgu par khrag sna chang sngo bcu// bcu gcig dug rdzas sku tsho ga sa bzhag
522a6(sha): dur khrod ras sam zhing ras la// gong bzhin bris la rdzas kyi sa bsku// bdun nam dgu ru steng nas dag pa// dmod pa bzlas shing bskor ba bya// drag tu bskul
522a7(sha): gyin me sbar la// gzugs la mtshon brdeg bstabs la sreg/ gdug pa'i sha sogs rim bzhin bsreg/ nyin mtshan thun drug sbyin sreg bya// gdug pa
522b1(sha): rjes gcod kyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bsrung ba thams cad bstan par bya ba'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po gdug pa bsrung ba la/
522b2(sha): mi ldog pa yi 'khor lo bca'// rgya shog gru bzhi cha gnyis la// dbus na mu khyud drug tu bskor// dbus su gru gsum thod pas bskor// gnyis par
522b3(sha): 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// thod pa'i 'phreng ba gong ma bzhin// gsum par 'khrul mig nyi shu la// de bzhin thod pa'i 'phreng ba bya// bzhi pa rtsibs
522b4(sha): chen sum cu gnyis// yang logs phyi rim tho 'phreng me// yi ge dgod pa 'di lta ste// dbus su gang dmigs gzugs dang ming // gnyis par rtsa ba'i drag/
522b5(sha): sngags dgod// gsum pa khyad par drag po yi// gzir 'joms srog dbrog nyos shing gnon// bzhi pa'i rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// shi phrad gu thul
522b6(sha): drag po'i 'bru// yang gsang mchog gi drag sngags dgod// ru sbal lto bar rdzogs par bca'// 'khrul 'khor rgyal po'i gzugs brnyan la// bdud
522b7(sha): rtsi'i 'o ma khrag gis byug/ kha sbyor tsho na skud thod sgong gzhug/ lto sbyor khri yis ngar blu da la// sngags pa'i steng 'og par snang bca'// de yis thams
523a1(sha): cad bsrung ba yin// shi phrad stobs kyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gdug
523a2(sha): pa gzir ba'i sngags 'di bton to// sa nA ga tsa tr-i du ma srog la breng breb tsa la dun dun skur nan kham shag zad/ sa nA ga tsit+ta ra myags rbad/ srog la muk+ka
523a3(sha): tIrbad// dug phyung khram shig rbad/ tsi tra mA ma dbugs lA thang gzer rban/ srog mthun zad b+h+yo/ sa nA ga dur/ sa nA ga~M un na gzer phung srog la dun
523a4(sha): tsit+ta dreng shag thun rbad e raM/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM i nun drid phyung sa nA ga tsit+ta bruM ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sbur nan rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzor
523a5(sha): mUr nan rbad/ sa nA gA snying gzer drid phyung rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer srog la phyogs rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer du raM rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer yaM bzlog rbad/
523a6(sha): sa nA ga snying gzer tsit+ta la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer sarba u nan gzer phyung rbad/ de nas yang sa'i lha mos bcom ldan 'das la las
523a7(sha): tshe bdag shan pa'i sbyor ba thams cad rgyas par mdzod ces zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par bshad do// de'i las kyi rim pa 'di lta ste/
523b1(sha): dur khrod dpan la shin tu gdug pa'i sar// dur khrod sa la maN+Dal khrag gis byug/ dbus su gru gsum rgya sol dug chu bsku// phyi rim zla kham myos pa'i/
523b2(sha): khrag gis bsku// sbrul dang thod pa ma ri ldan par bskor// mtha' ma khrag dang dug gis dmar nag dag tu bya// gdug pa'i shing la rtsang mar byas la bskor
523b3(sha): zhing lpags keng rus bras sku dung chen dgram// dpa' bo rta nag khyi nag shel nag snying // bam chen dbang po ban d+ha dung chen dgab// bdud rtsi dang bcas
523b4(sha): dbus su mthing nag ste// dpal bshos nag po steng ga sha khrag dang // me tog nag po la sogs byang dang lho ru dgra ma// dur khrod ras sam zhing ras gru
523b5(sha): bzhi la// dur khrod gnas nas bam gyi rgyu blangs la// sme ba lnga dang tsha bas thang pa bya// ni ras su yis brgya dang skya bcad la// dbus nas thig skor zlum po
523b6(sha): bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum zla kham bzhi dang ldan// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig lcags mkhar bzhi// mtshams bzhi gnam lcags rdo rje'i ka pa
523b7(sha): can// mtha' mthod rlon brgyad gnyis rabs bskor// de yi phyi rim lcags mkhar bcu drug la/ mtshams su rin chen ka ba de bzhin si ra'i mtshams//
524a1(sha): de yi phyi rim sbrul drug chun pos bskor// srid pa ru sbal khra bo'i lton gnas pa bri// de la dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus
524a2(sha): su brnag pa'i ming rus ling ga dgod// zla kham dgra yi pha mas dur du song ba'i ming dang rus// brnag pa bya ba'i snag tsha khrag gis bri// gcig la phas
524a3(sha): kyi srungs ma grub pa bri// zla kham gcig la bsrung ba'i lha rnams bri// phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi po la// drag po gsad pa'i spu gri ming bcas mtshan
524a4(sha): bzhir dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu drug la// drag po srog sdud las kyi rgyal po gnyis// khro bo rngam pa'i dgra dang bdud kyi snying po gnyis//
524a5(sha): gshi ni rje nyid dang ma mo'i snying po gnyis// chags byed ma dang srin po'i snying po gnyis// shan pa btsan dang dmu yi snying po

524b1(sha): sngags me dpal dug/ 'khrul 'khor me rlung spu gri thog chen 'dis// lus bshig rtsa bcad khrag dang bag chags skyams// nad bslang 'byung ba bsdus
524b2(sha): nas thim// shes pa rten dang dbang po yul las 'byed// rten gcig lus la shes pa kun bsdus bstim// kha sbyor 'khrul 'khor thod pa'i ga pur gzhug/
524b3(sha): nyin mtshan dril gtor ming bcas spu grir sbyar// thod pa'i gsob tu thun gyi spu gri dgrod// ri rgyal kha nas rba ba chen 'dril ba 'am// gser gyi dgu thog rgyab
524b4(sha): pa zor thun mthar// sbrul gyi gseb tu gnan pa'i spu gri dgod// gser gyi sa gzhi ri rab brtan ltar bzlas// gru gsum nang du brnag pa'i rten rnams gzhug
524b5(sha): mthing nag kha gcad ga sad pa'i sbyor ba brtsa ma// dur khrod gzhal ya sa rin chen gru bzhi la// sgo bzhi glang chen 'brug dang seng ge stag/ chu sri na ga na ma lcags khro chung
524b6(sha): thog chen gzer// lha klu tshangs po nyi zla rus pa khrag/ zhing rus thod pa bla ri 'phan 'phran bcas// sbrul dang thod pa me ri brtan ltar gnas// dbus na gnam lcags
524b7(sha): gru gsum spu gri'i gnas// phyi rim dug mtsho thod mkhar gling bzhi'i dbyibs// yang logs 'o ba chen bcu gnyis mtshon cha'i mkhar// mtha'am lkugs mkhar bcu drug
525a1(sha): pho nya'i gnas// dbus na klu 'bum gnyan khris bdag stong // lto 'phye bzhi greng ma he phyogs skyong brgyad// nyi zla brtsegs pa gtso bo'i
525a2(sha): gdan du rdzogs// mdun gyi zla kham sa bdag klu gnyan dang // dregs pa pho mos ma he nyi zla'i gdan// thod khar dregs pa pho mo ma he nyi zla'i brtsegs// 'obs dang
525a3(sha): lcags mkhar zhing bsnol ma he nyi zla'i gdan// sgo bzhir zheng bsnol stag dang seng ge dom// dbus su gtso bo zil gnon stobs kyi lha// dbu gsum phyag drug mthig
525a4(sha): nag zhabs bzhir bgrad// glang chen zhing stag thod sbrul dur khrod brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul rigs khrag 'thung bya khyung stag/ seng ge gdug pa khro chung ba dud mo g.yon/
525a5(sha): gsod byed dregs pa ru sbal srog dbugs 'chang // zla kha ma mdun na tshe ba dag mgo dgu pa// sku mdog sngo nag gtum khro rngam la brjid// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad
525a6(sha): zhabs brgyad brkyang bskum tshul// dbu gsum steng rnga ma mkha' lding bya yi dbu// khyung chen rma bya dur bya klu gnyan glo snying za// dbu gsum par pa g.yas dkar g.yon
525a7(sha): dmar mthing // gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro rta ro sprul// spyan dgu khrag 'dzag dbu skra ag tsom se ra// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril rngam pa'i dbu//
525b1(sha): zhal gsum 'o ga ma sha za dud 'gro'i dbu// stag dang seng ge ma he dbus na 'gying // snying dang rgyu ma zhing chung za yin rnga ma// spyan rtsa bsgrigs nas mche ba gtsigs shing
525b2(sha): za// dbu dang snyan cha mgur dang lha tshigs la// rigs bzhi sbrul dang kam rlon thod pas brgyan// phyag dgu g.yas na mtshon cha 'bar ba yi// 'khor lo ral gri rdo rje kha Ta ma dung /
525b3(sha): mda' chen zhing dbyug rgya gram phur bu bsnams// g.yon pa be con gtun shing rgyu zhags sbrul// thod pa sdigs mdzub dgra sta gzhu// sku stod glang chen dur khrod chas// sku smad//
525b4(sha): stag lpags rag ta'i chu rgyun 'bab// g.yon na bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// zhing lpags thod pa re lde sbrul gyis brgyan//
525b5(sha): tri shul ba na d+ha yab la 'khyud cing stobs// thugs kar gsod byed 'khor lo tsi tu bsnams/ dbu la bya khyung gnam lcags nyi zla'i spyan// bya dang gcan gza na sha za 'ug
525b6(sha): pa'i tshegs// thod mkhar srog gshed phyi rim phyogs skyong bdun// lcags mkhar nang na drug khri drug stong 'khor// sgo bzhir tshe srog bla la rku// dbugs len ma dang mdangs
525b7(sha): 'phrog bzhi yis brgyan// gong nas 'dus shing rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// nyi shu bdun nas ga nam stong du// zhag bzhi'i bar du gsang sngags bzlas// nyin bzhi
526a1(sha): gtor la mtshan bzhi dril// ba ra bar bskul zhing yul lha rbad// gshin rje bod kyi na skyugs glu blang // pho thod mo thod rgya gram dang // ru sbal gru
526a2(sha): gsum me ri bri// steng 'og drag sngags ming rus sprul// rdzas sogs sbyor ba klu dang sbyar// bsnal ma gsad pa'i sbyor bar bshad// las kyi tshe bdag
526a3(sha): mgo dgu yi// mchog gi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dur khrod ra sa sa ma shog pu la// sme ba lnga yi thang pa bya// ru sbal lto bar thig skor ba zhi// dbus dang gru gsum lcags mkhar
526a4(sha): bcas// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu drug bca'// phyi rim sprul bzhis ra bas bskor// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus su nri dang ming rus rba da// gnyis pa'i 'khrul
526a5(sha): mig bcu drug la// snying po srog bsdus las bsdus gnyis// bdud dang khro bo'i chags byed gsum// srin po dregs pa ma mo gshin// btsan dang mkha' lding srog bdag dmu//
526a6(sha): sgrol byed rgyal po ging gi 'bru// 'khrul mig re la gnas par dgod// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon dang thun zor gyi// drag po spu gri gsum du gnas//
526a7(sha): ru sbal yan lag lto ba la// ling ga sgrub bya bcu gsum gnas// 'khor lo mtshon cha med dpal sngags// gcod cing gnon pa'i 'khor lo yin// sbyor ba gzhan tshogs
526b1(sha): snga ma bzhin// lto dkrugs gab pa'i 'khor lo bshad// lo thog gzhom pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la// thig gsum bskor
526b2(sha): la dbus su yul gyi ming // zla kham sbyor ba gzhom pa'i 'bru// lcags mkhar bcu drug es drangs rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs tshan nyi shu chu drul zor dang gzir// ru sbal lto
526b3(sha): ba ra tsha ba dug chu khrag/ kha sbyar thod pa zhab sa ma thun gyis bskul// dam rdzas stegs bu dang dang g.yang gzhi dag pa// bsgom bskul sngags la thod pa rta mar gzhug/
526b4(sha): khrag la nyungs kar zor la khri bzhis bstim// rten gsum dmigs la phur pas klu la gzir// sbyor ba sngags kyis spu gri ba ni ru bsdeb// dregs pa kun gyi mthu dril dbab
526b5(sha): par bshad// de nas las kyi tshe bdag gis// bsrung zhing gzir ba 'di lta ste// thams cad dril ba'i sbyor ba ni// 'khrul 'khor rim pa gsum du
526b6(sha): bskor// srid pa ru sbal lto ba ra bri// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// gang gnod dmigs pa'i yul rnams bri// phyi rim 'khrul mge bcu gnyis la// rtsu
526b7(sha): ba'i sngags te 'bru bcu gnyis// 'bru bzhi 'phos la shis dgod// yang logs rtsibs chen bcu bzhi la// spu gri drag po 'bru rnams dgong // las ni sna tshogs/
527a1(sha): rtsa ba gcig/ zla kham lo thog bsrung ba'i 'bru// bcu bzhi bkod la skabs dang sbyor// khrag dang tsha ba dug chu ba sku// thod par bcug
527a2(sha): la sbyor ba brtsam// zhag bdun sngags bzlas drag tu bskul// bsrung ba thams cad dril ba yi// sbyor ba rgyal po mchog tu bshad// de nus bcom ldan 'das
527a3(sha): kyiso sku gsung thugs las las sngags sbyor ba 'di phye ste ba to na to// e ka he du na ya ma ra ga sha mun tri shaM ra ma kring shu snying dgra bo'i srog la ni sha traM mA ra ye rba da
527a4(sha): srog stam pA ya nan/ srog la thun myogs b+h+yo/ e ka dun ha ra ga sha ya raM dza shu kring snying mun tri tsa/ dgra bo'i srog la myogs mA ra ya rba da/ phreM pro shar sha ra hri la b+h+yo/
527a5(sha): nA ga ma'i snying gzir phreM phro sha ra shar phob/ e ka he du na ya ma rag sha dza/ mu tri shaM raM kring shu snying / sarba du raM u nan gzer phyung spur nan/ srog la myogasarba da
527a6(sha): srir ba sha trAM snyam pa ya nA sha ya hUM phaT/ de dag sbyor ba'i rgyal po ste// thugs dam bsnyen pa rgyu la ba rnag/ rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ dmod pa ngan sdug
527a7(sha): kyi le'u ste brgya bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang sa'i lha mo sa/ bcom ldan 'das la/ yang dag gsang ba'i gsang rgyud 'dir// gas
527b1(sha): ba mchog dang gzir ba dang // klu nad dkar ru bcag pa dang // sbod gtong dam dkrugs gshig pa dang // rang gshed rang la bskor ba yi// sbyor ba rgyas par bshad
527b2(sha): du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas drag po sngon phyung gi/ rtsa ba'i sbyor ba mchog gi las// yang gsang 'khrul gyi snying po bcud// gcig tu dril ba rgod kyi
527b3(sha): sngags// gsang chen gsad pa'i sbyor ba dril// de yi rim pa 'di lta ste// dur khrod pa de ba'i gnas btsal la// dpa' brtul sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'//
527b4(sha): dur khrod ras sam shog bu la// cho gnyis byas la bskor ba ni// thig sbyor rim pa bdun dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum drag po'i gnas// phyi ru 'phrul mig
527b5(sha): bzhi dang ldan// yang log 'khrul mig lcags mkhar brgyad// bzhi par mtshon cha rtsibs bcu gnyis// lnga par thod pa'i 'phreng ba sa brgyan// drug pa gdug pa
527b6(sha): sbrul gyis brgyan// bdun pa me ri raM dang ldan// gcod byed tsit+ta'i 'khrul 'khor yin// de la dgod cing gnas pa ni// dbus su brnag pa'i ming yang bri// zla kham
527b7(sha): gsum la bsrung ba'i lha// 'khrul mig bzhi la dgod pa ni// 'dren pa stobs kyi 'bru bzhi dgod// de bzhin 'khrul mig brgyad po la// khong khrag 'brel pa'i 'bru lnga
528a1(sha): dang // srog sdud 'byed pa'i 'bru gsum dgod// mtshon cha'i rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// gcod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// thod
528a2(sha): pa'i gseb tu pho ga don bri// sbrul gyi ga seb tu mo gdon dang // ga dug pa'i sa bdag klu gnyan bri// ru sbal khra bo'i lto bar bri// dug chu khrag dang tsha ba bsku//
528a3(sha): kha sbyor sngon dmar dA ra gyis glil// thod par bcug la gru gsumu bzhag/ gsal gsum bsgoms lA zhag gsum bu zlas// sbyor ba thon nA sa mnan sngags
528a4(sha): bzlos/ 'khor lo sbal pa'i lto bar gzhug/ de yang phag mo'i lto bar bca'// thod pa ru sbal skye gram bri// 'khrul mige bcu lo chos kyis gril// gdug pa'i
528a5(sha): ku la gzir la gtad// khru do brko sa la thod pa gzhug/ sa bcag dbang chen pho brang ba skyed// dbang gzugs 'o dod cho nges gad ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
528a6(sha): sku gsung thugs las drag po'i sngags 'di bton to// e ka ya ma snying khrag ra ma tsa thum ril shag/ dgra bo'i myogs mA ra yA rba da/ drag po sbyor ba med pa la mtshon//
528a7(sha): yang gsang mchog gi 'khor lor bshad// drag po mngon phyung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// yang gsang mchog gi 'khrul 'khor 'di bshad do// sngags
528b1(sha): dang 'khor lo man ngag bsdebs pa'i las// gcig tu dril te bca' ba 'di lta ste// nyams dga' dur khrod bde ba'i sa phyogs su// dur khrod ras sam shog bu gru bzhi la//
528b2(sha): sme ba lnga dang thal ba mdog bton la// dbus nas drangs nas thig skor lnga ru bskor// phyogs bzhi tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// dbus su gru gsum 'khrul mig
528b3(sha): bzhi dang ni// mtshams bzhir drag po'i gsang mdzod bzhi dang ldan// de'i phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi gnyis la// lcags mkhar bar khyams gshed kyi khang pa yin// de yi
528b4(sha): phyi rim mu khyud dbang sdud drag po la// stobs dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba 'joms pa'i gnas// yang logs mu khyud bzhi po lum po thun mong rten pa la// khyams khang chen po sgrung
528b5(sha): pa'i snying po rdzogs// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig drag po bcu gnyis pa// mtshon cha'i rgyal po me rlung sbyin thang gnas// myos pa stobs 'brel rno dpal kha sbyor yin//
528b6(sha): de dag dgod cing gnas pa'i rim pa ni// dbus dang mtshams kyi gsang mdzod gru gsum lngar// bla sems 'chags pa'i snying po ming rus bri// lcags mkhar bzhi dang phyi
528b7(sha): rim brgyad po la// rtsa ba'i drag sngags me rlung drag sngags dgod// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig nyi shu bzhir// thams cad gzir dang gshig pa'i spu gri dgod// de yi rim pa
529a1(sha): sum cu rtsa gnyis la// gang bsgrub bsnyen pa rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// phyi nang mgo bstan skabs dang sbyar la dgod// mtha' me'i 'khrul
529a2(sha): mig nyi shu la// dgug dang thun brdegs gsad dang gnon pa yi// drag po sbyar ba'i spu gri dgod// drag sngags me dpal 'khor lo mtshan// 'khor lo mtshon chen mo
529a3(sha): dpal gyis// zhing bcu ma lus gtan nas sreg/ 'khrul mig dgu bcu las mthar gsum// drag po khyams khang mchog gi gnas// de yis thams cad 'joms shing
529a4(sha): 'pho// 'khor lo'i lto bsdeb me dang rlung // spu gri mtshan chen gcod dang 'bigs// bsrung dang skyob pa kun byed pa'o// ngar stobs ldan pa'i 'khor lo la// dug
529a5(sha): dang khrag bsku kha sbyor bya// gang sgrub las sngags drag po gnas// lto bsde ba drag pa'i 'khor lo bshad// stobs chen lha rnams tsit+te la// snying po 'bru re sgraru/
529a6(sha): ga nas// de la rtsa ba'i drag sngags dang // gang sgrub dbang can pho mo yi// sgrub sngags drag po'i phyi rol tu// 'od kyi tshul du gsal bar bsgom// bsnyen pa nang du/
529a7(sha): mgo bstan dang // drag po gsang sngags skabs dang sbyar// man ngag thugs kyi bsdebs su bshad// zhal gyi dmod pa bzlas pa'i tshul// e nas drangs la spu kri
529b1(sha): thung // gang bsgrub bsnyen pa sbyar la dgug/ spyan drangs la sogs gzhung dang sgyur// rbad pastong skyong gong bzhin pasdeb// de bzhin gsad dang gnan pa la// rka/
529b2(sha): dang sbyar bas las kun byed// 'dod pa'i ming bcas dbus su bsdeb// rno dpal spu gri kha sbyor yin// dmod pa sngags kyi sdebs su bshad// / de nas
529b3(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsad pa thams kyi sbyor ba rtsa ba gcig tu dril pa 'di bshad do// drag po nye ba'i sbyor ba 'di// dur khrod gnyan ra'i dben gnas su// 'brel
529b4(sha): pa gsum dang ldan pa yi// grogs dang dpa'i btul gnod pa bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// gsang ba'i gsang rgyud 'phrul gyi bcud// yang gsang mtshon cha gsed/
529b5(sha): pa'i mchog/ nye bar gcig tu dril bsdebs pa'i// las kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po ni// zhing ras la sogs rgyu bzhi la// thig skor gsum ldan de bzhin bzhir//
529b6(sha): bar khyams sprul bcas rdzogs byas la// dbus la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi dang // de bzhin phyogs mtshams brgyad du brtags// srid pa'i khyams khang lto ba na// rgya
529b7(sha): gra ma rlung dri sreg mar gnas// dang por tshangs pa'i thig gnyis dang // zur bzhi de bzhin cha snyams la// dbus du gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim phyogs bzhir
530a1(sha): rdo rje yi// rwa bzhi rgya gram nag po la// dbus kyi snying po phyogs bzhi ru// 'khrul mig mkhar nag rnam gsum gnas// rgya gram mtshams
530a2(sha): bzhi khrag gi mtsho// yang logs mu khyud zlum po chu// skom zhing g.yeng bas sdud cing smin// lte sbyor gab pa'i 'khor lo yin// yang logs dbus mtshams gling
530a3(sha): brgyad du// rlung ri rdo rje rtse mo re// kha dog 'phrin las ljang khu la// snying po 'phrul mig gnyis gnyis ldan// las rnams rdzogs pa spu gri'i gnas// rlung
530a4(sha): gshed kyi 'khor lo yin// lto bsdebs ma yin mu khyud spang // zur brgyad mu tig chun 'khor bcas// gsod byed drag po rngam pa yi// gab pa'i thugs kyi
530a5(sha): 'khor lo yin// byang khram snying po spu gri'i sngags// 'phrul gyi rtsa ba dril ba ni// gru gsum ming rus zla kham lta// bsrung ba kun ldan rdzogs par bri//
530a6(sha): rgyu grum bzhi yi 'khrul mig la// rtsa ba'i snying po drug sngags dgod// khor yug rbad dang gsad pa'i sngags// gang bsgrub lo sbyar gnas mthun dgod// phye ma
530a7(sha): rdo rje rtse brgyad la// ming gi 'bru gsum dang ber bri// gsod cing gnon dang 'phen pa yi// glu gris gsum rdzogs por dgod// mtsho gling bar
530b1(sha): rA dbus la// sdang dang gnod pa de bzhin bri// ming gi 'bru gnyis srog dang sbyar// gang 'dod mtshams su de bzhin sbyar// 'bur nag gdug pa'i ha la'i mtshon/
530b2(sha): b+hi li kho nga 'dus khong dreg can// ya ma ka li'i karma tsa// kyo pa ka pa gur pa sha// yaM raM e dbus tsa ma ri// ma ra ya yi sbyor ba'i mchog/ lto sbyor ba cas la
530b3(sha): thod par gzhug/ sbyin sreg brnag pa'i 'og tu gzhug/ zhag gsum sngags bskul sbyor ba dril// ru sbal phag mos 'khrul 'khor bca'// thod pa rgya gram ru
530b4(sha): sbal ltor// sbyor ba kun ldan glu la gtad// tshul gsum sbyor ba gong ma bzhin// sngags kyi rtsa ba dril la brdeg/ zhag gsum nyin gcig nyin zhag gnyis//
530b5(sha): gsad dang gnan pa zor gyi dus// rig pa bde ba yang ma'i klong // 'khrul 'khor dam pa 'di gzung bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las
530b6(sha): rtswa ba dang spa gri'i sngags 'di bton to// e du na he ka snying khrag ya ma tsa ma ra ya/ dgra bo'i srog ma ra ya myogs rba da/ sbyor ba gnyis po snga ma bzhin// yang
530b7(sha): gsang 'phrul gyi bcud bsdus pa// gsad pa la sogs sbyor ba'i mchog/ 'phrin las thugs ka'i 'khor lor bshad// // de nas yang
531a1(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khog gshig gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// byin can bde ba'i gsang gnas su// gsang ba mchog gi sbyor
531a2(sha): pa brtsam// b+hi la'i khong 'dus khong dreg can// ha la nag po tsam ri// be ta ta yis 'jig rten nas// ya ma rag sha'i bde klong du// sgyu ma'i phung po gnas
531a3(sha): sbyangs la// rin po che yi rgyal sa ru// thugs kyi bde ba gnyis med 'phang // de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// 'dul khrims nyams pa'i gos blangs la// rdo lcugs

531a5(sha): mar ngo la// nyi shu drug nas 'khrul 'khor bca'// dbus nas thig bskor bzhi ru bskor// dbus kyi gru gsum brda gnas su// sku yi gzugs brnyan ming
531a6(sha): bris la// zla kham gsum la bsrung ba'i lha// phyi rim bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs khor yug rbod rbad gas// bri dang phyi nang gong ma bzhin//
531a7(sha): mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// srid pa ru sbal lto na gnas// dug dang khrag gis ngar bla da la// rdza'am yul srungs
531b1(sha): kyi thod par gzhug/ rtsang bcas dong du mthing nag dag pa// dmigs med ngang las ye shes kyi// rol pa phyag rgya chen por 'phro// drag tu bskul zhing shugs kyis/
531b2(sha): drang // kha khyab rdo rje'i sbyor ba sa bsde ba// dmod pa'i lus la spu gri bsdub// ming rus ming sbyar khams la bcad// rgya mdud brtsegs pa'i lho ru ma nan// yang na
531b3(sha): dkyil 'khor chen po yi// 'og tu bka' yi byin bsdus la// rin po che yi lto ru gnan// bshags dang dge ba rgyun mi gcad// 'byung ba lnga yi mdangs pa sdus
531b4(sha): la/ rin po che yi rgyal sar brtan// rgyu yi snyigs ma srog bsdus la// dbus kyi 'bu ba gnas gzugs la bstim// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha
531b5(sha): dbyings kyi khongs su gzhug/ dmigs pa dag pa'i tshad ma gdon// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs la sa sngags kyi spu gri 'di bton to// gu ru ni
531b6(sha): srog la myogs thu ma ril ma ra ya rba da/ snyam pa yA na na/ bgrod pa med pa'i phyag rgyar brtan/ seng ge khog gshig gi 'khor lor bshad/
531b7(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rma 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// yid mthun bde ba'i gnas rnams su// dur khrod gnas nas dpa' ba yi//

532b1(sha): 'od kyi gong bus dme 'khrug byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las drug po'i spu gri 'di bton to// nI srog la dun rmugs
532b2(sha): sa ma sa myogs ma rA ya rbad/ ni srog gzir snum pa ya nan/ sngags kyi 'od dang 'bar ba'i dpal// gdug pas rang gshed rang la 'bribs//
532b3(sha): mtshon cha ngar blud me la bdug/ khri bzhi'i sbyor ba dril la phang // thon nas rtsang bcas thod pa gnan// zil gnon phyag rgyas gzir cing
532b4(sha): dbab// 'khor lo gnan la snga ma bzhin// rtsa ba gcig las yan lag 'byung // dam tshig mna' chu gzer gsum mtha'// drag po'i
532b5(sha): sbyor ba yang yang brtsam// dam thab drag po'i 'khor lo bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stag mo kha 'thab kyi sbyor
532b6(sha): ba 'dri bshad do// shog bu gru bzhi mdzub gang la// rme ba lnga yi thung ba bya// ni ra su yi thal ba yis// mtha' ma rgya dang skya bcad la// thig skor zlum
532b7(sha): po bzhi ru bskor// dbus su gru gsum ming dang rus// zla kham bsrung ba'i lha dang gdon// 'khrul mig bcu gnyi rtsa ba'i sngag/ mu khyud stong pa bod zad bsad//
533a1(sha): rtsibs chen bcu bzhi spu kri'i gnas// myos pa'i stobs dang dpral ba yi// drag po stobs kyi 'khrul 'khor yin// nag po'i ke'u mun pa'i
533a2(sha): gling // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las drag po'i spu mi 'di bton to// dgra bo mA ra ya rbad/ mtshon cha'i rgyal po 'khor lo can// gcod pas
533a3(sha): skam pa spu gri'i tshul// gzir ba stobs ldan pasam dpag dka'// mA lus kun 'jom sbyor ba'i mchog/ khwa 'thab drag po'i 'khor lor bshad/
533a4(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge mche sbyor gyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rgya shog cha gnyis gru bzhi la// smre ba lnga dang tsha ba bsku// mu khyud
