533a6(sha): sgrub pa'i sngags// bod rbad gsad pa nyis stong brgyu// mu za'i khram thod srin mo'i sgom// sbyor ba sngar bzhin gnan pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku
533a7(sha): gsung thugs las seng ge mche sbyor gyi spu gri 'di bton to// dgra bo'i srog la myogs mA ra ya rbad/ lto gshag dbang chen po brang bsam// seng ge mche sbyor gyi 'khor
533b1(sha): lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan gyi pho nya rkang mgyogs slar bzlog pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gnyan ra gdug pa'i bde gnas
533b2(sha): su// rigs min gzhan gyis sbyor ba 'joms// gzir bzlog drag pos gzhan dbang bskur// mu stegs can gyi lus srog da bral// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// dred mo ra la
533b3(sha): pa bsnyigs pa yis// zhabs mas 'khor lo'i rgyu byas la// sa dkar cung zi rus pa yis// kha dog phyung la 'khor lo bri// lnga ru bskor la dbus gru gsum// brnag pa'i
533b4(sha): gzugs bris spyi tshugs gzhag/ zla kha ma ming rus de ba bri// mu khyud sbrul gyi ra ba sa bskor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// srog
533b5(sha): la dug rmugs b+h+yo/ srog la kham shag b+h+yo/ srog la breng shag b+h+yo/ srog la yam shag b+h+yo/ rang sngags ming bcas bskor la bri// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug la//
533b6(sha): gsod cing gnon pa'i spu gri dgod// sbyor ba thams cad snga ma bzhin// dag dig gla no gle na thod pa ru// sbyor ba dril la bdag dbang bsdu// sngags pa'i 'og tu gnan pa
533b7(sha): bya/ pho nya bzlog pa'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag po nang 'thab kyi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// rang sems dben pa'i gnas
534a1(sha): mchog tu// dam tshig srog gi mtshams bcad la// zhing ras pags shun khru gang la// sbyor ba'i rgyal po gsum sbyar la// mdog dang ldan par rgyu
534a2(sha): bcad la// zhing gi srad pus thig gdab brtsam// thig bskor lnga ldan dbus drag po// phyi rim phyogs bzhir thig rkang gsum// thig mdud rgya gram 'khrul mig bzhi// phyogs
534a3(sha): bzhi 'khrul mig bcu drug gcod// mtshams bzhir gsang mdzod drag po'i gnas// yang logs nyi shu rtsa ba'i mkhar// phyi rim 'khrul mig bzhi bcu gnyis// lcags mkhar
534a4(sha): 'khral mig brgya bcu drug/ gsang mdzod mtshams bzhir dbus dang lnga// srid pa'i ru sbal lho na ga nas// dbus dang mtshams bzhir ba sgrub bya'i ming // dri ma dang ldan
534a5(sha): tshe srog sdud// phyogs bzhir 'khrul mig bcu drug la// thun dang gsor pa'i spu gri gnas// yang logs 'khrul mig bcu drug la// gab po'i 'bru bcu gcod dang bcas//
534a6(sha): de bzhin brgyan gyi bcu gsum la// gcod cing gnan pa'i spu gri ldan// lnga pa mtha' yi bcu bzhi la// thun pazhi sngags kyi sbyor ba gnas// gang byed skabs dang sbyar la
534a7(sha): bzlas// dug chu myos pa bskus la bdug/ kha sbyar rgyus chen sngo dmar da ma// sngags pa ra tsa'i thod pa ru// ru sbal rgya gram ming rus sngags// rtsang bcas lha sgom dgod pa
534b1(sha): bzlas// thon nas zil gnon ye shes bsam// 'khor lo sbal ba phag mor gzhug/ sbyor ba dril la thig le la// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram gyi// tshul dang sbyar la gnan pa bya//
534b2(sha): drag sngags nang 'thab kyi 'khor lor bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gshed rang la dbab pa'i sbyor ba de dag gcig tu dril ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'di bsha
534b3(sha): do// yang dag 'khor lo dam pa 'di// shog bu rgyu la sme ba lngas// thang pa byas la kha dog dbyung // tshangs pa'i thig gnyis rgya gram gdab// ru thig gnyis te re mig skyong
534b4(sha): thig skor mu khyud lnga dang ldan// dbus su gru gsum le tshe brgyad// phyogs bzhir 'khrul mig gsum gsum drang // mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhi// gsum par
534b5(sha): las kyi rdo rje la// rgya gram sbyor ba bzhi dang ldan// bzhi pa mtshon cha bdun gnyis rtsibs// lnga pa rigs bzhi ra bas bskor// 'khor lo'i dam pa 'di gzung bya// de la
534b6(sha): dgod pa'i 'bru rnams ni// dbus su gu ru'i phyag rgya sku// brjid pa'i tshul gyis skyis krung bzhag/ gzhan la gcer bu spyi tshugs ridi// zla kham ming nus gsang mdzod
534b7(sha): bzhi/ bsgrub bya 'chang ba rdzu gri'i mkhar// phyogs bzhi'i 'khrul mig bcu gnyis pa// 'og phyogs me rlung nam mkha'i 'bru// mjug mar bya khyung bdud mo dregs/
535a1(sha): g.yas su bdud dang gshin rje khyung // las kyi rgyal po ma mo srin// 'bru gsum sbyor ba bcu gnyis 'bru// g.yas g.yon rnam ma de bzhin bzlog/
535a2(sha): rgya gram bzhi yi snying po la// 'og phyogs srog phrog thams cad 'gugs// mjug mar lha dang lus sreg 'byed// g.yas su gzan la dbab pa'i 'bru// g.yon gyi ral
535a3(sha): gzir ba'i sngags// bod rbad ga sad dang bsrung ba'i sngags// sgrub dang thun mong go rims sbyar// rtsibs la thams cad gsad pa yi// yang gsang spu gri bcu gnyis
535a4(sha): mchog/ thams cad sbrul gyis bskor ba'i tshul// sbyor ba gzhan ma snga ma bzhin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las yang gsang mchog gi spu gri 'di bton
535a5(sha): to// ya ma ta ra dun dun sarba tsit+ta breng shag ka dun rak+Sha a ya srog la dun dun dza dza/ sarba tsit+ta ru bruM sgur nan/ gzer thun tri ga nan/ kha nan/ a ka dzA ri ya ma tsit+ti breng shag
535a6(sha): pra bi sha ya phaT/ ya ma tsit+ta/ dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs thun b+h+yo yaM raM b+h+yo/ dgra bo'i srog la du na rmugs tsit+ta breng shag mA ra yarba da/ lu ma 'khyil par rkang 'dom rer/
535a7(sha): phyogs bzhir thod pa khyud mchog dbus// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram gyi// gnan pa mi shigs brtan pa'i mchog/ sbyor ba'i rgyal po dril bar bshad// de nas
535b1(sha): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis las dang nus pa thams cad bshig pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// brnag pa stobs kyis las gshig pa// dregs pa stobs kyi lha rnams kyi//
535b2(sha): 'khrul 'khor drag po'i me rlung stobs// snying po me dpal stobs kyis 'joms// dmod pa'i mtshon cha 'di lta ste// dur khrod zhing ras shog bu la// mu khyud rim pa bzhi dang //
535b3(sha): ldan// rlung ri las kyi 'khrul 'khor la// dbus su gru gsum zla kham gsum// phyi rim lcags mkhar bang mig bzhi// de yi phyi rim 'khrul mig brgyad// zhing gi
535b4(sha): pas mtshams brgyad 'degs// yang logs mtshon cha'i rtsibs bcu gnyis// las kyi me ri 'bar ba'i tshul// mtshon cha'i khang pa de dag la// gnas shing dgod pa 'di//
535b5(sha): lta ste// dbus na brnag pa'i snying po ming // zla kham de bzhin rdzogs par bri// lcags mkhar bzhi yi khang pa ru// srog dang las bdud bya khyung rdud// 'bru bzhi
535b6(sha): sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ khang khyud lcags mkhar brgyad po la// gshin rje ma mo'i snying po gnyis// mkha' lding dregs pa btsan ma mo// ru sbal gshin rje'i snying po rdzogs//
535b7(sha): lcags mkhar bang mig re la dgod// mtshon cha'i khang pa bcu gnyis la// dug lnga'i sbyor ba gshig pa yi// drag po spu gri'i mtshon chad dgod// me lha snying po spong
536a1(sha): ba dgod// 'khrul 'khon mtshon cham dpal sngags// sbyor ba'i rgyal po ku 'joms 'di// me rlung las kyi mtshon chas gcod// rdzas rnams
536a2(sha): kun la kha sbyar dril// dur mar bcug la re bas gril// rtsang bcas gru gsum bskyed pa'i bstan// zhing lpags steng nas hom shing gzug/ lha bsgoms sngags
536a3(sha): bzlas thun brab bsreg/ du ba'i rdzas la bdug cing brab// drag tu bskul cing yul ya rbad// bdun nam lnga ru nya stong brtsam// sbyor ba thon na 'khrul 'khor dril// chos
536a4(sha): gcig dag dang bcu drug la// spobs pa med pa'i gnan pa bya// zhi khro phur pa gshin rje rnams// 'khor lo ru sbal thod chen gzhug/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu
536a5(sha): gnan// mkha' lding dregs pa klu rgyal rnams// 'khrul 'khor tshe bdag lto bar gzhug/ 'brong chen thod par ro lugs gnan// ma mo bdud mo srin mo rnams// 'khrul
536a6(sha): 'khor nyan thos thod par gzhug/ bka' rten byin can 'og tu gnan// bdud dang mu stegs mgon po rnams// 'khrul 'khor g.yag ru g.yas par gzhug/ ro khang sgo
536a7(sha): srungs 'og tu gnan// rgyal po dge bsnyen dkor srungs rnams// sbyang khu dar ma'i thod par gzhug/ kyi tshang lam ka'i 'og tu gnan// btsan dang srog bdag dri bo rnams//
536b1(sha): sha ru sprang zod gong gsum gnan// klu bdud ma bdud phug bdag rnams// bon po'i thod par lha khang ga na na// the rang chags 'gong shing ngog rnams// glang rur bcug la
536b2(sha): lam mdor gnan// sa bdag sgra gzhan mdze 'dra rnams// 'khor lo phag mo'i zod par gzhug/ papha gzod bka' rten 'og tu gan+dan// bon po rigs gnyis 'dzin pa nam/
536b3(sha): khyi thod bcug la kyi tshang ga na na// sri gcan chu thod the ma 'og gnan// rigs 'dzin sbyor ba bdag dbang bsdu// sa gzhi sbyor ba gnan pa'o// bar snang ming
536b4(sha): bcas mchod rten gnan// nam mkha'i bsam gtan mchog gi las// 'khrul 'khor me rlung sbyin dang mtshan// drag po gshig pa'i las mthar sbyar// de nas
536b5(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugasA las drag po gshig pa'i spu gri 'di bton to// sarba rtsa srur srog na na/ snying gzer breng shag yaM rbad/ las kyi rgyal
536b6(sha): po kun 'joms 'di// 'khrug byed tsit+ta'i las yin pas// drug po gshig pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
536b7(sha): snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig po'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// drag po nye bar sbyor ba ru// gab pa thugs kyi 'khrul 'khor bca'// rten pa shog bu grub zhil//
537a1(sha): cha gnyis dur khrod sme bas byug/ ru sbrul lto bar thig skor bzhi// bskor la dbus su gru gsum la// zla kham sbrul gyi ra bas gtam/
537a2(sha): de yi phyir ma 'khrul mig bzhi// thod khar rdo rje ka ba me// phyi rim 'khrul meg phyugs mkhar brgyad// yang logs rtsa sbubs nyi shu gcig/ gdug pa sreg
537a3(sha): byed ye shes me// 'od kyi gong bur gnas pa 'phro// de la gnas pa'i rim pa ni// gru gsum dbus na snying po gsum// gang gnod mi dang bcas la dgod//
537a4(sha): zla kham gsum la gang gnod ming // lcags mkhar brgyad dang thod mkhar bzhi// rtsa ba'i yig 'bru bcu gnyis dgod// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig la// snying gzer ci
537a5(sha): shu rtsa gcig dgod// drag sngags 'khrul 'khor me dpal mtshon// 'khor lo mtshon chen ma dpal sngags// drag po sngags dgod gdug pa'i mtshon// thog chen
537a6(sha): dril 'phreng drag po'i stobs// nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtshos// mtshon cha kha sbyar dug chu ngar// sngo dmar dang bcas phag mo'i ltor// dug khrag bskus la thod par
537a7(sha): gzhug/ mi rkang skyed bu lcags khris 'degs// gsal gsum dang ldan gsum stong bskul// nya stong mare gyi ngo la sbyar// tha chungs bzhi la rab tu brtag/ zhag gsum
537b1(sha): shin tu gnod par bca'// de nyid dong gzhug thod par ga nan// mi ldog gyad dang dregs pa bsgom// thod mkhar steng du gdug pa'i rtsang // nyi shu gcig pus mchog phur
537b2(sha): bstan// gang gnod gzugs/ blang snying khar brdeg/ rgyun du drag sngags brgya brgyas bsrung // yag sha b+hi la'i sbyor tshul can// snying po ngang dang shugs kyis drang //
537b3(sha): dug lnga parkam chags rtsa ba gcod// ha la nag po'i zhen chags 'brel// gdug pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags kyi rgyal po kun 'joms 'di// drag la dril zhing
537b4(sha): sgra spangs la// dgra ni gtum zhing lci bar bshad// drag po gtum chen dregs pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las gdug pa thams cad gzhon/
537b5(sha): pa'i phyir snying gzer nyi shu rtsa gcig gi spu gri 'di bton to// sa nA ga snying gzer dza/ sa nA ga snying gzer dug phyung / sa nA ga snying gzer du ga tsit+ta rbad/ sa nA ga snying
537b6(sha): gzer thun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer dun rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer ye rbad/ sa nA ga snying gze re ri thun rbad/ sa nA~M ga snying gzer srog la rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer myogs
537b7(sha): rbad/ sa nA ga snying ga zer thum ril rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzir du ra rbad/ sa nA ga rnying gzer nan 'drir rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer breng shag rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer khas
538a1(sha): rbad/ sa nA ga snying gzer thibs rba da/ sa nA ga snying gzer skur nan rbad/ 'am si ra la/ rang gcod sbyar ba'i rgyal po ste// snying gzer dgu yi
538a2(sha): 'khor lor bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dz+wa la drag po bsrung ba'i rgyal po 'di bshad do// klu gnyen sa bdag zhugs pa yi// ya nga ba yi
538a3(sha): nad dar na// dmod pa drag po'i snying po bca'// de yi sbyor ba 'di lta ste// rgya shog rgyu la lho sbyar bri// dbus nas thig skor bzhi ru bskor// dbus su drag po 'bub gnas
538a4(sha): bzhi// ma mo rgyal po mdze tri can// rtse yi 'bub gnas gsum la bri// sa dang nA ga dbus su bri// zla kham gang gnod ming rnams bri// phyogs bzhi rtsa ba'i 'phrul mig
538a5(sha): ni// lcags mkhar gsum gsum rgya gram la// rtsa ba'i drag po'i lus dang ldan// mtshams kyi gsang mdzod mun khang bzhir// gdug pa gsum gyi gzugs bris la//
538a6(sha): lus srog 'phrog pa'i 'bru dgu bri// mu khyud gsum par gdug pa'i gzugs// mtha' ma phyi yi mu khyud la// 'khrul mig rtsa sbubs bcu gcig gnas// dmigs
538a7(sha): pas bkug cing mtshams su gzir// shi khrag drag sngags bcu gcig gnas// ru sbal rtsa ba'i 'khor lo ni// yon tan 'brel sgrib sna tshogs 'byung // dug dang tsha ba
538b1(sha): rdzas bsras la// kha sbyor ba dug cing thod pa bca'// dkyil 'khor dbus su rtsang bcas gzhug/ phyag rgya zil gnon skur bsams la// dmod pa nyin mtshan brgya brgya
538b2(sha): bzlas// 'khor lo thod pa gdug cing brab// cha lugs bzlog pa bsnol khrag brdeg/ shi phrad bcu gcig srog lus kyi// dug gsum ga nad dang zhe na chags 'brel//
538b3(sha): gdug rtsub zhe na chags gzir cing gcod// yid kyi dbang po 'khrul pa'i yul// rkam chags rgyun gyis srog phrogs la// gsang mdzod mu khyud gzugs la sdud// ma rlu//
538b4(sha): stobs kyis khrug cing sdud// rkyen min sbyor ba'i stobs dpag gis// srid pa'i khyams khang lta ru 'chang // mngag ga nad mda' yi sbyor ba yin// mgo gcig gdong lce
538b5(sha): gnyis pa'i tshul// rgyud gcig dngas snyigs sngags kyis 'byed// yang gsang mchog gi snying po bcud// drag po me dpal stobs dpag med// sbyor ba phag thod steng dang
538b6(sha): 'og/ rdo rje rgyal po'i bzlas pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku gsung thugs las yang gsang mchog gi sngags 'di bton to// sa nA ga srog breng breng dun dun thu
538b7(sha): ril nA ga dza/ sa nA ga srog la br-ing breng dza dza bruM ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la dun dun thu ril shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta thu ril shag/ sa nA ga rtsa le rbad thu ril shag/ sa nA ga
539a1(sha): du ling khas thu ril shag/ sa nA ga srog la hur thum ril shag/ sa nA ga tsit+ta la bruM ril shag/ sa nA ga snying gzer chur na na thu ril shag/ du me ma ma
539a2(sha): srog gzir thu ril shag/ tsa ti shu la gzer nan bruM ril shag/ ro ni tri ye shig nan gzir thu ril shag/ drag sngags me dpal 'khor lo mtshon// 'khor lo me dpal
539a3(sha): mtshon chen gyis// sbyor ba gcod cing gdug rtsub bsreg/ bdag skyob gzhan bsrung bstan pa'i lus// ya ma ka li'i dregs pa yi// ha mo gnon po'i be ga ta//
539a4(sha): 'di min sbyor bas rang 'ching yin// drag po snying gzer bcu gcig gi/ yang gsang thugs kyi 'khor lo bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin
539a5(sha): sreg drag po sa'i 'khor los gsad pa'i sbyor ba 'di bshad do// gsang chen sngags kyi rtsa ba ru// 'khor lo sbyin sreg s+ho bsdebs nas// gsod dang 'bigs la sogs
539a6(sha): pa'i las// bsrung dang skyob pa kun byed yin// thabs rnams ldan dang mi ldan las// bya ba kun 'grub rlag par 'gyur// 'di dag pa de dang smin pa'i las// gsang
539a7(sha): chan 'khrul gyi 'khor lo 'di// 'byed cing bsnyad pa'i rim pa ni// gnyen ra gdug pa'i bde gnas su// dang po shes ldan smin byed pa'i// 'khrul 'khor rim pa
539b1(sha): 'di lta ste// rgyu la rdzas kyi thang pa bya// bar snang 'khor lo las kun byed// thig skor gsum ldan ru sbal ltor// dbus su gru gsum mu khyud ser// zla kham dmar
539b2(sha): po gru gsum ga nag/ phyi rim rdo rje rgya gram la// snying po 'khrul mig gsum ldan gnas// rtsa ba'i drag sngags kun gyi lus// yang logs rdo rje'i rwa brgyad la// de bzhin
539b3(sha): 'khrul mig gnyis gnyis ldan// gsod cing gnon pa'i spa gri gnas// mtshams dang zla kham dbus rnams su// don gnyis bsngas la ming sogs bris// rdzas
539b4(sha): dang kha sbyar nam mkha' bzhag/ las kyi rgyal po'i 'khrul 'khor yin// phung sa la sogs stegs bu la// khrag dang dug gi byi dor bya// bam gyi srad bus lnga ru bskor//
539b5(sha): drag po zla kham sum brtsegs dbus// dmar dang dkar dang nag po la// rtsang dang thod pa de bzhin ma// mthing nag ling ka hom shing dbus// phyi rim rgya gram phur pa ming //
539b6(sha): yang logs rtsibs la rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi rim thod 'phreng me ri mtha'// dmar dang ljang dang nag po rims// de dag ru t+pal lto bar bri// dug gi khrag gi rme ba can//
539b7(sha): shas+tha tshil sna mar khu 'chang // nyungs kar nyungs nag til shangs skye// lcags rdo zangs dang ling ga ming // thun brab bskul la bstab cing bsreg/ drag sngags
540a1(sha): bcu yis mtshon brdeg brtan// rgya gram rA yi 'dab brgyad du// bsreg pa'i spu gri gzugs rnams dgod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skug su
540a2(sha): thugs las drag po lto sbyar gyi sngags 'di bton to// nri tirba da/ dgra bo'i srog la dun rmugs dza/ tsit+ta hu ra thums dza la ram/ dgra bo'i srog la breng shag rba da/ 'khor
540a3(sha): lo thod pa ling ka gnan// snying po 'phrul gyi rtsa bar bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa chen po rnams las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di
540a4(sha): bton to// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas// drag po e yi gzhal yas nus// klu 'bum gnyan khri sa bdag stong gi gdan// phyogs skyong ma hes brdzis pa'i khri//
540a5(sha): thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan stengs na// dug ldanam chags 'joms pa'i lha// srog sdud tshe bdag nag po ni// gtum chen dus mtha' bskal pa'i me ltar
540a6(sha): 'bar// sku mdog nag po dug chen bskyil ba 'dra// sku yang tshal rngam chen dregs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar klu brgyad zhal du
540a7(sha): gsol// g.yon dmar gnyan khri klu 'bum gsol// dbus kyi mthing nag rngam pa yis// sku dgrar 'ongs pa'i las ngan dang // sa bdag sde brgyad lha srin gyi/
540b1(sha): dbang po lnga dang tsit+ta gsol// phyag drug mtshon cha 'bar ba yis// zhe sdang klu gnyan sa bdag dang // dgra bgegs mgo lus tshal bar gshog/ skul dur khrod rgyan
540b2(sha): cha dang // klu chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// do shal snying gi 'phreng bas brgyan// dbu la bdud dang srin po dang // btsan dang mu stegs rgyal po yi//
540b3(sha): mgo bcad thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal rigs gnyan gyi grong khyer brgya na// rje rigs mgur chu tshangs skud brgya na// bram ze rigs kyi phyag gdung
540b4(sha): bya// dmangs rigs zhab sa gdub lbu tshig sa brgyan// rigs ngan gdol pa zhabs 'og bting // ba su rigs drug zas su za// mche ba rgyu ring rtsang phur gtam/
540b5(sha): spyan nas dug gi tsha tsha 'phro// dbu smra sma ra ba spu las// gdug rtsub dmar nag me chen 'bar// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can dang // gdug pa'i klu gnyan sa bdag
540b6(sha): bsreg/ gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yini/ mngon du sgrol// zhe sdang dregs pa'i sbyor ba chom// lus srog dbang po rten dang phrol// g.yon
540b7(sha): gyi phyogs nas yum cig ma// bdud mo gsod byed rgyal mo ni// glu mdog mthing nag brjid pa la// dbu la sbrul nag ral pas gtibs// ral pa'i za ru re re las/
541a1(sha): gser dang mu thig rgyan 'byung ba// gdol pa'i klu dang thod pa yis// dbu dang phyag gdub rgya tshigs brgyan// gas nas ma'o ta ro 'bras// d+hun
541a2(sha): nAs khrag 'adz+rak+Sha r+tha sam+b+ha// shangs nas rlung nag 'tshub ma 'khyil// gams pas dam pa'i snying byung zad// gamin pasku na rgong d+hi wakrAts+tshaH/ drag tu brtul zhing da na
541a3(sha): / ma mo ki gang dgral 'bebs// mo gdon 'bum TI gar zhing 'joms// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang min myur du sgom// che bdag thugs kyi
541a4(sha): dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul pa mngon byung ba// gsod byed la ma n+ta tsa ni// su mdog sdug nas 'jigs tshul can// rngag zhing dregs pas dgra shegs 'dus// rnapa
541a5(sha): grong khyer sbrul gyis bcan// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad do shul byas// bdud dang rtswa stegs rgyal po'o// tsit+ta'i 'bring bas can du b+h+yas// gsas pa 'khor lo tshabs bcu ba rnams/
541a6(sha): byams bzhin sbyi go smras/ khon pasas// bston nas zlas// nga shing dregs pa'i rgyud kyis// rde brgyad kun ci sbyo gA 'dzim sa/ brtul shing drugan tu sa
541a7(sha): bdun dang rgyal po don skyong 'byin// bcan dngas bdag dbang po 'jims// dug lnga 'dul bar bskul tsas na// sa bdag gru gtan gzing zhing sreg/ gangs bya ba khyod shes kyi
541b1(sha): dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol// ya ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul pa sngon phyung ba// dregs pa chen po rngam pa'i sku// sku mdog ljang nag brjid pa ni// 'phrin
541b2(sha): las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags// zhal gcig rnga ma zhing 'tshigs pa ni// dregs pa can dang gnod sbyin kun// srog dang phral nas gsol ba'i rtags// tshems dang mche ba gcig/
541b3(sha): pa ni// klu brgyad zas su za ba'i rtags// zhal gcig skan sgra 'debs pa ni// gnyan dang sa bdag klu bdud kun// dbang po bsdus nas gsol ba'i rtags// tshems dang mche
541b4(sha): ba'i bar bar nas// gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro 'brul// snyan cha mgur chu gdub sor kun// sbrul dang rin po che yis brgyan// shangs kyi rlung sgras klu srin 'thor// dbu la rin chen 'bar
541b5(sha): pab sa brgyan// g.yas pa gser gyi rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa ni// sdang dgra gnod bgegs mgo lus gshog pa'i rtags// g.yon pas tsit+ta'i 'phreng ba bsnams pa ni// dbang chen
541b6(sha): dregs pa bran du 'khol ba'i rtags// zhabs gnyis bsnol nas 'gying stabs bzhugs pa ni// klu gnyan 'bum sde gdan du bting ba'i rtags// zhal gdangs mche ba rab tu
541b7(sha): gtsigs pa ni// dug gsum skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags// spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// 'dod chags chen pos gdug pa 'dzin pa'i rtags// gang la bya/
542a1(sha): brdegs pa khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol las shog/ dregs chen po'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// thugs kyi sprul pa mtsho/
542a2(sha): byung ba// ru sbal rngam pa'i mi ban ni// chags sdang lnga yi rtsa ba gcod// 'byung ba lnga yi 'bras bu skyems// lus stug gnyis kyi rtsa mdangs 'brel// hUM bi med pa'i
542a3(sha): khams la sdud// dngas ma bkrag gi snying po 'chang // thugs kyi gsang mdzod 'bar ba ru// bkrag mdangs bcud kyi snying po chongs// dkon mchog dbu 'phangs dmod pa
542a4(sha): dang // rgyal ba'i bkra' dam gcod pa dang // sdang ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs// klu dgrar 'os pa ma lus kyang // gshed kyi gsang mdzod 'bar bar chug
542a5(sha): rtag tu 'khyams pa'i gnas su 'chongs// rtsa bzhi sngags kyi stobs kyis gzir// dmod pa drag po'i mtshon chas gcod// yan lag lnga dang gsang ba las// mchod
542a6(sha): drug gis dgra bgegs gnon// dgra bgegs las ngan gdug pa rnams// s+phu gI'i gnas nas sho ra re// tshe bdag nag po'i spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi bya khyung ka ru DA/
542a7(sha): bya khyung rgyal po dam tshig can// bya khyung rgyal po mthu bo che// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog rtsa yis// klu gnyan sa bdag mgo lus gshogs// ral gri 'bar ba'i gshog
542b1(sha): papa yis// gdug pa gsum gyi sbyor ba gcod// spu gri 'bar ba'i thed ga shog gis// dgra bo nyams pa'i srog dbugs phrol// ye shes 'bar ba'i gshog zer gyis//
542b2(sha): nyon mongs dug gsum rtsad nas sreg/ spu bran spu gr-i de bal chen gyis// nyams pa kun gyi srog rtsa gcod// spyan gnyis nyi zlar skyil ba yis// zhe sdang klu mchog ting
542b3(sha): nas skems// gnam lkugs 'bar ba'i sder mo yis// klu gnyan sa bdag drangs kyi na gsol// gnam lcogs 'bar ba'i rdo rje mchus// sa bdag klu bdud klu srin
542b4(sha): gsol// khyung gi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// gdug po'i gnas khang rmang nas gshig/ khyud chen rngam pa'i nga ro yis// klu gnyan sa bdag zil gyis gnon// ga/
542b5(sha): la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dmigs pa gang yin mngon du sgrol// yang sbrul dug gi khyung chen gyi// mtshon cha 'bar ba'i gshog pa yis// gdug pa'i rkam
542b6(sha): chags gcod cing za// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las ngo long // stag dang sing ge rngam pa yis// nyams pa'i sha khrag drod las rol// zhe sdang dug sbrul nag po yis//
542b7(sha): kha nas me 'bar dug lnga sreg/ dgra bo mkhar gyi rmang nas gshig/ dag sbrul nag po lus srog 'brel// dregs pa can rnams dgra la b+h+yo/
543a1(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dregs pa chen po'i 'khor srog gshed kyi mon pa bzhi las sna tshogs las bskul ba 'di gsungs so// yab
543a2(sha): cig tshe bdag nag po thugs kyi sprul pa ni// shar gyi phyogs nas bla rku ba// dug gi mon pa rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// sku stong zhing gi g.yang gzhi thod pa 'bum gyis brgyan//
543a3(sha): sku smad stag gi sham bu mu tig chun gyis brgyan// sbrul nag gdug pa sku yi rgyan du byas// snying dang thod pa'i 'phreng bas do shal dregs pas brgyan// zhal nas dug gi rlangs
543a4(sha): pa nad thun sprin ltar gtibs// shangs nas dug gi tshub mas stong khams phyags mas 'de bas// snyan nas rnga ma pa'i 'brug sgras zhing bcu zil gyis gnon// phyag g.yon
543a5(sha): lcags kyu zhags pa 'khrigs pa yis// gang la dmigs pa'i dgra bgegs bla yang 'gugs// phyag g.yas shel gyi rdo rjes mgo lus gshog/ mon pa chen po drag tu/
543a6(sha): bskul tsam na// chibs su seng ge chibs nas dgra bgegs tshe srog sdud// g.yas na gshog pa can gyi pho nya srog la lding zhing 'debs// g.yon nas ga can gzan
543a7(sha): gdug pa'i pho nya rngam zhing rol// stod nas me 'bar bla mtsho gting nas skems// smad nas khrag 'dzag dal gyi bu yug glog/ dug gi mon pa sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// mon pa nag
543b1(sha): po sku yi g.yon phyogs na// dug gi mon pa bla rkun rngam pa'i gdong // sku la dar nag ber chan sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// dbu la dug sbrul cod pan khrag gi za ru can//
543b2(sha): zhal nas gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan nas dug dang khrag gi rba glong tshi li li// g.yas pas snying 'byin yab kyi sku la 'khyud// g.yon pa dug zor dug
543b3(sha): mda' dgra la 'phen// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// dug gi mon pa gcer bu 'bu ma// dug mda' lcags gzer dgra bgegs snying la thob// spyi gtsug/
543b4(sha): dug gi bya khyung ga ru ka/ rdo rje ga shog pas dug gi me lce 'bar// rdo rje mchu dang sder mos klu gnyan drangs shing za// klu nad mdze shu dkar ru gtsogs shing skyems// rdo rje
543b5(sha): rigs kyi sprul pa sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// lho yi phyogs nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs pa// lcags kyi mon pa nag po rngam pa'i gdong // sku stod lcags kyi zhun
543b6(sha): khrab thod pas brgyan pa gsol// sgyu smad stag sham g.yu yi dril bus brgyan pa gsol// dbural nag po nam mkha'i sprin ltar gtibs// kha nas me 'bar khrag gi rgya
543b7(sha): skems// mche ba dgu ris dgra bo nang rol 'brab// spun rtsa dmar la sdang mig dgra la gzigs// g.yon pa rlung gi 'khor los dgra bo lus srog 'byed// g.yas pa
544a1(sha): me yi 'khor los dgra bgegs rtsa rgyud sreg/ mon po nag po drag tu bskul tsam na// stag la zhon nas dgra yul phyugs mas 'debs// me yi
544a2(sha): bskal pa stong zhing dgra bo'i bla mtsho skems// zhal du sbrul dang mi ro za zhing rngam// mon pa nag po sku yi g.yon phyogs nas// mon pa nag po ga lu yi ral pa can// dgra
544a3(sha): bo bla rku yid la dzag 'gyed ma// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zhal nas mi ro 'brul// sku la mthing nag sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// g.yas pas snying 'byin mon pa gtso la
544a4(sha): 'khyud// g.yon pas dug zor nag po sdang ba'i dgral 'phen// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// lcags kyi mon pa nag po gsum// ri klung rgyug cing tshe bkrag
544a5(sha): sdud// lag na lcags mda' gzer chen dgra yi snying la 'debs// rngam pa'i ngaro stong gsum zil gyis gnon// gcer bu 'bum gyis dgra bo sgrol las shog/ mon pa
544a6(sha): nag po dbu yi spyi gtsug na// bya khyung rgyal po mtshon cha'i gshog pa can// rin chen cod pan ma yi bskul pa gtong // zhe sdang klu mtsho gting nas skems shing
544a7(sha): 'thung // mchu dang sder mo rin chen 'bar ba yis// klu gnyanas bdag 'dzin cing zhal du gsol// khyung gi gshog pa brdabs nas 'od zer spros pa yis// klun mdze
544b1(sha): shu dkar rus gcod cing skye mas// rin chen rigs kyi sprul pa sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// nub kyi phyogs nas sdang ba'i dgra 'gugs pa// bse yi mon pa gtum
544b2(sha): chen dregs pa can// sku stod pas khrab thod pas brgyan pa gsol// sku smad stog lpags sham bu pad+ma 'bum gyis brgyan// dbu skra kham nag khrag gi gzar bu can//
544b3(sha): zhal nas khrag gi skyugs pas dgra bo khrag tu skyug/ spyan nas me 'bar dgra bo'i dug gsum sreg/ snyan nas stong gsum 'bru sgras zil gyis gnon// klu brgya'i mgo
544b4(sha): bcad thod pas do shal byas// phyag g.yon sbrul zhags nag pos dgra bo'i yid nas 'gugs// phyag g.yas ral gris dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcod// ba se yi mon pa
544b5(sha): drag tu bskul tsam na// ban glang dmar po zhon nas stong gsum phyugs mas 'debs// khrag gi rgya mtsho rlobs cing khrag nad char ltar 'bebs// klu dang sa
544b6(sha): bdag 'bum sde zas su za// rngam pa'i nga ros stong gsum zil gyis gnan// sprul pa chen po rngam zhing dgra bo 'dul// mon pa chen po sku yi g.yon phyogs na//
544b7(sha): mon mo tshe phrog khrag gi ral pa can// sku la rma bya'i 'jol bar gsol// pad+ma 'bum dang sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zhal nas mi ro 'brul// g.yas
545a1(sha): pa zhing 'byin mon pas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pas khrag mda' gzer chen dgral 'debs// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// bse mi
545a2(sha): mon pa gcer bu 'bum// khrag gi skyugs pa dgra la spros// ral pa bas 'od ma ltar 'bar// me yi bskal pa dgra la stong // khyed kyi lag pa g.yas g.yon nas// zangs mda'
545a3(sha): gzer chen dgra la 'debs// rngam pa'i nga ros stong gzugs zil gyis gnon// gcer bu 'bum gyis dgra bgegs sgrol las shog/ mon pa chen po dbu yi spyi gtsug nas//
545a4(sha): ba se yi bya khyud ral gri'i gshog pa can// zangs sngar zangs mchus klu gnyan sa bdag za// pad+ma stong gi spu bran me ltar 'bar// spyan nas khrag 'dzag klu ga nyan sa bdag
545a5(sha): myos// pad+ma rigs kyi sprul pa dgra la b+h+yo// byang gi phyogs nas dgra bo'i bla 'gugs pa// mon pa rnga ma chen srid pa'i srog gshed ni// ser nag mi bsrun
545a6(sha): dug gi kha rlangs 'phro// ral pa sbrul nag khrag gi zar bu can// spyan nas khrag 'dza ga na bun char ltar 'bab// sku stong zhing lpags rgya gram stong gis brgyan// sku sma stag sha ma
545a7(sha): thod pa'i cha ga can// bya dang gcan gzan gdug pa'i tshogs kyis bskor// phyag g.yon zhing gi zhags pas dgra bo gnas nas 'dren// g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram dgra bgegs
545b1(sha): mgo lus gshog/ mon pa chen po drag tu bskul tsam na// dred la zhon nas dgra bgegs phyags mas 'debs// kha nas me 'bar dgra yi dug gsum ba sreg/ rngam pa'i nga
545b2(sha): ros dgra bgegs zil gyis gnon// mon pa chen po sku yi g.yon phyogs nas// mon mo chen mo bla rkun snying la gzer 'debs ma// sbrul nag ral pa khrag gi zer bu can// sku la
545b3(sha): ljang nag ber chen thod pas brgyan pa gsol// zhal nas gdug pa'i sbrul dang mi ro rta ro 'brul// spyan nas khrag 'dzag dug gi chu bo 'bab// snyan dang phyag zhabs sbrul nag 'bun
545b4(sha): gyis brgyan// g.yas pas snying 'byin mon pa yab la 'khyud// g.yon pas 'brong chen rwa zor dam nyams dgra la 'phen// yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sprul pa ni// mon pa
545b5(sha): ser nag gcer bu 'bum// lcags mda' gzer chen dgra la phen// rkang pa rgyug cing lag pa rje// tshe srog dbang po bkug cing gsod// bla dang sprul pa phral zhing 'chang //
545b6(sha): dgra bo bla dang grol las shog/ mon pa ser nag dbu yi spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi rgyal po bya khyung ga ru Da// rdo rje rgya gram gshog pa 'od zer 'phro// n+ya gram mchu dang sder
545b7(sha): mo lcags kyu yis// chu gnyanas bdag drangs shing zas su za// gshog pa rgya gram las kyi rlung chen gyis// klu gnyan sa bdag klu bdud phyags mas 'debs// spyan gnyi
546a1(sha): nyi zlas sdang shing bzlog pa yis// klu nad mdze shud kar ru gtsogs shing skyems// khyung gi rngam sgra sgrom sbom drag tu bsgrags pa yis// klu gnyan sa
546a2(sha): bdag zil gyis gnon cing gzir// las kyi sprul pa chen po sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// kun 'dus rig pa'i pho brang nas// stobs chen dregs pa 'khor skyong rnams// sna tshogs
546a3(sha): las mthar sbyar ba dang // gshed kyi las gnyer bskor bar bshad// de nas sa yi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ drag po sngags
546a4(sha): dgod dmod po'i rgyal po yis// khyad par srung zhing bsam gtan chen po dang // gsad pa mchog gi sbyor ba ji ltar bgyi// zhes gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom
546a5(sha): ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po zil gyis gnon pa bshad pa'o// bdud kyi gsad dang dab ba dang bdag bsrung dang // btsun dang srog dbrog bshad du gsol// zhes
546a6(sha): zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sngags bdun du dril te bshad do// srog gcod bdud kyi sbyor ba ni// dur khrod gnyan ra'i dben gnas su// dpa' brtul
546a7(sha): sngags kyi dmod pa bca'// maN+Dal byi dor dug chu khrag/ gru gsum dur khrod rgya sol byug/ kha khyer dmar po rtsang dang snying // rgyu rten khrag bcas ming dang gzugs//
546b1(sha): rog po'i rgyu la rten du bya// byang khram g.yas g.yon srog brag kha// dbang po lnga dang skyu ru gdags// tshon skud dang bcas dbus su gzhug/ mkha' lding gsum dang rgyu yi snying//
546b2(sha): ban d+ha bdud rtsi steng du rdzas// gri lcags seng ldeng phur ba rtsang // yan lag rnam shes drod la dgab// nyungs kar dug sna khrag thun brdeg/ nag po ka li b+ha l-i bshos// gshi
546b3(sha): rje nag po'i cha lugs sgom// bka' sdod pho nya mdun na rnga ma// nyi shu rtsa gcig drag sngags bzlas// b+ha ling mchod mthar sbyor ba tsam// nyin mtshan pho mos phye la brdeg
546b4(sha): rten la thun dbab drag tu bskul// mtha' ru dus tshod drag sngags brdeg/ thun brab mtshon brdeg parnag pa bsgral// ling ka thod pa rgya gram gnan// pho nyas bkug
546b5(sha): la rten la bsti ma// rgya de ba rnag pa'i khams su bya// tsha tsha dgu lding thog ser dpapa// thugs dam rgyu yis pastabs pa bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skra
546b6(sha): gsung thugs las drag sngags bdun pa 'di pho mo phye ste bton to// ga ro nri sha na sharba da/ tsa ro ba sho na shag rba da/ mu ga ga du na sha ga rbad/ dzA la pho tra na sha ga rbad/
546b7(sha): 'dun 'bur tir na shag rbad/ rag ti phug na sha garba da wa ka sha ling na shag rbad/ ma mA tsi tA la thum rbad/ ma mA rtsa thang br-i ling rbad/ ma ma
547a1(sha): srog la gzer thung rbad/ mam+mu dza la shag thurbad/ ma mA srog la hu ra rbad/ ma ma rtsa srog zer thums rbad/ ma ma tsit+ta gzer thum rbad/
547a2(sha): drag sngags dmod pa'i thun phab na// dregs pa kun kyang myos shing brgyal// brnag pa kun 'joms yul dang sprad// bstan pa'i rgyud la mtshon cha 'pho// thod pa
547a3(sha): la sogs ming dang sbyar// rgyu yi sbyor ba bdun par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drag sngags bdun pa'i sbyor ba 'khrul 'khor 'di rgyas par bshad
547a4(sha): do// brnag pa bdud kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// dur khrod ras sam zhing ras la// rdzas kyi sbyor bas thang ba bya// phyogs mtshams mnyam la thig bdun gdab// de bzhin
547a5(sha): dbus nas bdun du bskor// 'khrul 'khor rtse mor rdo rje'i 'gram// rtsu ba chu la ral gri'i gdung // lte ba gru gsum drag po'i gnas// 'khrul 'khor lcags mkhar
547a6(sha): lnga bcu la// dbus nas ming rus gnag pa'i mda'// 'khrul mig pho mo drag po'i sngags// 'bru bdun mtha' nas dbus su dril// srog gcod pho mo lto bar bca'//
547a7(sha): dug dang tsha ba'i rdzas byugs la// kha sbyar thod pa'i ga bur bca'// 'khrul 'khor mtshon cha drag sngags me// pho nya bskul zhing dbus su brnag/ nyin dang mtshan mo
547b1(sha): phye la bskor// mar gyi ngo la nyi shu gcig/ dra ga sngags sbyor ba gsum du brdeg/ khrag dang dug chus ngar blud la// bla dang sprul pa bkug cing bstim// thod pa bka' yi
547b2(sha): rten la gtad// drag sngags sbyor ba gong bzhin bsdeb// 'pho ba med pa'i las 'di yang // srog gcod pho nya 'khor skyong ging // mtshon cha bdud kyi 'khor lor bshad//
547b3(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba ya stig gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// mthing nag dbus su mon thod pa rnag/ rog gsum tsit+ta rtse mo gshag/
547b4(sha): brnag pa'i ming byang shing la bri// zhing ras drag sngags dug gis bri// tsit+ta'i phyi nang ldan par bya// thod par bcug la mthing nag dgab// lcags phye zangs phye rdo phye khrag/
547b5(sha): dug gi ngar blud thod pa thun// gshin rje'i stobs kyis lha bsgoms la// ga shin rje bdud dang mon pa rbad// bla kun drod dang sbyor la mngag/ bcu drug dbus gzugs
547b6(sha): stong la gdon// khri tsho bdun dang drag sngags gso// de dag tshes kyi dkar po la// ba ling dang bcas rag ta gsur// brnag pa'i gzugs la drag sngags mtshon//
547b7(sha): bla khugs nyams su lon na brdeg/ thun gyi mtshon cha rgya pis dang pa// dril gtor rtags dang nyams kyis blang // dur khrod rgyu ba'i sha za kun// dmed pa'i las la
548a1(sha): rngam zhing gtod// snang snang sbyar na dmyal khams 'gro// dmod pa'i yang tig dug gis mtshon/ cha yis sbyor na las rnams rdzogs//
548a2(sha): gshed bdag ka li dmod pa smin// 'bras bu rang nyams drod la rtag/ ya dang ma yi ma ra brnag/ dug khrag 'o ma sngo sna ming // sbyor ba glang po thabs kyi rdzas// lcags
548a3(sha): phur sngags bkod dug gi ngar// drag po gzir la dbab pa'i rdzas// dur khrod rdzas ldan rgya shog la// thig skor mu khyud zlum po lnga// dbus nas brtsams te rim
548a4(sha): pUr bskor// dbus su chu bskams thig gnyis gdab// zur thig btab pas 'khrul mig bzhi// phyi rim 'khrul mogo brgyad du dbab// yang logs bcu gnyis
548a5(sha): rtsibs dang ldan// de bzhin tha mar bcu drug rtsibs// de la gnas shing dgod pa ni// dbus su yul du ser bsrun lha// sbyor ba gzhom phyir ming rnams bri/
548a6(sha): 'khrul mig bzhi la dgod pa ni// ga sha ri ni 'byung ba bzhi// de yi phyi rim brgyad po la// tsar du mun rag ling dang // ma dang sha ko rtsa ba'i sngags// yang logs
548a7(sha): rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la// bro pro shar shar da ling dril hris dzA ya/ chu dril khrag la bstim pa dgod// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu drug sa// gzi zhing dbab pa'i gsang
548b1(sha): sngags te// phro shar hri la b+h+yo/ ya phro shar drag phob/ nA ga snying gzer hri la shar/ kha sbyar thod pa gsum bcas la// tha chungs dgun dpyid rtsa ba 'bum// chu dril tha
548b2(sha): chungs khri bdun sbyar// nya dang stong la rta ma gzhug/ lha rten klu rten rgya gram du// ston lo gsum la dbab pa bri// chu dril stong gi spyi rgyug bya// bdud dang sprul pa yul
548b3(sha): g+ha rbad// dang por zor dal gnyis pa zab// gsum pa gzir la yis mtha' dbab// lo thog 'joms pa'i sbyor ba 'di// nag po bdud kyi 'khor lo bshad// rgyal
548b4(sha): mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ yang gsang mchog gi le'u ste brgya bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi gleng gzhi 'di
548b5(sha): bshad do// 'jam dpal thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dang po slob ma gzhug pa yi// rim pa lnga dang ldan par bya// bkra shis nyams dga'i bde gnas su//
548b6(sha): phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams bcad nas// sa phyogs snu ma la bshol ba ru// grangs kyi tshad ma tho ba thob tu// gtso la bye ba 'khor la 'bum// sku gsung thugs
548b7(sha): kyi bsnyen pa bya// khro bo'i dka' thub ldan byas la// gtor ma dang bcas mchod bstod bya// rnal 'byor nyams pa tshogs kyis bskang // slob mtshig dang tshogs
549a1(sha): kyis bshags// bkra shis dri ldan sa stsal// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mdzes par bya// rgyan dang ldan pa'i lha rnams dgod//
549a2(sha): bum pa dung chen gling bzhi ru// bdud rtsi lnga yi chus bkang la// mthing nag ma nyams mgul pa dkri// dbugs ma chad pa'i sgra yis brgyan// nyi ma'i gdan la ya ston
549a3(sha): la// gtso bo yab yum phyag rgyar bskyed// lhag pa'i bzlas pa 'bum du bya// rin chen bum pa lha yi grangs// ma nyams mdzes pas brgyan la bzhag/ lcang lo mdzes
549a4(sha): pa'i bum pa ru// bdud rtsi zhun ma snum gyis dgang // hUM rgyas gdab la dar gyis bcad// bcu bdun mtha' ru sid+hi dang // mtshams su brgya brgya spa ra nas// spel zhing
549a5(sha): byin rlabs brtan par bya// rig pa'i thugs kyi snying po 'bum// bum pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang // dbu rgyurgyan la sogs byin ldan bya// chu srin stag dang seng ge dom// bya rgod//
549a6(sha): khyung khra 'ug pa bsnol// dregs pa'i khro chu 'bum dang bcas// de nas dbang gi stegs bu tsam// lho phyogs gshin rje'i 'jug go'u// gru bzhi khru gang dbus su zlum/
549a7(sha): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser dang ldan// sa gzhi dmar po 'dab brgyad dkar// me tog mthing nag chu yis bkru// mtshams gcad brda phyag gsol ba gdab// spro ba
549b1(sha): bskyed de slob ma gzhug/ lung ba stan dam tshig sdom pa dpog/ bya ba sngon 'gro kun rdzogs nas// hUM gis gshin rje'i sras su bskyed// dbang stegs 'khor lo gdan la
549b2(sha): bzhag/ snying kha nyi zla'i rdo rje gzhug/ lus la bsrung ba'i phyag rgya dgod// de nas bum pa'i bya ba brtsam// khyad par bum pas bdag dbang brang // rigs kyis de bzhin
549b3(sha): slob ma la// ye shes chu yis khrus nas dbyung // dag pa'i 'bras bu phyag rgya'i sku// rin chen 'bru lnga nyi zla'i gdan// 'bras bu gshed bzhi gtso bo'i sku// spro ba
549b4(sha): bskyed la bstan pa sbyin// sbrul dang zod 'phreng gdengs kar ldan// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya sbyin// sbyor ba du ma'i bcas gzhi bstan// khams gsum bdag por
549b5(sha): dbang bskur lo// dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod lung bstan bya// me tog blangs la gsang mtshan bsgrags// phyag rgya bkrol la mna' rgyu blud// dam tshig bsgrags la
549b6(sha): gtams pa bya// sangs rgyas thugs kyi bcud bsdus la// khro bo brtul zhugs rdo rje sbyin// thun mong bcas pa'i las skal bsgo// thun mong bsgrub pa'i bca' bzhi
549b7(sha): bstan// gsang ba brlags na snying mgo 'gas// tshogs dang sbyor ba'i longs spyod dgye// dkyil 'khor lha bcas lus la bstim// nus pa thun mong dbang du bshad//
550a1(sha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang gi don 'di bshad do// dur khrod gdug pa'i sa phyogs su// khro bo rtags kyi bsnyen pa brtsam// /
550a2(sha): dur khrod gdug pa'i sa rnams la// yi dwags chen po bsnol ba yi// mthing nag zla kham dkyil 'khor bri// gtor ma gsum dang rag ta bsham// zhing chen rgyan dang keng
550a3(sha): rus 'phan// dung rnga gling bu lbu gdum gsur// rgyan dang mchod pa'i rten bshams la// dbus su ru tra pho mo'i gdan// zla kham srin po mgo bsnol gdan// rtsibs
550a4(sha): la mu stegs zhing rkyen brtsegs// sgo dang gru chad yi dwags ro// mgo dang lha gtum phyi khyams rgung // dbus su ma he brgyad gling gdan// thabs dang shes rab pad+mas
550a5(sha): mdzes// gzhan du nyi ma'i gdan dang ldan// dbus su khro bo gshin rje'i sku// dbu gsum mdzes pa'i phyag drug can// ral pa che ba spyan rtsa dmar// yum dang /
550a6(sha): gnyis su med par rtag/ yab yum gnyis kyi byin brlabs las// 'phro 'du phro chung nyi ma'i zer// thugs kar 'od kyi gong bu gzhug/ gsang lam b+ha ga'i
550a7(sha): gnas su 'khyil// gdan la phyag rgya gsal ba'i skye// gshed bzhi phyogs sbyong sgo srungs 'khor// rang rang smin nas mtshan mar gsal// rgyan dang
550b1(sha): byu mtshan sgyu mdog dmar// kun kyang 'od kyi gong bu smr-i// dbang stegs gru gsum mthing nag la// ma he bsnol ba'i gzugs bris la// slob ma bdud
550b2(sha): rtsi'i khrus nas gdon// 'jug pa'i rim pa rdzogs pa dang // dngos grub bskul bas las la 'jug/ rdzas rnams hUM bcas byin gyis brlabs// dam bcas
550b3(sha): dam tshig lta ba srog/ phyag rgya sbyor ba nus pa bskyed// rang sems brtan pas sangs rgyas sku// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzas las 'byung // slob ma zhal drug
550b4(sha): bcu gnyis phyag/ yum dang bcas pa'i skur bsgoms la// dbang gi gnas su stan du bzhag/ a dang bru gyi sa bon las// dbu la thod pa'i gzhal yas
550b5(sha): khAng // gdan dang bcas pa lnga bskyed la// gnam sgo dbus su nyi ma'i gradan// steng du khrag 'thung lnga yi sku// dbul de bzhin khro bos brgyan// lce la
550b6(sha): nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// pad+ma khrag 'thung he ru ka/ thugs kar nyi ma'i gdan stengs su// 'jam dpal rnon po mtshon gang ba// ya man ta ka skul thim/
550b7(sha): sku gsung thugs kyi dbang du spyad// dug lnga ye shes lnga yi dbang // be con rtags kyi phyag rgya sbyin// sku gsung thugs gsum bsrung ba'i dbang // khaT+Ta ka
551a1(sha): yi rtse gsum sbyin// nyon mongs ye shes rang gnas dbang // shes rab chen po'i ral gri sbyin// thugs rje'i dbyings su sgrol ba'i dbang //
551a2(sha): sbyin pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// 'khor ba dbyings su gcod pa'i dbang // dgra sta'i phyag mtshan 'debs pa'i tshul// nyon mongs rig pa 'dzin pa'i dbang /
551a3(sha): lcags kyu sa mtshan pa'i phyag mtshan no// 'khor ba chos skur 'khor los sgrol ba'i dbang // pa da na 'khor ba ye shes lhug par gsal ba'i dbang // zhags
551a4(sha): pas 'khor ba dbyings su 'dren pa'i dbang // sti ra'i dbyug pas dug lnga gnas su 'joms pa'i dbang // sdigs mdzub gdug pa pho mo zil gyis gnon pa'i
551a5(sha): dbang // mda' gzhus 'khor ba mda' yis sgrol ba'i dbang // mdung gi 'khor ba'i ye shes gnyag mar 'brigs pa'i dbang // phyag mtshan bcu gnyis
551a6(sha): sgrol ba'i dbang du bshad// dur khrod chas kyis 'khor ba chos nyid du// skye shi med pa'i don gyis khyab pa'i dbang du bshad// skam rlon tshar bu'i thod
551a7(sha): pa yis// sku gsung don dang ldan pa'i dbang du bshad// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi rgyan cha yis// thogs pa med par gnyen po slong ba'i dbang du bshad//
551b1(sha): ga yang gzhis bdud dang mu stegs 'dul ba'i dbang du bshad// gti mug sel ba'i ko rlon dang // phrag dog stag gi sha ma bu dag/ rdo rje gshog pas thabs//
551b2(sha): dang shes rab rtogs// me 'od 'bar bas dug gsum gtan nas bsregs// khro bo dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang du bshad// zhing gi khog pas phyi nang gsang
551b3(sha): ba yi// dur khrod gzhal yas mtshon pa'i dbang du bshad// ro dang sregs pa dbang can 'dul ba'i rtags// ma hes chos nyid g.yo ba med pa'i
551b4(sha): rtags/ nyi zla thabs dang shes rab thig ler shar ba'i rtags// zhabs 'og gdan gyi yon tan dbang du bshad// bdag pos phyag
551b5(sha): rgya bstan pa'i dbang // khams ga sum sgrol bas dbang can bran du 'khor// nyan bshad sgom pa'i dbang bskur bas// re dog sa gnyis kyis
551b6(sha): mtha' bsal nas// 'das dang ma 'dase kun gyi rje// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub bstan// thogs pa med pa'i dbang du bshad// 'phrin/
551b7(sha): las rnam pa'i dbang bskur bas// rtsa ba bzhi dang les phrag brgyad// yan lal/ nyes brgya stong bcu drug/ sbyor ba gsum dang las mchog gsum
552a1(sha): las rnams thogs pa med par bshad// dam rdzas bzhi yis dbang bskur bas// dregs pa pho mos mtshan 'dres nas//
552a2(sha): bsad pa'i las la myur bar bshad// thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// yab yum gnyis su med pa yi// snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku//
552a3(sha): gang 'dod dngos grub myur bar bshad// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur bas// 'khor ba chos skur ro mnyam nas// ye shes 'khor lo brtan par
552a4(sha): bshad// lta spyod 'brel ba'i dbang bskur bso// rig pa rang la shar bar bshad// lus sems gnyis la dang skur bas// las kyi gshin rje pho mo
552a5(sha): dang // pho nya bran g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// las la nye ba'i dbang du bshad// dam tshig mna' yi snying po sbyin// thun mong phyi yi sbyor
552a6(sha): pa bstan// gcod pa'i rdzas kyi 'khor lo bca'// thun drug mtha' ru sbyin sreg gnan// phyi dang nang gi sgrub pa brtsamo// dur khrod rgyan gyi dbang
552a7(sha): du bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi dbang gi sbyor ba 'di bshad do// shin tu dben pa'i dur khrod du// 'du 'dzi dben
552b1(sha): pa'i sa rtags la// ting 'dzin bstan pa'i lha mo dang // rig pa'i rgyal po gnyis sbyar la// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba yis// lus dang yan lag/
552b2(sha): bsangs la dgram// gsum pas slob mas khrus nas gdon// bum pa gsum dang longs spyod dgram// thabs dang shes rab rdzas su bstan// yol
552b3(sha): pas ga cang la slob mas drang // dang por rdzas kyi bum pa ni// bkra shis mtshan ldan bum pa ru// bdud rtsi tshwa dang nyi zlas dgang // thugs kyi snying pos
552b4(sha): byin gyis brlabs// bdud rtsi chu dang bumu pas bkru// mgo la gshed bzhi'i bdag po bsgom// bkra shis rjes kyi bum par bshad// thabs kyi
552b5(sha): bum pa bde chen sku// 'khor lo drug gi rim rgyud la// byang chub bdud rtsi lam du drangs// thugs khar lha yi 'khor lo rtags// bde chen gnas
552b6(sha): nas mchod rgyun dbab// lus dang lha yi dkyil 'khor la// slob ma phyi yi 'jug pa brtsa ma// sems kyi dkyil 'khor kha phye la// 'khor lo rim
552b7(sha): gyis gso zhing rgyud// rdo rje gsang ba'i lam du drang // oM gyis bde ba'i lam du bskyil// rdo rje slob ma'i lus nyin la// bdud rtsi bsangs la dbang
553a1(sha): bskur bya// lce yi pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// ge sngar 'dren pa'i dza bsams la// bung ba me tog tshul du'o// nung gi rang
553a2(sha): rgyud 'khor lor bstan// ye shes bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo brtag/ bde chen nang gi bum par bshad// phyag rgya ma yi gsang ba la// dkyil 'khor bzhi
553a3(sha): dang ldan par brtag/ gzungs ma gtsang ma'i chus bkrus la// me tog bkram pa'i maN+Dal du// spro ba bskyod la gsung mtshan bsgrags// b+ha ga'i dbus
553a4(sha): su 'dab brgyad bskyed// pho brang lte bar gtso bo dgod// 'dab brgyad mdzes pa'i lha mor brtag/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor la// 'khor lo mi rgyud rtsa lam
553a5(sha): drang // bdag dang lha ru mnyam sbyar la// mi dmigs bde ba'i ro mnyam bskyil// thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// yab yum mnyes pa'i mcho
553a6(sha): rgyun 'khyil// bde ba chen po'i 'od du gnas// thabs kyi srin lag sbu gu nas// slob ma'i rtse la sems 'jog pa// nang gi bum dbang rdzogs
553a7(sha): pa yis// gzungs ma lha dang slob ma la// tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'byor pa 'bul// 'khor lo sems kyi rgyal po brten// shes rab bum pa'i
553b1(sha): dbang du bshad// bum pa gsum gyi brda brtan pas// mchog gi sbyor ba gsum dang ldan// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ thun mong gi dbang ba'i
553b2(sha): le'u ste brgya bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i dbang 'di bshad do// dgon pa chen po'i dben
553b3(sha): gnas su// 'dod pa'i longs spyod kun bshams nas// slob ma dbang gzhan rdzogs pa la// thabs mchog bde ba chen po yis// yum gyi pad+mo bde phab
553b4(sha): la// shes rab gsang mchog dam pa yis// ye shes bskyed pa'i dbang bskur bya// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ de la 'jug pa'i las
553b5(sha): tsam bya// rig ma sbyang dang sems bskyed tsam// phyag rgya mo yi brda bstan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis nyi shu'i bar// lhan cig skyes dang grogs mo dang //
553b6(sha): sman mo bu mos bya ba min// sems sbyang dag la sngags ngo shes// gsang thub bkra shis dal 'byor ldan// ut+pal ljon shing kha dog dbyibs// bde
553b7(sha): chen phyag rgya ma yi mchog/ lha yi lung bstan zhing skyed ma// sngags kyi byin brlabs byas pa ni// gshin rje sras kyi gzungs mar bstan//
554a1(sha): lha dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bskyed// dang por bde chen rdzogs pa yi// tshul du dbang gi sbyor ba bya// sbas pa'i 'jo
554a2(sha): lo gnyis brtags la// rtsa ba'i 'dab ma brgyad gnyis la// thabs la kA li 'bru bzhis bkang // shes rab A la 'bru gnyis bsnol// dbus kyi
554a3(sha): gsang lam chen po na// 'bru gsum sa bon sku gsung thugs// g.yas na chags pa'i 'bru gnyis rgyu// g.yon na bskyod pa'i 'bru gnyis rkyen//
554a4(sha): rtsa gsum rtse la gcig tu gnas// thabs kyi rang rgyud 'khor lo la// sku gsung thugs kyi drag sngags so// de sems mchog gi dkyil 'khor ro// ma
554a5(sha): tog ldan pa'i maN+Dal du// rgyan dang gos bskon dris byugs la// tshogs dang sna tshogs mchod pa bya// rang rang mos pa'i lha ru bskyed// rkyen gyi sbyor bas
554a6(sha): rdo rje gsor// dben pa'i gnas su yol bas gcad// gsol ba btab la pad+mas pa rtag/ b+ha ga brtsegs pa'i gzhal yas su// rdo rje slob ma gzhug
554a7(sha): par bya// sems kyi lha ngo bstan pa dang // mna' yi snying po gsang mtshan sbyin// dbang bskur dam pa mchog la sbyar// chags pa'i glu dang dga' ba'i
554b1(sha): gar// chags pa'i mtshan nyid 'phreng ba'i dbang // chu byung mtshan ma bkrus chu'i dbang // bag btsums smra bzung dbu rgyan dbang // pad+mar rdo bcug
554b2(sha): rdo rje'i dbang // de nyid bskyod pa dril bu'i dbang // dam tshig dbugs phyung ming gi dbang // bltas pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs dbang // sngags spa dril bu
554b3(sha): brtul zhugs dbang // gnyis med 'khyud pa phyag rgyar bshad// kha sprad dbugs dbyung dam pa'o// mnyam par gnas pa lung bstan yin// pad+ma
554b4(sha): bgo 'dzums phyir mi ldog/ rgyal chen bu dang bcas pa gnyis// dus mnyam yol ba sA bar du gcod// dbang gi sbyor ba thon pa dang // zhing rkyang nyi ma'i/
554b5(sha): khri stengs su// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// lha dang gzungs ma tshogs kyis mchod// snying po 'byin la lha ngo bstan// rang nyid lhag pa'i
554b6(sha): bstod pa bya// gsang ba'i 'khor lo thob pa yin// gsang ba'i dbang gi rim par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las gsang ba'i
554b7(sha): dbang gi le'u ste brgya bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi dbang 'di bshad do// thams
555a1(sha): cad chos sku bde ba'i dbang // chos nyid ma bcos rang bzhin gnas// sna tshogs sgyu ma lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med
555a2(sha): pa'i don bstan pas// sna tshogs chos rnams snang med stong // mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo ni// chos sems gnyis med ye shes sku// chos dang
555a3(sha): sems ni yai nas gnyis su med// phung po mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i sku// don gyi man ngag nges pa'i lung 'dir bshad// sku dang phyag rgya
555a4(sha): yig 'bru sngags tshig la// zhen pas rtag par 'dzin pa la// chos nyid rig pa ma skyes pa ru bshad// 'bras bu don la mi gnas
555a5(sha): 'chad par lte ba la// dkyil 'khor grangs dang sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // rgyan cha snang la rang bzhin med par bshad// mi gnas
555a6(sha): sku yi phyag rgya gsal bar bshad// mi g.yo gsung gi chos nyid gsal bar bshad// thugs kyi rang bzhin sna tshogs ngos gzung med//
555a7(sha): mnyam pa'i dbang thob rang sems don rtogs yin// sangs rgyas lhun grub mnyam pa'i rgyal por bshad// dug gsum mi spang rang bzhin
555b1(sha): spyad du med/ sra gsung thugs su spyan gyis grub pa'i dbang / gti mug mAM gnas chos kyi sku/ thung longs spyan
555b2(sha): rdzogs pa'i sku// 'dod chags len med sprul pa'i sku// phrag dog 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku// nga rgyal mngon par byang chub
555b3(sha): s+ya r+m+mAHm+bu na ba pa gasmang pa gas lasas// m+bu ga cig pa
555b4(sha): laM brgan ljang khru mtshon grang 'ad du 'khyil// dang ya ma nyi zla brtsegs pa la// sngags kyi 'od zer me skye nyi zer 'gro// snang srid kun
555b5(sha): bsregs 'od kyi gong bur thim// bkrag dang gzi mdangs ye shes lnga yi smra// snang med dbu ma'i bde ba chen po yi// mtshan dang dpe
555b6(sha): byad thams cad rgyan du rdzogs// sangs rgyas kun pas 'gres par mngon sangs rgyas// gshin rje'i rang bzhin mi gnas
555b7(sha): chos kyi sku// mnyam pa chen po bde ba'i dbang du bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bam chen
556a1(sha): glusang ba brtul zhugs rab 'byam gyi dbyung 'di bshad do// sems nyid dben pa'i bde gnas
556a2(sha): su/ rang sems mnyam pa'i rgyal po bstan/ thugs kyi sprul pa byugasu bcur spros/ dur khrod gnas nas bam
556a3(sha): chen blang // zhag gsum sngon 'gro khrus dang sbyar/ tsit+ta 'od kyi pho brang du/ gtso bo dang bcas wA ru
556a4(sha): brtag/ phung po khams dang skyid mched rnams// sha za 'khor sogs rdzogs par gnas// bsgrub pa'i gzhung
556a5(sha): btsan tshogs da gyur/ nyin gsum mtshan gsum 'byor pa dbul/ rag ta bdud rtsi mchod rgyun bi sham/
556a6(sha): bamachen dregs pa'i stobs kyis bsgral// sha khrag longs spyod mchod pa'i rdzas// slob ma stobs kyi lhar bskyed
556a7(sha): la/ tsit+ta gsang ba'i lha ngo bstan// rme ba lnga yi brtul zhugs bskur// drag po nye ba'i sngags dang sprad/
556b1(sha): yang na gsang ba'i gzungs ma la// bya ba sngon 'gro gong ma bzhin// tshogs dang mchod pa rgyun mi gcad// b+ha ga
556b2(sha): gsang ba'i pho brang du// gtso bo dang bcas lha rnams brtag/ rtsa lam rgyu la bde ba dbab// phyag rgya 'jug pa'i lha ngo bstan//
556b3(sha): me tog dkar dmar sems 'dres nas// mthing nag yol bas mtshams bcad nas// slob ma brtul zhugs nod par sgo/
556b4(sha): dpe gsum tshul gyis brtul zhugs sbyin// drag sngags dmod pa'i brtul zhugs basmra ba// gzhan du nyams pas gsang mi
