556b7(sha): nyams brtags// bam chen gsang ba'i dbang du bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las// dbang gi rtsa ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya bcu dgu
557a1(sha): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gshin rje gshed kyi tshad la sogs pa rdza bshad do// gshin rje'i tshad ni don dam kun rdzo
557a2(sha): gnyis// don dam 'gyur med dus gsum sangs rgyas sku// dpag tu med pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// kun rdzob drag po'i yi dwags rdzu 'phrul can// mi dge bcu yi sa yi dgas lus/
557a3(sha): su smin// gti mug mun pa'i nang nas khong khro dregs pas ldang // gnas lugs gnyis kyi 'khor 'das tshad du bya// ngo bo las kyi skabs dang ngo bo nyid kyi sku// las kyi sku gsung thugs
557a4(sha): kyi spyod pa'o// sku ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya cir yang snang // gsung ni khro bo rnga ma sgra lnga dang ldan// thugs ni sna tshogs 'phrul gyi mtshon cha bzhin// las kyi skabs kyis phye ba'i ngo bor
557a5(sha): bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku skye ba med// skye ba'i cho 'phrul snang la rang bzhin med// yon tan ye shes mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying po 'gyur pa med pa'i ngang las 'char// /
557a6(sha): dper na rin po che yi phyag rgya lta bur bshad// gnas ni phyi nang gsang ba'i dur khrod nas// lho phyogs phyi yi dur khrod me la yaM// skye med byang chub sems kyi dur khrod
557a7(sha): nas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i pho brang dur khrod gnas// don dam chos kyi pho brang la// 'gyur ba med pa'i ye shes gnas par bshad// phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyi rgya
557b1(sha): stan pa// phyi yi khro bo dregs pa'i rgyan// dur khror chas dgu yon tan dgu dang ldan// 'jam dpal sku la mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan// byang chub sems la rnam shes du mas
557b2(sha): brgyan// b+ha ga'i pho brang pad+ma'i thig les brgyan// chos nyid mi 'gyur don gyi phyag rgya la// ye shes rang 'byung gsal ba'i phyag rgyas brgyan// rigs 'dzin phyag rgya bgrod ra
557b3(sha): dbang gis brgyan// gshin rje grong khyer rgyan dang ldan par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ gshin rje'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu pa'o//
557b4(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo'i dbye ba 'di bshad do// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lo dang /
557b5(sha): las rnams 'grub pa'i 'khor lo'o// rang rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lo gnyis// thabs dang shes rab 'khor lo'o// ngo bo thabs kyi 'khor lo gnyis// gnyug mar
557b6(sha): gnas pa'i 'khor lo dang // dregs pa gnas pa'i 'khor lo'o// gnyug mur gnas pa'i chos sku la// log par zhen pa'i don med 'khrul// bag chags stug po'i
557b7(sha): las zad 'khor// lung gi rgyal po gdon rnams dang // sna tshogs snang ba chos sku'o ngang // shugs snang longs spyod sprul mtha' yas// ngo bo thabs kyis 'khor yor
558a1(sha): bshad// dregs pa 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// sna tshogs srid pa'i 'khor lo dang // lhun grub gnas pa'i 'khor lo'o// ngo bo mnyam nyid kun 'dus
558a2(sha): la/ rgyu rkyen bya btsal mtha' las 'das// bde chen lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu rkyen du mar bzung bas 'khrul// snang stong gnyis med ye shes la// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i blo yis
558a3(sha): 'khru la// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la// bzang ngan 'dzin rtog zhen pas 'khrul// sna tshogs sgyu ma lhun grub la// yang dag shes par 'dzin pas 'khrul// thabs rnams ye shes
558a4(sha): rol pa las// gnyen po gzhan rten spong len 'khrul// srid pa'i 'khor lo dbye bar bshad// lhun grub gnas pa'i 'khrul 'khor ni// drag po sngags kyi rten gyi gnas// srid pa'i ru sbal lto /
558a5(sha): gnas/ rtsa bzhi dngas ma'i ye shes la// nga bdag rten 'brel 'byung bas 'khrul// rgyu bzhi rkyen du ldang ba la// sbyor ba'i rtsol ba rang 'ching 'khrul// rtsa sbubs las kyis gcod pa la//
558a6(sha): sngon 'gro'i sbyor bas rtsom pas 'khrul// 'byung ba chos skar thim pa la// thun zor mtshon brdeg rtsol bas 'khrul// rtsa bran yon tan lhun grub la// sbyor ba gzhan dbang rten pa
558a7(sha): 'khrul// tshe srog dril bsdu sngon byas la// pho nya 'gugs 'dren byed pas 'khyal// sku gsum snang ba ye shes la// gzhan la brten pa khams gsum 'khor// lhun grub 'khrul
558b1(sha): 'khor gyi dbye bar bshad// shes rab rang rgyud 'khor lo yang // gnas pa rang las 'char ba drug/ bde chen longs spyod chos dang sprul// rjes su 'jug dang gsang ba drug/ bde ba chen
558b2(sha): po bcu gsum gnyis// dbus na snying po haM gnyis ldan// 'dab ma ka li'i 'bru yis dgang // spyi bo tshangs pa'i mgo la gnas// longs spyod brgyad gnyis lte rtsabs dbus//
558b3(sha): A li bcu drug kA bA tsi// sbubs na shes rab 'bru yis dgang // mgrin pa bskyod pa'i lam la gonas// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// brgyad dbus dngas ma bzhi dang
558b4(sha): 'brel// dbus nas sa bon nam mkha' hUM// yon tan drAg sngags du mas dgod// tsit+ta rin po che la rtun// sprul pa rgya mdud 'khor lo ni// bcu drug bzhi yi dbus na/
558b5(sha): oM/ nus pa rgyu yi yig 'brus dgang // rin po che yi rdzing la brtan// rdo rje gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni// bcu bzhi 'dab mo'i da bus na raM// bod pa gsum gyi yig 'brus
558b6(sha): dgang // rdo rje gsang ba'i mtshams la brten// rjes su 'jug pa'i 'khor lo ni// drug gis bgrod pa'i sI rA ti// ra ma ya yi 'bru yis dgang // thig le rten la srog
558b7(sha): shing tshul// steng sgo 'og sgo'i sbyor ba yis// 'them 'grib srog sbyong tha zas dang ldan// shes rab sbyor ba'i 'khor lo yang // rkyen dang ldan pas 'bras bu skyed// rang gnas
559a1(sha): bsam gtan rten 'brel ni// rang rgyud gnas pa'i 'khor lor bshad// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gsum du bshad// rnal ma drag po nA ga'o// rnal ma'i
559a2(sha): 'khor lo gsum du bshad// gshini rje yab kyi 'khor lo dang // ro langs ma yi 'khor lo dang // gsang ba gshed kyi 'khor lo'o// gshin rje yab kyi 'khor lo la//
559a3(sha): dbusun rtsa yi 'khrul mig lnga// gsung mdzod gshed kyi sun khang bya ni// bcu gnyis 'khrul mig me dpal gshed// yang logs bcu drug ba ton stobs// phy-i
559a4(sha): shu gcod dang gnon// lto sbyor dril gtor gnyis su bya// rtsa ba gcig la yal ga stong // rno dpal mtshon cha'i rgyal po ni// stobs dang yab kyi 'khor lor bshad//
559a5(sha): ro langs 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// thun mong dang ni khyad par ro// thun mong 'khor lo bzhi ru bshad// mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa'i 'khor lo dang // sbyin thang 'phrul
559a6(sha): kyi 'khor lo dang // gdong mo snying gi 'khor lo dang // nag mo thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad// khyad par mkha' 'gro brtsegs pa la// tsitA gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o//
559a7(sha): de dag ro langs nag mo yi// mi 'gyur spogs pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gshed bzhi'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// nus pa bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dang // rang rang gnad
559b1(sha): kyi 'khor lo'o// nus pa gshed kyi 'khor lo bzhi// srog gshed gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang // lo thog gzhom pa'i 'khor lo dang // sde brgyad dkrug pa'i 'khor lo dang //
559b2(sha): 'bru gcig ya yi 'khor lo rnams// las kyi rgyal po sgrub pa ste// gsang ba gshed kyi 'khor lor bshad// rang gnad 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dag/ dbye ba bcu gnyis
559b3(sha): dag tu bshad// dregs pa las la sbyor ba ni// khyab 'jug nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// dregs chen bran du bkol ba ni// gnod sbyin nag po'i 'khor lor bshad//
559b4(sha): gnam the srog la 'bebs pa ni// sems dpa' dkar po 'khor lor bshad// gying chen gnad la dbab pa ni// gsang ba'i gling chen 'khor lor bshad// thoms pas
559b5(sha): khram la gdab pa ni// nag po bdud kyi 'khor lor bshad// gnyen po las la mngag pa ni// za byed srin po'i 'khor lor bshad// myos pa'i khrag la dbab pa ni// khram
559b6(sha): kha nag mo'i 'khor lor bshad// lha srin stongs su gdab pa ni// dmu bdud nag po'i 'khor lor bshad// gzhan yang gnad la dbab pa ni// rang gshed bzlog pa'i 'khor
559b7(sha): lor bshad// gnod sbyin pa nang nas mngag pa ni// bgegs kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lor bshad// srungs can stobs dang bral ba ni// sprul pa gyad kyi 'khor lor bshad//
560a1(sha): gdug pa'i mtshon cha de rnams la// phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bshad// gang bsgrub gcig la'ang gsum du bshad// rtogs pa gnas
560a2(sha): 'gyur lha yi 'khor lo dang // sbyor ba rten 'byed rdzas kyi 'khor lo dang // dngas snyigs 'byed pa sngags kyi 'khor lo'o// de dag gzugs brnyan phyi yi 'khor lor
560a3(sha): bshad// de las bzlog pa'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// bsnyen pa ye shes rang gnas 'khor lo dang // gsod byed gdug pa dgra yi 'khor lo dang // gnan pa gdug
560a4(sha): pa thod pa'i 'khor lo'o// bsnyen pa'i 'khor lo gnas pa gnyis su bshad pa dang // bsam gtan phyag rgya lus kyi 'khor lo dang // bsam gtan tsit+ta gsang ba
560a5(sha): 'khor lo'o// gdug pa dgra yi 'khor lo gsum du bshad// gnad dgu 'joms pa yi ge'i 'khor lo dang // drag pos gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo dang // gnas bzhin
560a6(sha): gcod pa mtshon cha 'khor lo'o// gnan pa thod pa'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// snying po bcud la bsdus pa'i 'khor lo dang // dregs pa stobs kyis gnan pa'i
560a7(sha): 'khor lo dang // thod pa log then sbyor ba'i 'khor lo'o// man ngag gsang ba thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad// gcod pa sngags kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// thun mo
560b1(sha): dang ni khyad par 'khor lo'o// thun mong sbyor ba'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// dbang sdud gtad khram thod pa'i 'khor lo dang // thun mong bsrung ba'i gzugs brnyan 'khor lo//
560b2(sha): drag sngags dbang sdud sbyor ba'i 'khor lor bshad// khyad par 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su bshad// tshe bdag gab pa'i 'khor lo dang // sbyor ba dril ba'i 'khor lo'o// sbyor ba dril
560b3(sha): ba'i 'khor lo no// mu khyud drug dang ldan pa la// thugs kha ra ru sbal raM yaM e// rtsa ba bzhi yi sbubs na gshed po bzhi// rtsa bran brgyad la klu chen brgyad// yang logs rtsa
560b4(sha): 'dab nyi shu bzhi// sreg cing 'joms pa'i sbyor ba drug dang ldan// lnga pa rtsa yi 'dab ma bcu gnyis drug/ thugs kyi 'bru gnyis sgrub pa'i bdun dang bcu// sngags kyis bskyon/
560b5(sha): te dug lnga'i 'bru dang ldan// drug pa 'dus pa'i 'dab ma bcu gnyis la// snying gzer lnga dang gsad pa'i 'bru bdun pa// sbyor ba byi na bcu drug mtha' ru rdzogs// ru sbal snyi
560b6(sha): kha lte ba gsang ba ru// me rlung sbyin 'dang 'bru gnyis e dang ldan// gshed po bzhi yi lto ba na// dngas ma bzhi yi 'khor lo gnas// sa khams gsang ba'i 'khor lo la// 'phrul
560b7(sha): mig bdun cu rtsa dgu pa// gsod cing gnon pa'i sngags kyis dgang // rlung khams bshig pa'i 'khor lo na// 'phrul mig brgya dang nyi shu gnyis// gzhan gshig stobs kyis
561a1(sha): 'bru yis dgang // me khams bsregs dang snying gzer klu// 'khrul mig drug cu rtsa lnga pa// 'bru rnams sbyor ba gsum gyis dgang // chu khams
561a2(sha): 'bras bu 'joms pa ni// 'khrul mig bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la// 'bras bu rtsi thog 'joms pa yi// drag po sngags kyi 'bru yis gang // thun mong bsnyen pa la bstan nas
561a3(sha): las kyi mtha' ru sbyor ba ni// las kyi gshin rje'i lto ni gnas// dbang sdud sngags kyi 'khor lor bshad// tshe bdag gab pa'i 'khor lo gsum du bshad// khyad par
561a4(sha): gnas pa lus kyi 'khor lo dang // sbyor ba sna tshogs grub pa'i 'khor lo dang // rtsa ba drag po khyad par 'khor lor bshad// lus kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bdun pa la// thugs ka dag
561a5(sha): na drag po stobs chen gnyis// stobs can thugs kar srid pa'i ru sprul gnas// rtsa bzhi dang sa mar kri ka ta bzhir bsnol// lte bzhi rgyas pa'i 'khrul mig chen po la// rgyan
561a6(sha): gyi yig 'bru bcu gsum stobs chen phyi nas 'char// ba dag skyobs ltas bzlog sbyor ba gnyis dang ldan// 'khrul mig dbang drag gcod pa'i 'bru brgyad brten// gshed bzhi
561a7(sha): lton gnon sreg gshegs dang 'joms// gzhan gyi sbyor ba bzhi dong bcu par ldan// rang rgyud tsho bdag lta na gnas pa ste// khyad par srid pa'i 'khor lo dag tu bshad// gab
561b1(sha): pa'i 'khor lo phan gnod gnyis su bshad// bsad pa'i 'khor lo gcod dang gnon pa gnyis// gsad pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud gsum dang ldan// rtsibs bdun spu gri'i rtsibs
561b2(sha): dgu rtsa ba'i sngags// gnan pa'i 'khor lo steng la mu khyud bzhi// dbus na rgya gram phyi rim sbrul bzhi bsnol// gsum par thod pa bzhi par ma raM sngags//
561b3(sha): 'og ma gru gsum bzhi le sbrul brgyad bsnol bas bsdams// de bzhin rigs bzhi'i sbrul dang me ri rAM// gsad pa drag po gab pa'i 'khor lor bshad//
561b4(sha): sbyor ba'i 'khor lo gab pa bzhi ru bshad// gdug pa 'joms pa'i 'khor lo dgang // yab yum gseng ba mkha' la gnas// 'bru brgyad lus la spu rmi
561b5(sha): gdags// snying gzer gdug pa'i 'khor lor bshad// gshig pa dug lnga'i 'khor lo ni// me rlung gsang ba rtsa la gnas// 'khrul mig rtswa ba
561b6(sha): rtsibs la mtshon// sbyor ba gshig pa'i 'khor lo sa// 'byung ba lnga yi lo tog 'joms// phyi yi shu lo ka la gnas// rta ma dbab pa'i 'khor lo gnyis//
561b7(sha): lo tog gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// tshogs brgyad 'gyur ba'i 'khor lo ci// gsang lam bgrod pa'i rtsa la gnas// ltas ngan bcu yi 'khor por bshad// khyad par tsa ba'i 'khor lo gsum du ba
562a1(sha): drag po sngon phyung gsod pa'i 'khor lo dang // srog bzhi dril ba ser ba'i 'khor lo dang // sbyor ba sna tshogs srung ba'i 'khor lo'o// drag pos gsad pa'i 'khor lo
562a2(sha): gnyis su bshad// pho mos lto sbyar bdud kyi 'khor lo dang // drag po sngags dgod stobs kyi 'khor lo'o// drag po stobs kyi 'khor lo thun mong khyad par gnyis// thun mong gsad pa'i 'khor lo gnyis
562a3(sha): su bshad// ye shes 'khor lo las kyi 'khor lo gnyis// ye shes 'khor lo sbyor ba gsum du bshad// mu khyud gsum pa'i dbus na chags pa'i ru sbal mo// gru bzhi rgyas pa de bzhin zla kham dbang // rtsib
562a4(sha): dang 'khrul mig drag po nyi shu bzhi// srid pa'i ru sbal lto na mtshon cha gnas// yan lag lnga dang lto gnyis mjug ma nas// zhe sdang gdug pa'i sbrul brgyad stobs kyis 'byung // rtsa ba drag po gsad
562a5(sha): pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud drug pa'i dbus na drag po bla sems 'chang // 'khrul mig bzhi dang brgyad las rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen bcu bzhi spu gri gsum gyis gang // thod 'phreng
562a6(sha): gdug pa'i ra ba ru sbal lto na gnas// yang gsang gsad pa mchog gi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa'i dbus na gru gsum ming // rim pa gnyis la bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsibs chen
562a7(sha): nyi shu gnyis la spu gri lnga// gdug pa'i rA ba ru sbal lton rdzogs// drag po nye bar gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga ldan gru gsum rtsibs bzhi brgyad// sbrul dang thod rlon 'phreng ba me
562b1(sha): ri ru sbal lhor// rgyu la blon stobs bcad bsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyu bzhi pa gru gsum rtsibs bcu gnyis// khor yug lto sdebs 'khru la mige rgya gram mtshon// rtsa ba spu gr-i
562b2(sha): lholto na gnas// rtsa ba sbyor ba'i gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa drag po'i 'khrul mig bzhi// phyi rim rtsa bzhi rtsa 'dab bzhi dang ldan// 'khrul mig brgya dang sbrul bzhi ru
562b3(sha): sbal lhor// rnal mo bsad pa bsam gtan 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa gru gsum rtsibs bzhi brgyad// 'khru la mig bcu bzhi sprul bzhi bsnol mar bsdams// srid pa'
562b4(sha): lto bar dkrug pa'i 'khor lor bshad// las kyi 'khor lo mu khyud bzhi dang ldan// gru gsum zla kham 'khrul mig spu gri bzhi// bcu drug lcags khar rtsa ba'i sngags te sbrul/
562b5(sha): / ru sbal lto na rnal ma'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum zla kham gsum// 'khrul mge bcu drug de bzhin rtsi bis bcu drug/ ru sbal yan lag bsgrub bya bcu gsuma'o//
562b6(sha): dkrug gsad pa drag po'i 'khor lor bshad// khyad par gsad pa'i 'khor lo bcu ru bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa ru sbal lhon gnas// gru gsum sku yi gzugs brnyan zla kham srung
562b7(sha): ba'i lha// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsa sngags 'khor yug sgrub pa'i sngags// 'khrul mig bcu drug gu ru spu gris 'joms// seng ge khog pa gshig pa'i 'khor lor bshad/
563a1(sha): 'khrul mig lnga la thod pa sbrul gyi mtshams// lcags mkhar bzhi dang gru gsum 'khrul mig brgyad// 'khor yug de bzhin 'khrul mig nyi shu pa// rdo rje rma
563a2(sha): 'thab gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa phyogs bzhir ljags mkhar bzhi bzhi ldan// gsang mdzod bzhi dang dbus na snying po ming // 'khrul mig nyi shu phyi dang yang logs
563a3(sha): bzhi bcur gnas// drag sngags sbyor ba lnga yis mdzes par gang // drag sngags gnam lcags 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum zla kham brgyad// 'khrul mi ge
563a4(sha): bcu gnyis mu khyud rtsibs bcu drug/ seng ge mche sbyar stobs kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa 'khrul mig bcu gnyis ldan// phyi rom khor yug de bzhin rtsibs bcu
563a5(sha): drug/ stag mo kha thab gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa gru gsum ling ka ming // zla kham phyi nang sbrul gnyis ra bas bskor// 'khor mig bcu gnyis rgya gram
563a6(sha): rtsibs bcu drug/ pho nya bzlog pa gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa gru gsum zla kham dbus// rgya gram snying pos 'khrul mig gsum gsum ldan// rdo rje'i rwa
563a7(sha): brgyad 'khrul mig gnyis gnyis ldan// ru sbal lto ru kha sbyor ming rus bsdu// dril las gsad pa dbab pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi pa gru gsum gsang mdzod bzhi//
563b1(sha): phyogs bzhi lcags mkhar bzhi la 'khrul mig gsum gsum ldan// de yi phyi rim rdo rje rgyu gram mdzes// rtsibs chen bcu bzhi sbrul gdug rA bas bsdams// thams cad dril
563b2(sha): te gsad pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa tshangs thig bzhi dang ldan// 'khrul mig bzhi brgyad drag po gsang mdzad lnga// phyi rim lcags mkhar nyi shu bzhi ru gnas//
563b3(sha): yang logs khor yug lto sbyar sgrub pa'i sngags// mtha' ma 'khrul mig nyi shu spu gri'i gnas// lto sbyar gab pa thugs kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa sa yi
563b4(sha): 'khor lor bca'// dbus su gru gsum khe khyer gsum dang ldan// zla kham phyi nang rdo rje rgyu grum mdzes// de yi phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gnyis gnas// thod pa'i 'phreng ba
563b5(sha): me ris ru sbal lto bar bca'// drag pos gsad pa mchog gi mtha' sdud yin// drag po sngon phyung sbyor ba'i rgyal po las// sbyin sreg gdug pas gsad pa'i 'khor
563b6(sha): lor bshad// lto sbyar bdud kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// gsade pa mchog dang lo thog gzhom pa'o// mu khyud brgyad ldan rol gri rdo rje'i mchu// mtshams kyi
563b7(sha): bas bcad pa 'a khrul mo gi bzhi ba cu dgu// srog gcod pho mos bdud kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyung lnga pa tshangs thig gnyis// zung glig gnyis ldan 'phrul tshig ba
564a1(sha): thig bzhi mnan pas phyi log brgyad// yang logs bcu gnyis rtsibs dang ldan// de bzhin mtha' mar bcu drug rtsibs bcud kyi sbyor ba drag po yis//
564a2(sha): lo tog 'joms pa'i 'khor lor bshad// drag po bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gnyis su bshad// gdug pa bsrung dang sbyor ba bsrung ba'o// sbyor ba kun bsrung 'khor lo bdun du
564a3(sha): bshad// byas pa bshig dang zhen pa bzlog/ zug pa dbyung dang gsang lam 'gag/ thams cad gzir dang dug mda' dbyung // byad dgrol gsang ba'i 'khor lo'o//
564a4(sha): mu khyud bzhi pa dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bzhi brgyad rtsibs bcu gnyis// rdo rje klu bzhi zhing rgyang brgyad// ru sbal ljon rdzogs par gnas// byas pa gshig
564a5(sha): pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum dbus gru gsum bzhi// rtsibs bcu khor yug b+h+yo yis gang // zhen pa bzlog pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa ru
564a6(sha): sbal ltor// gru gsum gnam lcags rtsibs bcu gnyis// phyi rim rtsibs chen bcu gsum pa// zug pa dbyung ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus zhi
564a7(sha): ba'i gnas// rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsa ba'i lus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis spu gri mtshon// gsang lam dgag pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus dbang drag
564b1(sha): gnam// lcags mkhar brgyad dang bcu drug 'obs// mtha' ma bcu drug spu gri'i gnas// thams cad gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi ldan dbus zlum drag/
564b2(sha): rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad rtsibs bcu gnyis// snying po sngags bcas steng du bca'// khor yug drag sngags sbrul chun me// 'og mar+ya bcas la kha sbyar dkrug/ dug
564b3(sha): mda' dbyung ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa sa la bri// gru gsum kha khyer gsum dang ldan// zla khaM ma phyi nang thod pas bskor// rtsi bas chen bcu gnyis me
564b4(sha): ri 'bar// sa yi 'khor lo brnag pa'i rten// de bzhin gru gsum rgya gram yaM// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs bcu drug/ mtha' ma gru gsum me ri raM/ bar snang 'khor
564b5(sha): lo stobs dpag med// byad dgram gsang ba'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum ldan gru gsum dbus// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs bcu drug/ las kyi tshe
564b6(sha): bdag mgo dgu pa'i// btsan thabs gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// gdug pa bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yang // gsang ba'i rgyud 'dir bdun du bshad// mu khyud gsum
564b7(sha): pakru gsum dbus// rtsibs chen bcu gnyis bcu bzhi phyi// gdug pa lto dkrug 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum pa ru t+pa la lhor// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis
565a1(sha): sbubs bdun// gru gsum brgyad ldan zla kham gsum// snying gzer bdun pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud drug pa ru sbrul lhor// dbus su
565a2(sha): gru gsum zla kham sprul// thod mkhar bzhi la rdo rje mtshams// rgya gram brgyad dang rabs sbrul// rtsa sbubs nyi shu rtsa gcig me// snyed gzer nyi shu'i 'khor lor bshad//
565a3(sha): mu khyud lnga pa dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bzhi brgyad rtsa ba'i sngags// rtsa sbubs rgyu la snying por mtshon// rtsibs su bcu drug shi phrad sngags// snying gzer dgu pa'i
565a4(sha): 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi dbus gru gsum bzhi// phyogs bzhir 'phrul mig gsum gsum gnas// gsang mdzod bzhi la gdug pa'i gzugs// mu khyud klu gnyanas
565a5(sha): ba dag gzugs// rtsu sbubs bcu gcig sbyor ba'i sngags// snying gzer shai phrad 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud lnga pa'i dbus gru gsum// 'khrul mig bcu gnyis rtsibs
565a6(sha): nyi shu// thod pa dang ni mo raM ldan// sbyin sreg sa yi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud de bzhin dbus gru gsum// kha khyer gsum la gdug pa'i gdug/ zla kham gzugs brnyan
565a7(sha): rtsibs bcu gnyis// phyi rim nyi shu ba zhi yi rtsibs// yang logs khor yug thod par rdzas// mtha' ma me ri sreg pa'i 'od// drag po mtha' sdud 'khor lor bshad// lo thog
565b1(sha): gzhom pa'i 'khor lo ni// mu khyud gsum pa rus sbal dbus// ru sbal yan lag mjug ma dang // lto gnyis dag nas 'byung ba yi// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu gnyis
565b2(sha): phyi rim 'khrul mig bcu gnyis la// srog bzhi ga nad kyi snying po 'du// srog bzhi gzir ba'i 'khor lor bshad// de dag drug po'i sngags dgod kyis// 'khor lo rgyal po dbye
565b3(sha): bar bshad// sde brgyad gnad kyi 'khor lo yang // dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// mu khyud gsum pa tshangs thig bzhi// 'khrul mig sum cu rtsa gsum pa// gsad pa drag
565b4(sha): po'i 'khor lo re bshad// mu khyud de bzhin 'khrul mig sngags// bzhi brgyad bcu gnyis bcu drug la// lo tog gzhom pa'i 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud de bzhin tshad
565b5(sha): thig bzhi// le'u tshe dgu la rtsa ba'i sngags// phyi dang yang logs zur bzhi thig/ bsnyams pas le'u tshe nyi shu bzhi// bar du snying po 'bru re la// gang dmigs ming dang
565b6(sha): spu gris bskor// mtha' ma spu gri 'byin pa'i 'bru// sde brgyad cham la dbab pa yi// drag po gnad kyi 'khor lor bshad// gdug pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru bshad// sdig
565b7(sha): bi lus kyi 'khor lo dang // sa rba dag srog gi 'khor lo dang // klu bdud sbrul gyi 'khor lo dang // mdzen las kyi 'khor lo'o// yum dang yan lag rwa gnyis la// sbyor
566a1(sha): thun mong gnan pa ni// sdig pa'i lus kyi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gnyis dbus gru gsum ming // rtsibs bzhi rtsibs brgyad drag po'i 'bru//
566a2(sha): sa bdag srog gi 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud gsum la tshangs thig bzhi// 'khrul mig bzhi la gru gsum sbrul// gsang mdzod bzhi la ru sprul bzhi// phyi rim 'khrul
566a3(sha): mig bcu gnyis la// las kyi rdo rje'i dbus na sprul// mtha' ma'i 'khrul mig bcu drug la// sbrul gyi ra ba gru gsum sngags// 'khrul mig sum cu rtsa bdun pa// klu
566a4(sha): bdud sbrul nug 'khor lor bshad// mu khyud bzhi la sbrul gyis bskor// tshangs thig bzhi dang zur thig bzhi// 'khrul mig sum cu rtswa gnyis la// drag po'i mtha' ma
566a5(sha): gdug pa'i gzugs// mtha' ma gsang sngags dbus snying po// mdze nad las kyi 'khor lor bshad// las ni gsod dang bsrung zhing 'joms// gnan pa la sogs
566a6(sha): rtsa ba bzhi// yan lag stong dang drug cur bshad// grangs dang dbye ba brgya dang bcu// yan lag 'khor lo rnam grangs stong // las kyis skabs kyi du mar 'gyur// thun
566a7(sha): mong bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gsum// ma rtogs rtogs par dka' ba'i 'khor lo gcig/ 'khor lo rtsa ba nyis brgya rdzogs par bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las
566b1(sha): 'khor lo gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi dbye ba 'di bshad do// yul dang shes pa
566b2(sha): spro ba gsum// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas 'gyur pas// gsang ba sngags kyi sbyor ba la// rig pa gsum du shes par bya// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags so// yul ni dmigra/
566b3(sha): pa dang po ste// khro bo khro mo dregs pa'o// shes pa srog gi snying po la// spro ba rig pa'i rtsa la sbyong ba// ngo bo kun gyi rtsa ba ni// skye ba med pa'i sems nyid do// gnas pa bdag/
566b4(sha): gzhan thams cad la// 'gyur ba yon tan 'phel 'grib byed// gsang ba bgrod pa med pa la// sngags kyi sbyor ba bstan pa ni// dbang lnga'i bgrod pa thob pa la// rig pa sngon dang /
566b5(sha): phyis 'byung ba// sdebs kyi sbyor ba shes pa'o// gsang ba srog gi snying po la// sngags ni sbyor ba'i rkyen rnams so// srog gi snying po gsum du bshad// rang bzhin gsang ba'i
566b6(sha): srog gi snying po dang // dgug pa rang dbang med par srog gi snying po dang // nus pa spro ba srog gi snying po'o// bde gshegs 'dus pa sprul pa'i sras// khro bo rgyal po
566b7(sha): gshin rje dang // ma mo sha za mkha' 'gro bdud// srin po ka ma~M ka ma gnod sbyin klu// rgyal po dkor srungs srog bdag gzang // kun gyi thugs dang sems kyi bcud// dngas
567a1(sha): ma snying po 'bru gsum po// skye ba med pa'i chos nyid la// cho 'phrul srog gi snying po 'byung // srog gi dngas ma 'dzin pa yin// 'byung ba snang med
567a2(sha): rang bzhin stong // 'bru gcig snying po a zhes bshad// snying po pyod pa'i dang po ni// skye ba'i tshe 'phrul bstan pa ste// ya dang ma las byung ba'o// yod dang med pa'i mtha'
567a3(sha): dang / rang bzhin snang stong dbyer med pas// ngo bo 'gyur ba med pa'i don// rang bzhin srog gi snying por bshad// dgug pa lha dang bsgrub bya ste// lha dang dgug pa gsum du bshad
567a4(sha): bdag lus dmigs pa'i tsit+ta nas// rin po che yi sgro phye la// dngas ma'i hUM las dza 'phros pas// yab yum bcas pa'i thugs ka ru// rang rang sku gsung thugs kyi sngags
567a5(sha): bskul zhing bzlas pas slar 'dus nas// bdag gi lus ni 'od kyi tshul// gong bu 'dus pa'i gzi mdangs kyis// byin rlabs sprul pa'i bdag por bstan// sngon du 'gro ba'i
567a6(sha): bsnyen par bshad// ya yi sa bon spros pa las// dregs pa pho mo'i snying kha nas// nyi zla'i gdan la 'byung ba yi// ya ma'i snying po rang sngags bskul// bzlas pas lus dang
567a7(sha): shes rab bcas// gnas dang phral nas mngon du bkug/ phyag 'tshal snying po lag cha ston// dmigs pa'i las rnams mtha' ru bsgrub// las la sbyar ba'i bsnyen par bshad// phyag rgya
567b1(sha): bstan pa'i thugs ka nas// ya dang ma las rgyu blangs la// sngon du 'gro ba'i lus nyid las// dgug pa gsum gyi yan lag btags// snying khrag 'dus nas dbang du 'gyur//
567b2(sha): rang dbang bsdu ba'i bsnyen par bshad// bsgrub bya dgug pa'i snying po gnyis// pho nya bskul gyin las sngags la// 'bru bdun a mo ka dang sbyar// bzlas pas dmigs pa'i snying
567b3(sha): kha nas// lcags kyu zhags pas 'khrigs pa yi// dbang po rten dang bcas nas dgug/ yang na lha dang phral nas 'gugs// yang na gnas rten yul mkhar mgugs// mngag
567b4(sha): pa srog 'gugs sbyor bar bshad// khro bo thugs kyi snying po la// bcu bzhi'i mtshams su a mu ka/ sbyar na drag tu stong bzlas pas// dmigs pa'i lha dang lus phye nas//
567b5(sha): dkar na ga tsit+ta'i go na ma sgo nas// 'od zer chu la chu thim ltar// dngas snyigs hUM dang ni bsdus nas// ze la lcags na 'dus pa'i tshul// tsit+te'i sbubs nas 'bru gnyis
567b6(sha): bton// mtshon cha'i gnas su dbye dgug gsod// snying po dgug pa'i sbyor bar bshad// de ltar 'od dang 'od bzhi'i tshul// dgug pa srog gi snying por bshad// bdag dang lha
567b7(sha): yi 'phro 'du yis// dman pa'i rgyu dang shes pa las// nus pa spro ba'i snying po ste// gsang ba srog gi snying por bshad// gzungs sngags don ni bzhi ru bshad// srog dang
568a1(sha): dbang po rtog pa dang // shes pa gzung ba'i sngags rnams so// srog la dngas ma gzhug pa dang // snyigs ma gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// 'bru/
568a2(sha): ba'i dngas ma kun bsdus nas// thig le 'dzin pa'i 'bru gcig ni// dngas mu gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// rtsa lam khrag dang bcas pa yi// rtsa sgo sbubs nas 'bru bton
568a3(sha): nas/ 'gro ba'i snying po srog bsdus te// thod pa'i bcud la sbyor ba ni// snyigs ma gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// dug gsum bya sbrul khyi pag la// bla rtags sprul pa'o/
568a4(sha): khams btags nas// 'bru bzhi sbyor bas 'dzin cing 'joms// rtog pa gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// tshogs drug dbang po 'bru drug gis// sgro 'gags shes pa mi gto//
568a5(sha): 'dzin// dbang po gzung ba'i sngags su bshad// shes pa drug gam brgyad bsdus nas// 'bru gcig don dang nam mkhar dbye// dngas mu thig ler 'dzin pas na// shes pa gzu
568a6(sha): paba'i sngags su bshad// gnad dgu'i sbyor ba ma shor bas// don cig tshul gyis gzungs sngags bshad// rig sngags dmod pa'am mtshon cha ste// las kyi skabs kyi du mar
568a7(sha): sbyar// sngon du 'gro ba'i dus dang tshad// lo yi skor phyed dag tu bya// lha yi lung bstan sku mthong ngam// rang lus yan lag sgra byung na// dam rdzas tshogs dang gtor ma dgang //
568b1(sha): sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ste// gang rung gcig tu ngag blo sbyangs// dam tshig gsum dang mi 'brel bas// ldan pa'i rnal 'byor rdzogs par bshad// las la sbyor ba'i dus
568b2(sha): dang tshad// lo phyed lus kyi dben gcad la// zhing chen ro ras stag lpags bgo/ myos byed rag ta bdud rtsi btung // sha chen dang ma dbang po bza'// dung rnga gling bu rdza rnga rdung//
568b3(sha): bam chen gsur chen rmebs mchod// bton mi bya zhing las mi gzur// phyag mi btsal zhing lung mi bstan// gzungs ma rten gyi na gzhan mi sbyar// kha zas yul dang
568b4(sha): bdud rtsir sbyar// me dang rlung gi 'khor lo bskyed// khro bo dka' thub rdzogs par bsrung // dben gnas chen po gsum du bya// bris sku dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas// mchog
568b5(sha): gsum tshang ba'i bde gnas su// khro gtum rngam tshig bde gnas su// khro gtum rngam tshig rang lus sbyar// 'gyur ldeg me 'bar 'chad dang kho la// du ba 'phar ba rdzas dang sbyar/
568b6(sha): 'od sgra g.yo 'gul gnas dang sbyar// ma rdzogs las rtsom don med yal// las la tshud pa'i sbyor ba ste// gshin rje'i dka' thub rdzogs pa ra bshad// zla phyed dus kyi bsnye/
568b7(sha): ba ni// srog bdud yam dbang du bsdu// spyugs klu'i 'o dod cho nges gdab// rag brlab cing 'khur ba bud// dbang po bsdus shing gzugs la dbab// nus pa dbang du 'dus
569a1(sha): bar bshad// gsad pa'i sngags ni gang rung sbyar// gnan pa dgu bskor spyi brdeg sbyar// skabs skabs thun drug gshen 'debs bya// rnal mas gsad
569a2(sha): pa'i sngags su bshad// spogs pa'i sngags rnams ru zlog la// rgya log sgyur na 'gugs shing gcod// lus gcig yan lag du mas 'grub// sngags kyi yon tan brgya dang
569a3(sha): gsum// drag sngags rtsa ba yan lag gnyis// sngags kyi rtsa ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// dbang sdud drug cu rtsa gcig dang // gab pa'i yig 'bru rtsa ba bcu// drag po bcu gnyis
569a4(sha): kun gyi sngon 'gro ba'o// dbang sdud sum cu rtsa gcig pa// spyi gshig sbyor ba'i rgyal po yin// yan lag dbang po lnga ru bye ba ni// thun mong gsad pa'i drag sngags yin// dril dang /
569a5(sha): dbab pa'i yan lag drag po ni// 'bras bu lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags// bcu bdun lus la spu gri bcu btags pa// thun mong byas pa gshig pa yin// rkang pa sum cu rtsa
569a6(sha): gnyis la// gnod byed pho mo'i skr-i nga po ste// ming dang mtshams su sbyor ba ni// dbang sngad gab pa'i gcad bya yin// lus med yan lag dbye bar bshad// snying po 'bru /
569a7(sha): ming dang sbyar// drag po mthar thug gcad bya yin// sbyor ba kun gyi mtshams su ste// dbang bgrod sngags pa'i yul du bshad// gsad dang gzir ba'i sbyor ba gnyis//
569b1(sha): gdug pas gzir ba'i drag sngags yin// gdug pa yi ge sum cu pa// gnan pa rdo rje lcags kyis sngags// dbang sdud sngags kyi dbye bar bshad// bcu gsum sngags kyi
569b2(sha): sbyor ba yis// lus kyi go dang las dbang sran// lhas log srun pa'i dbye ba gnyis// spyi rgyud lus la 'byung ba yaM// bcu gsum drag po'i sdigs su bshad// 'bru
569b3(sha): dgus ya ma gzi ra ba ra bshad// bcu pa de bzhin ma mo gzir// 'bru brgyad gdug pa gsum po gzir// gcu gcig dregs pa pho mo gzi re// gzi re bzhi'i yin//
569b4(sha): lag sngags su bshad// 'bru lngas dmigs pas gnon pa'i sngags// nyi shu gcig pa drag po'i sngags// bcu bdun skabs sbyor sreg pa'i sngags// drag po sbyor
569b5(sha): ba'i spu gri bzhi// tsit+ta gsad pa'i 'bru bcu yis// lo thog 'joms pa drag po'i sngags// 'bru brgyad lus la gar gshig gdagos// gdug pa snying gzer drag po
569b6(sha): las// gshed bzhi dngas ma'i rig sngags te// gab pa'i sngags kyi dbye bar bshad// spu gri bcu gnyis lus la sbyar// drag po'i sbyor ba gshig pa yin// rtsu ba'i
569b7(sha): yig 'bru bcu gnyis la// spu gri'i sbyor ba nyi shu dbye// skabs kyi mtha' 'gyur ming dang bcas// gsad pa drag po dgod kyi sngags// bcu gnyis lus la srogs
570a1(sha): gzir// lo thog 'joms pa drag po'i sngags// spu gri bcu drug thams cad gzir ba'i sngags// spu gri bcu bzhi dug mda' 'byin// bcu pas
570a2(sha): sngags kyi gsad lam 'gogs// spu gri bco lngas zhen pa bzlog/ yig 'bru nyi shu byad 'grol sngags// bcu gcig b+h+yo btags zug pa 'byin// nyi shu gcig gis
570a3(sha): sngags bdag gzir// bcu bzhis btsan thabs gzir ba'i sngags// yig 'bru bcu dgus nang stobs gshig/ sbyor ba sna tshogs spu grir bshad// gdug pa gzir
570a4(sha): ba'i drag sngags dgu/ yig 'bru bcu dgus gdug pa gsum// lto dkrug drag pos gzir ba yin// yige 'bru bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa// gdug pa'i snying gzer bdun pa'o//
570a5(sha): log 'bru bdun cu rtsa lnga pa// gdug pa'i stong gzor dgu para'o// yig 'bru bcu drug gi zad yin// brgyu dang drug n+d+ha rtsa bzhi'i 'bru// snying gA bar nyi shu rtsa gcig
570a6(sha): khyad par yi ge 'bru bcu gnyis pas// klu gnyan sa bdag gdug pa rnams// rang dbang med par srog dbrog pa'o// brgyu dang yig 'bru bzhi pa yis// gdug pa'i klu
570a7(sha): gnyan sa bdag gi/ snying gzer bcu gcig shi phrad kyi// yang gsang mchog gi drag sngags yin// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// thun mong gdug pa sreg pa'i sngags//
570b1(sha): de bzhin nyi shu bzhi pa yis// las kyi mtha' sdud khyad par gyi// drag po'i sbyor bas sreg pa'i sngags// de dag drag po mngon phyung gi/ lus dang yan lag drag po'i
570b2(sha): sngags// rtsa ba gcig las 'byung bar bshad// bdud kyi drag po bzhi ru bshad// srog dang ser bas ltas ngan dang // drag pos srung ba'i gsang sngags so// yig 'bru
570b3(sha): bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa// pho yi drag sngags bdun pa yin// ma las drangs pa'i drag sngags bdun// bzhi bcu rtsa dgu mo yi sngags// drag sngags bdun la 'bru bzhi btag//
570b4(sha): yig 'bru bdun cu rtsa bdun pa// gsang ba yang stig drag sngags yin// de bzhin bdun cu rtsa bdun 'brus// dus tshod bdun la brdeg pa ni// mtshan mo gcig la rdzogs
570b5(sha): pa yin// de dag gsad pa'i sngags su bshad// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis// bdud dang bdud mo pho nya bdun// rang dbang med par srog dbrog yin// yi ga 'bru/
570b6(sha): nyi shus lus dbang srun// de bzhin nyi shus gtsun cing gzir// bcu bzhi 'bru yis ltas ngan 'bebs// sbyor ba sna tshogs sngags su bshad// yig 'bru bcu gnyis
570b7(sha): ba'i sngags// bcu gcig 'bru ba tags chu dril yin// 'bru bzhi gang 'dod zor gyi sngags// de bzhin 'bru drug thabs kyi sngags// 'bru drug gdug pa gzer nas 'bebs/
571a1(sha): de dag drag sngags gdug pa yis// lo thog gzhom pa'i sngags su bshad// rang gnad 'joms pa'i rig sngags la// bsnyen pa gsad pagan/
571a2(sha): bzor/ sngags kyi yan lag bzhi bzhi yang // bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dag tu bshad// gzhan yang ro langs dmar nag gi/ bod rbad gsang ba sngags gsum dang // rang
571a3(sha): srog dbrog dang gzir bar bshad// me chu thabs kyi sbyor ba gnyis// byin gyis brlab dang 'phang ba'i sngags// spogs pa'i rten dang gsum du bshad// bsrung ba bcu
571a4(sha): gnyis 'bru dag dang // gnyis don sbyar ba 'grub par bshad// srog sngags sum cu rtsa brgyad 'brus// gshin rje stobs kyi rgyal po yis// kha chings sbyor ba bzlog
571a5(sha): par bshad// thun mong sbyor ba brgya dang bcu// byin gyis brlabs dang rtsa ba'i sngags// dbye ba gnyis kyis 'grub par bshad// gsang ba'i sbyor ba nyis brgya la//
571a6(sha): gsad dang gso ba'i nyis rdzogs te// gsad pa mthu gzhug rtsu ba'i sngags// de 'ang gnyis su bsrung ba gnyis// sngags dang rdzas la bslab pa'o// gsang ba sbyor
571a7(sha): ba sngags su bshad// mkha' 'gro spyi yi bsnyen pa dang // nye ba'i bsnyen pa gnyis su bshad// gsad pa'i rig sngags nyi shu gcig/ de dag rtsa ba'i dbye bar bshad// yan/
571b1(sha): lag sbyor ba'i rig pa lnga// 'bru gcig phral dang mthun par bsdeg/ dbang po bcu drug tshe nas bstim// pho mos dkrug pa'i sngags su bshad// rgyal blon la sogs
571b2(sha): gdug pa 'joms// 'bru gnyis sbyor ba las bcu drug/ tshe gnas bstim pa'i sngags su bshad// dbye dgug la sogs bcu gnyis la// 'bru brgyad spu gri gdod
571b3(sha): pa'i ming // yan lag dbye ba'i sngogs su bshad// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa 'phang ba gsum// sbyin 'dang thog gi sngags su bshad// bsnyen dang tshu dral dbab dang rta//
571b4(sha): gza' gdong ser ba'i sngags su bshad// bod rbad gsad dang gnan pa'i sngags// nag mo thun gyi sngags su bshad// bsnyen pa chu dril 'phang dang gsum// 'khor lo dkrug
571b5(sha): dang rten la gzir// gshed bzhi ser ba'i sngags su bshad// 'bru gcig ya la 'gros gnyis ming // spu gr-i dang bcas sbyor ba brgyad// 'bru gcig gsad pa'i sngags su
571b6(sha): bshad// bod rbad gsad pa'i zor gnan pa// shrI sa gzir dang dbye ba lnga// lha mo srini mo'i sngags su be shad// bsnyen pa 'bru bcu ga cig dang ldan// 'bru dgu brtags
571b7(sha): pa rbad pa'i sngags// nyi shu ming bcas 'bru bzhi gcod// ming bcas 'bru brgyad zor du 'phang // 'bru bzhis gnan pa mtha' ru spor// snying zer dgu yi 'khor lo bcar//
572a1(sha): lha mo dme ma sring mo bzhi// sgrol gying bzhi dang lto sdebs pa// rno dpal kha sbyor sngags su bshad// yig 'bru sum cu gnyis kyi sa bod// bco brgyad 'bru
572a2(sha): yis yul la rbad// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis gsad pa'i 'bru// yi ge 'bru bcu bzhes rang srog 'phrog/ de dag li byin yul dang bcas// sgrol gying brgyad dang rno dpal sbyar// li byin
572a3(sha): har gyi sngags su bshad// sum cu rtsa lngas bsnyen pa bod// nyi shus gang dmigs yul la sprad// nyi shu rtsa lnga yig 'brus gsod// yig 'bru bcu bdun srog 'phrog
572a4(sha): yin// de dag sgrol gying dmar po yi// sngags kyi dbye ba bzhi ru bshad// nyi shu bzhi yi yig 'bru yis// ma mo rang bzhin gzir ba'i sngags// nyi shu brgyad kyis btsan thabs
572a5(sha): gzir// yig 'bru nyi shus drag po gzir// yig 'bru bco lngas dam tshig bstan// nyi shu'i yig 'bru ma mo rnams// rang dbang med par sgrog 'phrog yin// rang gnas dbab
572a6(sha): pa'i sngags su bshad// yig 'bru nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyis// gnod sbyin dbang du bsdu ba yin// de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa'i 'brus// gzir zhing shis bstan pa yin// yig
572a7(sha): 'bru sum cus gnod sbyin kun// rang dbang med par srog 'phrog yin// de dag dregs pa'i pho gdon rnams// rang gnad sngags kyi dbye bar bshad// rgyu ni thabs te ka la sogs// sum
572b1(sha): cu gnyis las 'byung bar bshad// rkyen ni shes rab a la sogs// yan lag rgyun du 'dren par bshad// rgyu rkyen gnyis las smon pas sngags// 'dus byas bskye
572b2(sha): pa'i yi ge la// dam rdzas gtor ma'i 'phro 'dus dgug/ brtan dang mthu bcug byin gyis brlabs// dbang bskur mthu rtas gsod cing 'joms// bsnyen pas kha
572b3(sha): g.yogs rgyun mi gcad// rgyun dang bran na las mi 'grub// grod pa ga yang saM'i mthar lhung bas// bde ba'i rgyal pos mngon mi mthong // ngo bo yi ge'i gzugs brnyan
572b4(sha): yin// las ni rkyen dbang gzhan la rten// sbyor ba gsum gyi rgyu rkyen gtso// yan lag nyams na g.yang sa dgod// sgrub pa rkyen gyi sngags su bshad// drag po
572b5(sha): mchog gi sngags dgod ni// rgyu dang rkyen la rog ma lus// bsnyen grub byed rtsol mthar mi lhung // re dogs rtag chad mtha' las 'das// rdzas dang gtor ma gzhung mi
572b6(sha): btsan// 'phro 'du sbyor ba'i rkyen las 'das// khyad par gzhan la rten mi 'cha'// ngo bo chos sku'i rang bzhin lha// rnam pa sngags yig rno dpal mtshon// las ni sna tshogs
572b7(sha): sbyor bache// zhus pa dog thal yin dang ru// 'thugs pa chung ba rten pa pa// 'byed pa lus la 'chang po thob/ 'phen pa dbugs lam shig pa sgoms ldan pa lnga la gcod pa
573a1(sha): / ngo bo chos nyid longs spyod lha// sprul pa'i sbyor ba bsam phrag yas// 'byung ba rang las nus pa gshed// gso ba rang lus bsrung ba 'khor// 'bras
573a2(sha): bu mi gnas chos kyi sku// drag sngags ye shes rig pa'i rtsa la// rig pa'i ngang las rang bzhin 'char// rol pa gsum gyi rtsa la dang ldan// sngags dgod drag po'i rang bzhin bshad/
573a3(sha): gsang sngags gzugs sngags rig sngags gsum// rgyu rkyen bral bcas gnyis su bshad// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ sngags thams cad gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi/
573a4(sha): shu gnyis pa'o// / de nasu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo chen po la bstod pa 'di bshad do// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje gshed//
573a5(sha): gzhugs ni me dpung 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// gA shini rje gdan du 'dings shing ma he gdan du 'dings// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgya ni gsol zhing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
573a6(sha): bzhi bgradang// g.yas dkar g.yon du mar dbus mthing zhal// drag shul rngam pa'i stobs kyis gshin rje dbang du spyad// khro gtum gdug pa'i stobs kyis mu mo dbang du spud//
573a7(sha): dbu skra kham nag ral pa gyen du brdzes// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing 'jig rten yongs kyang skrag/ ya bdud khol po 'khol zhing ma bdud gcer bur 'don// stong gsum zos
573b1(sha): zhing phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed// dgra bgegs snying khrag 'thung zhing mi sha zas su za// dung chen rag tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gshin rje dbang du bsdus la dgra
573b2(sha): bgegs bsgral du gsol// 'jam dpal nag po'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu gsum pa'o// /
573b3(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snang srid thams rud tshe srog gi bdag po las sna tshogs la bskul ba 'di skad bshad do// hrI bskal pa
573b4(sha): brgyad khri bzhi stong 'khor ba'i gzhal yas nas// 'jam dpal nag po sku yi sprul pa yi// srog bdud 'jam dpal tshe bdag nag po ste// sgo med lcags mkhar/
573b5(sha): bcu drug 'bar ba'i nang shed nas// mun khang 'o ba chen bcu gnyis nang shed nas// thod mkhar 'bar ba bzhi yi dbus phyogs nas// gnam lcags spu gri 'bar ba'i dbus
573b6(sha): phyogs nas// sa bdag klu gnyan bsnol ba'i gdan stengs nas// dregs pa pho mo ma nyes brdzis pa nas// thabs dang shes rab rtags kyi gdan stengs nas// sku yang
573b7(sha): rngamachen dregs pa'i cha lugs ni// nag po dug chen 'gyel po dregs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhams bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// g.yas na nyi
574a1(sha): bya/ zla'i 'od zer 'phro// g.yon na khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khrug/ dbus na mun nag dug mtsho ba skyil// phyag g.yas dang po 'khor lo yis// dam nyams
574a2(sha): mgo lus tshul par gshog/ g.yas kyi bar pa ral gri yis// nyams pa'i srog rtsa rtsad nas gcod// tha ma gnam lcags rdo rje yis// spyi bo'i gtsug nas brgya ba nas kyang //
574a3(sha): rkang pa'i mthil du thal bar thon// phyag g.yon dang po be con gyis// nyams pa'i zhe sdang go yang gnon// ba ra du gtun shing dbang po 'joms// mtha' ma sdigs mdzub
574a4(sha): 'bar ba yis// nyams pa'i dug gsum rtsa danas sreg/ sku stod glang chen ko rlon gyis// sa dgu rngam pa zil gyis gnon// sku smad stag gi shum bu yis// sha za mngag
574a5(sha): pa dbang du sdud// zhing gi g.yang gzhi thod sbrul gyis// 'jig rten dregs pa che btsan 'dul// tshe bdag nag po mthu bo che// srog gshed bzhi po las la bskul// bdud
574a6(sha): mo gsod byed mthu bo che// ma mo ki kang dgra la phog/ thugs kyi sprul pa dregs pa can// gdug pa za byed bka' yi bdag/ rdo rje bka' nyan las la bskul// tshe badrag nag
574a7(sha): po spyi gtsug nas// gser gyi bya khyung ga ru Ta// bya khyung rgyal po dam tshig can// bya khyung rgyal po mthu bo che// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog rtsa la// ral gri 'bar ba'i gshes
574b1(sha): ba can// chu gri 'bar ba'i the shog la// ye shes 'bar ba'i gshog zer can// spu yi nyag ma re re las// mtshon chen spu glo'i dpal 'bar bas// nyams pa'i srog rtsa gtan nas
574b2(sha): len// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sder mo yis// klu bdud klu srin gnas nas 'dren// gnam lcags rdo rje mchu yis ma lus 'joms// gang la bya ba khyed shes kyis// dgra bo las ngan sdig
574b3(sha): can 'di// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs la skyon// gdug pa gnyen sreg nang du chug/ gshed kyi gsang mdzod bzhi ru chug/ rtag tu 'khyams pa'i gnas su khrid// rgya mtsho chen po'i gting du
574b4(sha): spos// 'byung ba gtan bzhi rngams kyis no no// tshe bdag nag po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i snying la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo// dregs pa las la bskul bar bshad// de nas yang
574b5(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi tshe ba dag la gshed bskul ba 'di skad bshad do// hUM/ las kyi sprul po che bdag chen po ni// 'byung ba brtan gzhi rngams kyi 'og shed nas// dug mtsho/
574b6(sha): lba tsha ting khol 'gyur// zhe sdang dug mtsho'i nang shed na// dur khrod gdug pa'i gzhal yas nas// sha za rngams pas brgyan pa'i pho brang nas// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu
574b7(sha): drug dbus phyogs nas// 'obs chen bcu gnyis 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor na// klong mkhar 'bar ba bzhi yid bus phyogs na/ pho brang gnam lcags spu gros gtams pa na//
575a1(sha): klu gnyan sa bdag lto 'phye ba snol ba'i gdan stongs na// dregs pa pho mo ma hes pardzis pa na// thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan stengs na// lcags kyi mon/
575a2(sha): ba tshe bdag mgo dgu pa// sku mdog sngon ga ro yi dud pa 'dra// sku la glang chen dur khrod chas kyis brgyun// stag gi sham thabs thod pa'i dro shal can// snyan dang mgur chu phyag
575a3(sha): zhabs sprul gyis brgyan// zhal gsum mkha' lding bya yi mgos// gdug pa gsum dang dgra bo'i glo snying za// zhal gsum gtum rngam khro bo'i mgos// gdug pa'i sbrul dang
575a4(sha): mi ro rta ro 'brul// gsum ni shu za rngam pa'i mgos// nyams pa'i sha khrag nang khrol za// g.yas kyi phyag dgus bsnams pa ni// dang po 'khor los mgo lus gshog
575a5(sha): gnyis pa ral gris srog rtsa gcod// gsum pa rdo rjes dbang po 'joms// bzhi pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum gyis// dgra bo dug gsum rtsa da nas gcod// lnga pa mdung thung snying khrag
575a6(sha): 'byin// drug pa mda' chen snying gzer 'debs// bdun pa zhing chen dbyug tho 'phyar// brgyad pa rdo rje rgya gram gyis// 'phrin las sna tshogs mdzad pa'i rtags// dgu pa gnam
575a7(sha): lcags phur pa yis// dgra bo'i srog dang rtsa la 'debs// phyag g.yon dang pi ba con gyis// dgra bo zhe sdang mgo yang gnon// gnyis pag tu ming dbang po 'joms// gsum bcu
575b1(sha): zhags dgra bo 'gugs// bzhi pa sbrul zhags byad du chug/ lnga pa sdigs mdzub dug gsum sreg drug pa tri shul rtse gsum gyis// lus ngag yid kyi rtsa srog chod// bdun pa dgra
575b2(sha): stas mgo lus gshog/ brgyud pa gzhu yis gdug pa 'dul// dgu pas tsit+te 'byin cing za// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bdud dang mu stegs gnon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor
575b3(sha): thabs klu gnyan sa bdag gnon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs ma he nyi zla gnon// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum thabs dang shes rab tshul// dbu skra ba spu dug gi rlangs pa 'phro// srog bdag
575b4(sha): nag po sdang ba'i dgra la b+h+yo// gang la bya ba dregs pa khyod shes kyis// dam nyams gang yin lus srog myur du grol// g.yon na bdud mo khrag gi ral pa can// ya mtshan bud med rngam pa'i gdod
575b5(sha): nyid kyi sku mdog mthing nag la// ral pa khrag gi zu ru can// spyan nas khrag 'jug zu lu lu// zhal nas mo rau rta ro 'bru la// sku stod zhing gi g.yang gzhi la// nyi ma 'bum gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/
575b6(sha): sku smad steg dang re ldes klubs// thod pa ma mo'i do shal la// sbrul nag 'byam gyi rgyun gyis brgyan// phyag g.yas tri shul rtse gsum gyis// dgra bo dam nyams srog rtsa chod// g.yon pa ban
575b7(sha): dz+ha khrag gis bkang // dgra bo'i khong du dug mda' skyol// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// ma mo ki kang dgra la phob// 'chi bdag chen po'i thugs ka nas// thugs ka'i sprul pa gsod pa'i
576a1(sha): gshed// ya ma rA tsa 'jigs tshul can// smug nag bdud 'dul rngam pa'i gdong // zhal gcig phyag gnyis srog rtsa gcod// g.yas pa rdo rje gri gug gis// dgra
576a2(sha): bo'i mgo lus sha lpags gshog/ tsit+ta phyung zhing zhal du gsol// g.yon pa lcags kyu zhags pa yis// dbang po lus srog drangs shing 'chang // bla dang sprul pa dkrug cing gsol// zhal
576a3(sha): gdangs mche ba gtsigs shing bgrad// tsit+ti nang khrol drangs shing za// ba s+phu smA ra aka tshom las// 'od zer sprul pa phyogs bcur 'pho// tshe gnas dbang po bkug cing 'chang // gsod byed
576a4(sha): chen mo dregs pa can// gang la bya ba khyod shes kyis// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta phyung // ya ma rA tsa dgra la b+h+yo// tshe bdug nag po'i spyi gtsug na// khya khyud rgyal po ga ru Da// gser gyi lus
576a5(sha): la gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mchu// spyan gnyis nyi zlar bskyil ba yis// dgra bo'i bla mtsho gting nas skems// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i gshog rtsa yis// dgra bo'i mgo lus tshul
576a6(sha): par gshog/ ral gri 'bar ba'i gshog pa yis// dgra bo nyams pa'i srog rtsa gcod// theg shog spu gri me ltar 'bar// klu gnyan sa bdag rtsad nas skems// g.yas kyi sder mos
576a7(sha): klu chen brgyad kyang gnon// g.yon pas klu brgyangs bdag gnon// gnam lcags sder mos srog gi dbang po 'dren// sku ni gtum rngam brjid pa'i cha byad kyis// sa bdag klu gnyen lho/
576b1(sha): zil gyis gnon// khyung gi gshog brdabs gdug pa'i gnas khang gshig/ gang la bya ba mkha' lding khyod shes kyis// bya khyung rgyal pos brnag pa'i lus srog phrol// tshe bdag nag
576b2(sha): po dun ting ka/ dgra bo'i srog la ya ya b+h+yo b+h+yo// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ sprul pa chen po las sna tshogs las bskul ba'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
576b3(sha): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gshed bzhi la bskul ba 'di bshad do// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa ni// gshed pa mon pa nag po bzhi// shar gyi phyogs nas
576b4(sha): sku bskyod pa// gshed po ya ma rA tsa ni// sku mdog spug nag 'bar ba la// gcer bu ral pa gyen du brdzes// g.yas pas ma tang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag na 'kho
576b5(sha): lo bskor// yum chen nag mo re ma ti// smyug nag dgra 'dul mthu mo che// g.yas pa thabs kyis ya ba la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka'
576b6(sha): byung gis// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// klad pa gshogs la klang khrag 'thung // lho yi phyogs nas sku bskyod pa// gshed po myos byed 'bar ba ni// sku
576b7(sha): mdog ser nag 'bar ba la// gcer bu ral pa gyen du brdzes// thod pa skam po dbu rgyan la// thod rlon mang po se ral kha// rigs bzhi'i sbrul gyi rgyan cha can// g.yas pa ma trang
577a1(sha): yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'khor lo bskor// myos byed thugs kyis dgyes bskul ma// sbal mgo khrag mig ser nag 'bar// g.yas
577a2(sha): pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dung chen rak+Shas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di bzhes la// tsat+ti
577a3(sha): gshogs la snying khrag 'thung // nub kyi phyogs nas ska bskyod pa// gshed po ar+ya dmar po ni// skra mdog dmar na ga gcer bu la// thod pa mang po'i rgyan cha can// g.yas pa
577a4(sha): gshin rje ma tang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyog na 'khor lo bskor// yum chen sran mo mgo 'chang ma// dmar nag sbrul gyi chun 'khor can// g.yas pa thabs
577a5(sha): kyis ya ba la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dung chen rak+Shas bkang ba'i mi chod pa 'di bzhes la// mgrin pa chod la
577a6(sha): don khrag 'thung // byang gi phyogs na sa sku bskyod pa// gshed po ral pa tshar dgu ni// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba la// gcer bu ral pa gyen du brdzes// thod pa skam po'i
577a7(sha): dbu rgyan la// thod pa rlon pa'i do shal tsan// g.yas pa ma trang ro yi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa'i phyag na 'khor lo 'khor// g.yon na yag sha nag mo ni// ljang nag/
577b1(sha): sbrul gyi cod pan can// g.yas pa thabs kyis yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dud dmar gtso la stob// yab cig 'jam dpal bka' byung gis// dud chen rak+ta sa bkang ba'i/
577b2(sha): mchod pa 'di bzhes la// dam nyams srog rtsa rtsad nas chod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs skyong bcu'i gshed bskor ba 'di bshad do// shar gyi
577b3(sha): phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po dmar po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la mo dpu 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su mgyogs
577b4(sha): byed sha ba chi bas// mchong gi ral pa sel li li// spyan mig dmar po glog ltar 'gyu// phyag na mchong gi zangs grib bsnams// g.yon pa bdud kyi zhags pa thogs// stong
577b5(sha): gsum srog la dbang sgyur ba// khyod kyi ming dang mtshan gsol ba// shar gyi btsan 'gong dmar pos bya// rgya lnga de ni ban d+ha drug/ zhing chen sha dang khrag la za// khyod kyi 'phrin las dus
577b6(sha): la bab/ rak+ta dmar gyi mchod pa 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgral khrag nad thong // shar lho'i mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po dmigs pa ni// dbu gsum
577b7(sha): phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su sdig byed dred mo chibs// phyag na thod 'phreng rlon pa bsnams// 'khor ni me lha 'bum gyis
578a1(sha): bskor// pho log gtong ba'i mthu bo che// drang srong bsgral ba'i sha la za// khyod kyi dam chog dus la bab// dung chen rak+tas bkang ba'i mchod pa 'di
578a2(sha): bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la pho log thong // lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po mig dmar ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me
578a3(sha): dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su smyo byed sha ba chibs// 'khor du phung sri 'bum gyis bskor// sa bdag stong la dbang sgyur zhing // phyag na khra ma byang dkar nag
578a4(sha): 'khrol// mi dur gshed kyi ral pa can// sa byAdag shra dang khrag la za// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la smyo 'bog thong // lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs
578a5(sha): byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po lcogs pa mgo dgu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar po'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su lkugs pa lug
578a6(sha): la tshabs// phyag na rdo rje be con bsnams// 'brum nag gtong ba'i mthu bo che// 'khor du bdud nag 'bum gyis bskor// zas su bdud kyi sha la za// khyod kyi dam tshig dus
578a7(sha): la bag/ sdang ba'i dgra la 'brum nag thong // nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po a ba glang mgo can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me/
578b1(sha): dpung 'bar ba'i rgyun gsol cing // phyag na gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhugs ni rol mtsho'i nang na bzhugs// chibs su sems can pir la chibs// lus ni sbrul nag
578b2(sha): chen po la// byol song glang gi mgo bo can// klu rnams kun la dbang sgyur zhing // zas su klu yi sha la za// 'khor du klu bdud stong gis bskor// mdze dang lhog pa'i sna 'dren ma// khyod kyi
578b3(sha): dam tshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la mdze dang lhog pa thong // nub byang mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po yab ti// dbu gsum
578b4(sha): phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su mgyogs byed rtal chibs// yab bdud stong la dbang sgyur zhing // nag po spyi chibs bdud
578b5(sha): kyi bu// phyag na bdud kyi khram byang thogs// 'khor ni yab bdud stong gis bskor// zas su mi sha rlon du za// gzer nad gtong ba'i mthu bo che// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// khyod kyi
578b6(sha): dam tshig dus la bab// sdang ba'i dgral gzer nad thong // byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po gtel pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la me
578b7(sha): dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su phung sri rnga mo chibs// phyag na nad kyi rgyal pa thogs// nad do cog gi bdud gcig po// mi dur gshed kyi ral pa can// dmu bdud
579a1(sha): skyong la dbang sgyur cing // phung mi 'brum sde po nyar 'gyed// smyo' bog gtong ba'i mthu bo che// 'khor du ma bdud 'bum gyis bskom/ khas su phyung sri
579a2(sha): sha la ba// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sdang po'i dgu la spro 'bog thong // byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po
579a3(sha): cha sangs ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad // sbru la mi dpung 'bar ba'i rgyun gsol cing // sku mdog dkar po ral pa can// stong gsum srid pa zas su pa// stong
579a4(sha): g+ha m+b+ha srid pa sgrom d+ma 'byung // na bza' dkar po nam mya khwa'i sprin wA gA b+h+yas// spyan mig dmar po nam mkha'i grog+sa ltar 'gyu// 'khor du ya bdud 'bum gyis bsgo m+bu khyA na
579a5(sha): glog gi zhags pa thog ste// klung na dag sbyong ba'i m+b+ha b+hu bo / da kyi de mtshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// snang ba'i dgral gling nad thong // ga gi phyogs nas
579a6(sha): 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i rgyal po stag mgo nag pa ni// da bug sum phyag d+hag zhabs bzhir bzad// sbru la mi dpung 'bar ba'i rgyan gastsol cing // sbrul mugo brgyags pa
579a7(sha): thod ga dang can// chibs su ba glang dmar po tshabs// phyag na zhing gi zhags pa thigs// stong gsum gru la dbang sgyur zhing // zas su klu srin shal mo// mdze dang ldog pa'i/
579b1(sha): 'dren pa// khyod kyi dam tshig dus la ba ba// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la mdze dang lhog pa thong // steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// gshin rje'i
579b2(sha): rgyal po nag 'joms ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku la bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i rgyan gsol cing // chibs su 'brug mo ral can tshabs// dbu
579b3(sha): sgraskra kham na ga sprin ltar gtibs// phyag na be con dbyug tho bsnams// zas su gza' yi sha la za// 'khor du lha bdud 'a bum gyis bskor// ba la nad gtong ba'i mthu bo che// khyod
579b4(sha): kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sha khrag gtor ma 'di bzhes la// sdang ba'i dgra la bal nad thong // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud po bcu la bskul ba
579b5(sha): 'di bshad do// 'jigs byed sprul pa'i pho nya ni// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po mi bzad brang dkar rje// phyag na bdud kyi rta nag 'byam pa
579b6(sha): thogs// 'phyar zhing dgra bo'i me go la brdeg/ dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab po khram la tho ba// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po
579b7(sha): ma he khro bdag rje// phyag na bdud kyi ral gri 'byam pa thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// shar lho mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa//
580a1(sha): bdud kyi rgyal po tho ya tho nag rje// phyag na bdud kyi spu gri rnon po thogs// dam las 'dus pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thog// lho yi
580a2(sha): phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rngam chen thog bdag rje// phyag ni dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab
580a3(sha): khrakhrim la thob// lho nub mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po dmu bdud ral pa rje// phyag na bdud kyi khram byang thod pas brgyan pa thogs// dam las 'das pa'i na
580a4(sha): pa la/ dus la bab bo khram la thob// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rag sha mi dur rje// phyag na bdud kyi sog le 'byam pa thogs// dam las 'das
580a5(sha): pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab po kham la thob// nub byung mchis su nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po sto bor mgo nag dz+haiM// phyug na bdud kyi gri gug thod pa thogs// dam
580a6(sha): las 'das pa'i banag pa la// dus la bab po khram la thob// byung gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po zhag po gsod sbyang ste// phyug ni bdud kyi shin pa gri rings thugs/
580a7(sha): dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo kham la thob// byang shar mtshams nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po rngam pa 'gro bdag rdzi// phyag na bdud kyi dri shul
580b1(sha): rtse gsum thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab bo khram la thob// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs byed pa// bdud kyi rgyal po sa to nag po rje// phyag na gti//
580b2(sha): mug phag gi mgo bo thogs// dam las 'das pa'i brnag pa la// dus la bab po khram la thob// 'phrin las kun gyi sbyor ba la// bstod bskul byas na don gnyis 'grub// rtsol
580b3(sha): bas smin pa'i las su bshad// rgyu la mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ 'khor gyi gshin rje la gshed bsgo ba'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas
580b4(sha): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud pho mo las la bsngags pa 'di bshad do// phyogs phyogs tsam gcig ya gi na// sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi ya stengs na// bdud yul nag po
580b5(sha): mthong khyab na// bdud mkhar nag po lcags mkhar sgro dgu na// bdud ye med 'khrul gyi rgyal po bzhugs// sku la bdud gos 'od nag 'khyil ba gsol// phyag na bdud kyi zhags
580b6(sha): pa nag po bsnams// 'dzam bu gling gi 'gro ba mi la 'debs// g.yas na bdud kyi rtsis byang chen mo bsnams// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams khram la 'debs// chibs su bdud rta
580b7(sha): ngar chen 'brug la chibs// chibs kha dgra bo'i yul du bskyod la gshegs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud po mi zad snying rkun ma// sku ni mthing nag 'jigs
581a1(sha): tshul can// sku la dar nag na bza' zhing dang sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// dbu ral nag po khrag dang thod pas brgyan// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri sdig can
581a2(sha): bsnams// dgra bo phung byed sgrog rtsa chod las shog/ g.yon na ban d+ha lcang lo khrag gis bkang ba bsnams// dgra bo'i yul du khrag mda' khrag zor 'phongs// chibs su dre rta rkang gsum
581a3(sha): thod pas brgyan pa chibs// chibs kha dam nyams dgra la bskyod las gshegs// sngags kyi sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po drang khar rngam pa rje// bdud rta nag po sra
581a4(sha): med rta ru zhon// sku la gser gyi skrag pa gsol// phyag na gser gyi 'gying dkar bsnams// g.yon na bdud kyi rtsis byang bsnams// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi
581a5(sha): blon po tha~M yo mtho mtshams rje// chibs su bdud rta nag po rting dkar chi bas// sku la dar nag thod pas brgyan pa gsol// g.yas pas bdud kyi ral gri kha mangs bsnams// g.yon na/
581a6(sha): bdud kyi zhags pa nag po bsnams// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po sA le dag btsan rje// chibs su bdud rta 'brong chen 'gying ba chi bas// sku la mun
581a7(sha): pa'i na bza' gzha' yis brgyan pa gsol// phyag g.yas bdud kyi gze ma kha mangs bsnams// g.yon pa zhing gi zhags pa dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las
581b1(sha): shog/ bdud kyi blon po gsod sbyong rje// chibs su bdud kyi dur bya nag po chibs// sku la zhing chen skrag pa gsol// phyag g.yas zhing gi dbyug pa bsnams// g.yon pa glog gi zhags
581b2(sha): pa dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po mi dur so dar rje// sku la nam mkha' 'od nag 'khyil ba gsol// tshabs su lcags kyi sdig pa kha
581b3(sha): dgu chi bas// phyag g.yas sprul pa'i bdud bye stag gzig rngam pa bsnams// g.yon pa yid dang rlung gi zhags pa dgra la 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud
581b4(sha): kyekyi blon po kha yal 'thom po rje// sku la lcags kyi zhun khrab gsol// chibs su lcags kyi phag po tshobs// phyag g.yas lcags mda' gzer chen bsnams// g.yon pa bdud gzhu 'od
581b5(sha): ma bsnams// dgra bo'i snying la lcags gzer 'debs// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud kyi blon po rngam pa klu 'dul rje// sku la chu srin skrag pa sbrul gyis brgyan
581b6(sha): pa gsol// chibs su chu glang sngon po chibs// phyag g.yas lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams// g.yon pa tsit+taM'i 'phreng ba bsnams// khong nas tsit+ti thon las shog/ sngags pa'i sku dgra
581b7(sha): myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo blon zan kha chem// sku la mthong nag go zu lu// drod chen sbrul gyis brgyan pa gsol// tshigs su chu bo'i gzhung la chibs// g.yas pas snying
582a1(sha): 'byin g.yon pas stob// bdud mtsho mer ba gting nas 'khrug/ yid la dag 'gyed blo snying brku// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo
582a2(sha): kha 'bur ral gcig ma// sku la re lde gnam phyed gsol// chibs su cang shes bong bu chi bas// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// kha nas dug gi skyugs pa 'thor
582a3(sha): dug mtsho khol ma gting nas rlob// blo la dzag 'khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ rdo rje mche gtsigs lha gdon 'dul// sku la ri nag rus pra
582a4(sha): brgyan pa gsol// tshibs su lcags kyi sdig pa chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// spyan nas khrag 'dzag mchi mar 'dzag/ khrag mtsho'i khyil ba'i gting nas
582a5(sha): rlob/ dbugs la dzag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ gtum mo khrag 'thung dri za 'dul// sku la zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// chibs su rtol
582a6(sha): mo ru rings chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas sto ba// zhal nas khrag gi za ru 'dzag/ bdud mtsho smug nag gting nis rlob// khrag la dzag byed snying la brkus// sngags
582a7(sha): pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo mi zad khrag skems ma// sku la chu srin skrag pa sbrul gyi sa brgyan pa gsol// chibs su ru sbal khra bo bcibs// g.yas pas snying
582b1(sha): 'byin g.yon pas stob// spyan nas khrag 'dzag zhal nas mi ro 'bru la// klu mtsho smug nag gting nas rlob// sha za dzag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las
582b2(sha): shog/ bdud mo rag sha srin mo 'dul// sku la dom nag g.yang gzhi gsol// tshibs su so bya rog po chibs// g.yas pas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// mchi ma khra ga dang dug
582b3(sha): tu 'dzagasrani mtsho mer ba gting nas rlob// rus la dzag khye snying la rkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ bdud mo phung byed sa bdag 'dul// ska la dar nag gza/
582b4(sha): skar brgyan pa gsol// kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// chibs su kye le gdong drug chibs// kha gdengs so 'dar lag pa bairdze// g.yas nas snying 'byin g.yon pas stob// rim
582b5(sha): gyi rgya mtsho gting nas rlob// rtsa la dzag khye snying la brkus// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mon pho mo las la bskul
582b6(sha): ba 'di bshad do// mon pa nag po dred la zhon// phyag na dung gi bai con bsnams// nyams pa kun gyi gzugs phung gshig/ g.yon pas dam nyams tsit+te 'byin// sku la dar nag ber
582b7(sha): chen gsol// kha rlangs na bun sprin du gtibs// so 'dar ljags 'dril tsit+ta gsol// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i
583a1(sha): sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po 'brug la zhon// sku la nam mkha'i 'od nag gza' yis brgyan pa gsol// dbu yi ral pa nam mkha'i//
583a2(sha): sprin ltar gtibs// snyan nas 'brug sgra stong gsum zi la gyis gnon// phyag nas thog dang skar mda' dgra la 'phen// spyan nas dug gi ser ba drag tu 'bebs// dam nyams
583a3(sha): dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i ska dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po khyung la zhon// sku la g.yang gzhi'i ber chen
583a4(sha): gsol// dbu skra stong gsum mun nag gtibs// phyag nas nyi ma'i 'od zer sdang ba'i dgral 'gyed// bar snang rgyu zhing dam nyams yid la 'dzin// dam nyams dgra
583a5(sha): bopo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i skye dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po glog la zhon// sku la 'od kyi na bza' gsol//
583a6(sha): dbu skra sbrul nag mun ltar gtibs// zhal nas mi ro rta ro 'brul// phyag na ral gri dgra la 'debs// g.yon pa tsat+ta 'byin cing gsol// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi//
583a7(sha): rnam shes bklag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po stag la zhon// sku la dar nag ber chen gsol// dbu skra dug gi sprin
583b1(sha): gtibs// dug gi kha rlangs bun de bun// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// dam nyams dgra bo'i mgo lus gshog/ g.yon pas nyams pa'i tsit+te 'byin// sha za khrag 'thung rtsa
583b2(sha): la 'jib// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i skra dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po chu srin zhon// sku la chu
583b3(sha): srin skrag pa gsol// dbu ral rgya mtsho mun ltar gtibs// sbal pa stong gi rgyan gyis brgyan// phyag ne me 'bar rgya mtsho skems// dgra bo dug gsum rtsad nas sreg/ rgya
583b4(sha): mtsho'i gting nas ser ba 'bebs// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag mdangs drod dang 'brel// sngags po'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nA ga
583b5(sha): po sbrul la zhon// sku la zhing gi g.yang gzhi gsol// dbu la khrag gi zar bu 'bab// spyan nas khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag/ phyag na zhing gi dbyug tho bsnams// g.yon pa dgra bo'i
583b6(sha): tsit+taM gsol// dgra bo'i khong nas tsit+ta 'byin// dam nyams dgra bo sdig can gyi// rnam shes bkrag ma dngas drod dang 'brel// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon/
583b7(sha): ba nag po dom la zhon// gcer bu mthod phyag na bsnams// sprul pa gcer bu 'bum sde 'gyed// dam nyam tha' rnga bo sdig can gyi// klad pa gshog la klad khrag spyos// khong nas
584a1(sha): snying phyung snying khrag 'thung // gzugs phung gshig la bkrag mdangs 'phrol// sngags pa'i sku dgra myur du sgrol las shog/ mon pa nag po khro gnyer/
584a2(sha): can// dar nag be ra chen sku la gsol// thod pa 'bum gyi cha ga can// sprul nag stong gi rgyan chu klubs// ral pa dug gi phur pas brgyan// g.yon na ban d+ha khrag gis bkang //
584a3(sha): g.yas pas thun rlob tshi li li// khrag mda' bu yug dgra la 'bebs// thun gyi mon mo lag rings ma// dam nyams dgra la snying thun b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo bla rkun ma// lag na sha
584a4(sha): za'i tsit+taM bsnams// zhabs gnyis bgrad nas lag pa brdzi// gsang ba'i snying gzer dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo tshe 'phrog ma// lag na rme khrag rims nad 'phen// rims nad
584a5(sha): dgra la mi ltar spros// gsang ba'i snying gzer dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo snying rkun ma// bag+h+ra dug zer dgra la 'phen// dal gyi bu yug char ltar 'bebs// dgra bo myos shi
584a6(sha): rlams su 'dzud// gsang ba'i dug zor dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo dgug sdud ma// lag ni 'brong chen rA zor bsnams// smyo 'bog lhog rgal dgra la 'bebs// dbang po
584a7(sha): 'chal dang gzer du chug/ rwa zor brnag pa'i dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo thun 'bebs ma// lag na phur zor dug thun bsnams// mdze shu lhog pa yams su 'bebs/
584b1(sha): klu gnyan sa bdag pho nyar 'gyed// dug zor phur mda' dgra la 'phen// gsang ba'i dug zor dgra la b+h+yo// mon mo nag mo gzer 'debs ma// lag na lcags mda' snying
584b2(sha): gzer bsnams// bsnol thog rme gri dgra la 'bebs// shan pa srog gcod pho nyar 'gyed// rme gri shan dmar dgra la thong // gsang ba'i snying zor dgra la b+h+yo/
584b3(sha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis pho brang chen po la bshags pa 'di bshad do// 'phags pa'i rgyal po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos skra byang chub sems dpas ma
584b4(sha): g.yos pa'i// yab yum sras dang 'khor bcas dgongs su gsol// bdag cag dkyil 'khor 'di la mngon du zhugs pa rnams// nongs pa mchis nas 'gyed pas
584b5(sha): dam du bcas// thugs rje che dgongs 'gyod pas mthu dang dngos grub gsol// ya man ta ka khro bo'i tshogs kyi gtso// sbyor sgrol yum mchog gsang ba'i mtshogs bdag
584b6(sha): gnyis med e yi gdan las dgongs su gsol// kun tu bzang po mchod pa che ba'i don ma rtogs// phyag rgya ye shes mchod pa'i rgyud ma grol// phyi yi mchod pa yul la
584b7(sha): rtag par bzung // yab yum khyed kyi thugs dang ci 'gal ba// thugs rje che mnga' khyer la bzod par gsol// khro chen sprul pas sku gsung thugs kyi rgya// dregs pa
585a1(sha): yab yum dngos grub rtags kyi lha// lus ngag yid kyi rtog sbyong dgongs su gsol// rung 'byung bdud rtsi rgyu rkyen rtsol bas nyams//
585a2(sha): sta na sgrol mchog mchod pa'i byin chungs shing // 'ga' na sbyor mchog mchod pa'i gnas ma stob// sprul pa pho mo'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// sku gsung thugs
585a3(sha): kyi 'da' dka' 'o// ya ma rA dza gshed po tshogs kyi gtso// lha mo nag mo bdud mo tshogs kyi gtso// sgrol ging shan pa pho mo dgongs su gsol// sha khrag
585a4(sha): dmar gyi mchod pa byin chungs pas// phyi dang nang gi bskang ba brten ma 'byongs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa gnas ma stob// gshed pho gshed mo'i thugs/
585a5(sha): dang ci 'gal ba// dang sa ma'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o// gshed po nag 'joms pho nya'i tshogs kyi gtso// bdud po mi zan rngam pa'i tshogs
585a6(sha): rnams dang // thar byed chen po dgu rnams de gongs su gsol// mchod rdzas rgyan rdzas phyi rdzas rten rdzas dang // nang gi dam rdzas brten rdzas brnag/
585a7(sha): pa'i rdzas// 'khor lo sbyor rdzas gsang ba'i dbang rdzas rnams// bka' dang byin nyams pho nya dbang ma 'dul// pho nya gsod byed thugs dang ci 'gal ba//
585b1(sha): ya na lag grub pa wAn gyis grub pa'o// ro langs na ga mo ma mo'i tshogs kyi ga // ro langs dmar mo srin mo Shi tshogs kyi gtso// sgrol ging lce
585b2(sha): spyang rngam pa dgongs su gsol// longs spyod chung bas tshogs kyi yan lag nyams// 'dod yon lnga yis lha mo rgyud ma grol// sngags dang ting
585b3(sha): 'dzini phyag rgya rgyud ma grol// rngam pa phro mo'i thugs dang ci 'gal ba// rtsa rgyud phyo brang gnas su dag pa'o// bka' nyan mon dang mon mo'i tshogs
585b4(sha): rnams dang // sha za kyai kam drug khri drug stong dang // ya ma brtan ma sgom dgongs su gsol// lhag ma'i gnas rI stabs dang dug lnga nyams//
585b5(sha): las kyi kha ma thus pas dngos grub rtags ma phyin// bran dang g.yog 'khor thugs dang ci 'gal ba// snang stong sgyu ma lhun gyis grub pa'o// grol byed
585b6(sha): ging dang ka sing gnas yul brgyad// mche ba sder mo gshog pa za byed tshogs// rgyud rgyal 'phrul gyi rigs 'dzin rnams// ma lus 'khor dang bcas
585b7(sha): pa dgongs su gsol// phyi dang nang gi ma dngos rnams kyang // rang dam gdug pa rdzas rnams dbye sri nyams// phyi yi 'khor dang longs spyod ma dag
586a1(sha): / ga/ snang stong sgyu ma lhun gyis grub pa'o// dngos po bdun dang bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bcus// sbyor ba du ma drag po gsum dang /
586a2(sha): gcig/ dbang dang byin rlabs dngos grub don ma rtogs// rig pa'i rgyal po rig pa gsum dang 'brel// lung gi rgyal po sbyor ba'i yan lag gtams//
586a3(sha): tshig lung ma 'dres brda yi sgo ma phye// mtshan ma skye med dbyings las shar ba'o// rgyal mtshan me long gi rgyud las/ bdud pho mo las la mngag pa dang mtshan
586a4(sha): ma dbyings su bshags pa'i le'u ste brgya nyi shu drug po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor thams cad la gdams pa'i don 'di
586a5(sha): bshad do// e ma'o chos sku byang chub sems// e ma'o zhi ba'i rang bzhin gnas// e ma'o 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyir// e ma'o khro bo rngam pa'i sku//
586a6(sha): mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings nyid las// 'khor lo dag pa'i rgyun du sprul// ye shes rig pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// mtshan dang dpe byad ngang gis rdzogs// chags
586a7(sha): sdang lnga nyid sbyor ba'i lam// yon tan sna tshogs 'byung ba'i gzho// mtshon cha'i rgyal po gdug pa'i dpal// gcod dang slar ldog lto bar 'khyam// e ma
586b1(sha): sbyor ba du yi ga zhi// zang bzhin gnyis ka'i dmigs pa 'du// nges pa'i don med skon de dag/ yon tan du ma lhan gyis grutha// dngos med dngos po dag las
586b2(sha): 'das// brjod med brjod dang bral ba'ang min// 'jig rten 'khor ba'i khams ma yin// mya ngan 'das pa dngos dang bral// sa khams 'byung ba'i sa las
586b3(sha): dbang // mi shigs rdo rje'i sbyor ba'o// rtag chad kha dog phyag mtshan zhal// snang stong gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan ldan//
586b4(sha): bdun dang lnga sogs thams cad kyis// sbyor ba du ma'i mtshon cha 'di// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs// phyung nas rdo rje'i gsang lam brgyud//
586b5(sha): longs spyod 'khor gyi sangs rgyas dang // sprul pa 'khor gyi rdzu 'phrul dang // dngas ma lhun grub gnas pa'i 'khor// lha mi dregs 'khor rdzu 'phrul
586b6(sha): can// byang sems bka' dang lung por min// slob dpon yul la brnyas mi brjod// sangs rgyas bka' dang mchod pa'i rgyun// 'da' bar ma yin rtag
586b7(sha): tu gnas// gnas mchog gzungs ma sems mi spang // bdag gzhan byang chub sems mi gsad// yongs su ma sbyang tshad ma sbyor// tshogs lam
587a1(sha): don gyi lam gtor la// gsang ba'i brda dang dbang mi smra// phung po dngos med chos mi brnyas// dad ldan mi ldog phyag rgya brtag/ bka'
587a2(sha): la tshad ma sgras mi gzhal// dam rdzas gzungs ma dregs pa bsten// rnal 'byor mi brtag gsang sngags bzlas// bla ma dam chog dam rdzas lung // cung zad
587a3(sha): 'das na de yis ni// dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi bskad gso bya// dad pa'i sgo gsum sdom la gnas// sems kyi rten pa skye med brtags// gshin rje gshed kyi dka'
587a4(sha): thub bsrungs// brtul zhugs rig pa rdzas la spyad// sems kyi 'khor lo rtag tu blta// gdug pa'i snying po dbang du bsdu// las kyi rnam grangs du ma brtsam//
587a5(sha): gshin rje'i phyag rgya don dang sbyar// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis che ba'i don du 'di bshad do// e ma'o gsang ba'i gsang bcud 'di// 'kho
587a6(sha): lo rgyal po mtshon chen 'di// rgyud rgyal me long rgyal mtshan 'di// las kyi rgyal po mtshon cha yin// khyung chen nam mkha' dbang sdud yin// seng ge rtsal
587a7(sha): bsgoms sems can zil gyis gnon// dregs pa'i rgyal pos bde ba'i gnas la bgrod// lhun po nam mkha' rin chen rgya mtsho me// gsang rgyud bshad pa 'phrul
587b1(sha): gyi bka'// shes rab dbang gi rtsa la mi ldan// 'khor gyi rigs dang rigs min kun// nga yi snying po bcud bsdus pa'i// sna tshogs 'phrul gyi sbyor ba 'di// shes rab
587b2(sha): dbang gi rtsa la dang sbyor// sangs rgyas bka' yi byin brlabs nas// gsang ba'i bdag pos rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba bstan// byin gyis brlabs dang
587b3(sha): ldan pa yis// log pa'i sems 'chang 'dul byed bka'// gsang lam sbyor ba'i dag pa 'di// sangs rgyas stobs dpag med pa'o// mngon par rdzogs par
587b4(sha): sangs rgyas dang // gshin rje gshed po'i dge 'dun rnams// lha dang lha min gsang ba'i bdag/ ma mo myos byed khrag 'thung 'bum// mkha' 'gros smyo byed bya
587b5(sha): stesnyems sam// bdud dang srin po shu za'i tshogs// srin mo la sra byed gnod sbyin klu// mu stegs ke ka byAd stems gnyan// nyi zla dbang phyug dkor srungs gza'//
587b6(sha): / rgyal po sngags pa gling srog bdag/ stobs chen 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// mu stegs log pa'i nus pa 'joms// kun kyang gshin rje gshed po'i 'khor// rab tu mi
587b7(sha): bsrun 'jig rten dregs// bde ba'i 'khor du 'dus pa rnams// bde ba'i snying bo lam can 'di// khro bo rgyal po dregs pa 'khor// khro bo gshin rje gshed pon// sangs
588a1(sha): @#rgyus sku gsung thugs kyi bcud// bsdus nas rdo rje lam las phyung // gsang ba'i pho brang gnas su bskyil// snying med thugs kyi
588a2(sha): snying po las// 'khor gyi khro tshogs pho mo rnams// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// nga yi 'phrul gyi gsang rgyud 'di// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// nga yang dam
588a3(sha): las mi yol srung // 'khor gyi dregs pa pho mo dang // dbang chen sangs rgyas chos srungs rnams// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// skal ldan bsgrub pa'i bcud
588a4(sha): len dang // rgyud kyi snying po 'dzin pa la// de tshe gshin rje gshed po yis// dam tshig 'byung dang thugs brtse ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
588a5(sha): la 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan gyi me long gi rgyud las/ yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste
588a6(sha): brgya dang nyi shu bdun pa'o// // bshad pa'i rgyud chen po gshin rje thams cad 'byung ba 'khrul 'khor rgyal mtshan sbyor ba du
588a7(sha): ma'i bcas gzhi rdzogs so// // sngags dang mtshon cha ba ka'i bdag po gsum gyi rgyas gdab pa'o// rgya rgya rgya//
